airway	<h3>airway</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>通气道, 通风巷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a purple airway in London Airport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伦敦机场里有一条皇家专用飞机跑道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lay them on their side and ensure the airway is unobstructed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让他们侧躺着, 并确保呼吸道畅通。</font><br>\n
alarm	<h3>alarm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>警告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before the enemy's attack he crossed the river and alarmed the unarmed villagers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在敌人进攻前, 他过河去向手无寸铁的村民报警。</font><br>使惊慌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The breaking of a branch under my foot alarmed the deer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我踩断了一根树枝, 把那头鹿吓惊了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>警钟, 警报器, 闹钟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is afraid of waking up late, so he always has an alarm on his bedside table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怕睡过头，总是在床头小几上放一个闹钟。</font><br>警报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three fire companies answered the alarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到警报后, 三个消防队都来了。</font><br>惊恐, 忧虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He jumped up in alarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惊慌地跳了起来。</font><br>\n
album	<h3>album</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>粘贴簿, 集邮簿, 相册<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The photos belong in an album.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些照片应该放在相册里。</font><br>唱片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you look over his album?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要不要去看看他的歌集唱片?</font><br>\n
alcohol	<h3>alcohol</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>酒; 酒精; 含酒精的饮料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whisky contains a large percentage of alcohol.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 威士忌的酒精含量极高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The law forbids shops to sell alcohol to minors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律禁止商店向未成年者出售含酒精的饮料。</font><br>\n
alert	<h3>alert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>警惕的, 警觉的, 注意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man alert in problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个留意问题的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rabbit seems to be very alert all its life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兔子似乎一生都小心翼翼, 十分警觉。</font><br>机灵的, 敏捷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has an alert mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很机灵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A monkey is very alert in its movements.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猴子的动作很敏捷。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(某人)保持警觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The voice of the caller alerted her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 呼唤者的声音使她警觉起来。</font><br>提醒(某人)注意(某事)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boss alerted him that thief might come out at night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老板要他提防夜里可能有贼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>警戒; 警报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole navy was placed on full alert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个海军都处于全面戒备状态。</font><br>\n
alike	<h3>alike</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>同样的, 相像的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two office buildings are somewhat alike in appearance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两座办公楼在外形上有点相似。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The twins are so alike that I can't tell which is which.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对双胞胎一模一样, 我分辨不出谁是谁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同样地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She treats all her students alike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对她所有的学生都同样看待。</font><br>\n
alive	<h3>alive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>活着的, 在世的, 存在的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is still alive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他仍然活着。</font><br>有活力的, 活跃的, 有生气的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is alive in every nerve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他浑身是劲。</font><br>\n
all	<h3>all</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>一切的, 所有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the children are not noisy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 并不是所有的儿童都吵闹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All his toys cannot make him happy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 即使他的全部玩具也不能使他快乐。</font><br>全部的, 总的, 整个的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All my flowers have died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的花全死了。</font><br>尽量的, 极度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All five men are hard workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们五个人工作都很努力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>全部; 一切<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All were silent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家都不吭声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All of us were disappointed by him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他使我们大家都失望了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地, 很<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed all in white.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她从头到脚一身白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was all excited.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常兴奋。</font><br>\n
allergic	<h3>allergic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>过敏的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Alice is allergic to the fur of cats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 艾丽斯对猫的皮毛过敏。</font><br>\n
alliance	<h3>alliance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结盟, 联盟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two parties entered into a defensive alliance with each other to win the election.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个政党结盟以争取在选举中获胜。</font><br>同盟国; 结盟的社会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The SDP-Liberal Alliance is holding a conference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 社会民主党—自由党联盟正在举行会议。</font><br>\n
allow	<h3>allow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>允许, 许可(做某事)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think he would allow it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他不会允许的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do they allow smoking in the cinemas?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们允许在电影院里抽烟吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Allow me to introduce you to our headmaster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请允许我介绍你见见我们的校长。</font><br>给予, 让…得到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The court allowed a sum of money to each child for clothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法院判给每个孩子一笔服装费。</font><br>承认, 认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The referee refused to allow the goal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁判不承认这次进球。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must allow yourself to be wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须承认自己错了。</font><br>\n
allowance	<h3>allowance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>津贴, 补助, 零用钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pension includes an allowance of fifty pounds for traffic expenditures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年金中包括50镑交通费补贴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Government officials who travel on business are given traveling allowances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因公出差的政府官员享有出差补贴。</font><br>\n
ally	<h3>ally</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)结盟, (使)联合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This country allied with another country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家与另一国家结盟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Common interests allied this country with many others during the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在大战中共同的利益使该国与许多国家结盟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>同盟国, 同盟者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In that war England was not an ally; she was neutral.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那场战争中, 英国不同任何一国结盟, 保持中立。</font><br>支持者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt she needed an ally so badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她感到她极需一个支持者。</font><br>\n
almost	<h3>almost</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>几乎, 差不多, 差一点; 将近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his blind haste he almost ran into the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他匆匆忙忙地几乎跑到河里去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the hall it was almost dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大厅里几乎漆黑一片。</font><br>\n
alone	<h3>alone</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>单独的; 独一无二的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was all alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他单独一个人。</font><br>仅仅, 惟一, 只有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Time alone will show who was right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有时间能证明到底谁对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not alone in this opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 持这种意见的不只是我一个人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>单独地, 独自地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他独自一人来了。</font><br>\n
along	<h3>along</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向前, 往前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policeman told the crowds to move along.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察叫人群向前走。</font><br>一道, 一起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come to the party and bring some friends along.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请来参加聚会并带些朋友来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)沿着…的某地点; 在…旁的某地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His room is along this passage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的房间在这条通道上。</font><br>(表示方向)沿着, 循着, 顺着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I took my dog for a walk along the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我带着狗沿那条河散步。</font><br>(表示方位)靠着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a striped sofa along the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一张靠墙放着的有条纹的沙发。</font><br>(表示依据)根据, 顺着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Here are a few suggestions along this line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是根据这一路线提出的一些意见。</font><br>\n
alongside	<h3>alongside</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>靠着边, 沿着边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boat came alongside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船靠岸了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two ships lay alongside of each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两艘船并排靠着。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…旁边; 沿着…的边; 与…并排靠拢着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧院旁边有一家肉店。</font><br>(表示比较)与…放在一起比较<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put this cloth alongside real silk, and you will at once see the difference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这块料子同真丝放在一起比较, 你就会立刻看出差别。</font><br>(表示伴随)与…一起, 与…一道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a pleasure to work alongside such men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与这样的人一起工作是一件乐事。</font><br>\n
aloud	<h3>aloud</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>出声地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was thinking aloud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把想的事说出来了。</font><br>大声地, 高声地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He called aloud for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他高声喊叫救命。</font><br>\n
alphabet	<h3>alphabet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>字母表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A precedes B in the alphabet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 字母表上A在B的前面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语字母表中有26个字母。</font><br>\n
already	<h3>already</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>早已, 已经<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had already left when I called.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我打电话去时, 他已走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I came in, she was already laying the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我进来时, 她已在摆餐具了。</font><br>\n
also	<h3>also</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>也, 同样, 并且<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to get a passport, and you'll also need a visa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须申办护照, 同时还需要有签证。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am also writing a short story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我也写短篇小说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The son has gone also.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 儿子也去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She not only plays well, but also writes music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不仅很会演奏, 而且还会作曲。</font><br>\n
alter	<h3>alter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>改变, 更改<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As times alter, men's affections change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时过境迁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is trying to alter the coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正设法改那件衣服。</font><br>\n
alternative	<h3>alternative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>两者择一的, 供替代的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We returned by the alternative road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们从另一条路回来的。</font><br>不寻常的, 非传统性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are alternative medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是非传统性药物。</font><br>非正统的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This kind of newspaper is alternative press.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种报纸是非正统性报刊。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>取舍, 抉择, 可供选择的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The only alternative to being taken prisoner was to die fighting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了当俘虏之外, 惟一的选择就是奋战至死了。</font><br>选择的余地, 可供选择的机会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm afraid I have no alternative but to report you to the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怕除了向警方告发你以外, 我是别无选择了。</font><br>\n
although	<h3>although</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>尽管, 虽然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Although my car is very old, it still runs very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的汽车虽然很旧, 但仍然跑得很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Although they are poor they are happy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然他们很穷, 但很快乐。</font><br>但是, 然而<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的，但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支。</font><br>\n
altitude	<h3>altitude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>高度, 海拔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane flew at an altitude of 20, 000 feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这架飞机在两万英尺的高空飞行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the altitude of the top of the mountain?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座山的顶峰海拔是多少?</font><br>高处, 高地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At high altitudes it is difficult to breathe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在海拔高的地方会感到呼吸困难。</font><br>\n
altogether	<h3>altogether</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>全部地, 完全地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The noise has altogether stopped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吵闹声完全停止了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't altogether agree with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我并不完全同意你的看法。</font><br>总共<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to have 100 sheets altogether.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一共想要100张。</font><br>总而言之<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Altogether, our achievements are very great.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总而言之, 我们的成绩是很大的。</font><br>\n
aluminium	<h3>aluminium</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Aluminium is a kind of metal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铝是一种金属。</font><br>\n
aluminum	<h3>aluminum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉铝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Aluminum is a kind of metal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铝是一种金属。</font><br>\n
always	<h3>always</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>总是; 永远; 一直; 无例外地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always acts the lord.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是装阔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've always been my close friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一直是我亲密的朋友。</font><br>重复地; 有规律地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My little daughter is always bothering me when I'm at work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我工作时, 我的小女儿老爱打扰我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is not always late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有时迟到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Freddie almost[nearly] always goes to town on Sunday nights.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 弗雷迪几乎每星期天晚上都进城。</font><br>\n
amateur	<h3>amateur</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>业余的, 非职业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Acting with an amateur theatrical group can be fun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和业余戏剧小组一起演出可能是有趣的。</font><br>外行的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made an amateur attempt to build a cupboard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很外行地试做了一个碗柜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>业余爱好者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Although Tom's only an amateur he's a first-class player.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然汤姆只是个业余爱好者, 但却是一流的高手。</font><br>外行, 生手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shouldn't employ them—they're just a bunch of amateurs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不该雇用他们——简直是一群外行。</font><br>\n
amaze	<h3>amaze</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使大为吃惊, 使惊奇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your knowledge amazes me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你丰富的知识令我吃惊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It amazed us to hear that you were leaving.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到你要走, 我们都很吃惊。</font><br>\n
amazing	<h3>amazing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>令人惊异的<br>\n
ambassador	<h3>ambassador</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大使, 使节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the Chinese ambassador to Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是中国驻日本大使。</font><br>\n
ambition	<h3>ambition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抱负, 雄心, 野心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His ambition knows no limits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的野心是无止尽的。</font><br>渴望得到的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The big house on the hill is my ambition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 山上那所大房子是我所企望得到的。</font><br>\n
ambitious	<h3>ambitious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有抱负的, 雄心勃勃的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only ambitious students get the best marks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有抱负的学生才能取得最好的成绩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Young people, be ambitious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年轻人, 要胸怀大志。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actress is ambitious of applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这女演员极想得到喝彩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is ambitious to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她极想成功。</font><br>有野心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an ambitious man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个有野心的人。</font><br>\n
ambulance	<h3>ambulance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>救护车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sent to hospital by ambulance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 救护车将他送往医院。</font><br>\n
amid	<h3>amid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…中间, 处于…之中, 为…所环绕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house stood amid maple trees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那房子坐落在枫树林中。</font><br>(表示环境)处于…环境中, 处于…状态中; 由于存在…情况, 由于处于…状态中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt strange amid so many people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他处在那么多人当中感到不习惯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government collapsed amid budget quarrels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府因预算问题争吵不休而倒台。</font><br>(表示让步)尽管有…的情况, 尽管存在…的状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book was written amid many difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书是在困难重重中写成的。</font><br>\n
among	<h3>among</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)处在…中, 为…所环绕, 为…所环抱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sitting among a group of children, telling them a story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事。</font><br>(表示方式)以…联合行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They earned a fortune among themselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们共同努力发了财。</font><br>(表示比较)与…比较, 突出于<br>(表示排斥)除…之外(还有)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conference discussed, among other things, the problem of environmental protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了其他问题以外，会上还讨论了环保问题。</font><br>(表示范围)在…之内, 为…所分享[共有], 在…一类之中, 是…中之一, 在…群中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the tallest among her classmates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在她同学之中是最高的。</font><br>(表示环境)与…在一起, 与…相处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My wife was there among others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妻子和其他一些人在那儿。</font><br>(表示牵涉)经过, 涉及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unemployment among married women reached a peak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰。</font><br>(表示关系)相互间, 彼此<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must settle the matter among yourselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们必须彼此商量, 自行解决这些问题。</font><br>(表示所属)为…所特有; 为…所熟悉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a custom among the Germans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是德国人特有的习俗。</font><br>\n
amongst	<h3>amongst</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)处在…中, 为…所环绕, 为…所环抱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sitting amongst a group of children, telling them a story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事。</font><br>(表示方式)以…联合行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They earned a fortune amongst themselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们共同努力发了财。</font><br>(表示比较)与…比较, 突出于<br>(表示排斥)除…之外(还有)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conference discussed, amongst other things, the problem of environmental protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了其他问题以外，会上还讨论了环保问题。</font><br>(表示范围)在…之内, 为…所分享[共有], 在…一类之中, 是…中之一, 在…群中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the tallest amongst her classmates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在她同学之中是最高的。</font><br>(表示环境)与…在一起, 与…相处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My wife was there amongst others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妻子和其他一些人在那儿。</font><br>(表示牵涉)经过, 涉及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unemployment amongst married women reached a peak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰。</font><br>(表示关系)相互间, 彼此<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must settle the matter amongst yourselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们必须彼此商量, 自行解决这些问题。</font><br>(表示所属)为…所特有; 为…所熟悉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a custom amongst the Germans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是德国人特有的习俗。</font><br>\n
amount	<h3>amount</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>量, 数量, 数额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Large amounts of money were wasted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 浪费了大量的钱。</font><br>总额, 总数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He owed me ￡１００ but could pay only half that amount.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他欠我100英镑, 但是只能偿还总数的一半。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>合计, 共计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bill amounts to 500.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张账单共计500美元。</font><br>等同, 接近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His words amounted to a threat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话实际上是威胁。</font><br>\n
amuse	<h3>amuse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使人发笑, 逗乐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His jokes amused the crying child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的笑话逗笑了那个正在哭闹的孩子。</font><br>使消遣, 娱乐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How do you amuse yourself in rainy weather?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在雨天怎样消遣?</font><br>\n
amusement	<h3>amusement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>娱乐, 乐趣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To our amusement, the boy acted an old woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 使我们感到好笑的是那男孩扮演了一个老太太。</font><br>娱乐活动, 文娱活动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They should not be treated only as amusements.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不能把它们单纯看成是娱乐活动。</font><br>\n
amusing	<h3>amusing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有趣的, 好玩的, 逗人笑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wit made even troubles seem amusing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的风趣能使麻烦事也变得似乎有趣。</font><br>\n
an	<h3>an</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>art.</i></font><br>一(在元音字母前代替不定代词a)<br>\n
analyse	<h3>analyse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分析, 分解, 解释<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher tried to analyse the cause of our failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师设法仔细分析我们失败的原因。</font><br>\n
analysis	<h3>analysis</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分析<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His analysis was always shallow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的分析总是很肤浅的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We made a careful analysis of his character.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们仔细分析了他的性格。</font><br>分析报告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He provided a detailed analysis of the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提供了一份详细的形势分析报告。</font><br>\n
analyze	<h3>analyze</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>〈美〉分析, 分解, 解释<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher tried to analyze the cause of our failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师设法仔细分析我们失败的原因。</font><br>\n
ancestor	<h3>ancestor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>祖先, 祖宗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has worshipped her ancestor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已拜过她的祖先。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The custom of worshipping ancestors is prevalent among these people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 崇拜祖先的风俗在这些人中是普遍的。</font><br>原型, 先驱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This machine is the ancestor of the modern computer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器是现代电脑的始祖。</font><br>\n
anchor	<h3>anchor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>锚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lay at anchor outside the harbour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在港外抛锚停泊。</font><br>给人安全感的物(或人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Letters from home were an anchor to him when he worked abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在国外工作时, 家书是他的精神支柱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>抛锚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They anchored their ship in the river in a foggy morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在一个迷雾的早晨他们把船停泊在河上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship anchored along the shore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这船沿岸抛锚。</font><br>担任(电视节目等的)主持人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She anchors the top-rated news show.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她主持要闻节目。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)系住, (使)固定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We anchored the hammock to the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把吊床牢牢地系在树上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The insect anchored fast to its prey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这昆虫紧紧地抓住它的猎物不放。</font><br>\n
ancient	<h3>ancient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>古代的, 古老的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should read ancient authors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该读古代学者的著作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book gives you a good idea of life in ancient Greece.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书使你对古希腊生活有一清楚的概念。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jerusalem is an ancient city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 耶路撒冷是一座古城。</font><br>年老的, 老式的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My grandparents are rather ancient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我爷爷奶奶都是老寿星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is my ancient car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我的老爷车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drives an ancient machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他操纵一台老掉了牙的机器。</font><br>\n
and	<h3>and</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>和, 与, 及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes to play football and to sing popular songs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢踢足球和唱流行歌曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are three hundred and sixty-five students in this school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所学校有365个学生。</font><br>那么, 则<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost his health, and therefore his difficulties increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他身体虚弱, 因此更增加了他的困难。</font><br>然后, 接着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It came nearer and nearer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那东西越来越近了。</font><br>而且, 还, 又<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary was tall and fair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽是个高个子的金发女郎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joan was rich, beautiful and proud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 琼非常有钱, 漂亮且庄重。</font><br>\n
anger	<h3>anger</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>怒气, 怒火<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is swift to anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她爱生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quivering with anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他气得全身发抖。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)发怒; 激怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He angers easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他动辄发怒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His impolite words angered his teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出言不逊, 激怒了他的老师。</font><br>\n
angle	<h3>angle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>角, 角度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Angles of less than 90 degrees are called acute angles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小于90度的角叫锐角。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She cocked her hat at a jaunty angle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把帽子歪戴成俏皮的样子。</font><br>观点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They discussed the matter from all conceivable angles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从各种角度讨论了那件事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…放置成一角度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She angled the mirror so as to reflect light from a window.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为了反射窗外的光线而把镜子摆成某一角度。</font><br>使(新闻、报道等)带有倾向性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She angles her reports to suit the people she is speaking to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她带着一定的倾向性作报告以迎合她的听众。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>垂钓, 钓鱼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He loves to go angling on a fine summer day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢在晴朗的夏日去钓鱼。</font><br>\n
angry	<h3>angry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>愤怒的, 生气的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My friends' angry words hurt my feelings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我朋友的气话伤害了我的感情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be angry about trifles!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要为小事生气！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was angry at my words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我说的话生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was angry to hear it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听了这话而生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is angry that he has not answered her letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他还没有回信, 她生气了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing ever makes him angry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从未有事使他生气。</font><br>(天气等)恶劣的, 狂怒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was blowing an angry storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狂风大作。</font><br>(伤口)疼痛的, 发炎的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An infected cut looks angry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感染的伤口看起来发炎了。</font><br>\n
animal	<h3>animal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>动物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An animal has senses but no reason.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物有感觉, 而无理性。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a good story-teller and used to make up tales about farmers and animals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个讲故事的好手, 常编一些农夫和动物的故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Elephants are intelligent animals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 象是聪明的动物。</font><br>兽, 牲畜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to get these animals over beforehand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们得先把这些牲畜赶过去。</font><br>兽性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was unable to control the animal in himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他控制不了自己兽性的发作。</font><br>粗野残暴的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What an animal he is!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个非常残暴的人！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>动物的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is cooking with animal fats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正用动物的脂肪来烹调。</font><br>肉体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her body gave off an animal warmth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的身子散发出体香。</font><br>\n
ankle	<h3>ankle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>踝, 踝关节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She turned her ankle while ice-skating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她滑冰时扭伤了脚踝。</font><br>\n
anniversary	<h3>anniversary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>周年纪念<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today is my parents' 30th wedding anniversary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天是我父母结婚30周年纪念日。</font><br>\n
announce	<h3>announce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>宣布, 宣告, 发表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They announced that a cold wave would come soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们报告说不久寒流就要来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have they announced when the race will begin?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们宣布比赛什么时候开始了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A voice on the phone announced itself as Mr. Baker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电话里的人说他是贝克先生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “I've a proposal to make, ” she announced as she entered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一进来就对大家说“我有个建议。”</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>通报…到达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you announce the guests as they come in?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 客人来时你通报一声好吗?</font><br>预告, 预示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bright flowers and warm winds announced that spring was here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲜艳的花朵和暖和的风已表明春天到了。</font><br>主持, 介绍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inauguration of the President is announced for Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统的就职典礼已定于星期五举行。</font><br>\n
annoy	<h3>annoy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>打扰, 干扰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These flies are annoying me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些苍蝇真使我心烦。</font><br>使烦恼, 使恼怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was annoyed to learn that the train would be delayed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听说火车要晚点, 心里感到烦恼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was annoyed that we had one of his cushions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用了他的一个坐垫, 他很生气。</font><br>\n
annual	<h3>annual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>每年的, 年度的, 一年一次的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your birthday is an annual event.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的生日是年年都要庆祝的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an annual report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是年度报告。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grandfather had assembled all the members of the family for the annual picnic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 祖父把一家人聚在一起进行一年一度的野餐。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一年生植物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Corn is one of an annual.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玉米是一年生植物。</font><br>年刊, 年报, 年鉴<br>\n
another	<h3>another</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>又一个, 再一个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That boy will be another Nelson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩将成为尼尔逊第二。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have another piece of cake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请再来块蛋糕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had three goals in the first half, and another two in the second.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在上半场进了三个球, 下半场又进了两个。</font><br>另一的, 其他一种<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look at the difficulty in another way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用另一种不同的观点看待困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's quite another matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那完全是另外一回事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>另一个, 别个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like this one, show me another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢这个, 请让我看看另一个。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is just such another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这真是无独有偶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will never see such another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样的人物恐怕再也看不到了。</font><br>再一个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you take one glass, you will take another and another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你喝了第一杯, 你就会一杯接一杯地喝下去。</font><br>\n
answer	<h3>answer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>答复; 解答; 答辩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I asked him a question but he would not answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我问了他一个问题, 但是他不作回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I telephoned this afternoon, but nobody answered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今天下午打过电话, 但没人接。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He answered that he knew nothing about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他回答说关于此事他一无所知。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He answered, “It's two o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”他回答说“现在两点。”</font><br>适应, 符合, 满足<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It answers very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这完全适用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our work must answer the specifications laid down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的工作应符合所定的规范。</font><br>回应, 响应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers answered by calling a strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人举行罢工进行回击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three fire companies answered the alarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到警报后, 三个消防队都来了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>回答; 回音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Facts are the best answers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事实是最好的回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We often learn foreign language through questions and answers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们常用问答的方式学外语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you had an answer to your letter?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你收到回信了吗?</font><br>答案<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can find the answers of all the exercises at the end of this book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这本书后面, 你可以找到所有习题的答案。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the answer to your question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是你的问题的答案。</font><br>反应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A nod was her only answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 点了下头是她仅有的反应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The publication comes as the answer to an acute demand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一出版物是为满足急需而出版的。</font><br>\n
ant	<h3>ant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蚂蚁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ant is a social insect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蚂蚁是一种群居昆虫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They make experiments with ants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用蚂蚁做实验。</font><br>\n
anticipate	<h3>anticipate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>先于…行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have anticipated us and seized the bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们抢在我们之前占领了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A relatively firm material can be anticipated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可以提前准备一种较为坚实的材料。</font><br>预感, 期望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The directors anticipated a fall in demand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 董事们预感需求会降低。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I anticipate deriving much instruction from the lecture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我期望从这演讲中获得很多教益。</font><br>\n
antique	<h3>antique</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>古时制造的, 古董的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an antique chair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一张古旧的椅子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wore an antique gown to the costume party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在化装舞会上穿着一件过时的长袍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This table is antique.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张桌子很古老。</font><br>古代的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>古玩, 古董, 古物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The palace is full of priceless antiques.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宫殿里到处都是无价的古玩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a dealer in antique.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一名古董商。</font><br>\n
anxiety	<h3>anxiety</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>焦虑, 担心, 不安<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a lot of anxiety among the staff about possible job losses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工作人员都很忧虑, 担心可能失业。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What he did yesterday showed his anxiety to please his customers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他昨天的所作所为表明他很着急使他的顾客满意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager expressed anxiety that it should be done in no time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经理担心的是没有时间去做这些事。</font><br>焦虑的原因<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her sick child is a great anxiety to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的孩子生病使她十分担忧。</font><br>渴望, 热望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She expressed anxiety for a new dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她渴望得到一本新字典。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom's anxiety to succeed led him to work hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆对成功的渴望使他更加努力。</font><br>\n
anxious	<h3>anxious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>焦急的, 忧虑的, 担心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a very anxious time until we knew that they were safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一直忧虑直到得知他们平安。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looks anxious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她面带忧虑的神色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are anxious that he should listen to our advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们担心他是否能听从我们的劝告。</font><br>渴望的, 急切的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are really anxious for peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们确实渴望和平。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was anxious for everything to be settled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我渴望每一件事都安排妥当。</font><br>\n
any	<h3>any</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>无论哪个, 无论哪些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saved all the fish for his children and never tasted any himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把鱼都留给孩子们, 自己一点都没有尝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the last chance any of us has.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对于我们中的任何人来说, 这是最后的一次机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their performance that night was better than any before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们那天晚上的演出比以往任何一次都好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>任何一个(的)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp China is larger than any country in Africa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 中国比任何一个非洲国家都大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are scarcely any flies left around there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那周围几乎没有任何苍蝇了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got there without any trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们顺利到达。</font><br>一点, 一些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Haven't you any work to do?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有要干的活吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come and see me if you have any time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如有空就来看我。</font><br>普通的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't just wear any clothes if you're going there—you have to dress very smartly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你去那里, 你不能穿着普普通通的衣服, 你必须穿得很整齐漂亮。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>丝毫, 一点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was never any good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一向不行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I couldn't stand it any longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能再忍受了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't want to express himself any more strongly than he had to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不想更强烈地表现自己。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't like it any.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我压根就不喜欢它。</font><br>\n
anybody	<h3>anybody</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>任何人, 无论谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is there anybody who can tell a fairy tale?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人能讲童话故事吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Anybody can enter for the competition, can't they?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何人都能参与竞争, 是吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What sort of anybody are you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你算老几?</font><br>\n
anyhow	<h3>anyhow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不管怎样说, 无论如何, 至少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told me not to buy it, but I bought it anyhow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他告诉我不要买它, 但不管怎样, 我还是买了。</font><br>不论用何种方法, 无论从什么角度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Well, anyhow, I rang the bell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“好吧, 不管好歹, 反正我按铃了。”</font><br>随随便便地, 杂乱无章地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her clothes were thrown down just anyhow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的衣服随便乱扔。</font><br>\n
anyone	<h3>anyone</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>任何人, 无论谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is there anyone who can tell a fairy tale?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人能讲童话故事吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Anyone can enter for the competition, can't they?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何人都能参与竞争, 是吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What sort of anyone are you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你算老几?</font><br>\n
anything	<h3>anything</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>无论什么东西, 随便什么事情<br>任何东西, 任何事情绝对不<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want something to eat; anything will do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想吃点东西, 随便什么都行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is there anything wrong?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有什么毛病吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know anything about that country?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对那个国家了解得多吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is he anything of a statesman?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他像个政治家吗?</font><br>\n
anyway	<h3>anyway</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不管怎样说, 无论如何, 至少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't care what you say, I'm going to do it anyway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不管你说什么, 不管怎样我将去完成它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Anyway, you can try.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 至少你可以试试。</font><br>不论用何种方法, 无论从什么角度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She don't want to go, anyway, she can't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不想走, 无论怎样, 她也不能走。</font><br>\n
anywhere	<h3>anywhere</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>什么地方, 任何地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We haven't been anywhere this summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年夏天我们没有到任何地方去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you want to go anywhere this evening?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天晚上你想去什么地方?</font><br>无论何处, 随便哪里<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can go anywhere you like.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以去任何你想去的地方。</font><br>\n
apart	<h3>apart</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>相距, 相隔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two buildings are eight metres apart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两栋楼相距八米远。</font><br>分离, 分开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take a machine apart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把机器拆开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tore the cooked chicken apart and began to eat it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把煮好的鸡肉撕开就开始吃起来。</font><br>\n
apartment	<h3>apartment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一套房间, 一户<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a nine-storey apartment building next to the bank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 银行旁边有一座九层高的宿舍大楼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many city dwellers live in apartment buildings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多城市居民住在公共住宅楼里。</font><br>厅堂, 殿堂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can visit the whole palace except for the private apartments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个宫殿都可以参观, 只有内殿不开放。</font><br>\n
apologise	<h3>apologise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>道歉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You forgot to apologise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你忘记道歉了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must apologise that if I offended you I didn't mean to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须向您道歉, 如果冒犯了您, 我不是有意的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Sorry I haven't called you yet, ”Tom apologised.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “对不起, 我没有给你打电话。”汤姆道歉说道。</font><br>\n
apologize	<h3>apologize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>道歉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You forgot to apologize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你忘记道歉了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must apologize that if I offended you I didn't mean to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须向您道歉, 如果冒犯了您, 我不是有意的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Sorry I haven't called you yet, ”Tom apologized.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “对不起, 我没有给你打电话。”汤姆道歉说道。</font><br>\n
apology	<h3>apology</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>道歉, 认错, 愧悔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm afraid I was rather bad-tempered yesterday; I think I owe you an apology.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怕我昨天的脾气不怎么好, 我认为应该向你道歉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please accept my apologies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请接受我的歉意。</font><br>\n
apparent	<h3>apparent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>显然的, 明白的, 清晰可见的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His guilt is apparent to all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的罪恶尽人皆知。</font><br>表面上的, 貌似(真实)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The apparent truth was really a lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 表面上看似实话, 实际上是个谎言。</font><br>\n
appeal	<h3>appeal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>呼吁, 恳求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His appeal for forgiveness went unanswered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他恳请原谅, 但没有得到答复。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We made an appeal to the villagers for money to build the bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为建造这座桥, 我们呼吁村民捐款。</font><br>感染力, 吸引力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This kind of music hasn't much appeal for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这类音乐对我没有吸引力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>呼吁<br>有吸引力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This job rather appeals to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这工作对我有吸引力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>上诉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Five times he appealed the case, always losing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他上诉五次, 都失败了。</font><br>\n

appearance	<h3>appearance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>出现, 显露, 露面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sudden appearance of a policeman caused the thief to run away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察突然出现, 小偷就逃跑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has made several television appearances recently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最近参加一些电视演出。</font><br>外观, 外貌, 外表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a young woman of good appearance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位年轻貌美的女子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It had the appearance of an 18th century church.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它的外观像一座十八世纪的教堂。</font><br>\n

appreciate	<h3>appreciate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>感激, 感谢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I appreciate your help very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常感谢你的帮助。</font><br>欣赏, 赏识, 重视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't appreciate English poetry unless you understand its rhythm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你若不懂英文诗韵律, 就无法欣赏英文诗。</font><br>意识到, 体会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I really appreciate the danger of this job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真的认识到了这份工作的危险。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)增值, 涨价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things appreciate as time goes on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 货物价格逐日上涨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp New buildings usually appreciate land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新建筑通常会提高土地的价值。</font><br>\n
approach	<h3>approach</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>接近, 走近, 靠近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Christmas was approaching.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 圣诞节快到了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Walk softly as you approach the bed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当你接近床时, 走路轻些。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>接洽, 交涉; 着手处理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He approached the question as a scientist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以一个科学家的眼光去处理这个问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>靠近, 接近, 临近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our approach drove away the wild animals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一走近, 野兽全都跑开了。</font><br>通路, 入口, 途径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Police are patrolling the major approach roads to the stadium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察正在通往运动场的主要道路上巡逻。</font><br>方式, 方法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His approaches to the problem are wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他处理这个问题的方法是错误的。</font><br>\n
appropriate	<h3>appropriate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>适当的, 恰当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her bright clothes were not appropriate for a funeral.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那身鲜艳的衣服不适合参加葬礼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is appropriate that he should get the post.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由他担任这一职务是恰当的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挪用; 占用; 盗用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The minister was found to have appropriated government money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部长被查出挪用了公款。</font><br>拨出(款项)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has appropriated a large sum of money for building hospitals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府为建造医院拨出一大笔款项。</font><br>\n
