argue	<h3>argue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>争吵, 辩论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why are they always arguing?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为什么他们老是争吵?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She argued that she should not go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她争辩说她不该去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>坚决主张, 提出理由证明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Columbus argued that the world was round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哥伦布论证地球是圆的。</font><br>说服, 劝说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jack argued me into buying the shirt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰克劝说我买那件衬衫。</font><br>表明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His accent argues him to be a foreigner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的腔调表明他是个外国人。</font><br>\n
argument	<h3>argument</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>争论, 争吵, 辩论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were having an argument about whose turn it was to do the cooking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为该轮到谁做饭而争吵不休。</font><br>说理, 论证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is not much meat in this argument.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这番议论没什么内容。</font><br>论据, 论点, 理由<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government's argument is that they must first aim to beat inflation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府的论点是必须首先着眼于抑制通货膨胀。</font><br>\n
arise	<h3>arise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>呈现; 出现; 发生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the night a great storm has arisen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜里来了一场大风暴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He formed a picture of his future that arose bright and colourful in his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脑海中浮现出一幅光明灿烂的未来景象。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>起身, 起来, 起立<br>\n
arithmetic	<h3>arithmetic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>算术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is good at arithmetic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他擅长算术。</font><br>计算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waiter got his arithmetic wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 服务员算错了账。</font><br>\n
arm	<h3>arm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>臂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He broke his arm in an accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在一次事故中折断了手臂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There must be something wrong with my left arm, which is asleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的左臂发麻, 一定出什么问题了。</font><br>武器, 军火<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People were up in arms against the invaders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人民拿起武器反抗侵略者。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)武装起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their former enemy is arming again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从前的敌人正在重整军备。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Arm yourselves and be ready to fight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 武装起来, 准备战斗。</font><br>\n
army	<h3>army</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>军队, 陆军<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army were still fighting in spite of heavy casualties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管伤亡人员众多, 军队仍在继续战斗。</font><br>大群, 大批<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An army of workmen was brought in to build the stadium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一大群工人被召来建筑运动场。</font><br>\n
around	<h3>around</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在周围, 在附近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't see anyone around.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看见附近一个人也没有。</font><br>到处, 四周<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hear laughter all around.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到四周的笑声。</font><br>大约<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll be back at around 5 o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 五点左右我就回来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)围绕, 绕在; 在…各处, 在…范围之内; 在…附近, 在…周围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sat around the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们围着桌子坐。</font><br>(表示方向)绕过, 越过; 朝…的四周, 往…的四周<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's go around the town, not through it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们从城外绕过去, 不要穿城而过。</font><br>(表示状态)包着, 裹着; 在…身边, 接近(某人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bound the cloth around my head to stop the bleeding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将布裹在头上止血。</font><br>(表示依据)以…为中心, 根据<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their society was built around a belief in God.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的社会建立在信仰上帝的基础上。</font><br>\n
arouse	<h3>arouse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>唤醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The noise aroused the sleeping guard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 响声把睡着的警卫惊醒了。</font><br>引起, 激发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must arouse them to fight with enemies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须唤起他们同敌人斗争。</font><br>\n
arrange	<h3>arrange</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>安排; 准备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll arrange somehow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我总会设法去办的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything has been arranged satisfactorily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一切都得到了令人满意的安排。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>整理; 布置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to arrange the flowers in the vase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开始把花瓶内的花摆好。</font><br>\n
arrangement	<h3>arrangement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>安排; 解决办法<br>约定; 协议<br>布置好的东西<br>改编曲<br>\n
arrest	<h3>arrest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>逮捕; 拘捕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Policemen have authority to arrest lawbreakers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察有权逮捕犯法者。</font><br>制止; 阻止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A driver uses brakes to arrest his car's speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 司机用刹车降低车速。</font><br>吸引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her earnest manner arrested me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那种热忱的态度引起了我的注意。</font><br>\n
arrival	<h3>arrival</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>到达, 抵达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His arrival brought complete silence to the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的到来使房间里鸦雀无声。</font><br>到达者, 到达物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Arrivals continue to be abundant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到货仍然源源不断。</font><br>\n
arrive	<h3>arrive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>到达, 来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He arrived punctually at four o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他准时在四点钟到达。</font><br>发生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jenny is a young writer who has not yet arrived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 珍妮是个尚未成名的年轻作家。</font><br>\n
arrow	<h3>arrow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>箭, 矢, 箭状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He discharged his second arrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抽出第二枝箭。</font><br>箭号, 箭头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Follow the arrows on the wall, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请顺着墙上箭头指示的方向走。</font><br>\n
art	<h3>art</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>艺术, 美术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She loves art.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她热爱美术。</font><br>技能, 技巧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Driving a car in Central London needs quite an art!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在伦敦市中心开车可真需要点技术！</font><br>\n
article	<h3>article</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物品, 物件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should buy several articles at the shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在这家商场买点东西。</font><br>文章<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an article on the new club manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一篇介绍新上任的俱乐部经理的文章。</font><br>条款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This article allows no other explanation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项条款不容有别的解释。</font><br>冠词<br>\n
artificial	<h3>artificial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>人造的, 人工的, 假的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new dam will form a large artificial lake behind it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新筑的水坝将会在后面形成一个人工湖。</font><br>虚假的, 不真挚的, 矫揉造作的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her smile looks artificial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的微笑很做作。</font><br>人为的<br>\n
artist	<h3>artist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>艺术家, 美术家<br>能手, 大师<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Addis's no ordinary baker—he's an artist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阿迪斯是个非同寻常的面包师——他简直是个大师。</font><br>\n
artistic	<h3>artistic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>艺术的,有美感的,风雅的<br>\n
artwork	<h3>artwork</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(书, 杂志等的)插图<br>艺术作品; 美术作品<br>\n
as	<h3>as</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同样地, 一样地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is as tall as her mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她和她母亲一样高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dining room was twice as big as the Tom's.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个餐厅比汤姆的餐厅大一倍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is as difficult a problem as you are likely to meet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 像这样的难题, 你可能会碰到。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示时间)当还是…的时候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As a schoolboy, he showed every sign of genius.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他还是个小学生的时候, 就显示出了天资聪慧。</font><br>(表示方式)以…的身份, 以…资格, 作为; 以…形式, 以作为; 以…角色, 扮演…角色; 如同, 像<br>(表示结果)成为, 看作, 看成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had better treat it as a joke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们最好把它当作玩笑。</font><br>(表示目的)为了, 以…为目的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dykes were built as a protection against the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 建筑堤坝是为了防止海水泛滥。</font><br>(表示举例)例如, 诸如…之类的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We talked about such subjects as the weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们谈论了诸如天气之类的话题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>在…期间, 当…时候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was coming in as he was going out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我进来的时候, 他正出去。</font><br>尽管, 即使, 虽然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Intelligent as you are, I suspect you will fail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管你聪明, 我猜想你会失败。</font><br>像…一样<br>由于, 因为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As you weren't there I left a message.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为你不在那里, 我留了个信儿。</font><br>\n
ash	<h3>ash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>灰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Coke is an economical fuel but it leaves a lot of ash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 焦炭是一种很经济的燃料, 可是燃烧后剩下很多灰。</font><br>灰烬, 废墟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house was burnt down to ashes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房子被烧成了灰烬。</font><br>骨灰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her ashes were spread over the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的骨灰被撒到海里。</font><br>\n
ashamed	<h3>ashamed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>惭愧的, 羞耻的, 害臊的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband felt ashamed at her behaviour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她丈夫为她的行为感到害臊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt ashamed of having done so little.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为自己干得太少而感到羞愧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt very much ashamed whenever he encountered any of his old mates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每遇到老相识时, 他总是感到很难为情。</font><br>\n
aside	<h3>aside</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在一边, 到旁边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stepped aside to let them pass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他站到一旁让他们通过。</font><br>\n
ask	<h3>ask</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>问, 询问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you don't know, you must ask.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 假如你不知道, 你就要问。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked how to mend the radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她问无线电怎么修。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We ask you ten dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们向你要价十美元。</font><br>要求, 请求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must ask to be excused.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须请求原谅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He asked that they should be allowed to leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他请求允许他们离开。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>邀请<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were asked to attend the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们应邀出席会议。</font><br>\n
asleep	<h3>asleep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>睡着的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army attacked at night when the enemy was asleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在夜间敌人熟睡时军队发起了攻击。</font><br>\n
aspect	<h3>aspect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The training program covers every aspect of the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 训练计划的范围包括了这种工作的各个方面。</font><br>方位, 朝向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house has a north-facing aspect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这栋房子朝北。</font><br>面貌, 模样, 神态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of enormous size and terrifying aspect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个面目狰狞的彪形大汉。</font><br>\n
aspiration	<h3>aspiration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>强烈的愿望, 志向, 抱负<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has aspirations to become a great writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有成为一个大作家的志向。</font><br>\n
assemble	<h3>assemble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>集合, 收集<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装配, 组合<br>\n
assembly	<h3>assembly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>集会, 集合; 集合的人们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The National Assembly has[have] discussed the crisis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国民大会已对这一危机进行了讨论。</font><br>立法机构, 议会<br>装配, 组装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each component is carefully checked before assembly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查。</font><br>\n
assert	<h3>assert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>声称, 断言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He asserted his ideas loudly and clearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声明确地说出自己的想法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her friends asserted that she was innocent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的朋友断言她是无罪的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asserted the charge to be incorrect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她断言这起指控是不正确的。</font><br>维护, 坚持<br>\n
assess	<h3>assess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>估价, 估计<br>评定, 核定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should equitably assess historical figures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该公正地评价历史人物。</font><br>\n
asset	<h3>asset</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>有价值的人或物; 优点, 长处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a great asset to our company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我们公司的宝贵人才。</font><br>资产, 财产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bank has assets of more than ￡1 billion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该银行有十亿多英镑的资产。</font><br>\n
assign	<h3>assign</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分配; 交给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have assigned me a small room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已给我分配了一个小房间。</font><br>指派, 选派<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain assigned two soldiers to guard the gate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上尉派了两个士兵守大门。</font><br>指定, 订出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He assigned the students a few books to read.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给学生指定了几本书要他们读。</font><br>\n
assignment	<h3>assignment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工作, 任务<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His assignment was to follow the spy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 分配给他的工作是跟踪这个间谍。</font><br>分配, 指派<br>\n

assistance	<h3>assistance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>帮助, 援助<br>\n

associate	<h3>associate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)发生联系, (使)联合; 结交, 结伙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't associate the two ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个概念我联系不起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伙伴, 同事<br>\n
association	<h3>association</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>协会, 社团<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The association is[are] having its[their] annual conference next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该协会在下个星期举行年度会议。</font><br>联合, 结合, 交往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our long association with your company has brought great benefits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我方和贵公司的长期合作带来了巨大的利益。</font><br>\n
assume	<h3>assume</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>假设, 臆断, 猜想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can't assume anything in this case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这种情况下我们不可能做出假设。</font><br>假装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He assumed a look of innocence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他装出一副天真无邪的样子。</font><br>承担, 担任, 就职<br>呈现, 采取<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We assumed a new method.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们采取了一种新方法。</font><br>\n
assumption	<h3>assumption</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>假定, 臆断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We mistook assumption that the price would fall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们错误地认为价格会下降。</font><br>\n
assure	<h3>assure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使相信; 使确信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He assured me success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他使我相信能够成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing will assure permanent happiness to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有什么能保证我永久的幸福。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She assured us not to worry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她使我们相信不用担心。</font><br>保险<br>\n
astonish	<h3>astonish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使惊讶, 使大为吃惊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her father's sudden death astonished her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲突然逝世使她大为震惊。</font><br>\n
astronomer	<h3>astronomer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>天文学者; 天文学家<br>\n
at	<h3>at</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置) 在, 于; 到达, 达到; 经, 由; 在…旁, 靠近; 在…里; 在…上; 在…方位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was not at his office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不在办公室。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was standing at the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正站在门边。</font><br>(表示时间)在, 在…时刻[时辰, 期间, 阶段, 时节]; 在…岁时<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meeting will open at 15 ∶ 00.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议在下午三点钟开始。</font><br>(表示状态)处于…状态, 在…情况下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers are standing at attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵们立正站着。</font><br>(表示方式)以…的方式; 通过一次…的动作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was there at a bound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我纵身一跃就到了那里。</font><br>(表示原因)因为, 由于; 由于有, 由于应…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were frightened at the terrible sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到这可怕的景象, 我们被吓呆了。</font><br>(表示距离)从, 在距离…处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw it at a distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从远处看见了它。</font><br>(表示目标)朝, 向, 对着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He threw the key at me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把钥匙丢给我。</font><br>(表示环境)出席, 参加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remember him at a banquet on that night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记得那天晚上他参加了一个宴会。</font><br>(表示方向)在…方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is good at describing things or expressing ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她善于描述事物或表达思想。</font><br>\n
athlete	<h3>athlete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>运动员, 体育家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trainers rub down an athlete after hard exercise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在运动员剧烈的训练之后, 教练们为他按摩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is over the hill as a professional athlete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为一名职业运动员, 他的巅峰时期已过。</font><br>\n
atmosphere	<h3>atmosphere</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大气, 大气层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Changes in the climate are due to pollution of the atmosphere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于对大气层的污染而造成了气候变化。</font><br>空气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were no windows to admit moist atmosphere to enter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有窗户使潮湿的空气进入室内。</font><br>气氛, 环境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is an atmosphere of peace and calm in the country quite different from the atmosphere of a big city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在乡间有一种和平宁静的气氛, 与大城市的气氛截然不同。</font><br>\n
atom	<h3>atom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>原子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water is made up of atoms of hydrogen and oxygen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水由氢和氧的原子构成。</font><br>原子能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The power of the atom will become still better as time goes by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着时间的推移, 原子动力的利用还会变得更好。</font><br>微粒, 微量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hadn't an atom of food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有一点食物了。</font><br>\n
atomic	<h3>atomic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(关于)原子的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The atomic theory is important.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原子理论很重要。</font><br>\n
attach	<h3>attach</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>贴上; 系; 附上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The worker attached a cable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人连接电缆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attached a cheque to the order form.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在定货单上附了一张支票。</font><br>\n
attack	<h3>attack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>攻击, 进攻; 抨击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They knew when to attack and when to retreat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们知道什么时候进攻和什么时候撤退。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy attacked us at night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人在夜间袭击了我们。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>攻击, 袭击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy attack took us by surprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人的进攻使我们感到意外。</font><br>抨击, 辱骂<br>(疾病)侵袭, 发作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had her first heart attack the other day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不久前, 她第一次心脏病发作。</font><br>\n
attain	<h3>attain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>实现, 达到, 得到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attained the position of minister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他得到了部长的职位。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She attained her ambition of becoming a pilot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她实现了成为一名飞行员的志向。</font><br>\n
attempt	<h3>attempt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>试图; 尝试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attempted the exam but failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图通过考试, 但失败了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attempted to get in touch with them but without success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图和他们联系, 但未成功。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尝试, 试图, 企图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After repeated attempts they finally succeeded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过反复尝试, 他们终于成功了。</font><br>\n

attitude	<h3>attitude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>态度, 看法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They maintained an uncertain attitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们持一种暧昧的态度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's your attitude to[towards] this idea?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对这种意见看法如何?</font><br>姿态, 姿势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the photo she stands in the attitude of a sailor looking afar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在照片中, 她摆出水手伫立远望的姿势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She received guests with a respectful attitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她恭恭敬敬地接待了客人。</font><br>\n

attractive	<h3>attractive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>吸引的, 有吸引力的, 诱人的, 引起注意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is an attractive girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个妩媚动人的女孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bright colours are attractive to children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲜艳的颜色对儿童有吸引力。</font><br>\n
attribute	<h3>attribute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认为…是; 归因于…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attributes his success to working hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为他的成功是艰苦工作的结果。</font><br>认为某作品出自某人之手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We attributed this saying to Shakespeare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们认为这句格言出自莎士比亚。</font><br>认为某事[物]属于某人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some scientists attribute intelligence to ants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些科学家认为蚂蚁有智力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>属性, 特性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Kindness is one of his best attributes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 仁慈是他的好品性之一。</font><br>\n
auction	<h3>auction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拍卖, 拍卖方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We bought these items at an auction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些物件是我们在一次拍卖时买的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They've put the contents of their house up for auction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把房子里的东西全都拿去拍卖了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拍卖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He auctioned all his old furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把所有的旧家具都拍卖掉了。</font><br>\n
audience	<h3>audience</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>观众, 听众; 读者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The audience has expressed its approval.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 观众已经认可。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The audiences are requested to be their seats by ７ ∶ ２５.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要求观众在７ ∶ ２５入座。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt nervous at having to sing before such a large audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为这么多听众演唱, 她感到很紧张。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each style or form has its own audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每一种格调或形式各有其拥护者。</font><br>\n

aunt	<h3>aunt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>姑母, 姨母; 伯母, 婶母, 舅母<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Copy your aunt and you won't go wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 向你姑妈学, 你就不会办错事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl found her way into her Aunt Alison's home all by herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个小女孩独自一个人摸到了艾莉森姑妈家。</font><br>阿姨, 大妈, 大娘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a good aunt to all the children in the neighbourhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是街坊上所有孩子的好阿姨。</font><br>\n
authentic	<h3>authentic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>真的, 真正的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The copy he made of the painting can pass for an authentic one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他临摹的画足以乱真。</font><br>可靠的, 可信的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an authentic news report.We can depend on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是篇可靠的新闻报道, 我们相信它。</font><br>\n
author	<h3>author</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>著作家, 作者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you read many French authors?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你阅读过许多法国作家写的书吗?</font><br>创造者, 创始人; 发起人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As the author of the scheme I can't really comment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我作为这一计划的创始人是不便置评的。</font><br>\n
authorise	<h3>authorise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>授权, 批准; 委托<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government authorised an irrigation project.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府批准了一项灌溉工程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are authorised to receive contributions for the Red Cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们受托接受给红十字会的捐助。</font><br>\n
authority	<h3>authority</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>权力, 职权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A policeman has the authority to arrest lawbreakers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察有权逮捕犯法的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the authority for handling this matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有权力处理这件事。</font><br>官方, 当局<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The local authorities decided to build a suspension bridge over the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该地区政府决定在这条河上建一座吊桥。</font><br>权威, 专家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good dictionary is an authority on the meanings of words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一本好词典是词义的权威。</font><br>\n
auto	<h3>auto</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉汽车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't park your auto here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别把你的汽车停在这儿。</font><br>\n
automate	<h3>automate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)自动化<br>\n
automatic	<h3>automatic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>自动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The movements of machines are completely automatic, you only need to start and stop the machines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运行是完全自动的, 你只需开关机器就行了。</font><br>不假思索的, 无意识的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A boy who has good manners stands up in an automatic movement when a lady enters the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个有礼貌的孩子, 在一个女士进入房间时, 便会不假思索地站起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Breathing is automatic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 呼吸是无意识的。</font><br>必然发生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will get an automatic increase in pay every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你每年一定有一次加薪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>能自动运转的机器或器械<br>\n
automobile	<h3>automobile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉汽车<br>\n
autumn	<h3>autumn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>秋, 秋天, 秋季<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Winter comes after autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 秋去冬来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fall of one leaf is enough to tell coming of autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一叶知秋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nature is most colourful in autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 秋天, 大自然的色彩最为丰富。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What I like best is the autumn in Beijing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我最喜欢的是北京的秋天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On a lovely autumn evening we went out on a picnic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在一个美好的秋夜, 我们外出野餐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came to see us last autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去年秋天来看我们。</font><br>成熟期, 渐衰期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has entered the serene autumn of his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已进入了美好的中年时期。</font><br>\n
auxiliary	<h3>auxiliary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>辅助的, 补充的; 备用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I work in an auxiliary unit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在一家附属单位工作。</font><br>\n
available	<h3>available</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可用的或可得到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll send you all the periodicals available.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将把我能得到的期刊给你寄去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My bicycle is not available, and it is being repaired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的自行车现在不能用, 因为正在修理。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The season ticket is available for three months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 季票有效期为三个月。</font><br>可会见的, 可与之交谈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor is not available now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生现在没空。</font><br>\n
avenue	<h3>avenue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>林阴道, 大街<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can find my house along the avenue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沿着林阴道你能找到我的家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The avenues of the city were crowded with people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 城里大街上挤满了人群。</font><br>途径, 手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Books are avenues to knowledge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书籍是获得知识的渠道。</font><br>\n
average	<h3>average</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>平均的<br>平常的, 普通的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was nothing special about the meal; it was average.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饭菜没什么特别, 挺平常的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平均; 平均数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An average of 1500 persons pass here every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每天平均有1500个人经过此地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spends on the average two hours a day on reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他平均每天用两小时读书。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>求…的平均数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you average 4, 5 and 9, you get 6.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你求4, 5和9的平均数, 得6。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We average eight hours' work a day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每天平均工作八小时。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>平均为, 平均达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rainfall averages 1000mm a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年平均降雨量为1000毫米。</font><br>\n
avoid	<h3>avoid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>避开, 避免, 预防<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I avoided him as much as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我尽可能地躲开他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try to avoid accidents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽量防止事故。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He avoided answering my questions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他避而不答我的问题。</font><br>\n
await	<h3>await</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>等候<br>期待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A warm welcome awaits all our customers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对我们所有的顾客准备好热烈的欢迎。</font><br>\n
awake	<h3>awake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>醒着的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the only one boy awake at that time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是当时惟一醒着的男孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This thought kept me awake all night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种顾虑使我通宵未能合眼。</font><br>觉醒的, 洞察的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The explorer was ever awake for the dangers that surrounded him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个探险家时刻提防着周围的危险。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>醒, 唤醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She usually awakes at six.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她通常六点醒来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I awoke to find that it was raining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我醒来后才发现正在下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She slept badly, awoke tired and pale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她睡得很不好, 醒来时满身疲惫, 面色苍白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A great noise awoke her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嘈杂的吵闹声把她吵醒了。</font><br>觉悟到, 使觉悟<br>\n
award	<h3>award</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>授予, 奖给; 判给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The court awarded heavy damages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法院判定很重的损失赔偿金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They awarded John the first prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们授予约翰一等奖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The court awarded damages of 5000 dollars to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法庭判给他5000美元损害赔偿金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奖品, 奖金<br>\n
aware	<h3>aware</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>意识到的, 知道的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't seem to be aware of the problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他好像没有意识到这个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you aware that there is a difficulty?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道有困难吗?</font><br>\n
away	<h3>away</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>远处, 离开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some birds flew away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟儿飞走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned away and refused to listen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他转过身去, 不愿再听了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep away from the transformer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要靠近那个变压器。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy hasn't been away from home before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩子以前还没离开过家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge is three miles away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桥在三英里远处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They ordered the guard away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们命令警卫离开。</font><br>\n
awful	<h3>awful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>糟糕的, 可怕的, 惊人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather is awful today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天天气坏透了。</font><br>非常的, 极大的<br>\n
awkward	<h3>awkward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>笨拙的, 不灵活的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is an awkward girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个笨手笨脚的女孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is so shy and awkward that everyone notices him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰如此害羞狼狈, 以至于大家都注意到了他。</font><br>难操纵的, 使用不便的<br>尴尬的, 棘手的<br>\n

baby	<h3>baby</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>婴儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be a baby and cry over that little scratch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别那么孩子气, 擦破点皮就哭个不停。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where's the baby which needs injection?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 需要打针的婴儿在哪里?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…当作婴孩看待, 娇养<br>\n

back	<h3>back</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>背, 背部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The back is shaped to the load.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 背脊生来就是负重的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got a sore place in my back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我背上有个地方痛。</font><br>后部, 后面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes sitting in the back of the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直喜欢坐在教室的后排。</font><br>背面, 反面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the back of the letter was a diagram.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 信的背面是张图表。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)后退, (使)倒退<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse backed suddenly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马突然向后倒退。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>作…的衬里<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You could back the dress with silk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以给这件衣服加丝绸衬里。</font><br>支持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many of his friends backed his plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的很多朋友支持他的计划。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you back your story with facts?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能举出事实来证明你的话吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>后边的, 背后的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the back wall there is a map of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 后墙上有一幅世界地图。</font><br>以前的, 过去的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The war is all back history now, and our two countries are good friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场战争已成为过去的历史, 我们两国现在是友邦了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He owed three months' back rent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他欠了三个月的租金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>还, 回, 往后退<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stand back! This dog bites.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 往后站!这狗会咬人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've brought a lot of books back with me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我带回了很多书。</font><br>向后面, 后仰着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bent back too far and hurt my neck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我向后仰得过度了, 扭伤了脖子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't bend the book back, and you'll damage it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别向后卷书, 会弄坏的。</font><br>回原处, 恢复原状<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not ready to go back to work yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我还不准备回去工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a year in the hospital, he's back in circulation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 住了一年医院之后, 他又活跃起来了。</font><br>从前, 回到(从前)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You only need to cast back a little and you'll remember the event.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你只要稍微回想一下, 就可以记起那件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That smell of freshly baked bread carries me back!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新烤面包的气味使我回忆起往事！</font><br>\n
background	<h3>background</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(画等的)背景, 底色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mountains form a background to this photograph of the family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅家庭照的背景是群山。</font><br>背景情况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The riots took place against a background of widespread unemployment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴乱是在普遍失业的情况下发生的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to give me a bit more background before I can help you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须提供我更多的背景情况我才能帮助你。</font><br>个人背景资料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a background in child psychology.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她受过儿童心理学的教育。</font><br>\n
backup	<h3>backup</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>替代物; 备用品; 支援人员, 后备, 后补, 助手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医院有备用发电机以防停电。</font><br>\n

bad	<h3>bad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>坏的, 劣质的; 不合格的, 有错的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speaks bad English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说的英语很差劲。</font><br>差的, 有缺陷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan is bad in several ways.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个计划在几个方面都不够好。</font><br>不道德的, 邪恶的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He leads a bad life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过着邪恶的生活。</font><br>严重的, 厉害的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has had a bad accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他遇到了严重的意外。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things are bad with me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的情况不妙。</font><br>腐烂的, 腐败的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't eat those bad eggs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要吃那些坏掉的鸡蛋。</font><br>\n
badge	<h3>badge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>徽章, 证章 标记, 标志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every student should carry a school badge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个学生都应该佩带校徽。</font><br>象征<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mayors wear chains round their necks as badges of office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市长们戴着象征职位的项链。</font><br>\n
badly	<h3>badly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>坏, 差, 拙劣地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He judged the present situation badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很糟糕地错估了当前形势。</font><br>非常, 在很大程度上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I need your advice badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常需要你的意见。</font><br>不利地, 有害地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't speak badly of others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别说人家的坏话。</font><br>\n

bake	<h3>bake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>烤, 烘焙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother bakes every Saturday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲每个星期六烤面包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bakers bake in huge ovens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面包师用大烤炉烤面包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bread will not bake if the fire is too small.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果火太小, 面包就烤不成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cakes will bake quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些饼很快就可以烤好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are baking in the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在晒太阳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pottery was left to bake in the hot sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 陶器放在外面让炎热的太阳烘晒焙干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dirt road became dusty as it baked under the summer sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在夏天烈日的暴晒下, 泥路变得满是尘土。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's baking in here!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里真是热死人了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why shouldn't Dan eat the cake?After all, he baked it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为什么丹不该吃蛋糕?不管怎么说还是他做的呢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She baked bread in an oven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用烤炉烤面包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We baked bread and cake in an oven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在炉子里烤面包和蛋糕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mrs.Green has baked cakes, and Mr. Green has bought a small present for every little guest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 格林夫人已烤好了蛋糕, 格林先生还为每个小客人各买了一个小礼物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He knows how to bake bricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他会烧砖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They settled themselves with their backs to the cliff and let the warm sun bake them through.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们靠着岩石坐了下来, 沐浴着温暖的阳光。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Were these bricks baked by the sun or fire?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些砖是太阳晒干的还是由火焙制的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He baked us a cake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我们烤了一块蛋糕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We baked him some bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们为他烤了一些面包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Carol, did you bake the cake for Jim's party?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 卡罗尔, 你为吉姆办的聚会烤饼了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't bake the cakes black.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别把饼烤焦了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun is baking the ground dry.</font></i><br><font balance	<h3>balance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平衡, 均衡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I found it hard to keep my balance on the icy path.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得在冰滑小道上走路要保持身体平衡是相当困难的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We try to strike a balance between justice and mercy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们设法做到宽严并济, 恩威兼施。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She temporarily lost her balance during the long months of solitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在与外界隔绝的漫长岁月中, 她一度失去心态的平衡。</font><br>天平, 秤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Weigh that loaf of bread on the balance, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把那块面包放在秤上称一称。</font><br>结存, 结余, 余额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My bank balance isn't very large.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我银行存款不多。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)平衡, (使)均衡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When you learn to ride a bicycle you must learn to balance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你学骑脚踏车时必须学会保持平衡。</font><br>(使)相抵, (使)相等<br>权衡, 比较<br>\n

basic	<h3>basic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>基本的, 基础的; 根本的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The basic vocabulary of a language is those words that must be learnt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一种语言的基本词汇即必须掌握的词语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My knowledge of car engines is pretty basic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我所掌握的汽车发动机知识是相当简单的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These rules of playing basketball are basic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些篮球规则是基本的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Work hard is absolutely basic to success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 成功基于努力之上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Physiology and anatomy are basic to medical science.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生理学和解剖学是医学的基础。</font><br>\n
basically	<h3>basically</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>基本上, 根本上, 本质上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Basically I agree with your plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我基本上同意你的计划。</font><br>\n

basketball	<h3>basketball</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>篮球(运动)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was hot on playing basketball when I was in college.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我上大学时热衷于打篮球。</font><br>篮球<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We bought two basketballs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们买了两个篮球。</font><br>\n

bath	<h3>bath</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>沐浴, 洗澡; 浴缸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I used to take a bath twice a day last year, morning and night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年我一天洗两次澡, 早晚各一次。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(给…)洗澡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bathed her toddlers in tubs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在浴缸里给小孩子们洗澡。</font><br>\n
bathe	<h3>bathe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>给…洗澡, 游泳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't bathe too soon after eating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刚吃完饭不要马上去洗澡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Has the patient been bathed?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给病人洗过澡吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>冲洗; 浸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nurse bathed the wound with disinfectant water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 护士用消毒水冲洗伤口。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>游泳, 洗海水澡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I went for a bathe this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天上午我洗海水浴去了。</font><br>\n

bay	<h3>bay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>湾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sailed through the Bay of Biscay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们航行通过比斯开湾。</font><br>分隔间<br>低沉的吠声<br>月桂树<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(尤指猎犬等)低沉地吠叫<br>\n
be	<h3>be</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux. v.</i></font><br>[be v-ing]构成进行式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are[were] dancing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在跳舞。</font><br>[be v-ed]构成被动语态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief was caught.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窃贼被捉住了。</font><br>[be to-v]表示必要、打算、可能性、假设等或用来表示将来安排<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are to report to the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该报警。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>用来表示某人或某物即主语本身; 用来表示某人或某物属于某一群体或有某种性质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today is Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天星期五。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is nobody to direct the workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人指挥工人们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her work is to take care of the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的工作是照料好孩子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>在, 存在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whatever is, is right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 存在就是合理。</font><br>不受干扰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the baby's sleeping, let her be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿如果睡着了, 就让她睡吧。</font><br>\n

bear	<h3>bear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>具有, 怀有(感情)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>承担, 负担<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His shoulders can bear a heavy load.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的肩膀能挑重担。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A camel can bear burden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骆驼能驮重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three helping one another bear the burden of six.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 三人互相帮忙, 能挑得起六个人的担子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This beam bears the whole weight of the upper floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这根大梁承受了上面那一层的全部重量。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The delicate handicraft works will not bear rough handling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 精致的手工艺品经不起粗鲁的摆弄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ice is too thin to bear your weight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰太薄, 承受不了你的重量。</font><br>忍受, 容忍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was unable to bear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她忍受不了啦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't bear to see you like this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不忍看你这样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oh, I can't bear to think of it!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 啊, 我简直不忍心去想它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She couldn't bear to turn around again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不忍心再转回身去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She couldn't bear to see others suffer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不忍看见别人受苦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She couldn't bear to see animals treated cruelly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不忍见动物受虐待。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot bear to leave him alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不忍心让他独自留下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can't bear to be laughed at.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不能忍受被取笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She can't bear to watch them suffer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不忍看他们受折磨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you bear hearing about it again?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 再听到这种事情, 你能容忍吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not bear that his friends should laugh at him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他受不了朋友们的嘲笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not bear that they should be so conceited.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他受不了他们这样自高自大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I couldn't bear that Mother should scold me in the face of my friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲当着我朋友们的面骂我, 我受不了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't bear him to do this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能容忍他做这种事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man can't bear anyone in the family to oppose him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人绝不能容忍家里有人违抗他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She could not bear me to be away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不忍我离去。</font><br>生(孩子); 结(果实)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This tree bears well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这棵树果实累累。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some of the new planted apple orchards have also begun to bear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些新开的苹果园也开始结苹果了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peach tree bears well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这棵桃树结果子很多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peach trees are not going to bear well this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年桃树结果不会多。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>熊<br>\n
