beer	<h3>beer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>啤酒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He emptied the bottle of water and then filled it with beer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把瓶子里的水倒了, 然后装上啤酒。</font><br>\n
before	<h3>before</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…前面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man standing before the blackboard is our English teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 站在黑板前面的那个人是我们的英语老师。</font><br>(表示时间)先于, 在…以前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got up before sunrise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在太阳升起之前起床。</font><br>(表示比较)优于, 先于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must pay attention to this problem before every thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该首先注意这个问题。</font><br>(表示顺序)在…之前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My name comes before his on the list.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在名单上我的名字排在他的名字前面。</font><br>(表示目的)供…研究, 由…审判<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The criminal case comes before the court.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那桩刑事案件已送法院审理。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>在…之前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It will be some time before we know the full results.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 还要过一些时间我们才能知道全部结果。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>先前; 从前; 以前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We saw that film before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那部电影我们以前看过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It came across my mind that I had met him somewhere before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我突然意识到我曾在什么地方见过他。</font><br>\n
beg	<h3>beg</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>乞讨, 乞求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He begged money in the streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他沿街讨钱。</font><br>请求, 恳求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He begged and begged until I said yes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一再恳求, 直到我同意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They begged a lift in our car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们请求搭我们的车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child begged not to be left home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子恳求不要把他留在家里。</font><br>\n
beggar	<h3>beggar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乞丐<br>家伙<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使贫困<br>超常以至于不能(相信、描写等)<br>\n
begin	<h3>begin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>开始; 着手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's begin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们开始吧！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you sitting comfortably?Then I'll begin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坐好了吗?那我要开始了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When does the film begin?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电影什么时候开始?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will the next term begin?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下学期什么时候开学?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The campaign had begun during his absence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在他不在期间运动已经开始了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Knowledge begins with practice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 知识始于实践。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He begins school today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他今天开始上学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We decided to begin the experiment in the evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们决定晚上开始那个实验。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's time to begin the meeting now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在是开会的时候了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to learn Japanese three years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 3年前他开始学日语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他笑起来了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child began to cry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子哭了起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Computers have also begun serving agriculture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 计算机也开始为农业服务了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My heart suddenly began beating violently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的心突然开始猛烈地跳动。</font><br>\n
beginning	<h3>beginning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>开始, 起点; 根源<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The discovery of America forms the beginning of a new period.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美洲的发现成为一个新时代的开始。</font><br>\n
behalf	<h3>behalf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方面, 利益, 赞同<br>\n
behave	<h3>behave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(行为或举止)表现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has behaved well at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在学校表现良好。</font><br>工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How is the new engine behaving?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的引擎运行得如何?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)守规矩<br>\n
behavior	<h3>behavior</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉行为, 举止, 表现<br>\n
behaviour	<h3>behaviour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>行为, 举止, 表现<br>\n
behind	<h3>behind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…的后面<br>(表示时间)迟于, 比…晚<br>(表示比较)落后于, 不如<br>(表示顺序)在身后; 跟着; 通过…之后<br>(表示状态)被…遮挡; 隐藏在…后面<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在后面; 向后<br>(落)在后面, (留)在原处<br>\n
being	<h3>being</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生物, 人<br>存在, 生存<br>\n
belief	<h3>belief</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相信, 信任<br>信念, 信仰<br>\n
believe	<h3>believe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>相信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I quite believe!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常相信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I believe that man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信那个人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Believe it or not, that's the way it is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 信不信由你, 反正事情就是这样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I believe you are right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信你是对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I quite believe what you say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我完全相信你的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I believe my sister to be honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为我姐姐是诚实的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认为, 想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We believe him an excellent student.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们认为他是个优秀学生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>信仰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They believe in Christianity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们信仰基督教。</font><br>\n
bell	<h3>bell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钟, 铃, 电铃<br>钟声, 铃声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bell roused me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铃声把我惊醒。</font><br>\n
belong	<h3>belong</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>属于; 是…的成员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whales belong among the mammals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲸鱼属于哺乳动物。</font><br>应被放在, 应归入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put the bowl where it belongs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把碗放在应放的地方。</font><br>适应, 合得来<br>\n
belongings	<h3>belongings</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>动产; 财物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I put a few personal belongings in a bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把几件私人物品装进包中。</font><br>\n
beloved	<h3>beloved</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>为…所深爱的<br>亲爱的; 敬爱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is Tom's beloved wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是汤姆的爱妻。</font><br>\n
below	<h3>below</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…下面, 低于<br>(表示状态)在…掩饰之下, 在…背后<br>(表示比较)不及, 劣于; 低于<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在下面, 到下面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I looked down at the hall below.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我瞧了瞧下面的大厅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Below is an example of a typical business letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下面是典型商业信函的一个例子。</font><br>\n
belt	<h3>belt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>腰带, 带子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You don't need braces if you're wearing a belt!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要系腰带, 就用不着吊带了。</font><br>区域, 地带<br>\n
bench	<h3>bench</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>长凳, 长椅<br>\n
bend	<h3>bend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)弯曲; 屈身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The branch bent but did not break.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那树枝弯曲, 但没有折断。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>弯曲(处)<br>\n
beneath	<h3>beneath</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>在…的下方, 在…的底下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sheltered beneath their umbrellas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们躲到了伞下。</font><br>(表示状态)在…掩饰之下, 在…背面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things rapidly became calm, though beneath the surface the argument rumbled on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情迅速平静下来了, 然而, 在这种平静的表面背后争论如隆隆雷声, 持续不断。</font><br>(表示比较)不及, 次于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Richard is far beneath Henry in intelligence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 理查的智力远不及亨利。</font><br>(表示环境)在…影响之下, 由于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shelf was beginning to sag beneath the weight of the books upon it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书架在书的重压下渐渐下弯。</font><br>(表示等级)低于, 不如, 在…之下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't do anything that is beneath you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要做与你身份不符的事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在下面, 在底下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her careful make-up hid the signs of age beneath.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的精心化妆掩饰了岁月留下的痕迹。</font><br>\n
beneficial	<h3>beneficial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有益的, 有利的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope your holiday will be beneficial to you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望你的假期会对你有益。</font><br>\n
benefit	<h3>benefit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>有益于, 得益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bank suffers while its officers benefit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 银行遭受损失, 而它的高级职员们却得到好处。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>益处, 好处<br>救济金, 保险金<br>\n
beside	<h3>beside</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…旁边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Here! There's room beside me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嘿!我旁边有空间。</font><br>(表示比较)与…相比<br>(表示排斥)除…之外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thomas was the only blond in the family, beside the mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这一家人中除了母亲之外, 只有托马斯是金发。</font><br>(表示关系)与…无关, 与…相差甚远<br>\n
besides	<h3>besides</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>而且, 还有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't want to go;  besides, I'm too tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想去, 再说我也太累了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示排斥)除…之外(还有)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had other people to take care of besides me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了我以外, 他还需要照料其他人。</font><br>\n
best	<h3>best</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lucy is the best person to fill this secretary vacancy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 露西是秘书这个空缺的最佳人选。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>最好地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whoever does best will get the prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁做得最出色谁就得奖。</font><br>最, 最大程度地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love work the best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我最喜欢工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最好的东西; 最好的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the best in the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是班上最优秀的学生。</font><br>最重要的优越性, 最重要的方面<br>\n
bet	<h3>bet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>打赌<br>赌金, 赌注<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His bet on the boat race was 50.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他下在赛船上的赌注是50美元。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打赌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people are fond of betting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人喜欢打赌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll bet you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将与你打赌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bet you twenty cents on his winning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我跟你赌20美分他赢。</font><br>肯定, 确信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bet you can't do this puzzle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我敢说, 你解决不了这个难题。</font><br>\n
betray	<h3>betray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>对…不忠, 背叛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He promised never to betray the organization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发誓永不背叛组织。</font><br>出卖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He betrayed his own brother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出卖了他的亲兄弟。</font><br>泄露, 暴露, 表明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her accent betrays her a Londoner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的口音说明她是伦敦人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her accent betrays her a Londoner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的口音说明她是伦敦人。</font><br>\n
better	<h3>better</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有好转的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is no better yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一点也没有好转。</font><br>更好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is good but that is better.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个好, 可是那个更好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's better that she should go alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 还是由她单独去比较好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>更好地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can do better.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能做得更好。</font><br>更<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>改善; 提高<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government hopes to better the conditions of the workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府希望改善工作人员的环境。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>更好者; 较优越者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's a fine horse, I couldn't get a better in a hurry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一匹骏马, 我一时难以找到比它更好的。</font><br>前辈; 长者; 上级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should show greater respect for your elders and betters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该对长辈和上级尊重些。</font><br>\n
between	<h3>between</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…之间; 在…之中<br>(表示时间)在…与…的一段时间内; 在…的间隔中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will come between twelve and one o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会在12点至1点之间来。</font><br>(表示数目)介乎…之间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must have walked between ten and twelve miles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该已步行了10至12英里。</font><br>(表示距离)在…到…的一段距离内, 来往于…与…之间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is about thirty miles between Nottingham and Sheffield.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从诺丁汉到谢菲尔德大约30英里。</font><br>(表示范围)在…之间, 为…所分享<br>(表示等级)介乎于…之间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An army major ranks between a captain and a colonel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 陆军少校的军阶在上尉与中校之间。</font><br>(表示关系)在…之间; …与…之间; 涉及<br>(表示对比)从…中选择, 就…比较而言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's nothing to choose between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它们之间无可选择。</font><br>\n
beyond	<h3>beyond</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在或往…另一边; 在或往…那一边; 在或往…的更远处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is beyond the bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房子在桥那边。</font><br>(表示时间)迟于, 晚于; 在…之后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't stay here beyond midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别在这待过午夜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new law extends this ban beyond 2002.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新法令将此项禁令延期到2002年以后。</font><br>(表示排斥)除…以外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had no money beyond his salary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了他的薪水, 他们一无所有。</font><br>(表示范围)超出; 非…所能及<br>(表示结果)不容; 超然于…之上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those results were beyond dispute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些结果不容争辩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His conduct has been beyond reproach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的行为无可指责。</font><br>(表示程度)超出…的范围; 超过; 对…来说太难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The switch on the wall was beyond the baby's reach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上的开关小孩子是够不到的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's going beyond a joke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样开玩笑太过分了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's beyond me why she married him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法理解她为什么嫁给他。</font><br>(表示数目)多于, 超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There weren't beyond twenty people present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 出席的人不超过20名。</font><br>(表示累加)一个接一个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We saw peak beyond peak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们看到山峰迭起。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在更远处, 往更远处, 再往后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The immediate future is clear, but it's hard to tell what lies beyond.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近期内的情况很清楚, 但很难说以后如何。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must look beyond for signs of change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该把目光放远, 看到变化的迹象。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Snowdon and the mountains beyond were covered in snow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 斯诺顿和远处的山到处都是白雪皑皑。</font><br>\n

bicycle	<h3>bicycle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>自行车, 脚踏车<br>\n

blow	<h3>blow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一击, 打击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave him a violent blow on the head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他照他的头部重重一击。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>吹; 吹气; 刮风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fan was blowing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风扇正吹着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door blew open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门被风吹开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind blew a hurricane.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风越刮越大, 终于形成一场飓风。</font><br>吹响, 吹奏; (使)鸣响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took out his flute, and blew at it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拿出笛子吹了起来。</font><br>(使)爆炸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The balloon has blown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气球炸开了。</font><br>\n
blue	<h3>blue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蓝色, 蔚蓝; 青色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A clear atmosphere intensifies the blue of the sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纯净的空气使天空变得更蓝。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>蓝色的, 蓝的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White clouds swam in the blue sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白云在蓝天上飘浮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blue car overtook ours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那辆蓝色的汽车超过我们的车子。</font><br>沮丧的, 忧郁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was blue over his dismissal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因被解雇而情绪低落。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're looking blue.What's the matter?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看起来挺忧愁, 怎么回事?</font><br>\n

boat	<h3>boat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小船, 小艇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A boat is on the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一艘船浮在水面。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>乘船, 划船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are boating on the lake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在湖上划船。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用船载运<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He boated some bags of rice across the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将几袋稻米载送过河。</font><br>\n

bolt	<h3>bolt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>螺栓<br>(门或窗)插销, 闩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a bolt on the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门上有把闩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slammed the door and drove the bolt home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他砰地一声关上门, 把插销拴好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>闩上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That door refuses to bolt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那扇门关不牢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bolted the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把门闩了起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>冲出去; 逃跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief bolted when he saw the policeman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小偷一看到警察就急忙逃跑了。</font><br>\n

bother	<h3>bother</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打扰, 烦扰, 搅扰, 使恼怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thank you, but please don't bother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谢谢, 但请你不要费事了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could I bother you to give the package to Mr.Miller?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麻烦你把这个包裹交给米勒先生好吗?</font><br>迷惑, 把…弄糊涂; (使)不安, (使)紧张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't bother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别紧张。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The complexities of life bothered him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生活的复杂使他困惑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>麻烦, 不便, 忧虑<br>令人烦恼的人或事物; 引起麻烦的人或事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a bother!We've missed the bus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 真恼人!我们错过了公交车。</font><br>\n
bottle	<h3>bottle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>瓶子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A hundred and fifty empty bottles tumbled onto the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 150个空瓶子滚落到地板上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…装入瓶中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many companies bottle perfume.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多公司进行香水的瓶装(业务)。</font><br>抑制; 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was about to speak.Again he bottled himself up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想说话又忍住了。</font><br>\n
bottom	<h3>bottom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>底部, 基部, 下端, 末尾; 水底<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water drained out of the flowerpot through the hole in the bottom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水从花盆底部的洞漏出去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The skirt should be flared at the bottom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裙子下端应展开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always at the bottom of the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的成绩在班上总是排在最末。</font><br>尽头, 末端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll walk with you to the bottom of the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我和你一起走到路的尽头。</font><br>臀部, 屁股<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She smacked a child's bottom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她打孩子的屁股。</font><br>\n
bounce	<h3>bounce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>弹回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A rubber ball bounces well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 橡皮球弹力好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bounced the ball against the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把球掷到墙上让它弹回来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>弹跳<br>活力, 生气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's got a lot of bounce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她浑身都是劲。</font><br>\n
bound	<h3>bound</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>跳; 弹回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rubber balls can be made to bound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可以使橡皮球弹回。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little horse is bounding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小马在跳跃。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…划界, 限制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher asked the students to bound Asia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师要学生划出亚洲的边界。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跳, 跳跃, 跃进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog jumped over the gate in one bound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只狗一跳就越过了栅门。</font><br>界限, 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king maintained order within the bounds of his realm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国王在其王国的疆界之内维持着秩序。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>被捆绑的, 被束缚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He kicked at the bound prisoner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他朝那被绑着的囚犯踢了一脚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is bound to her family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被家庭束缚住了。</font><br>一定的, 必定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is bound to succeed in his enterprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在事业上一定会成功。</font><br>去, 准备去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This train is bound from Shanghai to Nanjing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这列火车是从上海开往南京的。</font><br>\n
boundary	<h3>boundary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分界线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boundaries of that country were changed by a treaty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国家的边界根据条约有所更动。</font><br>界线, 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ball was caught by a fielder standing just inside the boundary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个球被正站在边界内的守场员接住了。</font><br>\n
bow	<h3>bow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>弓, 弓形物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew the bow and shot an arrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他张弓射箭。</font><br><h3>bow</h3>鞠躬, 低头<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(向…)弯腰; 鞠躬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bowed his thanks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他鞠躬致谢。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>低头, 俯首<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The congregation bowed their heads in prayer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会众在一起低头祷告。</font><br>\n

bowl	<h3>bowl</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>碗, 钵, 盘<br>一碗之量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He finished off two bowls of noodles in no time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很快就吃完了两碗面。</font><br>\n
box	<h3>box</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盒, 匣, 箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A large wooden box served as our table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个大木箱成了我们的桌子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I ate a whole box of chocolates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我吃了一整盒巧克力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…装入盒[箱, 匣]中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They boxed the furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把家具装入箱内。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拳击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boxer did not box fairly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个拳击手击拳犯规。</font><br>\n

branch	<h3>branch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>树枝, 枝条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to break the branches away to get through the thick forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得把树枝拨开才能穿过密林。</font><br>分支, 分科, 分系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The branch went completely dry this summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条支流今年夏天完全干涸了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This bank has ten branches in the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家银行在城里有10家分行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>出枝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tree branches forth in spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木在春天抽枝。</font><br>分岔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road branches after the level crossing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条路在经过平面交叉道口后岔开了。</font><br>\n
brand	<h3>brand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>商标, 牌子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is your favourite brand of cigarettes?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最喜欢哪种牌子的香烟?</font><br>烙印<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These cattle have my brand on them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些牛身上打了烙印, 标明是我的牛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>打烙印于, 以烙铁打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have branded our cattle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经给我们的牛打上了烙印。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His unhappy childhood has branded him for life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不愉快的童年在他心灵上留下了终生的烙印。</font><br>加污名于, 谴责<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The press branded him a liar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报界给他加上了说谎者的臭名。</font><br>\n
brass	<h3>brass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>黄铜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Formerly most of our household utensils were made of brass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以前我们家庭用的器皿多数是用黄铜做的。</font><br>铜管乐器; 铜管乐队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The brass is[are] too loud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铜管乐器的声音太响了。</font><br>\n
brave	<h3>brave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>勇敢的, 大胆的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a brave soldier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位勇敢的战士。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was very brave about his operation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对手术毫无惧色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>勇敢面对; 不怕; 不顾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let us brave the danger!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们勇敢地面对危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She braved death to rescue me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她冒着生命危险来救我。</font><br>\n
bread	<h3>bread</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had three pieces of bread for breakfast this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天早餐我吃了三片面包。</font><br>生计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took barely enough money to keep the children in bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他赚很少的钱仅够孩子们勉强糊口。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Painting is his bread and butter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他靠绘画谋生。</font><br>\n

break	<h3>break</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打破, 折断, 弄坏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Glass breaks easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玻璃易碎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oak may bend but will not break.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 橡木可以弯, 但不会断。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief broke the window and got into the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个窃贼打破窗子, 进入屋内。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He broke the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把门撞开了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>破坏, 违反<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If a man breaks the law, he can be punished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人如果犯法将受到惩罚。</font><br>终止, 中断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have broken the back of the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经完成了这件工作的主要部分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We broke our journey to Rome at Venice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们去罗马时, 中途在威尼斯停下来休息了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm afraid I must break this conversation short.I have to go now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怕这次谈话只能到此为止, 现在我得走了。</font><br>透露, 说出<br>打破(纪录)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came in second, but still broke the Olympic record.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他得了第二名, 但仍然打破了奥运纪录。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>破晓, 突然出现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day had broken, and he cast his net for the last time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这时天已亮了, 于是他便撒下最后一网。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>裂口, 裂缝; 破裂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a break in the water pipe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水管上有个裂缝。</font><br>间歇, 中间休息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's have a break for lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们稍微休息一会儿吃午饭吧。</font><br>\n
breakfast	<h3>breakfast</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>早餐, 早饭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They begin breakfast at seven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们七点钟开早饭。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吃早餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They breakfasted early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们早餐吃得早。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We breakfasted on eggs and coffee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们早餐吃的是鸡蛋和咖啡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>供给…早餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel regularly breakfasts 300 people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆通常供应300人的早餐。</font><br>\n
breakthrough	<h3>breakthrough</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>突破点, 突破性进展, 重要的新发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Scientists have made a breakthrough in their treatment of that disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家在治疗那种疾病方面已有突破。</font><br>\n
breast	<h3>breast</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乳房<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was feeding a baby at the breast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在给婴儿喂奶。</font><br>胸部, 胸膛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was wearing a nameplate on his left breast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他左胸前佩带着一张名牌。</font><br>胸肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had chicken breasts for lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们午餐吃鸡胸肉。</font><br>\n
breath	<h3>breath</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>气息; 呼吸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to pause frequently for breath.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不经常停下来喘口气。</font><br>(一次)呼吸, 一口气; 微风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was not a breath in the air.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一丝风也没有。</font><br>\n
breathe	<h3>breathe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>呼吸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has gone; you can breathe again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已经走了, 你可以松口气了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They came out of the tunnel and thankfully breathed the fresh air.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们走出地道, 贪婪地吸着新鲜空气。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>轻声说话; 低语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't worry, I wouldn't breathe a word of your secret.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别担心, 我不会泄漏你的秘密。</font><br>\n
breed	<h3>breed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>种, 品种<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It makes her furious to see a good breed of sheep being treated cruelly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到品种优良的羊受到残忍的对待, 她非常气愤。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>生育; 繁殖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rabbits breed quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兔子繁殖很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bear bred two cubs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只熊生了两只小熊。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>饲养, 培养<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bred her daughter to become a statesman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把她的女儿培养为一名政治家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parents are trying to breed their son a musician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对父母尽力要把儿子培养成为音乐家。</font><br>引起, 招致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Flies in food shops breed disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 食品店里的苍蝇能引起疾病。</font><br>\n
breeze	<h3>breeze</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>微风, 轻风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The banner fluttered in the breeze.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旗帜在微风中飘扬。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吹微风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's beginning to breeze.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开始刮起微风了。</font><br>漫不经心地行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He breezed through the task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他轻快地完成了那项工作。</font><br>\n
bribe	<h3>bribe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>贿赂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He who bribes is to be despised.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 行贿者受人鄙视。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their attempt to bribe the clerk had failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们贿赂那位办事员的企图没有成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried to bribe the policeman not to arrest him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他企图贿赂警察不逮捕他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>贿赂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The judge rejected a bribe from the defendant's family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官拒收被告家属的贿赂。</font><br>\n
brick	<h3>brick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>砖, 砖块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man stood on a pile of bricks almost as high as a house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位老人站在一堆跟房子差不多高的砖上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用砖砌, 用砖堵住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He murdered his wife, and bricked up her body in the kitchen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他杀死了妻子, 然后把她的尸体藏在厨房里, 用砖堵死。</font><br>\n
bride	<h3>bride</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>新娘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At least a dozen people attend on the bride of the wealthy prince.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 至少有12个人侍候这个富有的王子的新娘。</font><br>\n
bridge	<h3>bridge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>桥; 桥梁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am enthusiastic over a project for building a new bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我热衷于修建一座新桥的计划。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp London Bridge is an important construction in Britain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伦敦桥是英国的一处重要建筑。</font><br>鼻梁; 鼻梁架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gold rimmed spectacles bit deep into the bridge of his nose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金边眼镜深深嵌入他的鼻梁。</font><br>桥牌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bridge is a very popular game of cards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桥牌是一种很流行的纸牌游戏。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…建桥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The engineers want to bridge the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工程师们想在这条河上架座桥。</font><br>\n
brief	<h3>brief</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>短暂的, 短时间的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a brief pause in the conversation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对话中有短暂的停顿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Life is brief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人生短暂。</font><br>简洁的, 简短的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had time to give a brief report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有时间做一个简短的报告。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Time is limited, please be brief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时间有限, 请讲得简洁些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's brief of speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话简短扼要。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>向…介绍基本情况, 作…的摘要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She briefed me on the case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她向我简要说明了这个案子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>概要, 摘要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To begin with, I'd like to tell in brief the importance of the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 首先, 我想简要谈谈这项工作的重要性。</font><br>\n

brush	<h3>brush</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>刷子; 画笔; 毛笔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is not my writing brush.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这不是我的画笔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sells brushes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他卖刷子。</font><br>擦, 吹拂; 刷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll have to give my shoes a brush.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须把我的鞋擦一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She ran a brush over her hair again and again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把头发梳了又梳。</font><br>小冲突, 小争执, 小摩擦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a brush between patrols that night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天夜里巡逻队之间发生了一场冲突。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a brush with the customs men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他和海关人员发生了小冲突。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>擦; 刷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Brush after each meal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饭后刷牙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She likes to brush her hair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她喜欢梳头发。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's brushing the chair clean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正把椅子刷洗干净。</font><br>轻触, 掠过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bicycle just brushed me as it passed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那辆自行车与我擦身而过。</font><br>\n
bubble	<h3>bubble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>泡, 水泡, 气泡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When water boils, bubbles rise to the surface.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水开时, 水面起了泡泡。</font><br>泡影, 幻想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp News of the defeat quickly burst the bubble of our self-confidence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失败的消息使我们的自信心迅速破灭了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>起泡, 使冒气泡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bubbled air into the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他吹空气入水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was bubbling over with happiness and enthusiasm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她洋溢着喜悦和兴奋。</font><br>\n

bud	<h3>bud</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>芽, 苞, 花蕾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rose buds are near the burst.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玫瑰花苞要绽放了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>发芽, 长出蓓蕾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rosebushes are budding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玫瑰花正在含苞待放。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a little girl when I left home; now she buds into womanhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我离开家时她还是个小女孩, 现在已成年轻妇女了。</font><br>\n
budget	<h3>budget</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>预算; 政府预算案<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rising budget deficit is beginning to bite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 预算赤字的不断增加开始产生不良后果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Chancellor of Exchequer will present his budget to Parliament tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 财政大臣明天将向议会提出预算案。</font><br>预算额, 经费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our budget has been pared to the bone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的预算额已削减到最低限度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>编制预算, 安排开支等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She budgeted for a holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为了去度假而节省开支。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have budgeted their time carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已经认真地安排了自己的时间。</font><br>\n
bug	<h3>bug</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>虫子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sacks of rice were swarming with bugs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一袋袋的米里长满了虫子。</font><br>病菌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not feeling well, I must have picked up a bug somewhere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我感觉不舒服, 一定是在什么地方感染病菌了。</font><br>(机器等)故障<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a bug in the system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 系统出了故障。</font><br>窃听器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police searched the courtroom for bugs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方检查法庭, 看有没有窃听器。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…装窃听器; 窃听<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police have bugged his office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察在他的办公室装了窃听器。</font><br>打扰, 使厌烦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That man really bugs me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个人真是使我心烦。</font><br>\n
build	<h3>build</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>修建, 建造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can trust his word, he's been building for more than 20 years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以相信他的话, 20多年来他一直在从事建筑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have built another space station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们又建了一个太空站。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They will build us a new school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将给我们建造一所新学校。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our neighbours built their walls high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的邻居把墙砌得很高。</font><br>开发, 创建<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He built a school for the blind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他创办了一所盲人学校。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>体形, 结构<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of large build.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个身材魁梧的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These tall buildings are in the same build.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些高层建筑物结构相同。</font><br>\n
building	<h3>building</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>建筑物, 楼房, 房屋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a fine building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一栋别致的建筑物。</font><br>建筑(艺术或行业)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building is the symbol of eastern building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座建筑物是东方建筑的象征。</font><br>\n
bulb	<h3>bulb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>球茎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bulb of the eye is important for us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼球对于我们来说非常重要。</font><br>电灯泡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll have to change the bulb again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们又得换个灯泡了。</font><br>\n
bulk	<h3>bulk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(巨大)物体, (大)块, (大)团<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Great bulk does not always mean great weight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 体积大并不总是意味着份量重。</font><br>主体, 绝大部分<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>变得越来越大(或重要)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They added extra pages to bulk a book out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们增加额外页数使书更厚。</font><br>\n
bull	<h3>bull</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公牛, 雄兽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a bull.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一头公牛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a great bull of a man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个体壮如牛的人。</font><br>买进证券投机图利者, (对股市行情)看涨的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can see through all that bull.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们能识破那套胡诌。</font><br>\n
bullet	<h3>bullet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>子弹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bodies of the hostages were found riddled with bullets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在人质的尸体上发现了很多弹孔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was killed by a single bullet in the heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被一颗子弹射中心脏而死。</font><br>\n
bulletin	<h3>bulletin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公告, 新闻快报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Here is the latest bulletin about the President's health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是总统健康情况的最新报告。</font><br>小报, 期刊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look, this is our company's quarterly bulletin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看, 这就是我们公司出版的季刊。</font><br>\n
bump	<h3>bump</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>撞倒; 冲撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The driver bumped the kerb while reversing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 司机倒车时撞到了路边石。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>颠簸着前进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The circulation of the magazine has been bumping along for some time at around 30, 000.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一段时间以来, 杂志的销量一直在三万份上下摇摆。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>碰撞, 猛撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard a bump in the next room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到隔壁房间传来“砰”的一声。</font><br>肿块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got a nasty bump on the head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他头上起了一个大包。</font><br>隆起物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She tripped over the bump on the sidewalk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被人行道上一块隆起的地面绊了一下。</font><br>\n
bunch	<h3>bunch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>束, 串, 捆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I received a bunch of flowers yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我收到了一束鲜花。</font><br>群, 伙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like any of them much, but he's the best of the bunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这帮人我谁也不喜欢, 但他还算是其中最好的呢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bunch of girls was[were] sitting on the grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群女孩坐在草地上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)…成束[捆]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vehicles often bunches on the big highways.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在干线公路上, 交通往往十分拥挤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bunched the flowers and sold them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把花捆成束出售。</font><br>\n
bundle	<h3>bundle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>捆, 包, 束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We collected a bundle of old clothes to be given to poor people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们收集了一包旧衣服给穷人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The books were tied up in bundles of twenty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些书被捆成20本一捆。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>收集, 归拢, 把…塞入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guest got very drunk so they bundled him into a taxi and sent him home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位客人喝得酩酊大醉, 于是他们把他塞进一辆计程车, 送他回家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't bundle all the clothes into that bag so carelessly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别把所有的衣服随随便便塞进那个手提包里。</font><br>\n
burden	<h3>burden</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重负<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The burden fell on the eldest son.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 担子落在了长子身上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His invalid father is becoming a burden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父亲体弱多病, 对他来说渐渐成了累赘。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The burden of his complaint was that quality was very poor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他投诉的要点是品质非常差。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>加重压于, 使背负<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The economy was further burdened by a flood of refugees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 难民大批涌来使经济负担愈加沉重。</font><br>\n
bureau	<h3>bureau</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>局, 办事处, 分社<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather bureau makes daily reports on weather conditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气象局每天报告天气状况。</font><br>\n
burial	<h3>burial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>葬, 掩埋, 葬礼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cremation is more common than burial in some countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在一些国家, 火葬比土葬普遍。</font><br>\n
burn	<h3>burn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt., vi. & link v.</i></font><br>(使)燃烧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stove is burning brightly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炉火正旺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire burned red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火烧得通红。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire burnt the grass quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大火很快把草烧着了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People used to burn an oil lamp to get light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从前人们点油灯照明。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>使用某物为燃料<br>烧毁, 烧坏, 烧伤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house burnt years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这栋房子多年前被烧毁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some acids are strong enough to burn the wood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些酸的酸性强得可以烧坏木头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was burnt in a raging fire while working in a factory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在工厂工作时被烈火烧伤了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>烧伤, 烧痕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He died of the burns he received in the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因在火灾中受烧伤而死。</font><br>\n
burst	<h3>burst</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>爆炸, 爆裂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dam burst under the weight of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那水坝在水的压力下决口了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you get much fatter you'll burst your clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是再长胖就要把衣服撑破了。</font><br>挤满, 充满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The town is bursting with tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 镇上到处都是游客。</font><br>突然打开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Open up or we'll burst the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开门, 要不我们就把门撞开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to burst the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不破门而入。</font><br>突然发作, 突然发生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The storm burst and we all got wet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴风雨突然袭来, 我们都淋湿了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爆炸, 爆裂; 爆发, 突发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard several bomb bursts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到了几声炸弹的爆炸声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His appearance on the platform was greeted with a burst of applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一登上台就博得了一阵热烈的掌声。</font><br>\n
bury	<h3>bury</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>埋葬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt lonely after he buried his good friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 埋葬了好友之后, 他感到很孤独。</font><br>掩埋, 埋藏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man is burying his money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老头正在埋藏他的钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy buried him alive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人将他活埋了。</font><br>原谅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's time to bury our differences and be friends again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是我们摒弃分歧重归于好的时候了。</font><br>不公开, 隐藏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The anger which had been buried inside me rose to the surface.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 埋藏在我内心的愤怒暴露了出来。</font><br>沉溺于; 专心于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her head was buried in the book she was reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在埋头读书。</font><br>\n
bus	<h3>bus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公共汽车, 巴士<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When we first lived here there were no buses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们最初住在这里的时候没有公共汽车。</font><br>\n
bush	<h3>bush</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>灌木(丛)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a bush near the school playground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校操场附近有一片灌木丛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bushes may have died back in this cold autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这寒冷的秋天, 灌木可能会枯死。</font><br>\n
business	<h3>business</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交易, 生意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company has done business with many countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该公司与许多国家做生意。</font><br>营业额, 交易量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are now doing almost twice as much business as they were last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们现在的营业额几乎为去年的两倍。</font><br>工商企业, 商店; 行业, 事业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many a large and big business has been built up from small ones.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很多重要的大企业都是从小规模发展起来的。</font><br>职责, 关心的事, 本分, 任务<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sensible enough to mind his own business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他颇有见识, 不去管闲事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A teacher's business is to help children learn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师的本分是帮助孩子学习。</font><br>事情; 事务, 业务<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The insurance business is built on trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保险业建立在信任的基础上。</font><br>\n
busy	<h3>busy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>忙的, 专心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a very busy man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个大忙人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No matter how busy he is, he is ready to help others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不管他多忙, 他总是乐意帮助别人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is too busy to look after her child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她太忙, 没有时间照料孩子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's busy with some important work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正忙于一些重要工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is busy preparing for the examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他忙着准备考试。</font><br>繁忙的, 热闹的<br>(电话线)正在被占用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He telephoned the lawyer and again got a busy signal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打电话给律师, 但还是听到占线的信号。</font><br>\n
but	<h3>but</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>但是, 然而<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The watch was cheap, but it goes quite well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块表虽然便宜, 但走得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is extremely strong—not but that he will catch cold at times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然他特别健壮, 可是有时也会感冒。</font><br>而是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose of the scheme is not to help the employers but to provide work for young people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个计划的目的不是为了帮助雇主, 而是为青年人提供工作机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Not that the machine is out of order, but that I have not learned to operate it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不是机器出了故障, 而是我还没学会操作。</font><br>除了, 除去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They never meet but they discuss this problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们每次见面都讨论这个问题。</font><br>相当于that(用于否定结构后)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no doubt but that he will win the election.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毫无疑问, 他将在竞选中获胜。</font><br>(用于加强语气)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It'll be the event of the year—everyone, but everyone, is coming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这将是一年中的大事——每个人, 对, 就是每一个人, 都会来。</font><br>(用于表示惊奇或其他强烈感受)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But that's outrageous!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 啊, 这太可恶了!</font><br>只因为, 可是只有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one is so old but he may learn.[No one is so old that he may not learn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ]活到老, 学到老。</font><br>假如没有…, 要不是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I would fail my exams but that the classmates help me with my lesson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要不是同学们帮助我学习功课, 我考试就会不及格。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>除…以外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We go to school every day but Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们除了星期日每天都上学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has looked for it everywhere but in his own room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了他自己的房间外, 他到处都找遍了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The problem is anything but easy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个问题绝不容易。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He does everything in the house but putting the children to bed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了安排孩子上床睡觉之外, 他在家里什么事都做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody but you could be so selfish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了你之外, 谁也不会这样自私。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She can do anything but sing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她除了唱歌之外, 什么都会做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We cannot but laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不禁大笑起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It could do everything but stop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了停下来, 它什么事情都能做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wanted nothing but to stay here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了留在这里之外, 他别无所求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But for the rain we should have had a pleasant journey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要不是下雨, 我们会有一次愉快的旅行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>只, 仅仅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's but a boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只不过是个孩子。</font><br>\n
butcher	<h3>butcher</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>屠夫, 肉商, 肉贩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A butcher needs sharp knives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 屠夫需利刃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother went to the butcher's yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈昨天去了肉店。</font><br>杀人狂, 刽子手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was as great a butcher as the world has been.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是有史以来最大的杀人狂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>屠宰, 残杀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He butchered the pig with a small sharp knife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一把锋利的小刀杀猪。</font><br>\n
butter	<h3>butter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>黄油<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She combined some sugar, flour and butter to make some cookies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把白糖、面粉和黄油和在一起做小甜饼。</font><br>黄油状的食品<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>抹黄油于…上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She buttered her bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在她的面包上涂黄油。</font><br>\n
butterfly	<h3>butterfly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蝴蝶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you think butterfly is a type of insect?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为蝴蝶是一种昆虫吗?</font><br>蝶式游泳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The butterfly is a kind of water sport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蝶式游泳是一种水上运动。</font><br>游手好闲的人, 轻浮的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a butterfly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个轻浮的人。</font><br>\n
button	<h3>button</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>纽扣<br>按钮<br>没有价值的小东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't care a button about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对它毫不介意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>扣住, 系住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most coats, jackets or blouses button at the front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数上衣、夹克或衬衫都在前面扣扣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't even button his coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没扣他外衣的纽扣。</font><br>\n
buy	<h3>buy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>购买, 购得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unable to find the book in this bookstore, he bought elsewhere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家书店找不到此书, 他到别处买去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father bought a nice toy for me yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我爸爸昨天为我买了一个好玩具。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought it ready-made.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买的是现成货。</font><br>做出牺牲以获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our victory was dearly bought.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的胜利是付出巨大的代价而获得的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交易, 买卖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a buy of wheat last week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上星期他做了一笔小麦的买卖。</font><br>便宜货<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Best buys of the week are carrots, which are plentiful and cheap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本星期买胡萝卜最合算, 因为货源充足, 价格低廉。</font><br>\n
by	<h3>by</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…近旁; 在身边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On a cold evening it is pleasant to sit by the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在寒冷的夜晚坐在炉火旁边很舒服。</font><br>(表示时间)不迟于; 在…时候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be here by four o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 四点钟之前到这儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She should be back by now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她现在应该回来了。</font><br>(表示方向)从…中经过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They came in by the back door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是由后门进来的。</font><br>(表示方式)搭乘, 通过; 抓住…; 靠, 采取; 就…而论; 以…称呼方式; 以…的名义; 凭着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you to go there by bike or by bus?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你骑车还是坐车去?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can order tickets by telephone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以用电话订票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He seized her by the arm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抓住她的手臂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man does not live by bread alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人不能单靠面包生存。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They decided to raise the money by subscription.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决定采取募捐的办法来筹集这笔款项。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By temperament he was an artist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从气质上看, 他是一位画家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They always addressed each other by their Christian name.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们总是以教名互相称呼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By God he's done it!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老天为证, 他确实做了此事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I did it all by myself!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我完全是靠自己做此事的。</font><br>(表示原因)随…而来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meeting will be held in the school hall, by permission of the headmaster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于有校长的准许, 会议将在学校大厅举行。</font><br>(表示方位)偏于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The steamer will go west by north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘轮船将向西偏北方向航行。</font><br>(表示环境)借着…光亮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were playing cards by electric light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正借着灯光打牌。</font><br>(表示关涉)经过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I go by the house every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每天都要从这栋房子经过。</font><br>(表示程度)以…之差<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lost the match by one goal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们以一分之差输了比赛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在近旁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stole the money when no one was by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他趁旁边无人时把钱偷走了。</font><br>经过, 走过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hurried by without speaking to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他匆匆经过, 没有跟我说话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Excuse me, I can't get by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抱歉, 请让我过去。</font><br>保留<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I always keep a bottle of wine by in case friends call round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我平时总存放一瓶酒以备朋友来时喝。</font><br>\n

cake	<h3>cake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蛋糕, 糕饼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is making cakes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在烤蛋糕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cake we made was somewhat of a failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们做的蛋糕不大成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cake ought to be good—I used the best ingredients.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蛋糕应该是好的——我用了最好的配料。</font><br>饼状食物; 块状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother bought three cakes of soap yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈昨天买了三块肥皂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)结块; (使)胶凝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Blood from the wound had caked on his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伤口的血在他脸上结成了硬块。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her shoes were caked with mud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的鞋上沾满了泥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Snow was caked high along the streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 街道旁积着高高的雪堆。</font><br>\n
calculate	<h3>calculate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>计算, 估计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you calculated the result?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你算出结果来了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I calculated that the trip would take two days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我估计这段路程要走两天时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll calculate what it will cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要估计一下那要花多少钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scientist could not calculate when the spaceship would reach the Jupiter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位科学家没有算出那艘宇宙飞船什么时候会到达木星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Astronomers can calculate when there will be eclipses of the sun and moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天文学家可以算出何时发生日食和月食。</font><br>打算, 旨在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Emotional people don't stop to calculate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This advertisement is calculated to attract the attention of housewives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个广告旨在吸引家庭主妇们的注意力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speech was calculated to win votes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那演说意在争取选票。</font><br>\n
