calendar	<h3>calendar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日历, 月历<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp According to the calendar my birthday falls on a Sunday this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按照今年的日历, 我的生日恰好是个星期日。</font><br>日程表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The presidential elections are the highlight of next year's political calendar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统选举是明年政治日程表上的大事。</font><br>\n
call	<h3>call</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>叫, 喊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why doesn't the servant come when I call?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当我叫的时候, 为何仆人没来?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She called and called but no one came to her assistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她叫了又叫, 但没有人来帮忙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you call me a taxi?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我叫一辆计程车好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Not far away in the woods, a bird called.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在不远的林子里有一只鸟在叫。</font><br>通电话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She promised to call at noon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她答应中午来电话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The office called to find out where you were.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 办公室打电话来了解你在什么地方。</font><br>认为; 估计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you calling me a liar?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为我是一个不诚实的人吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing can be called unknowable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有什么事物可认为是不可知的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They called it silly to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们认为这样做很傻。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>命名, 取名<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The father called the baby John.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲给这个婴孩取名约翰。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had a daughter last year.They call this one Catherine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年她生了个女孩, 他们叫她凯瑟琳。</font><br>召唤, 号召, 召开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sirens are calling the men to assemble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警报声在召令士兵集合。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>拜访, 访问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did any one call when I was out?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不在的时候有人来过吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I called to see Mr. Green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我拜访了格林先生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>呼喊声, 叫声; 鸟鸣声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard a call for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到呼救声。</font><br>打电话<br>拜访; 小歇<br>\n

care	<h3>care</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>关心, 担心, 在乎, 介意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I couldn't care less.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不在乎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She affected not to care.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她作出不在意的样子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you care to come and have a chat with me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你不介意的话, 过来和我聊聊天好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Carrie doesn't care how far she has to walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嘉莉不在乎她得走多远。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They didn't care if/whether it rained or not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不在乎下雨还是不下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't care whether he comes or not.</font></i><br><font certain	<h3>certain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无疑, 肯定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His ear for music was certain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对音乐的鉴赏力毋庸置疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That we should stay together was certain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该呆在一起这是肯定的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is more or less certain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这有几分确定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the Boston Tea Party, war with England seemed certain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 波士顿倾茶事件以后, 与英国交战似乎是不可避免的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are certain to win the game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一定能打胜这场比赛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people of the afflicted areas are certain to need our help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 灾区人民一定需要我们的帮助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The duties before you are certain to be heavy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 摆在你面前的责任重大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are certain to be victorious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们定会胜利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief is certain to be caught in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小偷迟早会被抓到的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are pretty certain to be seen by someone who knows you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一定被认识你的人见到过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are certain that he will get over his illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们相信他一定会战胜病魔的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is certain that this TV set will operate on batteries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他肯定这个电视机可以用电池。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be certain you catch your train on time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 务必准时赶上火车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm certain she saw me yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我确信她昨天看到了我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was certain I'd found you here if you were still in existence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我确信如果你还活着的话, 我会在这儿找到你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not certain who he is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法确切说出他是谁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not certain where this ought to be put.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能确定这东西该放在什么地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is certain he will come to the discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他肯定会来参加讨论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not yet certain who will succeed him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁来接他的班还未确定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not certain when it will take place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不能确定这事什么时候会发生。</font><br>某, 某些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A certain Mr. Brown telephoned while you were out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你出去的时候, 有个叫布朗的先生来过电话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The terrorists will only release their hostages on certain conditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怖分子只有在某些条件下才肯释放人质。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are certain forms that must be followed in diplomatic circles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在外交界有一些礼节是必须遵守的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am prepared to make certain concessions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我准备做某些让步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a certain hesitation in her manner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的态度有些犹豫不决。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you want to be slim, you should try to lose a certain amount of weight every week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果想变得苗条些的话, 你应该想方设法每周减少点体重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has certain definite beauties, such as her eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她确有几分姿色, 比如说她的眼睛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no certain cure for this disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种病没有特效药。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They face certain death unless they can be rescued today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们除非今天获救, 否则必死无疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The club meets on certain days every month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 俱乐部成员每月于某些天聚一次。</font><br>\n

clash	<h3>clash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(砰地相撞)发出撞击声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dustbins clashed as people emptied rubbish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 垃圾桶在人们倒垃圾时发出撞击声。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>交锋; 冲突<br>不合; 不一致<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(金属等的)刺耳的撞击声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pot came down on the stone floor with a clash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 锅“当”地一声掉到石地上。</font><br>不协调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colour of the curtains has a clash with the colour of the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗帘的颜色与墙的颜色不协调。</font><br>冲突<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a clash between two classes at 2 p.m.on Thursday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 星期四下午两点有两堂课是冲突的。</font><br>\n
class	<h3>class</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>等级, 级别<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As actress Jane is not in the same class as Susan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为演员, 简和苏姗不是同一层次。</font><br>阶级, 社会阶级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Society is divided into upper, middle and lower classes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 社会分为上层、中层和下层阶级。</font><br>社会等级制度<br>班, 班级, 年级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The class is too large, we shall have to divide it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个班太大了, 我们得拆班。</font><br>一节, 课<br>种类, 门类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Scientists divide animals, plants and rocks into classes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家把动物、植物和矿物分类。</font><br>优雅, 高尚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has got class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很有气质。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…归入某等级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Class the books in this category.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按目录把书分类。</font><br>\n
classic	<h3>classic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(著作, 赛事等)最优秀的, (可作)典范的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The novel is regarded as one of the classic works.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇小说被公认为是最优秀的作品之一。</font><br>(病例等)典型的, 标准的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a classic case of malnutrition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是营养不良的典型病例。</font><br>(衣服, 设计等)传统式样的, 典雅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a classic style of Gothic buildings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是哥特式建筑的典型样式。</font><br>(因为时已久)著名的; 传统的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>文豪, 大艺术家; 文学名著, 经典作品, 杰作<br>优秀的典范<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The football match was a classic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那场足球比赛堪称典范。</font><br>\n

clean	<h3>clean</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>清洁的, 干净的; 纯净的<br>新的, 未用过的<br>整齐的, 规则的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a clean cut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是整齐的切口。</font><br>正派的, 正大光明的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地, 彻底地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All he has is clean gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他失去了所有的一切。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)清洁; 变干净<br>\n
clear	<h3>clear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>晴朗的, 清澈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can see the hill through the clear glass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 通过透明的玻璃我能看到小山。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather was clear that day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天天气晴朗。</font><br>无愧的, 清白的<br>清楚的, 明白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave us a very clear explanation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我们做了非常清楚的解释。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm quite clear what I ought to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很清楚该做什么。</font><br>畅通的, 无阻的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>清晰地, 清楚地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speaks loud and clear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说话响亮清楚。</font><br>完全, 一直<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car ran clear off the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 车子完全驶离了道路。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>转晴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather has cleared up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天放晴了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>扫除, 清除<br>(从电脑中)消除(数据)<br>证明…无罪; 宣告…无罪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has been cleared of murdering the little boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已被证明与谋杀那个小孩无关。</font><br>\n

collar	<h3>collar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>衣领, 领子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned his overcoat collar up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把外套的衣领翻了起来。</font><br>(狗等的)项圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our dog has its name on its collar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的狗的项圈上有它的名字。</font><br>\n
colleague	<h3>colleague</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>同事, 同僚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a colleague of mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我的同事。</font><br>\n
collect	<h3>collect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>收集, 采集<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are collecting this material at the points of origin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在产地收集这种材料。</font><br>领取; 接走; 拿走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She collected her mail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她取走了邮件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He collected the children from school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从学校把孩子们接走了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>聚集, 集合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A crowd soon collected at the scene of the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 群众迅速聚集在事故现场。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>征收; 募集<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're collecting for the famine victims.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正在为遭受饥荒的灾民募款。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government is trying to improve the way it collects taxes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府正试图改进收税的方式。</font><br>\n
collection	<h3>collection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收集; 收取, 领取<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two collections a day from this letter-box.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个信筒每天收信两次。</font><br>收藏品, 收集的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The collection is housed in a fine building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这批收藏品存放在一座漂亮的房子里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her new book is a collection of short stories.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的新书是一部短篇小说集。</font><br>募集的款项, 捐款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His workmates made a collection for his leaving party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的同事为他的告别晚会募捐。</font><br>积聚物; 集中在一起的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a collection of rubbish in the corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 角落里有一堆垃圾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an odd collection of people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一群稀奇古怪的人。</font><br>\n
collective	<h3>collective</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>集体的, 共同的, 共有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all bear collective responsibility for this decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们大家共同承担这项决定的责任。</font><br>\n
college	<h3>college</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大学, 学院; 高等专科学校<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our daughter is going to college in autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的女儿秋天就要上大学了。</font><br>\n
collision	<h3>collision</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>碰撞, 冲突, 抵触<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two ships came into collision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两艘轮船相撞。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A collision with parliament could ruin the government's plans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与议会冲突可能使政府的计划成为泡影。</font><br>\n
colonial	<h3>colonial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>殖民地的, 拥有殖民地的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people of Africa have successfully fought against colonial rule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 非洲人民成功地反抗了殖民统治。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>殖民主义者的<br>\n
colony	<h3>colony</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>殖民地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They amassed huge wealth by plundering the colonies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们通过掠夺殖民地聚敛了大笔的财富。</font><br>(侨民等)聚居区, 聚居地; 聚居的同国籍侨民; 聚居的同类人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live in an artists' colony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们住在艺术家聚居区。</font><br>(动植物的)群体, 集群<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There lived a colony of bees on the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树上生活着一群蜜蜂。</font><br>\n
color	<h3>color</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉颜色,色彩,脸色,风格,外貌<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>v.</i></font><br>〈美〉给…涂颜色,改变…的颜色,粉饰,脸红,歪曲，获得颜色,变色<br>\n
colour	<h3>colour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>彩色<br>颜色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some insects can change colour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些昆虫可以变色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you think these two colours will blend together?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为这两种颜色和谐吗?</font><br>脸色, 气色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colour is coming back to your face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的气色在好转。</font><br>肤色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cloth blends in with her colour of skin very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件衣服和她的肤色很协调。</font><br>特色, 个性; 情调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lecturer told a few jokes and anecdotes to add colour to his talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 演讲者穿插着说了几个笑话和几则轶事, 为其演讲增色。</font><br>颜料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you like oil painting or water colour?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你喜欢油画还是喜欢水彩画?</font><br>\n
column	<h3>column</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>柱, 圆柱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dome was supported by white marble columns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 圆顶由白色大理石柱支撑着。</font><br>纵队, 直行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A column of soldiers marched down the highway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个士兵纵队沿着公路行进。</font><br>栏, 专栏(文章)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two columns on each page of this dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本词典每一页有两栏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I often read his column in the local paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我经常在当地的报纸上看到他的专栏文章。</font><br>\n
comb	<h3>comb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>梳理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't forget to comb your hair before you go out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要忘记临出门梳梳头。</font><br>在…搜寻, 彻底搜查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He combed through the files searching for evidence of fraud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他详查档案, 寻找欺诈行为的证据。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Police are combing the woods for the missing children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察搜遍树林以寻找失踪的孩子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>梳子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We use a comb to tidy our hair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用梳子来梳理头发。</font><br>\n

come	<h3>come</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>来; 来到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come here, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请来这儿一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Uncle's birthday is coming soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 叔叔的生日快到了。</font><br>移动, 行走<br>到达, 达到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Has the train come through?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车到达了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After much talk they came to an agreement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过多次商谈, 他们达成了协议。</font><br>出现于…, 位于…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car skidded off the road and came to rest in a field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车滑出公路, 在田里停了下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These troubles came along all at the same time that I was at a loss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些麻烦突然一起发生, 使我不知所措。</font><br>转入另一种状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Computer technology has come a long way since the 1970s.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自70年代以来, 电脑技术有了很大的发展。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>成为, 变为; 变得, 终于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This great prediction is coming true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一伟大的预言即将成为事实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had come to see the problem in a new light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他终于对那问题有了新的认识。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The buttons came unfastened.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 扣子松开了。</font><br>\n
comedy	<h3>comedy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>喜剧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you prefer comedy or tragedy?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你喜欢喜剧还是悲剧?</font><br>喜剧性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last he saw the comedy of the situation and laughed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他最后看出这一场面的喜剧性, 于是笑了。</font><br>\n
comfort	<h3>comfort</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>舒适, 身心健康<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has enough money so that he can live in comfort.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有很多钱, 足可舒舒服服过日子。</font><br>使人舒服的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is enjoying the comforts of life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正享受着舒适的生活条件。</font><br>安慰, 帮助<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I often take comfort from reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我经常从读书中寻求安慰。</font><br>给予援助或安慰的人或事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a great comfort to her parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是她父母最大的安慰。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a comfort to be with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跟你在一起真令人感到安慰。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>安慰, 使舒适<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old lady often comforts those who are in trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老妇人经常安慰处于困境的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She comforted herself that her husband would be home soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她安慰自己说她的丈夫很快就会回来。</font><br>\n
comfortable	<h3>comfortable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>安逸的, 使人舒服的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom gratefully took in the comfortable sitting room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆感激地接受了那间舒适的起居室。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel comfortable talking with that nice girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和那个可爱的女孩谈话我感觉很好。</font><br>丰富的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a comfortable income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有相当宽裕的收入。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sue is comfortable in circumstances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 苏的生活优裕。</font><br>\n
comic	<h3>comic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>滑稽的, 好笑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His accident with the microphone brought some welcome comic relief to a very dull party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他撞上了麦克风, 这给极沉闷的聚会带来了些欢乐。</font><br>喜剧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shakespeare created many comic characters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莎士比亚塑造了许多喜剧人物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ending of the play is comic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此剧的结局是喜剧性的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>连环漫画杂志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw the child reading a science fiction comic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看见那孩子在看一本科幻连环漫画杂志。</font><br>喜剧演员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a popular TV comic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是观众喜爱的电视喜剧演员。</font><br>\n
command	<h3>command</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>命令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general issued a command that all of them should come at six o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将军颁布了一道命令, 所有的人都要在六点钟到。</font><br>指挥, 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army is under the king's direct command.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军队由国王直接统帅。</font><br>掌握; 运用力, 控制力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a good command of French.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的法文很好。</font><br>部队, 兵团; 指挥部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know where's the United Nations Command?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道联合国部队司令部在什么地方吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>指挥; 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have no right to command.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你没有权利指挥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I advised him to command his temper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我劝他控制自己的脾气。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>命令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general commanded his men to attack the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那将军命令部下攻城。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He commanded that man go at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他命令那个人马上走。</font><br>应得, 博得, 值得<br>俯瞰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hill commands a fine view.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从这座山上可以俯瞰到周围的一片美景。</font><br>掌握, 支配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain of a ship commands all the officers and men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 舰长统率舰上的全体官兵。</font><br>\n
commander	<h3>commander</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>指挥官<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the commanders gathered at the headquarters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的指挥官都集合在司令部。</font><br>海军中校<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a commander who never took risks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位从不冒险的海军中校。</font><br>\n
commence	<h3>commence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>〈正〉开始<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the election the new government commenced developing the roads.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选举后新政府开始修建道路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl commenced to cry when she saw the snake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这小女孩一看到蛇就开始哭了起来。</font><br>\n
comment	<h3>comment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>评论, 意见, 解释, 批评<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Comment is needless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 解释是不必要的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>评论; 谈论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They watched and commented.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们边看边议论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The discovery is hardly commented by the press.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新闻界对该发现几乎未加评论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joan commented that it was a better play than usual, and I agreed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 琼评论说这场比赛比以往打得好, 我表示赞同。</font><br>\n

commerce	<h3>commerce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>商业, 贸易<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They drew up plans aimed at expanding commerce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拟定了发展商业的计划。</font><br>\n
commercial	<h3>commercial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>商业的, 商务的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I work for a commercial radio station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在一家商业广播电台工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His new record is much too commercial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的新唱片太商业化了。</font><br>\n
commission	<h3>commission</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>授权, 委托<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The commission for the new theatre was given to a well-known architect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 建造新剧院之权已委托给一位著名的建筑师。</font><br>委员会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The commission is made up of five people, including two women.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会由五人组成, 其中包括两名妇女。</font><br>佣金, 回扣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The salesman can get commission on everything he sells.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个售货员能得到所售每件货物的佣金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>委任, 委托<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He commissioned a statue of his wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他请人制作他妻子的雕像。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was commissioned (as a) general in 1944.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我于1944年被任命为将军。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father commissioned a real estate agent to sell our house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲委托了一名房地产经纪人来卖我们的房子。</font><br>\n
commit	<h3>commit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>犯罪; 犯错<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has committed a serious fault.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他犯了严重错误。</font><br>承诺; 使自己受约束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Asked if he was a candidate, he refused to commit himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当问到他是不是候选人时, 他不置可否。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has committed himself to support them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他答应负担他们的生活。</font><br>托付; 交付<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was committed to the care of his aunt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个孩子被交给他的姑妈照顾。</font><br>\n
commitment	<h3>commitment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>承诺, 许诺, 保证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a commitment to pay the rent on time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他保证按时付房租。</font><br>承担的义务<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am very tired because I have taken on so many commitments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很累, 因为我承担了很多的事情。</font><br>信奉, 献身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are looking for someone with a real sense of commitment to the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在找一个对这一工作有献身精神的人。</font><br>\n
commitment	<h3>commitment</h3>承诺<br>\n
committee	<h3>committee</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>委员会; 全体委员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee has[have] decided to dismiss him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会已决定辞退他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee which was[who were] responsible for this decision would consider it over again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对这一决定负责的委员会是会重新考虑它的。</font><br>\n
common	<h3>common</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>普遍的, 常见的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a common word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个常见的字。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This sort of weather is quite common.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种天气很常见。</font><br>公有的, 共有的, 共同的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Britain and America share a common language.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国和美国共用一种语言。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Certain desires are common to all men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 某些欲望对所有的人是共有的。</font><br>一般的, 平常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is common knowledge that the earth is round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球是圆的是常识。</font><br>\n
communicate	<h3>communicate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>传达; 表达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A politician must be able to communicate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政治家必须善于表达自己的观点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She reluctantly communicated the facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不愿把真实情况讲出来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>通讯; 交际, 交流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She and I don't communicate any more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我和她不再通信了。</font><br>相连; 相通<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her bedroom communicates with the bathroom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的卧室和浴室相通。</font><br>\n
communication	<h3>communication</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交流, 交际, 通讯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Telegraph communication was broken off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电讯中断了。</font><br>信息, 消息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This communication is confidential.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息是机密的。</font><br>通信工具, 交通联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All communications with the north have been stopped by snowstorm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 北部的一切交通均为暴风雪所阻。</font><br>\n
communism	<h3>communism</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>共产主义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a politically conscious fighter for communism.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在政治上, 他是个自觉的共产主义战士。</font><br>\n
communist	<h3>communist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>共产主义者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are communists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是共产主义者。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>共产主义的, 信仰共产主义的<br>\n
community	<h3>community</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>社区, 社会, 团体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He refuses to join any community.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不参加任何团体。</font><br>大众, 公众<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The job of a politician is to serve the whole community.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政治家的职责是为全体大众服务。</font><br>共有, 共享<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two men were united by community of interests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 共同的利益使两个人结合在一起。</font><br>\n
commute	<h3>commute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>通勤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Barbara lives in Oxford and commutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 芭芭拉住在牛津, 通勤往来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>减(刑)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His sentence was commuted from death to life imprisonment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的判决由死刑减为无期徒刑。</font><br>\n
compact	<h3>compact</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>压紧, (使)坚实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thousands of crates compacted in a warehouse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数以千计的板条箱堆放在仓库里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heat and lack of rain have compacted the soil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 高热少雨使土壤固结。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>装填紧密的, 整齐填满的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a compact package.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个捆得很紧的包裹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stamp the soil down so that it's compact.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把泥土踩结实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>协议, 条约, 契约<br>\n

company	<h3>company</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伴随, 陪伴<br>客人, 朋友<br>一群人<br>公司<br>\n
comparable	<h3>comparable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>类似的, 同类的, 相当的<br>可比较的, 比得上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fire is comparable with the sun; both give light and heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火可以和太阳相比, 两者都可以发光发热。</font><br>\n
comparative	<h3>comparative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>比较的, 相比的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's make a comparative study of the two languages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们将这两种语言作一下比较研究。</font><br>相比之下的, 相比而言的, 相对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After many hardships, he now lives in comparative ease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过许多困难之后, 他现在的生活相对舒适。</font><br>\n
compare	<h3>compare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>比较, 对照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is hard to compare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很难比较。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's interesting to compare these two cars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比较这两辆车是有趣的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相比<br>\n
comparison	<h3>comparison</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比较, 对照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My garden doesn't stand comparison with his.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的花园无法和他的相比。</font><br>经比较得出的结论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By comparison with London, Paris is small.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与伦敦相比, 巴黎较小。</font><br>类似, 相似<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They make a comparison of New York to a beehive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把纽约比作一个蜂巢。</font><br>\n
compass	<h3>compass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>罗盘, 指南针<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A compass needle always points north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罗盘指针总是指向北方。</font><br>圆规<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher asked us to buy a pair of compasses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师要求我们买圆规。</font><br>界限<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Finance is not within the compass of this department.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 财政不在这个部门的管辖范围之内。</font><br>\n

compete	<h3>compete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>竞赛; 竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some 1000 athletes competed in 20 events.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约1000名运动员参加了20个项目的比赛。</font><br>比得上, 媲美<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These products are of high quality and able to compete internationally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些产品品质很好, 在国际市场上有竞争能力。</font><br>\n

competition	<h3>competition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There will be a chess competition next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个星期有一场国际象棋比赛。</font><br>竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is keen competition between the two motorcar firms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两家汽车公司之间存在着激烈的竞争。</font><br>\n
competitive	<h3>competitive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>竞争的, 比赛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some kinds of business are competitive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些商业是要竞争的。</font><br>(指人)好竞争的, 求胜心切的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a competitive athlete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位竞技意识强的运动员。</font><br>(价格等)有竞争力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Because of the high exchange rate, our products have lost their competitive edge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于汇率很高, 我们的产品失去了竞争优势。</font><br>\n

complete	<h3>complete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>完整的, 完全的<br>完成的, 结束的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will the work be complete?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件工作什么时候完成?</font><br>完满的, 圆满的<br>彻底的, 完完全全的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>完成, 结束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will you complete the task?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你什么时候完成任务?</font><br>使完善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has completed repairing the car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已修好汽车。</font><br>\n
complex	<h3>complex</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>由许多部分组成的, 复合的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a complex sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个复合句。</font><br>复杂的, 难懂的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had not a particularly complex mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的头脑并不十分复杂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What he said was too complex for me to understand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说的太复杂了, 我无法了解。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>综合体, 集合体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a complex of new building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是新建筑群。</font><br>〈心〉情结, 夸大的情绪反应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am developing a guilt complex about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对此事有一种负罪感。</font><br>\n
complicate	<h3>complicate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使复杂化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no need to complicate matters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有必要使问题复杂化。</font><br>\n
complicated	<h3>complicated</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>结构复杂的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the most complicated case I have ever handled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我所处理过的最为复杂的案子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Life is so complicated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生活是如此复杂。</font><br>\n
component	<h3>component</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>成分, 组成部分, 部件, 元件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A chemist can separate a medicine into its components.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 化学家能把一种药物的各种成分分解出来。</font><br>\n
compose	<h3>compose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>组成, 构成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These twelve men are believed to compose the jury.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据信, 陪审团是由这12人组成的。</font><br>使安定, 使镇静<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard he ask her to compose herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到他叫她镇定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>创作(乐曲、诗歌等); 为…谱曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He teaches music and also composes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他教音乐, 也作曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yesterday he composed a piece of music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天他作了一首曲子。</font><br>\n
composer	<h3>composer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(尤指古典音乐)作曲家<br>\n
composition	<h3>composition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>创作, 写作, 作曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He played a piece of music of his own composition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他演奏了一首自己创作的曲子。</font><br>作文, 作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My composition has not been completed yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的作文还未写完。</font><br>构图; 构成, 成分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her drawing is competent, but her composition is poor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的画有功力, 但布局欠佳。</font><br>混合物, 合成物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you studied the composition of the chemicals?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你研究过这种药品的成分了吗?</font><br>\n
compound	<h3>compound</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>复合物, 化合物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When two or more elements combine and form a compound, a chemical change takes place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当两种或两种以上的元素结合形成化合物时, 发生化学变化。</font><br>(筑有围墙的)院子, (围起来的)场地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The compound was subdivided into four living areas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个区域被划分成四块居住小区。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使混合, 使合成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用水拌和沙和泥土做成砖块。</font><br>使严重; 使恶化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heavy rain compounded the trouble of the lost hikers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大雨增加了迷路的徒步旅行者们的困难。</font><br>\n
comprehension	<h3>comprehension</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>理解, 理解力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher set the class a comprehension test.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师对全班同学进行了一次理解力测验。</font><br>\n
comprehensive	<h3>comprehensive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>广泛的, 综合的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An objective test can be quite comprehensive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 客观测试相当全面。</font><br>\n
compress	<h3>compress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>压紧, 压缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In her anger she compressed her lips so tightly that they went white.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她生气时把嘴闭得很紧, 嘴唇都变白了。</font><br>\n
comprise	<h3>comprise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包含, 包括, 由…组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fishing fleet comprises around 70 boats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 捕鱼船队由大约70艘渔船组成。</font><br>组成, 构成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve departments comprise this university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12个系组成了这所大学。</font><br>\n
compromise	<h3>compromise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>妥协, 折中方法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spokesman made it clear that no compromise was yet in sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发言人表明, 目前还不会妥协。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>折中解决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They compromised by going to the cinema.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们采取折中的办法去看电影。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>连累, 危害, 损害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such conduct will compromise your reputation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些举动将会损害你的名誉。</font><br>\n
compute	<h3>compute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>计算, 估算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He computed that the project would take seven years to complete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他估计这项计划要花七年才能完成。</font><br>\n
computer	<h3>computer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(电子)计算机, 电脑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A computer is a device for handling of processing information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电脑是一种资料处理装置。</font><br>\n
computerise	<h3>computerise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用计算机做, 使计算机化<br>将(资料)存入计算机<br>\n
computerize	<h3>computerize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用计算机做, 使计算机化<br>将(资料)存入计算机<br>\n

concede	<h3>concede</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>承认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I conceded that I had made a mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我承认我犯了一个错误。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>出让, 容许<br>\n
concentrate	<h3>concentrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>专心于; 注意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't concentrate when I'm hungry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我饿了就无法集中精力。</font><br>集中, 聚集<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general decided to concentrate his forces near the capital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位将军决定把他的部队集中在首都附近。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>浓缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An acid solution is concentrated when it has very much acid in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当酸性溶液里含有很多酸时, 它就被浓缩了。</font><br>\n
concentration	<h3>concentration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>专心, 专注<br>集中, 集结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Large concentrations of capital were in the hands of merchants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大量资本集中在商人手里。</font><br>\n
concept	<h3>concept</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>概念; 观念; 想法<br>\n
concern	<h3>concern</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>忧虑, 焦虑, 担心<br>焦虑的原因<br>重要的或感兴趣的事物<br>企业, 公司<br>股份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a concern in the business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在企业中有股份。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>有关于, 关系到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These problems concern all of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些问题与我们所有的人都有关系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It doesn't concern me at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此事与我毫不相干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The principal issues in dispute concern the duration of the future treaty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有争议的主要问题牵涉到将来条约的期限。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a great event that concerns the future of our company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是关系到我们公司前途的大事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The second question concerns our method of work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二个问题牵涉到我们的工作方法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are firm where our principles are concerned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在涉及原则问题时我们是坚定不移的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In short, the style concerns not what a writer says but how he says.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简言之, 风格不是跟作者说什么有关, 而是跟如何说有关。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police are anxious to interview everyone concerned in last night's accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察急于会见与昨晚事故有关的每个人。</font><br>使担忧, 使烦恼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our losses are beginning to concern me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的损失使我担心起来。</font><br>\n
concerning	<h3>concerning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示论及)关于, 有关, 就…而论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What do you know concerning this?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于这事你知道些什么?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wrote to the head of the firm concerning Robert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我曾就罗伯特的问题写信给公司的主管。</font><br>\n
