conclude	<h3>conclude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>结束<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>得出结论; 断定<br>决定<br>\n
conclusion	<h3>conclusion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结束, 结尾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I found the conclusion of his book very interesting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得他这本书的结尾很有趣。</font><br>信念, 意见, 结论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They drew different conclusions from the facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们根据这些事实得出了不同的结论。</font><br>\n
concrete	<h3>concrete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>实体的, 有形的<br>确实的, 明确的, 确定的<br>\n
condemn	<h3>condemn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>谴责, 责备<br>判罪, 处刑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoner is sure to be condemned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个犯人一定会被判刑。</font><br>宣布…不能使用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meat was condemned as unfit for human consumption.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种肉已被宣布不适宜人们食用。</font><br>迫使…陷于不幸的境地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were condemned to spend a fortnight of idleness at that lonely island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们被迫在那个孤岛上待了两个星期。</font><br>\n
condense	<h3>condense</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)变稠或变浓; 浓缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Soup condenses when boiled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤煮过后就浓了。</font><br>(使)凝结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Steam is condensed in the condenser.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蒸汽在冷凝器中凝结。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>简说, 摘要, 简述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have condensed my report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已缩短了我的报告。</font><br>\n
condition	<h3>condition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>状况, 状态; 地位<br>健康状况, 可使用的状况<br>条件, 先决条件<br>环境, 情况<br>疾病<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>制约, 限制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ability and effort condition success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 才干和努力是成功的条件。</font><br>使习惯于, 使适应<br>\n
conduct	<h3>conduct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>引导, 带领, 担任指挥<br>控制, 管理<br>传导<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>举止, 行为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is famous for his good conduct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因良好的行为而远近闻名。</font><br>管理(方式), 实施(方式)<br>\n
conductor	<h3>conductor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(乐队)指挥<br>售票员, 列车长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bus conductor collected money from the passengers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公共汽车售票员向乘客收钱。</font><br>〈电〉导体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Copper is a good conductor of heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铜是热的良导体。</font><br>\n
conference	<h3>conference</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>会议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nearly all the members attended the conference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几乎全体成员都出席了这次会议。</font><br>讨论, 商谈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll have a conference with the manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要和经理商谈一下。</font><br>\n
confess	<h3>confess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>承认, 供认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The criminal soon confessed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罪犯很快就供认了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She confessed hating the boss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她承认痛恨这个老板。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed where he had hidden the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他供出了他藏钱的地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed himself (to be) guilty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认自己有罪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I confessed myself beaten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我承认自己被击败了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They confessed themselves to have made a great mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们承认自己犯了大错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed himself out of contact with the times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认自己与时代脱节。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>听…忏悔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The priest confessed the criminal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 神父听取那罪犯的忏悔。</font><br>\n
confidence	<h3>confidence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信任<br>信心, 自信<br>知心话, 私房话<br>\n
confident	<h3>confident</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>确信的, 肯定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel confident that we will win.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我确信我们将胜利。</font><br>有信心的, 自信的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need a confident leader to overcome these difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要一个有信心的领导者来克服这些困难。</font><br>\n
confine	<h3>confine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>限制; 局限于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She confined her activities in educational circles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把她的各项活动都限制在教育圈内。</font><br>禁闭; 管制; 关起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They confined the prisoner in a cell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把犯人监禁在监狱里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>界限, 范围<br>\n
confirm	<h3>confirm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>证实, 证明; 肯定, 确认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have confirmed the report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们证实了那则报道。</font><br>使巩固, 加强<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news confirmed my resolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息坚定了我的决心。</font><br>批准; 认可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king confirmed that the election would be held on July 20th.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国王批准选举在7月20日举行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President confirmed him as Secretary of State.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统任命他为国务卿。</font><br>\n
conflict	<h3>conflict</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>战斗, 斗争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a serious dispute, and could lead to armed conflict.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一场严重的争执, 有可能导致武装斗争。</font><br>冲突, 抵触, 争论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not surprising that such a view has led to very considerable conflict.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样的一种观点引起很大的分歧是不足为怪的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your statement is in conflict with the rest of the evidence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的陈述同其余证据有矛盾。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>抵触, 冲突<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do British immigration laws conflict with any international laws?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国的移民法与国际法有抵触吗?</font><br>\n
confront	<h3>confront</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>勇敢地面对, 正视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A soldier has to confront danger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵须面对危险。</font><br>迎面遇到, 遭遇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The difficulties that confront us seem insuperable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们面临的困难似乎是不可克服的。</font><br>使对质, 使当面对证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They confronted the prisoner with his accusers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们让犯人与原告对质。</font><br>\n
Confucian	<h3>Confucian</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>儒家学者<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>孔子的,儒家的<br>\n
confuse	<h3>confuse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使困惑, 把…弄糊涂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They asked so many questions that they confused me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们问了许多问题, 都把我弄糊涂了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people are confused about the new ways of measuring temperature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人都搞不清测定温度的新方法。</font><br>混淆, 把…混同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an attempt to confuse form and[with] substance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是企图把形式同实质混淆。</font><br>混乱, 搞乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These verbs are often confused.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些动词常被弄混。</font><br>\n
confusion	<h3>confusion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>困惑, 糊涂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对我的问题的回答只是使我更加困惑不解。</font><br>混淆, 混同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There have been some of confusion names.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些名字弄混了。</font><br>混乱, 骚乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His unexpected arrival threw us into total confusion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的突然来访使我们完全不知所措。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the ensuing confusion another eight persons were hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在随后的骚动中, 又有八人受伤。</font><br>\n
congratulate	<h3>congratulate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>祝贺, 道喜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is to be congratulated for his success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将会由于取得的成就而受到祝贺。</font><br>\n
congress	<h3>congress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>代表大会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were some days to wait before the Congress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大会的召开还有几天时间。</font><br>国会, 议会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Congress has approved the new budget.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国会已批准了这项新的预算。</font><br>\n
conjunction	<h3>conjunction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>连词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “And”, “but”and“whereas” are conjunctions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp and, but和whereas是连词。</font><br>结合; 联合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conjunction of heavy rains and strong winds caused flooding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大雨和大风加在一起造成了洪水泛滥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are working in conjunction with the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们与警方配合进行工作。</font><br>\n
connect	<h3>connect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>连接, 联结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wires connect under the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电线是在地板下接通的。</font><br>把…看作有关联; 由…联想到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot connect the two things in my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我心中, 我无法将这两件事情联系在一起。</font><br>给…接通电话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The telephone operator connected us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 话务员给我们接通了电话。</font><br>\n
connection	<h3>connection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>连接, 联结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How long will the connection of the telephone take?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 接通电话需要多长时间呢?</font><br>联系; 关系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company has connections with a number of American firms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司与许多美国公司有往来。</font><br>连接点; 连接物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a faulty connection in the fusebox.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保险丝盒里接错了线。</font><br>熟人, 业务上的客户<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard about it through one of my business connections.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我通过一个生意上的客户知道了这件事。</font><br>\n
connexion	<h3>connexion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>联系,连结<br>\n
conquer	<h3>conquer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>攻克, 征服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have conquered the enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们战胜了敌人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will scientists conquer the stars?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家什么时候能征服恒星呢?</font><br>破除, 克服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I conquered my dislike for mathematics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我克服了讨厌数学的毛病。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>得胜<br>\n
conquest	<h3>conquest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>攻取, 征服, 克服<br>\n
conscience	<h3>conscience</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>良心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had a guilty conscience about not telling her the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我因为没有告诉她事实真相而感到内疚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After he had committed the crime, his conscience was troubled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他犯罪后, 良心上感到很不安。</font><br>\n
conscious	<h3>conscious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>神志清醒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She spoke to us in her conscious moments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她神志清醒时跟我们说过话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is badly hurt but still conscious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他伤得很重, 不过神志还清醒。</font><br>知道的; 注意到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was not conscious of having made a mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没意识到犯了错误。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were conscious that he disapproved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们意识到他不赞成。</font><br>自觉的; 蓄意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had to make a conscious effort not to be rude to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得刻意约束自己不要对她粗鲁。</font><br>\n
consensus	<h3>consensus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(意见等)一致, 一致同意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can we reach a consensus on this issue?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们能在这个问题上取得一致意见吗?</font><br>\n
consent	<h3>consent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准许, 同意, 赞成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her parents refused their consent to the marriage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的父母对这桩婚姻持反对态度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>同意; 赞成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My parents have consented.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父母已经同意了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joe's mother consents to let him live with his girlfriend, but his father doesn't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乔的母亲同意让他和女朋友住在一起, 但父亲却反对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father won't consent to my leaving school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲不会同意让我辍学。</font><br>\n
consequence	<h3>consequence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结果, 后果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody can tell what the consequences may be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人能说出可能的后果。</font><br>重要(性), 重大<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This matter is of great consequence to all of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对于我们来说这件事非常重要。</font><br>\n
consequently	<h3>consequently</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>所以, 因此<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a bright and eager student and, consequently, did well in school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个聪明好学的学生, 因此学习成绩很好。</font><br>\n
conservation	<h3>conservation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保存, 保护, 避免浪费<br>对自然环境的保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is interested in conservation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对保护环境这个问题十分关心。</font><br>\n
conservative	<h3>conservative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保守的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Aunt Mary's a real conservative.She's totally opposed to women going out to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽姑妈是一个极守旧的人, 她根本就反对女人外出工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>保守的, 守旧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professor's a radical in politics but a conservative dresser.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教授在政治上是激进派, 但衣着却很守旧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man is very conservative.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人很守旧。</font><br>(式样等)不时新的, 传统的<br>\n
consider	<h3>consider</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She paused a moment to consider.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她停下来考虑了一会儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll consider your proposal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将考虑你的建议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should consider what to do next.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应考虑下一步该怎么办。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am considering going abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在考虑出国。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…看作, 认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is greatly considered by his colleagues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他深受同事们的尊重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I consider that you are wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为你错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I considered him as a politician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他是个政客。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We consider them to have been foolish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们认为他们的做法是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I consider it useless discussing the matter with them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为和他们讨论这件事没有用。</font><br>关心, 体谅, 顾及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never considers others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从不为别人着想。</font><br>\n
considerable	<h3>considerable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相当大(或多)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a considerable sum of money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一笔数量可观的钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have given the plan considerable attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已经给予这个计划以相当多的注意。</font><br>\n
considerate	<h3>considerate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>体贴的, 体谅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We think that he is the most considerate person we have ever met.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们认为他在我们碰到的人中间是最能体谅人的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always considerate to old people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对老人一向体贴入微。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was very considerate of you to send me a postcard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你想得真周到, 寄给我明信片。</font><br>\n
consideration	<h3>consideration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>体贴, 关心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John never showed any consideration for his mother's feeling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰从来都不体谅他母亲的感情。</font><br>考虑; 要考虑的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall give your request our fullest consideration.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们会认真考虑你的请求。</font><br>报酬, 补偿费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For a small consideration my friend will help you move your belongings to your new house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给少量的报酬, 我的朋友就会帮你把东西搬到你的新居去。</font><br>\n
considering	<h3>considering</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>考虑到, 就…而论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Considering the strength of the opposition, we did very well to score two goals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就对方的实力而论, 我们能进两个球就很不错了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>从各方面考虑, 从通盘考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yes, her speed was quite good, considering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不错, 从各个方面来看, 她的速度相当快。</font><br>\n
consist	<h3>consist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>组成, 构成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The entire world consists of matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个世界都是由物质组成的。</font><br>在于, 存在于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spirit consists in whole-hearted devotion to public interests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种精神就是一心为公。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Health does not consist with intemperance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 健康和饮酒无度是不能并存的。</font><br>\n
consistency	<h3>consistency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一致性, 连贯性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your behaviour lacks consistency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的行为缺乏一贯性。</font><br>坚实度, 浓度, 黏稠度<br>\n
consistent	<h3>consistent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>一贯的, 始终如一的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a consistent girl in her feeling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在感情方面她是个始终如一的女孩。</font><br>一致的, 符合的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His account of what happened was consistent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对于所发生事情的叙述前后一致。</font><br>\n
constant	<h3>constant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>始终如一的, 恒久不变的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In our world nothing seems constant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我们这个世界上似乎没有东西是永恒不变的。</font><br>不断的, 连续发生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In history, change is constant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在历史上, 变化是不断的。</font><br>忠实的, 忠诚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The seeing eye dog was the blind man's constant companion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 导盲犬是盲人的忠实伙伴。</font><br>\n
constitute	<h3>constitute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>构成, 组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve months constitute a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12个月为一年。</font><br>建立, 制定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They constituted an acting committee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们设立了一个临时委员会。</font><br>选定, 任命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company will constitute you captain of the ship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司将任命你担任这艘船的船长。</font><br>\n
constitution	<h3>constitution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宪法, 法规, 章程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp According to the American Constitution, presidential elections are held every four years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 根据美国宪法, 总统选举每四年举行一次。</font><br>体格, 体质, 心理素质<br>构成方式, 构造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The constitution of a primitive society is not necessarily simple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原始社会的结构未必简单。</font><br>制定, 设立, 组成, 任命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was responsible for the constitution of a new committee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他负责组成一个新的委员会。</font><br>\n
construct	<h3>construct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修建, 建立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They constructed the bridge in a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们花一年时间建起了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has constructed a new theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他建立了一种新理论。</font><br>构成, 组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The composition is well constructed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇文章的构思很不错。</font><br>\n
construction	<h3>construction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>建造, 建设; 建筑业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two new hotels under construction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有两家新饭店正在兴建。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He works in construction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在建筑行业工作。</font><br>建造物, 建筑物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building is a peculiarly shaped construction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一栋造形独特的建筑物。</font><br>解释, 意思<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please do not put a wrong construction on her action.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要误解她的行为。</font><br>结构, 句法关系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A learner's dictionary should give both the meanings of words and examples of the constructions in which they are used.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一本学生词典应该既提供词语的含义, 又举出应用这些词语的例子。</font><br>\n
consult	<h3>consult</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>商议, 商量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They consulted long, but could not decide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们磋商了很久, 但是不能做出决定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>请教, 咨询; 找(医生)诊治<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He consulted the workers to understand the technical process.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他询问工人, 想了解技术上的程序。</font><br>翻阅, 查阅<br>顾及, 考虑<br>\n
consultant	<h3>consultant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>顾问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a consultant on law affairs to the mayor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是市长的一个法律顾问。</font><br>高级顾问医生, 会诊医生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There're many consultants in hospital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医院里有很多会诊医生。</font><br>\n
consume	<h3>consume</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>消耗, 消费, 耗尽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Arguing about details consumed many hours of the committee's valuable time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 争论细节问题耗费了委员会数小时宝贵的时间。</font><br>大吃, 大喝<br>烧毁, 毁灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire soon consumed the wooden buildings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大火很快就把那些木制建筑物烧毁了。</font><br>\n
consumer	<h3>consumer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>消费者, 顾客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price increases were passed on by the firm to the consumers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司把上涨的费用转嫁到了顾客身上。</font><br>\n
consumption	<h3>consumption</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>消费, 消耗; 消费[耗]量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food was declared unfit for human consumption.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种食品被宣布不适于人吃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Consumption of oil has declined in recent years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 石油消耗量在最近几年下降了。</font><br>肺病; 结核病<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She died of consumption.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她死于肺结核。</font><br>\n
contact	<h3>contact</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>接触<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My hand came into contact with a small lump.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我摸到一个小肿块。</font><br>联系, 联络, 交往<br>社会关系, 熟人, 门路<br>触点, 接头<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We agreed to contact again as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们同意尽快再次联系。</font><br>\n
contain	<h3>contain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包含; 容纳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whisky contains a large percentage of alcohol.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 威士忌的酒精含量极高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rice contains protein and fat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大米含蛋白质和脂肪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hall can contain two hundred people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大厅可以容纳200人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is contained in this drawer?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这抽屉里装的是什么?</font><br>控制, 抑制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy couldn't contain his urine any longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小孩再也忍不住小便了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cholera outbreak has been contained.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 霍乱的发生已被控制住了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He contained his fear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抑制住自己的恐惧。</font><br>\n
container	<h3>container</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>容器<br>集装箱, 货柜<br>\n
contaminate	<h3>contaminate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…弄脏, 污染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们这些颠覆作乱的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染。</font><br>\n
contemporary	<h3>contemporary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>当代的<br>同时代的, 同属一个时期的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The telephone and the gramophone were contemporary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电话和留声机是同一时代的产物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shakespeare was not contemporary with Dickens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莎士比亚与狄更斯不是同时代的人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>同代人, 同龄人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is a contemporary of mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰与我同龄。</font><br>\n
content	<h3>content</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>所容纳之物, 所含之物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police emptied her bag and examined the contents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察倒出她包中的东西检查。</font><br>(书等的)内容, 目录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In my opinion the movie lacks contents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 依我看, 这部电影缺乏实质性内容。</font><br>容量, 含量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No other food has so high an iron content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有别的食物有这么高的含铁量。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>满足的, 满意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now that she has apologized, I am content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 既然她已经道了歉, 我也就满意了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was content that the thing had happened.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事终于发生, 对此他是满意的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>满足, 满意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cat lay stretched out beside the fire in sleepy content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只猫伸展四肢躺在炉边睡得很满足。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使满足, 使满意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Simple praise is enough to content him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简单的称赞就能使他满足了。</font><br>\n
contented	<h3>contented</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>满意的, 满足的; 知足的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He won't be contented until he's upset everyone in the office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不把办公室里的每个人弄得心烦意乱他就不会满足。</font><br>\n
contest	<h3>contest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>争夺, 竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's contesting the election next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在争取下周当选。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比赛, 竞赛, 竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We entered a fishing contest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们参加了钓鱼比赛。</font><br>搏斗, 争论, 纷争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is man's contest with nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是人与大自然的搏斗。</font><br>\n
contestant	<h3>contestant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>竞争者; 参赛者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two candidates are emerging as contestants for the presidency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两位候选人最终成为总统职位竞争者。</font><br>\n
context	<h3>context</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>背景, 环境<br>上下文, 语境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can always tell the meaning of a word from its context.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你常可以从上下文中猜出词义来。</font><br>\n
continent	<h3>continent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>洲, 大陆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Africa is a continent, but Greenland is not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 非洲是大陆, 而格陵兰不是。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>自制的, 克制的<br>\n
continual	<h3>continual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不间断的, 不停的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am tired of this continual rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不停的下雨使我厌倦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Church Street is continual with High Street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教堂街与高街相连。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is continual that he glanced at Simon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直盯着西蒙看。</font><br>多次重复的, 频繁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has continual arguments with his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他屡次跟他父亲争论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That sort of thing is quite continual.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种事经常有。</font><br>\n
continue	<h3>continue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi. & link v.</i></font><br>继续, 连续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cold wave will continue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 寒潮还要继续。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is to continue as manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要继续当经理。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price of silk continued to be firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 绸缎的价格仍旧稳定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She continued sullen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她依然闷闷不乐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had lunch and then continued his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他午饭后继续工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We continued talking till late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一直谈到很晚的时候。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He continued that it was time for us to go swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他接着说, 我们现在该去游泳了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The team continued him as manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球队继续让他做管理员。</font><br>\n
continuity	<h3>continuity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>连续(性), 持续(性)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no continuity between the three parts of the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书的三个部分之间没有连贯性。</font><br>\n
continuous	<h3>continuous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>连续的, 没有中断的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The brain needs a continuous supply of blood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大脑需要不断供给血液。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must be continuous to study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须不断学习。</font><br>\n
contract	<h3>contract</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>染上(恶习, 疾病等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bad habits are easy to contract.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坏习惯很容易养成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son's contracted a severe fever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的儿子发高烧。</font><br>缩小; 紧缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Metal contracts as it becomes cool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金属冷却时体积缩小。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>缔结; 订契约<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They've contracted an agreement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们缔结了一项协议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have contracted to build a railway across Africa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已立约承建一条穿越非洲的铁路。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>契约, 合同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Once you have reached formal agreement, you should enter into a contract with the other party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一旦达成正式协议, 就应该和对方签订合同。</font><br>\n
contradiction	<h3>contradiction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>矛盾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech contained many contradictions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话矛盾百出。</font><br>否认, 反驳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your attitude is in contradiction to your character.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的态度和你的性格相抵触。</font><br>\n
contrary	<h3>contrary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相反的, 相违的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My sister's taste in dresses is contrary to my own.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在服装方面, 我妹妹的爱好和我完全不同。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相反, 反面, 对立面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They did not say the contrary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没有说意思相反的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is neither tall nor the contrary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不高也不矮。</font><br>\n
contrast	<h3>contrast</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>对比, 对照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The black paint on the door provides a contrast for the white walls.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门上的黑漆与白墙形成对比。</font><br>差异, 差别<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There can be no differentiation without contrast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有比较才有差别。</font><br>对照物, 明显的对比物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today's work is quite a contrast to what you did yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天的工作与你昨天做的工作完全不同。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>对比, 对照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colours in that picture contrast nicely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 颜色在这幅图画里很协调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He contrasted the two different economic systems in his speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在演讲中对比了两种不同的经济制度。</font><br>\n
contribute	<h3>contribute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>捐献, 捐助, 贡献出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I contributed a pound towards Jane's leaving present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我凑了一英镑给简买告别礼物。</font><br>撰稿, 投稿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She regularly contributes to the college magazine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她定期给校刊投稿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>起促成作用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Various factors contributed to his downfall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多种因素导致了他的垮台。</font><br>\n
contribution	<h3>contribution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>捐助物, 贡献<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is Chekhov's contribution to Russian literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是契诃夫对俄罗斯文学的贡献。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All contributions, however small, will be greatly appreciated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有捐献, 不论数量多少, 我们都将非常感谢。</font><br>捐款<br>\n
control	<h3>control</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>控制, 抑制, 支配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried to control me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图支配我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I couldn't control myself, and I hit him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我气得不得了就打了他。</font><br>管理, 操纵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A captain controls his ship and its crew.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船长管理他的船和船上的船员。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>控制, 支配, 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She argued for import control.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她主张实行进口限制。</font><br>管理手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She explained the controls of the washing machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她解释了这台洗衣机的控制系统。</font><br>\n

convenient	<h3>convenient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>方便的, 便利的, 合适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have to find a convenient location for the shelves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得找一合适的地方放这些书架。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I come and talk with you whenever it's convenient?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在你方便时我能来和你谈谈吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is it convenient for you to go out tonight?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚你方便出去吗?</font><br>附近的, 近便的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is useful to have a convenient supermarket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 附近有超市实在方便。</font><br>\n

cook	<h3>cook</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>烹调, 煮, 烧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Meat cooks more slowly than vegetables.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 肉比菜熟得慢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It took me about two hours to cook the meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我花了大约两个小时来煮这些肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother cooked us a good meal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈给我们做了一顿可口的饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please cook a cake for the little boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给这个小男孩做个蛋糕。</font><br>编造; 篡改<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quite capable of cooking the evidence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 编造这个证据足以证明他很有才能。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>做饭的人, 厨师<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother is a terrific cook!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我母亲饭做得好极了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have secured a first class cook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经请到了一位第一流的厨师。</font><br>\n

correspondence	<h3>correspondence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信件, 函件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The library bought all the correspondences between the President and his wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 图书馆购买了总统和他妻子之间的所有通信。</font><br>通信, 通信联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Alexander has kept up a correspondence with his friend for over a year now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 亚历山大跟他的一个朋友保持通信已有一年多了。</font><br>一致, 相似<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many correspondences between the two plays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个剧本有很多相似之处。</font><br>\n
correspondent	<h3>correspondent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>通讯员, 记者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They said foreign correspondents who stayed too long in a place went blind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们说, 驻外记者在一个地方待得太久就变得不能发现新事物了。</font><br>通信者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a good correspondent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个勤于写信的人。</font><br>\n

cost	<h3>cost</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>价格, 成本, 费用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last I bought the film rights of a novel at a moderate cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最终我以适中的价格买下了把小说改编成电影的版权。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scientific books will be sent without cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些科学书籍将免费赠送。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I promise all costs will be readily returned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我保证所有的费用会迅速偿还。</font><br>代价, 损失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must finish the work at all costs before midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论付出什么样的代价, 我们必须在午夜前完成这项工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>价钱为; 花费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sofa really cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那沙发可真值钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The best goods cost much money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好货价钱高。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>付出(代价), 失去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How dear the lesson costs!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个教训的代价真大啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work cost me a lot of time and effort.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本著作花费了我大量的时间和精力。</font><br>估价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Has this project been costed?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项工程估价了吗?</font><br>\n

could	<h3>could</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>(表示允准)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could I use your phone?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我用一下你的电话好吗?</font><br>(表示请求)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could I come round next week?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我下星期来拜访好吗?</font><br>(表示结果)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He studied very hard but couldn't pass his examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他学习很努力, 但没能考及格。</font><br>(表示可能性)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It could be my mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可能是我母亲。</font><br>(表示建议)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We could write a letter to the headmaster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不妨给校长写封信。</font><br>\n

count	<h3>count</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(按顺序)数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can read, write and count.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能读写, 还会计数。</font><br>有价值, 有重要意义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Quality counts above origin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 质量比产地更重要。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>点…的数目, 计算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's count the people who are present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们把到的人数点一下。</font><br>把…算入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are thirty people in the classroom, counting the teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把老师算上, 教室里有30个人。</font><br>认为, 看作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He counted himself a great writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自认为是一个伟大的作家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I count myself to be fortunate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为我自己是幸运的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I count it foolish to let him go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为让他走是不明智的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>计数, 总数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By my count that's five cakes you've had already.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我数着你已经吃了五块蛋糕。</font><br>事项, 罪状<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was found guilty on three counts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被判定三项罪名。</font><br>\n

crack	<h3>crack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使…)开裂, 破裂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But at last the shells cracked, one after another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后, 蛋壳一个接着一个地裂开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can crack this toughened glass, but you can't break it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种韧化玻璃只裂不碎。</font><br>(使)身体上或精神上垮掉<br>打开, 砸开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Father was cracking the nuts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲正在砸开那些坚果。</font><br>(使)发出爆裂声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whip cracked threateningly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鞭子挥得噼啪响得惊人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cracked the joints of his fingers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把手指关节弄得劈啪作响。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>裂缝, 缝隙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a crack in this cup.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个杯子上有个裂缝。</font><br>劈叭声, 爆裂声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He heard the sharp crack of a twig.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听到树枝清脆的断裂声。</font><br>意外的一下重击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I got a nasty crack on the head when I went through that low door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我走过那扇矮门时, 把头给撞了一下。</font><br>试图, 尝试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've never done this before, but I'll have a crack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我以前从未做过这个, 不过我将试试看。</font><br>俏皮话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's always making cracks about my big feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是拿我的一双大脚开玩笑。</font><br>\n

crash	<h3>crash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)猛撞, (使)撞毁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane crashed shortly after takeoff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机起飞后不久便坠毁了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John crashed his car last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰昨晚撞毁了他的汽车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door crashed open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门撞开了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>猛冲直撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The angry elephant crashed through the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愤怒的大象闯过森林。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He crashed the trolley through the doors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他推着手推车乒乒乓乓地过了几道门。</font><br>发出巨响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thunder crashed dramatically.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雷声震耳欲聋。</font><br>突然失败, 倒闭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The New York Stock Exchange crashed in 1929.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 1929年纽约证券交易所倒闭。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>撞车事故, 失事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a serious car crash this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晨发生了一起严重的撞车事故。</font><br>突然发出的巨响, 碰撞声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The desk lamp fell to the floor with a crash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 台灯哗啦一声掉到地上。</font><br>破产, 失败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the most spectacular financial crash of the decade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是10年里最引人注目的金融破产事件。</font><br>\n

crop	<h3>crop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>作物, 庄稼<br>(谷物等的)收获, 收成<br>一群(人), 一批(事物)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>剪短, 修剪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gardener cropped the hedge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 园丁把树篱剪矮了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked the barber to crop her hair short.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她叫理发师把她的头发剪短了。</font><br>播种, 种植<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The land on hilltops and hillsides was all cropped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 山顶和山坡上的地全都种了庄稼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>收成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This plant doesn't crop very heavily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种作物收成不很大。</font><br>\n
cross	<h3>cross</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>十字架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jesus died on the cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 耶稣死在十字架上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They marked the exact place of that hospital with a red cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用一个红十字标出那所医院所在的确切位置。</font><br>十字形饰物<br>画十字的动作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a cross over his head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在他头上画了一个十字。</font><br>杂交品种; 混合物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骡子是雌马和驴的杂交种。</font><br>痛苦, 苦难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all have our cross, I suppose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想我们大家都有苦难。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>穿过, 越过, 渡过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They crossed from England to France.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从英国渡过海峡到法国去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have to cross the railway line by the foot bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不从人行桥上越过铁路线。</font><br>交叉, 相交; 错过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Line A crosses line B at right angles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A线与B线成直角相交。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>反对, 阻挠; 使受挫折<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cross me and you'll regret it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和我作对, 你会后悔的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>坏脾气的, 易怒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cross and hungry children came in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 又气又饿的孩子们走了进来。</font><br>相反的, 反向的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was just a result cross to our purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这恰恰是与我们的目的相反的结果。</font><br>\n
crossing	<h3>crossing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人行横道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White lines mark the crossing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白线标出人行横道。</font><br>十字路口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are traffic lights at each crossing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个十字路口都有红绿灯。</font><br>横渡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a rough crossing from Japan to China.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们顶着险风恶浪从日本横渡到中国。</font><br>\n
crowd	<h3>crowd</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人群<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were large crowds of people in the street on New Year's Eve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除夕那天街上有大批人群。</font><br>听众, 观众<br>一群, 一批; 一堆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A large crowd has gathered on the square.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 广场上聚集了一大群人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>群集, 拥挤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't crowd, stand back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要挤上来, 往后退。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like to be crowded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可不喜欢太拥挤。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挤满, 塞满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Swimmers crowded the beaches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海滩上挤满了游泳的人。</font><br>催逼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't crowd me; give me time to think.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要逼我; 给我时间让我想想。</font><br>\n
crown	<h3>crown</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>王冠, 冕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the coronation, the archbishop put a crown on the Queen's head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在加冕典礼上, 大主教把王冠戴在女王头上。</font><br>王权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Crowns and thrones may perish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 王权不会永存。</font><br>\n
crucial	<h3>crucial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>决定性的, 紧要关头的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a crucial decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个极其重要的决定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The success of this experiment is crucial to the project as a whole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次试验的成功是整个工程的关键所在。</font><br>\n
crude	<h3>crude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>天然的, 未加工的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Last night a cargo ship collided with a tanker carrying crude oil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨晚一艘货轮与一艘载着原油的油轮相撞。</font><br>简陋的, 粗糙的, 未加修饰的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cottage wears a very crude appearance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那幢农舍外观颇为简陋。</font><br>粗鲁的, 粗俗的, 粗野的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy is crude enough to stick his tongue to his own sister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩太粗野了, 居然对他妹妹伸舌头。</font><br>\n
cruel	<h3>cruel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>残酷的, 残忍的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cruel boy threw stones at the frogs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个残忍的男孩用石头投掷青蛙。</font><br>使人痛苦的, 让人受难的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fate dealt him a cruel blow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 命运给他以惨痛的打击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The disappointment was cruel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失望是令人痛苦的。</font><br>\n

cry	<h3>cry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>哭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby can cry as soon as he is born.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿生下来就会哭 。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She cried bitterly tears.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她流出了伤心的眼泪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She cried herself blind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把眼睛都哭瞎了。</font><br>喊, 叫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a very sad film, it made me cry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一部很感人的影片, 让我流泪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cried that he had found the key.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声地叫喊找到了钥匙。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>叫卖; 大声报道; 哭着说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peddlers cried their wares in the streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小贩们沿街叫卖货物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>哭, 哭声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel like a good cry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真想痛痛快快地大哭一场。</font><br>叫喊, 叫声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tiger in the cage gave a thrilling cry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 笼子里的老虎发出了令人毛骨悚然的吼声。</font><br>要求; 呼吁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the meeting, the parents were in full cry, demanding further government spending on schools.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会上家长们大声疾呼, 要求政府增拨教育经费。</font><br>\n
crystal	<h3>crystal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水晶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those fine wine glasses are made of crystal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些漂亮的酒杯是用水晶做的。</font><br>结晶(体)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is snow and ice crystals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是雪和冰的结晶体。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>水晶制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wears a crystal ornament on her chest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的前胸戴了一个水晶饰品。</font><br>水晶般的, 透彻的, 清澈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It used to be a crystal stream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那曾是条清澈见底的小溪。</font><br>清楚的, 明显的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is crystal clear what we must do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们该做什么是很明显的。</font><br>\n

cue	<h3>cue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尾白, 提示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actor missed his cue and came onto the stage late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这演员错过了向他发出的提示, 上场晚了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Follow my cue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 照我的样子做。</font><br>暗示, 暗号, 指示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When she coughs, it's my cue to come onto the stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一咳嗽, 就是给我暗号出场。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>向…发出指示信号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The studio manager will cue you in when it's your turn to sing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轮到你唱的时候, 演播室经理会向你发出暗示的。</font><br>\n

current	<h3>current</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>现在的, 现行的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suggested measures to overcome current difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们提出了克服目前困难的措施。</font><br>通用的, 通行的, 被普遍接受的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This word is no longer in current use.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个字已经不再通用了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水流, 气流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The swimmer was swept away by the current.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个游泳的人被激流卷走了。</font><br>电流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This button switches the current on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个电钮接通电流。</font><br>趋向, 趋势, 倾向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The adventure changed the whole current of his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那场奇遇改变了他人生的方向。</font><br>\n

cut	<h3>cut</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>切, 剪, 割, 削<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A freshly baked cake doesn't cut easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刚烤好的蛋糕不容易切。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cut you a piece of meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我给你切块肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ade cut a slice of bread for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 艾德给我切了块面包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll cut the lawn close.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要把草坪贴地修齐。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>削减<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We mustn't cut the cost of education.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不应该削减教育经费。</font><br>挖成; 刻成<br>使(某人)感到疼痛或痛苦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Words cut more than swords.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 言语比利剑更伤人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What she said cut me terribly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她说的话使我非常难受。</font><br>(直线)与(另一条直线)相交<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The line cuts the circle at two points.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一条直线与圆相交于两点。</font><br>不出席, 不到场<br>灌制(唱片)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>切, 割, 砍; 用刀等割的破口<br>减少, 降低; 删减<br>裁剪样式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like the cut of his new suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢他这套西装的样式。</font><br>伤感情的话或行为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was a cut at me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是中伤我的话。</font><br>\n
