damage	<h3>damage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>损害, 毁坏, 加害于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bone china damages easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骨瓷容易破损。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This cloth damages easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件衣服很容易坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wool usually damages if washed in hot water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毛织物用热水洗一定会受 损。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've damaged my bicycle.You shan't have it again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把我的自行车弄坏了。你别想再用了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hailstones damaged crops and even killed farm animals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰雹毁坏了农作物, 甚至打死了牲畜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fire has damaged the school houses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一场大火毁坏了学校的房子 。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bomb destroyed two buildings and damaged several others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炸弹炸毁了两幢建筑物, 炸坏了另外几幢房屋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Drinking and smoking can damage your health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饮酒和吸烟会损害你的健康。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They shot down or damaged about 10 enemy planes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们击落击伤大约10架敌机。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried to use it to damage our international reputation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他企图利用此事来破坏我们的国际声誉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their failures in this area have damaged their self-confidence and creditability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在这一领域的失败使他们的自信心和可信度受损。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This lock is damaged.This door will never open!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这把锁坏了。门打不开了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many houses were damaged by the earthquake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多房屋在地震中遭到毁坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If men breathed in the fine paint spray, their lungs would be damaged.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果人们吸入这种细微的漆雾, 他们的肺部就会受到损伤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her heart was slightly damaged as a result of her long illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 久病使她的心脏受到一些损伤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police acknowledged that three police vehicles were damaged.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方承认有三辆警车被毁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His political reputation was damaged due to his illegal marriage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的政治名誉由于他的非法婚姻而受到诋毁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>损失, 损害, 损毁<br>损害赔偿金<br>\n
damn	<h3>damn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel a damn sight better than I did yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我感觉比昨天好多了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He would know damn well better on time tonight or I am leaving without him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应该明白今晚得准时来, 否则我就自个走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't lie to me.You know damn well what was happening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别瞒我了, 你压根就很清楚发生了什么事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I knew damn well what he was going to say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常清楚他要说什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll damn well do as you're told!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 告诉你做什么你他妈的就做什么！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She works damn hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她工作得真够努力的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>该死的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where's that damn book?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那本该死的书在哪儿?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>罚…入地狱受罪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damn you!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该死的！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damn this useless typewriter!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台破打字机真该死！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Should all criminals be damned?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的罪犯都该咒骂吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had rather be damned with Plato than saved with those who anathematized him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他宁可让自己的灵魂与柏拉图一道被罚入地狱, 也不愿和谴责他的人们一起升入天国。</font><br>严厉批评<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play was damned by the reviewers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部戏被评论家们批评得一无是处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The department's review damned the whole system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该部门的评述严厉批评了整个系统。</font><br>使彻底失败, 毁掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She damned herself with one stupid remark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被自己的一句蠢话毁了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一点点, 丝毫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't care a damn what he does.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他干什么我一点儿也不在乎。</font><br>\n
damp	<h3>damp</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>潮湿的, 不完全干燥的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like a damp weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢潮湿的天气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The damp air makes my old bones hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 潮湿的空气伤着了我的这把老骨头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The statue was erected in a damp grove at Olympia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雕像建造在奥林匹亚潮湿的小树林中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is too much damp here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里太潮湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building was cold and damp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那房子又冷又湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything gets damp on raining days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨天什么东西都变湿了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My clothes are damp from the rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的衣服被雨水打湿了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>潮湿, 湿气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shivered in the damp of the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们因树林里的湿气而打寒颤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary's illness cast a damp over the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽病了, 这使参加聚会的人很扫兴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使潮湿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damp the cloth, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这块布弄湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should damp clothes before ironing them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在熨衣服之前应将衣服打湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She damped her cloth before cleaning the window.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 擦窗之前她先把抹布弄湿。</font><br>减弱, 抑制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My failure last time has not damped my interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上一次的失败没有使我的兴趣减弱。</font><br>使沮丧, 使败兴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing could damp his spirits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何事情都不能使他精神消沉。</font><br>\n
dance	<h3>dance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跳舞, 舞蹈, (伴随着音乐的)舞步<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She did a little dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她跳了一会儿舞。</font><br>某种形式的舞; 伴随跳舞的音乐, 舞曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The band played a slow dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乐队奏起慢步舞曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's dance a dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们跳支舞吧。</font><br>舞蹈艺术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has dedicated her life to the study of the dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一生致力于舞蹈艺术的研究。</font><br>舞会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We enjoyed ourselves at the dance party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在舞会上我们玩得很愉快。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>跳舞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She began to dance as soon as she heard the music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一听到乐曲便跳起舞来。</font><br>手舞足蹈; 摇晃; 跳跃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moon danced on the ripples.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 月亮在涟漪上舞动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His heart danced with happiness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他内心洋溢着幸福感。</font><br>\n
danger	<h3>danger</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>危险, 风险<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In case of danger, raise the electric alarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果有危险, 就拉响电动警报器。</font><br>可能造成损伤、疼痛等的人或物; 危害<br>\n
dangerous	<h3>dangerous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有危险的, 危险的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We argued him out of going on such a dangerous journey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们劝说他别去做如此危险的旅行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Except for the gun, he did not look very dangerous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了那支枪以外, 他看上去并不像危险人物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Being lost in the bush is very dangerous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在丛林中迷了路是很危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire is dangerous to us as it is so near.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火这么近, 对我们很危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man is dangerous to his community.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个人对他的社区是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This sort of punishment is applied only to nonviolent criminals who are not likely to be dangerous to the public.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种惩罚手段只适用于那些对公众不太可能形成危险的非施暴罪犯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river is dangerous to bathe in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那条河里游泳是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge is dangerous to cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过那座桥是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is dangerous to play with fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玩火是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is dangerous to walk on the thin ice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在薄冰上行走是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's dangerous to go too near the edge of the cliff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 靠近悬崖的边缘行走是很不安全的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is dangerous for a girl to go out alone at night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个女孩夜里单独外出是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is dangerous for you to do the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做这种工作是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Well, what more dangerous do you want?”He argues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他嚷道</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “你还要干出什么更危险的事来?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Charles Bright thought it dangerous to lay the cable in these conditions;  and so he shouted to the men to stop the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 查尔斯·布赖特认为在这样的条件下铺设电缆很危险, 所以他叫人们把机器停下来。</font><br>\n
dare	<h3>dare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>敢; 敢做<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't dare to speak to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不敢和她说话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I dare you to jump over the stream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我谅你不敢跳过这条小河。</font><br>向…挑战, 激<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I dared him, but he didn't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我向他挑战, 可是他不敢应战。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>敢, 竟敢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I daren't ask her for a rise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不敢向她要求加薪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know whether he dare try.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道他是否敢试一试。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wanted the money badly, but she daren't ask for it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她急需用钱, 但却不敢要。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dare not mention the subject again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不敢再提起那个话题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're so late I daren't look at my watch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们太迟了, 我连手表都不敢看一眼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I daren't think how much it's going to cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没敢想这得花多少钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dared not show that he was pleased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不敢表示自己觉得高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dare you tell him the news?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你敢告诉他这个消息吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I show him my new blouse but I dared not tell him how much it cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我给他看了我的新衬衫, 但没敢告诉他花了多少钱买的。</font><br>\n
dark	<h3>dark</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>黑暗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was a dark, moonless night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个黑暗的、无月光的夜晚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The night is too dark for us to see.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜间太暗, 我们看不见。</font><br>(颜色)深色的, 暗色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a dark suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是套深色的西装。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colour of this cloth is too dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这布的颜色太深了。</font><br>(皮肤、毛发等)棕黑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her large dark eyes are flashing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那双黑色的大眼睛亮晶晶的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>傍晚, 黄昏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should turn the light on at dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天黑时你应开灯。</font><br>黑暗; 无光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is too much dark in this painting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画颜色太暗。</font><br>\n

dash	<h3>dash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>冲; 猛冲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse dashed onward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那匹马向前直冲。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>猛掷; (使)猛撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't dash stones! It's dangerous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要扔石头, 那样做危险。</font><br>匆匆地写或画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dashed some paint on the paper and called it a tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在纸上涂抹了些颜料, 说这就是一棵树。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猛冲, 飞奔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoners made a dash for freedom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 囚犯逃奔自由。</font><br>短距离赛跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The contestants lined up for the 100-yard dash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 参赛选手列队参加100码短跑。</font><br>少许<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give him a glass of water with a dash of whisky in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给他一杯水, 加少许威士忌。</font><br>破折号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dash is longer than the hyphen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 破折号比连字符稍长点。</font><br>\n

date	<h3>date</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(注明的)日期, 日子, 年份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp March 6 is the date of his death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他死的日期是三月六日。</font><br>时代, 年代<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At that date there were no airplanes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那时还没有飞机。</font><br>约定, 约会<br>约会的对象<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>记载日期于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please date your letters to me in future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以后请在你给我的信上写明日期。</font><br>鉴定…的年代<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't date the pot exactly, but it must be very old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能精确断定这个罐子的年代, 不过时间一定很久远了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>与人约会, 相约<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have been dating for months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们两个人彼此约会已经有好几个月了。</font><br>\n
daughter	<h3>daughter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>女儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ruth was a daughter of Abraham.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 露丝是亚伯拉罕的女儿。</font><br>产物, 后代<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The United States is a daughter of Great Britain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美国发端于大不列颠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp French is a daughter of Latin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法语源于拉丁语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Radon is the daughter of radium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 氡是镭的子体。</font><br>\n
dawn	<h3>dawn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>黎明, 拂晓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dawns here in the mountains are very beautiful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里山区的黎明是很美的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you hear the cock crow at dawn?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黎明时你听到鸡叫了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At dawn we broke through the barbed wire entanglements under the city wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拂晓我们突破了城墙的铁丝网。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They got across the bridge before dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们于破晓前过了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They work from dawn till dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从天亮一直工作到天黑。</font><br>开端, 萌芽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The war was ended and we looked forward to the dawn of much happier days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大战结束了, 我们盼望着更加美好的日子的来临。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>破晓; (天)刚亮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day dawns in the east.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 东方破晓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The morning dawned brightly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拂晓天气晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day was just dawning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天刚亮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day will soon dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天很快就亮了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day was dawning when we set out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们出发时天刚破晓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were waiting for the day to dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在等待天明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Last Sunday dawned a perfect day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上星期日, 一早就是个好天气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm at night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜里暴风雨过后, 拂晓清新而晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the storm at night, the morning dawned clear and fine over the bay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过一夜的暴风雨之后, 海湾的早晨分外晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The next day dawned bright and sunny.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二天一大早阳光灿烂。</font><br>开始出现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The space age dawned in the twentieth century.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太空时代开始于二十世纪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A new age dawned with the invention of the radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着无线电的发明, 一个新时代开始了。</font><br>\n
day	<h3>day</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一天, 一日<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many days are there in a week?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个星期有几天?</font><br>白天, 白昼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The days are getting longer in summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏天白昼变长了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The exhibition will be opened day and evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 展览在白天和晚间开放。</font><br>时期, 时代; 寿命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The life used to be very interesting in my school days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我学生时代, 生活非常有趣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In my days things were different.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我那个时代, 情况又不同了。</font><br>\n
daylight	<h3>daylight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日光, 白昼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll keep on driving while there's still daylight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 趁着天亮, 我们继续往前开车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To get there on time we must leave before daylight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了准时到那里, 我们必须在天亮之前离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is easier to read by daylight than by lamplight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在日光下读书比在灯光下读书舒适。</font><br>\n
dead	<h3>dead</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>死去的, 已故的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary threw away the dead flowers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽把枯萎的花扔掉了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is dead of a disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby was born dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿生下时就已死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bullet struck him dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一颗子弹把他击毙了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been now dead for many years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已死去多年。</font><br>无感觉的; 麻木的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's so cold outside that my fingers feel dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外面很冷, 我的手指都冻僵了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地, 绝对地, 彻底地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're not coming with us, so drop dead!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不和我们一起来, 去你的！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was dead tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他疲倦极了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was dead asleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他完全睡着了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm dead sure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我绝对肯定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are dead right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你完全正确。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was dead drunk yesterday evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨晚我烂醉如泥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know how Ann stands for her husband's behaviour;  he comes home dead drunk nearly every night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道安是怎么忍受她丈夫的行为的, 他几乎每天晚上回家时都烂醉如泥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm dead keen on Chinese paintings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常喜欢中国画。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stranger was dead ahead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那陌生人就在前面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Close the door, please.The wind is blowing dead against me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请关上门, 风正对着我吹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man is dead against me for some reason or the other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人以各种理由死命反对我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Someone is dead against your plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人拼命反对你的计划。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His shot was dead on target.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他射得正中目标。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp God, it's dead on eight.I'm only just in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天哪, 正好8点, 我总算及时赶到了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The deputation to see the Prime Minister arrived dead on time and was received at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要求会见首相的代表团准时抵达并立即受到接见。</font><br>\n
deadline	<h3>deadline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最后期限<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Next week is the deadline for sending in your application.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 呈递申请书的截止日期是下星期。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want the report ready for the three o'clock deadline.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望报告最迟在三点之前准备好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're working to a tight deadline.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的工作期限很紧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp April 15 is the deadline for filling individual income-tax returns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 个人所得税申报归档的最后期限是4月15日。</font><br>\n
deadly	<h3>deadly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>致死的, 致命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She suffered from a deadly disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她患了绝症。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shock was deadly to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次打击对他是致命的。</font><br>充满仇恨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has become my deadly enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他成了我不共戴天的敌人。</font><br>极端的, 非常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm in deadly earnest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是非常认真的。</font><br>\n
deaf	<h3>deaf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>聋的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Deaf people can't hear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 聋人听不见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can't hear you—he's deaf.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听不见你说的话——他是聋子。</font><br>不愿听的, 装聋的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was deaf to my advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对我的劝告充耳不闻。</font><br>\n
deal	<h3>deal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分给, 分配<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交易, 协议<br>许多<br>\n
dean	<h3>dean</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(大学的)学院院长, 系主任<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who is the dean of the Foreign Languages Department?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外语系主任是谁?</font><br>\n
dear	<h3>dear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>珍贵的; 珍视的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost everything that was dear to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他所珍惜的一切都失去了。</font><br>价格昂贵的; 昂贵的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fruit is dear at this time of year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一年中这个时候水果是很贵的。</font><br>亲爱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is my dearest friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我最亲爱的朋友。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>亲爱的人, 可爱的人<br>\n
death	<h3>death</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>死, 死亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Car accidents have caused many deaths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 车祸造成了许多人死亡。</font><br>毁灭, 消失, 终止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bankruptcy was the death of his plans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 破产毁了他的计划。</font><br>\n
debate	<h3>debate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>讨论, 辩论<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>辩论, 争论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They debated for over an hour on the merits of the different systems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们就几种不同体制的优点辩论了一个多小时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're just debating what to do next.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正在讨论下一步该做什么事。</font><br>\n
debt	<h3>debt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>债, 债务, 欠他人的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If I pay all my debts I'll have no money left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 若还清所有欠债我就分文不剩了。</font><br>\n
decade	<h3>decade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>十年, 十年间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prices have risen steadily during the past decade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过去的十年间, 物价一直在上涨。</font><br>\n
decay	<h3>decay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)腐烂, 腐朽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The vegetables have begun to decay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些蔬菜已开始腐烂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sugar can decay the teeth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 糖能腐蚀牙齿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>衰败, 衰退, 衰落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our powers decay in old age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的体力在老年时就衰退。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>腐败、衰退的状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is in decay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这栋房子已经坏了。</font><br>\n
deceive	<h3>deceive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>欺骗; 蒙骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deceived his friends about his income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在自己的收入问题上欺骗了朋友。</font><br>\n
December	<h3>December</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>12月<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was born in December.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是在12月出生的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The December weather favoured our voyage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12月的天气使我们的航行顺利。</font><br>\n
decent	<h3>decent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>正派的, 合乎礼仪的, 得体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't have a decent dress for the dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有参加舞会的合适的衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those tight trousers of yours aren't very decent!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你那条紧身裤真不雅观！</font><br>像样的, 过得去的, 体面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not decent to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样做是有失体统的。</font><br>令人满意的, 相当好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He earns a decent wage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挣一份很不错的工资。</font><br>\n
deception	<h3>deception</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>欺骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This made Tom sadder than his deception.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这比受骗更令汤姆难受。</font><br>骗术, 诡计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody saw through Mary's deceptions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无人看透玛丽的诡计。</font><br>\n
decide	<h3>decide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>下决心; (使)决定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are the one to decide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该由你来决定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must decide that ourselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这得由我们自己决定。</font><br>解决, 裁决, 肯定, 断定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He decided that she couldn't pass the examination this time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他断定这次考试她不会及格。</font><br>\n
decision	<h3>decision</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>决定, 决心, 判断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several unpopular decisions diminished the governor's popularity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几项不得人心的决定使州长的声望下降。</font><br>果断, 坚决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The voice firmed with decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嗓音变得果断坚定。</font><br>决议, 结果<br>\n
deck	<h3>deck</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>a floor built across a ship over all or part of its length 甲板, 层面<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装饰某人或某物<br>\n
declaration	<h3>declaration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宣布, 宣告, 声明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We read the declaration posted on the bulletin board.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们读了贴在布告板上的声明。</font><br>申报(单)<br>\n
declare	<h3>declare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>宣布, 宣告; 声明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He declared that the meeting has been postponed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他宣布会议已延期了。</font><br>断言, 宣称<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He declared (that) he was right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他力陈他是对的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>申报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He should declare at customs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应该报关。</font><br>\n
decline	<h3>decline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>下降, 减少, 衰退<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been a sharp decline in profits this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年的利润大幅度下降。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>辞谢; 谢绝(邀请等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We asked her to come to our party, but she declined.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们请她来参加我们的晚会, 但是她谢绝了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy declined to answer a question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩拒绝回答问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(太阳)落下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun is declining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳在落山。</font><br>\n
decorate	<h3>decorate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother likes to decorate rooms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妈妈非常喜欢装饰房间。</font><br>授予(某人)勋章<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Queen decorated the soldier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女王授予士兵勋章。</font><br>\n
decoration	<h3>decoration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>装饰, 装潢<br>装饰品<br>奖章, 勋章<br>\n
decrease	<h3>decrease</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)缩短; 减小, 减少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The traffic accidents in the city decreased last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该城市去年交通事故减少了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The population began to decrease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人口开始减少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Interest in the sport is decreasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们对此项运动的兴趣已逐渐减退。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They decreased the size of the group from 25 to 15.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把小组的人数从25人减少到15人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>减小, 降低<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been some decrease in imports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 进口货物有所减少。</font><br>减少(量)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The decrease in sales was almost 20 percent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 销售量差不多减少了20％。</font><br>\n
deduct	<h3>deduct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>扣除, 减去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My employer deducted ten pounds from my wages this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的雇主从我本周的工钱中扣除了十英镑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cost of the breakages will be deducted from your pay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 损坏东西的费用将从你的工资中扣除。</font><br>\n
deed	<h3>deed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>行为, 行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Deeds are better than words when people are in need of help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当别人需要帮助时, 行动胜于语言。</font><br>〈律〉契约, 证书<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the deed to John's plantation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是约翰农场的契约。</font><br>\n
deep	<h3>deep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>深的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river is not deep;  we can walk through it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这河不深, 我们可以涉水过去。</font><br>位于深处的, 纵深的<br>深色的, 浓重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea was deep blue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大海是深蓝色的。</font><br>声音低沉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't you love his deep, rich voice?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你难道不喜欢他低沉、浑厚的嗓音吗?</font><br>强烈的, 极度的, 深厚的<br>严重的, 深厚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company is in deep trouble again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司再度陷入严重的困境。</font><br>理解深刻的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is deep in translation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在翻译方面有很深的造诣。</font><br>深奥的, 神秘的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Philosophy is too deep for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哲学对我来说太深奥了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>深入地, 深深地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Still waters run deep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 静水流深。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walked deep into the woods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他走到树林的深处。</font><br>到很晚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We talked deep into the night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们谈至深夜。</font><br>\n
deer	<h3>deer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鹿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Deer are herbivorous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鹿是食草动物。</font><br>\n
defeat	<h3>defeat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>击败, 战胜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our football team defeated theirs this time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一次我们的足球队胜了他们的足球队。</font><br>挫败, 使落空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've defeated moves to build another office block.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已否决另建一座办公大楼的动议。</font><br>使困惑, 难住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This kind of problems always defeats me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我总是无法应付这类问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>战胜, 挫败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was regarded as an Iranian defeat of Iraq.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们认为那是伊朗挫败了伊拉克。</font><br>战败, 失败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had two defeats this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年我们失败过两次。</font><br>\n
defect	<h3>defect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺点, 过失, 瑕疵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must correct our defects as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须尽快纠正我们的缺点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>变节, 叛变, 脱离<br>\n
defence	<h3>defence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>防御, 保卫, 保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Leagues are commonly made for mutual defence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 结成联盟往往是为了共同防御。</font><br>防御工事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The defences of the city are strong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市的防御工事很稳固。</font><br>辩护, 答辩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lawyer produced a clever defence of his client.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 律师机智地为委托人辩护。</font><br>\n
defend	<h3>defend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>保卫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They defended very well in the game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那场比赛中他们防守得很好。</font><br>辩护; 辩解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She defended herself successfully in court.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在法庭上成功地为自己进行了辩护。</font><br>\n
defense	<h3>defense</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(D-)(美国)国防部,防卫,防卫物<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>谋划抵御<br>\n
defensive	<h3>defensive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>防御用的; 防守的; 守势的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>守势; 防守<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy troops are put on the defensive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌军被迫采取守势。</font><br>\n
deficiency	<h3>deficiency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺乏, 不足, 短缺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The deficiencies in the system soon became obvious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种制度的缺陷不久就变得很明显。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cosmetics do not always cover up the deficiencies of nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 化妆品未能掩饰天生的缺陷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the war children suffered from a deficiency of food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争期间孩子们遭受缺乏食物之苦。</font><br>\n
deficit	<h3>deficit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>不足额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We raised ￡100, and we need ￡200; that's a deficit of ￡100.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们筹措了100英镑, 而我们需要200英镑, 还缺100英镑。</font><br>赤字, 亏空, 亏损<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The directors have reported a deficit of 2.5 million dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 董事们报告赤字为250万美元。</font><br>\n
define	<h3>define</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>精确地解释; 界定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please define the words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请准确地解释这些字的意义。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They defined him as a rogue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们确定他为骗子。</font><br>规定, 确定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please listen while I define your duties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我规定你的职责时, 请仔细听好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The powers of a judge are defined by law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官的权限是由法律规定的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's hard to define exactly what has changed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很难解释清楚到底发生了什么变化。</font><br>\n
definite	<h3>definite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>明确的, 确切的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We demand a definite answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要求明确的答案。</font><br>一定的, 肯定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor is quite definite about Tom having measles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生十分肯定汤姆得了麻疹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's definite that he will come to help us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他肯定会来帮助我们。</font><br>\n
definitely	<h3>definitely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>明确地, 确切地<br>一定地, 肯定地<br>\n
definition	<h3>definition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>定义, 释义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I made a definition for this word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我给这个字下了定义。</font><br>清晰(度), 鲜明(度)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They concentrated on better definition of the optical image.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们致力于提高该光学影像的清晰度。</font><br>清楚的说明; 轮廓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book attempts a definition of his role in world politics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该书要阐明的是他在世界政局中的作用。</font><br>\n
defy	<h3>defy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>公然反抗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He defied his opponents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他公然反抗他的对手们。</font><br>不服从; 不尊重<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you defy the law, you may find yourself in prison.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你不服从法律, 你就可能会坐牢。</font><br>有无法克服的困难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His strange behaviour defies understanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他古怪的举止使人难以理解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This defies to be explained.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这难以解释。</font><br>\n
degree	<h3>degree</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>度, 度数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's at 10 degrees centigrade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气温是10℃。</font><br>程度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers show various degree of skill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们表现出不同程度的技巧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His art has reached a high degree of excellence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的艺术已达到炉火纯青的地步。</font><br>学位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has attained the degree of Master of Arts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已获得文学硕士学位。</font><br>\n
delay	<h3>delay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>耽搁, 延迟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His delay made the teacher angry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的迟到使老师生气了。</font><br>被耽搁[推迟]的事件或时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My delay in going abroad is due to my illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我推迟出国是因为我生病了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)耽搁, 延误<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is getting late, don't delay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时间已晚, 不要耽搁了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heavy traffic delayed us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 繁忙的交通把我们耽误了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>推迟, 使延期<br>\n
delegate	<h3>delegate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>代表, 代表团成员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is one of the delegates to the conference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是与会代表之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>任命或委派…为代表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He delegated me to perform a task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他委派我去执行一项任务。</font><br>托付<br>\n
delegation	<h3>delegation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>代表团<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp China sent a large delegation to the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 中国派了个很大的代表团参加会议。</font><br>\n
delete	<h3>delete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>删除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The patient's high fever deleted most of his memories.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人的高烧使他的记忆丧失殆尽。</font><br>\n
deliberate	<h3>deliberate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>故意的, 蓄意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told us a deliberate lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他故意跟我们撒谎。</font><br>慎重的, 深思熟虑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did it in a deliberate manner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以慎重的态度来做这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was deliberate in his speech and action.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他谨言慎行。</font><br>不慌不忙的, 从容不迫的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man stood up in a very deliberate way and left the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人不慌不忙地站了起来, 然后离开了房间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>仔细考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be deliberating again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别再考虑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should deliberate what to do tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该考虑一下明天做什么。</font><br>研讨, 商讨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were still deliberating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们仍在商讨。</font><br>\n
delicate	<h3>delicate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>娇弱的, 纤细的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her health is delicate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的身体很虚弱。</font><br>易碎的, 脆弱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be careful with those wine cups—they are very delicate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当心那些酒杯——它们很容易碎。</font><br>微妙的, 有技巧的, 得当的<br>精美的, 雅致的<br>\n
delicious	<h3>delicious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>美味的, 可口的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This dish is very delicious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这道菜味道鲜美。</font><br>令人开心的, 怡人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a delicious joke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个令人开心的笑话。</font><br>(人际关系中的)技巧和谨慎; 敏感<br>\n
delight	<h3>delight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>快乐, 高兴<br>使人高兴的东西或人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your new book is a real delight!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的新书真讨人喜欢！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a delight for her to watch her daughter dance in the show.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对她来说, 观看女儿在节目中表演舞蹈是件乐事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使高兴, 使欣喜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your visit last week delighted us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你上星期的来访使我们很高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It delights me to have made your acquaintance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很高兴与你相识。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everybody was delighted to see her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家见到她都很高兴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>感到高兴[快乐]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her playing of Chopin delighted the guests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她演奏肖邦的乐曲使宾客们感到愉快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He delights to talk about his family in the office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢在办公室谈论他家里的事。</font><br>\n
delightful	<h3>delightful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>令人非常高兴的, 讨人喜欢的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a delightful party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一次愉快的聚会。</font><br>\n
deliver	<h3>deliver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>递送, 交付<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The telegram was delivered early this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份电报是今天清晨送到的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The postman delivers letters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 邮递员投递信件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He delivered them the goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给他们送来了一些货物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>发言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr. Smith delivered the opening speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯先生致开幕词。</font><br>助产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The midwife delivered her sister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位助产护士给她妹妹接生。</font><br>发动, 提出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy is going to deliver an attack during the dry season.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人准备在旱季发动攻势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I delivered a verbal protest against their brutal acts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对他们的暴行提出口头抗议。</font><br>\n
delivery	<h3>delivery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>投递, 送交<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll charge myself with the safe delivery of the secret information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我来负责安全递送这个秘密情报。</font><br>投递的邮件, 发送的货物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The strike caused a great delay in the delivery of the mail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次罢工严重地延误了邮件的投递。</font><br>分娩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mother had an easy delivery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲顺利生产。</font><br>讲话方式, 演讲风格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had to give a slow delivery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不得不慢慢地说。</font><br>\n
demand	<h3>demand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>要求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She demanded a room all to herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她要求自己一个人住一个房间。</font><br>需要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rocket at this speed demands great power.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种速度的火箭需要很大的动力。</font><br>想要知道, 查问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gate-keeper demanded my business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看门人问我有什么事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They demanded whether I could go with them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们问我能不能和他们一起去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>要求, 所需求之物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They rejected the union demand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拒绝了工会的要求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is our demand that she should go there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她到那里去是我们的要求。</font><br>需求, 需要<br>\n
demanding	<h3>demanding</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>很费心的, 很费力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This job is very demanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项工作很费力。</font><br>\n
democracy	<h3>democracy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>民主, 民主制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did democracy have its beginnings in Athens?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 民主制度是创始于雅典吗?</font><br>民主国家<br>\n
democratic	<h3>democratic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>民主的, 有民主精神或作风的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He heroically defended democratic principles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他勇敢地捍卫民主原则。</font><br>\n
demonstrate	<h3>demonstrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>举行示威游行(或集会)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Large crowd demonstrated outside the British Embassy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很多群众在英国大使馆外面示威。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>说明, 演示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Recent events demonstrate the need of change in policy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近的事态表明政策需要改变。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This demonstrates that all power belongs to the people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这说明一切权力属于人民。</font><br>论证, 证明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All of those demonstrated the correctness of his analysis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一切都证明了他分析的正确性。</font><br>显示, 表露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fireman demonstrated great courage in saving the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位消防队员在抢救孩子的过程中, 表现了极大的勇气。</font><br>\n
denial	<h3>denial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>否认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspaper printed a denial of the untrue story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报社刊登了否认不实消息的声明。</font><br>拒绝, 拒绝给予<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her denial of my advice hurts me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拒绝我的忠告伤害了我。</font><br>\n
dense	<h3>dense</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>密集的, 稠密的, 浓密的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We entered a dense forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们进入一片浓密的森林。</font><br>密度大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some dense substances allow electricity to flow through them freely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些密度大的物质容易让电流通过。</font><br>愚笨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is so dense, he'll never understand your message.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很笨, 绝不会理解你的意思。</font><br>\n
density	<h3>density</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>密集, 稠密<br>〈物〉〈化〉密度<br>\n
dental	<h3>dental</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>牙齿的; 牙科的<br>\n
dentist	<h3>dentist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>牙科医生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have got toothache, so I must go to a dentist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我牙疼, 必须去看牙医。</font><br>\n
deny	<h3>deny</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>否认知情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He denied the signature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他否认这是他的签名。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He denied knowing anything about their plans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他否认知悉他们的计划。</font><br>拒绝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He denied the money to his son.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拒绝给儿子钱。</font><br>\n
depart	<h3>depart</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>离开; 出发; 开出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He departed early in the morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一大早就离开了。</font><br>\n
department	<h3>department</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>部, 部门, 系<br>\n
departure	<h3>departure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>离开, 离去<br>\n
depend	<h3>depend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>依靠, 依赖<br>信赖, 相信<br>决定于, 视…而定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It all depends.I have certain doubts about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这很难说, 得看情况。</font><br>\n
dependence	<h3>dependence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>依赖, 依靠<br>信任, 信赖<br>对药物(尤指毒品)之依赖; 毒瘾<br>\n
dependent	<h3>dependent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>依靠的, 依赖的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a mother completely dependent on him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一个完全靠他赡养的母亲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country is dependent on foreign aid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家靠外援生存。</font><br>取决于…的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is largely dependent on the weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这多半取决于天气情况。</font><br>\n
depict	<h3>depict</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>描绘; 描画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The artist depicted him strolling through a garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 画家描绘了他在花园漫步的情景。</font><br>描述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They depicted the thrilling situation to us in great detail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们向我们详细地描述了那激动人心的场面。</font><br>\n
deposit	<h3>deposit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>放置; 放下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deposited the books on the desk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把书放在桌子上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Deposit the sand here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把沙子放在这儿。</font><br>存放; 交与…保管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's deposited quite a lot of money recently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他最近存了不少钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She deposited her money in the bank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把钱存在银行里。</font><br>付订金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deposited a small amount of money toward the purchase of the car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为买这辆汽车先付了少量订金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>矿床, 矿藏; 沉淀物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are rich deposits of gold in those hills.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些丘陵里埋藏着丰富的金矿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is too much deposit in a bottle of wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酒瓶里有太多的沉淀物。</font><br>储蓄, 存款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to make a deposit please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想存款, 请给我办理一下。</font><br>订金; 押金, 保证金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel requires a deposit for all advance bookings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅馆规定凡预订房间都要先付订金。</font><br>\n
depress	<h3>depress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>压下; 推下; 拉下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl depressed the button.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小女孩按下按钮。</font><br>使愁苦; 使沮丧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mother was depressed by the sad news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个坏消息使他的母亲意志消沉。</font><br>使跌价; 使萧条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A rise in oil prices depresses the car market.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 石油价格的上涨使汽车市场不景气。</font><br>\n
depression	<h3>depression</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>忧伤, 消沉, 沮丧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suffers from acute depression.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他患有严重的忧郁症。</font><br>经济大萧条, 不景气时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Business depression usually causes misery among the working class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 商业不景气常使工薪阶层受苦。</font><br>凹陷, 洼地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain collected in several depressions on the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地面上好几处凹陷的地方都积了雨水。</font><br>低气压(地区)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A depression over the Atlantic usually brings bad weather in Britain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大西洋上空的低气压通常给英国带来恶劣的天气。</font><br>\n
depth	<h3>depth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>深, 深度, 纵深<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the depth of this lake?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个湖有多深?</font><br>深厚, 深切, 深刻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have expressed the depth of my gratitude to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我向他表示了深切的谢意。</font><br>深处, 深渊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man disappeared into the depths of the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老人消失在住宅深处。</font><br>\n
deputy	<h3>deputy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>副手, 代理人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John will act as a deputy for me during my absence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我离开期间, 约翰将代理我的职务。</font><br>\n
derive	<h3>derive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>得到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He derives his income from freelance work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以自由职业获取收入。</font><br>源于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He derived his enthusiasm for literature from his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对文学的爱好是受他父亲的影响。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many English words are derived from Latin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多英语词汇源于拉丁文。</font><br>\n
descend	<h3>descend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>下来, 下去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Darkness descended too soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜色过早降临。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They descended the slope towards the hamlet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们顺坡下山, 向那个村子走去。</font><br>\n
describe	<h3>describe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>描写, 叙述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you describe your son?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能描述一下你儿子吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She described in detail their resisting the invaders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她详细叙述了他们抵抗侵略者的事迹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who'd like to describe what happened just now?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁来描述一下刚才所发生的情形?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you describe it to me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能把它描述给我听吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I should describe the attempt as a failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为这次尝试失败了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hesitate to describe him as really clever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不愿说他真的聪明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His employer had described him as lacking in initiative and drive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雇主说他缺乏进取心和干劲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They described me to be a mysterious person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把我描绘成一个神秘的人。</font><br>画出(图形等)<br>\n
description	<h3>description</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>描述, 形容<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you give me a description of the thief?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能给我描述一下那个窃贼的模样吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A comprehensive description is one that is full and complete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一篇详尽的描写就是一篇充实完整的描写。</font><br>种类, 类型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The show featured dogs of every description.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 展览会中展示了各式各样的狗。</font><br>\n
desert	<h3>desert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>沙漠, 不毛之地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vast areas of land have become desert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大片的土地已变成沙漠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Few kinds of plants grow in the desert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几乎没有植物在沙漠上生长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>舍弃, 遗弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Never desert a friend in need.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 决不要抛弃有困难的朋友。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开小差, 逃亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many soldiers deserted during the battle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那次战斗中许多士兵开小差了。</font><br>\n
deserve	<h3>deserve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>应受, 应得, 值得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deserves a reward for his efforts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他积极努力, 值得奖赏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deserved to be punished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应受惩罚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy richly deserves whipping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子活该挨鞭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't really deserve (that) she should be so kind to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他确实不值得她对他那么好。</font><br>\n
design	<h3>design</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>设计, 绘制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has designed all the scenes and costumes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他设计了所有的布景和服装。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>计划, 筹划<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He designs to become a musician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他立志成为一个音乐家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I designed going abroad two years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两年前我曾计划要出国。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>图样, 设计图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This piece of cloth has a new design.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块布图案新颖。</font><br>设计, 布局<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The success of this car shows the importance of good design in helping to sell the product.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种汽车的成功显示精良的设计对打开销路的重要性。</font><br>目的, 打算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His evil designs were frustrated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的邪恶企图未能得逞。</font><br>\n
desirable	<h3>desirable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可取的, 值得拥有的, 合意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My desire for a desirable house will come true in the near future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要买一幢称心如意的房子的愿望在不久的将来会实现。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some reasonable adjustments seem desirable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 某些合理的调整似乎是可取的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For this job it is desirable to know something about medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做这项工作最好能懂点医学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is most desirable that they should both come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们俩都来, 这是最好不过了。</font><br>\n
desire	<h3>desire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>希望, 渴望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all desire happiness and health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都想得到幸福和健康。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They greatly desired to come to China.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们非常想到中国来。</font><br>要求, 请求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers desire better working conditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们要求更好的工作条件。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>愿望, 欲望, 心愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Failure only intensified my desire to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失败反而使我增强了获得成功的欲望。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a desire of climbing mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她想去爬山。</font><br>\n
desk	<h3>desk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>书桌, 办公桌, 写字台<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These desks and seats can be adjusted to the height of any child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些桌椅可以随儿童的身高而调整。</font><br>\n
desktop	<h3>desktop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>桌面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My computer is a desktop computer of excellent quality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的计算机是品质卓越的台式计算机。</font><br>\n
despair	<h3>despair</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>绝望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Defeat after defeat filled us with despair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一次又一次的失败使我们完全绝望了。</font><br>使人绝望的人(或事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy is the despair of his teachers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩使老师们感到无可救药。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>绝望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't despair; things will get better soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不必绝望, 事情不久就会好起来。</font><br>\n
desperate	<h3>desperate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不顾一切的, 拼命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a desperate criminal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个亡命之徒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoners grew more desperate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 囚犯们在绝望中更加不顾死活了。</font><br>铤而走险的, 孤注一掷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They made a desperate attempt to save the company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为挽救公司作孤注一掷的努力。</font><br>极想望的, 极需要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's desperate for money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他极渴望得到钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They're desperate to escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们急于想逃跑。</font><br>危急的, 极严重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city is suffering a desperate shortage of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市严重缺水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The state of that country is desperate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国家的形势非常危急。</font><br>\n
despite	<h3>despite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>不管, 尽管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Despite the fact that she is short, she is an excellent basketball player.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管她个子矮, 却是个出色的篮球运动员。</font><br>\n
dessert	<h3>dessert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(餐后)甜食, 甜点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had ice cream for dessert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们餐后吃的甜点是冰淇淋。</font><br>\n
destination	<h3>destination</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>目的地, 终点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I eventually arrived at my destination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我终于到达了目的地。</font><br>\n
destroy	<h3>destroy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>破坏, 毁灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It seems he's destroying himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他似乎正在毁灭自己。</font><br>消灭, 杀死<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The injured dog had to be destroyed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只受伤的狗要予以人道毁灭。</font><br>\n
destruction	<h3>destruction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>破坏, 毁灭, 消灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy bombs caused widespread destruction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人的炸弹造成大面积的破坏。</font><br>\n
destructive	<h3>destructive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>破坏性的, 毁灭性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is the most destructive storm in 20 years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是20年来破坏性最大的一次风暴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the end, it will be destructive of our whole society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它最终会毁灭我们整个社会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those anticancer drugs are effective, but also destructive to white blood cells.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些抗癌药是有效的, 但也破坏白细胞。</font><br>\n
detail	<h3>detail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>细目, 细节; 小事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you're interested in the job, I'll send you all the details.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你对这工作感兴趣, 我将寄给你全部的说明。</font><br>各种细节, 详情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a good eye for detail and notices almost everything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他明察秋毫, 几乎一切事情都注意到了。</font><br>\n
