determination	<h3>determination</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>决心; 决定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Firm determination moves mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坚定的决心可以移山。</font><br>确定, 测定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is responsible for the determination of wage levels within this company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她负责确定这家公司职员的工资标准。</font><br>\n
determine	<h3>determine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)下决心, (使)做出决定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't determined yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我还没有决定呢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The board determined company policy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 董事会决定公司的方针。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has determined to give up smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已决定戒烟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have they determined when to start?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决定什么时候动身了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news that he was in trouble determined me to act at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他陷入困境的消息使我决心立即行动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>确定, 测定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We both looked up to determine the source of the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们俩都向上看, 以便确定水从何处流下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shall we determine what we are going to do next?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么吧?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I determine him to be a fool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我确定他是一个傻子。</font><br>限定; 制定; 支配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Economic factors determine the progress which a society can make.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经济因素是社会进步的决定因素。</font><br>\n
develop	<h3>develop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>开发, 发展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This has made it necessary for agriculture and industry to develop very quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就使得工农业必须飞速发展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must do our best to develop the national economy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须努力发展国民经济。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are developing nuclear weapons to do away with such weapons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们发展核武器是为了消灭核武器。</font><br>(使)成长, (使)发育, (使)发达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A child develops rapidly between the ages of 13 and 16.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子在13到16岁之间发育得很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Warm rains and summer suns develop the plants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和暖的雨水和夏日的阳光促进植物生长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(照相)冲洗, 显影<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you develop this film for us?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能代我们冲洗这个胶卷吗?</font><br>\n
development	<h3>development</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发展, 生长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tribe's development was more primitive than that of their neighbours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个部落处于比邻近部落更原始的发展阶段。</font><br>新阶段, 新事态; 新产品, 新发明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This new rose is a development from a very old kind of rose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一玫瑰新品种是由一种很老的品种培育而成的。</font><br>新开发地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How is the economic development zone going on?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在经济开发区怎样了?</font><br>\n
device	<h3>device</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>装置, 设备, 器具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A computer is a device for processing information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电脑是用来处理信息的。</font><br>手段, 策略<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her illness is merely a device to avoid seeing him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她所谓生病只不过是避免见他的花招而已。</font><br>\n
devil	<h3>devil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>魔鬼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Devil tempted Adam and Eve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 魔鬼诱惑了亚当和夏娃。</font><br>家伙, 人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The poor devils have been stuck at the airport for three days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些可怜的家伙被困在机场已经三天了。</font><br>\n
devise	<h3>devise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>想出; 计划; 设计; 发明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has devised a scheme for making money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想出一个赚钱的办法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is devising how to do that thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正计划如何进行那件事情。</font><br>\n
devote	<h3>devote</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…奉献(给), 把…专用(于)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should devote everything we have.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该奉献我们的一切。</font><br>\n
diagnose	<h3>diagnose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>诊断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He diagnosed the trouble that caused the engine to knock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他找出了引擎咔咔响的毛病所在。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor diagnosed my illness as a rare skin disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生诊断我的病为罕见的皮肤病。</font><br>\n
diagram	<h3>diagram</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>图解, 简图, 图表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The engineer drew a diagram of the bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工程师绘制了一幅这座桥的示意图。</font><br>\n
dial	<h3>dial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钟(表)面; 标度盘; 拨号盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My watch has a luminous dial so I can see it in the dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的表有个发光的针盘, 因此在暗处可以看见时间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打电话, 拨电话号码<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you often dial home?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你常给家里打电话吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dials his favourite station every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他每天早晨调拨收听他最喜欢的电台。</font><br>\n
dialect	<h3>dialect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方言, 土语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote a play in a local dialect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用当地方言写了一个剧本。</font><br>\n
dialogue	<h3>dialogue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>对话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had long dialogues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们进行了长时间的对话。</font><br>(文学、戏剧、电影等中的)对话, 对白<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two actors carried on a dialogue in the middle of the stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两个演员在舞台中央进行对白。</font><br>意见分歧者之间的意见交换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last there can be a reasonable dialogue between the two governments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两国政府间最终能够进行理智的对话。</font><br>\n
diameter	<h3>diameter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>直径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The circle has a diameter of 6 inches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个圆直径六英寸。</font><br>放大率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This microscope magnifies 40 diameters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台显微镜能放大40倍。</font><br>\n
diamond	<h3>diamond</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>金刚钻, 钻石<br>〈数〉菱形<br>方块牌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got only four diamonds in my hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我手里仅有四张方块牌。</font><br>\n

dictate	<h3>dictate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>大声讲或读; 口授<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cannot write but he can dictate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不会写, 但可以口述。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It took him a long time to dictate this letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 口述这封信花了他很长时间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>指示; 指定; 指令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're now in a position to dictate our own demands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在, 我们有资格提出我们的要求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dictated how everything should be done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他专横地规定各种事物应如何处理。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>命令, 规定, 要求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always follows the dictates of common sense.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是按常识行事。</font><br>\n
dictation	<h3>dictation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>口授, 听写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new secretary takes dictation very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位新秘书善于记录口授。</font><br>听写测验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a dictation every English class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每次上英语课我们都进行听写测验。</font><br>\n
dictionary	<h3>dictionary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>词典, 字典<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better look it up in the dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好查一下词典。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a dictionary of place name.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一本关于地名的词典。</font><br>\n
die	<h3>die</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>死亡; 枯萎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He became very ill and then he died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病得很重, 接着就死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She died a heroic death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她英勇地牺牲了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>死时处于(某种状态)或具有(某种身份)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He died a millionaire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他死时是个百万富翁。</font><br>\n
diet	<h3>diet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日常饮食<br>规定饮食<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)节制饮食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is dieting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在节食。</font><br>\n
differ	<h3>differ</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>不同, 有异<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nylon and silk differ.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尼龙与丝绸不同。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tastes differ.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嗜好各有不同。</font><br>持异议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two brothers differed about politics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这兄弟俩政见不同。</font><br>\n
difference	<h3>difference</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>差别, 差异<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the synthetic fabric is contrasted with the natural one, the difference is very apparent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要是把合成纺织品和天然纺织品对比一下, 它们的差别就很明显了。</font><br>差距, 差额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is both important and necessary to note this difference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 注意到这个差距是重要的和必要的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's an age difference of six years between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们之间相差六岁。</font><br>分歧, 争执<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our differences were at last hammered out in discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的分歧最后通过讨论消除了。</font><br>\n
different	<h3>different</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不同的, 差异的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary and Joan are quite different.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽和琼很不相同。</font><br>个别的, 另外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's take a different way home today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天我们回家走另一条路吧。</font><br>各式各样的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A department store sells many different things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 百货公司出售各种各样的东西。</font><br>\n
difficult	<h3>difficult</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>困难的, 难懂的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things become increasingly difficult.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情变得日益困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is difficult for me to teach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教书对于我是件不容易的事。</font><br>不易相处的, 难满足的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was the most difficult customer the salesman had to deal with that day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是这个售货员那天所遇到的最难应付的一位顾客。</font><br>\n
difficulty	<h3>difficulty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>困难; 难度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has difficulty breathing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她呼吸有困难。</font><br>难事; 麻烦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where's the difficulty?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 困难在哪儿?</font><br>\n
dig	<h3>dig</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>挖, 掘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went from place to place, and dug and weeded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她到处走, 又挖土, 又锄草。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dug a hole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们挖了一个坑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>中意, 了解, 欣赏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I really dig the way she sings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真喜欢她那种唱法。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>戳, 刺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse started galloping the moment I gave it a good dig.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猛戳了马一下, 它就奔驰起来了。</font><br>挖苦, 讽刺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She makes mean little digs at him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她冲他说一些刻薄的挖苦话。</font><br>\n
digest	<h3>digest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>消化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cheese doesn't digest easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乳酪不易消化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I just cannot digest eggs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我吃鸡蛋就不能消化。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>透彻了解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It often takes a long time to digest new ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吸收新思想往往需要很长一段时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should digest what he said.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该仔细体会他说的话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>摘要, 文摘, 汇编<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I read only this digest of the novel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只读过该小说的摘要。</font><br>\n
digital	<h3>digital</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>数字式的, 数码的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a digital watch on the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桌子上有一块数字式手表。</font><br>数字显示的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The digital reading is right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数字显示的读数是正确的。</font><br>\n
dignity	<h3>dignity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>庄严, 端庄, 尊严<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dignity of the occasion was spoilt when she fell down the steps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她跌倒在台阶上, 破坏了该场合的庄严气氛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only a truly free person has human dignity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有真正自由的人才具有人的尊严。</font><br>高尚, 尊贵, 高贵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The real dignity of a man lies in what he is, not in what he has.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人真正的高贵之处在于他是什么样的人, 而不在于他拥有什么。</font><br>\n
dilemma	<h3>dilemma</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>左右为难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was in a dilemma whether to stay at school or get a job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是继续求学还是找工作, 她感到难以决定。</font><br>\n
dim	<h3>dim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>暗淡的, 昏暗的, 不明亮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat in a dim corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坐在一个黑暗的角落里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The light is too dim for me to read easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 光线太暗, 我很难阅读。</font><br>隐约的, 模糊不清的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outline of the mountain in the distance is dim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 远处山脉的轮廓隐隐约约。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people are rather dim about the purposes of their lives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人稀里糊涂, 不知他们生活的目的是什么。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)变暗淡, (使)变模糊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lights in the theatre began to dim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧场的灯光开始暗下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tears dimmed her eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼泪使她的眼睛模糊。</font><br>\n
dimension	<h3>dimension</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尺寸, 度量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Length is one dimension, and breadth is another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长是一种度量, 宽又是另一种度量。</font><br>方面, 部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is another dimension to this problem which you haven't considered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个问题还有你尚未考虑到的另一方面。</font><br>规模, 程度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What are the dimensions of this room?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房间的面积是多大?</font><br>\n
dine	<h3>dine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吃饭, 进餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't talk about business while we are dining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吃饭时别谈公事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>设宴款待, 请客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our school dined the famous scholar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们学校宴请了这位有名的学者。</font><br>\n
dinner	<h3>dinner</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>正餐, 主餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't had dinner yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我还没有吃晚饭呢。</font><br>宴会<br>\n
dip	<h3>dip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>浸, 蘸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dip your pen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将你的钢笔蘸一下。</font><br>洗药水浴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's dip the sheep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们用消毒水洗羊。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)微降, (使)下沉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun dipped below the western sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳慢慢沉入西边的大海里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dip your head under the low arch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在低矮的门拱下要低头。</font><br>(使)向下再向上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sailor dipped the ship's flag as a salute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水手将船上的旗降下来再上去以示致敬。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>洗澡, 泡水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm just going for a dip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只是去泡一会儿水。</font><br>倾斜, 凹陷处; 下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dip increased as we went on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们越往前走, 坡度越大。</font><br>\n
diplomat	<h3>diplomat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外交官<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a U.S. diplomat assigned to the embassy in London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是美国驻伦敦大使馆的一名外交官。</font><br>有手腕的人, 善于交际的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lady is a diplomat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位女士是个善于交际的人。</font><br>\n
diplomatic	<h3>diplomatic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外交上的, 外交人员的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were some mediate contacts between the two countries before their diplomatic relation was established.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在两国外交关系建立之前, 已经有些间接的接触。</font><br>有手腕的, 策略的, 善于交涉的, 圆滑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must be more diplomatic in handling the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在处理这一情况时, 必须圆滑。</font><br>\n
direct	<h3>direct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>直的, 笔直的, 径直的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the most direct road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是最直的一条路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This train is direct, you do not have to change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆火车是直达的, 你不必换车。</font><br>直接的, 直系的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm in direct contact with the hijackers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我与劫机者保持着直接的联系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were the direct descendants of the Dutch settlers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是荷兰移民的直系后裔。</font><br>率直的, 坦率的, 坦白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a direct way of speaking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她说话直爽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very direct, so you always know what his real views are.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为人很直率, 所以你总能知道他的真实想法。</font><br>恰好的, 完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your reply today is in direct contradiction to what you said last week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你今天的答复跟上星期说的恰好相反。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>径直地, 笔直地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road leads direct there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条路直通那儿。</font><br>直接地, 亲自地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher suggested that I write him direct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师建议我直接写信给他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mayor goes direct to the people to listen to their complaints.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市长亲自深入群众倾听他们的怨言。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>指示方向, 指引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sign posts direct travelers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 路标给游客指路。</font><br>在…上写姓名和地址<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parcel was directed to the wrong address.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这邮包被寄错了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>指导, 导演, 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who will direct at the concert?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐会谁来指挥?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thinking directs one's actions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 思想指导行动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general directed that the prisoners should be set free.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将军命令释放囚犯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I directed him to do the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我命令他去做这项工作。</font><br>\n
direction	<h3>direction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方向, 趋向, 趋势, 动向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bullets and cannon-balls were flying in all directions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 子弹和炮弹到处乱飞。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is the present direction of government thinking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是政府考虑问题的趋向。</font><br>方面, 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are making changes in various directions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在进行多方面的改革。</font><br>指南, 指示, 说明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not give any directions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有作任何指示。</font><br>管理, 指导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was entrusted with the direction of the project.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她受委托负责这项计划。</font><br>姓名和地址<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had no trouble finding your house because your directions were definite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们很容易找到你的家, 因为你的地址说得很清楚。</font><br>\n
directly	<h3>directly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>直接地, 径直地, 直爽地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is not directly responsible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有直接责任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She answered me very directly and openly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她非常坦率地、开门见山地答复了我。</font><br>立即, 马上, 很快地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll be there directly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我马上到那儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>一…就…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will telephone you directly I hear the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一听到消息, 马上打电话给你。</font><br>\n
director	<h3>director</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>主管, 董事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am a member of the board of directors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是董事会成员。</font><br>负责人, 主任, 校长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom's father is a school director.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆的父亲是中学校长。</font><br>导演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a good director.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个好导演。</font><br>\n
dirt	<h3>dirt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>污垢, 灰尘, 脏土<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wash the dirt off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把污物洗去。</font><br>泥土, 散土<br>下流想法; 下流话<br>恶言, 丑闻<br>\n
dirty	<h3>dirty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>肮脏的<br>下流的, 淫秽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were telling dirty stories.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在讲下流故事。</font><br>卑劣的, 不公平的<br>恶劣的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Even in the dirtiest weather, they were driven to go out to sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 即使是最恶劣的天气, 他们也被迫出海。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>弄脏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will dirty the sofa if you put your muddy shoes on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你把沾满泥巴的鞋子放在沙发上, 你会弄脏它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White shoes dirty very quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白鞋很快变脏。</font><br>\n
disabled	<h3>disabled</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>伤残的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>v.</i></font><br>丧失能力<br>\n
disagree	<h3>disagree</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>不同意, 不一致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes to fight it out whenever others disagree with him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当别人与他意见不一致时, 他总喜欢争辩个明白。</font><br>(食物)有害健康; 不适合<br>\n
disappear	<h3>disappear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>不见, 消失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He disappeared.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不见了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A ship disappeared below the horizon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船消失在地平线下。</font><br>不复存在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snow will soon disappear when the warm weather comes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气变暖时, 雪很快就会融化。</font><br>\n
disappoint	<h3>disappoint</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(人)失望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I promised to buy my son a new bicycle but I had to disappoint him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我答应给儿子买辆新自行车, 可我不得不让他失望了。</font><br>\n
disappointing	<h3>disappointing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>令人失望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The result was disappointing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 结果是令人失望的。</font><br>\n
disapprove	<h3>disapprove</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>不赞成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She replied that she disapproved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她回答说她不赞成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My parents disapproved of my marriage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父母不赞成我的婚事。</font><br>\n
disarm	<h3>disarm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>裁军<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要说服超级大国裁军是很难的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使息怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her words disarmed him at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的话使他怒气顿消。</font><br>\n
disaster	<h3>disaster</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>灾难, 灾祸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They kept a record of earthquake disasters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们记录地震所引发的灾害。</font><br>彻底的失败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His career is a story of utter disaster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在事业上一事无成。</font><br>\n
disc	<h3>disc</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>圆盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hands a metal disc to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把一个金属圆盘给我。</font><br>唱片; 磁盘, 光盘<br>\n
discard	<h3>discard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>丢弃, 抛弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should discard old beliefs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该抛弃旧观念。</font><br>不再使用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will discard the old books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将不再使用这些旧书。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>打出的牌<br>废弃的东西<br>\n
discharge	<h3>discharge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>卸船<br>偿还<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has discharged his debts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已把债务偿清。</font><br>执行; 履行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She discharged all the responsibilities of a minister conscientiously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她自觉地履行部长的一切职责。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>放出; 流出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wound is still discharging pus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这伤口仍在流脓。</font><br>开枪; 发射<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pistol discharged accidentally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 手枪走火了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policeman discharged his gun at the fleeing robbers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察向逃跑的强盗开了枪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>获准离开, 释放<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his discharge from the school, he went to Hong Kong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他离开学校后去了香港。</font><br>排放出的物体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wound hasn't healed, there's still some discharge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伤口没好, 还有些浓液。</font><br>\n
discipline	<h3>discipline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>训练, 训导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She must have been well disciplined for her orderliness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有条不紊, 一定受过良好的训练。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They disciplined him to be patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们培养他有耐心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've disciplined myself to do two hours of exercise every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我坚持每天锻炼两个小时。</font><br>处罚, 惩罚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was often disciplined for staying away from school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子常因为逃学而受到处罚。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>训练, 锻炼, 训导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She needs the discipline of having to write an essay every week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她需要进行每周写一篇文章的训练。</font><br>纪律<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our soldiers showed perfect discipline under heavy fire from the enemy's guns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在敌人的炮火下, 我们的士兵表现出良好的纪律。</font><br>处罚, 处分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That child needs discipline.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 必须对这个孩子加以惩罚。</font><br>学科<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mathematics and physics are related disciplines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数学和物理是相关学科。</font><br>\n

discount	<h3>discount</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>数目, 折扣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can give you a small discount.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以给你打点折扣。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打折扣, 减价出售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That store does not discount at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家商店出售商品一概不打折。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The store discounted all clothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家商店打折出售所有的服装。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>不考虑; 不全信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have discounted the rumours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不信那些谣传。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his plans he discounted the expense.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在他的计划中他没有考虑到费用。</font><br>\n
discourage	<h3>discourage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使气馁; 使沮丧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't let one failure discourage you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 勿因一次失败而气馁。</font><br>阻碍; 劝阻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We discourage smoking in this school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这所学校里我们劝阻吸烟。</font><br>\n
discover	<h3>discover</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Recently they have discovered a comet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近他们发现了一颗彗星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I never discovered how to open the box.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一直未能发现该如何打开这个箱子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She discovered that she was being closely watched.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她发现她在被人监视。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We discovered her to be a good cook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们发现她是一个很好的厨师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When returning back, he discovered the room to be in disorder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回家后, 他发现屋子里乱七八糟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They discovered him stealing public property.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们发现他偷窃公共财产。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They discovered the murderer to have run away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们发现凶手已逃之夭夭。</font><br>碰见, 撞见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He discovered what it was.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看见它到底是什么了。</font><br>了解到, 认识到, 发觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll discover who did it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们会查出是谁做的。</font><br>\n

disease	<h3>disease</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>疾病, 病害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Disease is usually caused by germs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 疾病通常是由病菌引起的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Arthritis is a chronic disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关节炎是一种慢性病。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prejudice is a social disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 偏见是一种社会弊病。</font><br>\n

disgusting	<h3>disgusting</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>令人作呕的, 令人厌恶的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a disgusting smell!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么讨厌的气味！</font><br>非常令人不快的, 极坏的, 极糟的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think it's disgusting the way the goverment keeps putting up taxes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为政府不断加税的做法糟透了。</font><br>\n
dish	<h3>dish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盘, 碟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dried the dishes carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他小心地把碟子擦干。</font><br>一盘食物, 一碟食物, 一道菜, 菜肴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The main dish is a fried steak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主菜是炸牛排。</font><br>餐具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please dry the dishes and put them away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请你把餐具擦干, 收拾好。</font><br>外貌有吸引力的人, 漂亮的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary's new boyfriend is quite a dish, isn't he?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽新交的男朋友挺帅的, 是不是?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>盛于碟盘中; 分发, 提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dished out the food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用餐时分发饭菜。</font><br>使某人的希望破灭, 使某人不能成功<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scandal dished his hopes of being elected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件丑闻使他当选的希望破灭了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The journalists like to dish the dirt about television stars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 记者有时喜欢揭电视明星的疮疤。</font><br>\n
disk	<h3>disk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>圆盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hands a metal disk to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把一个金属圆盘给我。</font><br>唱片; 磁盘, 光盘<br>\n
dislike	<h3>dislike</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>不喜欢, 厌恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That man was disliked inside the college.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全校的人都不喜欢这个人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I dislike to go to the cinema alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢一个人去看电影。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother dislikes our being together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我母亲不喜欢看到我们在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wife dislikes him to be a smoker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他妻子不喜欢他当烟民。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dislikes you to disturb her so often.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不喜欢你经常去打扰她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I dislike my wife going out often.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌我妻子经常外出。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>不喜爱, 厌恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know why, but I took a strong dislike to him as soon as I saw him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 也不知道为什么, 我一见到他就十分讨厌。</font><br>不喜欢的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have our likes and dislikes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都有自己的好恶。</font><br>\n
dismiss	<h3>dismiss</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>解雇; 撤职; 开除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new governor dismissed the staff that served his predecessor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新州长将前任州长的职员全部解雇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dismissed me from the club.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把我开除出俱乐部。</font><br>使退去; 解散<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupils were dismissed from school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们放学了。</font><br>自心中摒除, 不再考虑或谈论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dismissed the story as a rumour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把这个消息当做谣言而不予考虑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dismissed the idea as impossible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为那个主意不可能而断然拒绝。</font><br>\n
disorder	<h3>disorder</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>混乱, 凌乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When returning, he discovered the room in disorder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回家后, 他发现屋子里乱七八糟。</font><br>骚乱, 动乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The announcement led to violent civil disorders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项宣布引起剧烈的骚乱。</font><br>(身心、机能)失调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's suffering from severe mental disorder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他患有严重的精神病。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…弄乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Too rich a diet will disorder his digestive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太油腻的饮食会使他的消化系统变得紊乱。</font><br>\n
display	<h3>display</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>陈列, 展览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A new kind of car was on display in the shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 商店里展出一种新汽车。</font><br>陈列的货物、艺术品等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The displays in Harrods are one of the sights in London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哈罗德百货公司的陈列品是伦敦一景。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>陈列, 展览<br>显示, 显露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young woman proudly displayed her furs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻女人骄傲地炫耀她的皮衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He displayed an originality amounting almost to genius.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他显示出近乎天才的创造性。</font><br>\n
disposal	<h3>disposal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>清除, 处理, 处置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 安全处置核废料是个大问题。</font><br>排列, 布置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You had better discuss with her the disposal of the furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好和她讨论一下如何布置家具。</font><br>\n
dispose	<h3>dispose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>处理; 处置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He disposed his books on the shelves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把书籍排列在书架上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>布置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They disposed troops along the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们沿着河布署军队。</font><br>使愿意或准备做<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His criminal records do not dispose me to trust him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的前科迫使我无法信任他。</font><br>\n
dispute	<h3>dispute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>辩论; 争论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some husbands and wives are always disputing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些夫妇总是争吵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's dispute the decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们来讨论一下这个决定吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They disputed how to get the best results.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们讨论如何获得最佳结果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were disputing whether they should start at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在讨论是否应立即开始。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>怀疑…的真实性或妥当性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I disputed the minister's figures, the true cost of the project is much higher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怀疑部长所说的数字; 那个项目的实际花费要高得多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't dispute that children need love.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对于儿童需要爱并无异议。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>辩论, 争端, 争执<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a dispute about how much money he owed me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们就他欠我多少钱一事进行了一番争论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John got into a dispute with Jack about the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰与杰克为了钱的事吵了起来。</font><br>\n
dissolve	<h3>dissolve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)溶解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun dissolves snow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳使雪融化。</font><br>结束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The campaign dissolved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场运动结束了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dissolved their marriage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们结束了他们的婚姻。</font><br>\n
distance	<h3>distance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>距离, 间距<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oil painting is to be appreciated at a distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油画要在一定的距离外欣赏。</font><br>远处, 远方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can see the mountain in the distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以看见远处的山。</font><br>(时间或空间的)相距<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We spotted them at a distance of two hundred yards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在相距200码处就看到他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things look different at a distance of 10 years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时隔十年, 情况不同了。</font><br>疏远, 冷淡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep your distance from him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不要和他太亲近。</font><br>\n
distant	<h3>distant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(时间或空间)远隔的, 遥远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is a distant country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个遥远的国度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It happened in the distant past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此事发生在遥远的过去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The airport is ten miles distant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 机场离此地有十英里远。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The village is rather distant from here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小村离这里还相当远。</font><br>远亲的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a distant cousin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是我的远房表妹。</font><br>不太友好, 不太热情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her manner was rather distant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的态度相当冷淡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He remained distant from the people he worked with.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对同事们始终敬而远之。</font><br>\n
distinct	<h3>distinct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>截然不同的, 完全分开的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party split into two distinct groups.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该党分裂成两个截然不同的团体。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those two ideas are quite distinct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个主意完全不同。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gold is distinct from iron.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金在性质上不同于铁。</font><br>清晰的, 明白的, 明显的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a distinct improvement in your spoken English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的英语口语有明显的进步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His pronunciation is quite distinct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的发音非常清楚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her voice is very distinct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的嗓音很清晰。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is distinct that smoking is harmful to health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很明显, 抽烟对健康有害。</font><br>\n
distinction	<h3>distinction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>区别, 明显差别, 特征<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't see any distinction between these two cases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看不出这两个案例有什么不同。</font><br>卓越, 优秀, 盛名<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a writer of real distinction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位真正才智超群的作家。</font><br>荣誉, 殊荣, 奖赏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are the highest distinctions that have ever been given by our government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是我国政府迄今授予的最高荣誉称号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has gained a distinction in various fields of scholarly studies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在多种科学的学术研究中享有盛名。</font><br>\n
distinctive	<h3>distinctive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有特色的, 与众不同的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a very distinctive way of walking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她走路的样子与别人很不相同。</font><br>\n
distinguish	<h3>distinguish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>辨别, 区别<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you distinguish the twins apart?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能分辨这对双胞胎吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can distinguish between gold and silver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们能区分金和银。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>显扬自己, 使自己扬名<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He distinguished himself in physics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在物理方面享有盛名。</font><br>\n
distract	<h3>distract</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(人)分心, 分散(注意力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Noise outside distracted her mind from her studies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门外的噪音使她心神不宁, 无法集中注意力学习。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was distracted with an unhappy love affair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因失恋而心烦意乱。</font><br>\n
distress	<h3>distress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>悲痛, 痛苦, 忧伤, 苦恼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing could alleviate his distress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 什么都不能减轻他的痛苦。</font><br>贫困, 窘迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can we prevent such distress?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们怎样才能避免这种贫困?</font><br>危险, 困难, 危难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Send out a distress signal;  the ship is sinking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发出求救信号吧, 船正在下沉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使痛苦, 使忧伤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't distress yourself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请你不要忧愁了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news of his death distressed us greatly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他逝世的消息使我们极为悲痛。</font><br>\n
distribute	<h3>distribute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分配, 分给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foreman distributes the work every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工头每天早晨分派工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the war, all foods were distributed in a planned way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在战争中, 所有的食品都按计划分配。</font><br>散发; 散播; 分布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These books are distributed freely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些书免费散发。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fuel resources are very unevenly distributed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 燃料资源分布很不均匀。</font><br>\n
distribution	<h3>distribution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分发, 分配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conference discussed the fair distribution of income and wealth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议讨论了公平分配收入和财富的问题。</font><br>散布, 分布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The town council passed a law forbidding the distribution of handbills.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市议会通过法律, 禁止散发传单。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pines have a very wide distribution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 松树的分布很广。</font><br>\n
district	<h3>district</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地区, 区域<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A number of unruly youths ganged up and terrorized the district.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一些不法青年结成一伙, 使这个地区陷于恐怖。</font><br>行政区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They divide the city into sections, each district having its own streets or blocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把这个城市分成若干个区, 每个区都有自己的街道或街区。</font><br>\n
disturb	<h3>disturb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>打扰, 妨碍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't disturb him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别打扰他。</font><br>使焦虑, 使烦恼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His passion for his cause disturbed me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对事业的热情使我焦虑不安。</font><br>扰乱, 弄乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I felt disturbed to hear of your illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听说你生了病, 我感到不安。</font><br>\n
ditch	<h3>ditch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>沟, 渠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My headlights shone over a broad ditch of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的汽车前灯照亮了一道很宽的水沟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>摆脱, 抛弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She got bored with her boyfriend and ditched him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对男友感到厌烦, 于是甩掉了他。</font><br>\n
dive	<h3>dive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>跳水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dived from the bridge and rescued the drowning woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从桥上跳入水中, 救起溺水的妇女。</font><br>潜水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The men are diving for pearls.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些人正在潜水采集珍珠。</font><br>头向下钻, 猛冲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane dived sharply and rose again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机猛然俯冲而后又拉了起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>潜水, 跳水<br>\n
diverse	<h3>diverse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不同的, 多种多样的<br>\n
divide	<h3>divide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>分, 划分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They agree to divide evenly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们同意平分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This class is too large, we shall have to divide it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个班太大了, 我们得把它分一分。</font><br>分离, 隔开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train divides at York.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这列火车在约克市调动车厢分途行驶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea divides England and the Continent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大海将英格兰与欧洲大陆分开了。</font><br>(使)产生分歧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The House again divided, and the bill was passed by 11 votes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 议院的意见又产生了分歧, 该法案以11票获得通过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't let such a small matter divide us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要让这样的小事使我们不和。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分水岭, 分界线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mountain is the divide between the two rivers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座山是这两条河的分水岭。</font><br>\n
division	<h3>division</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分开; 分配<br>部门<br>界限<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A hedge forms the division between her land and mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一道篱笆在她和我的土地之间形成了分界线。</font><br>分歧, 分裂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Division arose over the interpretation of the idea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对这个观点的解释产生了分歧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unequal distribution of wealth may cause division in society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 财富分配不均会引起社会分裂。</font><br>除(法)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you learnt division?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你学会除法了吗?</font><br>分组表决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Bill was read without a division.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该法案未经分组表决即进行宣读。</font><br>\n
divorce	<h3>divorce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>离婚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Divorce is on the increase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 离婚不断增多。</font><br>分离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of us like the divorce of word and deed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都不喜欢言行不一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>与…离婚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She divorced him after years of unhappiness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过多年的不愉快, 她跟他离婚了。</font><br>分离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In sports, exercise and play are not divorced.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在运动中, 练习和比赛是分不开的。</font><br>\n
dizzy	<h3>dizzy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>头昏眼花的, 眩晕的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel a dizzy spell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我感到一阵头晕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was dizzy from lack of food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于没吃东西我感到头晕目眩。</font><br>引起头晕的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drove the car at dizzy speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以令人头晕的速度开车。</font><br>\n
DNA	<h3>DNA</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>abbr.</i></font><br>deoxyribonucleic acid 脱氧核糖核酸<br>\n
do	<h3>do</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>(构成疑问句和否定句)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know him?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认识他吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't think.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有想过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Telling lies does not pay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 撒谎不值得。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What (did) he tell you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他告诉了你什么事?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp (Do you ) like it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp (你)喜欢它吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why (does she) not buy one?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp (她)为什么不买一个?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does she have a bike?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有自行车吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sorry, I don't have any whisky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 我没有威士忌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you have time for a drink?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有空喝一杯吗?</font><br>(代替动词)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I knew he would help us, and he did.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道他会帮助我们的, 他确实这样做了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got there earlier than we did.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他到得比我们早。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Does he know I'm here?”“Yes, he does.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“他知道我在这儿吗?”“是的，他知道。”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Does he come every day?”“He does (so).</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“他每天都来吗?”“他每天都来。”</font><br>(用于加强语气)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I never did like her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的确从来没有喜欢过她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only then did he realize that he had been wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 直到这时他才知道他错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I do think so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的确是这样想的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I did come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的确来过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please do be quiet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 务请肃静。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do wait for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 务必请等我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do be honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一定要诚实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do be on time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一定要准时。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>做, 干, 从事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've done very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When in Rome do as the Romans do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入乡随俗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of us care whether they do right or wrong, good or harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们中没有人关心他们做的是对还是错, 是好还是坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He does nothing but eat and drink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他除了吃喝之外, 什么也不做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've done a good job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做得挺不错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you do me a favour?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你帮我一下忙好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John has done a good turn to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰为我做了一件好事。</font><br>学习, 研究<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is doing very well at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在学校学习很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She does her lessons well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她学习很好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>整理; 使整洁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is doing the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在整理房间。</font><br>烹调, 烧, 煮<br>算出, 解答<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm quite sure they were doing the same problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我敢肯定他们解决的是同一问题。</font><br>行过, 走过, 游览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We did the journey in six hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在六小时之内走完了这段旅程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I did the travel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我旅行去了。</font><br>引起, 产生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hard work does wonders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 努力工作会取得惊人的成就。</font><br>适合, 可用, 方便<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This room will do me quite well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个房间对我很合适。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will this spanner do you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个扳手你用着行吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>行, 足够<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That will do!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 行了, 够了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This small one will do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小的就行了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It would never do to neglect official obligations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玩忽职守是绝对不行的。</font><br>生长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vegetables do well here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里蔬菜长势好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fruit trees are all doing well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 果树长得不错。</font><br>\n

dot	<h3>dot</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>点, 小圆点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Join the dots up to complete the drawing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 顺点连线把图画好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a dot between 6 and 0.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在六和零之间有一个小数点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以小圆点标出<br>分布各处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sky was dotted with stars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天上繁星密布。</font><br>打, 击(某人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dotted me in the eye.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他击中了我的眼睛。</font><br>\n
double	<h3>double</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>双的, 双重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The total output is double that of last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总产量是去年的两倍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His share is double.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的份额是双份的。</font><br>供两人用的, 双人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They bought a double bed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们买了一张双人床。</font><br>两面派的, 虚伪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't like the man who bears a double face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不喜欢不诚实的人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>两倍, 双份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ten is the double of five.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 十是五的两倍。</font><br>极为相似的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is my double.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他酷似我。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…对折, 折叠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She doubled the sheet of the paper and put it away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把这张纸折起来放到一边。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>是…的两倍, (使)加倍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house has doubled in value since I bought it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从我买下这幢房子以来, 它的价值已增加了一倍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby doubled its weight in a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那婴儿一年中体重增加了一倍。</font><br>兼任, 兼作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is doubling the parts of a preacher and a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他扮演牧师和教师两个角色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>折回, 掉头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suddenly doubled and ran in the opposite direction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他突然转身, 朝相反方向跑去。</font><br>\n
doubt	<h3>doubt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>怀疑, 疑虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no room for doubt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有怀疑的余地。</font><br>未确定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is not much doubt about his guilt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有罪几乎是可以确定的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>怀疑, 疑惑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything is clear now; no one would doubt what to be done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一切都很清楚, 没有人对所要做的事怀疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doubts being able to finish in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怀疑能否及时完成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They doubted his speeding up steps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们怀疑他是否能加快步伐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't doubt that he can do a good job of it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们并不怀疑他能把这事做得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you doubt what I say?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你怀疑我说的话吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I doubt if it will rain today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能确定今天是否会下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We doubted him a liar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们怀疑他是个骗子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I doubt it to be truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怀疑这是真实的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody doubts him to have been honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人怀疑他曾经是诚实的。</font><br>\n
doubtful	<h3>doubtful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>难以预测的, 未定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a doubtful battle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一场胜负难测的战争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm doubtful where to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该往哪里去我心中无底。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel doubtful what I ought to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知该做什么。</font><br>怀疑的, 可疑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's try to clear up our difficult and doubtful points.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们设法把难处和疑点解决一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel very doubtful about this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对这点很怀疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am very doubtful of that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很疑心那件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is doubtful whether it is true or not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事的真假是可疑的。</font><br>\n
down	<h3>down</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向下, 在下面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man bent down to kiss the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男人俯下身子去亲吻小孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's very early, and no one is down yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时间太早, 楼下还没有人。</font><br>由大到小, 由强到弱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't let the fire burn down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别让火熄灭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wish you would turn the radio down a bit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真希望你能把收音机的音量调低一些。</font><br>往南<br>处于低等地位, 处于潦倒状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Once a very rich man, he is now down and out and must depend upon his friends for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾是一个很富的人, 现在完全潦倒了, 必须靠朋友周济。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…的下方; 在…的下端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their house is down the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的房子在山下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His office is down the stair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的办公室在楼下。</font><br>(表示时间)自…以来; 持续一段时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story came down the ages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个故事从古代流传至今。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked back down the last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他回顾了去年的情景。</font><br>(表示方向)沿着…向下; 沿着, 顺着; 向…那一端; 朝[在]…的下游地区; 朝[在]…的南方; 到, 去; 从页首开始, 向…的底部看<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tears trickled down her cheeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 热泪一滴滴从她脸颊上滚下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw him walking down the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看见他在沿着街走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They hired a boat and went for a row down the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们租了条小船, 划向河的下游。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The movement spread down the Rhine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运动沿着莱茵河往下游地区蔓延开来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am just going down the shops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我正要去商店。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always looks down the column of the TV program in the newspaper before he starts reading the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在阅读报上的新闻以前, 他总是先把电视节目栏从头到尾看一遍。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>向下的, 下行的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cast a down look!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 向下看！</font><br>沮丧的, 情绪低落的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We felt very down after the party was over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 舞会结束后我们甚感沮丧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt down about his failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对自己的失败感到沮丧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was so down that he didn't want to live any longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他情绪低落以至于不想活了。</font><br>(以…)落后于对手的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was down by 15 ∶ 40 in the third game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在第3局中他以15比40输给对方。</font><br>完成了的, 已处理的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The student reported to his parents on his exams—five down and two to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个学生向他父母汇报考试情况:已考完五科, 还剩两科。</font><br>\n
download	<h3>download</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>v.</i></font><br>将(程序，资料等)从大计算机系统输入小计算机系统；下载<br>\n
downstairs	<h3>downstairs</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在楼下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John's father is waiting downstairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰的父亲在楼下等着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She cried out that she was downstairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她大声喊道她在楼下。</font><br>向[往]楼下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went downstairs to breakfast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他下楼去吃早饭了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>楼下的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives in a downstairs room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住在楼下的一个房间里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The downstairs rooms are not as quiet as the upstairs ones.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 楼下房间没有楼上房间安静。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>楼下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We haven't painted the downstairs yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们还没有给楼下刷漆。</font><br>\n

downward	<h3>downward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>向下的, 往下的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All apples on apple trees are downward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 苹果树上的所有苹果都是向下的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向下地, 下行地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The garden sloped gently downward to the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 花园呈缓坡向河边倾斜。</font><br>\n
