draft	<h3>draft</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>草稿, 草案, 草图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They agreed on a draft resolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们商定一项决议草案。</font><br>汇票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I enclose here with a draft for the sum of 100 dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兹附上100美元汇票一张。</font><br>应召入伍者; 特遣队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That year's draft was the largest ever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那年的征兵规模最大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The draft consists of those best qualified for the special assignment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这支特遣队由最适于执行这项特殊任务的人组成。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>起草, 画草图, 草拟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sat down and drafted a letter to the local newspaper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们坐下来, 给当地的报纸草拟了一封信。</font><br>选派, 抽调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was drafted last autumn by the Detroit Lions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去年秋天被底特律雄狮队选作队员了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They drafted her to serve as their delegate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们选她当代表。</font><br>征募, 征召…入伍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the men were drafted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 男人们全都应征入伍了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been drafted as a soldier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应征去当兵。</font><br>\n
drag	<h3>drag</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使…)在地上拖拉; 慢吞吞地走, 磨蹭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heavy coach is dragging along.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 重载的马车吃力地行进着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bottom of her long dress dragged in the dust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她长衣裳的下摆拖着尘土。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dragged the fallen tree clear of the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把倒下的树从路上拖走。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拖, 拉, 拽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship dragged her anchor during the storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船在暴风雨中拖动了锚链。</font><br>打捞, 拖捞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They're dragging the river for the body of the missing boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在河底打捞失踪男孩的尸体。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拖, 拉, 拽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walked with a drag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拖着脚走路。</font><br>吸, 抽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took last drags at his cigarette and stood up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抽完最后几口烟, 站了起来。</font><br>累赘, 障碍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She loves her family, but they're a drag on her career.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她热爱自己的家庭, 但家庭却是她事业的拖累。</font><br>\n
dragon	<h3>dragon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>龙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dragons are legendary animals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 龙是传说中的动物。</font><br>凶恶的人, 悍妇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wife is an absolute dragon!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的老婆是个十足的母夜叉！</font><br>\n
drain	<h3>drain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)流干, (使)逐渐流走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was not easy to drain the flooded mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 排干矿坑里的积水不容易。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>喝光, 喝干<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's drain the glass dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们把这杯喝干吧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>排水沟, 排水管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The drain was choked up with dirt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 排水管被污物堵住了。</font><br>流尽, 用光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wife's illness has been a great drain on his income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他妻子的病要用去他的大部分收入。</font><br>\n
drama	<h3>drama</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>戏剧, 剧本<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He acted his part very well in the French drama.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在这出法国戏剧中演得很成功。</font><br>戏剧文学[艺术]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a student of drama.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是研究戏剧的学生。</font><br>戏剧性事件[场面]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a big drama at school when one of the teachers fell in the pond.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有个老师掉进了池塘里, 这件事轰动了全校。</font><br>\n
dramatic	<h3>dramatic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>戏剧的, 剧本的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He enjoys the dramatic arts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜爱戏剧艺术。</font><br>戏剧性的, 激动人心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech was dramatic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的演说激动人心。</font><br>引人注目的, 给人深刻印象的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She plays a very dramatic woman with flashing eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她饰演一位双眼闪光的引人注目的妇人。</font><br>\n
draught	<h3>draught</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>通风, 气流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a draught in this room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房间里有风。</font><br>一饮, 一口之量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He emptied his glass at one draught.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将杯中物一饮而尽。</font><br>\n
draw	<h3>draw</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>绘画, 画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew some pictures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他画了一些画。</font><br>拖, 拉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cart draws easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆马车很容易拉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拔出, 取出, 抽出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew his gun and fired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拔出枪就开火。</font><br>提取, 汲取, 领取<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She draws a good salary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她领取丰厚的薪水。</font><br>引起, 吸引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The airplane drew the enemy's fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机引来敌人的炮火。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>移动, 来临<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The National Day is drawing closer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国庆节快到了。</font><br>打成平局, 不分胜负<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two teams drew last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个队昨晚打成了平局。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抽奖, 抽签<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When does the draw take place?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抽奖什么时候举行?</font><br>平局, 不分胜负<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The game ended in a draw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比赛以平局告终。</font><br>\n

They're getting married!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁能想到?他们都快结婚了！</font><br>\n

each	<h3>each</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>每一, 各个的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each school has its library.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每一所学校都有图书馆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each one of us has his own duty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每个人都有自己的职责。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each boy and each girl works hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个学生都努力学习。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>每个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were three students who called and I gave a book to each.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 来了三个学生, 我发给每个人一本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each of us has a company car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每人都有一辆公司的汽车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each of you have to work together with one heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们大家要齐心合力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The witnesses were each perfectly certain of what they said.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 证人们个个对自己所说的话十分肯定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peter and Bill each say they came first in the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彼得和比尔都说自己跑了第一。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The French and Germans each claimed the territory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法国人和德国人都声称这块土地是他们的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We each have our own particular tastes, haven't we?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们各有所好, 不是吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>每, 各自<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They both hold each an opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们俩各执己见。</font><br>\n

eat	<h3>eat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>吃, 喝; 吃饭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was too ill to eat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病重得不能吃东西。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When do we eat?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们什么时候吃饭?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have eaten already.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经吃过了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't eat so quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要吃这么快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We eat at noon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们中午进餐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will eat at 甘蔗吃起来很甜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Crackers alone eat very dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 光吃饼干口很干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It eats crisp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这东西吃上去松脆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This fish eats well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这鱼好吃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We eat to live, not live to eat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们吃饭是为了活着, 而不是活着为了吃饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tigers eat meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老虎吃肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I made a fierce countenance as if I would eat color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个计划中, 哪一个都同样有危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news did not shock either of them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息没有使他们任何一个人震惊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think either of them are at home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他们中任何一个都不在家。</font><br><i><font 我也不去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The product is of high quality and is not expensive either.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种产品质量好价格也不贵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom has no home, or friends either.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆没有家, 也没有朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Either your watches or mine is wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不是你们的表不准, 就是我的表不准。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have not been to either Paris or Rome.</font></i><br><font empty	<h3>empty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>空的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby was sucking away at the empty feeding-bottle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个孩子正在吮吸着空奶瓶。</font><br>空闲的, 空虚的, 寂寥的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't want to live an empty life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不想过一种空虚的生活。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)成为空的, 把…弄空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tank gradually emptied.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蓄水池的水渐渐流空了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby cried loudly when he emptied his bottle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿喝干了瓶子里的东西就大哭起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…腾出来, 倒空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He emptied his tool bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他腾出自己的工具袋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room was emptied very quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间很快就腾空了。</font><br>\n

enterprise	<h3>enterprise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>事业, 计划<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are determined to carry forward the enterprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决心把事业进行下去。</font><br>事业心, 进取心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of great enterprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很有进取心。</font><br>企[事]业单位, 公司<br>\n
entertain	<h3>entertain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>款待, 招待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They entertain a great deal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们常常招待客人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He entertains his guest very poorly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对客人很怠慢。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使欢乐, 使娱乐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A circus show entertains children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马戏表演使孩子们兴高采烈。</font><br>抱有, 考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They entertained a firm belief in final victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对最后胜利抱有坚定信心。</font><br>\n
entertainment	<h3>entertainment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>款待, 请客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel is famous for its entertainment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆以殷勤待客而著称。</font><br>娱乐, 文娱节目, 表演会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an interesting entertainment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个有趣的文娱节目。</font><br>\n
enthusiasm	<h3>enthusiasm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>热情, 热心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speech aroused the enthusiasm of the students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那篇演说唤起了学生们的热情。</font><br>巨大兴趣, 热衷的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One of his many enthusiasms is a great fondness of eastern music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酷爱东方音乐是他众多爱好之一。</font><br>\n
entire	<h3>entire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>全部的, 整体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've wasted an entire day on this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这上面我已经浪费了一整天的时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the Venus de Milo was entire, there were arms on the statue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 维纳斯塑像完整时, 是有胳膊的。</font><br>\n
entitle	<h3>entitle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使有资格; 使有权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He entitled us to enter his office at any time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他授权给我们可以随时进入他的办公室。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are entitled to enjoy many advantages and privileges.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们有资格享有许多优惠和特权。</font><br>给…题名<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He entitled the book The Secret Garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把这本书定名为《秘密花园》。</font><br>\n
entrance	<h3>entrance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>入口, 大门口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car waited at the front entrance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车在前门口等候。</font><br>进入; 登场; 入学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The singer's entrance was greeted with applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位歌星在掌声中登场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had decided for taking the entrance exam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她决定参加入学考试。</font><br>\n
entry	<h3>entry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>进入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army made a triumphant entry into the enemy's capital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队胜利地进入了敌方首都。</font><br>入场权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You mustn't drive into a street with a “No Entry” sign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你切勿把车驶进有“不得进入”标示的街道。</font><br>入口处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will wait for you at the entry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在入口处等你。</font><br>登记, 条目, 词条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The entry of all expenditure is necessary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有必要把一切开支入账。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This dictionary has over 30, 000 entries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本词典收词3万多条。</font><br>参赛的人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many entries are there for the high jump?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报名参加跳高比赛的有多少人?</font><br>参加比赛的名单或总(人)数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a large entry for the flower show this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年的花展有大量花卉参展。</font><br>\n

envy	<h3>envy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>妒忌; 羡慕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were full of envy when they saw my new car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们看了我的新汽车, 都非常羡慕。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>妒忌; 羡慕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I envy your ability to work so fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真羡慕你, 能干得这么快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't envy your journey in this bad weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我才不羡慕你在这样恶劣的天气里旅行呢。</font><br>\n

equal	<h3>equal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相等的, 同样的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their ages are equal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们同龄。</font><br>平等的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All men are equal in the eye of law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律面前人人平等。</font><br>能胜任的, 合适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't seem equal to meeting our demands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他似乎不太合乎我们的要求。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>与…相等或相同<br>比得上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Few cars can equal this kind of cars for speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很少有其他车在速度方面胜过这种车。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>同样的人, 相等的数量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government should regard nationalities as equals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府对待各民族应一视同仁。</font><br>能与之比拟的东西, 匹敌者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's the equal of his brother as far as intelligence is concerned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 论智力, 他和他哥哥不相上下。</font><br>\n

equivalent	<h3>equivalent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相等的, 相当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no exactly equivalent French tense to the present perfect tense in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法语里没有和英语中的现在完成时完全对应的时态。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Changing her job like that is equivalent to giving her the sack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样调换她的工作等于是解雇她。</font><br>\n

erect	<h3>erect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>竖立的, 直立的, 挺立的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is an erect pine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那儿有一棵挺拔的松树。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers stand erect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵笔直地站着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She held her head erect and her back straight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她昂着头, 把背挺得笔直。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使直立; 竖起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They erected a telephone pole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们竖起一根电话线杆子。</font><br>〈正〉建立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't want to see a system like that will be erected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不希望看到那种制度被建立起来。</font><br>\n

error	<h3>error</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>错误<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went through the typescript carefully to eliminate all errors from it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她认真地检查了打字稿, 排除了所有的错误。</font><br>过失, 失误<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accident was caused by human error.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这宗事故是由人为过失造成的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jack used to be a thief, but now he's seen the error of his ways and is trying to rebuild his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰克过去是小偷, 但是现已知过能改重新做人了。</font><br>\n
escape	<h3>escape</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>逃脱, 逃跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of them could escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们谁也跑不了。</font><br>漏出, 泄漏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make a hole and let the water escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 挖一个洞, 让水流出去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>逃避, 避开; 免除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fox escaped the hunter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狐狸躲开了猎人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>逃走, 逃脱; 逃避<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We quickly cut off the enemy's escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们迅速切断了敌人的退路。</font><br>消遣, 解闷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I read love stories as an escape from reality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我阅读爱情小说以逃避现实。</font><br>\n
especially	<h3>especially</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>尤其, 特别<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It especially excited their inquisitiveness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这尤其引起了他们的好奇心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Especially is Dennie good at swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尤其是丹尼精于游泳。</font><br>\n
essay	<h3>essay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>散文, 随笔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an essay heavy with surplus phrasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是篇废话连篇的散文。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a thoughtful essay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一篇具有思想性的随笔。</font><br>\n
essential	<h3>essential</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>必不可少的, 绝对必要的; 非常重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Food is essential for life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生命离不开食物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is essential for us to know all the facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对我们来说, 了解所有的事实是必要的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is essential that you should come home early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有必要早点回家。</font><br>本质的, 实质的, 基本的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are essential differences between the two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两者之间有本质的区别。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>要素, 要点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The information and advice are boiled down to bare essentials.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各种资料与建议缩短为极简单的要点。</font><br>必需品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We only have time to pack a few essentials.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们只来得及装几件生活必需品。</font><br>\n
establish	<h3>establish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>建立, 成立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have established diplomatic relations with many countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已和许多国家建立了外交关系。</font><br>安置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They established themselves between the Danube and Greece.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在多瑙河和希腊之间定居下来。</font><br>确定, 证实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police established that she was innocent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察查明她是无罪的。</font><br>\n
establishment	<h3>establishment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>建立, 确立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The establishment of new international economic order is the essence of his article.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他文章的主题是建立国际经济新秩序。</font><br>企业, 机构<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel is a well-run establishment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这旅店是一家经营完善的企业。</font><br>当权派, 当局<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Establishment has reached a decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当局已做出决定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The musical Establishment think he is a musical genius.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐界权威人士认为他是个音乐天才。</font><br>\n
estate	<h3>estate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>土地, 地区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An industrial estate will help to promote the business of that city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业区将促进那个城市的商业发展。</font><br>庄园, 种植园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a tea estate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一座茶树种植园。</font><br>地产, 财产; 遗产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He owns a large estate in Scotland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在苏格兰有大量地产。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her estate was divided among her four children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的遗产分给了她的四个子女。</font><br>\n
estimate	<h3>estimate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>估计, 估价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The painter's estimate for painting the whole house was 1000 dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油漆匠对油刷整个房子的估价是1000美元。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an outside estimate of the price.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是最高的估价。</font><br>报价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got estimates from three different contractors before accepting the lowest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们得到三个承包商的报价后, 接受了最低的报价。</font><br>判断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know her well enough to form an estimate of her abilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对她不太了解, 无法对她的能力做出判断。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>估计; 评价, 评估<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gardener estimated that it would take him four hours to weed the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 园丁估计他给花园除草需要四个小时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We estimate the cost to be five thousand dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们估计费用为5000美元。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We estimated his character highly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对他的人品评价很高。</font><br>\n
eternal	<h3>eternal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>永恒的, 永久的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rome has been called the Eternal City.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罗马一向被称为不朽之城。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A wedding ring is a symbol of eternal love between a married couple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 结婚戒指象征已婚夫妇之间永恒的爱。</font><br>似乎不停的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stop this eternal chatter!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要唠叨个不停！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am tired of your eternal arguments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌你们没完没了的争吵。</font><br>\n
ethnic	<h3>ethnic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>种族的, 部落的<br>某文化群体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This music would sound more ethnic if you played it in steel drums.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你用钢鼓演奏, 这首乐曲将更具民族特色。</font><br>\n
evaluate	<h3>evaluate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>评价, 估计, 估价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't evaluate his ability without seeing his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有看到他的工作情况, 无法评论他的能力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school has only been open for six months, so it's hard to evaluate its success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该学校仅开办了六个月, 现在还很难估计它的成就。</font><br>\n
eve	<h3>eve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(宗教节日或假日的)前日, 前夕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll have a party on New Year's Eve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将在除夕举行晚会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On Christmas Eves we go to Grandma's home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当圣诞前夕我们都到祖母家去。</font><br>(重大事件发生的)前一刻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt sick on the eve of the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在比赛前病了。</font><br>\n
even	<h3>even</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>甚至, 即使<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never even bothered to acknowledge her presence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他甚至对她的在场未予理会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Even a child can answer it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 甚至连小孩都能回答这个问题。</font><br>更加, 愈加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You seem even more beautiful than usual today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你今天好像比平时更漂亮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was cold yesterday, but it's even colder today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天冷, 今天更冷了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>平的, 平坦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the end we arrived at the even ground at the top of the mountain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后我们登上了山顶上的平地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country is even with no high hills.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 田野平坦无高山。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cut the bushes even with the fence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把灌木丛剪得和围栏一样高。</font><br>均匀的; 有规律的; 稳定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cut the bread into even slices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把面包均匀地切成片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child's pulse is now even.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子的脉搏现在稳定了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried to keep his voice even.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他尽力使自己的声音保持平静。</font><br>相等的, 均衡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our scores are now even.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们得分现在相等。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two horses were even in the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那两匹马竞赛的成绩相等。</font><br>双数的, 偶数的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thirteen is not divisible by any even number.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 13不能被任何偶数除尽。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)平; (使)相等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The carpenter evened a board with a plane.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位木工用刨子刨平了一块木板。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She evened the edges by trimming them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把边缘修齐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Smith's goal evened the score.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯进的球把比分拉平了。</font><br>\n
evening	<h3>evening</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>傍晚, 黄昏, 晚上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Evening in the country is a very peaceful time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乡村里的傍晚是平静安谧的时刻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On summer evenings we often have supper in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏季的晚上, 我们常常在花园里吃饭。</font><br>晚会, 晚上娱乐活动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We held an English evening last week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上周我们举行了一次英语晚会。</font><br>\n
event	<h3>event</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>事件, 大事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Next day the newspapers reported the event.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二天, 报纸报道了这个事件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Events proved the folly of such calculations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情的进展证明了这种估计是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The authorities were unable to control events.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当局不能控制局势。</font><br>运动项目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some 2000 athletes competed in 20 events.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约2000名运动员参加了20个项目的比赛。</font><br>\n
eventually	<h3>eventually</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>终于, 最后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hated his stepfather and eventually ran away from home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他恨他的继父, 最终从家中逃走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “When will you be back?”“Eventually.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“你什么时候回来?”“最后总会回来的。”</font><br>\n
ever	<h3>ever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在任何时候; 在某时; 有时; 从来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you ever been there?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你曾去过那里吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't you ever think about your work?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 难道你就不考虑一下自己的工作吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hardly ever go to bed after midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我几乎从来不会在午夜以后去睡觉的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you are ever in Spain, come and see me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是到西班牙来, 请一定来找我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their products enjoy ever higher prestige in the world market.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的产品在世界市场上享有越来越高的声誉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the best work you have ever done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是你所做的最好的工作。</font><br>不断地; 总是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were very happy ever afterwards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以后他们一直幸福地生活着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The world's ever-increasing population will cause great problems in the future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 世界人口的不断增长将给未来带来重大的问题。</font><br>究竟, 到底<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How ever did I forget it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怎么竟然把它忘了呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When ever did you lose it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你究竟在什么时候把它弄丢的?</font><br>\n
every	<h3>every</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>每一, 每个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every word in this dictionary is important.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本字典每一个词都很重要。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every man is not honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 并不是每个人都是诚实的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go to bed, every one of you!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们大家都去睡觉。</font><br>每…一次的, 每隔…的, 每…之中的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take a pill every three hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每三小时吃一粒药。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Out of every five men only two were fit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每五人中只有两个是合格的。</font><br>\n
everybody	<h3>everybody</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>每人, 人人, 各人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone knows it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家都知道这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone knows what they have to do, don't they?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每一个人都知道他们必须干什么, 不是吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone is not present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 并非每个人都来了。</font><br>\n
everyday	<h3>everyday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>每天的, 日常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is everyday routine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是每天的例行公事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a fact of everyday experience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是平日常见的事情。</font><br>\n
everyone	<h3>everyone</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>每人, 人人, 各人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone knows it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家都知道这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone knows what they have to do, don't they?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每一个人都知道他们必须干什么, 不是吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone is not present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 并非每个人都来了。</font><br>\n
everything	<h3>everything</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>每件事, 一切<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must do everything carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须仔细地做每一件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything is not settled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 并非事事都解决了。</font><br>最重要的东西<br>\n
everywhere	<h3>everywhere</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>处处, 到处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't find it though I've looked everywhere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然我什么地方都找了, 但还是没有找到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man isn't very happy everywhere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人并不能在什么地方都舒畅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People come from everywhere to celebrate the victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们从各处汇集而来庆祝胜利。</font><br>\n
evidence	<h3>evidence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>证词; 证据; 迹象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A scientist must produce evidence in support of a theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家必须提供证据以支持其理论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room bore evidence of a struggle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房间里有搏斗过的迹象。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There wasn't enough evidence to prove him guilty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有充分的证据证明他有罪。</font><br>\n
evident	<h3>evident</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>明显的, 明白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed his name with evident satisfaction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他显然很满意地签了名。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prospect became more evident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 前景变得更加明朗了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This fact is too evident to require proof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事实很明显, 用不着证明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is evident that smoking is harmful to health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很明显, 抽烟对健康有害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's evident to me that they have no experience in this work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我看来, 他们干这项工作没有经验是显而易见的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spokesman made it evident that no compromise was yet in sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发言人表示, 目前还不会妥协。</font><br>\n
evidently	<h3>evidently</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>明显地, 显然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Evidently, he has fallen in love with Miss Green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 显然, 他爱上了格林小姐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was evidently too tired to go any further.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他显然太疲劳, 一步也走不动了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was born evidently in London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 显然, 他出生在伦敦。</font><br>\n
evil	<h3>evil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>邪恶的, 坏的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an evil man with evil ideas, and leads an evil life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个满脑子恶念头的邪恶的人, 过着一种罪恶的生活。</font><br>讨厌的, 使人不舒服的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What an evil smell!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么臭的气味！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was an evil night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个坏透了的夜晚。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>邪恶, 罪恶, 祸害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Love of money is the root of all evil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爱钱是邪恶的根源。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tobacco is considered by some to be an evil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 烟草被有些人认为是一种祸害。</font><br>\n
evolution	<h3>evolution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>演变; 进化; 发展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the course of evolution, some birds have lost the power of flight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在进化的过程中, 一些鸟丧失了飞行能力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cultural and social evolution now becomes rapid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在文化和社会发展很快。</font><br>\n
evolve	<h3>evolve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>演变; 进化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Language is constantly and gradually evolving.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 语言在不断地缓慢发展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has evolved a new theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已形成了一种新学说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He evolved a system for making money quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想出了一套快速赚钱的方法。</font><br>\n
exact	<h3>exact</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>准确的, 确切的, 精确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please give me your exact age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把你的确切年龄告诉我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His memory is very exact;  he never makes mistakes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的记忆非常准确, 从不出错。</font><br>严谨的, 严格的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Accountants have to be very exact.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会计必须十分严谨。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>要求, 索取; 苛求, 强求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The job exacts care and attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项工作需要谨慎和集中精力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The difficult operation will exact all the doctor's skill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这困难的手术将需要这位医生拿出全部本领来。</font><br>\n
exaggerate	<h3>exaggerate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)扩大, (使)增加<br>夸大, 夸张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She always exaggerates when she tells something she's done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当她谈及自己所做的事时, 她总是言过其实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He exaggerated the dangers of the trip in order to frighten them not into going.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他夸大了旅行的危险, 目的是恫吓他们, 以使他们不敢去。</font><br>\n
exam	<h3>exam</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈口〉考试<br>\n
examination	<h3>examination</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>检查, 调查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On further examination it was found that the signature was not genuine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过进一步的调查发现签名不是真的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor attended her immediately with a brief examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大夫立即给她迅速地检查了一下。</font><br>考试; 考查; 试题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then came the day of his examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 后来, 他考试的日子到了。</font><br>讯问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His statement won't bear the lawyer's examinations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的供述经不起律师的讯问。</font><br>\n
examine	<h3>examine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>仔细检查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor examined the wound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生检查了伤口。</font><br>考试, 对…进行考核<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All candidates must first be orally examined.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的考生必须先参加口试。</font><br>审查, 审问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policeman examined the suspicious man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察盘问了那个可疑的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The judge examined the principal witness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官询问了主要证人。</font><br>\n
example	<h3>example</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>例子, 实例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An example is furnished by him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提供了一个例子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is beyond example in history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这在历史上是史无前例的。</font><br>样本, 范例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a good example of Shelley's lyric poetry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这首诗是雪莱抒情诗的范例。</font><br>榜样, 楷模<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good example serves to promote good manners in the young.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好榜样可促使青年人讲礼貌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Example is better than precept.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 身教重于言教。</font><br>警告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher made an example of the boy who copied from another student during a test.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师惩罚了考试作弊的学生以儆效尤。</font><br>\n
exceed	<h3>exceed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>超过; 超越<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The demand for fish this month exceeds the supply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本月的鱼市供不应求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The driver exceeds the speed limit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位司机超速驾车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their total grain output still exceeded that of the previous year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的粮食总产量仍超过头一年。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(在数量、质量上)突出, 领先<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the Olympic Games Americans exceeded in basketball.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在奥运会上, 美国在篮球方面领先。</font><br>\n
exceedingly	<h3>exceedingly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>非常, 极其, 过分地, 极为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drove exceedingly fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把车开得极快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were exceedingly kind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们非常友好。</font><br>\n
excellence	<h3>excellence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>卓越, 杰出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My performance is far below excellence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的表演离优秀还差得远呢。</font><br>\n
excellent	<h3>excellent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>优秀的, 卓越的, 杰出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Brooks is an excellent composer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 布鲁克斯是一位杰出的作曲家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an excellent meal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一顿很好的饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The student was excellent in chemistry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个学生的化学成绩优异。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's excellent that you are here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在这儿太好了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I thought the answer excellent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得这答案好极了。</font><br>\n
except	<h3>except</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…除外; 免除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I say that the boys are lazy, I except you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我说男孩懒惰, 并不包括你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will be punished, I can except no one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们都得受到惩罚, 我不放过任何人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>除…外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everybody except me looks down upon him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了我以外人们都瞧不起他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't see him, except casually, in two months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我两个月里我只偶尔见过他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like her except when she is angry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢她, 只要她不发脾气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could do little except write.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他除了会写之外, 其他什么都不行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know nothing about him except that he lives next door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对他一无所知, 只知道他住在隔壁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I received nothing except what was due to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了我应得的东西, 我并未接受任何东西。</font><br>\n
exception	<h3>exception</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>例外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is considered an exception to the rule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把这看作是该规则的例外。</font><br>\n
excess	<h3>excess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>超重的, 过量的; 额外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to pay excess postal charges on this letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这封信你必须付超重邮资。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>超过, 过多之量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An excess of fat in one's diet can lead to heart disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饮食中脂肪过量能导致心脏病。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was charged an excess of 400 dollars over the amount stated on the bill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 向她索取的比账单上显示的数额多400美元。</font><br>过度, 过分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has an excess of anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她爱过度地生气。</font><br>\n
excessive	<h3>excessive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>过度的, 过分的; 极度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She takes an excessive interest in clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她过分注重衣着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prices at this hotel are excessive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆的价钱贵得过分。</font><br>\n
exchange	<h3>exchange</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交换, 互换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There have been numerous exchanges of views between the two governments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两国政府间曾多次交换意见。</font><br>兑换, 汇率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose was to halt the rise in the exchange rate of the Swiss franc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 目的在于制止瑞士法郎汇率上涨。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>交换, 互换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You two boys exchange places.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们两个孩子交换一下位置。</font><br>交流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They exchanged experience at the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在会上交流经验。</font><br>\n
excite	<h3>excite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使兴奋, 使激动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This announcement greatly excited us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个通知使我们大为激动。</font><br>激发, 引起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professor's lecture excited our interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个教授讲的课引起了我们的兴趣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This excites crying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这引起了哭泣声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king's cruelty excited the people to rise against him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国王的残酷激起了人民起来反对他。</font><br>\n
excitement	<h3>excitement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>兴奋, 激动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Very great excitement prevails throughout the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全国到处洋溢着极度兴奋的情绪。</font><br>令人兴奋的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Life will seem very quiet after the excitements of our holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 假期一阵兴奋后, 生活会显得很平静。</font><br>\n
exciting	<h3>exciting</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>使人兴奋的, 令人激动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He concentrated his pupils and declared the exciting news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把他的学生集中在一起, 宣布了这条令人兴奋的消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Skiing is more exciting than skating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 滑雪比滑冰更激动人心。</font><br>\n
exclaim	<h3>exclaim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>呼喊, 惊叫, 大声说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She exclaimed in delight when she saw the presents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她见到礼品高兴得叫了起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He exclaimed that it was untrue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声说那不是真的。</font><br>\n
exclude	<h3>exclude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>排除; 不包括在内<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Closing the windows excludes street noises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关窗使街上吵闹的声音不能进来。</font><br>\n
exclusive	<h3>exclusive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>高级的, 奢华的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often goes to the exclusive restaurants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他经常去高级饭馆。</font><br>专用的; 独家的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This bathroom is for the President's exclusive use.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这间浴室是总统专用的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story is exclusive to this newspaper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家报纸独家报道这个材料。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>独家新闻, 独家报道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you pay me ￡ 20, 000, I'll give your paper the story as an exclusive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你如果付给我2万英镑, 我就给你的报纸独家报道这件事。</font><br>\n
excursion	<h3>excursion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>远足, 短途旅行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our class will make an excursion to the seaside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们班将去海边旅行。</font><br>\n
excuse	<h3>excuse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>原谅, 宽恕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cannot come this evening, so he asks you to excuse him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他今晚不能来, 所以他请你原谅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Excuse my taking your umbrella by mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请原谅我错拿了你的伞。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Excuse me, but I don't think that statement is quite true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 不过我认为那话不十分真实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Excuse me, could you tell me the way to the post office?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 请问到邮局走哪条路?</font><br>使免除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That will excuse him another trip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那将省得他再跑一趟。</font><br>为…辩解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He who excuses himself exposes himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 越为自己辩解的人越暴露自己的错误。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>理由, 借口, 辩解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her excuse didn't go down well; no one believed it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的借口不能使人信服, 没有一个人相信它。</font><br>原谅, 饶恕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such conduct admits of no excuse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种行为不容宽恕。</font><br>歉意, 道歉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give my excuses to your mother for having caused her so much trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请代我向你母亲致歉, 我给她添了不少麻烦。</font><br>\n
execute	<h3>execute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>处决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A month or two later they executed the king.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一两个月以后他们处死了国王。</font><br>执行, 实现; 使生效<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Never once did I doubt that I would be able to execute my plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从未怀疑过我能执行自己的计划。</font><br>\n
executive	<h3>executive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>主管, 高级行政人员, 执行官<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good executive usually gets on well with people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个好的高级管理人员通常与人们相处得很好。</font><br>行政部门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The executive has[have] been making decisions about the future of the company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 领导层一直在研究公司未来的决策。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>执行的, 行政的; 有行政能力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The routine office work had all been delegated to his executive staff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一般的办公室工作都已经交给了他的执行人员。</font><br>\n
exemplify	<h3>exemplify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>是…的典型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This painting exemplifies the artist's early style.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画是该画家早期艺术风格的典型。</font><br>例示, 举例证明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He exemplified the use of the word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他举例证明那个词的用法。</font><br>\n
exercise	<h3>exercise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>运动, 锻炼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Moderate exercise will benefit you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 适当的锻炼对你有好处。</font><br>练习, 习题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please do that exercise over again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请重做那个练习。</font><br>演习, 操练<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain set his soldiers various exercises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上尉让他的士兵做各种操练。</font><br>使用, 应用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Voting is the exercise of a civil right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选举是行使公民权利。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>锻炼, 训练; 练习<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every day I exercise before I go to sleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每天睡觉前锻炼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should constantly exercise our muscles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应当经常锻炼肌肉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>运用; 行使<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king cannot exercise much political power.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国王不能行使很多政治权力。</font><br>\n
exert	<h3>exert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用(力); 尽(力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never exerts himself to help anyone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从未尽力帮助别人。</font><br>运用, 发挥, 施加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes to exert his authority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢行使自己的权力。</font><br>\n
exhaust	<h3>exhaust</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>弄空, 取出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You need to exhaust the air in the jar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你需要把瓶中的空气抽尽。</font><br>用尽, 耗尽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They exhausted the funds in a week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一周内耗尽了资金。</font><br>使非常疲倦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The climb will exhaust the boys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爬山会使那些男孩们疲惫不堪的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was exhausted by overwork.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因工作过度而疲惫。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>排气<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>排气装置, 排气管[孔]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The factory has an advanced exhaust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家工厂拥有一套先进的排气装置。</font><br>机器排出的废气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Industrial exhaust must be well treated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业废气必须妥善处理。</font><br>\n
exhibit	<h3>exhibit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>陈列; 展览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Next week those goods will exhibit in that shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个星期, 这些货物将在那家商店展出。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She exhibited her paintings at our school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在我们学校展览绘画。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>显示, 显出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He exhibited great courage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他表现出极大的勇气。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>展览品, 陈列品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't touch the exhibits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要触摸展品。</font><br>在法庭提出的证物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The first exhibit was a knife which the prosecution claimed was the murder weapon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当庭出示的第一件证物是一把刀, 据原告称是谋杀凶器。</font><br>\n
exhibition	<h3>exhibition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>展览, 展览会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She will have an exhibition of her pictures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她将为自己的画作举办一个展览会。</font><br>表现, 显示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The quiz was a good opportunity for the exhibition of his knowledge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次测验是他显示知识的好机会。</font><br>公开示范表演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's an exhibition of pottery-making at the fair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在集市上有陶器制作的示范表演。</font><br>\n
exile	<h3>exile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>流放, 放逐, 使流亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people of the country will exile the king to foreign country next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个月, 这个国家的人民将把这个国王流放到国外去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>流放, 放逐, 流亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Napoleon was sent into exile on an island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拿破仑被流放到一个岛上。</font><br>长期离家[出国]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After an exile of eight years her uncle returned to Cairo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她叔叔背井离乡八年后返回开罗。</font><br>被流放者, 流亡国外者, 背井离乡者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were many French exiles in England after the Revolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法国大革命后, 有许多法国人流亡到英国。</font><br>\n
exist	<h3>exist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>存在, 有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such people do not exist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样的人是不存在的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There exist many sources of energy both potential and kinetic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 存在着许多势能和动能的能源。</font><br>生存, 活下来, 幸存<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man cannot exist without oxygen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人没有氧气就不能生存。</font><br>\n
existence	<h3>existence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>存在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He does not believe in the existence of ghosts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不相信有鬼存在。</font><br>生存, 生活(方式)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trees owe their existence to soil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木靠土壤生存。</font><br>\n
exit	<h3>exit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>出口, 通道, 安全门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Leave the motorway at the next exit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在下一个出口处驶离高速公路。</font><br>退出, 退场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His farewell speech marked his exit from politics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的告别演说是他退出政界的标志。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>离开; 退场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She exited in a hurry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她匆忙离去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the end of the third scene the actress exited.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位女演员在第三场结束时退场。</font><br>\n
expand	<h3>expand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>使…变大, 扩大, 扩张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ranks of the teachers are constantly expanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师队伍日益扩大了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The merchant wants to expand his business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个商人想扩大他的经营。</font><br>伸展, 伸开, 张开, 展开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多花瓣在阳光下绽放。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The eagle expanded its wings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雄鹰展翅。</font><br>\n
expansion	<h3>expansion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>扩大, 扩张, 扩展, 膨胀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heat causes the expansion of gases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 热使气体膨胀。</font><br>扩张物, 膨胀物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His big book is an expansion of the little book he wrote before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他这本大部头的书是在他以前写的一本小册子的基础上扩充而成的。</font><br>\n
expect	<h3>expect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>预料; 预期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She expects to fail the exam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她预料无法通过考试。</font><br>认为(某事)会发生; 认为(某人)会来; 预计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I expect a storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我预计会有一场暴风雨。</font><br>理应得到; 期望, 期待; 期盼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We expect writers to produce more and better works.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们期望作家们写出更多更好的作品。</font><br>猜想; 认为某事是真实的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I expect (that) you are tired from the trip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想你旅途劳顿了吧。</font><br>\n
expectation	<h3>expectation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>预料; 期望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has little expectation of passing the exam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对考试及格不抱希望。</font><br>有信心的指望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His parents have great expectations for his future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父母对他的前途深寄厚望。</font><br>\n
expel	<h3>expel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>驱逐, 赶走, 放逐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They expelled a foreign spy from their country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把一个外国间谍驱逐出境。</font><br>把…除名, 把…开除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was expelled from the club for breaking the rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因违反了规定而被开除出俱乐部。</font><br>排出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whale expelled water from his blowhole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲸鱼从鼻孔排出水。</font><br>\n
