experience	<h3>experience</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>经验, 体验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Experience is the best teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经验是最好的老师。</font><br>经历; 阅历; 感受, 体会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of the others have lived my experiences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有任何人体验过我的经历。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>经历, 体验; 感受, 遭受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She experienced a joy in helping others in trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她感受到了帮助有困难的人带来的快乐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a man who has experienced suffering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个吃过苦的人。</font><br>\n
experiment	<h3>experiment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>实验, 试验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should like to do another experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们倒是很想再做一个实验。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>做试验; 试验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is experimenting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在做实验。</font><br>\n
experimental	<h3>experimental</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>实验(性)的, 试验(性)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This trip will be only experimental.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次旅行只是试验性的。</font><br>\n
expert	<h3>expert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>专家, 能手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cook was an expert at making sauces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位厨师是调制味汁的能手。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>专家的, 内行的, 熟练的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To her expert eye, the painting was terrible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以她内行的眼光看, 这幅画糟透了。</font><br>\n
explain	<h3>explain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>讲解, 解释<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You needn't explain any more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不必再解释了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He explained that he had to leave at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他解释说他必须立即离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp UFOs are often explained as supernatural.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不明飞行物常常被解释为超自然现象。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>说明…的原因; 辩解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please explain this rule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这条规定说明一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please explain where to begin and how to do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请说明从什么地方开始, 以及如何做。</font><br>\n
explanation	<h3>explanation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>解释, 说明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will find the explanation in the encyclopedia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以在百科全书中找到解释。</font><br>能说明某事缘由的言语、事实、情况等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His explanations are always difficult to believe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说的总是令人难以相信。</font><br>\n
explicit	<h3>explicit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>详述的, 明确的, 明晰的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an explicit statement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这句话说得很明确。</font><br>直言的, 毫不隐瞒的, 露骨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was quite explicit about why she left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对自己离去的原因直言不讳。</font><br>\n
explode	<h3>explode</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)爆炸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bomb exploded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炸弹爆炸了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Steam pressure exploded the boiler.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蒸汽的压力使锅炉爆炸了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>爆[突]发, 发怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last his laughter exploded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他最后哄然大笑起来。</font><br>激增, 迅速扩大<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The population was still exploding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人口仍在迅猛增长。</font><br>\n
exploit	<h3>exploit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>开采; 开发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many countries exploit oil under the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多国家在海底开采石油。</font><br>剥削<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>业绩, 功绩, 功勋, 事迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He performed many daring exploits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有过很多英勇事迹。</font><br>\n
explore	<h3>explore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>勘查, 探测, 勘探<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As soon as they arrived in the town they went out to explore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一到这城镇就外出察看周围环境。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were exploring the Amazon jungle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正对亚马逊丛林进行勘察。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>探索; 探究; 仔细查看<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must explore all the possibilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须探讨所有的可能性。</font><br>\n
explosion	<h3>explosion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爆炸; 爆发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The missile warhead hit the target, effecting a nuclear explosion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 导弹头命中目标, 完成了一次核爆炸。</font><br>激增, 扩大<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can we account for the recent population explosion?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们如何能解释最近人口激增的现象?</font><br>\n
explosive	<h3>explosive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>爆炸的, 爆发的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A gas pipe was explosive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个煤气管爆炸了。</font><br>极易引起争论的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Race relations are an explosive issue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 种族关系是一个极易引起争论的问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爆炸物, 炸药<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dynamite is an explosive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炸药是爆炸物。</font><br>\n
export	<h3>export</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>出口, 输出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We now export all kinds of industrial products.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们现在出口各种工业产品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>输出, 出口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These cars are made for export.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些汽车是为出口而生产的。</font><br>输出[出口]物<br>\n
expose	<h3>expose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>曝光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This film has been exposed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这胶卷已经曝光了。</font><br>暴露; 显露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp New fashions are exposing more and more the body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新式服装越来越露。</font><br>揭露, 袒露<br>\n
exposure	<h3>exposure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>暴露, 显露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After only a short exposure to sunlight he began to turn red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在阳光下只晒了一会儿, 皮肤就开始变红了。</font><br>揭发, 揭露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I threatened them with public exposure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我扬言要公开揭发他们。</font><br>(软片等)曝光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An exposure of one-hundredth of a second will be enough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 曝光百分之一秒就够了。</font><br>\n
express	<h3>express</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>表达, 表示, 陈述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He expressed his views at the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在会上发表了自己的观点。</font><br>特快发送, 快运<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've expressed the package.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已将包裹以快件寄出了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>快车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That evening they saw her get on the No.12 special express to London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天晚上他们看见她上了开往伦敦的12次特快车。</font><br>〈英〉快运<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>特快的, 高速的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Express mail service has just begun in this town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个小城, 特快专递服务刚刚开始。</font><br>〈正〉明确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is an express provision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一项明文条款。</font><br>丝毫不差的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the express image of his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他酷似他的父亲。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>用快递方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parcel was sent express.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这包裹是用快递方式寄出去的。</font><br>\n
expression	<h3>expression</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>表示, 表现, 表达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He closed his letter with expression of grateful thanks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在那封信的结尾表达了自己的感激之情。</font><br>表情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All their expressions were not true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们所有的表情都不是真的。</font><br>感情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her voice lacked expression.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的声音缺乏感情。</font><br>词, 措辞, 词组<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fashionable remarks of today often become the commonplace expressions of tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天的时髦话往往变成明天的陈词滥调。</font><br>\n

extension	<h3>extension</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>延伸, 扩展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupils disliked the extension of the term.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小学生们不愿延长学期。</font><br>增加部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our extension is nearly finished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的扩建部分已接近完工。</font><br>电话分机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are telephone extensions in every room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个房间都有电话分机。</font><br>\n

external	<h3>external</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外面的, 外部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The external layer of skin is called the epidermis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 皮肤的外层叫表皮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The engine is external to the boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发动机在船舷之外。</font><br>外观的, 表面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The external features of the building are very attractive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座建筑物的外观是很吸引人的。</font><br>外国的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The internal affairs of any state, whether it's big or small, do not allow of external interference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国家虽有大小, 但它的内政是不容许外国干涉的。</font><br>\n

extra	<h3>extra</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>额外的, 外加的, 附加的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship was loaded down with extra cargo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船上又额外加装了货物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Room service is extra.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房价不含小费。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>另外收费的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At this hotel a hot bath is an extra.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这家旅店, 热水浴另外收费。</font><br>拍电影时的临时演员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need a thousand extras for big crowd scene.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在拍摄群众大场面时, 我们需要上千名临时演员。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>特别地, 非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought an extra large cake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一块非常大的蛋糕。</font><br>\n
extraordinary	<h3>extraordinary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>非常奇怪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What an extraordinary hat!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么奇特的帽子呀！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is very extraordinary that I should meet him here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很奇怪, 我在这儿碰上他了。</font><br>非同寻常的, 特别的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A trunk is extraordinary long!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 象的鼻子特别的长！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her strength of will was extraordinary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的意志力是非凡的。</font><br>额外安排的, 临时的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There will be an extraordinary meeting next Wednesday to discuss the emergency resolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下星期三将有一个额外安排的会议专门讨论紧急决议。</font><br>\n
extreme	<h3>extreme</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>尽头的, 末端的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lived on the extreme edge of the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她住在森林的最边缘。</font><br>极度的, 极端的; 过激的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His views are rather extreme.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的见解相当偏激。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>极端, 过分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joy and grief are extremes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 喜与悲都是极端。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not tolerate the extremes of heat in the desert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他忍受不住沙漠的酷热。</font><br>\n
eye	<h3>eye</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>眼睛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The eyes, nose and mouth are parts of the face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼、鼻子、嘴都是脸的组成部分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost an eye in the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在战争中失去一只眼睛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have light skin and blue eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们有白皙的皮肤和蓝色的眼睛。</font><br>视力, 眼力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has sharp eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她视力极好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把目光从可怕的景象上移开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a good eye for beauty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对美有很好的鉴赏力。</font><br>见解, 观点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To modern eyes, such doctrines appear harsh, even cruel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从现代的角度看, 这样的教义显得苛刻, 甚至残酷。</font><br>眼状物<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>定睛地看, 盯着<br>\n
eyesight	<h3>eyesight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>视力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have good eyesight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的视力很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her eyesight grew so bad that she could hardly see.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的视力变得很糟, 几乎什么也看不见了。</font><br>\n

face	<h3>face</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>脸, 面孔<br>面容, 面部表情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their faces were pinched with grief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的面容因悲伤而憔悴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children's faces were brightened up when they saw their parents appear at the gate of the kindergarten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当孩子们看到家长们出现在幼儿园门口时, 都喜形于色。</font><br>外表, 外貌<br>表面, 正面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A dice has six faces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骰子有六个面。</font><br>面子, 威严<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>面对, 面向…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the houses there face south.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那里所有房子都朝南。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned and faced us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他转过身面向我们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sat on Mother's right, facing Mary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坐到妈妈右边, 脸朝着玛丽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He feels nervous when he faces so many people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面对那么多人, 他感到紧张。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat facing the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他面对着门坐着。</font><br>正视; 承认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was prepared to face the consequences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他准备承担后果。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>面临…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He faced being isolated from society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他面临被社会抛弃的危险。</font><br>\n

fade	<h3>fade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)褪去, (使)变弱, (使)枯萎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will the colour in this material fade?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种料子褪色吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king is fading fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国王的身体很快就衰弱了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>逐渐消失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His hopes faded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的希望破灭了。</font><br>\n
fail	<h3>fail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>在…中失败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He failed to pass the examination through carelessness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于粗心, 他考试没及格。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>衰退, 衰弱<br>破产<br>不足, 短缺, 缺乏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The oil supply failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 石油供给不足。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>辜负<br>忘记, 忽视, 未能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car failed to climb the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆小汽车没能爬上山去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>考试不及格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some college courses are graded in terms of either a pass or a fail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些大学课程按及格或不及格评分。</font><br>\n
failure	<h3>failure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>失败, 不成功<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Failure teaches success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失败是成功之母。</font><br>失败的人[事]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As a writer, he was a complete failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为一个作家, 他是个完全失败的人。</font><br>未执行, 未实现, 未运转<br>无法继续经营, 倒闭<br>\n
faint	<h3>faint</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>晕倒, 昏倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young soldier fainted in the hot sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻的士兵在炎炎烈日下晕了过去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>微弱的, 模糊的, 暗淡的<br>(体力)无力的, 虚弱的; 易失去知觉的, 昏眩的<br>(动作等)无力的, 似无太大效果的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sounds of music grew fainter in the distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐的声音在远处逐渐变得微弱了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>昏倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He recovered from a faint.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从昏厥中苏醒过来。</font><br>\n
fair	<h3>fair</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>公平的, 公正的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The umpire's duty is to see that competition is fair play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁判员的职责是监督双方进行公平竞争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's fair of you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你干得很公正。</font><br>中等的, 尚可的, 不错的<br>晴朗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We met on a fair day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在一个晴朗的日子见面了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather will be fair tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明天天气晴朗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>公正地, 直接地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ball hit him fair in the head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球不偏不倚, 正打在他的头部。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speaks fair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讲话彬彬有礼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>集市<br>\n
fairly	<h3>fairly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>公平地, 诚实地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think I was quite fairly treated by the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为警察对我非常公正。</font><br>相当地, 适度地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a fairly easy book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一本相当容易的书。</font><br>完全地, 简直<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It fairly destroyed the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它将那部机器完全毁了。</font><br>\n
fairy	<h3>fairy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>仙人, 小仙子, 小精灵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his dream, he became a fairy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在梦中, 他变成了一个小精灵。</font><br>\n
faith	<h3>faith</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信任; 信仰; 信心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Faith that justice would prevail impelled us forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 正义必胜的信念激励着我们前进。</font><br>宗教信仰<br>\n
faithful	<h3>faithful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>忠实的, 守信的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are all faithful listeners to the program.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都是这档节目的忠实听众。</font><br>如实的, 可靠的, 忠于原文的<br>忠贞的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was always faithful to her husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对她的丈夫一直忠贞不渝。</font><br>\n
fake	<h3>fake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>伪造, 篡改, 对…做手脚<br>仿造<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>假装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I thought he was really hurt but he was faking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我原以为他真的受伤了, 不料他只是在装样子而已。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>骗子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked like a postman but he was really a fake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看上去像个邮递员, 但实际上是个骗子。</font><br>赝品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We thought it was a genuine antique, but it turned out to be a fake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们以为这是真古董, 结果只是一件赝品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>假的, 冒充的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are fake diamonds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是假钻石。</font><br>\n
fall	<h3>fall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>降落, 落下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The leaves begin to fall when autumn comes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 秋天来临时, 树叶开始落下。</font><br>跌倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Babies often fall when they are learning to walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 幼儿学步时常会跌跤。</font><br>降低, 减退<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The barometer is falling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气压正在下降。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind fell during the night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜里风力减弱了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water in the river has fallen two feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 河水水位下降了二英尺。</font><br>来临, 降临<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Darkness was falling fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天很快黑了下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sudden silence fell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 突然静了下来。</font><br>失势, 垮台<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy strongholds fell one after another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌方据点相继被攻破。</font><br>沦陷, 失守<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city fell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市沦陷了。</font><br>下垂; 倾斜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her eyes fell before his steady gaze.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在他的逼视下, 她双目低垂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old house fell into decay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那幢旧房子腐朽了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>成为, 变为; 进入…状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One after another, all of them fell asleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些人一个接一个地睡着了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Suddenly he fell ill and ran a high fever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他突然病倒, 发起高烧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fell prey to her charms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被她的美色所迷倒。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跌落, 下落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He survived a fall of 40 feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从40英尺高的地方跌下来没有丧命。</font><br>下降, 降低, 减少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a sudden fall in temperature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气温一下子降低了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a fall in the price of apples.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 苹果的价格下跌了。</font><br>掉落的距离, 落差<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a fall of 60 metres to the foot of the cliff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从这儿到悬崖之底距离60米。</font><br>陷落; 垮台; 灭亡; 没落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pride goes before a fall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骄兵必败。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fall of the city followed heavy bombardment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 城市受到猛烈轰炸后沦陷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That debate led to the government's fall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那场辩论导致政府垮台。</font><br>堕落, 沦落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play was about the fall of an honest man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个剧本描写一个诚实的人堕落的故事。</font><br>瀑布<br>〈美〉秋天<br>\n
false	<h3>false</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不真实的, 错误的<br>假的, 伪造的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actor in role of an old man wears false whiskers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 扮演老头的演员戴着假胡子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think his documents are false.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他的证件是伪造的。</font><br>不忠实的, 虚伪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They obtained money under the false pretenses of patriotism.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以虚伪的爱国主义为借口获得金钱。</font><br>\n
fame	<h3>fame</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>名声, 名望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her chief fame rests on her several films.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的名声主要来自她的几部影片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a woman of ill fame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个名声不好的女人。</font><br>\n
familiar	<h3>familiar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>熟悉的, 通晓的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man seemed familiar, but I could not quite place him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这人很面熟, 但是我记不清在哪儿见过他。</font><br>冒昧的, 放肆的<br>随便的, 非正式的<br>\n
family	<h3>family</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>家, 家庭<br>子女<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a large family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他孩子众多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We won't have a family until we've been married a few years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们打算结婚几年后再要孩子。</font><br>家族, 氏族<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The royal family consists of the king and queen and their relatives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 王室成员包括国王、王后及其亲属。</font><br>语族, 语系<br>(动植物的)科<br>\n
famine	<h3>famine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>饥荒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people die of starvation during famines every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每年发生饥荒时都有许多人饿死。</font><br>\n
famous	<h3>famous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>著名的, 出名的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is famous at fencing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他长于击剑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is famous as a writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是著名的作家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shef-field is famous for its cutlery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谢菲尔德以餐具闻名。</font><br>\n
fan	<h3>fan</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>扇子; 风扇; 扇形物<br>狂热爱好者, 迷<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>扇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She fanned her face with a newspaper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用报纸朝脸上扇风。</font><br>\n
fancy	<h3>fancy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>想像, 设想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you fancy yourself on the moon?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能想像自己登上月球是怎样一种情景吗?</font><br>想要, 喜欢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't fancy this place at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一点也不喜欢这个地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't fancy swimming in that river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢在那条河里游泳。</font><br>猜想, 以为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “He had no clothes on.”“I fancy so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“他没穿衣服。”“我想是这样。”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She fancied herself nervous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她自以为神经衰弱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>设想, 空想, 幻想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He indulged in idle fancy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他沉溺于幻想之中。</font><br>想像力, 幻想力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children usually have lively fancy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 儿童往往有丰富的想像力。</font><br>爱好, 迷恋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a fancy for some wine with my dinner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢在晚餐时喝点酒。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>昂贵的, 高档的<br>别致的, 花式的, 花哨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dress is too fancy for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件服装我穿太花哨了。</font><br>\n
fantastic	<h3>fantastic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>荒诞的, 奇异的, 古怪的<br>极大的, 异乎寻常的<br>极好的, 极出色的, 了不起的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a fantastic goal!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这球进得多漂亮！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you heard his new opera? It is fantastic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你听过他的新歌剧吗?那好极了。</font><br>\n
fantasy	<h3>fantasy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>想像, 幻想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone should indulge in fantasy on occasion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个人都应偶尔沉浸在想像之中。</font><br>空想的产物, 怪念头<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>想像, 幻想<br>\n
far	<h3>far</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>到很远距离, 遥远地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you come far?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是远道而来的吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live into far beyond the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们住在山那一边很远的地方。</font><br>久远地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's fallen far behind in his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的工作远远没有做完。</font><br>到很大程度, 很, 极<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is far different.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书很不一样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These jokes would be far too difficult to translate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些笑话也许极其难译。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Automobile accidents are far too common.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车事故太常见了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>远的, 遥远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I long to travel to far places.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我渴望去远方旅行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp France is far from China.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法国离中国很远。</font><br>\n
fare	<h3>fare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>费, 票价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A single fare is 170 dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 单程票价为170美元。</font><br>乘客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The taxi driver stopped to pick up a fare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 出租车司机停车让一个乘客上车。</font><br>食物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fare here is simple but good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里的伙食简单而可口。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吃, 进食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She fared plainly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她吃得很简单。</font><br>进展, 遭遇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think I fared quite well in the interview.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得我这次面试情况不错。</font><br>\n
farewell	<h3>farewell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>告别, 欢送<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made his farewell to his family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向他的家人告别。</font><br>\n
farm	<h3>farm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>农田, 农场; 饲养场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives on a farm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在农场里住。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>耕作, 经营农场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is farming in Africa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在非洲经营农场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He farmed in the south for many years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾在南方务农多年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They should farm the land instead of letting it lie waste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们应当在这块地里种庄稼, 不要让它荒了。</font><br>\n
farmer	<h3>farmer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>农场主, 农民<br>\n
farther	<h3>farther</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>更远地, 较远地, 再往前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shall we go farther?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们去更远的地方好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can throw the ball farther than you can.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个球我能比你扔得远。</font><br>在更大程度上, 进一步<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>更远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farther hill is five kilometres away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那座更远的小山在五公里以外。</font><br>\n
fascinate	<h3>fascinate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使着迷, 使极感兴趣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her beauty fascinated every boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的美貌使所有的男孩子都着了迷。</font><br>慑住…使动弹不得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The serpent fascinated its prey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条蛇震慑住了它要捕食的动物。</font><br>\n
fascinating	<h3>fascinating</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>迷人的, 有极大吸引力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The changing vivid colours of the sunset are really fascinating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 日落时变化多端的色彩确实使人心醉神迷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your ideas are fascinating to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的这些主意对我来说是有吸引力的。</font><br>\n
fashion	<h3>fashion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方式, 样子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walks in a peculiar fashion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他走路的样子很奇特。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did it in his own fashion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他按照自己的方式做了。</font><br>流行款式, 时尚款式, 时装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed in the latest fashion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着最新时装。</font><br>\n
fashionable	<h3>fashionable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>流行的, 符合时尚的, 时髦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We ate at a fashionable new restaurant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在一家新开张的时尚餐馆吃饭。</font><br>\n
fast	<h3>fast</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>快的, 迅速的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a fast weaver and the cloth was very good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她织布织得很快, 而且布的质量很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're very fast, aren't you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你动作很快, 对吧?</font><br>紧紧的, 牢固的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing can undermine their fast friendship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有什么能破坏他们忠实的友谊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the window fast?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗子关紧了吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>快地, 迅速地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was running so fast that he couldn't stop himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他跑得太快了, 一下子停不下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't speak so fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要说得那么快。</font><br>紧紧地, 牢固地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boat was stuck fast in the mud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘船深深地陷在泥里。</font><br>\n
fasten	<h3>fasten</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>系紧, 拴牢<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>闩住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door will not fasten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这门关不上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shut the door and fastened the bolt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我关上门, 拴上插销。</font><br>\n
fat	<h3>fat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>多脂肪的, 肥胖的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fat man has much more flesh than a thin man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 胖子比瘦子肉多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby is fat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这婴儿很胖。</font><br>丰富的, 大量的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sale netted a fat profit for the company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次销售为公司赚得了丰厚的利润。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>脂肪, 油脂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pig stores a lot of fat in its body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猪在体内储存了大量的脂肪。</font><br>肥肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She can't eat fat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不能吃肥肉。</font><br>\n
fatal	<h3>fatal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>致命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her children's death is a fatal blow on her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们的死对她是致命的打击。</font><br>灾难性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It would be fatal to bring in outsider.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把外人引进来可能招致灾难。</font><br>重大的, 决定性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I made the fatal mistake of letting her talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我让她讲话是犯了严重的错误。</font><br>\n
fate	<h3>fate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>命运<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't believe in fate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不相信命运。</font><br>死亡, 毁灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those evil men met with a terrible fate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些坏人都罪有应得。</font><br>\n
father	<h3>father</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>父亲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father carries on a trade in silk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲经营丝绸生意。</font><br>祖先, 先辈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy from America said his fathers were Chinese.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个来自美国的男孩说他的祖先是中国人。</font><br>创始人, 奠基人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Graham Bell was the father of telephone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 格雷汉姆 · 贝尔是电话的发明人。</font><br>\n

favour	<h3>favour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>喜爱, 宠爱; 好感; 赞同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He soon won the favour of his boss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很快赢得了老板的好感。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mother shouldn't show too much favour to one of her children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲不应该对一个孩子表现出过多的宠爱。</font><br>偏袒, 偏爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must decline to show favour to any of the candidates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须拒绝偏袒任何一位候选人。</font><br>善行, 恩惠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate asking favours of people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不愿求别人给予照顾。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>喜爱, 偏爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher favours serious students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师喜欢认真的学生。</font><br>赞同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He favours peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他赞成和平。</font><br>有利于, 便于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hot climate and plentiful rainfall favour the growth of plants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炎热的气候和充足的雨水有助于植物生长。</font><br>容貌像…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone said that the child favoured his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家都说这孩子像他父亲。</font><br>\n

fear	<h3>fear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>害怕, 恐惧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He couldn't move for fear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他害怕得动弹不得。</font><br>可能性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no fear of that happening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那事绝不可能发生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>畏惧, 害怕, 担心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not fear to die.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不怕死。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Experts fear that there will be new outbreak of the disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 专家们担心这种疾病会再度流行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>害怕, 忧虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Never fear—I will hold your hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别怕, 我会握住你的手。</font><br>\n
fearful	<h3>fearful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>惧怕的, 担心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nurse on duty was fearful that the patient should get worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 值班的护士担心病人的病情会恶化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were fearful of tackling him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们害怕与他打交道。</font><br>可怕的, 吓人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have ever witnessed a fearful accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我曾目睹一场可怕的事故。</font><br>〈口〉极端的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a fearful waste of time!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简直太浪费时间了！</font><br>\n

feed	<h3>feed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>喂养, 为…提供食物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I fed the birds yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我喂过鸟了。</font><br>向…提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tried to feed me a false line about unexpected extra expenses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们试图向我提供假情况来解释那些意想不到的额外开支。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吃, 以…为食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cattle feed chiefly on grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛主要以草为食。</font><br>\n
feedback	<h3>feedback</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>反馈, 反馈信息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The more feedback we get from viewers, the better.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从观众那儿得到的反馈越多越好。</font><br>\n
feel	<h3>feel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>触, 摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Blind persons can often recognize objects by feeling them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盲人常凭触摸识别物体。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi. & link v.</i></font><br>由触摸而得知[感觉到]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cotton feels soft.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 棉花摸上去很柔软。</font><br>觉得, 认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How do you feel today?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天你感觉怎样?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>感觉, 手感<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't you like the feel of this material?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 难道你不喜欢这种材料的手感吗?</font><br>触, 摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let us have a feel inside the bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们在袋子里边摸一摸。</font><br>直觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must develop a feel for words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们必须养成用字的直觉。</font><br>\n
feeling	<h3>feeling</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>知觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've lost all feeling in my hands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的双手失去了知觉。</font><br>感觉, 感触<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had an uneasy feeling that they were still following her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一种他们仍在跟踪她的感觉。</font><br>态度, 看法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There seems to be a general feeling that the election will be held in June.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 似乎普遍的看法是这次选举将在六月份举行。</font><br>同情, 体谅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has no feeling for the suffering of others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对别人的痛苦没有同情心。</font><br>激情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spoke with feeling(s) about the high rate of unemployment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他针对高失业率慷慨陈词。</font><br>感情, 情绪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His abrupt reply hurt our feelings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他粗鲁的回答伤了我们的感情。</font><br>\n
fellow	<h3>fellow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>男子; 小伙子, 家伙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I consider him to be a clever fellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他是个聪明的小伙子。</font><br>(大学的)研究员, (学术团体的)会员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Kehr is a fellow of the Royal Society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 凯尔是皇家学会会员。</font><br>同伴, 同志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her fellows share her interest in computers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的同伴跟她一样对计算机感兴趣。</font><br>\n
female	<h3>female</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>女性的, 雌性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We only employ female workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们只雇用女工。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The animal in the picture was a female elephant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 照片上的动物是头母象。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雌性动物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The males in the herd protect the females and the young.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兽中的雄性动物保护雌性动物和幼崽。</font><br>女人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a slatternly female.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个懒婆娘。</font><br>\n
fence	<h3>fence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>栅栏, 篱笆; 围墙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They put a fence around the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在园子的周围建起了篱笆。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>围以栅栏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Farmers fence their fields.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农民用栅栏来防护他们的田园。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>保护, 防御, 周旋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fences well, as she had noticed before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 正如她以前观察到的一样, 他善于周旋。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>击剑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm learning how to fence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在学击剑。</font><br>\n
fertile	<h3>fertile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>多产的, 富饶的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Plants grow well in fertile soil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 植物在肥沃的土壤里长势良好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The district is fertile of wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该地区盛产小麦。</font><br>\n
fertilizer	<h3>fertilizer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肥料, 化肥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Get some more fertilizer for the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给花园再多施些肥料。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peasant bought a bag of chemical fertilizer in the market place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位农民在集市上买了一袋化肥。</font><br>\n
festival	<h3>festival</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>节日, 节期, 喜庆日<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We spent most of the Spring Festival at home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 春节的大部分时间我们都在家过的。</font><br>\n
fetch	<h3>fetch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>接来(某人), 取来(某物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you fetched the doctor?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把医生接来了吗?</font><br>使发出; 吸引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The beauty of the lake fetched her completely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 湖上的美景把她完全吸引住了。</font><br>售得(若干价钱)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How much do you suppose these old books would fetch?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看这些旧书能卖多少钱?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>抵达, 到达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fetched home after his long ride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骑了很久之后他回到了家。</font><br>\n
fever	<h3>fever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发烧, 热度<br>一时的狂热<br>\n
few	<h3>few</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不多的, 很少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of few words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个沉默寡言的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Changes in policy were few.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政策很少变化。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>少数, 很少, 几个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only[So] few of them care to sing a song.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没几个人愿意去唱支歌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some few of the students are absent today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些同学今天缺席。</font><br>\n

fibre	<h3>fibre</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(动植物的)纤维<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The muscle fibre of this animal is diseased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个动物的肌肉纤维产生了病变。</font><br>纤维质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Eating cereals and fruit will give you plenty of fibre in your diet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吃谷类食物和水果能多摄取纤维质。</font><br>\n
fiction	<h3>fiction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He prefers light fictions to serious novels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比起严肃小说来, 他更为喜欢轻松的小说。</font><br>虚构的或想像出的事, 并非完全真实的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her story was a pure fiction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的故事纯属虚构。</font><br>\n
field	<h3>field</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>田, 地, 牧场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are working in the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在地里干活。</font><br>(作某种用途的)场地, 场所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll find Billy on the football field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在足球场上能找到比利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't want to lose his life in[on] the battle field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不想在战场上送命。</font><br>(矿物的)产地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Capital construction is under way at several gas fields.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几个天然气田正在进行基本建设。</font><br>(学习或研究的)领域<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What are his main fields of interest?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他感兴趣的主要领域是什么?</font><br>\n
fierce	<h3>fierce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>凶猛的; 凶狠的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is guarded by a fierce dog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这栋房子由一条凶犬看守。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A wounded lion can be fierce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 受伤的狮子会变得很凶猛。</font><br>强烈的, 极度的; 酷烈的, 激烈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What he said met with fierce opposition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话语遭到激烈反对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This heat is really fierce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样的高温真叫人难受。</font><br>\n
fifteen	<h3>fifteen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>num.</i></font><br>十五<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were fifteen of us present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有十五个人出席。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>十五的<br>十五岁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My younger brother is fifteen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我弟弟十五岁。</font><br>\n

fight	<h3>fight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>战斗, 斗争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fought his bravest (war).</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打得最勇敢。</font><br>打架, 吵架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When dogs fight, they use their teeth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗打架时用牙齿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can fight him, but can you beat him?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以打他, 但是你能击败他吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>打架, 吵架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jim was able to hold back his anger and avoid a fight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吉姆总算抑制住了愤怒, 从而避免了一场殴斗。</font><br>战斗, 斗争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are determined to persevere in the fight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决心坚持战斗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fight against drug abuse goes on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 反对吸毒的斗争在继续。</font><br>斗志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's not much fight left in him now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他现在已没多少斗志了。</font><br>\n
figure	<h3>figure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>数字<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The above figure did not include workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上面的数字没有包括工人。</font><br>图解, 图表; 装饰性的图案<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The figure on page 22 shows a political map of Africa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第22页的插图是非洲的政区图。</font><br>人或动物的像, 画像, 肖像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a group of figures on the left of the painting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画的左方是一群人像。</font><br>轮廓, 人影, 身材, 体态, 风姿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I made out three figures moving in the distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我隐约看出远处有三个人影在移动。</font><br>算术, 计算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you good at figures?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的算术好吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>出现, 被提及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His name figured among the guests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宾客名单中有他的名字。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>计算在内<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Figure the total and I'll pay it with a cheque.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把总数算出来, 我用支票支付。</font><br>估计, 有可能; 认为, 料想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I figured that you wouldn't come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我料想你不会来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He figured himself as a good candidate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为自己是合适的人选。</font><br>\n
file	<h3>file</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…归档<br>提交(申请等), 呈递<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They filed an application to have their case heard early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们申请早日审理他们的案子。</font><br>用锉锉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was filing her nails.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在锉指甲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He filed the wood smooth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把木头锉光滑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>排成纵队前进<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>文件夹, 公文箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fran came in holding a blue file.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 弗兰拿着一个蓝色的文件夹进来了。</font><br>卷宗, 文件; 计算机文件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put this letter in the main file.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将这函件放入文卷总档中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't access the file on your company because I've forgotten the code.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法读取贵公司的文件, 因为我把计算机的密码忘了。</font><br>纵列<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers were walking in single file.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战士们排成一列纵队前进。</font><br>\n
fill	<h3>fill</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)充满, (使)装满, 填满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hall soon filled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大厅里很快挤满了人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you fill me a bucket of water, please?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我打一桶水好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I filled all my pockets full.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把所有的口袋都装满了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>满足<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This should fill your requirements nicely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这将大大地满足你的要求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please fill this glass for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这个杯子给我倒满。</font><br>任职<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lucy is the best person to fill this secretary vacancy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 露西是秘书这个空缺的最佳人选。</font><br>配药<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her main job was filling the doctor's prescriptions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的主要工作就是给大夫开的药方配药。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>填满…的量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you like a fill of my tobacco?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 想抽一斗我的烟吗?</font><br>充分, 足够<br>\n
film	<h3>film</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>影片, 电影<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film reminded me of my school life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部电影使我想起了我的学校生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those film fans were waiting at the ticket office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些影迷们正在售票处门口等着。</font><br>胶片, 胶卷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole incident was recorded on film.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个事件都记录在胶片上了。</font><br>薄层, 薄膜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a film of mist over the land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大地上笼罩着一层薄雾。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)拍摄(成)电影[电视等]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story won't film well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部小说不宜拍成影片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom filmed his daughter playing in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆把他的女儿在公园嬉戏的镜头拍摄了下来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(给…)覆上一薄层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thin ice filmed the lake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 湖上结了一层薄冰。</font><br>\n

final	<h3>final</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最后的, 最终的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are hopeful of our final victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对我们的最后胜利抱有希望。</font><br>决定性的, 确定性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The judge's ruling is final.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官的判决是终审判决。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>决赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have reached the finals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已进入决赛。</font><br>(大学的)期终考试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cage is studying for the English finals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 凯奇正在准备英语期终考试。</font><br>\n

find	<h3>find</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>找到, 发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have found the lost book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已经找到丢失的书了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He found that the method worked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发现这方法行得通。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please find Mary her bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请替玛丽找到她的提包。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She said she would find an electrician for us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她说她要给我们找一个电工技师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He couldn't find it in his heart abandoning her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发现他不能忘记她。</font><br>发觉, 感到, 认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you find him what he wanted?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你觉得他想要什么?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary tried several lines of work, but at last found herself as a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽尝试了好几种工作, 最后她认为自己适合当教师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have found the farm (to) do well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们感觉到这个农场经营得好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I found my headache coming on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得头开始疼起来了。</font><br>到达; 努力获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What do you find the total?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要求的总数是多少?</font><br>供给, 供应; 知道…是有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't find that amount of money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能提供那笔款子。</font><br>〈律〉判决, 裁决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jury found against the plaintiff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 陪审团做出不利于原告的判决。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That old book is quite a find.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那本古书是一个重大发现。</font><br>发现物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new finds have deepened our knowledge of giant ape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的发现物加深了我们对巨猿的认识。</font><br>\n
finding	<h3>finding</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发现物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such a finding as this exquisite antique is rare indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 像这样一件精美古物的发现确实少有。</font><br>调查(或研究)的结果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee reported its findings after a thorough investigation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会在彻底调查以后报告了调查结果。</font><br>〈律〉(陪审团的)裁决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The findings of the court will be published on Wednesday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法院的判决将于星期三公布。</font><br>\n
fine	<h3>fine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>美好的, 优秀的, 优良的, 杰出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was no doubt that he was a fine scholar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毫无疑问, 他是位杰出的学者。</font><br>纤细的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She likes to use pencils with fine points; I don't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她喜欢用笔头尖细的铅笔, 我不喜欢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sand is finer than gravel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沙子比碎石细。</font><br>细致的; 细微的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The law makes fine distinctions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律做出细致的区别。</font><br>晴朗的, 无雨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a fine weather for outdoor sports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气很好, 有利于户外运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fine day makes us cheerful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 晴朗的日子使我们愉快。</font><br>健康的, 舒适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel fine today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今天感觉很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This apartment's fine for two people, but not more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这套房子两个人住挺舒适, 但人再多就不行了。</font><br>过分夸饰的, 炫耀的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is too much of a fine lady for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对我来说, 她显得过于文雅。</font><br>可怕的, 糟透的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your shoes will be in a fine state if you walk in the mud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是在泥里走路, 你的鞋就会弄得很糟糕。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>很好, 不错<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is your son doing fine in school?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你儿子在学校学习好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shirt suits me fine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那件衬衫很适合我。</font><br>细微地, 精巧地<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>转晴; (使)变纯, (使)澄清<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ale will fine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 啤酒会变清的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before the beer can be bottled it has to be fined.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 啤酒在装瓶之前要使其澄清。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使精细, 使精炼<br>处…以罚金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They fined him heavily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们重罚了他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They fined him ten dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们判他10美元罚金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>罚款, 罚金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People who walk on the grass are liable to a fine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在草坪上行走要受罚。</font><br>\n
finger	<h3>finger</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手指<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are five fingers on each hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每只手有五个手指。</font><br>指状物<br>指幅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She poured herself three fingers of whisky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给自己倒了三指深的威士忌。</font><br>\n
finish	<h3>finish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>结束, 完成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll never finish if we go on at this rate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以这样的速度, 我们永远也完不成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must hurry up or you cannot finish it in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须赶紧些, 否则不能及时完成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Place the book back where you found it when you have finished reading it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看完后把书放回原处。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结束, 完成, 最后阶段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gives the last finish to the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对这桌子进行最后的加工。</font><br>\n
fire	<h3>fire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>火<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Paper is apt to catch fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纸容易着火。</font><br>火灾; 炉火, 火堆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fire broke out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发生了一场火灾。</font><br>射击, 炮火, 火力<br>热情, 怒火, 热心<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>开火; 射击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ordered his men to fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他命令他的士兵开枪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>〈口〉解雇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager fired Bob because he was always late for work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲍勃因上班总迟到而被经理解雇。</font><br>\n
fireman	<h3>fireman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>消防队员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw a fireman racing to the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看见一个消防队员冲入了火中。</font><br>司炉工, 烧火工人<br>\n

firm	<h3>firm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>结实的, 坚硬的, 牢固的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The runner has firm muscles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个赛跑运动员有一身结实的肌肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His muscles are very firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的肌肉很结实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This wet ground is not firm enough to walk on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块湿地不够坚实, 不能在上面走。</font><br>坚定不移的, 矢志不渝的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our offer was met with a firm refusal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的报价被坚决拒绝。</font><br>强有力的; 坚信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He kept a firm hold on my arm as he helped me over the fence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有力地拉着我的手臂, 帮我越过栅栏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm a firm believer in always telling the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我坚信应该总说真话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)坚硬[稳固]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jelly firmed quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 果冻迅速坚硬起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reshuffled the cabinet to firm his government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他重新改组内阁以强化其政府。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公司, 商行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The firm has agreed to give me a two weeks' holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司已经同意给我两个星期的假。</font><br>\n
first	<h3>first</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>第一(个人或事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm the first in my family to go to university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是我们家第一个大学生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>第一, 最早, 首先<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp First, let me deal with the most important difficulty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 首先, 让我来处理最为重要的困难。</font><br>首次<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All mothers fear for their children when they first leave home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子初次出门, 母亲总要为之担心。</font><br>宁愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll never allow you to do that; I'll die first!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我绝不允许你做那种事, 我宁愿死！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>第一的; 最初的; 最早的; 最先的; 第一流的; 最重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know when the first artificial satellite of America was launched?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道美国的第一颗人造卫星是什么时候发射的吗?</font><br>一点也不<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't the first idea of what you mean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一点也不懂你的意思。</font><br>\n
fish	<h3>fish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鱼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy caught a fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小男孩捉到一条鱼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are several fishes in the lake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 湖里有好几种鱼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He found some dead fish beside the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在海边发现一些死鱼。</font><br>鱼肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fish was the last course that day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天, 鱼是最后一道菜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>捕鱼; 钓鱼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know how to fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不会钓鱼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I often fish the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我常在这条河里钓鱼。</font><br>摸出, 掏出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was fishing around in her handbag trying to find the key.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在她的手提包中摸索着找钥匙。</font><br>\n
fisherman	<h3>fisherman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>渔夫, 渔民<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His father is a fisherman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的父亲是渔民。</font><br>\n
fist	<h3>fist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拳, 拳头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He struck me with his fist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用拳头打我。</font><br>\n
fit	<h3>fit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)适合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hat fits perfectly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这顶帽子挺合适的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His great height fitted him to play basketball.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的身材高大, 适合打篮球。</font><br>试穿<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>安装, 配备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fitted my new cooker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我安装新炊具。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The authorities fitted the explorers a fleet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当局为探险者配备了一艘舰艇。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>合适的, 适宜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only fit applicants need application.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有符合条件的申请人需要申请。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is fit for the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她适合做这项工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is not fit to drink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这水不适宜饮用。</font><br>健康的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You look very fit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看上去很健康。</font><br>恰当的, 正当的, 得体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is fit that we give thanks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们致谢是应该的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>适合的样子, 合身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shoes are just your fit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这双鞋子正合你的脚。</font><br>(病)发作, 昏厥, 痉挛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She fell down in a fit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她突然昏倒了。</font><br>突然爆发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She burst into a fit of laughter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她突然大笑起来。</font><br>\n
