fix	<h3>fix</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修理; 校准<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They know how to fix their cars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们知道怎样修理自己的汽车。</font><br>固定, 安装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stove is fixed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火炉装好了。</font><br>安排; 决定, 确定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will fix the same room for you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会给你安排同样的房间。</font><br>准备, 做(饭等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me fix you a drink!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我来给你们准备一点饮料吧！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>困境, 窘境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got himself into a bad fix.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他使自己陷入困境。</font><br>定位于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got a fix on the missile launching site.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们确定了导弹发射场的位置。</font><br>受操纵的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The election was a fix!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次选举是受人操纵的！</font><br>\n
flag	<h3>flag</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旗, 旗帜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Flags were flutter-ing in the wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旗帜在风中飘扬。</font><br>\n
flame	<h3>flame</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>火焰, 火舌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The candle flame flicked and went out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 烛火摇曳着, 随即熄灭了。</font><br>\n
flash	<h3>flash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>发出闪光<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>闪耀, 闪现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His eyes flashed a smile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他眼里闪现出微笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She flashed him a despairing glance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她绝望地瞥了他一眼。</font><br>\n
flat	<h3>flat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>平的, 扁平的, 平坦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't have flat land in this region.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们这个地区没有平地。</font><br>单调的, 沉闷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a flat weekend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个乏味的周末。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一套房间, 公寓套房<br>\n

flee	<h3>flee</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>逃走, 逃掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Samuel has fled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 塞缪尔已经逃跑了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>逃离, 逃避<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why does she always flee any kind of responsibility?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为什么总是逃避责任?</font><br>\n
fleet	<h3>fleet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>舰队; 船队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Dutch fleet is sailing up the Thames.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 荷兰舰队向泰晤士河上游驶去。</font><br>车队; 机群<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made his money with a fleet of moving vans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他靠一队家具搬运车赚钱。</font><br>\n
flesh	<h3>flesh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fat man has much more flesh than a thin man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 胖人较瘦人肉多。</font><br>果肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flesh of the peach was sweet and juicy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桃子的果肉甜而多汁。</font><br>肉体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His life was devoted to the pleasure of the flesh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一生贪图肉体上的舒适享受。</font><br>\n
flexible	<h3>flexible</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>易弯曲的, 柔韧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Copper wire is flexible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铜丝易弯曲。</font><br>灵活的, 可变通的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a flexible mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脑瓜灵活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need a foreign policy that is more flexible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要一种更灵活的外交政策。</font><br>\n
flight	<h3>flight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>飞翔, 飞行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The idea of flight had been kicking around for centuries before man actually achieved it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在人们真正能上天飞行之前, 飞行这种想法早已存在数百年了。</font><br>航班, 航机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've booked you on a direct flight to Paris.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我为你预订了直飞巴黎的航班。</font><br>楼梯的一段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A flight of steps led up to the front door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一段阶梯通向前门。</font><br>逃跑, 溃退<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police intercepted the flight of the escaped criminal and put him back in jail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察把越狱的罪犯拦截并押回监狱。</font><br>\n
fling	<h3>fling</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>抛, 扔, 丢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The monkey was up the tree, flinging nuts to the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只猴子爬到树上往地面扔坚果。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>扑进, 冲出; 急伸, 猛动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The angry father flung the door open and marched into his daughter's room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲怒气冲冲地把门猛地推开, 大步走进女儿的房间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尽情欢乐的一阵, 放纵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's have a fling and eat at that expensive restaurant for a change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们痛快一下, 到那间高级餐馆吃一顿换换口味。</font><br>\n
float	<h3>float</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)漂浮[飘动]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When you're tired of swimming, just float for a while.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你游累了就漂浮一会儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was floating his boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩让他的小船在水上漂着。</font><br>(使)浮动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was decided to float the pound because a fixed value was damaging exports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 决定浮动英镑的汇率, 因为固定汇率不利于出口贸易。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>游荡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man floats from town to town with nowhere to go and nothing to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人从一个市镇游荡到另一个市镇, 无所事事, 也没有目的地。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提出, 提请考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The idea was first floated before the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个意见最初是在战前提出的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>漂浮物; 鱼漂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When a fish bites the hook, the float bobs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当鱼上钩时, 鱼漂上下跳动。</font><br>浮有冰淇淋的饮料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll have a coke float please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请来一杯带冰淇淋的可口可乐。</font><br>彩车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An outsize cotton shoes was mounted on a huge float and paraded through the main street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一双特大的布鞋装在大型花车上在大街上通过。</font><br>备用零钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The salesmen in this company have floats for their traveling expenses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司的推销员准备了在路上用的零钱。</font><br>\n
flock	<h3>flock</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>畜群, 鸟群<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A flock of birds comes over, and the hunting starts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群鸟飞过来, 打猎开始了。</font><br>人群, 群众<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A flock of customers were waiting for the store to open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群顾客在等候着商店开门。</font><br>同一教会团体的教徒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The priest warned his flock against breaking God's law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牧师警告他的教友不要违背上帝的训诫。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>群集, 成群结队而行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People flocked to hear the new prophet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们成群结队地去听这新的预言家演讲。</font><br>\n
flood	<h3>flood</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)为水淹没<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our street floods whenever we have rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的街道一下雨就淹水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every spring the river floods the valley.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每年春天, 河水都会淹没这个溪谷。</font><br>大量涌来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Letters flooded the office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 办公室里到处是信件。</font><br>充满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cheap plastic bowls and buckets flood (into) the market.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 低廉的塑料碗和塑料桶充斥市场。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>泛滥, 溢出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After such a storm I'm surprised the river hasn't flooded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样一场暴风雨之后, 我很惊讶河水竟然没有泛滥。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>洪水, 水灾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The floods were a cataclysm from which the local people never recovered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经历了这场特大洪水, 当地人民元气大伤, 很难恢复。</font><br>大量, 大批<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There followed a great flood of indignation in the newspapers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随后, 报纸连篇累牍地刊载了表示义愤的文章。</font><br>\n
floor	<h3>floor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地面, 地板<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A Turkey carpet adorned the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地板上铺着土耳其地毯。</font><br>楼层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our office is on the second floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的办公室在二楼。</font><br>底<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the floor of the basins lie deserts, lakes and swamps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这几个盆地的底部有沙漠、湖泊和沼泽。</font><br>发言权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The representative shouted for the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位代表嚷着要发言。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…铺地板<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The carpenter will floor this room with oak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 木匠将用橡木铺设这个房间的地板。</font><br>把…打倒在地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldier floored his attacker with one heavy blow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵重重一拳, 把向他进攻的人打倒在地。</font><br>击败, 打败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was floored by his argument and had to admit defeat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我被他驳倒了, 只得承认失败。</font><br>\n
flour	<h3>flour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面粉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Add the remaining flour to make a soft dough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把剩下的面粉加进去做成一块软面团。</font><br>\n
flourish	<h3>flourish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>茂盛, 繁荣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Crops flourish in rich soil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作物在肥沃的土壤中长得茂盛。</font><br>兴旺发达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His business seemed to be flourishing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的生意似乎很兴隆。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挥动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He flourished his stick at the boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他朝那个男孩挥舞棍棒。</font><br>\n
flow	<h3>flow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>流, 流动; 循环<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Blood flows through our bodies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 血液在我们体内循环。</font><br>垂; 飘拂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her hair flowed down her back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的头发飘垂在背后。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Red flags flow in the east wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 红旗在东风中飘扬。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>流动, 流量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love the still flow of the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢那条河静静的流淌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better measure the flow of water over the dam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们最好测量一下从堤坝上面流出的水量。</font><br>\n
flower	<h3>flower</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>花, 花朵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This flower was drawn on the paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这朵花儿被画在了纸上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I always associate the smell of those flowers with my childhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一闻到这种花香, 就联想起我的童年。</font><br>开花植物, 花卉<br>精华<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flower of the nation's youth attended the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全国最优秀的青年参加了会议。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开花<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This bush flowers in the spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个灌木丛在春天开花。</font><br>繁荣, 成熟<br>\n
fluctuate	<h3>fluctuate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>波动, 涨落, 起伏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price of vegetables fluctuates seasonally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蔬菜的价格随季节变动。</font><br>\n
fluent	<h3>fluent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(说话、写作等)熟练的, 流畅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is fluent in five languages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她通晓五种语言。</font><br>(说话、写作等)流利的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father speaks fluent English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲讲一口流利的英语。</font><br>\n
fluid	<h3>fluid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>流体的, 流动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Well, we have not enough fluid capital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可是, 我们没有足够的流动资金。</font><br>易变的, 不固定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather is fluid in summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏天天气多变。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>液体, 流体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is taking cold fluids.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在喝冷饮。</font><br>\n
fly	<h3>fly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>飞, 飞行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Birds can fly with their wings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟能用翅膀飞行。</font><br>过得快, 飞逝, (动作)疾驰<br>(旗)飘荡, 飘扬<br>碎成片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This glass easily flies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这玻璃容易碎裂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>乘(…的)飞机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He flies to Hong Kong next day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他明天乘飞机去香港旅行。</font><br>驾驶(飞机等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has flown for years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他驾驶飞机已有好几年了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使飞, 放飞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother is flying a kite in the park.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的弟弟在公园里放风筝。</font><br>逃离; 逃出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The robbers have flown the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抢劫犯逃往国外了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>苍蝇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fly is on the ceiling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一只苍蝇在天花板上。</font><br>\n
focus	<h3>focus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)集中, (使)聚集<br>调整(镜头, 眼睛)焦点[焦距]以便看清<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>焦点, 焦距; 中心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The camera has two focuses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部相机有两个焦距。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was the focus of everyone's attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是大家注意的焦点。</font><br>\n
fog	<h3>fog</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We get heavy fogs on the coast in winter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里的海边冬季有浓雾。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>雾气笼罩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Steam has fogged the bathroom mirror.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水蒸气遮住浴室的镜子。</font><br>使迷惑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lack of sleep had fogged her mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 缺乏睡眠使她头昏脑胀。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>模糊不清<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The steam fogged my glasses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水气使我的眼镜模糊不清。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The complicated language fogs the real issues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 复杂的语言把实质问题弄得模糊不清。</font><br>\n

folk	<h3>folk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of the people on the island are fisher folk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个岛上的居民大部分是渔民。</font><br>大伙儿, 各位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Well, folks, shall we go out this afternoon?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 唔, 伙计们, 今天下午我们出去吗?</font><br>亲属, 父母<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>民间的, 普通平民的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a folk singer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个民谣歌手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not very fond of folk dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不太喜欢民间舞蹈。</font><br>\n

follow	<h3>follow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>跟随; 接着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You go first, and I'll follow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你先去, 我随后就来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heated discussion followed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 接着是一场热烈的讨论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please follow me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请跟我来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>注视, 密切注意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall follow closely the development of the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将密切注意形势的发展。</font><br>从事, 经营<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He follows the trade of baker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想当面包师。</font><br>遵照, 接受, 听从<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These orders must be followed at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些命令必须立即照办。</font><br>\n
following	<h3>following</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>其次的, 接着的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Answer the following questions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回答下列问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The following is the full text.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全文如下。</font><br>下述的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President has issued the following statement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统已经发表了下述声明。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一群追随者[拥护者]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a keen following among rock fans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在摇滚乐迷中拥有一批热心的追随者。</font><br>\n
fond	<h3>fond</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>喜欢的, 喜爱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm fond of pop music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢流行音乐。</font><br>多情的, 温柔的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She may appear severe toward her children but she is a fond mother at heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她表面上对孩子的态度很严厉, 实际上是一位慈祥的妈妈。</font><br>溺爱的, 痴情的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fond mother may spoil her child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个溺爱孩子的母亲会把孩子宠坏。</font><br>盲目轻信的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's waiting patiently in the fond belief he'll come back to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在耐心等待, 痴情地相信他会回到她身边。</font><br>\n
food	<h3>food</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>食物, 粮食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food was both bad and insufficient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 食物既糟又匮乏。</font><br>食品, 固体食物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oatmeal is a breakfast food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 燕麦粥是一种早餐食品。</font><br>\n
fool	<h3>fool</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>愚人, 傻瓜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fool may give a wise man counsel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愚者千虑, 必有一得。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>愚弄, 耍弄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt that he had been deliberately fooled by that man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他当时觉得那个人故意捉弄了他。</font><br>欺骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the use of trying to fool me that way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你企图如此欺骗我, 这有什么用！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开玩笑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am only fooling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只是开玩笑罢了。</font><br>\n

footstep	<h3>footstep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>脚步(声)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He heard soft footsteps coming up the stair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听见有人上楼的轻微脚步声。</font><br>一步的距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The servant walked two or three footsteps behind his master.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 仆人走在主人后面, 相隔两三步。</font><br>\n
for	<h3>for</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示时间)在(某一特定时间); 在…时节; 持续达<br>(表示方向)向, 朝, 开往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They made a rush for the exit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们猛然冲向出口处。</font><br>(表示对象) 替, 帮, 给, 为…做准备, 对, 对于, 对…来说, 在…一方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What can I do for you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我能帮你什么忙吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me lift that heavy box for you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我替你提那只重箱子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You had to be ready for any emergency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得随时预防不测。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This inspired in them a love for learning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这使他们产生了学习的热情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fortunately for him, he can swim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对他来说幸运的是, 他会游泳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speaks too softly for her to hear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讲话声音太轻, 她听不见。</font><br>(表示原因)因为, 由于, 作为…的结果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm pretty angry with you for not telling me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于你没有告诉我, 我对你很生气。</font><br>(表示距离)延续达, 计有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I followed him for some distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我跟着他走了一段路程。</font><br>(表示结果)当做, 作为, 作为…的部分, 就…的条件而言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can't accept that as a basis for a decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不能同意以此为基础来做出决定。</font><br>(表示目的)为了…, 适用于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship sent out a message for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船只发出求救信号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's the very person for the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最适合干这项工作。</font><br>(表示态度)支持, 赞同, 想要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you for the plan or against it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你支持这计划还是反对它呢?</font><br>(表示比率)按…比例, 以…价格, 第…次<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought this book for ￡3.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买这本书花了三英镑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I met them for the second time last week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我上周第二次遇见他们。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>因为, 由于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prepare to alight, for we are almost there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们马上要到了, 准备下车吧。</font><br>\n

force	<h3>force</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>力; 力量; 力气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lacks force.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她没有力气。</font><br>武力; 暴力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to use force to get into the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不强行进屋。</font><br>影响力; 效力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Decisions of the Congress have force of law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国会的决议具有法律效力。</font><br>一群人; 部队; 兵力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The navy is one of the armed forces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海军是三军之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>强制, 迫使, 逼迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She forced herself awake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她强迫自己不睡。</font><br>施强力于; 强行促成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The safe was forced by the burglars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保险柜被窃贼强行打开。</font><br>强作, 勉强做出<br>促成早熟, 促成生长<br>\n

forget	<h3>forget</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>忘记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep it in mind.Please don't forget.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 记住, 别忘了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll never forget them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我永远也不会忘记他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't forget to turn off the light when you leave the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你离开房间时别忘了关灯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I forgot how to do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我忘记怎样做了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I forgot my father going to London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我忘记了我父亲曾经去过伦敦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm sorry, I am forgetting that you don't like beans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很抱歉, 我差点忘了你不爱吃豆子。</font><br>不再想, 忽视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't forget your duties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别玩忽职守。</font><br>\n

form	<h3>form</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>组成, 结构, 形式; 种类, 体制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ice, snow and steam are different forms of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰、雪、蒸汽是水的不同形式。</font><br>人[物]的形状, 样子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the early morning we could just make out the dark forms of the mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在晨曦中我们只能看见群山的黛色轮廓。</font><br>需填写的表格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've filled up three forms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我填好了三份表格。</font><br>音乐和文学作品的形式, 体裁<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>形成, 构成, 产生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Steam forms when water boils.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水煮沸之后就形成蒸汽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The idea formed in her mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个想法在她头脑中形成了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>塑造, 养成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children should form good habits from the very beginning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们从一开始就应养成良好的习惯。</font><br>组织, 成立<br>\n

forum	<h3>forum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>集会的公共场所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yesterday we visited the forum of ancient Romans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我们参观了古罗马的公共集会广场。</font><br>论坛, 讨论会, 专题讨论节目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They're holding a forum on new ways of teaching history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在举行历史教学讨论会。</font><br>\n
forward	<h3>forward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向前[向末]端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The seats face forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些座位面朝前方。</font><br>前进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Move forward to the front of the train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 往前走到列车的前面。</font><br>向着将来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I won't go there again from this time forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以后我再也不去那儿了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>向前方的, 向前进的; 位于前面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The forward part of the train is for first-class passengers only.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车的前部仅供头等车厢的乘客使用。</font><br>早熟的, (儿童)发育早的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very forward for his age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就其年龄而言, 他很早熟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>发送; 转寄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you forward his telegram?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你转送了他的电报了吗?</font><br>促进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The civic leaders helped to forward the project.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市政府领导者协助促进工程的进展。</font><br>\n
fossil	<h3>fossil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>化石<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fossils may be a million years old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些化石可能有100万年了。</font><br>老顽固, 食古不化的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man is a fossil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人是个老顽固。</font><br>\n
found	<h3>found</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>创办, 成立; 建立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They founded the company themselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们自己创办了这家公司。</font><br>\n
foundation	<h3>foundation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>建立, 设立, 创办<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foundation of the university took place 600 years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所大学是600年前创办的。</font><br>基础, 基本原理, 根据<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foundation of democracy is the will of the people to preserve liberty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 民主的基础在于人民维护自由的意志。</font><br>地基<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foundations of the building settled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房屋的地基下陷了。</font><br>基金(会)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Foundation gives money to help artists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家基金会捐款帮助艺术家。</font><br>\n
fountain	<h3>fountain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>喷水; 喷泉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fountain plays only at weekend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个喷泉仅在周末喷水。</font><br>来源, 根源, 源泉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地。</font><br>\n

fraction	<h3>fraction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小部分, 一点儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car missed me by a fraction of an inch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那车子差一点儿就要撞到我了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cost is only a fraction of his salary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那项费用不过是他薪水的一小部分。</font><br>〈数〉分数<br>\n
fragment	<h3>fragment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>碎片; 片断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have found several fragments of a Roman vase in the area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这一地区他们发现了一只罗马瓷瓶的碎片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This was only a fragment of a long conversation with John.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这仅仅是与约翰长谈的一个片断。</font><br>\n
frame	<h3>frame</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>框架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I need to buy new spectacle frames but I will keep the old lenses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我需要买新的眼镜框, 不过我会留着旧镜片。</font><br>骨架, 构架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house has a wooden frame which is braced with brick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幢房子是木结构的砖瓦房。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…加框<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you frame the picture?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给这个画加个框好吗?</font><br>陷害, 诬告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She framed Tom for something he never did.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她陷害汤姆干了一些他从未干过的事。</font><br>表达, 构造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He framed his life according to a noble pattern.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以高尚的模式构筑自己生活的框架。</font><br>\n

fraud	<h3>fraud</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>欺诈, 欺骗行为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw through the fraud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我识破了那个骗局。</font><br>骗子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He said he was an insurance salesman, but later she discovered he was a fraud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说自己是保险推销员, 但她后来发现他是骗子。</font><br>\n
free	<h3>free</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>自由的; 不受约束的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone is free to express himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个人都可以畅所欲言。</font><br>免费的, 无偿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peter gave me two free tickets for the concert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彼得给了我两张音乐会的免费门票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The loan is interest free.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这贷款是无息的。</font><br>空闲的; 不忙的<br>摆脱…的; 不受…影响的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>免费地<br>自由地, 无拘束地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children ran free across the meadow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们在草地里自由地奔跑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>免除; 释放<br>\n
freedom	<h3>freedom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>自由, 自主<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been granted his freedom on condition that he leaves the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已获准恢复自由, 条件是他离开这个国家。</font><br>自由权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's old enough to have the freedom to do as she likes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已成年了, 有权做她喜欢做的事。</font><br>\n
