freight	<h3>freight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>货运; 货物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This aircraft company deals with freight only; it has no travel service.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家航空公司只经营货运业务, 不经营客运业务。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>运输, 装货于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We freighted the goods to the warehouse by truck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用卡车把货物运到仓库。</font><br>\n
frequency	<h3>frequency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(某事发生可重复的)频率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fatal accidents have decreased in frequency over recent years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近年来死亡事故发生的频率已经下降。</font><br>经常发生, 频繁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Accidents are happening with increasing frequency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事故发生得越来越频繁。</font><br>(声波或无线电波的)振动频率; 波段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If we can know their frequency we will monitor their talking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我们知道他们的频率, 我们就能监听他们的谈话。</font><br>\n
frequent	<h3>frequent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>时常发生的, 常见的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Research is also advanced by frequent conference to exchange experience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经常开会交流经验也促进了研究工作的发展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Traffic accidents are alarmingly frequent of late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近来交通事故频繁得吓人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>常到, 光顾, 常与…交往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He frequents the local restaurants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他经常光顾当地的餐馆。</font><br>\n
fresh	<h3>fresh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>新鲜的, 鲜嫩的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can buy fresh fruit and vegetables in the market.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个市场你可以买到新鲜的水果和蔬菜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This meat is not very fresh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这肉不太新鲜。</font><br>新的, 新到的, 新近的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fresh man does nothing to the problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个新手对这个问题的解决毫无帮助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please make me a fresh pot of tea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我沏一壶新茶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This bread's fresh from the oven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这面包是新出炉的。</font><br>精神饱满的, 生气勃勃的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man looks as fresh as a young man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这老年人看上去像年轻人一样生气勃勃。</font><br>另外的, 外加的; 重新的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he came out of prison, he decided to make a fresh start.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出狱后, 决心重新做人。</font><br>(水)淡的, 无盐味的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rivers are fresh water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 河流通常是淡水。</font><br>\n
Friday	<h3>Friday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>星期五<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a picnic last Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们上周五去野餐了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hoped to see her on next Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们希望在下星期五见到她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He will leave for Shanghai on the Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他星期五去上海。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was born on a Friday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是星期五出生的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On Fridays I do the shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每星期五我都去购物。</font><br>\n
fridge	<h3>fridge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>冰箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I put the milk and meat in the fridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把牛奶和肉放在冰箱里。</font><br>\n
friend	<h3>friend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>朋友, 友人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saluted his friends with a wave of the hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挥手向他的朋友致意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you made friends with your new neighbours?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你与你的新邻居交上朋友了吗?</font><br>同胞; 自己人, 同盟者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are friends of labour movement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们是工人运动的支持者。</font><br>资助者, 捐助者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new chemistry lab was paid for by friends of the college.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的化学实验室是由学院的资助者出钱建的。</font><br>\n
friendly	<h3>friendly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>友好的, 友谊的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're always sure of a friendly welcome at this hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在这家宾馆总是受到友好的欢迎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog is quite friendly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条狗不凶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our neighbours are friendly to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的邻居对我们很友好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was friendly of him to offer his help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提供帮助真是太好了。</font><br>和睦的, 融洽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are on friendly terms with the boss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们与老板的关系融洽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is not friendly with anybody.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他跟任何人都合不来。</font><br>\n
friendship	<h3>friendship</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>友情, 友谊, 友好<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I valued my friendship with my classmates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我珍视我和同学们之间的友谊。</font><br>\n
frighten	<h3>frighten</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)惊恐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll find that I don't frighten easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会发现我不是轻易就会害怕的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It frightened me sometimes to see that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到那种事, 有时真令我害怕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was frightened to ride a bike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不敢骑自行车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was frightened that he might cut himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怕他会伤了自己。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>吓唬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't frighten me.He is telling the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要吓我, 他说的是真的。</font><br>\n
frog	<h3>frog</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蛙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Frog can live both on land and in water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青蛙既能生活在陆地上也能生活在水中。</font><br>\n
from	<h3>from</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示时间)从…, 自…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've been working from morning to night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们从早到晚一直工作。</font><br>(表示状态)从某(位置、状态等)开始<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rose from office boy to managing director in ten years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在十年间由办公室勤杂员升至总经理。</font><br>(表示范围)从较低限度算起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jackets are from 35 dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些夹克衫起价是35美元。</font><br>(表示来源)来自…; 源于…; 从…里取出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I come from the north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是北方人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a shaving mirror from his bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从手提包里拿出一面剃须镜。</font><br>(表示分离)与…分离[隔开]; 减去; 扣除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind blew his hat from his head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风将他的帽子从头上吹走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Six from fifteen leaves nine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 15减6等于9。</font><br>(表示否定)免于; 免遭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wild fruit kept us from dying of starvation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们靠着野果才没被饿死。</font><br>(表示方位)从…; 以…为开始方向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Latitudes are the lines that go from east to west.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纬线是从东到西的线。</font><br>(表示原因)因为, 出于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She told him the truth from a sense of loyalty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她告诉他真相是出于忠诚。</font><br>(表示比较)与…相比; 与…区分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is different from her sister in character.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她和她姐姐性格不同。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can tell a fake from the original.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能分辨出赝品和真品。</font><br>\n
front	<h3>front</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>前面; 正面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sweeping all others aside, she pushed her way to the front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把别人都推开, 挤到了前边。</font><br>一面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The west front of the church contains some fine old windows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这教堂的西侧有一些精美的旧式窗户。</font><br>前线, 战线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The main body of troops moved toward the front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主力部队开往前线。</font><br>联合行动, 阵线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The opposition parties can only defeat the government if they present a united front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有反对党只有结成联合阵线才能击败政府。</font><br>幌子, 隐蔽物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Although he was very nervous, he put on a brave front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管他非常紧张, 但还是装出一副勇敢的样子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This firm is just a front for their illegal trade in diamonds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司不过是他们进行非法钻石交易的一个幌子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>前面的, 前部的; 正面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wardrobe in the front bedroom has been built in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 前面卧室里的衣橱已经镶建在墙壁之内了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>作…的正面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Imported marble will front the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这建筑物的正面将用进口的大理石来装饰。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>面向, 朝向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cinema fronts toward the south.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电影院朝南。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel fronts on the main road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅馆朝向大马路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel fronts the beautiful lake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆面对着那美丽的湖。</font><br>\n
frontier	<h3>frontier</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>边界, 边境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There have been large-scale military manoeuvres on the frontier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 边境地区曾有过大规模的军事演习。</font><br>开发地区的边缘, 边远地区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Areas near the frontier were rough and lawless in the old days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过去边远地区混乱不堪, 而且没有法律。</font><br>尚待开发的领域, 尖端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are highly interested in the frontiers of science.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对于科学的新领域有浓厚的兴趣。</font><br>\n
frost	<h3>frost</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)结冰霜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fields have frosted up in this wintry morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这寒冷的早晨田野里覆盖着一层霜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cold has frosted the windows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 寒冷的天气使窗子结满了霜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>冻坏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The drop in temperature frosted the tomato plants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气温下降冻坏了番茄苗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>霜<br>霜冻, 严寒天气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Frosts spoil the last of the flowers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 霜冻冻坏了最后一批花朵。</font><br>\n
frown	<h3>frown</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>皱眉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fiddly task like threading a needle often makes you frown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 烦琐的工作就像穿针引线一样, 常常令你皱眉头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why are you frowning at me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为什么对我皱眉头?</font><br>\n
fruit	<h3>fruit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>成果, 结果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After years of hard work, his efforts finally bore fruit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过多年艰苦劳动之后, 他的努力终于取得了成果。</font><br>水果; 果实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fruit has spoiled in the hot sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水果在暴晒下变坏了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tomato is technically a fruit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从专业上讲, 番茄是一种果实。</font><br>\n
fruitful	<h3>fruitful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>成功的, 富有成效的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a fruitful meeting; we made a lot of important decisions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一次很有成效的会议, 我们做出了许多重大决定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Newton's laws were fruitful for the future development of science.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛顿定律对其后的科学发展起了很大作用。</font><br>多产的, 果实累累的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is really a fruitful novelist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真是一位多产的小说家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These trees are fruitful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些树果实累累。</font><br>\n
frustrate	<h3>frustrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使不成功, 挫败, 阻止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police frustrated the bandit's attempt to rob the bank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方挫败了匪徒抢劫银行的企图。</font><br>使受挫折, 令人沮丧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bad weather frustrated all our hopes of going out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恶劣的天气破坏了我们出行的愿望。</font><br>\n
fry	<h3>fry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>油炸, 油煎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fish was frying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鱼正在煎着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is frying the bacon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在煎咸肉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>皮肤晒黑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll fry if we stay too long in this hot sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们如果在这样酷热的阳光下待久了, 皮肤会晒黑的。</font><br>\n
fuel	<h3>fuel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>燃料, 燃烧剂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Soot is usually the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 煤烟通常是燃料不完全燃烧的产物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…加燃料, 给…加油<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are fueling a car with petrol.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在给汽车加汽油。</font><br>激起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His provocative words only fueled the argument further.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的挑衅性讲话只能使争论进一步激化。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>补充燃料<br>\n
fulfil	<h3>fulfil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>执行, 遵守, 履行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you make a promise you should fulfil it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你许诺了, 你就要履行你的诺言。</font><br>尽到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A nurse has to fulfil many duties in caring for the sick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 护士在照顾病人时要尽很多责任。</font><br>满足, 使达成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This company should be able to fulfil our requirements.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司应该能够满足我们的要求。</font><br>应验, 实现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John was able to fulfil himself through writing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰通过写作充分地发挥了自己的才能。</font><br>\n
fulfill	<h3>fulfill</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>履行,实现,完成(计划等)<br>\n
full	<h3>full</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>满的, 装满的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train was crowded to its full capacity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车上挤满了乘客。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is rude to speak with your mouth full.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 满嘴含着东西讲话很不礼貌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car was full but I squeezed in any way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车已经满人了, 但是我还是设法挤了进去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My basket is so full that I can't carry it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的篮子装得太满, 我拿不动它。</font><br>完全的, 充分的, 完整的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only full members of the club are allowed to vote at meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有俱乐部的正式会员才可以在会中投票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been away for a full year now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他离开已整整一年了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A comprehensive description is one that is full and complete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一篇详尽的描写就是一篇充实完整的描写。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was full on that point.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对那一点讲得很详尽。</font><br>\n
fun	<h3>fun</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乐趣, 娱乐, 嬉戏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Life isn't all fun; it has its bad moments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人生不仅有乐趣, 也有令人不快的时刻。</font><br>有趣的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Picnics are fun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 野餐是件有趣的事。</font><br>\n
function	<h3>function</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>功能; 作用; 职责<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have the functions and powers in their hands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们手里掌握着职权。</font><br>函数; 与另一事物有密切关系的事物<br>社交集会<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>工作, 运行, 起作用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine will not function properly if it is not kept well-oiled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 机器没有上好油, 就不会顺利地运转。</font><br>\n
functional	<h3>functional</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有用的, 实用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The furniture is not fancy, just functional.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些家具不是摆着好看的, 只是为了实用。</font><br>能起作用的, 产生影响的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The telephone was out of order, but is functional now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电话刚才坏了, 但现在可以用了。</font><br>\n
fund	<h3>fund</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>基金, 专款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We made a contribution to the famine relief fund.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们给饥荒赈济基金捐了款。</font><br>现款; 资金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is willing to help, but she's out of funds at present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她愿意帮助, 但目前她拿不出现金。</font><br>储备, 蕴藏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a fund of amusing jokes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有很多有趣的笑话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>为…提供资金, 给…拨款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company is funding another scheme.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个公司正为另一项计划拨款。</font><br>\n
fundamental	<h3>fundamental</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>基本的; 重要的, 必要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fresh air is fundamental to good health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新鲜空气对健康是不可缺少的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>基本原则, 基本法则<br>\n
funding	<h3>funding</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>用发行长期债券的方法来收回短期债券<br>\n
funeral	<h3>funeral</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>葬礼, 丧礼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The funeral made its way slowly through the silent streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 送葬的队伍缓缓地穿过肃静的街道。</font><br>\n
funny	<h3>funny</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>滑稽的, 有趣的, 可笑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were amused at his funny movements in doing morning exercises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他做早操时的滑稽动作使我们觉得好笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was the funniest thing I ever heard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我所听到过最有趣的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sometimes he is funny; sometimes he seems like a poet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有时他很滑稽, 有时他又像个诗人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story is funny to listen to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那故事听起来很可笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's rather funny that he should wear a strange pair of shoes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿一双这样古怪的鞋子很好笑。</font><br>稀奇的, 古怪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine is making a very funny noise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部机器发出一种很怪的声音。</font><br>稍感不适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told the doctor that he felt funny all over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他告诉医生, 他感到浑身不舒服。</font><br>\n
fur	<h3>fur</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>软毛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cats are covered with soft fur.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猫有一身细软的毛皮。</font><br>毛皮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was wearing a silver fox fur across her shoulders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她肩上披着一张银狐皮。</font><br>毛皮衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saw an old lady in furs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看见一位身穿裘皮大衣的老太太。</font><br>\n
furnace	<h3>furnace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>熔炉, 火炉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The furnace broke down and the entire office building has no heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 锅炉坏了, 整栋办公大楼没有暖气。</font><br>\n
furnish	<h3>furnish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>陈设, 布置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We propose to furnish our own house according to our own taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们建议按自己的爱好布置自己的房子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her room was furnished elegant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的房子装饰得特别高雅。</font><br>提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That shop furnishes everything that is needed for camping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家店铺供应野营所需的一切。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man furnished the guerrillas information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老人给游击队提供情报。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one in the class could furnish the right answer to the question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 班上没有一个人能给出问题的正确答案。</font><br>\n
furniture	<h3>furniture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>家具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This old French table is a very valuable piece of furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张古老的法国餐桌是件很有价值的家具。</font><br>\n
further	<h3>further</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>更多的, 另外的, 进一步的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you wish for further explanation, you'd better apply in person to the director.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你想得到进一步说明, 你最好直接找厂长联系。</font><br>更远的, 较远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The desk is placed at the further end of the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书桌摆在房间里较远的一头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The church is much further than you think.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教堂比你想像的远得多。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在更大程度上, 进一步地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She refused to further talk that evening of her own worry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天晚上她拒绝进一步说她的担忧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house isn't big enough for us, and further, it's too far from the town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那住宅对我们来说不够大, 而且离城又太远。</font><br>更远, 再往前地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can swim further than I can.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能游得比我远。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The village is about two miles further on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 再向前约两英里就是那个村庄。</font><br>此外, 而且<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Further, it has come to my attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此外, 我已注意到它了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>促进, 推进, 助长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll do all we can to further your plans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将尽力促成你们的计划。</font><br>\n
furthermore	<h3>furthermore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>而且, 此外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想去那里, 而且我也没时间去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like her because she is too tall and furthermore she smokes too much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢她, 因为她太高, 另外她抽烟太厉害。</font><br>\n
fuss	<h3>fuss</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>小题大做; 大惊小怪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stop fussing!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要大惊小怪！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>烦恼, 激动(尤指对小事)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wish you would stop fussing me about; I'm quite able to look after myself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 但愿你不要为我过于操心了, 我挺能照顾我自己的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>忙乱, 大惊小怪, 小题大做<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stop all this fuss and do your homework.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别大惊小怪了, 去做你的家庭作业吧。</font><br>抱怨<br>焦急, 紧张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old lady soon got into a fuss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老妇人很快就紧张起来。</font><br>\n
future	<h3>future</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>将来的, 未来的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She introduced him as her future husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她介绍说他是她的未婚夫。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>将来, 未来, 今后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The future lies before us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未来展现在我们面前。</font><br>前途, 前景<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her son really has a great future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的儿子确实前途无量。</font><br>期货<br>\n
gain	<h3>gain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>获得, 赢得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man gained a lot in the business, but he lost the respect of his friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个人做这买卖赚了很多钱, 但他却失去了朋友们对他的尊敬。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gained the rank of Colonel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他获得上校军衔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many countries have gained national independence after prolonged struggles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多国家经过长期斗争而获得了民族独立。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gained my experience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我获得了经验。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To gain a complete mastery of English, one must study very hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要想精通英语就必须刻苦努力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They gained the game with ease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们很轻松地赢得了这场比赛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fought bravely in many battles and gained their respect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在多次战役中他英勇作战, 从而赢得了大家的尊敬。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gained the admiration of the whole world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他受到全世界的钦佩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers fought hard and began to gain ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵们奋力作战, 开始占领敌军阵地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His persistence gained him victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的毅力使他获得了胜利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her talent and hard work gained her success as an artist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她作为一名艺术家, 靠其天资和勤奋获得了成功。</font><br>增加, 增进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fertilizer use gained in 1995.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 1995年化肥的使用增加了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car is gaining speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那辆轿车加速了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Within two weeks, she gained five pounds in weight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两周内她的体重增加了5磅。</font><br>(钟、表)走快<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This clock neither gains nor loses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这钟不快不慢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My watch gains two minutes every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的表每天快两分钟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>获益; 增财<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gain is greater than the loss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 收益大于损失。</font><br>利润; 增加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They see gains of 5 to 10 percent this spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今春他们的利润增长百分之五到百分之十。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unemployment was high despite the gains of the civil rights movement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管民权运动有所进展, 失业率仍然很高。</font><br>\n
gallery	<h3>gallery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>画廊, 美术馆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The art galleries of Florence are very famous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 佛罗伦萨的美术馆非常著名。</font><br>楼座, (议会的)旁听席<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The visitor's gallery in the House of Commons was full.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下议院的旁听席上坐满了人。</font><br>走廊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The armour is displayed in a long gallery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盔甲在长廊内展出。</font><br>\n
gallon	<h3>gallon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>加仑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like five gallons of wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要五加仑葡萄酒。</font><br>\n
gamble	<h3>gamble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>赌博; 冒风险<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gambles when he is in cash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有钱时就赌博。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he had gambled his money, he was put to shifts to live.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他输光了钱就凑合着过日子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gambled his savings to start a small store.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他孤注一掷地用自己的积蓄开了一家小店。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The federal government gambled hundreds of thousands of dollars in research funds to work on the project.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 联邦政府为了这项研究计划冒险动用了好几十万美元的资金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their house and land were all gambled and lost by her husband that morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的房子、土地就在那一天上午被她丈夫全输光了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gambled that they wouldn't shoot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我大胆假定他们不会开枪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>赌博, 打赌; 投机, 冒险<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Setting up this business was a bit of a gamble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开办这样的公司有点冒险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The operation may succeed, and it may not;  it's a bit of a gamble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次手术没把握, 可能成功, 也可能失败。</font><br>\n
game	<h3>game</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>游戏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are playing a game of cards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在玩牌。</font><br>运动, 比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The football game is yours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场足球赛你们胜了。</font><br>一场, 一局, 一盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have lost the first game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已经输了第一局。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The top team in each group played off seven games against each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各组的前几名彼此进行七场比赛。</font><br>运动会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The 1984 Olympic Games was held in Los Angeles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 1984年奥林匹克运动会在洛杉矶举行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Asian Games meet every four years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 亚运会每四年举行一次。</font><br>猎物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lions and tigers are big game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狮子和老虎是大猎物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>勇敢的, 有决心的, 敢作敢当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a game fighter even when he was losing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 即使当他失败的时候, 他也是一位勇敢的战士。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is game for any risk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她敢冒任何风险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is game for anything no matter how dangerous it is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论这件事有多么危险, 他都敢去做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy was hurt by the fall, but he was game enough to get up and try again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小男孩跌倒受伤了, 但他非常勇敢地站起来, 准备再试一试。</font><br>愿意的, 心甘情愿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Who's game for a swim?”“I'm game!”</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “谁愿意去游泳?”“我愿意!”</font><br>残疾的; 瘸的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The camel has a game leg.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只骆驼有一只腿瘸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is game in the left leg.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他左腿瘸。</font><br>\n
gang	<h3>gang</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(罪犯有组织的)一帮, 一伙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The phone box was vandalized by a gang of youths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那电话亭被一群少年歹徒故意破坏了。</font><br>(闹事青少年的)一群<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gang are planning a robbery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那帮罪犯正在计划抢劫。</font><br>(工人有组织的)一队, 一组<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A whole gang of builders is there tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚整队建筑工人都在那儿了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使结成一帮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foreman ganged the men together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工头把工人集合起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children like to gang each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们喜欢成群结伙相互攻击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often ganged his pupils to play hide-and-seek.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他经常将学生分成伙玩捉迷藏游戏。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>结伙行动; 合伙攻击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boys ganged together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些男孩聚在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They ganged towards the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们结队向门口走去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was frail and never ganged with his fellows at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个男孩身体虚弱, 从不和同学们一起玩。</font><br>\n
gaol	<h3>gaol</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>监狱,拘留所<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>监禁<br>\n
gap	<h3>gap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺口, 裂口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gate was locked but we went through a gap in the fence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门锁了, 我们便从篱笆的一处缺口钻了进去。</font><br>间隔, 间隙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a gap of five miles between towns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 镇与镇之间相隔五英里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The record is not complete;  there are several gaps in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份纪录不完整, 中间有几处间断。</font><br>差距<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a wide gap between the views of the two statesmen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于这点, 两位政治家的政见有很大分歧。</font><br>不足, 缺陷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must see that there is no gap in our defence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须确保我们的防御没有漏洞。</font><br>\n
garage	<h3>garage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>车库<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Outside this door is the garage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车房在门外边。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The estate consists of a main house, servants' quarters, a garage, stables and 100 acres of woods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这地产包括一栋住宅, 仆人住室, 一个汽车房, 几间马厩及100英亩的树林。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car knocked against the garage door and damaged it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车撞在车房门上, 把门撞坏了。</font><br>汽车修理站; 加油站<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We called at a garage, where we were soon fitted up with what we needed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们到了加油站, 在那里我们需要的东西很快得到了供应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a garage mechanic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一名加油站技工。</font><br>\n
garbage	<h3>garbage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉垃圾, 废物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put the garbage down the incinerator.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把垃圾放入垃圾焚烧炉。</font><br>〈口〉废话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't talk such a load of garbage!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别说那么多废话！</font><br>\n
garden	<h3>garden</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宅旁园圃, 花园; 果园; 菜园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our garden affords us fresh vegetables.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的园子为我们提供新鲜蔬菜。</font><br>公园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By the side of Hyde Park stands Kensington Gardens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 肯星顿公园在海德公园旁边。</font><br>肥沃的地区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Kent is the garden of England.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 肯特郡是英格兰的肥田沃地。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>从事园艺; 种植花木<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's been gardening all day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在园子里干了一整天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She doesn't garden very much nowadays—she tires easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最近不常在园子里干活——她很容易疲劳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's outdoors gardening every afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她每天下午都在户外搞园艺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many retired people take up gardening as a hobby.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多退休的人都以从事园艺为嗜好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people garden for pleasure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人种植花木是为了娱乐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes to garden because it keeps him out of doors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢在园子里干活, 因为这可以使他常在户外。</font><br>\n
gardener	<h3>gardener</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>园丁, 园艺爱好者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has to employ two gardeners to look after that huge garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她要雇两个园丁来照料这个大花园。</font><br>\n
gas	<h3>gas</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>气体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fluid includes both gasses and liquids.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 流体包括气体和液体。</font><br>煤气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Turn the gas on and we'll have a cup of tea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 点上煤气, 咱们沏杯茶吧。</font><br>汽油<br>毒气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The murderer was executed in a gas chamber.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 凶手在毒气室被处死。</font><br>空谈, 吹牛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His long speech was nothing but gas and hot hair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的长篇大论只是吹牛和空话。</font><br>有趣的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's sure to be a real gas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那实在是好玩的事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使…吸入毒气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She couldn't face the future and gassed herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对未来感到绝望而用煤气自杀了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was badly gassed in the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在战争中深受毒气伤害。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>空谈, 吹牛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Well, I can't sit here gassing all day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好了, 我不能整天坐在这里闲聊。</font><br>\n
gasoline	<h3>gasoline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>汽油<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This car runs 5 miles on a gallon of gasoline.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部汽车一加仑汽油可以行驶五英里。</font><br>\n
gate	<h3>gate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>门, 栅栏门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He commanded that all the gates be shut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他命令关闭所有的大门。</font><br>登机门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our flight is boarding at gate number 12.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的航班在12号门登机。</font><br>观众人数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a gate of thousands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 观众成千上万。</font><br>入场费, 门票收入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today's gate will be given to charity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今日的门票收入将捐献给慈善机构。</font><br>\n
gather	<h3>gather</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)聚集; 集合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd is gathering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人群正在聚集。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher gathered all the pupils in the auditorium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师把全体同学集合在礼堂内。</font><br>推断; 了解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gathered that he was the real leader.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我推想他是真正的领导人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>收集, 收拢(分散的东西)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher went round the class to gather the papers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师在教室里走了一圈收试卷。</font><br>采集, 采拾; 收割, 收获<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gathered me some good stamps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我收集了一些好邮票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My boyfriend gathered some beautiful flowers for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的男朋友为我采来一些美丽的花。</font><br>把…围住, 拉紧…; 打褶子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child's dress is neatly gathered at the neck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子的衣服在领口处打着整齐的皱褶。</font><br>\n
gay	<h3>gay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>快乐的, 欢快的; 轻松的, 愉快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The streets were crammed with gay, laughing crowd.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 街上挤满了欢乐嬉笑的人群。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children were gay and cheerful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们都很高兴。</font><br>轻率的, 不假思索的; 放荡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She leads a gay and wild life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她过着放荡不羁的生活。</font><br>同性恋的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know he was a gay person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道他是同性恋者。</font><br>\n
gaze	<h3>gaze</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>凝视, 注视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The climbers stood on the top of the mountain, gazing at the splendid view.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 登山队员们站在山顶, 凝视壮丽的景色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Never in his life had he gazed on such splendor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他生平从没有见过如此辉煌壮丽的场面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was the most beautiful woman he had ever gazed upon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是他见过的最美丽的女子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't gaze round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要左顾右盼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We gazed out over the limitless expanse of the desert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们凝望着那一片漫无边际的沙漠。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>凝视, 端详<br>\n
gear	<h3>gear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>用具, 设备, 衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They put the hunting gear into the boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把打猎工具放在小船上。</font><br>齿轮; 传动装置; (排)挡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This large gear turns the small one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个大齿轮带动那个小齿轮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A car has five gears.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车有五挡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>换挡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to gear down when you drive uphill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上坡行驶时必须换慢挡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使兴奋起来; 使准备好<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party is all geared up for the forthcoming election campaign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该党为即将来临的竞选活动做好了准备。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)搭配; (使)适合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cogs gear smoothly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 齿轮啮合得很好。</font><br>\n
gender	<h3>gender</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈语〉性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp French differs from English in having gender for all nouns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法语不同于英语, 所有的名词都有性。</font><br>\n
gene	<h3>gene</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈生〉基因<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have good genes from your parents, so you should live a long time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你从父母那儿获得优良的基因, 所以能够活得很长。</font><br>\n
general	<h3>general</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>普遍的, 全面的; 总体的, 整体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general opinion is in favour of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 舆论普遍对我们有利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These difficulties are general among people of his age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些困难在他那个年龄的人中普遍存在。</font><br>非专门的, 一般的<br>正常的, 常规的; 通常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The serum is available to the general public.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一般公众均可获得血清。</font><br>大致的, 笼统的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a general idea of how a car works.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对汽车怎样工作有一个大致的了解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your answer is too general.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的答案太笼统。</font><br>总的, 首席的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>将军<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general assigned him to do the tough task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将军派他去完成这项艰巨的任务。</font><br>\n
generally	<h3>generally</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>一般地, 通常, 大体上, 广泛地, 普遍地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We generally go to the sea for our holidays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们通常去海边度假。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I generally stay at home in the evening and am not at home on Saturday evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我晚上通常在家里, 而星期六晚上不在家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He failed to explain his meaning generally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他未能把自己的意思完全说清楚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan was generally welcomed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该计划大受欢迎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Generally speaking, parents love their children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一般说来, 父母爱他们的孩子。</font><br>\n
generate	<h3>generate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>生成, 产生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This new boiler generates more heat than the old one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个新锅炉产生的热量比旧锅炉多。</font><br>引起, 导致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book will continue to generate excitement for a long time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书将在很长一段时间里继续使人们为之激动。</font><br>\n
generation	<h3>generation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>同时代的人, 一代人, 一代<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People of my generation all think the same way about this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于这件事, 我们这代人都有同感。</font><br>产生, 发生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Steam and water power are used for the generation of electricity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蒸汽和水力可用来发电。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The biology class studied the generation of fruit flies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生物班的学生研究了果蝇的繁殖。</font><br>\n
generator	<h3>generator</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发电机, 发生器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an alternating current generator.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一台交流发电机。</font><br>\n
generous	<h3>generous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>慷慨的, 大方的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a generous contributor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位慷慨的捐助者。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was generous with her money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很乐于仗义疏财。</font><br>善良的, 宽宏大量的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was kind and generous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她心地善良, 宽容大量。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was generous of you to forgive me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你原谅我的过错真是宽宏大量。</font><br>大量的, 丰富的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always sets a generous table for guests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他招待客人吃饭, 菜式总是十分丰富。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That salary is more than generous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那工资很丰厚。</font><br>\n
genetic	<h3>genetic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>遗传(学)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's very difficult to treat genetic diseases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 遗传性疾病治疗起来很困难。</font><br>\n
genius	<h3>genius</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>天才, 天赋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mozart showed genius even at the age of six, when he began to compose minuets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莫扎特六岁时就开始创作小步舞曲, 展露才华。</font><br>天才人物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Einstein was a mathematical genius.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爱因斯坦是数学天才。</font><br>\n
gentle	<h3>gentle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>温和的, 和蔼的, 有礼貌的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cat is a gentle animal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猫是一种温顺的动物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our new teacher is gentle towards us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的新老师对我们很和蔼。</font><br>轻的, 柔和的; 和缓的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We ran down the hill along the gentle slope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们顺着和缓的斜坡跑下山。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must be gentle when holding a little baby.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抱小孩时要轻柔。</font><br>高尚的; 出身名门的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a person of gentle blood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出身名门。</font><br>\n
gentleman	<h3>gentleman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>上等人, 绅士, 君子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he is anything of a gentleman, he will pay the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 倘若他是位真君子, 他会付这笔钱的。</font><br>男人, 先生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ladies and gentlemen, it is time to begin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各位女士先生们, 该开会了。</font><br>富贵闲人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Harry dressed like a gentleman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哈瑞打扮得像个富贵闲人。</font><br>\n
genuine	<h3>genuine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>真的, 非人造的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This medal is made of genuine gold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这枚奖章是真金制成的。</font><br>真诚的, 真心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As time went on, a genuine friendship grew up between us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着时间的推移, 我们之间产生了一种真挚的友情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wish to help seems genuine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来他是真诚地想给予帮助。</font><br>\n
geography	<h3>geography</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地理(学)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like geography and history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢地理和历史。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fifth chapter will bear on the geography of the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第五章将论述这个国家的地理。</font><br>地形, 地势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're familiar with the geography of New England.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们熟悉新英格兰的地形。</font><br>\n

germ	<h3>germ</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>微生物; 病菌, 细菌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Colds are spread by germs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感冒由细菌传播。</font><br>(某事的)根源, 发端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have the germ of an idea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有一个初步的想法。</font><br>\n
gesture	<h3>gesture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手势, 姿势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a rude gesture with his fingers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用手指做了一个不礼貌的手势。</font><br>姿态, 表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His resignation was merely a gesture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的辞职只是一种姿态而已。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>做手势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The orator gestured vigorously while speaking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位演讲者讲话时用力地做手势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gestured to the waiter to bring some more coffee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她打手势示意服务员再拿些咖啡来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gestured her disapproval.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用手势表示不赞成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gestured me over with a movement of his head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他摆动一下头示意我过去。</font><br>\n
get	<h3>get</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>得到, 收到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got your telegram.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已经收到了你的电报。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They got notice from the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从警察那里得到通知。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you get a ticket for me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能给我搞张票吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll get a better position for him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要为他谋个更好的职位。</font><br>具有<br>使得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please go and get him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请去把他叫来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll get you there somehow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将设法把你送到那里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must get them to come over here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得设法让他们来这儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't get the car to start.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法使车发动起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll get the car going.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要让这辆车发动起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She got her watch robbed of.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的手表遭抢劫了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How did the boy get himself dirty?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子怎么搞得这么脏?</font><br>(去)拿来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm going to get my hat from the other room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要到另一个房间去拿我的帽子。</font><br>理解, 听到, 学得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you get what I mean?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你明白我的意思了吗?</font><br>感染上, 得(病)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got a bad cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得了重感冒。</font><br>抓住, 击中, 杀死<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police got the thief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察抓住了小偷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I got the minister on the ear with a potato.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我用土豆打中了部长的耳朵。</font><br>受到(惩罚等)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>到达, 来, 往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The visitors got here last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游客们是昨晚到达这里的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After travelling all summer, I was glad to get home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅行了整个夏天之后, 我很高兴回到了家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We won't get anywhere that way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样我们不可能有任何进展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll get nowhere if you follow his instruction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要是你按他的方法去做, 将会一事无成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tried to talk, but not knowing each other's language they didn't get far.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们试图交谈, 但因彼此语言不通, 还是没谈出什么名堂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开始, 逐渐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll get to like it in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你终究会喜欢它的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got to be rich.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他富了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When you get to know him you'll find he is quite nice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当你渐渐认识他时, 你会发现他很不错。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>遭到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got sick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got killed in the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在战争中阵亡了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They got punished by the teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们受到了教师的惩罚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You nearly got hit by that car!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你差点被车撞了。</font><br>成为, 变得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was getting an old woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在变成一个老太太。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In this way we get better results in teaching.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样我们的教学效果就比较好了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's getting chilly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天冷起来了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Outside it was getting light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外边天已经发白了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The days are getting longer and longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白天越来越长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food's getting cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饭菜快凉了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A white dress gets dirty very fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白色的衣服脏得快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is getting old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他老了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man seems to be getting younger and younger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人似乎越来越年轻了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am getting restless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我开始不耐烦了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got angry with me because of my remark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他由于我讲的话而生我的气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The UN began to get more and more powerful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 联合国开始变得越来越强大了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now, now, boys and girls, don't get so excited!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好了, 好了, 同学们, 别这么激动！</font><br>\n
ghost	<h3>ghost</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鬼, 幽灵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you believe in ghosts?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你相信有鬼吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked so terrified that I thought he'd seen a ghost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看上去如此害怕, 我以为他看见鬼了。</font><br>\n
giant	<h3>giant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>巨人, 大力士<br>伟人, 卓越人物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shakespeare is a giant among writers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莎士比亚是作家中的巨擘。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>特大的, 巨大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The giant packet gives you more for less money!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 特大的包装使你用便宜的价钱买到超值的分量！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not often that one so young has such a giant intellect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年纪这样轻、智力又如此高的人可不多。</font><br>\n
gift	<h3>gift</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>礼物, 赠品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I neglected to bring a gift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我忘了带一件礼物来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Christmas tree was decked with gifts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 圣诞树上挂满了各种礼品。</font><br>天赋, 天才<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her tactfulness is a remarkable gift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的机敏是一种非凡的天赋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This diplomat possessed an excellent gift for repartee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位外交官具有卓越的应对才能。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the gift to draw painting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有绘画的天分。</font><br>\n

give	<h3>give</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>给予, 赠送<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gives generously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他慷慨解囊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gave a correct answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给了个正确的答案。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gave me a book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给我一本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They gave the number as 72.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们得到的数字是72。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>供给, 提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play gives us some new ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个剧本为我们提供了一些新的观念。</font><br>交给, 托付<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give your money to the hotel manager to be looked after.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把你的钱交给旅馆经理保管。</font><br>做出(某一动作), 发出(声音等)<br>举办, 表演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A foreign guest is giving a lecture in English this afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一位外宾今天下午要来作英语演讲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The following evening a party was given for him by his parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二天晚上他父母为他举行了一个派对。</font><br>付出, 出售<br>产生, 引起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun gives the earth light and warmth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳使地球得到光和热。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They gave me to believe they were coming.</font></i><br><font given	<h3>given</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>规定的, 特定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work must be done within the given time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个工作必须在规定的时间内完成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were to meet at a given time and place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们要在规定的时间和地点会晤。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示原因)考虑到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Given the present conditions, I think she's done rather well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 考虑到目前的条件, 我认为她已做得相当出色。</font><br>(表示假设)倘若; 假定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Given the chance, I'll do it again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果有机会, 我会再干一次。</font><br>\n
glad	<h3>glad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>高兴的, 欢喜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am glad about his new job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我为他的新工作感到高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall be glad for you to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能来我将很高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am glad you have succeeded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你成功了我感到高兴。</font><br>使人高兴的, 令人快乐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How did you get the glad news?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是如何得到这个令人高兴的消息的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a long separation, they held a glad meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阔别多年之后, 他们举行了一个令人愉快的聚会。</font><br>乐意的, 情愿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll be glad to do you a favour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我愿意为你效劳。</font><br>\n
glance	<h3>glance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>一瞥, 扫视; 略视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't glance left and right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要左顾右盼。</font><br>闪耀, 闪光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is glancing in the sunlight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水面在阳光下闪闪发光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一瞥, 瞥视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The women exchanged glances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女人们互使眼色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a glance over the notes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他匆匆地看了一下笔记。</font><br>闪光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A glance from one of the moving swords fell across his eyes and prevented him from seeing the blow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 挥动的剑发出一道闪光, 射向他的眼睛, 使他看不到这一重击。</font><br>滑过, 掠过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A sudden glance of the sword cut his shoulder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剑突然擦过, 伤了他的肩膀。</font><br>\n
glass	<h3>glass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>玻璃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Glass breaks easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玻璃易碎。</font><br>玻璃器皿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People often give glass as wedding presents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们常常赠送玻璃器皿作为结婚礼物。</font><br>玻璃杯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dropped his glass on the floor and broke it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把玻璃杯掉到地板上打碎了。</font><br>一杯之量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I could really want a large glass of beer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真想要一大杯啤酒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I used to drink three glasses of cold water in the morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我以前早上常喝三杯冷水。</font><br>眼镜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I need glasses when I watch television.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看电视时需戴眼镜。</font><br>镜子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked in the glass to check that his tie was straight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对着镜子看领带是否系正。</font><br>\n
glimpse	<h3>glimpse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>瞥见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I glimpsed her among the crowd just now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我刚才看到她在人群里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I glimpsed a bleak future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我隐约感到前途黯淡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She glimpsed him leaving.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她瞥见他走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I glimpsed a rat running past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看到一只老鼠跑过去了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一瞥, 一看<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One glimpse at himself in the mirror was enough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让他照着镜子看自己一眼就够了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She catches a glimpse of a car in the distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一眼就瞥见了远处的汽车。</font><br>\n
global	<h3>global</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>全球的, 全世界的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A global environmental meeting is going to be held here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个全球环境会议将在这里举行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crisis here caught the global attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里的危机引起了全世界的注意。</font><br>整体的, 总括的, 全面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The report takes a global view of the company's problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份报告对公司的问题作了综合性的论述。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chart showed us the global output of a factory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张图表展示了一个工厂的总产量。</font><br>\n
globe	<h3>globe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地球, 世界<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is plenty of water on the face of the globe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球表面有大量的水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're planning to travel round the globe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正计划做一次环球旅行。</font><br>球体; 球状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun is an immense globe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳是一个巨大的球体。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The silvery globe of the moon hung in the sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 银盘似的月亮悬挂在空中。</font><br>地球仪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We use a globe in our geography class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在地理课上使用地球仪。</font><br>\n
gloomy	<h3>gloomy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>黑暗的, 阴暗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy sat in a gloomy corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小男孩坐在一个阴暗的角落。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is so gloomy in the room that you should turn on the light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间内太暗, 你应该打开灯。</font><br>令人沮丧的, 令人失望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I saw their gloomy faces, I knew something was wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当我看到他们沮丧的脸时, 我知道出事了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Chances of getting the job were slim, so the young man felt gloomy about the future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 得到这份工作的机会很小, 所以这位青年人感到前途渺茫。</font><br>\n
glorious	<h3>glorious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>荣誉的, 光荣的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are our glorious traditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是我们的光荣传统。</font><br>辉煌的, 壮丽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army won a glorious victory in the first battle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队在第一场战役中取得了辉煌的胜利。</font><br>〈口〉非常愉快的; 令人快乐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a glorious time at the seaside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在海边度过了愉快的时光。</font><br>\n
glory	<h3>glory</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>光荣, 荣誉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was bathed in glory on the day he became the Ministry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在成为部长的那一天他感到无上光荣。</font><br>美丽, 壮丽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After years of neglect-ing, the palace has been restored to its former glory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过若干年的沉寂, 这座宫殿恢复了以往的壮丽。</font><br>非常美的事物; 给人荣耀的事, 值得称赞的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Being knighted by the Queen was the crowning glory of his long and successful career.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由女王授予爵士荣衔是他漫长而成功的经历中的无上荣誉。</font><br>\n
