glow	<h3>glow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(无焰地)燃烧; 发炽热; 烧红<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cigarette glowed in the dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黑暗中有支香烟发着光。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole countryside glowed with autumn tints.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乡间处处呈现出灿烂的秋色。</font><br>脸红, 身体发热<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His cheeks glowed after the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 赛跑后他满脸通红。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>光亮, 光辉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a dull red glow in the night sky above the steelworks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜晚炼钢厂的上空闪着暗红色的光。</font><br>脸红, (身体)发热<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I felt a pleasant glow in all my veins from the wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 喝过酒后我浑身的血都热烘烘的, 感到很舒服。</font><br>热情; 强烈的感情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt a glow of satisfaction at her son's achievements.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她因儿子的成就而感到心满意足。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The glow went out of his voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说话的声音不那么激动了。</font><br>\n
glue	<h3>glue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用胶水将物体粘合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's no use tying it; you have to glue it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 捆它没用, 你必须用胶把它粘上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The carpenter glued two pieces of wood together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个木匠将两片木头粘起来。</font><br>\n
go	<h3>go</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>去; 走; 行; 驶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want to go, but she wants to stay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要走, 但她想留下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I told the driver to go slow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我叫司机开慢点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train is going north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 列车向北行驶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train goes in 15 minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车15分钟后开出。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has gone to the station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她去车站了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went to see his aunt last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他昨天晚上去看望了姨母。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go and have a glass of beer!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去喝一杯啤酒吧！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm going to enter a university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要上大学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often goes marketing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他经常去市场做生意。</font><br>进行, 运行, 运转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything went pretty smoothly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一切进展相当顺利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are still two years to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 还有两年时间可利用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The engine went beautifully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台发动机运转得相当好。</font><br>放, 置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My clothes won't all go into that tiny suitcase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个小衣箱装不下我所有的衣物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shirts go in the top drawer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 衬衫放在最上层的抽屉里。</font><br>伸展, 通往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where does this road go to?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条路通向哪里?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want a rope long enough to go from here to there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要一根可以从这里拉到那里的长绳子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The roots of this plant go deep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种植物的根扎得很深。</font><br>消失, 丢失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My fever has gone, but I have a cough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我退烧了, 但是还有点咳嗽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got up in the morning and found that all the snow had gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他早晨起来发现雪已经全部消失了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My purse has gone!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的钱包丢了!</font><br>垮下来, 死<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ladder went at the critical moment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在关键时刻梯子垮了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge went under the heavy weight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桥被压垮了。</font><br>花费, 销售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My money is going fast!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的钱花得很快！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A lot of my grant goes on books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的许多补助金都花在书上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How much of your money goes in rent?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你花在租金上的钱是多少?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These socks are going at one pound a pair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些短袜每双卖一英镑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The antique table went to the lady in the pink hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张古董桌子卖给那位戴粉红色帽子的女士了。</font><br>行, 有效<br>据说, 流传<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story goes that he was murdered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据说他被谋杀了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story goes that long ago there lived a king.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 流传着这样一个故事, 讲的是很久以前有个国王。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is how the song goes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这首歌就是这么唱的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>发出…声音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ducks go “quack”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸭子发出“嘎嘎”的叫声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guns went “boom”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大炮发出“轰轰”声。</font><br>变得, 成为, 处于…状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The woman had gone mad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那女人疯了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fruit quickly goes rotten in hot weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在热天, 水果会很快变质。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went pale at the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听到这个消息时脸色变得苍白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My absence had gone unnoticed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的缺席未能引起人家注意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轮到机会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've been on the swing for ten minutes, it's my go now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你荡秋千有10分钟了, 现在该轮到我了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll be given a go next time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下次你会有机会的。</font><br>精力, 干劲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The youth has plenty of go in him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人活力十足。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children are full of go.They run and play all day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些小孩子精力充沛, 他们整天跑呀玩呀。</font><br>\n
goal	<h3>goal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>球门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The centre forward headed the ball into goal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 中锋用头把球顶入球门。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many goals did you score in the last game?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上一场比赛你们进了几个球?</font><br>进球得的分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We scored a goal in the first minute of the game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比赛开始头一分钟, 我们就得了一分。</font><br>努力的对象, 目标<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he at last arrived in Rome he felt he had reached his goal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他终于抵达罗马时, 他感到自己已达到了目的。</font><br>\n
goat	<h3>goat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>山羊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We keep a few fowls and some goats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们养了几只鸡和一些山羊。</font><br>\n
god	<h3>god</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>神<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These people pray to many gods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些人向众神祈祷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Apollo was the Greek god of the arts, prophecy, medicine and light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阿波罗是希腊神话中主管艺术、预言、医药和光明之神。</font><br>上帝, 天主<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp God bless you!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愿上帝保佑你！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people believe in God; some don't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人信仰上帝, 有的人不信。</font><br>极受崇敬的人; 过分注意的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school captain was a god to the younger boys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校队队长被低年级的男孩子奉若神明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He makes a god of his work, and forgets his family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把工作看得极为神圣, 以致忘了自己的家庭。</font><br>\n
gold	<h3>gold</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>金, 黄金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gold is found in rocks and streams.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黄金蕴藏在岩石与溪流中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People used to pay in gold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以前人们常用金币交易。</font><br>金色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love the brown and gold of autumn leaves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢金褐色的秋叶。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>金(制)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some gold coins were dug out from the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几枚金币从地下挖了出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Winning an Olympic gold medal was, I suppose, the supreme moment of my life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为荣获奥运金牌是我一生中最重要的时刻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This watch is gold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块表是金的。</font><br>金色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Join the blue wool onto the end of the gold pattern and work the same stitches into the back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这金色图案边缘织上蓝毛线, 在背面也用同样的方法来织。</font><br>\n
golden	<h3>golden</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>金子般的, 金色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room was flooded with warm and golden sunlight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间充满着温暖、金色的阳光。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A vast expanse of golden crops lay before us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们眼前展现出一大片金黄色的庄稼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We feel sure your future here is golden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们确信你在这儿前途似锦。</font><br>极好的, 非常有利的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I missed a golden chance to make a lot of money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我失去了一个赚大钱的好机会。</font><br>\n
golf	<h3>golf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>高尔夫球运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They played a round of golf.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们打了一场高尔夫球。</font><br>\n
good	<h3>good</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>良好的, 令人满意的, 正当的, 适宜的, 令人愉快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was pleased to hear good news about him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到他的好消息，她很高兴。</font><br>有用的, 合适的; 有益的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give me some good advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给我一些有用的建议。</font><br>好的; 新鲜的; 有效的<br>漂亮的, 有吸引力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl has a good look.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个女孩长得很好看。</font><br>聪明的; 精通的; 熟练的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a good skier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个滑雪能手。</font><br>有道德的; 心地善良的, 助人为乐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a good young person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个有道德的年轻人。</font><br>充分的, 彻底的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their team gave us a good beating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们队把我们彻底打败了。</font><br>相当大的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>有道德的事, 善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is religion always a force for good?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宗教一向是诲人从善的力量吗?</font><br>好处, 利益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I knew it was no good to say anything, so I stood by Mary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道说什么也没有用, 所以就站在玛丽一边。</font><br>\n
goodbye	<h3>goodbye</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>再见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I said goodbye and rushed away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我说了声再见就跑了。</font><br>\n
goodness	<h3>goodness</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>良好, 善良, 优良<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In spite of the bad things he's done I still believe in his essential goodness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管他做了坏事, 我仍然相信他本性是善良的。</font><br>精华, 精髓<br>上帝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For goodness' sake, stop talking!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看在上帝的分儿上, 别再说了！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>天哪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Goodness, have you been expelled?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天哪, 你已被开除了吗?</font><br>\n
goods	<h3>goods</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>商品, 货物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There're a large variety of goods in the shops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 商店里有各式各样的商品。</font><br>个人财物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bequeathed her all his worldly goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把所有的财物遗赠给她。</font><br>\n
goose	<h3>goose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鹅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmer kept many geese on his pond.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位农民在他的池塘里养了许多鹅。</font><br>鹅肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dislikes to eat goose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她讨厌吃鹅肉。</font><br>傻瓜, 笨蛋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jane did such a thing, she is really as silly as a goose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简竟然干出这种事, 她实在是太蠢了。</font><br>\n
govern	<h3>govern</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>统治<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A king governs in that country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国家由国王统治。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>控制; 支配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One can't completely govern one's thoughts at all times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人不能始终控制得住自己的思想。</font><br>\n
government	<h3>government</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>政府<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Foreign governments have been consulted about this decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一决定曾征询过外国政府的意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government is responsible for the provision of education for all the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府有责任向所有儿童提供教育。</font><br>治理的形式; 政体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their country has democratic government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们国家实行民主政体。</font><br>治理, 统治<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Government of a large city is very difficult.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 管理一个大城市是非常困难的。</font><br>\n
governor	<h3>governor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>统治者, 管辖者, 地方长官; 州长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was elected governor of the state of California.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他当选为加州州长。</font><br>理事, 董事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The head teacher is appointed by the school governor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校长是由学校的董事任命的。</font><br>\n
gown	<h3>gown</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>女长服, 礼服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bought an evening gown for the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为这次聚会买了一件晚礼服。</font><br>宽松长外衣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I went downstairs in my dressing gown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我穿着睡衣走下楼去。</font><br>\n
grab	<h3>grab</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>抢先, 抢占<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't grab!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要抢！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is rude to grab a seat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抢占座位是不礼貌的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>攫取, 抓住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joe grabbed him by the collar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乔抓住他的衣领。</font><br>对…有好感, 对…产生影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How does the idea of a holiday in Spain grab you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对于到西班牙去度假这个主意感兴趣吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>试图抓取, 有意抢夺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief made a grab at my bag but I pushed him away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贼想抢我的手提包, 但被我推开了。</font><br>\n
grace	<h3>grace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>优美<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gymnast performed on the balance beam with an easy grace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 体操运动员在平衡木上表演得优美自如。</font><br>风度, 魅力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A young man with graces appeared on the stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 舞台上出现了一位风度翩翩的年轻人。</font><br>宽限, 缓期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Payment is due today, but I gave her a week's grace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天付款到期, 但我给了她一个星期的宽限。</font><br>恩泽, 善意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had been the king's favourite, and his sudden fall from grace surprised everyone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他本是国王的宠臣, 一朝失宠众人都感到意外。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修饰或装扮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fine paintings graced the walls of the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些精美的绘画使四壁生辉。</font><br>\n
graceful	<h3>graceful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>优美的, 文雅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tall graceful form of a woman appeared at the top of the stairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个体形修长优美的女人出现在楼梯顶上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ballet dancer is so graceful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 芭蕾舞演员的姿态是如此的优美。</font><br>得体的, 礼貌而周到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His refusal was worded in such a graceful way that we could not be offended.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他婉言谢绝, 无损于我们的颜面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her apology was so graceful that we forgave her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的道歉很得体, 我们只好原谅了她。</font><br>\n
grade	<h3>grade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(官阶、质量)等级, 品级, 阶段, 程度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The milk is sold in grades.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛奶分等级出售。</font><br>〈尤美〉 (考试或作业的)分数, 评分等级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He merits a grade of B on his composition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的作文分数应该得B。</font><br>〈尤美〉 (学生受测试的)技巧水平(尤指音乐方面)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The music exam has eight grades; I have passed Grade 1, the easiest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐考试分为八级, 我已通过了最容易的第一级。</font><br>〈美〉 年级; (按年级划分的)小学生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you in high school or are you still in the grades?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你上中学了, 还是仍在上小学?</font><br>\n
gradual	<h3>gradual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>渐渐的, 逐步的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor noticed a gradual improvement in his patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生注意到病人在逐渐恢复健康。</font><br>\n
graduate	<h3>graduate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>〈美〉毕业了的, 研究生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a graduate nurse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是护士学院的毕业生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈英〉大学毕业生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a college graduate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个大学毕业生。</font><br>〈美〉毕业生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Graduates from our school are working all over the island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们学校的毕业生在全岛各地工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(从…)大学毕业, 获得(学士)学位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He graduated at Oxford.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他毕业于牛津大学。</font><br>〈美〉(使)毕业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is three years since he graduated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他毕业三年了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The university graduated 1５００ students last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该大学去年有1500位学生毕业。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>划分级别<br>\n

grass	<h3>grass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>草, 牧草<br>禾本科植物<br>草地, 草坪; 牧场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm just going to cut the grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我正打算去修剪草坪。</font><br>告密者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was once a professional grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾是一个职业告密者。</font><br>\n
grateful	<h3>grateful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>感激的, 感谢的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sent us a grateful letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们给我们寄来了一封感谢信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd be very grateful if you could let me know as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你尽快让我知道我将非常感激。</font><br>\n
gratitude	<h3>gratitude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>感激, 感谢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her eyes were immediately filled with gratitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的眼里立刻充满了感激之情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her eyes were immediately filled with gratitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的眼里立刻充满了感激之情。</font><br>\n
grave	<h3>grave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>坟墓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She laid flowers on the grave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把花放在坟上。</font><br>死亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drank himself into an early grave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因喝酒过度而过早死去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(指情况)严重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This heavy rain could have grave consequences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场大雨会造成严重后果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The situation was grave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况是严重的。</font><br>严肃的, 庄重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looks terribly grave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸色很严肃。</font><br>\n
gravity	<h3>gravity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>万有引力; 地心引力; 重力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An apple falls down because of gravity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于重力的关系, 苹果往下掉。</font><br>严重性; 严肃, 庄严<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't think you realize the gravity of the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为你没意识到局势的严重性。</font><br>\n
gray	<h3>gray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>灰色,暗淡,灰暗<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>灰色的,灰白的,老的,老练的,阴沉的,〈美俚〉广告商的,广告业的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>v.</i></font><br>(使)变灰色<br>\n
great	<h3>great</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>大的, 巨大的; 非常的, 很多的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That great tree takes away all the light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那棵大树把光线全给遮住了。</font><br>距离遥远的, 时间久远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was a great while ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是很久以前的事了。</font><br>格外的, 相当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You take great care to do it properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要格外用心地把这事做好。</font><br>伟大的, 杰出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's the greatest man I have ever seen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我见过的最伟大的人物。</font><br>非常愉快的, 令人满意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's great to see you again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 又见到你, 实在太好了。</font><br>擅长, 精于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is great on the subject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他精于此道。</font><br>重要的, 显著的, 值得注意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's a great decision indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那的确是一项重大的决定。</font><br>无比的, 无双的, 极好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She grasped a great chance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她抓住了一个极好的机会。</font><br>名副其实的, 真正的, 不一般的, 不寻常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of great executive ability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个具有极高管理能力的人。</font><br>\n
greedy	<h3>greedy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>贪吃的, 贪心的, 贪婪的, 渴望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a greedy little boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个贪吃的小男孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was greedy of them to eat up all the candy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把所有的糖都吃光了, 真贪吃。</font><br>\n
green	<h3>green</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>绿色的, 青色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In front of the hill are green fields.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 山前是一片绿油油的田地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our new car is green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的新车是绿色的。</font><br>未熟的, 生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Green apples are sour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未熟的苹果是酸的。</font><br>未干的, 潮湿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Green wood does not burn well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未干燥的木柴不易燃烧。</font><br>未成熟的, 无经验的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a green hand at such things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做这样的事她是个生手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man is still green at his job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人对自己的工作尚无经验。</font><br>面色苍白的, 带病容的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hogan went slightly green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 霍根的面色苍白。</font><br>主张保护环境的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He posed a green political view.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提出一个主张保护环境的政见。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>绿色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our eyes were filled with the rich green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们眼前是一片碧绿的景色。</font><br>绿色的衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed in green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她身穿绿色衣服。</font><br>绿色蔬菜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the greengrocers' there are varieties of greens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 菜市场里有各种各样的蔬菜。</font><br>植物, 绿叶<br><i><font They are dancing on the green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在草坪上跳舞。</font><br>\n

grey	<h3>grey</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>灰色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This colour is grey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种颜色是灰色。</font><br>灰色衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed in grey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着灰色服装。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>灰色的, 灰白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wore a grey suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿一套灰衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His face turned grey as he heard the bad news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当听到这个坏消息时, 他的脸色变得灰白。</font><br>灰发的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is growing grey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他头发白起来了。</font><br>灰暗的, 阴沉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day started out grey with a shower or two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天破晓时阴沉沉的, 下了一两场阵雨。</font><br>郁闷的, 单调乏味的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To her, life seems grey and joyless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对她来讲, 人生似乎很乏味。</font><br>无生气的, 不突出的, 无名的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The identity of these grey men of politics should be revealed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 应揭露这些不露身份的政界人士的身份。</font><br>白人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What about that grey girl in New York?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纽约的那位白人姑娘你中意吗?</font><br>\n
grief	<h3>grief</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>悲伤, 悲痛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Love, hate, joy, fear and grief are emotions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爱、恨、高兴、恐惧、悲伤都是情感。</font><br>悲伤的事, 悲痛的缘由<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her death was a real grief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的去世实在令人痛心。</font><br>\n
grind	<h3>grind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>磨碎; 嚼碎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This wheat grinds well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种麦子很好磨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ground the knife sharp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把刀磨锋利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you please grind a pound of coffee for me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我磨一磅咖啡好吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>旋转开动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He threw the cigarette down and ground it under his heel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把烟卷丢到地上, 用脚踩灭。</font><br>压迫; 折磨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Slaves were mercilessly ground down by slave holders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奴隶受奴隶主的残酷压迫。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>磨, 碾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are several different grinds of coffee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有好几种不同等级的磨好的咖啡。</font><br>苦差事, 苦活儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you find learning English a grind?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你觉得学英语是件苦事吗?</font><br>\n
grip	<h3>grip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>紧握, 抓牢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His grip weakened as he was tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为累了, 他紧握的手放松了。</font><br>掌握, 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He keeps a firm grip on his children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对孩子们管得很严。</font><br>理解力, 控制力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have a good grip of several languages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对几种语言有深刻了解。</font><br>握法, 手法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To improve your tennis strokes you try using a different grip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了提高你网球的击球法, 你试试用另一种握拍方法。</font><br>发夹; 把手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought some hair grips for his wife in the fair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在集市上为妻子买了一些发夹。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>紧握, 抓紧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their hands gripped hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们紧紧握手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gripped my hand in fear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因害怕而紧握住我的手。</font><br>吸引, 引起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story grips.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这故事有吸引力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pictures gripped my imagination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些绘画吸引着我, 使我浮想联翩。</font><br>\n

gross	<h3>gross</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>臃肿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's not just fat.He's positively gross!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不只是胖, 他是过于肥胖！</font><br>粗俗的, 粗野的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gross feeder likes gross food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 滥食者爱吃粗食。</font><br>总的, 毛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gross weight of the box of chocolates is 500 grams.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那盒巧克力的全部重量是500克。</font><br>显而易见的, 显然恶劣的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a gross mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他犯了严重的错误。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>获得(…的)总收入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her last film grossed a million pounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拍最后一部影片总共赚了100万英镑。</font><br>\n
ground	<h3>ground</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slipped off the ladder and fell to the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从梯子上滑下来摔在地上。</font><br>地域, 水域<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The land near the border is disputed ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 靠近边界的土地是有争议的地区。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is one of the world's best fishing grounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是世界上最好的渔场之一。</font><br>场地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cheers of the fans echoed round the ground as the team appeared.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球队一上场, 球迷们的欢呼声立即响遍全场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Girls and boys are playing in the school grounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 男女学生们正在校园内玩耍。</font><br>建筑物四周的土地或花园; 庭园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now that you've seen the house, I'll show you the grounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 屋子你已看过了, 我领你参观一下庭园。</font><br>泥土, 土地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ground is dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 泥土干了。</font><br>理由<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What grounds have you for thinking so?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有什么理由这样想?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grounds for his action was never clearly stated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从未清楚地说明过采取这一行动的根据。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>搁浅; 停飞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship has grounded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这船已搁浅了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the planes today have grounded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天所有的飞机都停飞了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cloudy skies grounded planes to Washington.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天空多云使飞往华盛顿的飞机停飞。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>将…放在地上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy grounded arms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人放下武器投降了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boxer was grounded by his opponent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个拳击手被对手打倒在地。</font><br>\n
group	<h3>group</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>组, 群, 团体, 类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The research group is ready to start its work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个研究小组已准备好随时开始工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Swallows come by groups at the advent of spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 春天来临时燕子成群飞来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A large group of chimpanzees was feeding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一大群黑猩猩在吃东西。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A group of us are going up to London for the day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有些人要去伦敦一天。</font><br>小型流行音乐演奏组<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a lead singer in a pop group.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是流行歌曲演唱团体的最重要的歌手。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>使成群; 集合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Group together in three.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每三人一组！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please group all those tall flowers here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把所有高的花放在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Theatres and cinemas were grouped mainly on the two streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧院和电影院主要集中在那两条街上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分类; 归类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He grouped students according to ability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他按能力把学生们分类。</font><br>\n
grow	<h3>grow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>种植<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This farm grows mainly flowers and vegetables.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个农场主要种植蔬菜和花卉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmer has grown the seed a big tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个农民种下的种子长成了大树。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>生长, 发育<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Babies grow very quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿长得很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crops are growing well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 庄稼长得很好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>渐渐变得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company has grown rapidly in the last five years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司近五年来迅速地发展壮大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's growing to like him better.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她渐渐地更喜欢他了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've changed a lot.You have grown big boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你变了许多, 已经长成大小伙子了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As its population grows larger, the world seems to grow smaller.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着人口的增多, 世界似乎在逐渐变小。</font><br>\n
growth	<h3>growth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生长, 发育<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cold weather retards the growth of the crops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 寒冷的天气妨碍作物的生长。</font><br>增加; 发展, 扩大<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rapid industrial growth makes new demands on science and technology.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业的发展对科技提出新要求。</font><br>生长物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nails are thin horny growths at the ends of the fingers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 指甲是生长在手指头尖端的细薄角质物。</font><br>\n
guarantee	<h3>guarantee</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保证; 担保<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can't guarantee our workers' regular employment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不能保证我们的工人定期受雇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We guarantee to be here tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们保证明天来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I guarantee you'll enjoy yourself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我保证你会过得很快活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you guarantee me a job when I get there?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以确保我到那儿就可以找到一份工作吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can guarantee it pure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们可以保证它的纯度。</font><br>使(事情)可能发生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His turning up will guarantee the success of the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一出席, 会议便成功在望。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保证, 保障; 保证书; 保用期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you give me your guarantee that the goods will be delivered before Friday?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能给我保证这批货在星期五之前交货吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This guarantee is valid for one year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份保证书有效期为一年。</font><br>担保, 担保人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If I try to borrow 10, 000 from the bank, will you be my guarantee?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我向银行借一万美元, 你愿意作我的保证人吗?</font><br>担保品, 抵押品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What guarantee can you offer?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能拿什么作抵押?</font><br>\n
guard	<h3>guard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>保护; 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three men guarded him whenever he went out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当他外出时都有三个人保护他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers guarded the prince whenever he left the palace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当王子离开皇宫, 士兵们都要保护他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two fierce griffins guarded the entrance to the castle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在城堡的进门处, 守着两个凶猛的怪物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's our duty to guard this bridge and not let the enemy pass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的责任是守卫这座桥不让敌人通过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Guard the secret with your life, tell it to no one!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要以生命来保守秘密, 不要告诉任何人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Guard your temper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 克制住你的脾气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better guard your tongue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好说话谨慎些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The player was guarded closely by her opponent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那名运动员被她的对手紧紧地看住。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When they exchanged ideas, their talk was too guarded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在他们交换意见时, 说话都很谨慎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boxer is hitting with his right arm, guarding with his left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个拳击手是用右手出击, 左手防护。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>警戒, 警惕, 守卫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wears the guard on his expression.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸部带有戒备的神情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the prisoners are under close guard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的犯人都在严密的看守之下。</font><br>卫兵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guard won't let anyone through the gate without a pass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 卫兵不让任何没有通行证的人通过大门。</font><br>警卫队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A guard is made of eight soldiers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 卫队由八个士兵组成。</font><br>防御姿势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dropped up his guard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他未做出防御姿势。</font><br>防护装置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Football players often wear shin guards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 足球运动员经常穿着护腿。</font><br>\n
guess	<h3>guess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>猜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't really know, I'm just guessing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真的不知道, 我仅仅是猜想。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Guess this riddle!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猜猜这道谜语！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I guess you to be her father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜想你是她父亲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I guess this hall to accommodate 1, 000 persons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜这个大厅能容纳1000人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>猜对, 猜中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She guessed the right answer at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她立刻猜出了正确的答案。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't guess how to control the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜不出来怎样操作那台机器。</font><br>想, 以为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She guessed that the letter had something to do with her husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她猜想这封信与她丈夫有关。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Is he right?”“I guess so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“他对吗?”“我想他是对的。”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I guess it sheer waste of time arguing about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来争论这件事纯粹是浪费时间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猜测, 估计, 猜想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll allow you three guesses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我让你猜三次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My guess is that he didn't come because his parents wouldn't let him come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜, 他没来是因为父母不让他来。</font><br>\n

guide	<h3>guide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>引路; 指导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He flashed a torch to guide me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用手电筒为我引路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book guides us in using English words and idioms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书指导我们如何使用英语单词和习语。</font><br>操纵, 驾驶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We guided a ship through a storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们驾驶轮船通过了暴风雨。</font><br>影响, 支配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One should be guided by his sense of what is right and just.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人做事应当有是非观念。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>指导者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他姐姐过去一直指导他, 给他出主意, 是他的朋友。</font><br>向导, 导游<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A tourist guide will show you around.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一位导游将陪您到处参观。</font><br>有指导意义的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In English, the spelling of a word is not always a guide to the pronunciation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语里, 一个词的拼法不总是发音的依据。</font><br>\n
guideline	<h3>guideline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>指导方针, 准则<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We laid out the economic guidelines and followed it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们制定了经济方针并且遵循它。</font><br>\n
guilty	<h3>guilty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>内疚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then I would be guilty too.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样的话我也要感到内疚了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bob felt guilty that he had not made an attempt to save her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲍勃为未曾设法救她而感到内疚。</font><br>有罪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief sought forgiveness for his guilty acts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那小偷乞求宽恕他的罪行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man was found guilty of armed robbery, and condemned to eight years' imprisonment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人犯有持械抢劫罪, 因而被判八年监禁。</font><br>\n

gum	<h3>gum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>牙龈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog bared its gums at me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗龇着牙冲我叫。</font><br>口香糖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Americans like to chew gum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美国人喜欢嚼口香糖。</font><br>树胶, 胶水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can stick these pictures into the book with gum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们可用胶水把这几张画粘贴在书里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>胶合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My fingers gummed together as the sticky candy melted in my hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黏糖在我手中化开了, 把我的手指粘住了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you gummed the labels?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在标签上涂胶了吗?</font><br>\n
gun	<h3>gun</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>枪, 炮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctors also wore guns at their waist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生们的腰间也带着手枪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guns destroyed the enemy's position.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大炮摧毁了敌人的阵地。</font><br>发令枪声, 起跑信号<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>开枪, 开炮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The criminal gunned the policeman down and escaped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罪犯将警察击伤, 逃走了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>加大油门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The motorcycle gunned through the streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 摩托车加大油门穿过街道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pilot of the airplane gunned his engine for a sharp climb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞行员加大油门使飞机急剧爬升。</font><br>\n
guy	<h3>guy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>家伙, 伙计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bad guy is very dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个坏人很阴险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who is that guy?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那伙计是谁?</font><br>\n

hail	<h3>hail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雹子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hail fell with such violence that it broke windows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰雹猛落, 把玻璃窗也砸破了。</font><br>一阵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a hail of angry words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愤怒的话语如冰雹似地砸来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>下雹子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's hailing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 正在下冰雹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sometimes it hails during a summer thundershower.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有时候夏天的雷阵雨中会夹有冰雹。</font><br>如冰雹般地降下<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>致敬; 向…欢呼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Millions of people hailed the astronauts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数百万人向宇航员们欢呼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They hailed us cordially.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们热情地欢迎我们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Here comes the new teacher, let's hail him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新老师来了, 我们欢迎他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hailed them as soon as they stood on the stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一站到台上, 我们就开始欢迎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people lined the streets to hail the returning heroes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们夹道欢迎凯旋的英雄们。</font><br>打信号示意(计程车等)停下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She hailed a taxi for him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给他叫了一辆出租车。</font><br>\n

half	<h3>half</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>一半的, 半个的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Half the apples are bad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些苹果有一半是坏的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They stood in half a circle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们站成半圆形。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A half truth is often no better than a lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 半真半假的话不见得比说谎要好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Half knowledge of anything is dangerous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对任何东西一知半解都是危险的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My home is half a kilometre away from here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我家离这儿有半公里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went out at half nine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他九点半出门。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I met him half an hour ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我半小时前碰到他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>半, 一半<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cut the apple into halves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这个苹果切成两半。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's in the bottom half of the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在班上的名次位于后一半。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Railway fares are reduced by half for children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁路旅费对儿童减半。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Half of ten is five.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 十的一半是五。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Half of the apples are unripe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一半的苹果不熟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Half of them are gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们之中的一半人走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only half of us came last Tuesday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上星期二我们只有一半人来了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gave me half, and kept the other half for her husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给了我一半, 把另一半留给她的丈夫了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>一半<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was half under the bed, with his legs sticking out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一半身子在床上, 腿伸在外面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My work is not half done yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的工作还没做完一半呢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These potatoes are only half cooked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些土豆煮得半生不熟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were driving half when the car broke down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当汽车抛锚时, 我们正行驶了一半的路程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was half laughing, half crying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她半哭半笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oh, I'm half dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哦, 我快累死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was half dead from hunger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩由于饥饿已经半死不活的了。</font><br>\n

halt	<h3>halt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>停住, 停止, 暂停<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the children's play got too noisy, their mother called a accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车及时停了下来, 避免了一场车祸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's about time we called a halt to all this senseless arguing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在正是我们停止一切无谓争论的时候了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)停下来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Halt color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 论据错误百出, 有时根本站不住脚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The officer halted his troops for a rest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军官命令部队停止行进, 休息一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last they have halted work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后他们停止工作了。</font><br><i><font They halted financial support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们停止了经济援助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one can halt the advance of history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没人能阻挡历史的前进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose was to halt the rise in the exchange rate of the Swiss franc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 目的在于制止瑞士法郎汇率上涨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the trains were halted when the storm started.</font></i><br><font hammer	<h3>hammer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>锤, 铁榔头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The only tools in the house are a hammer and a saw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 屋子里仅有的工具是一把锤子和一把锯。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>锤打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hammered a picture frame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我钉了个相框。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In order to hang the picture, he had to hammer a nail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了挂那幅画, 他必须钉枚钉子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blacksmith is hammering the red-hot metal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁匠正在锤烧红的铁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hammer metal with a hammer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用铁锤锤打金属。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hammered it flat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用锤子把它敲平。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The worker hammered the iron flat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人把铁锤平了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine can hammer metal very thin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器能把金属锤得很薄。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>击败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hammered a team.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们击败了一支队伍。</font><br>\n

说着他交给王教授一个试管。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As soon as I came out he handed me a bottle of salted water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一出来, He handed the papers to the headmaster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把文件交给校长了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He handed a letter to me when I went into the 这东西是昨天交给我的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hands the old granny upstairs and downstairs every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他每天扶那位老大娘上下楼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He handed the business over to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把业务(的处理权)转交给我。</font><br>\n

handle	<h3>handle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手柄, 把手<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>易于操作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This car handled easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆车开起来很灵活。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>处理, 应付, 对待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He refused to allow his secretary to handle confidential letters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不让秘书处理机密文件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wise father knows how to handle him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他聪明的父亲知道如何管教他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know how to handle the machine?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道怎样操作这台机器吗?</font><br>拿, 触, 摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wash your hands before you handle my books, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在拿我的书之前, 请你先洗手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't handle the merchandise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要摸这些商品。</font><br>\n

handy	<h3>handy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>方便的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good toolbox is a handy thing to have in any house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何一个家庭都应备有一个好的工具箱以便随时使用。</font><br>手边的; 附近的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our flat is very handy for the school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的住所离学校很近, 非常方便。</font><br>手巧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a handy girl who can turn her hand to anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个心灵手巧的姑娘。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is handy with the needle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是做针线活的巧手。</font><br>\n
hang	<h3>hang</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>悬, 挂, 垂下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The curtains hung well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗帘垂挂得挺合适。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clouds are hanging low today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天云层很低。</font><br>(被)绞死, 吊死<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was hanged for his crimes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因犯罪而被处绞刑。</font><br>贴, 固定, 安装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door hangs badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这扇门装得不好。</font><br>\n

happy	<h3>happy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>幸福的, 愉快的, 高兴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a happy reunion after many years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在分别多年之后又愉快地团聚在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was happy sitting among her students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坐在学生中间很高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am so happy that you could visit us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能来看望我们, 我真高兴。</font><br>对…感到满意的; 认为…是对的[好的]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you happy with his work?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对他的工作满意吗?</font><br>乐意的, 没有困难的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is happy in doing good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他乐于行善。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll be happy to help if you need us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你需要的话, 我们将乐意帮助。</font><br>幸运的, 运气好的<br>\n
harbor	<h3>harbor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>海港<br>\n
harbour	<h3>harbour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>海港, 港口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hong Kong has been endowed with one of the finest natural harbours in the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 香港是世界上最好的天然海港之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>庇护, 藏匿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an offence to harbour the criminals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窝藏罪犯是犯罪行为。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dirt harbours germs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 污垢中藏有病菌。</font><br>怀着, 怀有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't harbour unkind thoughts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要心怀不轨。</font><br>\n
hard	<h3>hard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>硬的, 坚实的, 坚固的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stone is hard to the touch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这石头很硬。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This candy is so hard that no one can chew it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种糖太硬, 没人嚼得动。</font><br>困难的, 难懂的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is English a hard language to learn?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语是一种难学的语言吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book is so hard that I cannot read it at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书太难了, 我一点儿也读不懂。</font><br>辛苦的, 努力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He earned a bare living by his hard work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他辛辛苦苦地工作仅够糊口。</font><br>有力的, 猛烈的<br>铁石心肠的, 冷酷无情的, 严厉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Good sports records come from hard training.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 良好的运动成绩是靠严格训练取得的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>努力地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man worked very hard and soon began to get ahead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻人很勤奋, 他的事业很快有了进展。</font><br>艰难地<br>严重地, 猛烈地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's raining harder than ever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨下得比以前更大了。</font><br>\n
harden	<h3>harden</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)变硬; (使)坚固; (使)硬化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snow hardened until ice was formed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雪成冰后变硬了。</font><br>(使)变得坚强<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mind hardened as he became used to difficulty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坚强起来了, 因为他已习惯于困难。</font><br>(使)变得冷酷无情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The positions of the two sides hardened.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 双方的立场变得更强硬了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hardened my heart against him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我硬起心肠来对待他。</font><br>\n
hardly	<h3>hardly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>几乎没有, 几乎不<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could hardly see anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他几乎什么也看不到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm so tired that I can hardly walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我太累, 简直走不动了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hardly drinks, does he?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很少喝酒, 是吧?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have got hardly any money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我几乎没有钱了。</font><br>刚刚, 仅仅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had hardly started before[when] it began to rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们刚出发, 就开始下雨。</font><br>\n

harm	<h3>harm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>损害, 危害, 伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her film was a complete failure, and this did her reputation a lot of harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她这部电影是彻底的失败了, 使她的名声受到很大的损害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Excessive drinking will do you harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过量饮酒对身体有害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He means no harm by saying what he thinks, but people tend to be upset by it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想到什么就说什么, 并无恶意, 但人们听了心里总是不舒服。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(使)受到损害, 伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have never harmed anyone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从没伤害过任何人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Smoking harms our health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吸烟有害健康。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a fire in our street, but no one was harmed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们街上发生了火灾, 但无人受伤。</font><br>\n

harmony	<h3>harmony</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>和睦, 融洽, 一致; 和谐, 协调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The couple lives in perfect harmony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对夫妇和睦地生活着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was perfect harmony between the two brothers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兄弟俩的感情非常融洽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His ideas were no longer in harmony with ours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他同我们的想法不再一致了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The harmony of sea and sky makes a beautiful picture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海天一色构成一幅美丽的图画。</font><br>\n

harvest	<h3>harvest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收割, 收获;  收获季节, 收获期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the harvest, the peasants began to prepare the soil for seed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 收割后, 农民就开始整地以便播种。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The summer harvest is about to start.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏收即将开始。</font><br>收成, 收获量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a good harvest that year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那一年收成好。</font><br>结果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not easy to reap the harvest of my hard work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 获得自己辛勤工作的成果是不容易的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>收割, 收成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try to harvest the fruit before the first frost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在第一次霜冻以前要设法把水果收摘完。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>收到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He harvested rewards in fame and wealth for his successful experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因试验成功而名利双收。</font><br>\n
haste	<h3>haste</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>急忙, 匆忙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The contract says the work must be completed with all possible haste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 合同上写明这项工作必须尽快完成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make haste, or we shall miss the train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 快一点, 要不然我们就赶不上火车了。</font><br>\n
hat	<h3>hat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>帽子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She happened to meet a girl in a red hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她刚好遇到了一位戴红帽子的姑娘。</font><br>\n
hate	<h3>hate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>憎恨, 讨厌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hates his little sister because she destroyed all his toys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讨厌他的小妹妹, 因为她弄坏了他所有的玩具。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌星期天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate you to use such vulgar words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌你用这种下流的字眼。</font><br>不愿, 不喜欢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My cat hates dogs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我家的猫不喜欢狗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hates leaving the office and going on holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不愿离开办公室去度假。</font><br>为…感到抱歉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Poor child, I hate to leave you like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可怜的孩子, 我真不愿这样离开你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate to disturb you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很遗憾来打扰你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate that they should be worried about trifles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 真遗憾, 他们竟为区区小事发愁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>憎恨; 厌恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt hate toward his enemies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对他的敌人感到憎恨。</font><br>所恨的人或物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her chief hates are gambling and stealing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最恨的事就是赌博和偷窃。</font><br>\n
hatred	<h3>hatred</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>仇恨, 憎恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is full of hatred for the men who killed her husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对那些杀死她丈夫的人心中充满仇恨。</font><br>厌恶的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have a hatred of bad workmanship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们很讨厌低劣的工艺品。</font><br>\n
haul	<h3>haul</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拖, 拉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you haul hard you will divert the fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果拉网太猛, 鱼会被吓跑的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fishermen haul the net.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 渔民们拉鱼网。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>运送<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trains haul freight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车拖运货物。</font><br>传讯<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拖, 拉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rope stood up under the strain of the haul.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这绳子经受不住紧拉。</font><br>拖运货物的距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a long haul home and we arrived exhausted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 搬运回家的这段路程特别长, 到家时我们已筋疲力尽。</font><br>一网的捕获量, 一次偷得的数量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fisherman had a good haul.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 渔夫捕到一大网鱼。</font><br>\n
have	<h3>have</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>(用以构成完成式及完成式的不定式)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car has arrived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车来了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have been to see John.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我去看过约翰了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've been writing letters all this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我写了一上午的信。</font><br>\n
