hazard	<h3>hazard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>尝试着做[提出]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have not used this article before, but they are willing to hazard a try.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种商品他们以前从未用过, 但愿意尝试一次。</font><br>冒风险<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't hazard your reputation by supporting that crook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要冒败坏你名声的危险去支持那个坏蛋。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>危险; 公害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He climbed into the car at the hazard of his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他冒着生命危险进了汽车。</font><br>\n
he	<h3>he</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>他; 它<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He that lives with wolves will learn to howl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 同恶人生活在一起将学会恶行。</font><br>一个人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone should do what he thinks best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人人都应做他认为是最好的事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “And what does HE want?”she growled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “他究竟要什么?”她大声吼道。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雄性动物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is your dog a he or a she?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的狗是公的还是母的?</font><br>\n
head	<h3>head</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>头部<br>领导, 首脑<br>上端, 顶部, 前端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Write your address at the head of this page.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把你的住址写在纸的上端。</font><br>个人<br>(牛、羊等)头数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has twenty head of cattle on the farm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在农场养了20头牛。</font><br>头脑, 智力<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>带领; 居…之首; 主管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His name heads the list.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的名字居名单之首。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their cars headed the funeral procession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的车队在葬礼队伍的最前面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He will head a firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将主管一家公司。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the president died, the vice president was chosen to head the firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总裁去世后, 大家选举副总裁为公司主管领导。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The delegation was headed by our Foreign Minister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个代表团由我们的外交部长任团长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>朝…行进; 长出头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are heading north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们在往北行进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd is heading eastward, believing that they can find gold there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人群正在向东移去, 他们认为在那里可以找到黄金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He realized that he was heading in the wrong direction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他意识到走错了方向。</font><br>\n

hear	<h3>hear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>听到, 听见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The deaf do not hear at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 聋子根本听不见声音。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hear the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到门开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I often hear him singing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我常听见他唱歌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard my name called.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到有人叫我的名字。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>听说, 得知<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've heard that you would graduate soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听说你很快就要毕业了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you heard why she did so?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你听说过她为什么要这么干吗?</font><br>听取; 审理<br>\n

heat	<h3>heat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>高温, 炎热<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heat from the fire will soon dry your coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炉火的高温很快就会烘干你的上衣。</font><br>激动, 热烈, 激烈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They argued with great heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们非常激烈地争论。</font><br>预赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He won the first heat, but lost the final.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在预赛中赢了, 但在决赛中输了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)热<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Grain heats in a pile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 粮食堆在一起会发热的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please heat me some milk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我热一些牛奶。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使激动, 激发<br>\n

heavy	<h3>heavy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This box is the heaviest of the three.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个箱子是三个箱子中最重的。</font><br>沉重的, 沉闷的, 忧郁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is laden with heavy responsibility.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他肩负重任。</font><br>迟钝的, (动作)艰难的<br>\n
hedge	<h3>hedge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>树篱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sheep got into the field through a gap in the hedge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 羊群从树篱的缺口跑向田野。</font><br>保护手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Buying gold may be a hedge against inflation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 购买黄金不失为防止通货膨胀的上策。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用树篱围起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They planted lilacs to hedge the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们种上紫丁香把院子围住了。</font><br>受…的束缚<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>回避, 避免<br>\n

high	<h3>high</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>高的; 高度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a high building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一幢很高的建筑物。</font><br>高级的, 重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man with glasses is a high official.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个戴眼镜的人是一位高级官员。</font><br>极度的, 强烈的; 价值高的, 数量大的; 奢侈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She enjoyed the high life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她过着奢侈的生活。</font><br>高尚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everybody has a high mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人人有一个崇高的理想。</font><br>全盛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I came to that city in high summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我去那个城市时正值盛夏。</font><br>高音调的, 尖声的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sang a high note.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她唱的是高音。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His voice is very high for a teenage boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对一个十几岁的男孩来说, 他的嗓音很尖。</font><br>开始变质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The beef is high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛肉变质了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>高, 高高地; 高音调地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They climbed high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们攀登得高。</font><br>在[向]高的地位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To live high does not mean being high in one's qualities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人的生活水平高并不等于品格也高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's risen high in society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有了很高的社会地位。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(最)高纪录, (最)高水平<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price of food reached a new high this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 食物价格本周已达到最高。</font><br>兴奋, 快感<br>\n

hire	<h3>hire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>雇用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No ordinary families can afford to hire servants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 普通人家雇不起仆人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hired a driver to take us on a tour of the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们雇了一个司机带我们游览这个城市。</font><br>租用<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>租用, 雇用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had the hire of a car for a week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他租用汽车一个星期。</font><br>租金, 工钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He paid the carriage hire to the driver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把马车租金给了马车夫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day's hire for the car is ten dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车每日的租金是十美元。</font><br>\n
his	<h3>his</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(he的所有格)他的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That man is his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人是他的父亲。</font><br>(he的物主代词)他的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That book is his, not mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是他的书, 不是我的。</font><br>\n
historic	<h3>historic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>历史上有名的, 具有重大历史意义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were lured by a curiosity to see the historic spot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们被好奇心驱使去看古迹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a historic occasion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是具有重大历史意义的时刻。</font><br>\n
historical	<h3>historical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>历史(学)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book is based on historical events.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书是根据历史事件写成的。</font><br>\n
history	<h3>history</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>历史学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp History is well taught in that school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那所学校历史教得很好。</font><br>历史<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Throughout history men have waged war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自有历史以来就有战争。</font><br>史实的叙述<br>经历, 履历; 来历<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This house has a strange history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所房子有一段奇怪的来历。</font><br>不再相关或不再重要的事实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She loved me once, but that's all ancient history now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她曾经爱过我, 但现在已成往事。</font><br>\n
hit	<h3>hit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打, 打击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boxer hits hard with his left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拳击手用其左手狠狠出击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ball sprang back and hit him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球弹回打在他身上。</font><br>碰撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cars hit with loud crash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车相撞发出巨大的轰隆声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hit a difficult point in my work, and decided it was time for a cup of tea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在工作中遇到了一个困难, 因此打算先喝杯茶休息一下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>伤害, 殃及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They hit the enemy one hard blow after another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们给敌人一个又一个的沉重打击。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一击, 击中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jim is still recovering from that hit on the head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吉姆头上挨了一拳, 还没有完全清醒过来。</font><br>成功而风行一时的事物<br>\n

hold	<h3>hold</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拿, 抱, 握住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hold the baby a minute, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把孩子抱一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was holding her sides with laughter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她捧腹大笑。</font><br>认为, 相信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hold that this is a right decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信这是个正确的决定。</font><br>包含; 容纳<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>保持, 持续<br>举行, 进行<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>有效, 适用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The law still holds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条法律仍然有效。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>握住, 抓住; 控制, 掌握<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have strengthened their hold on the troops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已加强对军队的控制。</font><br>用以握住的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are no holds for the hands on the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上没有抓手。</font><br>\n

hollow	<h3>hollow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>空的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bamboo is a sort of hollow plant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 竹子是一种中空的植物。</font><br>凹的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has hollow cheeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的双颊凹陷。</font><br>空洞的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave a hollow laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发出低沉空洞的笑声。</font><br>虚伪的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>洞, 坑, 凹地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hollow was full of trees but the higher ground was covered with grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 凹地树木成林, 但高处长满青草。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挖洞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They hollowed out a tunnel through the mountain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们挖通了穿山隧道。</font><br>\n

home	<h3>home</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>家; 住宅; 家乡, 故乡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the finest home in this city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是该城市最好的住宅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school is at convenient distance from my home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校在我家附近。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone loves their homes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人人都爱自己的家乡。</font><br>家庭<br>产地, 生长地; 发源地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yunnan province is the home of elephants and peacocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 云南是大象和孔雀的生息地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Paris is the home of women's fashions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 巴黎是妇女时装的中心。</font><br>收容所, 养育院<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a home for the blind in this town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个镇上有一家盲人院。</font><br>终点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hundred metres champion managed to get home by a second.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位百米赛冠军好不容易领先一秒到达终点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>家庭的, 在家里的; 家乡的; 总部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They enjoy home joys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们享受天伦之乐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is your home address?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的家庭住址是什么?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A happy home life needs the effort from both sides of the couple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美满的家庭生活要靠夫妻双方的努力。</font><br>家用的<br>本地的, 国内的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My bike is a home product.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的自行车是国产的。</font><br>主场的, 主队的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The home team was skinned alive this afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天下午主队输得惨极了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在家, 回家, 到家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl wanted to take this toy home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小女孩想把这玩具带回家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should send her home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该把她送到家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm home at last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我终于到家了。</font><br>尽可能深地; 击中要害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He struck the nail home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把钉子完全钉进去了。</font><br>\n

honest	<h3>honest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>诚实的, 正直的, 可靠的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An honest person has a lot of friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 诚实的人朋友多。</font><br>老实的, 真诚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is honest in all he does.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他干什么都是老老实实的。</font><br>坦诚的, 直率的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has an honest face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一张诚实坦率的脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must be honest with me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要对我坦率。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was very honest to tell me his story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他十分坦率地给我讲了他的故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked so honest that we accepted his story for true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看起来那么诚恳, 我们都把他的话当真了。</font><br>\n

honey	<h3>honey</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蜂蜜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Honey is very sweet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜂蜜很甜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your tea is sweetened with honey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的茶里加了蜂蜜变甜了。</font><br>〈口〉亲爱的; 宝贝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love you, honey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我爱你, 亲爱的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come here, my honeys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到这儿来, 我的宝贝们。</font><br>可爱的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That new car of his is a real honey!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的那辆新汽车真是棒极了！</font><br>\n

honor	<h3>honor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尊敬,敬意,荣誉,光荣<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>尊敬,给以荣誉<br>\n
honorable	<h3>honorable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可敬的,荣誉的,光荣的<br>\n
honour	<h3>honour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尊重, 敬重<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One must show honour to one's parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人人都应该尊敬父母。</font><br>名誉, 信用, 荣誉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her honour was discredited in the newspapers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的名声被报纸败坏了。</font><br>被引以为荣的人物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an honour to his country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是祖国的光荣。</font><br>荣幸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It has been a great honour your coming to visit me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 您来看我, 不胜荣幸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They feel deeply the honour of belonging to the Senate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为作为参议院的成员而深感荣幸。</font><br>各种荣誉称号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He received many honours from many cities, colleges and societies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他享有许多城市、大学及学会所授予的荣誉称号。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>尊敬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all honour courageous people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都尊重勇敢的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children should honour their father and mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们应该尊敬其父母。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lanny had honoured him as a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兰尼尊他为师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am honoured to be asked to speak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我应邀发言, 不胜荣幸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're deeply honoured that you should agree to join us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 想不到您会同意一起来, 真是不胜荣幸。</font><br>承兑, 执行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We demand that they honour this contract.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要求他们执行这份合同。</font><br>\n
honourable	<h3>honourable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>诚实的, 正直的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These businessmen are both competitive and honourable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些商人既有竞争性又很诚实。</font><br>尊敬的, 高尚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is descended from an honourable family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是名门望族的后裔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the most honourable of men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是品行最为高尚的人。</font><br>\n
hook	<h3>hook</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>钩住, 吊住, 挂住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This skirt hooks on the side.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件裙子在侧面有钩子扣住。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hook the window when you come in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你进来时把窗户扣好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hooked a large fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他钓了一条大鱼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>弯成钩形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hooked his arm round her neck and pulled her head down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一只胳膊钩在她的脖子上, 把她的头拉低。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>挂钩; 鱼钩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hang your coat on the hook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把你的外衣挂在钩上。</font><br>钩拳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He delivered a right hook to his opponent's jaw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给了对方下巴一记右钩拳。</font><br>转弯处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The driveway makes a hook around an old tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 车道绕过一棵老树来了个急转弯。</font><br>\n
hope	<h3>hope</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>希望, 期望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hopes of a peace settlement are now fading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和平解决的希望越来越小了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She never completely gave up hope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她从不完全放弃希望。</font><br>有希望的人或事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're my only hope.Please help me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是我惟一寄予希望的人, 请帮帮我。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>希望, 期望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have had no news from him but we're still hoping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有他的消息, 但我们仍在希望着能有。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hopes to have the problem settled as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他希望能尽快使这个问题得到解决。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope to have seen the film next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望下星期能看到这部电影。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hope that we will be better paid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们希望得到更好的报酬。</font><br>\n
hopeful	<h3>hopeful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>抱有希望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not very hopeful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不抱太多希望。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are hopeful about the future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对未来抱乐观态度。</font><br>给人以希望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a hopeful news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个鼓舞人心的消息。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>有成功希望的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The audition was attended by a score of young hopefuls.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 参加试音的是20个有成功希望的年轻人。</font><br>\n

however	<h3>however</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不管到什么程度, 无论如何<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll come however busy I am.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不管怎么忙都会来的。</font><br>然而, 可是, 不过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Later, however, he made up his mind to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可是, 后来他决定去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's raining hard. However, I still want to go there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然下着大雨, 我还是想去那儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>不管怎样<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But I am very much believable, however, you'll get him to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信你不管怎样都能把他请来。</font><br>\n

hurt	<h3>hurt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使受伤; 伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hurt his leg while playing football.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他踢足球时伤了腿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't hurt your pride on purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不是故意伤害你的自尊心。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>疼痛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My feet hurt when I walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我走路时脚痛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>对…有害; 对…有不良影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It won't hurt to postpone the matter for a few days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此事耽搁几天无所影响。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am sure smoking hurts you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我肯定吸烟会损害你的健康。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肉体上的伤害[痛苦]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one suffered any hurt in the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这场事故中没有人受伤。</font><br>精神上的痛苦[创伤]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a severe hurt to her pride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对她的自尊心是一次严重的伤害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The experience left me with a feeling of deep hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次经历给我留下了深深的创伤。</font><br>\n

color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司的董事们很快赞同了这个新想法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At this moment an idea burst upon him—a glorious idea.</font></i><br><font apart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那两个政党在思想上有巨大分歧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They look alike but in ideas they are very far apart from each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们看起来相似, 但他们在思想方面却截然不同。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a frank exchange of ideas, the two of them finally broke down their long-standing prejudice against each other and became friends again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开诚布公地交换思想之后, 他们两人终于解开了长期存在的疙瘩, 重归于好。</font><br>知道, 了解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The report will give you an idea of the problems involved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份报告将使你对所涉及的一些问题有所了解。</font><br><i><font age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道他多大岁数了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got a fairly good idea of what they want.</font></i><br><font Customs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方非常了解传入该国的大部分印度大麻是如何通过海关的。</font><br>\n

identify	<h3>identify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认出, 识别<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you be able to identify the man who robbed you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能够认出那个抢你东西的人吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She identified her son among a lot of children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在许多孩子中认出了自己的孩子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We couldn't identify the stray child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不能辨认出这个迷途孩子的身份。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could you identify your umbrella among a hundred others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能从100把雨伞中认出你的那一把吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She learned how to identify medicinal herbs from a traditional Chinese doctor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她向一位中医大夫学习如何识别草药。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot identify the signature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法辨别这个签名。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He identifies the two tastes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认出这两种味道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His hoarse voice was quickly identified.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他那沙哑的嗓音让人一听就知道是他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policeman identified him as the thief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察认出他是小偷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She identified him as her attacker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她认出他就是那个攻击她的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He identified the corpse as the criminal hunted after.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认出那具尸体就是那个被追捕的罪犯。</font><br>支持, 同情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children identify themselves with their parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们支持他们的父母。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>等同于; 有关联<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our tastes do not always identify.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的情趣并不总是相同的。</font><br>\n
identity	<h3>identity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>身份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had to conceal his identity to escape the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了躲避警方, 他只好隐瞒身份。</font><br>个性, 特性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The planners decided to preserve their distinct identities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 设计者们决定保留他们各自的特色。</font><br>同一性, 一致性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please note the identities in the two cases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请注意这两个案子的相同之处。</font><br>\n
idiom	<h3>idiom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>习语, 成语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every language has its own idioms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每种语言都有自己的习语。</font><br>(在语言等方面所表现的)风格, 特色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like the idiom of modern popular music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢现代流行音乐的风格。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was an old building in the local idiom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一座具有当地特色的古建筑。</font><br>\n
idle	<h3>idle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>空闲的, 闲着的<br>懒散的, 无所事事的<br>无根据的; 无聊的<br>无意义的, 无特别意图的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know why I asked—just idle curiosity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道我为什么问这问题——只是出于无意义的好奇心吧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>虚度, 闲逛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They idled before cafes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在餐馆前闲逛。</font><br>空转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car idled in the driveway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆车停在行车道上, 引擎发动着。</font><br>\n
if	<h3>if</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>如果, 假如<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If only I had gone by taxi.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 假若我是乘计程车去的就好了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If necessary, give me a ring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果需要, 打个电话给我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If ever eyes could speak, hers did very plainly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果说眼睛能说话, 她的眼睛可说得清楚极了。</font><br>是否<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will see if he wants to talk to you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我去了解一下他是否想和你谈话。</font><br>即使, 虽然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will go even if it rains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 即使下雨, 我们也要去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he is poor, at least he is honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他虽然穷, 但至少是诚实的。</font><br>无论何时<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She glares at me if I go near her desk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一走近她的办公桌, 她就瞪我。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>不确定的事, 无把握的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he wins—and it's a big if—he'll be the first Chinese to win for fifty years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 假使他赢了——是否能赢还是一大疑问——他将是五十年来的第一个获胜的中国人。</font><br>\n
ignorance	<h3>ignorance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>无知, 愚昧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he did wrong, it was from ignorance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果他做错了, 那是由于无知。</font><br>\n
ignorant	<h3>ignorant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无知的, 愚昧的<br>\n
ignore	<h3>ignore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>不顾, 不理, 忽视<br>\n
ill	<h3>ill</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有病的, 不健康的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was too ill to eat much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病得吃不下什么东西。</font><br>伤的, 受伤痛的<br>不好的, 坏的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of ill fame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他这个人名声很坏。</font><br>恶意的, 敌意的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>坏, 恶劣地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often speaks ill of me behind my back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他常在背后说我的坏话。</font><br>不利地, 不充分地<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伤害, 邪恶<br>困难, 不幸<br>\n
illegal	<h3>illegal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不合法的, 违法的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was an illegal act and will lead to your arrest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是非法行为, 足以将你送入监狱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In this sentence the writer uses an illegal construction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在本句中, 作者使用了一个不合语法的结构。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never does anything that is illegal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从来不做非法的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is illegal to park your car here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把车停在这里是违法的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's illegal for people under 17 to drive a car in Britain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在英国, 不满17岁的人驾驶车辆是违法的。</font><br>\n
illness	<h3>illness</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>病, 疾病<br>\n
illusion	<h3>illusion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>错觉, 幻想, 错误观念<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun appears to go round the Earth, but it's an illu -sion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳看起来好像绕着地球转, 但这只是个错觉。</font><br>假象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mirrors all round the walls give an illusion of greater space.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙壁周围的镜子造成一种较大空间的假象。</font><br>\n
illustrate	<h3>illustrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…加插图<br>说明, 阐明; 表明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company's bank statements illustrate its success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司的银行报表说明了它的成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This diagram will illustrate what I mean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个图表可说明我的意思。</font><br>\n
illustration	<h3>illustration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>插图, 图表, 图案<br>例证, 实例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Illustration by example is better than explanation in words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用实例说明比用词语解释清楚。</font><br>说明, 图解, 图示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He used photographs as illustration for his talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用照片为他的演讲作图片说明。</font><br>\n
image	<h3>image</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>形象, 概念<br>镜像, 影像, 图像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looked at her image in the mirror.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看着镜子中自己的映像。</font><br>印象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have this image of you as always being cheerful and optimistic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你留给我的印象总是快活和乐观。</font><br>酷似的人[物], 翻版<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was the spitting image of her mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她和她母亲长得一模一样。</font><br>比喻, 引喻, 明喻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The writer used the image of corn silk to describe the girl's hair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作者用玉米须来比喻那女孩的头发。</font><br>外形, 外表, 模样<br>\n
imaginary	<h3>imaginary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>想像中的, 假想的, 虚构的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My little daughter has an imaginary friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的小女儿有个想像中的朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the characters in this book are imaginary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此书中的所有人物都是虚构的。</font><br>\n
imagination	<h3>imagination</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>想像力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story shows plenty of imagination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个故事表现出丰富的想像力。</font><br>空想, 想像<br>想像出来的东西, 幻想物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her pains are mostly pure imagination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的疼痛多半是纯粹想像出来的东西。</font><br>\n
imagine	<h3>imagine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>想像, 设想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can imagine the scene clearly in my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以清楚地想像出那个情景。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot imagine what to do in this dreadful situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能想像在这么糟的情况下该怎么办。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't imagine lying like that. I would go crazy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法想像那样躺着的情形, 我会发疯的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You don't imagine it is true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你别想像那是真的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He imagined himself as manager of the company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把自己想像为公司的经理。</font><br>料想, 猜想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's nobody following us—you're just imagining it!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人跟着我们——你只不过是猜想而已。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't imagine they will come if it rains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为天如果下雨, 他们是不会来的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They imagined your ship wrecked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以为你的船遇难了。</font><br>想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always imagining dangers that don't exist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是想着那些其实并不存在的危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I imagine she was pretty annoyed when she found out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想她发现此事后一定很生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Does she know what kind of tablets she's taken today?”“I imagine so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“她知道今天她吃了什么药了吗?”“我想她知道。”</font><br>\n
imitate	<h3>imitate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>模仿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp James can imitate his father perfectly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 詹姆斯能逼真地模仿他父亲。</font><br>把…作为例子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should imitate her way of doing things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该效法她做事的方式。</font><br>\n
immediate	<h3>immediate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>立即的, 即刻的; 紧迫的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp About the problem, we must take immediate actions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于那个问题, 我们应该立即采取行动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This matter is immediate, we must do it now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事刻不容缓, 我们必须现在做。</font><br>目前的, 当前的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put long interests before immediate interests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把长远利益放在眼前利益之上。</font><br>直接的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heart failure was the immediate cause of his death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 心脏衰竭是他死亡的直接原因。</font><br>最接近的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His immediate neighbours felt it their duty to call.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的近邻认为他们有责任去拜访。</font><br>\n
immediately	<h3>immediately</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>立即, 马上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lay down and was asleep immediately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他躺下, 很快地睡着了。</font><br>直接地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这个决定通知所有直接有关的人。</font><br>\n
immense	<h3>immense</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极大的, 巨大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They made an immense improvement in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在英语方面他们取得了巨大的进步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The expense of living is immense.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生活费用很庞大。</font><br>\n
immigrant	<h3>immigrant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>移民<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Canada has many immigrants from Europe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 加拿大有许多欧洲移民。</font><br>\n
immune	<h3>immune</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>免疫的, 有免疫力的; 不受影响的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am immune from the disease, for I had it once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对这病有免疫力, 因为我已得过一次了。</font><br>免除…的, 豁免的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Being the only son in the family, the young man was immune from military service.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于是独子, 那个年轻人被免于服兵役。</font><br>\n
impact	<h3>impact</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>影响, 作用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The computer had made a great impact on modern life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 计算机对现代生活产生了巨大的影响。</font><br>冲击(力), 碰撞<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>对某事物有影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These costs will impact on our profitability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些费用会影响到我们的利润。</font><br>\n
impatient	<h3>impatient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不耐烦的, 急躁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave another impatient glance at his watch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他又一次不耐烦地看了看他的表。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't get impatient about trivial thing like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要为那种琐事烦躁。</font><br>热切的, 急切的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's impatient for her father's arrival.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她急切地盼望着父亲的到来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was impatient to know what had happened to her son.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她急于想知道她儿子出了什么事。</font><br>\n
imperial	<h3>imperial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>帝国的, 帝王的<br>英制的(度量衡)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The imperial gallon is not the same size as the US one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英制的加仑与美制的容量不同。</font><br>\n
implement	<h3>implement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使生效, 贯彻, 执行<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工具, 器具, 用具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The best implement for digging a garden is a spade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在花园里挖土的最好工具是铁锹。</font><br>\n
implication	<h3>implication</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>卷入, 牵连<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We heard of his implication in a conspiracy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听说他被牵连在叛乱案中。</font><br>含义, 暗示, 暗指<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What are the implications of this statement?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一声明的含义是什么?</font><br>\n
implicit	<h3>implicit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不言明[含蓄]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her silence gave implicit consent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的沉默表示默许。</font><br>无疑问的, 绝对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A soldier must give implicit obedience to his officers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵必须绝对服从他的长官。</font><br>\n
imply	<h3>imply</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>暗示, 暗指<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their failure to reply to our letter seems to imply a lack of interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没有回我们的信似乎暗示他们缺乏兴趣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This implied condemn-ing him to death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这意味着判他死刑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They implied him to be honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们暗指他是诚实的。</font><br>必然包含<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Drama implies conflict.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 戏剧必然包含着冲突。</font><br>\n
import	<h3>import</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>进口, 输入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The import of cotton goods went up sharply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 棉织品的进口大大增加了。</font><br>进口商品, 输入额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't like eating food imports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不喜欢吃进口食品。</font><br>意义, 含义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the import of the speech?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个演说的意义是什么?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>输入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country is importing a broad range of skilled personnel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家正在引进各种专业技术人员。</font><br>进口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We import raw silk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们进口生丝。</font><br>\n
importance	<h3>importance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重要(性)<br>\n
important	<h3>important</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>重要的, 重大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has just been called away to an important meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他刚才给叫走去开一个重要会议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Irrigation is important for farming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 灌溉对农业是非常重要的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's important to find out what he is doing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 弄清他在干什么是重要的。</font><br>有势力的, 有地位的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many important businessmen began as factory workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多显赫的企业家都是从工厂的工人做起的。</font><br>\n
impose	<h3>impose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>强迫, 强加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Overcrowding imposes mental strains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过度拥挤使精神紧张。</font><br>课税, 惩罚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The magistrate imposed a fine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 治安法官课以罚款。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>利用, 占便宜; 欺骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He imposed himself as their leader.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自封为他们的领袖。</font><br>\n
impossible	<h3>impossible</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不可能的, 办不到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They attempted the almost impossible thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们想干几乎不可能干成的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such a thing is impossible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种事情是不会有的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The problems are impossible to settle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 解决这些问题是不可能的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's impossible to renew one's youth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 返老还童是不可能的。</font><br>难以忍受的, 很难对付的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is an impossible woman to work with.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跟她一起工作真令人无法忍受。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river has become so dirty that in many places swimming and fishing are impossible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条河变得那么脏以致在许多地方无法游泳及钓鱼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That child is impossible to control.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子很难管。</font><br>\n
impress	<h3>impress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…以深刻印象, 使铭记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He impressed me favourably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我的印象不错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was very impressed by[at, with] her performance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的表演给我留下了深刻的印象。</font><br>印, 压印<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The design was impressed on the cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个图案印在布上了。</font><br>\n
impression	<h3>impression</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>印象, 感想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made a good impression on his mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给他母亲留下了很好的印象。</font><br>想法, 看法, 感觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had the distinct impression that I was being followed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我清楚地感觉到有人跟踪我。</font><br>滑稽模仿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did a brilliant impression of the President.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对总统作了逼真的滑稽模仿。</font><br>印记, 压痕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are the impressions of shoes in the mud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 泥地上留下了鞋印。</font><br>重印<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Seven impressions of the novel have been sold out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本小说印了七次都卖光了。</font><br>\n
impressive	<h3>impressive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>给人印象深刻的, 感人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The first ceremony which we went into college is an impressive ceremony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们进入大学的第一次典礼给我们的印象很深。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your work is very impressive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 您的工作真了不起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This cinema is so impressive that we can't help crying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这影片如此感人以至我们禁不住流下泪来。</font><br>\n
improve	<h3>improve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>改善, 改进, 提高<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he can keep from smoking for a month or two his health will improve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要是能一两个月不抽烟的话, 他的健康一定会有起色。</font><br>\n
improvement	<h3>improvement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>增加或修改<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is room for further improvement in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的英语尚有进一步提高的余地。</font><br>改进, 改善, 改良<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your work shows considerable improvement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的工作显示出相当大的改进。</font><br>\n
impulse	<h3>impulse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>凭冲动行事, 突如其来的念头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt an irresistible impulse to rush into the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一种难以抗拒的冲动想冲进房间。</font><br>推动, 冲力, 刺激, 推动力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan will give an impulse to industrial expansion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个计划将促进工业的扩展。</font><br>\n
in	<h3>in</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…里面; 在, 于; 在…部位上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I could feel the tension in the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以感觉到房间里的紧张气氛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live in France.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们住在法国。</font><br>(表示时间)在…时期, 在…之后, 在过程中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In her twenties and thirties she had had no difficulty getting jobs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在二三十岁时找工作一点也不困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot see you now, come back in half an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我现在不能见你, 半小时后回来。</font><br>(表示方向)往…内, 朝…方向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw him go in the shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看到他走进了商店。</font><br>(表示状态)处于…之中, 在…情况下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Martin was in his pyjamas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马丁穿着睡衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were living in terrible poverty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们生活在极度贫困之中。</font><br>(表示方式)用, 以, 按, 乘, 以…形式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were speaking in Italian.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在讲意大利语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They went up in the lift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们乘电梯上楼了。</font><br>(表示原因)由于, 为了<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went in fear of his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为自己的性命担忧, 所以走了。</font><br>(表示领域, 范围)在…以内<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not in my power to do that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做那事非我力所能及。</font><br>(表示结果)当做, 作为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What did you give him in return?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给他什么作为报答呢?</font><br>(表示目的)为了<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They set off in search of the lost child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们出发去寻找走失的孩子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>进入, 入内<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door being opened, they came in at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门一打开, 他们就马上进来了。</font><br>在家, 在里面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My wife won't be in until five o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妻子要到五点钟才在家。</font><br>到达, 来临<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the ship in yet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船到港了吗?</font><br>当政, 当选<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This year the Conservative Party is in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年保守党执政。</font><br>正当时令, 正当流行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Honey peaches are in now and we can eat them every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在水蜜桃正上市, 我们每天都可以吃到。</font><br>\n
inadequate	<h3>inadequate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不充足的, 不适当的<br>不足胜任的, 信心不足的<br>\n
inch	<h3>inch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>英寸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve inches is equal to one foot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12英寸等于1英尺。</font><br>少量, 短距离<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)缓慢地移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The worm inched along.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条虫向前蠕动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prices are inching up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 物价在缓慢地上涨</font><br>\n
incidence	<h3>incidence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发生率, 影响范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This area has a high incidence of crime, disease, unemployment, etc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个地区的犯罪率、发病率、失业率等很高。</font><br>\n
incident	<h3>incident</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发生的事, 小插曲<br>敌对行动, 军事冲突<br>骚乱, 事故, 暴力事件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The demonstration proceeded without incident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游行示威进行时没有出事。</font><br>\n
incline	<h3>incline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)倾斜, (使)偏向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He inclined forward so as to hear more clearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向前倾斜着身体, 以便听得更清楚些。</font><br>(使)认为, (使)倾向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I incline to take the opposite point of view.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我倾向于反对观点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His letter inclines me to think that it would be wrong for us to refuse his request.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的信使我认为我们拒绝他的要求是错误的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>斜坡, 斜面<br>\n
include	<h3>include</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包括, 包含<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their course of study includes elementary hygiene and medical theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的课程包括基础卫生学和医疗知识。</font><br>\n
income	<h3>income</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收入, 所得, 收益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He deceived his friends about his income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在自己的收入问题上欺骗了朋友。</font><br>\n
incomplete	<h3>incomplete</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不完全的, 未完成的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's an incomplete victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一次不彻底的胜利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His novel was incomplete when he died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他死的时候他的小说没有写完。</font><br>\n
increase	<h3>increase</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>增加, 增大, 增多<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her family increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她家的人口增加了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The population of this city has greatly increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本市人口已大大增加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their difficulties are increasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的困难越来越多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The factors for war were visibly increasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这时战争因素有明显增长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨下大了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The darkness increases the further we advance into the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们越朝森林里走, 周围就越来越暗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should increase production and practise strict economy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应当增加生产, 厉行节约。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had better increase the amount.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们最好把数量再增加一些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose of criticism is to increase the Party's fighting capacity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 批评的目的是为了增强党的战斗力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His words only increased the anger of the workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话只是使工人更加气愤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It has increased the contradictions between the two superpowers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这加剧了两个超级大国之间的矛盾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Travel increased one's knowledge of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅游使人增进对世界的了解。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>增加, 增大, 增多<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Increase in population made emigration necessary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人口的增加使向外移民成为必要。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tobacco merchants rose up in arms over the increase in taxes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 烟草商人对提高税率非常恼火。</font><br>\n
increasingly	<h3>increasingly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>日益, 越来越多地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I find it increasingly difficult to live within my income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我发现靠收入过日子越来越难了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rivers are being increasingly made use of by man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 河流正在日益为人类所利用。</font><br>\n
incredible	<h3>incredible</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不能相信的, 不可信的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plot of this book is incredible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书的情节不可信。</font><br>〈非正〉难以置信的, 不可思议的, 惊人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some planets run at incredible speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 某些星球以难以置信的速度运行着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Old superstitions seem incredible to educated people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旧的迷信对于受过教育的人来说是不可思议的。</font><br>\n
indeed	<h3>indeed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>的确, 确实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is indeed unfortunate!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那的确是不幸啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The possibility of rescue now seemed remote indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 救援的可能性的确很小。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She indeed lives in a fool's paradise as she always dreams about making a huge fortune overnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她总想一夜暴富, 的确有点想入非非。</font><br>甚至, 其实<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't mind.Indeed, I was pleased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不在意, 甚至还很高兴。</font><br>确实, 实在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thank you very much indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 实在感激你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A friend in need is a friend indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 患难的朋友才是真正的朋友。</font><br>真是, 哦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Are you pleased at our success?”“Yes, indeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“你对我们的成功感到欣慰吗?”“是的, 确实感到欣慰。”</font><br>\n
independence	<h3>independence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>独立, 自主, 自立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By the time they get to that age they will value their independence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他们到了那年龄时他们会珍视自己的独立性。</font><br>\n
independent	<h3>independent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>独立的, 自主的, 自立的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children should be encouraged to be independent thinkers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 应该鼓励孩子独立思考。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is economically independent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在经济上是独立的。</font><br>不相关连的, 无关的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Judges must be independent of political pressure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官们一定不能受政治压力的影响。</font><br>\n
index	<h3>index</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>索引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A supplementary volume has been published containing the index.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 附有索引的增补卷已经出版。</font><br>标志, 象征; 量度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The increasing sale of luxury goods is an index for the country's prosperity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奢侈商品销售量日增是该国繁荣的标志。</font><br>(物价或工资的)指数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The index of industrial production increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业生产指数提高了。</font><br>〈数〉指数, 幂<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…编索引, 指示出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All places mentioned are carefully indexed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有被提到的地名都仔细编入了索引中。</font><br>\n
indicate	<h3>indicate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>标示, 指示, 指出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She indicated where I should go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她指出了我该去的地方。</font><br>象征; 表明或暗示…的可能性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snow indicates the coming of winter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场雪表明冬天来临。</font><br>\n
indication	<h3>indication</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>指示, 表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did he give you any indication of his feelings?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向你表示了自己的感情了吗?</font><br>象征, 迹象<br>\n
indifferent	<h3>indifferent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不关心的, 冷淡的; 中立的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His manner was cold and indifferent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的态度既冷淡又无动于衷。</font><br>较差的, 平庸的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an indifferent cook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个手艺平平的厨师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her English is indifferent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的英文很一般。</font><br>\n
indirect	<h3>indirect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>间接的, 迂回的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the way home, we took an indirect route.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回家的路上, 我们绕了一个大圈。</font><br>不直截了当的, 婉转的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave only an indirect answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只作了间接的回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What he said was very indirect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话很婉转。</font><br>\n
indispensable	<h3>indispensable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>必不可少的, 必需的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an indispensable book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一本必不可少的书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For a successful class humour is indispensable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要在课堂上取得成功, 幽默是必不可少的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>不可缺少之物<br>\n
individual	<h3>individual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>个别的, 单独的, 个人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each individual house has its own yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每栋房子都有各自的庭院。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Students can apply for individual tuition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生可以申请个别指导。</font><br>独特的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has her own individual style of doing things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有自己独特的行事风格。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>个人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose of the law is to protect the right of the individual.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该法律目的是为了保护个人权利。</font><br>人<br>\n
indoor	<h3>indoor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>室内的, 户内的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a big indoor swimming pool in this hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆内有一个大的室内游泳馆。</font><br>\n
induce	<h3>induce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>引诱, 劝导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We induced him to come with us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们劝他与我们同行。</font><br>〈正〉引起, 导致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medicine will induce sleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种药使人入睡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her illness was induced by overwork.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的病是操劳过度引起的。</font><br>\n
industrial	<h3>industrial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>工业的, 产业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Manchester is an industrial city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 曼彻斯特是个工业城市。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That area of the country is industrial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国的那个地区是工业区。</font><br>用于工业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The alcohol is industrial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些酒精是供工业用的。</font><br>\n
industrialise	<h3>industrialise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)工业化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country has been steadily industrialising.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国正在稳步地实现工业化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They wanted to industrialise their nation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们想使国家工业化。</font><br>\n
industrialize	<h3>industrialize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)工业化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country has been steadily industrializing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国正在稳步地实现工业化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They wanted to industrialize their nation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们想使国家工业化。</font><br>\n
industry	<h3>industry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工业, 制造业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country's industry is assuming a new aspect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国的工业正在呈现新的面貌。</font><br>工业界<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does industry agree with the government?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业界的意见与政府的一致吗?</font><br>某一工业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea fisheries are an important industry in Norway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海洋捕鱼业是挪威一项重要的产业。</font><br>勤劳, 勤奋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The industry of these little ants is wonderful to behold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些小蚂蚁辛勤劳动的样子看上去真令人惊叹。</font><br>\n
inevitable	<h3>inevitable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不可避免的, 必然发生的<br>〈非正〉总会发生的, 照例必有的, 惯常的<br>\n
infant	<h3>infant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>婴儿, 幼儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sole survivor of the crash was an infant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次撞车的惟一幸存者是一个婴儿。</font><br>\n
infect	<h3>infect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(受)传染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dirt infected an open cut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尘土会使敞露的伤口受到感染。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whole societies become infected by these vices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个社会都被这些恶习所腐蚀。</font><br>污染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Waste gases infected the air.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 废气污染了空气。</font><br>影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary's high spirits infected all the girls in the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽的兴致感染了全班的女孩。</font><br>\n
infection	<h3>infection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈医〉传染, 感染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White blood cells fight infection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白血球抵抗感染。</font><br>传染病<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Measles is an infection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麻疹是一种传染病。</font><br>\n
infer	<h3>infer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>推断, 推知<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp From his remarks, I inferred that he hadn't enjoyed his holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从他的话中我推断他的假期过得不愉快。</font><br>\n
inference	<h3>inference</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>推论, 推理, 推断<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You seemed to know about this book, and by inference I thought you had read it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你好像了解这本书, 因此我推断你已读过它了。</font><br>推断结果, 结论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inferences drawn from data have led to some major changes in our policy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 根据资料做出的推论使得我们的方针发生了一些重大变化。</font><br>\n
inferior	<h3>inferior</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>低等的, 下级的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rank of captain is inferior.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上尉的军衔很低。</font><br>劣等的, 次的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sell inferior goods at that store.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家商店卖劣等货。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food at that restaurant is inferior.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家饭馆的饭菜质量差。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is inferior to what I expected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那房子比我所期望的差。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>部下, 下属<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good leader should get on well with inferiors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个好的领导应当与部下相处融洽。</font><br>\n
infinite	<h3>infinite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无限的, 无穷的, 无边无际的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The war brought infinite harm to the nation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争给这个国家带来了无穷的灾难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The universe seems infinite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宇宙似乎是无限的。</font><br>\n
inflation	<h3>inflation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(充气而引起的)膨胀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inflation of the airbed took several minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给空气床垫充气花了几分钟时间。</font><br>通货膨胀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Because of inflation, they had to spend more money on food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为通货膨胀, 他们不得不在食品上花费更多的钱。</font><br>\n
influence	<h3>influence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>影响; 感化力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her influence made me a better person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对我的影响使我成为一个更好的人。</font><br>势力, 权势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of great influence in this town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在这个镇上是很有权势的人。</font><br>产生影响的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His parents no longer have any real influence over him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的父母对他已不再有任何约束力了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>影响, 感化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The labour enthusiasm of the workers strongly influenced us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们的劳动热情强烈地感染了我们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's all too easy to be influenced by our parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们容易受父母的影响。</font><br>\n
influential	<h3>influential</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有影响的, 有权势的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a very influential man in the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在政府中是个很有影响的人物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fact is influential in reaching a decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一因素对做出决定是有影响的。</font><br>\n

ingredient	<h3>ingredient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(混合物的)组成部分; 配料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Imagination and hard work are the ingredients of success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 想像力和勤劳是成功的要素。</font><br>\n
