label	<h3>label</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>标签, 标记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attached labels to his luggage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把标签贴在行李上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp According to the symbol on the label, this sweater should be washed by hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 根据标签上的符号, 这件针织套衫应该用手洗。</font><br>称号; 符号; 标示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been given the label of “playboy”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被起了个“花花公子”的绰号。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>贴标签于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor labeled the bottle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位医生给瓶子贴上了标签。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She labelled all the boxes of the books carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在所有的书箱上都仔细地贴上了标签。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make sure your luggage is properly labelled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请务必把你行李上的标签贴好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything may be labelled, but everybody is not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 样样东西都可以贴标签, 可就是没有给人贴标签的。</font><br>把…列为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He labeled the boastful man a liar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把那个好自夸的男人称作说谎者。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His enemies labelled the boy a thief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的敌人把这个小孩叫做小偷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His son and daughter are clever that everyone labelled them as the genius.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他儿子和女儿都非常聪明, 大伙都称他们是天才。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspapers had unjustly labelled him as a coward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家报纸不公正地称他为懦夫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They labelled him as dishonest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们认为他不诚实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The phrase is labelled as slang in the dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个短语在这本字典里被注为俚语。</font><br>\n
labor	<h3>labor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>劳动,努力,工作,劳工,分娩,阵痛<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>v.</i></font><br>劳动,努力争取(for),苦干,详细分析,麻烦<br>\n
laboratory	<h3>laboratory</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>实验室<br>\n
labour	<h3>labour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>劳动, 努力; 工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live by honest labour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们靠正当劳动生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This education aimed at combining brain work with manual labour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此项教育的目的在于实现脑力劳动与体力劳动相结合。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should try to reform criminals through labour rather than punish them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该尽量通过劳动改造罪犯, 而不是惩罚他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We regard labour as a matter of honour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们认为劳动是光荣的事。</font><br>劳工, 工人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Farm labour used to hire themselves out for the summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农业工人过去经常整个夏天在外面打工。</font><br>分娩, (分娩时的)阵痛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wife is in labour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的夫人正在分娩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was in labour for two hours before her baby was finally born.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她分娩了两个小时, 才生下婴儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went into labour two weeks early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她提前两周分娩了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>劳动; 努力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy laboured quietly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个男孩静静地干着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I laboured to understand him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我努力了解他的意思。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have laboured to complete the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们努力完成这一工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We laboured hard to finish our job ahead of schedule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们努力工作, 以期把活儿提前干完。</font><br>艰难行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They laboured along the bad road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在那条难走的路上艰难地行进。</font><br>\n
lack	<h3>lack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>缺乏; 缺少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must note that we still lack qualified specialists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须看到我们还缺乏有资质的专家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't seem to lack anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我好像什么都不缺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lacked food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有食物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lack neither food nor clothing today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如今, 我们不愁吃, 不缺穿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We never lack food and clothing if we're willing to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我们愿意工作, 就不会缺吃少穿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city lacks a good library.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市缺少一个好图书馆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But they could not finish their work because they lacked money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 但是, 他们无法完成这一工作, 因为缺少钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They met with many difficulties, for they lacked equipment, experience and technical data.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为缺少设备, 缺乏经验和技术资料, 他们遇到不少困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Red soil lacks organic matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 红土缺乏有机质。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A desert lacks water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沙漠缺乏水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It lacks ten minutes of seven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在是七点差十分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The vote lacks three of being a majority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 差三张选票就过半数。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lacks decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他缺乏决断力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wanted to say no, but lacked the courage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想不同意, 但又没有勇气这样说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I lack words with which to express my thanks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法以言语来表达我的感激之情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company lacks sufficient money to invest in new products.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司没有足够的钱对新产品投资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lacks the strength to do the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做这项工作不是她力所能及的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lacked the strength to walk any further.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有力气再往前走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I lacked the stamina to run the whole length of the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有跑完全程的精力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lacked the experience to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们缺乏取得成功的经验。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺乏, 不足, 没有<br>\n
lad	<h3>lad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>男孩, 小伙子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little lad was playing on the swing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这小男孩在荡秋千。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's just a lad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他还只是个少年。</font><br>伙伴, 家伙<br>活泼、大胆或鲁莽的男子<br>\n

lady	<h3>lady</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>女士, 夫人, 小姐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ladies and gentlemen, it is time to begin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各位女士, 先生, 该开会了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a lady to see you, sir.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 先生, 有位小姐要见你。</font><br>举止文雅的女子, 淑女<br>\n
lag	<h3>lag</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>走得极慢; 落后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child lagged because he was tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子因累了而走得很慢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ten minutes later, some of runners in the race began to lag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 十分钟后, 有些参赛的人开始落后了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lame child lagged behind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个跛脚的小孩落在后面了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If your payments of rent lag behind, you will be asked to leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你不如期交房租, 你就会被赶走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why does she always lag behind others when we're out for a walk?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为什么外出散步时, 她总落在后面?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Britain's economic development must lag behind that of almost every other industrial nation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国的经济发展肯定落后于几乎所有的其他工业国。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>滞后, (时间上的)间隔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a time lag of about fifteen years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时间上有一段约15年的间隔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This work must go forward without lag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项工作必须毫不迟延地进行。</font><br>\n

land	<h3>land</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>陆地, 陆上, 地面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The storm blew over land and sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴风雨在陆地上和海上呼啸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most mammals live on land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数哺乳动物生活在陆地上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship came safely to land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船平安靠岸。</font><br>国家, 国土<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has visited many different lands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他游览过许多不同的国家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was once a grievous famine in the land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家曾有一次大饥荒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is my native land and I'll defend it with my life!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我的祖国, 我将用生命保卫她。</font><br>土地, 田地; 地产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a lot of good corn land around here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这附近有许多良田。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmer has just bought a new piece of land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位农民刚刚又买了一块地。</font><br>乡村生活<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)登岸, (使)下船, (使)着陆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When are we landing?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们什么时候着陆?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The passengers landed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乘客都已上岸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try to catch the ball before it lands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要把球接住, 不要让它落地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pilot landed the airliner safely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 驾驶员使客机安全着陆。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>自船上卸下<br>获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher hoped to land some good students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师希望得到好学生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He landed the first prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他获得一等奖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A friend of mine landed me a three-roomed flat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的一个朋友给我弄到了一套三居室的公寓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She landed him a guide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给他找来一个向导。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please land a book for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我弄本书。</font><br>\n

lap	<h3>lap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>舔; 舔食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cats and dogs lap water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猫狗舔水。</font><br>轻拍; 冲拍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water lapped the sides of the boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 河水轻拍着小舟的两侧。</font><br>领先一圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before the end of the race Bob had lapped Jimmy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比赛结束前, 鲍勃以一圈领先吉米。</font><br>包; 缠绕(布等)于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lapped my finger with gauze.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用绷带将我的手指包起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>跑完一圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp James lapped in two minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 詹姆斯在两分钟内跑完一圈。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He put in a spurt at the beginning of the eighth lap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他进入第八圈时便开始冲刺。</font><br>(坐着时)膝上腰下的大腿部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was sitting with her hands on her lap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坐着, 把手放到膝上。</font><br>裙兜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She put the apples in her lap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把苹果装在了裙兜里。</font><br>\n

last	<h3>last</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>延续; 继续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I expected the cease-fire to last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我指望停火会持久。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How long will the fine weather last?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好天气能延续多久?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt sure that their friendship would last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她确信他们的友谊会日久天长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked the nurse how long her agony must last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她问护士, 她的极端痛苦要延续多久。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain lasted quite a few days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨一连下了好几天。</font><br>耐用; 经久<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This cloth lasts well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种布很耐穿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>经受住, 到…之后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A pack of cigarettes lasts him two days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一包香烟够他抽两天的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This cake of soap will last you about several weeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块肥皂大约够你用几个星期。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最后的, 末尾的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They drank up the last of the wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们喝光了最后一滴酒。</font><br>最近的; 刚过去的, 上一个的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I received your last letter in May.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我收到你的最近来信是在五月份。</font><br>惟一剩下的; 最终的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is our last hope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我们是后的希望了。</font><br>最不可能的, 最不合适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the last wife in the world for a farmer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最不适宜作农夫的妻子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最后的[最后提到的]人[物]; 最近的信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are the last of our apples.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们就剩下这么多苹果了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the last to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是最后一个来的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't hear the last of his report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的报告我没有听完。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I received your last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我收到了你最近的来信。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>上一次, 最近一次<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When did you last see him?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最近什么时候见到过他?</font><br>最后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came last in the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在赛跑比赛中跑了最后一名。</font><br>\n
late	<h3>late</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>迟的, 晚的, 迟到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a late dinner last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们昨晚晚餐吃得很晚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's too late to go now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在去太迟了。</font><br>晚期的, 后期的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The poet lived a happy life in his later life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位诗人晚年过着一种幸福的生活。</font><br>不久之前的, 最近的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The late storm did much harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不久以前的这场暴风雨造成了很大的灾害。</font><br>已故的, 最近去世的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her late husband was an outstanding scientist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已故的丈夫是位杰出的科学家。</font><br>前任的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The visitor is the late President, now a scholar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位来访者是前总统, 现为学者。</font><br>新的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the late development of science.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是科学的新发展。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>迟, 晚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She married late in life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很晚才结婚。</font><br>接近末期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bush was planted late in the season.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这灌木是在这个季节末期才栽种的。</font><br>到深夜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He worked late into night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他工作到深夜。</font><br>不久前<br>\n
lately	<h3>lately</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>近来, 最近, 不久前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you seen him lately?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最近见到过他吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They haven't written lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们最近没有通信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like reading novels lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近来我不喜欢读小说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like your mamma lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近我不喜欢你的妈妈。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's only lately begun working here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近她才开始在这儿工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bright came lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 布赖特是最近来的。</font><br>\n
later	<h3>later</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>较晚地; 后来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We later learnt that this wasn't true at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们后来了解到根本不是这么回事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll call again later.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我以后再打电话来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fell ill on Monday and died three days later.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他星期一得病, 三天后就死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom and Mary got married in 1985.Two years later, they were divorced.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆和玛丽1985年结婚, 两年后他们离婚了。</font><br>\n

latter	<h3>latter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>后半的, 接近终了的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He'll go to school in the latter part of the year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 后半年他将上学了。</font><br>后者的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This latter point is of great importance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这后一个论点是非常重要的。</font><br>\n
laugh	<h3>laugh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>笑, 发笑, 嘲笑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were all laughing when he came in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他进来时, 我们正在笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “And I've forgotten the sugar.”she laughed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “我把糖给忘了”, 她笑着说道。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以笑表示, 以笑感动[影响]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She laughed her good mood when she saw her mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看到母亲时, 以笑表示了她愉快的心情。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>笑; 笑声; 笑态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave a good loud laugh when he saw it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一见到它便大笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She turned away her face with a merry, ringing laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她转过脸去, 发出愉快清脆的笑声。</font><br>笑料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a real laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真是个活宝。</font><br>\n

law	<h3>law</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>法, 法律, 法规<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In some countries the police enforce the laws.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在有些国家, 由警察机关执行各项法律。</font><br>法学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is studying law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在研读法学。</font><br>\n
lawn	<h3>lawn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>草地, 草坪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are lying on a grassy lawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们躺在绿草如茵的草坪上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children are playing volleyball on the lawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们在草地上打排球。</font><br>\n
lawyer	<h3>lawyer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>律师; 法学家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vera is studying law because she wants to become a lawyer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 维拉正在学习法律, 因为她想当律师。</font><br>\n
lay	<h3>lay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>放置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He laid his coat over a chair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把外衣放在椅子上。</font><br>压倒, 使躺下, 放倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trees were laid flat by heavy wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木被风刮倒了。</font><br>使平息, 使消失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain quickly laid the dust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨水很快消除了空中飞扬的尘土。</font><br>打赌, 下赌注<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll lay five pounds that you don't succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我出五英镑打赌, 你不会成功。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>生蛋, 产卵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hens don't lay during this cold weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样冷的天气母鸡不会下蛋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The duck laid ten eggs this month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只鸭子本月下了十个蛋。</font><br>\n

lazy	<h3>lazy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>懒惰的, 懒散的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lazy people seldom succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 懒惰的人很少会成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was lazy in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他懒于学英语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He comes to school by bus because he is too lazy to walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他乘公共汽车上学, 因为他懒得走路。</font><br>慢吞吞的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She spoke with a lazy articulation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她说话慢吞吞的。</font><br>\n
lead	<h3>lead</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>带路, 领路, 指引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll lead; you must follow me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我带路, 你一定得跟着我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the blind leads the blind, both will fall into ditch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盲人领瞎子, 两人都会掉进水沟里。</font><br>领导; 指挥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who is going to lead?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁来领导?</font><br>领先<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Which horse is leading in the race right now?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在赛马中哪匹马领先?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He leads the class in mathematics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在数学方面, 他是全班第一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>诱使<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They led him captive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将他活捉。</font><br>使过生活<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are leading a happy life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们过着幸福的生活。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>领导; 榜样<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is one of leads we should learn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我们应该学习的榜样之一。</font><br>领先; 占上风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a lead of ten metres over the other runners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他领先别的运动员十米。</font><br>主角, 主要演员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's playing the lead in the new play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在这出新剧中担任主角。</font><br>线索<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lead is a heavy metal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铅是重金属。</font><br>\n

lean	<h3>lean</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)倾斜, 屈身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The postbox leans a little bit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个邮筒有点倾斜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>倚, 靠; 依赖<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>瘦的; 少脂肪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a lean handsome face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的脸清瘦而英俊。</font><br>贫瘠的; 收益差的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In recent years, the cinema has fallen on lean times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近几年, 电影业遇上了不景气时期。</font><br>\n
leap	<h3>leap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>跳, 跳跃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His heart leaped and he felt himself reddening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的心在跳, 他感觉自己的脸红了。</font><br>猛然行动, 冲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look before you leap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 三思而后行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>跳过, 跃过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse leaped a stream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这匹马跃过小溪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跳跃, 飞跃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a leap over an obstacle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他跃过障碍物。</font><br>激增<br>\n
learn	<h3>learn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>学习; 学; 学会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is never too late to learn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 活到老学到老。</font><br>得知; 获悉; 听说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They never learn, never give up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从不吸取教训, 决不投降。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They learned she's gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们得知她走了。</font><br>\n
learned	<h3>learned</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有学问的, 博学的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a very learned man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位学识渊博的人。</font><br>学术上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote a learned book on frogs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他写了一部有关青蛙的学术著作。</font><br>\n
learning	<h3>learning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>学问, 学术; 知识<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A little learning is a dangerous thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一知半解是危险的。</font><br>\n
lease	<h3>lease</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>租, 租借<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He leased his home for the summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将房子出租供人避暑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They leased the building as a warehouse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们租用这栋大楼作仓库。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>租约, 租契<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed the lease yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天他在租约上签了字。</font><br>\n
least	<h3>least</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最小的, 最少的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did it well with the least money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用最少的钱把事办好了。</font><br>一点点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The least bit of dirt in a watch may make it stop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 表中哪怕有一点点污物都会使它不走动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>最少, 最小<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John chose the least expensive of the book in these books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰在这些书中选了一本最便宜的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>最小, 最少量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did the least of the work and got the most of the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他干活最少, 拿钱却最多。</font><br>\n
leather	<h3>leather</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>皮, 皮革<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a pair of leather shoes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一双皮鞋。</font><br>\n
leave	<h3>leave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…留下; 遗忘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must go back, I've left my car keys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须回去, 我忘了带汽车钥匙。</font><br>听任, 让<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Leave him to his father; he'll deal with him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让他父亲去收拾他吧！</font><br>交托, 委托<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll leave everything to you then.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那我就把一切托付给你办了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>离去, 离开; 出发; 舍弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're giving him a party when he leaves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他离开时, 我们将为他举办一个聚会。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准假, 假期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked for a day's leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她要求请一天假。</font><br>辞别<br>许可, 准许<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to read the letter by your leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你同意, 我想看看这封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was granted leave to speak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他得到发言的许可。</font><br>\n
lecture	<h3>lecture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>演讲; 讲课<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I take it as a pleasure to attend your lecture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很愿意听你讲课。</font><br>冗长的训斥[谴责]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father gave me a lecture for smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲因我吸烟而训斥我。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(向…)演讲; (给…)讲课<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was asked to lecture in America.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被邀请到美国讲学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's lecturing a group of tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在向一群观光者作报告。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>责备, 教训, 训斥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't lecture the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要责备孩子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lectured me heatedly for a few minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常激烈地训了我几分钟。</font><br>\n
left	<h3>left</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>左边, 左侧, 左部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make a left at the corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到下一个拐角处向左拐。</font><br>左手; 左拳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I caught him on the chin with a straight left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我用左拳击中他的下巴。</font><br>左翼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is on the Left of his party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在党内是左派。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>左侧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is blind in the left eye.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他左眼失明。</font><br>左边的, 左面的, 左方的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My house is on the left side of the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的家在这条街的左侧。</font><br>左翼的, 左倾的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our company made a sudden charge on the left wing of the enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们连对敌人左翼发动了突袭。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向左, 在左边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked left and right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他左右看看。</font><br>\n

legal	<h3>legal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>法律上的; 合法的; 法定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is my legal adviser.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我的法律顾问。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is it legal for boys of that age to drink alcohol?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年龄的男孩喝酒合法吗?</font><br>\n
legislation	<h3>legislation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>法律; 法规<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They began to draft legislation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们开始起草法规。</font><br>立法, 法律的制定[通过]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He brings in legislation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提议立法。</font><br>\n
leisure	<h3>leisure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>空闲时间, 闲暇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have not a moment's leisure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有一点空闲时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He read books at his leisure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在空闲时读一些书。</font><br>悠闲, 安逸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes leisure and hates work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢安逸, 讨厌工作。</font><br>\n
lemon	<h3>lemon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>柠檬树<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two lemons stand beside the entrance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入口处有两棵柠檬树。</font><br>柠檬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is drinking lemon squash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在喝柠檬露。</font><br>柠檬黄, 柠檬色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many colours, blue, red, yellow and lemon...</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有很多种颜色，蓝、红、黄和柠檬色…。</font><br>\n
lend	<h3>lend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>把…借给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He neither lends nor borrows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他既不借给人也不向人借。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I never lend money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从不借钱给别人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't lend yourself to such dishonest schemes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别参与这种欺诈的勾当。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>增加, 增添<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This poem lends itself to our program very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这首诗非常适合我们的节目。</font><br>\n
length	<h3>length</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一段, 一节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll need several lengths of string to tie the package.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要几段绳子用来打包。</font><br>长, 长度; 距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All these sticks are of uniform length.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有这些手杖的长度都是一样的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take two pieces of string of different lengths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拿两条长度不同的带子。</font><br>\n
lengthy	<h3>lengthy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>长的, 漫长的, 啰嗦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professor wrote a lengthy book on Napoleon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教授写了一部有关拿破仑的巨著。</font><br>\n
lens	<h3>lens</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>透镜, 镜头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lens of a camera forms images.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 照相机的镜头使图像形成。</font><br>眼睛中的水晶体<br>\n
less	<h3>less</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>较少的, 更少的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The firm has less money and fewer staff than last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司的资金和人员都比去年少了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has less money than ever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从来没有过这样少的钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I received less money than the others did.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我比别人收到的钱少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor advises me to eat less meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生劝我少吃肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Statistics show that people now drink less beer than they used to, and smoke fewer cigarettes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 统计数字表明, 人们现在比过去喝啤酒少了, 而且烟抽也少了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love the country, but I have less opportunity of seeing it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我热爱乡村, 但我几乎没有机会见到它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Less people go to church than before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上教堂的人比以前少些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Less noise, please!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要大声吵闹！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It cost less money than I expected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它比我预料的要便宜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The movie had less success than expected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 影片没有获得预期的成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got there in less than four hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用了不到4个小时就到了那里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Less people study Latin today than formerly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在学习拉丁语的人比以前少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing in this shop is less than ￡10.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家商店的东西没有低于10英镑的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>较少, 更少地, 少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's speak less and listen more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们少讲多听吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I read much less now than I did at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我现在看书远比我上学时少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With their children growing up, these mothers have become less involved with their families.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着孩子长大成人, 这些母亲受家庭拖累就少些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was less known than his brother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不如他哥哥出名。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope the next train will be less crowded than this one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望下趟火车不会像这趟这么挤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was less surprised as I had had this sort of experience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为我有过这样的经验, 所以并不感到怎么惊奇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try and speak less indistinctly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 想法子说得清楚些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tomatoes are everywhere in summer but less so in winter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏天到处都有西红柿, 冬天却不是这样。</font><br>\n
lesson	<h3>lesson</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>功课, 课<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you learnt your lessons?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的功课学会了吗?</font><br>一堂课, 一节课<br>课程<br>教训, 经验; 榜样<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should teach him a lesson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该教训他一顿。</font><br>\n
lest	<h3>lest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>惟恐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feared lest I should be late again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我惟恐自己再迟到。</font><br>免得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be careful lest you (should) fall from the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小心, 不要从树上掉下来。</font><br>\n
let	<h3>let</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>让, 使<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They let fly a shower of arrows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们射了一阵箭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让门开着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His father doesn't let him smoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父亲不允许他吸烟。</font><br>放掉, 松掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We mustn't let slip such an opportunity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样的机会我们不能错过。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>出租<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're hoping to let this field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们希望把这块地租出去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mrs. Brown let me a room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 布朗夫人租给我一间房。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They let rooms to college students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们向大学生出租房间。</font><br>\n
letter	<h3>letter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信, 函件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your letter reached me this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的信我今天早上收到了。</font><br>字母<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The last letter of the alphabet is Z.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 字母表的最后一个字母是Z。</font><br>\n

level	<h3>level</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水平线, 水平面; 水平高度<br>数量, 强度<br>水平, 等级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp First we have to lift the level of instruction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 首先我们得提高教学水平。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>平的, 水平的, 平坦的<br>同高度的; 同一程度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He kept a level head through the whole incident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个事件中, 他始终保持着镇静的头脑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In spring the river's surface is often level with the banks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 春天河水常常涨到与河岸一样高。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使平(坦); 变平<br>使成平面; 变成平面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A tornado leveled the entire business district.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 龙卷风使整个商业区成为平地。</font><br>\n
liable	<h3>liable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有法律责任的, 有义务的<br>易患…的, 易受…之害的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This area is liable to flooding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该地区易遭受水灾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children are liable to catch cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小孩易患感冒。</font><br>有做某事的倾向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are all liable to make mistakes when we're tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们疲劳的时候都容易出错。</font><br>\n

liberate	<h3>liberate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>解放, 释放<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They did their best to liberate slaves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们尽最大能力去解放奴隶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new government has liberated all political prisoners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新政府释放了所有的政治犯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should liberate the mind from prejudice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你该解除心中的偏见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This will liberate him from economic worry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这将消除他经济上的忧虑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city was liberated in 1949.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市是1949年解放的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heat brings about a chemical reaction, and oxygen is liberated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 热量引起化学反应, 释放出氧气。</font><br>\n
liberty	<h3>liberty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>自由, 自主<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The constitution guards the liberty of people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宪法保障人民的自由。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The constitution guards the liberty of people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宪法保障人民的自由。</font><br>〈正式〉许可权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He granted the boy liberty to go out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他允许那男孩出去。</font><br>\n

lick	<h3>lick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>舔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy is licking the ice-cream cone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小男孩在舔着冰淇淋蛋卷。</font><br>〈口〉打败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think we could lick the best teams there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想我们能打败那儿最好的队。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(波浪)轻拍; (火焰)吞卷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flames licked against the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火焰吞卷着那栋楼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flames of the fire licked the sides of the fireplace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火焰卷烧着壁炉的边缘。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>舔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave the bowl a thorough lick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把饭碗舔得一干二净。</font><br>(油漆等)一刷之量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house would look better with a lick of paint.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房子稍加颜色就好看了。</font><br>\n

lie	<h3>lie</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>躺, 卧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He broke his leg and had to lie all the time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他折断了腿, 不得不总是躺着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The national hero lies buried here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位民族英雄就安葬在这里。</font><br>位于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There lies a small town at the foot of the mountain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 山脚下有一个小镇。</font><br>展现, 伸展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ahead lay a vast expanse of wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 前面是一大片小麦。</font><br>说谎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Obviously he was lying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 显然他是在撒谎。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>平放<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The books have been lying here ever since they were laid here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些书自从放在这里就一直未动过。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>谎话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried to tell me a lie about losing his wallet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图使我相信他丢失了钱夹的谎言。</font><br>\n
life	<h3>life</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生命<br>生物<br>人生, 生存<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His work is his whole life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的工作是他全部生活的寄托。</font><br>生活<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The adolescent life is most important.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青春期的生活是非常重要的。</font><br>人命, 性命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the earthquake many lives were lost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地震中死了许多人。</font><br>一生, 终身, 终生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you ever visited the Great Wall in your life?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在你一生中, 你参观过长城吗?</font><br>生活方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His way of life is rather austere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的生活方式相当简朴。</font><br>\n

lift	<h3>lift</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>举起, 抬起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This window will not lift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个窗户推不上去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is strong enough to lift the box.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很强壮, 能举得起这只箱子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>终止; 解除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They decided to lift the embargo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决定解除禁运。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>消散<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane will take off once the fog has lifted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 等雾一消散, 飞机便起飞。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抬, 举<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With one great lift, the men moved the rock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些人猛一抬把那块石头搬动了。</font><br>电梯, 升降机<br>免费搭车; 搭便车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got a lift part of the way in a lorry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有一段路搭乘了卡车。</font><br>鼓舞, 振奋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Passing the exam gave me a real lift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 通过了考试我确实觉得很兴奋。</font><br>\n
light	<h3>light</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>光, 光线, 光亮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A dim light came from afar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一缕暗淡的光线从远处射来。</font><br>光源, 电灯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Turn the light off, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把灯关上。</font><br>火焰, 火花, 点火物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He struck a light and set the candle going.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他擦了一根火柴把蜡烛点亮。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>点火, 生火, 点燃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The match lights easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这火柴容易点燃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had lit many bonfires.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们燃起了一堆堆篝火。</font><br>(使)容光焕发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her face lighted when she saw who it was.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当她弄明白这是谁时, 脸上露出喜色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A quick animation lit her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 突来的兴奋情绪令她容光焕发。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>照亮, 照明<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>光线充足的, 明亮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a nice light room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一间光线明亮的房间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's getting light;  morning is coming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天渐渐亮了, 早晨来临了。</font><br>淡色的, 浅色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His hair was light brown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的头发是淡褐色的。</font><br>轻的, 不重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought a light suitcase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买了一只轻便手提箱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The box is lighter than that one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只箱子较那只箱子轻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The suitcase was light to carry, being empty except for two shirts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只箱子提着很轻, 因为里面只有两件衬衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's so light that a child could lift it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这东西太轻了, 孩子都能拿起来。</font><br>轻柔的; 轻巧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conversation is light and gay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谈话轻松愉快。</font><br>易消化的, 清淡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had light fish this lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天午饭我吃了清淡的鱼。</font><br>\n
lightning	<h3>lightning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>闪电<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>闪电般的, 快速的<br>\n
like	<h3>like</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>喜欢, 喜爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The students much like the new dean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们很喜欢这位新系主任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Women like to be thought younger than they are.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女人喜欢人家说她年轻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes getting up early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢早起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like that you should call on me frequently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢你经常来拜访我。</font><br>想要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm hungry; I'd like some hot food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我饿了, 我想吃一点热的东西。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示方式)如同, 像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is dressed in white like a nurse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着白衣服, 像个护士。</font><br>(表示态度)想要, 有…的意向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't feel like work today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今天不想上班。</font><br>(表示属性)像, 像…一样; 与…类似; 好像是, 看来有…可能(或迹象); 能表明…特征, 像…才会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child was like its mother in looks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子长得像妈妈。</font><br>(表示列举)比如, 诸如…之类, 像…等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was like them to leave the work to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们就是这样子, 总是把工作留给我们做。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相似的, 相同的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each employee received a like bonus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个雇员都得到了相同数目的奖金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two girls are very like.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个女孩很相像。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相类似的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you ever heard its like?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你听过这样类似的事情吗?</font><br>\n
likely	<h3>likely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可能的; 有希望的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are the likeliest candidates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是最有可能当选的候选人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It isn't likely that I should accept such an offer as that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我接受像那样的帮助是不可能的。</font><br>适合的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the likeliest person for the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是最适合做这份工作的人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They'll very likely come by car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们很可能开车来。</font><br>\n
likewise	<h3>likewise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同样地, 照样地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Watch him and do likewise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盯着点, 照他的样子做。</font><br>也, 又<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her speech and her manner likewise upset me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的言谈使我心烦意乱, 她的举止也一样。</font><br>\n
limb	<h3>limb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was very tall with long limbs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他个儿很高, 四肢很长。</font><br>大树枝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sat on a limb of the tree and looked down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坐在一根大树枝上往下看。</font><br>\n
limit	<h3>limit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>限制; 限定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He must limit the number of cigarettes he smokes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他必须限制他抽烟的数目。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>境界; 界限; 限度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There isn't a limit to everything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对每件事情没有什么限制。</font><br>限额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bank has written to say I've gone over my credit limit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 银行写信来说我已经超过信用限额了。</font><br>令人无法忍受的人[事物]<br>\n
limitation	<h3>limitation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>限制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am willing to accept certain limitation on my freedom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我愿意接受对我自由的某些限制。</font><br>局限, 极限<br>\n
limited	<h3>limited</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有限的<br>\n
limp	<h3>limp</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跛行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walks with a limp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他走路一瘸一拐的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>一瘸一拐地走<br>困难地航行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The damaged ship limped back to port.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘受损的船困难地驶回港口。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无力的; 无生气的; 易弯的; 松软的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave her a limp, cold handshake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有气无力且冷淡地与她握了一下手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This company is limp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司没有生气。</font><br>\n
line	<h3>line</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>线条, 线, 绳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She put the wet clothes on the line to dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把湿衣服晾在绳子上了。</font><br>界线, 边线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A line of forts was built along the border to protect the country against attack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在边界沿线修筑了堡垒以保护国家免受攻击。</font><br>方向, 路线<br>条纹, 皱纹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are a lot of lines on his forehead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他额头上都是皱纹。</font><br>线路, 电话线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My family has only one line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我家只有一条电话线路。</font><br>排, 行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a line of young trees on each side of the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 街道两旁各有一排小树。</font><br>家系, 家族<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He comes from a long line of actors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他来自一个演员世家。</font><br>铁路线, 航线, 运输线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The railway line follows the river for several miles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁路线沿着河流延伸几英里。</font><br>(文字的)行<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用线标出, 划线于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can line blank paper for writing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以在空白纸上划线以便写字。</font><br>使布满纹络[皱纹]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wrinkles lined her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的脸上布满了皱纹。</font><br>排队, 对齐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowds lined the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人群排列在马路两旁。</font><br>给…安衬里<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Strong cloth lined the trunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这箱子用结实的布作衬里。</font><br>\n
link	<h3>link</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>连接, 联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two companies have linked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两家公司已联合。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road links all the new towns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条路把所有的新市镇连接在一起。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>环, 联系, 纽带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each link that makes up a chain is equally important.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 链子上面的每一环都同等重要, 缺一不可。</font><br>\n
lion	<h3>lion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>狮子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lion is called the king of beasts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狮子被称为万兽之王。</font><br>\n
lip	<h3>lip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>嘴唇<br>边缘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They came to the lip of a dead crater.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们来到了一个死火山口。</font><br>\n
liquid	<h3>liquid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>液体<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>液体的, 液态的<br>清澈的, 明亮的<br>(声音)流畅的<br>易转换成现款的, 流动的<br>\n

list	<h3>list</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一览表, 目录, 名单, 清单<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>列出, 列入, 把…编列成表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's just list these factors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们仅列举这些因素。</font><br>\n
listen	<h3>listen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>倾听; 留心听<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He listened, but could hear nothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他侧耳静听, 但什么声音也听不见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It doesn't listen reasonable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这听上去并不合理。</font><br>听信, 听从<br>\n
liter	<h3>liter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>升<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Litre is a unit of capacity in the metric system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 升是公制测量中的一个单位。</font><br>\n
literacy	<h3>literacy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>识字, 有文化, 会读写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't believe that he failed the literacy test.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法相信他识字测试不及格。</font><br>\n
literally	<h3>literally</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>逐字地; 照字面地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He translated the passage literally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他逐字逐句地翻译这段文字。</font><br>确实地, 真正地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was literally blue with cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她真的冷得全身青紫。</font><br>\n
literary	<h3>literary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>文学(上)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a literary word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个文学用词。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your style is a bit too literary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的文笔书卷气重了一点。</font><br>精通文学的<br>\n

litre	<h3>litre</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>升<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Litre is a unit of capacity in the metric system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 升是公制测量中的一个单位。</font><br>\n
little	<h3>little</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>小的, 幼小的, 矮小的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a pretty little house it is!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么小巧玲珑的房子啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was beautiful when she was little.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她小时候很漂亮。</font><br>(时间、距离)短的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She stayed here only a little while.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在这里只停留了很短的时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have little time for reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我几乎没有时间看书。</font><br>琐碎的, 微不足道的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A few little things apart, I am very pleased with the result.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 撇开一些小事不谈, 我对这结果很满意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>少量, 些许<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>少到几乎没有, 毫不, 难得, 很少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Little does he know what trouble he's in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对自己身处何种麻烦茫无所知。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I go there very little.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很少去那里。</font><br>\n
live	<h3>live</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>活, 生存<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are your parents living?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你父母还健在吗?</font><br>居住; 住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lives about ten miles from my house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的住处离我家约十英里远。</font><br>继续存在, 留存<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As long as I live, the bridge lives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人在, 桥就在。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>以某种方式生活<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Eat to live but not live to eat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人为了活着而吃饭, 而不是为了吃饭而活着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lived a virgin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她终生未嫁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I lived a happy life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我过着幸福的生活。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>活的, 有生命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is a live fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是条活鱼。</font><br>真正的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We saw a real live rattlesnake!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们看到一条真的响尾蛇！</font><br>燃烧着的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We cooked the steak over live coals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们是把牛排放在燃烧的煤上烤的。</font><br>带电的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be careful, this wire is live.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当心, 这根电线有电。</font><br>未爆炸的; 随时可用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They found a live bomb in the valley.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在山谷里发现一枚未爆炸的炸弹。</font><br>当前重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shortage of funds is still very much a live issue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 资金短缺仍然是当前的重大问题。</font><br>现场直播的, 实况转播的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a live broadcast, not a recording.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是现场直播, 不是录音。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>实地, 现场地, 以直播方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The football game is going out live.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 足球赛正在进行实况转播。</font><br>\n
lively	<h3>lively</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>充满活力的, 活泼的, 轻快的<br>逼真的, 醒目的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed in a lively pink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她身穿一件粉红色的衣服。</font><br>剧烈的, 狂暴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea is quite lively today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天海面风浪很大。</font><br>\n
liver	<h3>liver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肝脏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a weak liver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的肝脏不好。</font><br>(供食用的)肝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a delicious dish—liver and onions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一道好菜, 洋葱炒肝。</font><br>过着某种生活的人<br>\n
living	<h3>living</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>活(着)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has no living relatives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她没有活着的亲人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the old man still living?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那老人还活着吗?</font><br>现存的, 在使用中的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp English is a living language.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语是现代使用着的语言。</font><br>逼真的, 生动的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生计, 生存之道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a living by writing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他靠写作谋生。</font><br>生活方式<br>\n

load	<h3>load</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>负荷; 负担<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The load on this beam is more than it will bear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 横梁上的负荷比它能承受的要大得多。</font><br>装载, 装载量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane can carry a ten-ton load.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机能载重十吨。</font><br>工作量, 负荷量<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>把…装上车[船]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The goods are hard to load.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些货物装起来会很困难的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stevedores' work is to load and unload ships.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 装卸工人的工作是装卸船只。</font><br>装…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This camera loads easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这架照相机装胶卷很容易。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Meantime he was loading the pistols.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 而同时他在往手枪里装子弹。</font><br>\n
loaf	<h3>loaf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一条[块]面包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought two loaves of bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了两条面包。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>〈口〉虚度光阴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't loaf your life away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要虚度光阴。</font><br>\n
