lobby	<h3>lobby</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>前厅, 厅堂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary is in the lobby of Asian Hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽现在在亚洲旅馆大厅。</font><br>议会休息室<br>游说议员的团体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clean-air lobby are/is against the plans for the new factory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 空气清洁运动团体反对设立新工厂的计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>向…进行游说[疏通]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are actively lobbying against the bill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在积极游说议员, 阻止通过该项法案。</font><br>\n
local	<h3>local</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>地方性的, 当地的, 本地的<br>局部的<br>褊狭的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>当地人, 本地人<br>住处附近的当地酒店<br>地方分会<br>\n
locate	<h3>locate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>找出, 指出(地点或位置)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general tried to locate the enemy's site.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位将军想找出敌人营地的位置。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(在…)设置, 坐落于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Early settlers located where there was water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 早期的移民安居在有水的地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He located himself behind the screen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他使自己居于幕后。</font><br>\n
location	<h3>location</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>位置, 场所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a suitable location for a new school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是建一所新学校的合适地点。</font><br>发现[找出]…的位置[地点]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was responsible for the location of the missing yacht.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他负责查明失踪游艇的下落。</font><br>外景(拍摄地)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was difficult to find a suitable location.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当时要找一个合适的外景拍摄地相当困难。</font><br>\n
lock	<h3>lock</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>锁<br>水闸, 船闸<br>刹车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For a car of this size the lock is excellent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对于这种大小的车子来说, 这刹车要算很好了。</font><br>(头发的)一绺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She keeps a lock of his hair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她保留着他的一绺头发。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>锁住, 锁上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The safe locks easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这保险柜容易锁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lock the door when you leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你离开时把门锁上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>卡住, 不动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't control the car, the wheels have locked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法操纵这辆汽车, 车轮卡住了。</font><br>\n
lodge	<h3>lodge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>暂住, 借宿<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>供…以临时住处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She seldom lodged the tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很少留宿游人。</font><br>向当局提出声明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is too late to lodge any objections.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在提出任何异议已为时太晚。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乡间小屋, 旅舍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We stayed at a lodge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在一间小屋里暂住。</font><br>\n
log	<h3>log</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>原木, 木材, 木料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We transport logs by trains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用火车运送木材。</font><br>航海[飞行]日志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain described the accident in the ship's log.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船长在航海日志中描述了这件事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>砍伐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They log for a living.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以伐木为生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They logged the timber into 7-foot length.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把那根木材锯成七英尺长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…记入航海日志<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He logged the ship's speed at 10 knots.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在航海日志之中记下船速每小时十海里。</font><br>航行(…距离), 飞行(…小时)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane logs 700 miles an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这架飞机以每小时700英里的时速飞行。</font><br>\n
logic	<h3>logic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>逻辑(学), 逻辑性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He argues with learning and logic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的辩论既有学问又合逻辑。</font><br>推理方法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At this point our logic was at fault.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这一点上, 我们推理的方法是错误的。</font><br>合理的想法<br>\n
logical	<h3>logical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>逻辑(上)的, 符合逻辑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To be specific, the argument in your graduation thesis is logical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 具体地说, 你的毕业论文符合逻辑。</font><br>推理正确的, 合乎常理的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is logical that the book is expensive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书贵是很自然的事。</font><br>\n
logo	<h3>logo</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>专用标志, 标记, 商标<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Longman logo, a small sailing ship, is on the cover of this book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本书的封面上印有朗文公司的小帆船标志。</font><br>\n
lonely	<h3>lonely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>孤独的, 寂寞的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lonely old man was much to be pitied by all of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位孤独的老人得到了我们大家的同情。</font><br>荒凉的, 人迹罕至的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The place is a bit lonely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个地方有点荒凉。</font><br>\n
long	<h3>long</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(距离, 长度)长的<br>长时间的, 长期的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an hour long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这有一个钟头之久。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupils have two long holidays every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们每年有两次长假。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>长久地, 长期地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you been working here long?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在这儿工作很久了吗?</font><br>很久地, 久远地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard about him long before I saw him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在没见过他之前就听说过他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>长时间, 长时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work won't take long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这工作不会花太长时间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>渴望; 极想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are longing to see you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们极想见到你。</font><br>\n
look	<h3>look</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>看, 瞧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look whether the postman has been yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去看看邮递员来过没有。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>面向, 朝向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house looks south.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这栋房子面朝南。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The offices look onto a park.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这几家办公室面对着公园。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>看来, 显得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looks an honest man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来他像个诚实的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's beginning to look his age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看上去和他的年龄相称。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looks much younger than she is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看起来比她实际年龄要年轻得多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was looking her best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那时显得很美。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked blank when he was informed of his dismissal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当被告知自己被解雇时, 他显得茫然。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It looks very suspicious to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得这事似乎很不可靠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They looked as if they didn't care.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们看起来好像不在乎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It looks as if it were going to rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天好像要下雨了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It looks as if we were going to have fine weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天好像要放晴了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It looks as if there will be a strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来将有一场罢工运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It looks as if the coming autumn harvest will be even better than the last one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来即将到来的秋收会比去年更好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>看, 瞥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I took a close look at her photo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我仔细地看了一下她的照片。</font><br>脸色, 神色, 表情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She assumed a look of innocence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她装出一副天真无邪的样子。</font><br>美貌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She used her good looks to compensate her lack of intelligence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她利用她漂亮的外表来弥补智力的不足。</font><br>\n
loop	<h3>loop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>圈, 环, 环状物<br>回路, 循环<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)成环, (使)成圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Loop the curtains up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把窗帘卷起来。</font><br>\n
loose	<h3>loose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>松的, 宽松的, 不牢固的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is wearing a loose dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着一件宽松的连衣裙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Loose shirts are good for summer wear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏季适合穿肥大的衬衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The radio wasn't working because of a loose connection in the wires.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于电线接头不牢, 这台收音机坏了。</font><br>不精确的, 不严密的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a loose thinker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个思维不严密的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That word has many loose meanings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个词有很多不确切的含义。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His logic is too loose to make much sense.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的推理太不严密, 没什么道理。</font><br>自由的; 散漫的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse is loose in the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马自由自在地在田野里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>释放, 失去控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He loosed the ropes that bound the prisoner, thus allowing him to jump up and escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他解开了囚犯身上绑着的绳子, 那个囚犯跳起来就跑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He loosed the dog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把狗放了出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wine loosed his tongue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他酒后说话很随便。</font><br>\n
loosen	<h3>loosen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>解开; 放松<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The screw has loosened.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 螺丝钉松了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He loosened his tie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他松开了领带。</font><br>松弛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medicine may loosen your cough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种药能减轻你的咳嗽。</font><br>\n

loss	<h3>loss</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>丧失; 遗失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should ensure yourself against loss of heat by having double glazing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该装双层玻璃防止热量散失。</font><br>损耗, 亏损<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The oversight issued in heavy loss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次疏忽造成重大损耗。</font><br>损失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My losses are nothing to yours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的损失和你的比起来算不了什么。</font><br>\n
lot	<h3>lot</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>许多, 大量<br>签; 抽签<br>命运; 运气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her lot has been a hard one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她命苦。</font><br>一块地, 场地<br>\n
loud	<h3>loud</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>响亮的, 大声的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The radio isn't loud enough, could you turn it up?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 收音机不够响, 你能把音量开大一点吗?</font><br>刺眼的, 太招摇的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>响亮地, 大声地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spoke loud enough for most of the audience to hear him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声讲话好让大多数听众能听见。</font><br>\n
love	<h3>love</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>爱; 热爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can't love but hate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只能恨不能爱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>喜爱; 喜好; 喜欢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My daughter loves folk songs very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我女儿很喜欢民歌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love you to dress well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢你穿得整整齐齐。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爱, 爱情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always unlucky in love.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在恋爱方面总是运气不佳。</font><br>喜爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Music was one of the greatest loves of his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐是他生活中最大的爱好。</font><br>\n
lovely	<h3>lovely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可爱的, 美丽的, 动人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was delivered of a lovely girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她生了一个可爱的女孩。</font><br>令人愉快的, 美好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's been a simply lovely afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天下午真令人愉快。</font><br>\n
lover	<h3>lover</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爱好者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr.Smith was a lover of poetry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯先生是一名诗歌爱好者。</font><br>情人, 情夫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has had many lovers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有过许多情人。</font><br>情侣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They met in June and became lovers soon after.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在六月相遇, 不久就成了情侣。</font><br>\n
low	<h3>low</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>低的, 矮的<br>低下的, 低等的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of low birth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位出身低微的人。</font><br>粗劣的, 低俗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lived on low diet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们吃粗劣的食物。</font><br>意志消沉的, 情绪低落的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Finding her in low spirits, they had persuaded her to join them for lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们发现她情绪低落, 便劝说她同他们一块儿吃午饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She always feels low.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她总是情绪低落。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>低, 向下; 低微地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun sank low in the sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳快要没入地平线了。</font><br>低声地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Speak lower or he'll hear you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 说话小声点, 不然他会听见的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>低点, 低水平<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Output was at a record low.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 产量为创纪录的最低水平。</font><br>(机器运转)低排挡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should put a car in low.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该用最低挡开车。</font><br>\n
lower	<h3>lower</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>较低的, 低等的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lower classes are always with us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们总是和下层社会人民在一起。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)降低; (使)跌落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun lowers in the west.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳从西边落下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>削弱; 削减<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cold had lowered her resistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感冒已削弱了她的抵抗力。</font><br>\n

lump	<h3>lump</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Break up these large lumps of dirt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这些大泥块弄碎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are some lumps in the sauce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酱汁中有一些块块。</font><br>肿块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a lump in his neck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脖子上有一个肿块。</font><br>〈非正〉傻大个, 笨拙的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do hurry up, you great lump!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 快点儿, 你这个笨蛋！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>结成块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This oatmeal lumps if you don't stir it well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你不好好搅动, 麦片粥会结块的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…归并在一起(考虑); 将人[物]同等对待[分类]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will lump our money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将把所有的钱合在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've lumped all the top students in single class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把所有优等生都编在一个班里。</font><br>\n

machine	<h3>machine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>机器, 机械装置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine has been idled away for several minutes to get it warm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 机器空转了几分钟以预热。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The washing machine seems to have broken down again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 洗衣机好像又坏了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Years of doing the same dull job can turn you into a machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经年累月地做一种单调的工作, 能把活人也做成机器。</font><br>机动车辆; 飞机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He thundered down the street on his new machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他驾驶着新车在大街上呼啸而去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用机器制造, 用机器加工<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He machined the clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用机器制造衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The edge must be machined down to 0.02 millimetres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这边缘必须切割到0.02毫米的精确度。</font><br>\n
machinery	<h3>machinery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(总称)机器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A factory contains much machinery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一家工厂可容纳很多机器。</font><br>体系, 机构<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need to discuss ways of improving the machinery of government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要商讨改进政府机构的办法。</font><br>\n
mad	<h3>mad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>疯了的, 发疯的, 神经错乱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't fight with him, he is a mad man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别跟他打架, 他是疯子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was mad at pain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他疼得要发疯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She must have been mad to do such a thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她干这种事情准是发疯了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The noise outside the building nearly drove me mad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 楼外的噪音几乎使我发疯。</font><br>恼火的, 发怒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the boss gets mad, leave him alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当老板生气时, 不要理他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was mad about being waked up so early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因这么早就被叫醒而生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His complete lack of responsibility drives me mad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的毫不负责使我极为生气。</font><br>狂热的; 着迷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is mad for fame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他疯狂地追求名誉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is mad about her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对她着了迷。</font><br>愚蠢的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mad mistakes amused all of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他愚蠢的错误使我们大家都发笑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's mad to force your foot into a shoe that's too small for you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 硬要把脚穿进太小的鞋里去是愚蠢的。</font><br>\n
madam	<h3>madam</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>女士, 小姐, 夫人, 太太<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What can I do for you, madam?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要我帮忙吗, 小姐?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dear madam, I am very glad and honoured to write to you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 亲爱的女士, 我能给你写信真是感到十分荣幸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I began my letter “Dear madam”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在书信的开头用“亲爱的夫人”。</font><br>喜欢指使他人的年轻妇女<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a little madam—don't let her order you around.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她喜欢指使别人, 别让她把你搞得团团转。</font><br>(妓院的)鸨母<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The greedy madam stopped at nothing to gain profit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贪婪的老鸨为了攫取利润无所不为。</font><br>\n
magazine	<h3>magazine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>杂志, 期刊<br>弹药库<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He escaped being killed when the magazine exploded because he had not gone to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因没有去上班而避免了在那次弹药库爆炸中丧生。</font><br>\n
magic	<h3>magic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>魔法, 法术; 巫术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They claimed that he had inflicted bad fortune on them through evil magic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们声称他运用了恶毒的魔法使他们遭受不幸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They believe that it was all done by magic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们相信这都是靠魔法实现的。</font><br>魔术, 戏法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conjuror's magic delighted the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 魔术师的戏法逗乐了孩子们。</font><br>魔力, 魅力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You could feel the magic of Shakespeare's poetry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以感觉到莎士比亚诗歌的魅力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>魔法的, 法术的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you do magic tricks?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会变魔术吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is really a magic palace!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那真是一个有魔力的宫殿！</font><br>很好的, 奇异的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their latest record is really magic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的最新唱片真是棒极了。</font><br>\n
magnet	<h3>magnet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>磁铁, 磁体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He picked all the pins up with a magnet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用磁铁捡起了所有的大头针。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rabbits in our backyard were a magnet that attracted all the children in the neighbourhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我家后院的兔子像磁铁一样吸引着邻居所有的孩子。</font><br>有吸引力的人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actress was the magnet that drew great audiences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位女演员曾吸引过许多观众。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Buckingham Palace is a great magnet for tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白金汉宫对旅游者来说是个有巨大吸引力的地方。</font><br>\n
magnetic	<h3>magnetic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有磁性的, 有吸引力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is magnetic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很有吸引力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The iron has lost its magnetic force.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块铁已失去了磁力。</font><br>磁性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a magnetic disc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有一张磁盘。</font><br>\n

mail	<h3>mail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>邮政(制度), 邮递<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Air mail is quicker than sea mail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 航空邮寄比海上邮寄快。</font><br>邮件, 邮包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please forward my mail to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把我的邮件转寄给我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They forwarded his mail to his new address.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把他的邮件寄到他的新地址。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>邮寄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've just come out to mail some letters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我刚出来要寄几封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I mailed him a letter yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我给他邮去一封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He mailed the package to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我邮寄了一个包裹。</font><br>\n
mailbox	<h3>mailbox</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>邮筒, 信箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stuck down the envelope and dropped it into the mailbox.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把信封粘好后便投进邮筒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They knocked together two rough mailboxes with wooden boards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用木板草草地做成了两个粗糙的信箱。</font><br>\n
main	<h3>main</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>主要的; 最重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the main purpose of my coming here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是我到这儿来的主要目的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This guidebook points out the main facts of early American history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本导游手册讲述了美洲早期的重要史实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>总管道; 干线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water is supplied from the mains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水是从总管道来的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Expansion joints of various kinds are fitted on gas mains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各种各样的伸缩接头被安装在煤气的总管道上了。</font><br>\n
mainland	<h3>mainland</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大陆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ferry services operate between the islands and the mainland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在大陆和各岛之间有轮渡服务。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have relatives on the mainland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在大陆有亲戚。</font><br>\n
mainstream	<h3>mainstream</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(思想或行为的)主流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their views lie outside the mainstream of current medical opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的观点不属于当今医学界观点的主流。</font><br>\n
maintain	<h3>maintain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保持; 继续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two countries have maintained friendly relations for many years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两国多年来一直保持着友好的关系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Food is necessary to maintain life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 食物是维持生命所必需的。</font><br>保养, 维护<br>坚持; 主张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She maintains that the accusation is groundless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坚持该指控是毫无根据的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He maintained the policy to be wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坚持认为这个政策是错误的。</font><br>供给; 赡养<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has to maintain his wife and two children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他必须养活妻子和两个孩子。</font><br>\n
maintenance	<h3>maintenance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>维持; 维护; 保养; 维修<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He learnt tractor maintenance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他学会了拖拉机维修。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His small farm provides maintenance, but not much more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的小农场能使他们维持生活, 但仅此而已。</font><br>赡养费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has to pay maintenance to his ex-wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他必须给前妻赡养费。</font><br>\n
major	<h3>major</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>较大的; 主要的; 严重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are major and minor principles in everything, and the minor principles are all subordinate to the major.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情有大道理, 有小道理, 一切小道理都归大道理管着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Seek common ground on major questions while reserving differences on minor ones.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 求大同存小异。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The major part of the town was ruined by the earthquake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这城镇的大部分已被这次地震造成一片废墟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The output of 13 major products has increased by a wide margin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 十三项主要产品的产量都有大幅度增长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two major dancers are level with each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两个主要舞蹈演员长得一般高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Scientists think they have broken through in their attempt to find the causes of many major diseases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家们认为, 他们在探索主要病症的病因方面有了新的进展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suffered some major setbacks during the fighting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这次战斗中, 他们遭到了严重挫折。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car needs major repairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆汽车需要大修。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The year went out with the news of a major earthquake in Peru.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那年年终, 传来了秘鲁发生大地震的消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lack of experience does not constitute a major hindrance to progress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经验缺乏并不是进步的主要障碍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were understood to have reviewed all major foreign policy issues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据了解, 他们讨论了所有重大的外交政策问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>少校<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A major precedes a captain in rank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 少校军阶高于上尉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The major ordered his men to fall in at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 少校命令他的士兵立即集合。</font><br>专业; 主修科目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mathematics is my major.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的专业是数学。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>〈美〉主修, 专攻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She majored in Maths and Physics at university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在大学里主修数学和物理。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you majoring in English Literature?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是在专修英国文学吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He majored in International Politics at Harvard University.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在哈佛大学主修国际政治。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In college I majored in Natural Science. What was your major?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上大学时我主修自然科学, 你当时学什么专业?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Brian majored in Economics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 布莱恩主修经济学。</font><br>\n
majority	<h3>majority</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>多数, 大多数; 半数以上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A majority vote enabled the passage of the resolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多数人投赞成票使议案得以通过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The majority of his books are kept upstairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的大部分书收藏在楼上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The majority of the damage is easy to repair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次的大部分损害容易补救。</font><br>票数差距, 多得的票数, 超过的票数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The draft resolution was adopted by a majority of 128.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项提案以超过128票的多数获得通过。</font><br>法定年龄; 成年<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has reached her majority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已达到法定年龄。</font><br>\n
make	<h3>make</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>做; 制造; 被制造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He'll make a kite for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将给我做个风筝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She makes all her clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的衣服都是自己缝制的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Boots are made in this tannery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家皮革工厂生产皮靴。</font><br>做出, 制定, 产生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made no answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她没作答复。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Once a decision is made, we must carry it out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一旦做了决定, 我们就要执行。</font><br>使, 使得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy made the baby laugh by making a face at him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩扮鬼脸逗那个婴儿笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That makes me mad!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这简直使我发疯！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boss made Tom work long hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老板逼着汤姆长时间地干活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everybody must be made to understand that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 务必让每个人都懂得这一点。</font><br>获得, 挣得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made 600 pounds last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去年赚了600镑。</font><br>总计, 等于<br>成为, 使成为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Medical knowledge alone doesn't make a good doctor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 单有医学知识并不能成为一个好医生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hall would make a good theatre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个大厅可以当一个很好的剧场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll find us all wanting to make friends with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会发现我们都希望与你交朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She would make him a good wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她可以成为他的贤妻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Newton was made President of the Royal Society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛顿被选为皇家学会会长。</font><br>到达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She'll never make the summit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她永远到不了山顶。</font><br>准备; 整理<br>认为; 估计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked at the moon and made the time to be midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看了看月亮, 估计时间是半夜了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made it important that everything should be finished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认识到每件事完成的重要性。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made it a useless attempt to advise her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为试图劝她是无用的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开始; 试图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made to cry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她哭起来了。</font><br>行进, 趋向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship was making towards the pier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船正驶向码头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief made towards the open window.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小偷好像要走向开着的窗户。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the evidence makes in your favour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有证据都对你有利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made as if he had not seen me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他装作没有看见我的样子。</font><br>增长起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snow made fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雪很快地堆起来了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>制造, 样式, 牌子, 类型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is of Japanese make.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是日本制造的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The make is very poor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样式很差。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sell all makes of washing machines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们销售各种牌号的洗衣机。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is a man of this make.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰是这种类型的人。</font><br>体格; 气质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the make of an athlete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有运动员的体格。</font><br>\n
male	<h3>male</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>男性的, 雄的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a male magazine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一本男性杂志。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Men and boys are male.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 男人, 男孩都是男性。</font><br>凸形的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a male plug.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一个凸形插头。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>男人; 雄性动物; 雄性植物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been a male.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已经是个男人了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The males are often larger than the females.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雄性动物常比雌性动物大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This flower is a male.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这朵花是雄性植物。</font><br>\n
man	<h3>man</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>男人, 成年男子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mike is a man of charm and cultivation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 迈克是一个既有魅力又有教养的男子。</font><br>人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Growing old is something a man has to accept.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 逐渐衰老是任何人都得承认的事实。</font><br>人类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man has been trying to control nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人类一直在努力控制自然。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…配备人员; 操纵<br>使振作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man yourself for dangers ahead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鼓起勇气, 应付当前危机。</font><br>\n
manage	<h3>manage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>经营, 管理; 控制, 操纵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She managed a clothes shop two years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两年前她开了一家服装店。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I doubt whether Jack could manage a sailing boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怀疑杰克会不会驾驶帆船。</font><br>使用; 吃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you manage another slice of pie?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能再吃一片馅饼吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>办理; 设法对付<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you manage on your own?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一个人能行吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son is a lawyer, so he manages all my legal affairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我儿子是律师, 由他处理我全部的法律事务。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She managed to make herself understood in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她设法用英语表达自己的意思。</font><br>\n
management	<h3>management</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(企业等的)管理, 经营<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel has been left to their management.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饭店已由他们管理。</font><br>管理人员, 管理部门; 资方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The management is[are] having talks with the workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 资方正在和工人谈判。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What this company needs is a stronger management.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司需要一个更有力的管理层。</font><br>与人交往的技巧, 手腕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gets them to accept these changes by tactful management.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用圆滑的手腕说服他们接受这些变动。</font><br>\n
manager	<h3>manager</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>经理, 管理人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has long been hoping to become the assistant manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很久以来就想当经理助理。</font><br>以某种方式管理人、家庭、钱财等的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's not a very good manager, she always spends more money than she earns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不大会理财, 总是入不敷出。</font><br>\n
manipulate	<h3>manipulate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>熟练控制[操作]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Primitive man quickly learned how to manipulate tools.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原始人很快就学会了使用工具。</font><br>\n
mankind	<h3>mankind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mankind has always struggled forward no matter what difficulty lies in its way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不管道路上有什么困难, 人类总是要奋勇前进。</font><br>\n
