manual	<h3>manual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>用手的, 手工的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school offers manual training to the pupils.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该校为学生开设手工课。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手册, 指南<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought a manual of car repairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一本汽车维修手册。</font><br>\n
manufacture	<h3>manufacture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>制造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is manufactured by hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是手工制造的。</font><br>捏造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She manufactured a false story to hide the facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她编了一段谎话来掩盖事实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>制造<br>制造品, 产品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They make manufactures from their own raw materials.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用自己的原料制造产品。</font><br>\n
manufacturer	<h3>manufacturer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>制造商, 制造厂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manufacturers in some countries dumped their surplus commodities abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一些国家的制造商向国外倾销过剩产品。</font><br>\n
many	<h3>many</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>许多, 多的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Not many people can write with the left hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用左手写字的人并不多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dishes were many, but they were all poorly cooked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 菜很多, 但烧得都不好吃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many a famous pop star has been ruined by drugs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很多著名的流行音乐歌星都因使用毒品而毁了自己。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>许多<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many are called but few are chosen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要得多, 选得少。</font><br>\n
map	<h3>map</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a map in the scale of one-millionth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一张比例尺为1比100万的地图。</font><br>天体图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The map of the heavens showed all the northern constellations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份天体图标明了北半部所有的星座。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>绘制(一地区等的)地图; 用地图表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scientists mapped the surface of the moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家绘制了月球表面的地图。</font><br>\n
March	<h3>March</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>三月<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp March 8 is the International Woman's Day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 三月八日是国际妇女节。</font><br>\n
march	<h3>march</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>进军; 行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd of demonstrators marched along the main street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游行群众沿主要街道行进。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)前进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a rest, they marched on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 休息一会儿以后, 他们继续前进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He marched the prisoner in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把犯人押了进去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>行进, 行军<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Military training fits men to make long marches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军训使人能适应长途行军。</font><br>前进, 进军<br>行进距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a day's march from the city to the camp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从这个城市行军到营地需要一天的行军时间。</font><br>游行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers were making a triumphal march through the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战士们正举行胜利游行穿过那城市。</font><br>进行曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The movement of a waltz is very different from that of a march.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 华尔兹的韵律和进行曲的韵律是不同的。</font><br>稳定的发展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The march of events is as fast as we thought.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情的发展就如我们所料的那样快。</font><br>\n
margin	<h3>margin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>页边空白<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the habit of making notes on the margin while reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他读书时有在页边空白处作注释的习惯。</font><br>边, 边缘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The village is situated at the margin of a forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 村子位于森林的边缘。</font><br>差数, 差额; 余地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We allowed a margin of 20 minutes in catching the train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有20分钟的余地赶火车。</font><br>\n
marginal	<h3>marginal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(印或记)在页边的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The marginal illustration is very interesting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 页边的插图很有趣。</font><br>不重要的, 微小的, 少量的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new law will have only a marginal effect on the lives of most people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新法律对大多数人的生活不会有重大的影响。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This once important social group is becoming more and more marginal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个一度十分重要的社会集团越来越无足轻重了。</font><br>仅以微弱多数票获胜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He won the most marginal seat by only two votes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只以两票的微弱优势当选。</font><br>\n
marine	<h3>marine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>海的, 海产的, 海生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a marine painter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位海景画家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are lots of marine mammals such as whales and seals in the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海洋里有许多诸如鲸鱼和海豹类的海生哺乳动物。</font><br>海军的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a soldier of Marine Corps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾是海军陆战队里的一名士兵。</font><br>海事的, 海运的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new marine law will be carried out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的海商法将被执行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水兵; 海军陆战队士兵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The marines landed on the small island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海军陆战队登上了小岛。</font><br>\n
mark	<h3>mark</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>痕迹, 污点, 斑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spilt coffee has left a mark on the table cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 洒出来的咖啡在桌布上留下了印渍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The monument bears the mark of age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纪念碑上有年深日久的痕迹。</font><br>分数, 等级符号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walked on air for getting a high mark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因得了高分而洋洋得意。</font><br>记号, 标记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Command of the mother tongue is the most distinguishing mark of the educated man or woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运用本国语言的能力是受过教育的人最明显的标志。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every garment in the shop has a price mark sewn on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 店里每一件衣服都缝有价签。</font><br>(德国货币名称)马克<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…留下痕迹, 标出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The table marks very easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张桌子很容易留下印痕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was careful to mark her place before she shut the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 合上书以前, 她小心地做了记号。</font><br>表示, 指明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His silence marked his anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的沉默表明了他的愤怒。</font><br>给…打分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He marks the score in the basketball match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在篮球比赛中担任记分员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He marked the paper leniently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他改考卷打分数很松。</font><br>\n
market	<h3>market</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>市集, 市场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the market to sell what she had made.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她去市场出售自制品。</font><br>交易情况, 行情<br>需求; 销路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a good market for motorcars now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在汽车的销路挺好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's not much market for these goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些货物的需求量不大。</font><br>行销地区<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在市场上出售某物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The firm markets many types of goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司在市场上销售多种商品。</font><br>推销<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inventor is trying to market his new product.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发明者正想推销他的新产品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>〈美〉去市场买东西<br>\n
marriage	<h3>marriage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结婚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news of their marriage was not made public until three months later.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们结婚的消息三个月后才公开。</font><br>婚姻状况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her first marriage ended unhappy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的第一次婚姻结局很不幸。</font><br>婚礼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will the marriage take place?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婚礼什么时候举行?</font><br>\n
married	<h3>married</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>已婚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Married people usually have a different view of life from single people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 已婚的人与单身的人通常有不同的人生观。</font><br>与…结为夫妻的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have got married for ten years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已经结婚十年了。</font><br>婚姻的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The third chapter described their married life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第三章描写他们的婚后生活。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈非正〉已婚的年轻人<br>\n
marry	<h3>marry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)结婚, 娶, 嫁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never married.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从未结过婚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is going to marry Mary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰将要和玛丽结婚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Byron has married an heiress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拜伦娶了个有遗产的女人。</font><br>结合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's meet by that bridge where the rivers marry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们就在河流会合处的那座桥边见面吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This poem marries theme and style well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这首诗的主题和风格结合得很好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>为…主持婚礼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bishop married them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主教为他们主持婚礼。</font><br>\n
marsh	<h3>marsh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>沼泽, 湿地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to cross the marshes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不穿过那片沼泽地。</font><br>\n
marshal	<h3>marshal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>元帅, 最高指挥官<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Zhukov was a marshal of the former Soviet Union.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 朱可夫是前苏联的一位元帅。</font><br>典礼官, 司仪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The marshal rode at the head of the parade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 典礼官在检阅队伍的前面骑马行进。</font><br>执法官, 警察局长; 消防局长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was appointed fire marshal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被任命为消防队长</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>整理, 排列, 集结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general marshaled his army for battle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将军集结部队准备战斗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Marshal your arguments before debating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 辩论前整理一下你的论点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He marshaled his facts well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把事实列举得很好。</font><br>\n
marvellous	<h3>marvellous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不可思议的, 惊奇的, 奇妙的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I warmly congratulated him on the marvellous achievement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我热烈祝贺他取得了惊人的成就。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's marvellous how he's managed to climb that far.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怎么能爬得那么远, 真不可思议。</font><br>〈口〉极好的, 绝妙的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What you said is a marvellous idea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你所说的真是个绝妙的主意。</font><br>\n
marvelous	<h3>marvelous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>引起惊异的,不可思议的,非凡的<br>\n
Marxist	<h3>Marxist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>马克思主义者<br>\n
mask	<h3>mask</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面具, 面罩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many of the dancers at the fancy dress ball wore colourful masks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 化装舞会上的许多跳舞者戴着五颜六色的面具。</font><br>用作掩饰的事物; 掩饰; 伪装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他装作若无其事, 借以掩饰内心的不安。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用面具遮住; 掩盖, 掩饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief masked his face with a stocking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那贼用长统袜遮住脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This perfume won't mask the unpleasant smell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种香水遮不住那股难闻的气味。</font><br>\n
mass	<h3>mass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>团, 块, 堆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The aircraft came down in flames, and the heat fused most of the parts together into a solid mass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机冒着火坠落了, 大多数部件因高温而熔成一团。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a mass of stones in the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 院子里堆放着一大堆石头。</font><br>大量, 大批; 众多<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have masses of work to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有大量工作要做。</font><br>群众<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The masses have boundless creative power.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 群众有无限的创造力。</font><br>质量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This particle has very small mass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种粒子的质量很小。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)集中; 聚集<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Troops are mass-ing on the frontier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队在边境集结。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They massed well-equipped troops on the frontier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在边境上集结了装备精良的军队。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>许多的, 大规模的, 群众的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These precise instruments have already gone into mass production.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些精密仪器已经大规模投入生产。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grand mass rally was held on the square.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 广场上举行了盛大的群众集会。</font><br>\n
massive	<h3>massive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>大而重的, 大块的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a massive monument in the square.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 广场上有一座巨大的纪念碑。</font><br>可观的, 巨大的, 大量的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drank a massive amount of alcohol.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喝了大量的烈酒。</font><br>\n
master	<h3>master</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>主人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is your master at home?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你家主人在家吗?</font><br>男教师; 院长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a master of the piano.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是钢琴教师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the Master of King's College, Cambridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾是剑桥大学国王学院的院长。</font><br>大师, 手艺灵巧的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The painting is the work of a master.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画是一位艺术大师的杰作。</font><br>原版, 母带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've left your master in the photocopier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把原件留在影印机里了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>精通的, 熟练的, 优秀的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That young man is a master singer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻人是一位优秀的歌手。</font><br>主要的, 重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother's master passion is swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我弟弟的主要爱好是游泳。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>做…的主人; 控制; 征服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has mastered the ship's crew.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已能管住全体船员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are able to master the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们能够控制局势。</font><br>熟练; 精通<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has mastered every detail of the business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已精通生意的每一个细节。</font><br>\n
mat	<h3>mat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>席子, 垫子<br>\n
match	<h3>match</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比赛, 竞赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a friendly match with them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们与他们进行了一场友谊比赛。</font><br>对手, 敌手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bill is no match for his younger brother at chess.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比尔下棋不是他弟弟的对手。</font><br>相似之物, 相配之物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chairs and the desk are a good match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些椅子和这种书桌很相配。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hat is a match for the coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这帽子与外衣很相配。</font><br>婚姻; 婚姻对象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Both her daughters made good matches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她两个女儿的婚姻都很美满。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使较量, 使比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one matches him when it comes to swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谈到游泳, 没有人比得过他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)相配; (使)相称<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those two shoes don't match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那两只鞋不是一双。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colours match well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 颜色很协调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tie matches your suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条领带跟你的西装很相配。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He promised to match me a piece of cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他答应过替我找一块布料来配。</font><br>\n
mate	<h3>mate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伙伴, 同事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her mates are waiting for her by the gate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的同事们在门口等她。</font><br>配偶, 伴侣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has been a faithful mate to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一直是他忠实的配偶。</font><br>(商船上的)大副<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mate is one rank below the captain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大副是仅低于船长的头衔。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)成为配偶, (使)交配<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Birds mate in the spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟在春天交配。</font><br>\n
material	<h3>material</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>材料, 原料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Japan imports textile materials from Britain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 日本从英国进口纺织材料。</font><br>衣料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She never wears clothes made of coarse material.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她从来不穿粗布衣服。</font><br>素材, 资料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During my three months' stay in the village, I collected enough material for two or three books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在村里待了三个月, 搜集的材料足够写两三本书。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>物质的; 身体的; 肉体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is too poor to satisfy her family's material needs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她太穷了, 无法满足家人的物质需要。</font><br>重要的, 重大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prosecution's case collapsed when a material witness failed to appear in court.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一名重要的证人没有出庭, 因此诉讼辩论无法进行。</font><br>\n
mathematical	<h3>mathematical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>数学的, 数学上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is unusually adept in mathematical calculations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常精通数学计算。</font><br>精确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a mathematical mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有精确的数学头脑。</font><br>\n
mathematics	<h3>mathematics</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>数学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy shows remarkable ability at mathematics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩显示出非凡的数学才能。</font><br>\n
matter	<h3>matter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物质, 物体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Matter is the opposite of mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 物质与精神相对。</font><br>题材, 内容<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The matter in your essay is good but the style is deplorable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你文章的内容很好, 但是体裁太糟糕了。</font><br>事情; 问题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a matter I know little about.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事我不太知道。</font><br>困难, 毛病, 麻烦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must have something the matter with your eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的眼睛一定有点毛病。</font><br>重要性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People know that and recognize its matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们知道这一点, 也认识到它的重要性。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>要紧, 有关系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It does not matter at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毫无关系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It doesn't matter throwing that away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把它扔掉, 没关系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It never mattered what time of day or night it was.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不论是白天还是晚上, 都没有关系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It doesn't matter much whether we go together or separately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一起去还是分头去都可以。</font><br>\n
mature	<h3>mature</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>成熟的, 成年人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a dress shop for mature women.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一家成年妇女服装店。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new ambassador is more mature than his predecessor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新大使比他的前任更成熟一些。</font><br>深思的; 慎重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a mature plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个深思熟虑的计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>成熟, 长成<br>\n
maximum	<h3>maximum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最大值的, 最大量的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the maximum amount of wine you're allowed to take through customs duty-free?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海关准许携带酒类的最大免税限量是多少?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's your maximum distance ever walked?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最多走过多远?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最大的量、体积、强度等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This hall holds a maximum of seventy people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这厅最多能容纳七十人。</font><br>\n
may	<h3>may</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux v.</i></font><br>可以, 许可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “May I smoke here?”“Yes, please (certainly).”</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “我可以在这儿吸烟吗?”“请吸吧!”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I use your bicycle?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以用你的自行车吗?</font><br>也许, 可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He may come, or he may not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他也许会来, 也许不会来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He may possibly know it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他可能知道。</font><br>但愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May good luck be yours!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 祝你顺利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May there never be another world war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 但愿不再有世界大战。</font><br>会, 能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Write to him at once so that he may know in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马上写信给他, 使他能够及时了解情况。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come what may, I will try it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论发生什么, 我总要试一试。</font><br>\n
May	<h3>May</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>五月<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll go on holiday in May.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们五月去度假。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She started work here last May.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年五月她开始在这里工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May flowers were blooming everywhere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 五月的鲜花到处盛开。</font><br>\n
maybe	<h3>maybe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>很可能; 大概<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Maybe you are right and I am wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可能你对了, 我错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Is it true?”“Maybe, I'm not sure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“那是真的吗?”“也许吧, 我说不准。”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I see him maybe once every three, four months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我大概每三四个月见他一次。</font><br>\n
mayor	<h3>mayor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>市长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mayor hurried into his office, brushing off the reporters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市长赶快走进办公室, 拒不接见记者。</font><br>\n
me	<h3>me</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(人称代词I的宾格)我<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you see me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看得见我吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Who is it?”“It's me”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “是谁?”“是我。”</font><br>\n
meal	<h3>meal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>餐, 饭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Bakers have invited us out for a meal tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贝克一家今晚请我们到外面去吃饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This restaurant is known for its Chinese meals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家餐馆以中国菜出名。</font><br>进餐时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The family only meet at meals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全家只在进餐时间相聚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is it usual to have milk with meals?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用餐时常喝牛奶吗?</font><br>\n
mean	<h3>mean</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>表示…的意思<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In this poem the budding flower means youth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这首诗里含苞欲放的花朵是指青春。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sign means that cars cannot enter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种标志表示汽车不能入内。</font><br>本意是, 原意为; 意味<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When we say yes, we mean it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们说同意就同意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I did not mean you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不是指你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These new orders for our manufactures will mean working overtime.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些订购我们产品的新订单意味着要加班。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He means you no harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对你没有恶意。</font><br>怀有某目的; 打算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He that promises too much means nothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许愿过多的人是不打算兑现的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I mean to stay here, if I can.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 若是能留下, 我想留在这儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I mean this house for my daughter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我打算把这房子给我的女儿。</font><br>对某人有价值或重要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In running a company, strict financial management means everything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经营一家公司, 严格的财务管理是至关重要的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must tell you that I mean what I say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得告诉你, 我说话是算数的。</font><br>打算或注定要某人成为或做某事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was never meant for the army.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我根本就不是当兵的材料。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He means his son to be a doctor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要儿子当医生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>吝啬的; 自私的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a mean man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个自私的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband is rather mean over money matters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的丈夫在金钱方面非常小气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's too mean to make a donation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很小气, 不肯捐款。</font><br>卑鄙的, 不善良的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a mean advantage of me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他利用卑鄙的手段占我的便宜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Corruption and bribery are mean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贪污行贿是可鄙的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was mean of her to say that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那样说是刻薄的。</font><br>中间的, 平均的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mean temperature of this area is 33 degrees in summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个地区夏季平均气温为33度。</font><br>低微的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of mean birth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位出身低微的人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平均数, 平均值<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What you do first is to calculate the mean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要做的第一件事就是算出平均数。</font><br>中间, 中庸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a question of finding the mean between too lenient treatment and too severe punishment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 问题是要找出处理过宽和处罚过严的折中办法。</font><br>\n
meaning	<h3>meaning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>意思; 含义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Duff explained his meaning shortly but clearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 达夫简短但清楚地解释了他的意思。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is some dark meaning in his words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话里有某种隐晦的含义。</font><br>重要性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't quite grasp the meaning of these figures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能很好地领会这些数字的重要性。</font><br>\n
means	<h3>means</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方法, 手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Scientists are working to devise a means of storing this type of power.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家们正在为发明一种能储存这种动力的方法而工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does the end always justify the means?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要目的正确, 是否就可以不择手段?</font><br>收入, 财富<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His means permit him to live comfortably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的财富使他能过上舒适的生活。</font><br>\n
meantime	<h3>meantime</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同时; 其间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I continued working, meantime, he went out shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我继续工作, 这期间他出去买东西。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>其时, 其间<br>\n
meanwhile	<h3>meanwhile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同时; 其间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I continued working, meanwhile, he went out shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我继续工作, 这期间他出去买东西。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>其时, 其间<br>\n
measure	<h3>measure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must measure accurately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一定要量准。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>量出; 记录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They measured the strength of an electric current.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们测量了电流的强度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He measured the rope to see if it was long enough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他量了那根绳子看是否够长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a yardstick for measuring whether a person is really progressive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是衡量一个人是否真正进步的标准。</font><br>估计, 估量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's hard to measure his ability when we haven't seen his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有见过他的作品, 很难估计他的能力。</font><br>仔细考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a man who measures his words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个用词很讲究的人。</font><br>(通过竞争, 冲突等)考验某事物, 较量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to measure your determination with that of other people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得与其他人较量一下决心了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>有…大小<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That old tree must measure at least 30 metres from top to bottom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那棵老树从地面到树梢至少有30米。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>测量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tailor took my measure for a new suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁缝量了我的尺寸准备为我做套新衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took the measure of the cliff before he climbed it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把悬崖的高度估量一下后再攀登。</font><br>计量制, 度量法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The measure is given in centimetres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按厘米进行测量。</font><br>计量单位<br>量具, 量器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The barman uses a small silver measure for brandy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酒吧招待员用一个小银制量器量白兰地。</font><br>尺度, 标准<br>程度, 地步<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We did reach a considerable measure of agreement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们确实取得了很大程度的一致。</font><br>措施, 办法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The measures had a detrimental effect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些措施已产生不良影响。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should take appropriate measures to improve our teaching.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应当采取适当的措施提高教学质量。</font><br>\n
measurement	<h3>measurement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>量度; 测量, 衡量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The measurement of individual intelligence is very difficult.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 衡量一个人的智力很困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can find the size of something by means of measurement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以用测量法求得某物的体积。</font><br>(量得的)尺寸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll just take your measurements, sir.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 先生, 我来给您量尺寸。</font><br>\n
meat	<h3>meat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shall we have fish instead of meat today?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天我们不吃肉吃鱼好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog was biting a piece of meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只狗叼着一块肉。</font><br>主要[重要]的部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a clever speech, but there was no real meat in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一次巧妙的演说, 可惜没有实际内容。</font><br>\n
mechanical	<h3>mechanical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>机械的, 力学的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He borrowed a mechanical book from me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从我这儿借了一本力学方面的书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bought a mechanical dog for her sister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为她的妹妹买了一只机械狗。</font><br>机械似的; 呆板的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looks very mechanical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看上去非常呆板。</font><br>\n
mechanism	<h3>mechanism</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>机械装置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He explained how the two mechanisms worked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他解释这两台机械装置是如何工作的。</font><br>构造, 机制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mechanism of the machine is very complicated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器的结构是非常复杂的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a good mechanism.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种好机制。</font><br>办法, 技巧, 途径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are no mechanisms for changing the decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个决定是无法改变的。</font><br>\n
medal	<h3>medal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奖章, 奖牌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pinned a medal on me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我别上一枚奖章。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medal is in silver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个奖牌是银制的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She obtained an Olympic gold medal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她获得一枚奥林匹克金牌。</font><br>\n
media	<h3>media</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>媒体<br>\n
medical	<h3>medical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>医学的, 医疗的, 医术的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Penicillin was an extremely significant medical discovery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青霉素是极其重要的医学发现。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His son is intended for the medical profession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他儿子计划将来从医。</font><br>内科的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家医院有内科病房和外科病房。</font><br>\n
medicine	<h3>medicine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>药, 内服药<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I felt fairly easy after taking the medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我服药后感到舒服些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Good medicines taste bitter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 良药苦口。</font><br>医术, 医学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is going to study medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰要去学医。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He studied tropical medicine in the university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在大学里学习热带医学。</font><br>\n
medium	<h3>medium</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>媒介, 手段, 方法, 工具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an effective medium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种有效手段。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There will be a fuss when the media get hold of the story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新闻媒介得知此事会引起大惊小怪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Radio, television, newspapers and magazines are known as the mass media.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 广播、电视、报纸和杂志被称为大众传媒。</font><br>折中, 中间物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We struck a medium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们采取折中办法。</font><br>生活条件, 环境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water is the natural medium in which most fish live.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水是鱼类生活的自然环境。</font><br>通灵的人<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>中等的, 适中的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a medium body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一副中等的身材。</font><br>\n
meet	<h3>meet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>遇见, 碰见, 相见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We write regularly but seldom meet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们经常通信, 却很少见面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Glad to meet you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很高兴见到你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I met her walking with John.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我碰见她和约翰走在一起。</font><br>认识, 结识<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know her by sight, but we've never met.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我跟她只是面熟, 但并不认识。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come to dinner to meet my sister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 来参加晚宴, 认识一下我妹妹。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>迎接<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hurried forward to meet them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他快步向前去迎接他们。</font><br>满足<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>运动会, 比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a sports meet every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每年都开运动会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I went to a swimming meet last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天晚上我去看了游泳比赛。</font><br>\n
meeting	<h3>meeting</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相会, 聚会, 会见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was an accidental meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这完全是一次偶然的相会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have two meetings in London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在伦敦有两次聚会。</font><br>会议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spoke at the meeting in a bright voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在会上大声地发言。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They talked in the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在会议期间私下谈话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What has the meeting decided?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与会者做出了什么决定?</font><br>运动会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a sports meeting next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下周有一场运动会。</font><br>\n
melt	<h3>melt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)融[溶, 熔]化; 溶解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ice will melt when the sun shines on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当太阳照到冰的时候, 它就融化了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a story designed to melt the hardest heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个铁石心肠也会感动的故事。</font><br>(使)消散, 消失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know where my money goes, it just seems to melt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道我的钱哪儿去了, 就像是消失了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They melted the nation's resources away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们使国家的资源逐渐枯竭。</font><br>\n
member	<h3>member</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>成员, 会员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every member of the organization should be constant to its regulations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这组织的成员都得遵守规则。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a conservative member of the church.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个守旧教会教友。</font><br>\n
membership	<h3>membership</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>全体会员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The society has a large membership.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个协会有很多会员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our membership may refuse to discuss the matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们全体成员可能拒绝讨论这件事。</font><br>会员身份, 会员资格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must renew my membership of the sailing club.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须延续我的航海俱乐部会员的资格。</font><br>\n
memorial	<h3>memorial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>纪念碑, 纪念物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We visited the Lincoln Memorial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们参观了林肯纪念堂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote a memorial of the late author.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他写了一篇纪念这位已故作家的文章。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Friends gathered at a memorial for the late statesman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位已故政治家的生前好友为他举行了纪念仪式。</font><br>\n
memory	<h3>memory</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>记忆力, 记性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As one grows older one's memory declines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人的记忆力随着年老而衰退。</font><br>记忆中的事物, 回忆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a vivid memory of her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的容貌栩栩如生地印在我脑海里。</font><br>记忆系统; 记忆容量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost his memory after that accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那次事故后他丧失了记忆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The computer has a 128M memory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台计算机有一个储量为128兆的内存。</font><br>\n
mend	<h3>mend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>修理, 修补<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've been mend-ing all night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我缝补了一夜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you please mend the sleeve of my blouse?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请你把我衬衣的袖子补一下好吗?</font><br>改[纠]正; 改善[进]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things are mending.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况正在好转。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should mend your manners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的态度应当纠正。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>恢复; 康复<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His health is mending.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的健康状况正在好转。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>修补过的地方<br>\n
mental	<h3>mental</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>精神的, 头脑的, 心理的, 智力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mental abilities are very good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的智力非常好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has some mental problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有心理上的问题。</font><br>精神病的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mental hospital has just been set up here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里刚刚建成一座精神病医院。</font><br>\n
mention	<h3>mention</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提到, 说起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He mentioned them by name.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他举出了他们的名字。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before closing I want to mention all those who contributed so generously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我结束讲话的时候, 我想提一下所有慷慨捐赠的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't mention this problem this evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚别提这个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you mention one of the mistakes off hand?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能马上指出其中一个错误吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody mentioned the real purpose of this meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁也没有提到这次会议的真正目的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp From now on no one is to mention that slip of paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以后, 谁也不准提到这张纸条的事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not want to mention the painful past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不愿意提起过去的伤心事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Haas decided not to mention his cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哈斯决定不提他患了感冒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had enough presence of mind not to mention my intention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我镇定自若, 没有说起我的意图。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were four of us there, without mentioning the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那儿有我们4个人, 不算那个孩子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have two dogs to find a home for, without mentioning the cat and the bird.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 得为两条狗找个家, 此外尚有猫和鸟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is being mentioned for the place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正被提名为本职位的候补人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is mentioned on page 20.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它在20页被提到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every time I mentioned taking a swim in the lake he would make a face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当我提起下湖去游泳, 他总露出不赞成的表情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You mentioned having been in hospital last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你说过去年你住过医院。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not mention having been on the spot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没说他当时在场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jeromy mentioned having seen me on TV the previous evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰罗米说起前一天晚上在电视上看到过我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She mentioned that she had glanced through it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她说她曾粗略看过一遍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You never even mentioned that your wife had had the baby!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你从来没有提起过你的妻子生了那个孩子！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom mentions that he often sees her in the library.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆说他经常在图书馆看到她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did he mention when he would marry?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说过他什么时候结婚了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She forgot to mention where we should meet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她忘了说我们该在何处会面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her mother had mentioned how colourful the yard was, now that spring had arrived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她母亲提到由于春天已经来到, 院子里已是五彩缤纷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't mention what happened last week, it could bring him out in a temper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别提起上周发生的事, 那会使他发脾气的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They mentioned you as a good source of information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们说你消息灵通。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>提及, 说起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As he has not done much, he is beneath mention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有做多少事, 不值得提到他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actor's wedding got a mention on television.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电视上报道了这位男演员的婚礼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By tacit agreement, Clark's friends all avoided any mention of his mentally ill wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 克拉克的朋友们心照不宣, 绝口不提他那位患精神病的妻子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The first mention of the discovery appeared in an article last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年的一篇文章首次提及这项发现。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made no mention of your request.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有提到你的要求。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The communique made no mention of progress on any of the issues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公报只字不提这些问题中哪个问题取得了进展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No mention was made of her illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的病情没有提到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made no mention of having seen her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不提他曾经见过她。</font><br>\n

mere	<h3>mere</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>仅仅, 只不过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mere words won't help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 光说没用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a mere matter of time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这仅仅是时间的问题。</font><br>纯粹的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was mere waste of breath to argue with a person in so unreasonable a state of mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与一个如此不讲道理的人争论纯粹是浪费口舌。</font><br>\n
merely	<h3>merely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>仅仅, 只不过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I merely suggested you should do it again.There's no need to get annoyed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只是建议你应该重新做, 你用不着为此而不高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you really want to go or are you merely being amiable?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是真的想去呢, 还是仅仅为了表示友好?</font><br>\n
merit	<h3>merit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>功勋, 功劳; 价值<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reached his present senior position through sheer merit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他全靠他的功绩才达到今天的地位。</font><br>长处, 优点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee are looking at the merits and demerits of the proposal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会正在评判该提议的优缺点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is great merit in dealing fairly with your employees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公正地对待你的雇员有极大好处。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>值得; 应获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think the suggestion merits consideration.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为这个建议值得考虑。</font><br>\n
merry	<h3>merry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>欢乐的, 愉快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We joined the merry crowd.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们加入了兴高采烈的人群中。</font><br>喝得微醉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was already merry after only two glasses of wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只喝了两杯酒就有点醉了。</font><br>\n
mess	<h3>mess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>弄脏; 弄乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stop messing about and listen to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别再胡闹了, 听我说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She messed up her new dress with blue ink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蓝墨水弄脏了她的新衣服。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>杂乱, 脏乱; 脏东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a lot of mess to clear up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有许多脏东西要清理。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You look a mess.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你外表太邋遢了。</font><br>不整洁[乱七八糟]的人[事]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This room's in a mess.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个房间杂乱不堪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That report you did is a real mess.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你写的那份报告乱七八糟。</font><br>粪便<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog made a mess on the carpet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗在地毯上大便。</font><br>\n
message	<h3>message</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信息, 便条, 口信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's leave her a message to meet us at the railway station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们留个口信, 通知她到火车站去接我们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope this message demonstrates my feelings to the students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望这个祝词能表达出我对学生们的感情。</font><br>要旨, 主题思想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new play is short on humour and long on message.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个新剧缺少幽默感, 但寓意深远。</font><br>\n
messenger	<h3>messenger</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信使, 信差, 送信人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The messenger brought your note today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 信使今天带来了你的信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By the time the messenger reached him, the damage had been done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 送信人赶到他那儿时, 损失已经造成了。</font><br>\n

meter	<h3>meter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉米<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 1.5 million cubic metres of earth were moved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 共搬运土方150万立方米。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This swimming certificate is to certify that I swim one hundred metres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张游泳证证明我可以游100米。</font><br>计, 表, 仪表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man from the gas board came to read the gas meter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 煤气公司派来的人来查煤气表的读数。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The amount of electricity used is recorded by a meter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电表记录下耗电量。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用仪表测量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She metered it and found it to be the exact size.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用仪器测量了一下, 发现正好是这个尺寸。</font><br>\n
method	<h3>method</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方法, 办法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He invented a new method to make bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发明了做面包的新方法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp New methods of production were employed a few years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的生产方法几年前曾使用过。</font><br>秩序, 条理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of method.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个做事有条理的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Use method rather than luck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按条理办事, 不要凭运气。</font><br>\n

metric	<h3>metric</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>公制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the metric system, measurements are made in metres and liters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在公制中, 用米和升作计量单位。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The metric system is fit to all of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公制适用于全世界。</font><br>\n

microwave	<h3>microwave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈无〉微波<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mum has just won a microwave cooker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈刚刚赢得一台微波炉。</font><br>\n
midday	<h3>midday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>中午; 正午<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room. It was already midday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂, 原来已是中午了。</font><br>\n
middle	<h3>middle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>中部, 中间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's best to slice into a rich cake from the middle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最好把甜美的蛋糕从中间切开。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>中部的; 中间的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I noticed two middle-aged passengers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我注意到两个中年乘客。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has three children, the middle child is a boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有三个孩子, 老二是个男孩。</font><br>\n

might	<h3>might</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux v.</i></font><br>表示许可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Might I make a suggestion?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以提个建议吗?</font><br>表示可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He might get here in time, but I can't be sure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他可能及时来到这里, 不过我不能确定。</font><br>表示询问情况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How long might that take?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那要多长时间?</font><br>用于婉转的请求或吁请<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think you might at least offer to help?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为你至少可以主动帮忙吧?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>力气, 力量, 威力, 权力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I pushed the rock with all my might.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我用全力推那块石头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Might is right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 强权就是公理。</font><br>\n
migrate	<h3>migrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>迁移; 移往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pioneers from New England migrated to all parts of the United States.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 来自新英格兰的拓荒者移居到美国各地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些鸟春天向北迁徙, 秋天向南迁徙。</font><br>\n
mild	<h3>mild</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>温柔的, 温和的, 和善的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm the mildest man alive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是世上最和善的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is mild of manner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他举止温和。</font><br>轻微的, 不严重的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sentence was mild.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 判刑判得很轻。</font><br>温暖的, 暖和的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That coat is too heavy for such a mild day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样暖和的天气, 穿那件大衣太厚了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather is mild in this part.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这地区天气温暖。</font><br>\n

military	<h3>military</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>军事的, 军用的; 军人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My sister works in a military hospital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我姐姐在一家部队医院工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His bearing was very military.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很有军人气概。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>军人; 军队, 武装力量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As the police could not keep order in the city, the military were called in to help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于警察无法维持城里的秩序, 所以军队被召去加以协助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The military has controlled the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军人已经控制政府。</font><br>\n
milk	<h3>milk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乳; 牛奶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to keep watching to prevent the milk from boiling over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要看住, 不要让牛奶溢出来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>产奶; 挤奶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cow is milking heavily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这头奶牛出奶率很高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmer milks the cows twice a day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那农夫一天挤两次母牛的奶。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>榨取, 勒索<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government was accused of milking the people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国政府被指控榨取人民的血汗。</font><br>\n
