millionaire	<h3>millionaire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>百万富翁, 大富翁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He became a millionaire when he was still young.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他还年轻时就成了百万富翁。</font><br>大财主, 有钱人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wants to marry a millionaire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她想嫁给一位有钱人。</font><br>\n
mind	<h3>mind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>想法, 感觉, 思维(方法)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You and I are of one mind on that matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于那件事我俩的想法一致。</font><br>思维能力, 才智, 理智<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fear evacuated their mind of reason.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐惧使他们丧失了理智。</font><br>记忆(力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The incident had faded from her mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事渐渐从她记忆里淡漠了。</font><br>注意; 考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He listened with all his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他全神贯注地听。</font><br>意图, 意向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If he's set his mind on doing it, nothing will stop him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一旦下决心去做, 任何事情都挡不住他。</font><br>理智(与感情相对而言); 精神(与肉体、物质世界等相对而言)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He believes in mind over matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他相信精神高于物质。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>留心; 注意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mind!There is a bus coming!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当心!车来了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mind the train!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当心火车！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mind you finish the work today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 注意, 你今天要把工作干完。</font><br>照顾, 照管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked her daughter to stay at home and mind the baby.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她叫女儿待在家里照看孩子。</font><br>介意; 在乎; 反对<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not seem to mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看来他并不介意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't seem to mind public opinion in the least.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对公众舆论似乎一点都不在乎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't mind you joking. I like it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不介意你开玩笑, 我还喜欢你这样呢。</font><br>服从, 听从<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog minds well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条狗很驯服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should mind the rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应当服从规定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>专心于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always minds his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是专心工作。</font><br>\n
mine	<h3>mine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(I的所有格)我的(东西)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's your coat; mine is here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是你的上衣, 我的在这儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>矿, 矿井<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inspector went down the mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 监察员已下到矿井里了。</font><br>地雷; 水雷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An engineer tried to detonate the mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一名工程师试图引爆地雷。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>在…中开采, 开采<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are mining for coal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在开采煤矿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They'd mined the hillside for the ores.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们曾在这个小山坡上开采矿石。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…中[下]布雷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They've mined the entrance to the harbour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在港口布了雷。</font><br>以地雷[水雷]炸毁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their ship was mined.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的船被水雷炸毁了。</font><br>\n
mineral	<h3>mineral</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>矿物; 矿石; 矿物质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bent down and picked up a mineral.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她弯下身子捡起一块矿石。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country possesses rich mineral deposits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家拥有丰富的矿藏。</font><br>\n
minimum	<h3>minimum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最低限度, 最小量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This price is his minimum; he refuses to lower it any further.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个价格是他开的最低价, 他拒绝再作任何降价。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最低的, 最小的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the minimum price?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最低价是多少?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today's minimum temperature is 10℃.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天的最低气温是10℃。</font><br>\n
minister	<h3>minister</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大臣, 部长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspaper reporters interviewed the minister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新闻记者们采访了这位部长。</font><br>公使, 外交使节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the Chinese minister to Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他曾是中国驻日本公使。</font><br>牧师<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His original intention was to become a minister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他原先的打算是当牧师。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>辅助; 服侍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He became a rector of a small parish where he ministered for several years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他成为一个小教区的教区牧师, 在那里主事了几年圣事。</font><br>\n
ministry	<h3>ministry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(政府的)部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army, navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海陆空三军均由国防部管辖。</font><br>\n
minor	<h3>minor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>较小的, 较少的, 低级的, 次要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young actor was given a minor part in the new play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年轻的男演员在这出新戏里被分派担任一个小角色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>未成年人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No minors inside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未成年人谢绝入内。</font><br>副修科目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had three minors this semester.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这学期他有三门副修科目。</font><br>\n
minority	<h3>minority</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>少数, 小部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only a minority of British households do not have a car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国只有少数家庭没有汽车。</font><br>少数民族, 少数信仰不同的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The interests of the minorities should be protected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 少数民族的利益应该得到保护。</font><br>\n
minus	<h3>minus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示否定)没有, 缺少, 差<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The statue survived through minus a leg.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雕像幸存了下来, 缺了一条腿。</font><br>(表示运算)减去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Five minus three is two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 五减三等于二。</font><br>(表示数目)在零度以下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The temperature was minus 30 degrees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气温为零下30度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>减号, 负号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plus sign is used in addition and the minus is used in subtraction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 加号用于加法; 减号用于减法。</font><br>不利, 不足, 缺点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's consider the pluses and minuses of moving house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们考虑一下搬家的利弊吧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>负的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve from ten equals minus two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 10减去12等于负2。</font><br>不利的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's keen, but his youth is a minus factor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常精明, 但他的年轻却是个不利的因素。</font><br>略低于某标准的<br>\n
minute	<h3>minute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分钟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's only several minutes from here to the cinema.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从这儿到电影院只有几分钟的路程。</font><br>瞬间, 很短的时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A policeman could meet danger any minute of his working day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察在工作日的任何时刻都可能有危险。</font><br>此时此刻; 立刻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At that very minute, he opened the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就在那时候, 他打开了门。</font><br>分; 1/60度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The exact measurement of this angle is 90 degrees 40 minutes, which can be written as 90° 40′.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个角的正确量度是90度40分, 可写为90° 40′。</font><br>会议记录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before the meeting started its work, the minutes of the last meeting were read out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议开始之前, 先宣读了上次的会议记录。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…记录在案<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He minuted the procedure of the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对会议议程做了记录。</font><br>为…测定时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is minuting a race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正为赛跑测时。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极小的; 极少的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were minute differences between the two copies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两册之间存在着微小的差别。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The area affected is very minute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感染部位非常小。</font><br>极详细的; 准确的, 精确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor made a minute study of the illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个医生对病作了详细的研究。</font><br>\n
miracle	<h3>miracle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奇迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The compact disc is a miracle of modern technology.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 激光唱片是当代技术的奇迹。</font><br>令人惊奇的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctors said that his recovery was a miracle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生们说他的复原是件奇事。</font><br>\n
mirror	<h3>mirror</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>镜子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was look-ing at herself in the mirror.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在照镜子。</font><br>写照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a mirror of times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是时代的反映。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>反映, 反射, 映照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pond mirrors the surrounding trees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个池塘映出周围的树木。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their eyes mirrored their thoughts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的眼神映出他们的内心思想。</font><br>\n
miserable	<h3>miserable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>悲惨的, 不幸的, 可怜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have led a miserable life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们过了一段悲惨的生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her past life was miserable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她过去的生活很苦。</font><br>令人痛苦的; 令人不快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They started their holiday on a miserable day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们假期开始时天气很不好。</font><br>低劣的; 贫乏的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was born in a miserable family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出身于一个贫困的家庭。</font><br>卑鄙的, 可耻的, 可恶的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a miserable old devil he was!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是多么可恶的吝啬鬼呀！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was miserable of you to make fun of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你取笑他, 这是可耻的。</font><br>\n
mislead	<h3>mislead</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…错误印象, 使误解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was entirely misled by her words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他完全误解了她的话。</font><br>把…带错路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guide misled the tourists in the woods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 向导在森林里给旅游者带错了路。</font><br>把…带坏, 使误入歧途<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy was misled by bad companions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个男孩被坏伙伴引入歧途。</font><br>\n
miss	<h3>miss</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>失误, 失败, 失手; 回避<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A miss is as good as a mile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失之毫厘, 差之千里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could hit his target one hundred times without a single miss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打靶能百发百中。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>未击中; 未抓住; 未达到; 未看见; 未领会…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fired two shots, both missed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打了两枪, 都没有打中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The arrow missed the target.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 箭未能射中靶子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've completely missed the point of his argument.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你完全没有领会他的论点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We missed the start of the movie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没看到电影的开头部分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It seems that we have missed our chance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 好像我们已失去了机会。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>未出席; 未赶上; 未能利用, 失掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I nearly missed my flight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我差点误了班机。</font><br>发现遗失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He missed the pen from the desk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发觉桌上的钢笔不见了。</font><br>避免<br>想念, 惦记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her children have gone to Australia, and she missed them very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们去了澳大利亚, 她非常惦记他们。</font><br>\n
missile	<h3>missile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>导弹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A missile hit the ship and sank it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 导弹击中了那艘船, 使其沉没了。</font><br>投射物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The angry crowd at the football match threw bottles and other missiles at the players.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愤怒的观众向足球队员丢瓶子和其他东西。</font><br>\n
missing	<h3>missing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>失掉的, 失踪的, 找不到的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Missing book is found now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 丢失的书现在已经找到了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is said to be missing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据说他失踪了。</font><br>\n
mission	<h3>mission</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>使命, 任务, 天职<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The minister was sent to Spain on mission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位部长奉命前往西班牙。</font><br>代表团, 使节团<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A Chinese trade mission has been dispatched to Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个中国贸易代表团已被派往日本。</font><br>\n
mist	<h3>mist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>薄雾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The towers were shrouded in mist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 城楼被蒙上薄雾。</font><br>视线模糊不清<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hills were shrouded in mist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 群山被蒙上薄雾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She saw his face through a mist of tears.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她泪眼朦胧地望着他的脸。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)蒙上薄雾, (使)模糊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It isn't raining, it's only mist-ing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没下雨, 只是下雾了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tears misted her eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼泪使她的双眼模糊了。</font><br>\n
mistake	<h3>mistake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>错误, 过失, 失策<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Regardless of how often I correct him, he always makes the same mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不管我怎样经常告诫他, 他总是犯同样的错误。</font><br>误解, 误会<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>弄错; 误解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You mistook when you thought I laughed at you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你以为我嘲笑你, 那你误会了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At first, he thought he had mistaken the address.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一开始他以为地址搞错了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认不出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't mistake his car in the busiest street; he's painted it red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在最繁忙的街上不会错认他的车, 他把它漆成了红色。</font><br>\n
mister	<h3>mister</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>先生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mister Smith is my good friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯先生是我的好朋友。</font><br>\n
misunderstand	<h3>misunderstand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>误会, 误解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I misunderstood her meaning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我误解了她的意思。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't misunderstand what I'm trying to say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别误解我要说的话。</font><br>\n
mix	<h3>mix</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>混合, 搅和<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was preparing fodder, chopping finely and mixing thoroughly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在准备饲料, 把它切碎, 拌好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can mix blue and yellow paint to make green one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以把蓝色和黄色油漆混合成绿色。</font><br>(使)结交, (使)交往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She doesn't mix well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不善与人相处。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>混合, 结合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His first reaction was a strange mix of joy and anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的第一反应很奇怪, 高兴和愤怒掺杂在一起。</font><br>食物混合配料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cake is made from a packaged mix.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 糕点是由一包现成的配料制成的。</font><br>\n
mixture	<h3>mixture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>混合物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is mixing the mixture of flour and water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在搅和面粉与水的混合物。</font><br>混杂的事物[人群]<br>混合(状态)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stood in a mixture of desire and apprehensions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怀着渴望和恐惧交加的心情伫立着。</font><br>\n
moan	<h3>moan</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>呻吟; 悲叹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sick woman moaned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位生病的女人在呻吟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoner moaned a prayer for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 囚犯呻吟着祈求帮助。</font><br>抱怨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's always moaning that she has too much work to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她总是抱怨她有太多的事要做。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>呻吟声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp From time to time there was a moan of pain from the sick man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人不时发出一声声痛苦的呻吟。</font><br>抱怨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They get fed up with her moans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的抱怨令他们感到厌烦。</font><br>\n
mobile	<h3>mobile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可迅速转动的, 易于移动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old lady sits on a mobile chair every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位老妇人每天上午坐在一把可携带使用的椅子上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has not been so mobile since his accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从出事后他一直行动不便。</font><br>车载的; 流动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He converted his truck into a mobile snack bar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把货车改成流动小吃店。</font><br>有交通工具的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's much more mobile now that she's bought a car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从她买了汽车后, 活动量就大多了。</font><br>\n
mode	<h3>mode</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>方式, 样式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mode of doing business is offensive to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他干事情的方式叫我很不喜欢。</font><br>样式, 风格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why do you still dress in an old-fashioned mode?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为什么还穿款式陈旧的衣服?</font><br>\n
model	<h3>model</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>模型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the model of the proposed new airport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是拟建的新机场模型。</font><br>设计, 型号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the most popular model in our whole range.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我们产品中最受欢迎的型号。</font><br>模式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nation's constitution provided a model that other countries follow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国的宪法提供了他国效法的模式。</font><br>模范<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make a model of your father, and you will become a fine man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以你的父亲为榜样, 你就会成为一个杰出的人。</font><br>模特儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is one of the country's top models.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是全国的顶尖模特儿之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>做模特儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was too fat to model.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她当模特太胖了。</font><br>制作模型; 塑造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is possible to model such a system mathematically.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做出这种系统的数学模型是可能的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>模仿; 仿制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The famous figure was modelled by the students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位著名的人物受到学生们的崇拜。</font><br>\n
modem	<h3>modem</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>调制解调器<br>\n
moderate	<h3>moderate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>中等的, 适度的, 不很大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a room of moderate size.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一个适中的房间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel is moderate in its charges.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅店收费适当。</font><br>温和的; 有节制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a moderate smoker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个有节制的烟民。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind is moderate today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天的风很柔和。</font><br>中庸的, 稳健的, 不走极端的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He holds moderate opinions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他持稳健的见解。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)减轻[缓和]; 节制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind is moderating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风势渐趋缓和。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should moderate your language when children are present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在孩子面前, 你说话应该有节制。</font><br>\n
modern	<h3>modern</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>现代的; 近代的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was steeped in modern history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他埋头于近代史的研究。</font><br>新式的, 时髦的, 最新的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has modern ideas in spite of his great age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管他年事很高, 但思想观念却很入时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dress is the most modern.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件衣服是最时髦的。</font><br>当代风格的, 现代派的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They went to an exhibition of modern art yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天, 他们参观了现代美术展览。</font><br>\n
modernise	<h3>modernise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使现代化, 使适应现代需要<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>现代化, 使用现代方法<br>\n
modernize	<h3>modernize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使现代化, 使适应现代需要<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>现代化, 使用现代方法<br>\n
modest	<h3>modest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>谦虚的, 谦恭的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a very modest person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位非常谦逊的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Really great men are essentially modest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 真正的伟人大都很谦虚。</font><br>适中的, 适度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price is very modest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价格是适中的。</font><br>\n
modesty	<h3>modesty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>谦虚, 谦逊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Modesty helps one to go forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谦虚使人进步。</font><br>\n
modify	<h3>modify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>修改, 更改<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业革命改变了整个英国社会的结构。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heating system has recently been modified to make it more efficient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暖气设备最近已进行了改造, 使其效率得到提高。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In “the black cat”the adjective “black” modifies the noun “cat”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在the black cat这一词组中, 形容词black修饰名词cat。</font><br>\n
moist	<h3>moist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>潮湿的, 微湿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Strawberries grow best in a cool, moist climate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 草莓最适于在凉爽、潮湿的气候条件下生长。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Winds from the sea are usually moist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海风通常是潮湿的。</font><br>\n
moisture	<h3>moisture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水分, 水气, 湿气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moisture in the air makes it humid today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天空气中水气大, 天气很潮湿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使防潮<br>\n

molecule	<h3>molecule</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>分子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The structure of molecules can be seen under an electron microscope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 分子的结构可在电子显微镜下观察到。</font><br>\n
moment	<h3>moment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>瞬间, 片刻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He thought for a moment and then spoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想了片刻, 然后说话。</font><br>时刻, 时机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Choose your moment carefully if you want to ask her for a pay rise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你想要求她给你加薪, 你要小心选择时机。</font><br>\n
Monday	<h3>Monday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>星期一<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He visited her last Monday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在上星期一拜访了她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the Monday she got worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个星期一, 她病得更厉害了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On Mondays I do the shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每星期一我都去买东西。</font><br>\n
money	<h3>money</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钱, 金钱; 货币<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His father makes a lot of money as a pilot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父亲当飞机驾驶员挣钱很多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher told us something about the money of Europe in the Middle Ages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师给我们讲了一些有关中世纪欧洲货币的情况。</font><br>财富, 财产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boss has put all his money into that speculative enterprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个老板把他的全部财产都投到那个投机事业中。</font><br>\n
monitor	<h3>monitor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>监视器, 监听器; 检测器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Watch the monitor and tell me if the level goes above forty decibels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看着监测器, 如果超过40分贝就告诉我。</font><br>(学校)班长; 纠察员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He will make a good monitor for them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将成为他们的好班长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>监听, 监视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This instrument monitors the patient's heartbeats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台仪器监听病人的心跳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must monitor the latest intelligence on armaments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们必须密切注意有关军备的最新情报。</font><br>监测, 检测<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were monitoring the upper air to collect evidence of atomic explosions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在检测高空空气以收集原子爆炸的证据。</font><br>\n
monkey	<h3>monkey</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猴; 猿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man and the monkey have many things in common.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人和猿有许多共同之处。</font><br>淘气鬼, 小淘气, 顽童<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's been some monkey business going on here!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人在这里搞鬼！</font><br>\n
monster	<h3>monster</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>巨大的, 庞大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many monster high-rise buildings spring up all over the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多巨大的高层建筑在这座城市拔地而起。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>怪物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a horrible monster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个可怕的怪物。</font><br>坏人, 恶人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The monster murdered 15 women before the police caught him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个坏蛋在警察捕获他之前谋杀了15名妇女。</font><br>\n
month	<h3>month</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>月, 月份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall go there next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将于下月去那里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came again the next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二个月他又来了。</font><br>一个月的时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He learnt English in ten months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用10个月的时间就学会了英文。</font><br>\n
monthly	<h3>monthly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj. & adv.</i></font><br>每月的[地], 每月一次的[地]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rent on his apartment was his biggest monthly expense.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的房租是每个月最大的开支。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>月刊<br>\n
monument	<h3>monument</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>纪念碑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A monument was erected to the memory of that great scientist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树立了一块纪念碑纪念那位伟大的科学家。</font><br>遗迹, 遗址, 名胜古迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ruins of the castle are an ancient monument, which the government pays money to preserve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座城堡废墟是古代遗迹, 政府花钱予以保护。</font><br>\n
mood	<h3>mood</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>心情, 情绪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must change your mood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一定要改变你的情绪才行。</font><br>语气<br>\n
moon	<h3>moon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>月亮, 月球<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moon yields less light than the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 月亮的光线比太阳的光线弱。</font><br>卫星<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mars has two small moons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火星有两个小卫星。</font><br>\n
moral	<h3>moral</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>道德上的, 有道德的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turns every subject into a moral discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把每个论题都变成了道德的讨论。</font><br>道义上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom refused to join the army, believing that he had no moral right to kill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆认为自己在道义上无权杀人而拒绝入伍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not moral to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样做是不讲道义的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>教育意义, 寓意<br>道德, 品行, 道德规范<br>\n
morality	<h3>morality</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>道德; 德行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jacelin is a person of strict morality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰斯林是个品行极其端正的人。</font><br>\n
more	<h3>more</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>更, 更加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She read the letter more carefully the second time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她第二次看信时更仔细了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the more diligent of the two boys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是这两个男孩中较用功的一个。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>更多的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His behaviour did more harm than good to himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的行为对他自己害多利少。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>更多的量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp More of the land is planted to cabbages than to tomatoes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 种白菜的地比种西红柿的多。</font><br>\n
moreover	<h3>moreover</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>再者, 此外, 而且<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rent is reasonable, and moreover, the location is perfect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房租合理, 而且地点优越。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't want to go skating and, moreover, the ice is too thin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想去滑冰, 再说, 冰也太薄了。</font><br>\n
morning	<h3>morning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>早晨, 上午<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At early morning I went up through the hillside woods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 清晨我穿越山坡的小树林。</font><br>\n
mosquito	<h3>mosquito</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蚊子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mosquitoes carry disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蚊子会传播疾病。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A swarm of mosquitoes fly into the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 成群的蚊子飞进房间。</font><br>\n
most	<h3>most</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>最<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was the most exciting holiday I've ever had.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是我经历过的最令人兴奋的假日。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Of course you're the most aristocratic of the two of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你当然是我们两个人中最有贵族气派的。</font><br>很, 非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spoke most bitterly of his experiences in prison.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常痛苦地讲述了他在监狱中的经历。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>大多数, 大部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We spend most of March ploughing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 三月份的大部分时间我们都在春耕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of her books were stolen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的大部分书都被偷走了。</font><br>最高额; 最大值<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do the most you can.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽你最大的力量去做。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最大的, 最多的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peter made the most mistakes of all the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全班同学中, 彼得出的错最多。</font><br>\n
mostly	<h3>mostly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>大部分, 主要地, 多半, 通常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She uses her car mostly for driving to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的汽车主要用于上下班。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the occasional cigarette, but mostly he smokes a pipe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他偶尔抽香烟, 但通常是抽烟斗。</font><br>\n
mother	<h3>mother</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>母亲, 妈妈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your mother wouldn't like it if you become too thick with each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你们来往太亲密, 你的母亲会不高兴的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Old Mother Adams next door has lost her cat again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 隔壁亚当斯老大娘的猫又不见了。</font><br>根由, 根源<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp School is the mother of learning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校是知识的源泉。</font><br>\n
motion	<h3>motion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(向…)打手势, 示意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher motioned the boy to study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师示意那个孩子去学习。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(物体的)运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The object is no longer in cyclical motion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这物体已不再循环运动。</font><br>手势, 动作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always accompanied his speech with motions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讲演时总是伴以手势。</font><br>提议, 动议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conference adopted a motion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议通过了一项提议。</font><br>\n
motivate	<h3>motivate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>作为…的动机; 激发; 诱发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have first got to motivate the children and then to teach them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你首先得激发孩子的学习兴趣, 然后再去教他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one really knows what motivated him to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人确知他那样做的动机。</font><br>\n
motive	<h3>motive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>动机, 目的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police could not find a motive for the murder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察不能找到谋杀的动机。</font><br>\n
motor	<h3>motor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>马达, 发动机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A washing machine is run by a small electric motor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 洗衣机由一台小电动机驱动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开[乘]汽车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We motored over to Cambridge to see some friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们开车去剑桥看一些朋友。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用汽车运送<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foreign guests were motored from the airfield to the hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用车把外宾从机场送到旅馆。</font><br>\n

mould	<h3>mould</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铸模, 模型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a mould of pudding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是在模子中做成的布丁。</font><br>性格, 气质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a man of gentle mould.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个性格温和的人。</font><br>霉, 霉菌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mould spreads quickly and can cover something completely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 霉蔓延得很快, 有时会完全覆盖发霉物体的表面。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用模子做, 浇铸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They moulded a figure in clay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用模子做泥塑人像。</font><br>\n
mount	<h3>mount</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>登上; 骑上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The climbers mounted higher and higher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 攀登者越爬越高。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>增加; 上升<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Social problems in modern society are mounting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现代社会问题日益增加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price has been mounting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价格正在上涨。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>上演; 配有…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It'll cost a great deal of money to mount the play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要上演这场戏得花很多钱。</font><br>发动攻击; 攻击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The opposition is getting ready to mount a powerful attack on the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 反对党已准备好对政府发动一次有力的攻击。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>山峰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the first woman who steps on the top of Mount Jolmo Lungma.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的女人。</font><br>坐骑<br>\n
mountain	<h3>mountain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>山, 山岳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a high mountain at the back of the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房子的后面有座高山。</font><br>山脉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Rocky Mountains lie in the west part of America.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 落基山脉位于美国西部。</font><br>\n
mouse	<h3>mouse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>老鼠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mouse is a small animal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老鼠是一种小动物。</font><br>鼠标<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I use a mouse to choose documents from my files.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我用鼠标从文件中选择资料。</font><br>羞怯[胆小]的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a strange little mouse, never said anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他竟然胆小如鼠, 一句话都没说。</font><br>\n
