opening	<h3>opening</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>开幕; 开张; 开端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many attended the opening of the new sports centre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很多人参加了新体育中心的开始使用典礼。</font><br>洞, 缺口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was an opening in the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上有个洞。</font><br>空缺, 缺额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are no openings for secretaries at the bank at present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在银行里没有秘书空缺。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>首次的; 开始的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many guests were invited to opening ceremony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多来宾应邀参加了开幕式。</font><br>\n
opera	<h3>opera</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>歌剧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An opera is a play set to music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 歌剧是谱上曲的戏剧。</font><br>歌剧艺术, 歌剧业<br>\n
operate	<h3>operate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>运转; 操作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine is operating properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器运转正常。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gradually she learned to operate a lathe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她慢慢地学会了开车床。</font><br>经营, 管理<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>开刀, (对…)动手术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor decided to operate at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生决定立刻动手术。</font><br>\n
operation	<h3>operation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>操作, 运转, 经营<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were also given the opportunity to do some operation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们也有机会亲自去操作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company will soon begin operation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家公司不久就要开始营业。</font><br>手术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor advised an immediate operation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生建议马上开刀。</font><br>(军事)行动, 活动<br>〈数〉运算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The four operations are the basis of math.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 四则运算是数学的基础。</font><br>\n
operational	<h3>operational</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>即可使用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The airport did not become operational until May.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 机场到五月才可使用。</font><br>(用于)操作的, 经营的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Operational Research is a newly emerging subject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运筹学是一门新兴的学科。</font><br>\n
operator	<h3>operator</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(机器、设备等的)操作员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a computer operator.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个电脑操作员。</font><br>电话接线员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Operator, I want to make a long distance call.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 话务员, 我要打长途电话。</font><br>\n
opinion	<h3>opinion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>意见, 看法, 主张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The opinion is accepted as true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个意见被认为是正确的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't wish to debate my opinions with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想就我的看法同你辩论。</font><br>舆论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One shouldn't act without caring for public opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个人的行为不能不顾及舆论。</font><br>评价, 印象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most people have a low opinion of gamblers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数人对赌徒评价很低。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a good opinion of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我留下的印象良好。</font><br>专业性的鉴定, 劝告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The museum is seeking an expert opinion on the authenticity of the painting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 博物馆在请专家鉴定那幅画的真伪。</font><br>\n
opponent	<h3>opponent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>对手, 敌手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He beat his opponent in the election.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在选举中击败了对手。</font><br>反对者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is one of the strongest opponents of tax reform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是税收改革的最强烈的反对者之一。</font><br>\n
opportunity	<h3>opportunity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>机会, 时机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sought opportunities of doing her little service.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他寻找机会为她尽一点力。</font><br>\n
oppose	<h3>oppose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>反对; 使相对<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll not oppose you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不反对你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man can't bear anyone in the family to oppose him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人决不能容忍家里有人违抗他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We opposed the plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们反对这个计划。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We opposed the proposal but to no avail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们反对这个提议, 但没用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Politically, they belonged to the conservative party and opposed reform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在政治上, 他们是保守派, 反对改革。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had opposed Jim's entry right at the beginning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从一开始他就反对吉姆参与。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They oppose each other also complement each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它们相辅相成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government called on the workers to oppose waste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府号召工人反对浪费。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The husband strongly opposed his wife's going there alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 丈夫极力反对妻子单独去那个地方。</font><br>\n
opposite	<h3>opposite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…的对面; 在旁边, 接着; 与…在一排<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The post office is opposite (to) the station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 邮局在车站的对面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Opposite his own name was a small tick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 紧接在他名字后面的是一个小对号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man wrote fifty dollars opposite the word “value”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人在价值一词的同一行写下了50美元。</font><br>(表示方式)与…联合主演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has played opposite her in many productions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他与她联合主演了许多影片。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>对面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think the picture would look better on the opposite wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为这张画挂在对面的墙上会好看些。</font><br>相反的, 对立的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hold the opposite opinions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们持相反的意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Black and white are opposite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黑与白是截然相反的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>对立面, 对立物, 相反的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chief of the group has gone over to the opposite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个组织的头头归降了对方。</font><br>\n
opposition	<h3>opposition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>反对, 敌对<br>对手, 对抗者<br>(尤指执政党最主要的)反对党, 在野党<br>\n
optical	<h3>optical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>视觉的, 视力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has optical trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的视力有问题。</font><br>光学的, 光的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Telescopes and microscopes are optical instruments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 望远镜和显微镜是光学仪器。</font><br>\n
optimistic	<h3>optimistic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>乐观的, 乐观主义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an optimistic young fellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位乐观的年轻人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is not optimistic about the outcome.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对结果并不乐观。</font><br>\n
option	<h3>option</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>选择(的自由)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will have to pay them; you have no option.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须付给他们钱, 别无选择。</font><br>可选择的办法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has two options; to reduce spending or to increase taxes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府有两种选择的办法:或是减少开支, 或是增加税收。</font><br>附件, 配件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car includes air-conditioning among its options.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆汽车的配件中包括空调设备。</font><br>买卖选择权, 期权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jones has taken an option on shares in the company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 琼斯已获得那家公司股票的期权。</font><br>\n
optional	<h3>optional</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可选择的, 非强制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The goods are optional, but only one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些物品是可以任选的, 但只能选一个。</font><br>\n
or	<h3>or</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>或, 或者; 还是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A boy or two girls are at home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个男孩或两个女孩在家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr.Jones or I am to speak at the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会上由琼斯先生或我来发言。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the flower red or blue?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那花是红的还是蓝的?</font><br>否则, 要不然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Turn the heat down or your cake will burn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把热度调低吧, 要不蛋糕就要糊了。</font><br>也不<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cannot read or write.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不会看书, 也不会写字。</font><br>\n
oral	<h3>oral</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>口头的, 口述的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He passed his French oral examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他通过了法语口试。</font><br>口服的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is oral medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是口服药。</font><br>\n
orange	<h3>orange</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>橙, 柑, 橘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He aimed at the apple and orange.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想要苹果和橘子。</font><br>橘黄色, 橙色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many Chinese adults dress their children in brilliant orange, red and pink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很多中国的成人给他们的孩子穿鲜艳的橘黄色、红色和粉色的衣服。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>橙色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The orange curtains jar with the red furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些橘黄色的窗帘与红色家具不协调。</font><br>\n
orbit	<h3>orbit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轨道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They put a weather satellite into orbit round the earth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把一颗气象卫星送入环绕地球的轨道。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>在…轨道上运行, 环绕轨道运行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A plane orbited over the landing field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一架飞机在机场上空盘旋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man-made satellite orbits the earth every 48 hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那颗人造卫星每48小时绕地球轨道运行一周。</font><br>\n
orchestra	<h3>orchestra</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>管弦乐队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He plays the violin in an orchestra.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。</font><br>\n
order	<h3>order</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>次序; 顺序<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The items are listed in order of importance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些项目是按其重要性的顺序列出的。</font><br>整齐; 有条理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His desk is always in order.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的书桌上总是整整齐齐的。</font><br>治安, 秩序<br>命令, 嘱咐<br>订购, 订货; 订单<br>汇票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They offered him the banker's order ￡5000 but he didn't accept it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们给他5000英镑的银行汇票, 但他没有接受。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>命令; 嘱咐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher ordered silence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师命令保持安静。</font><br>订购, 定制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can order tickets by telephone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以电话订票。</font><br>整理; 布置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work was all properly ordered, just as he wanted it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工作安排得井井有条, 就像他要求的那样。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>点(饭菜, 饮料等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ordered a hamburger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要了一份汉堡包。</font><br>\n
orderly	<h3>orderly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>安排好的; 整齐的; 有秩序的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an orderly room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个整洁的房间。</font><br>\n
ordinary	<h3>ordinary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>普通的, 平常的; 平庸的, 平淡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is only an ordinary incident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只不过是日常小事。</font><br>\n
ore	<h3>ore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>矿物, 矿石<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's an area rich in ores.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个矿产丰富的地区。</font><br>\n
organ	<h3>organ</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>器官<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many organs in a man's body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人体中有很多器官。</font><br>风琴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He played a beautiful tune on the organ.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用风琴演奏出一支动听的曲子。</font><br>机构<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Parliament is an organ of government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 议会是政府的一个机构。</font><br>新闻媒体, 宣传工具; 机关报[杂志]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This paper is the official organ of the Socialist Party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份报纸是社会党的正式机关报。</font><br>\n
organic	<h3>organic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>器官的; 器质性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is nothing organic wrong with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你没有器质性病变。</font><br>有机(体)的, 有机物的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Red soil lacks organic matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 红土缺乏有机物质。</font><br>\n
organisation	<h3>organisation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈主英〉组织,机构,团体<br>\n
organise	<h3>organise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>组织<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the ability to organise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很有组织才能。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When it was dark, they organised an attack a third time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天黑的时候, 他们组织了第三次进攻。</font><br>\n
organism	<h3>organism</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>有机物, 有机体; 生物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was an infectious organism that he studied.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他研究的是一种可传染病菌的微生物。</font><br>有机体系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army is an extremely complex organism.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军队是一个极其复杂的组织。</font><br>\n
organization	<h3>organization</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>团体, 机构<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He joined a revolutionary organization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他参加了一个革命团体。</font><br>组织<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is engaged in the organization of a new club.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正忙于组织一个新的俱乐部。</font><br>组织性, 系统性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is brilliant but her work lacks organization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很有才华, 但工作缺乏条理性。</font><br>\n
organize	<h3>organize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>组织<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has the ability to organize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很有组织才能。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When it was dark, they organized an attack a third time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天黑的时候, 他们组织了第三次进攻。</font><br>\n
origin	<h3>origin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>起点; 来源<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many words in the English language are French in origin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语中的许多词源于法语。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the origin of your anxiety?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你焦虑的根源是什么?</font><br>出身, 血统<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is considered to be of noble origins.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们都认为他出身高贵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm a Chinese by origin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是中国血统。</font><br>\n
original	<h3>original</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>起初的; 原来的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The original settlers are the Indians.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最早在这里定居的是印第安人。</font><br>独创的; 新颖的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inventor had an original mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个发明家具有创新的头脑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your designs are highly original.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的设计很独特。</font><br>原版的; 原作的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The original picture is worth 1000 dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画的原作值1000美元。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>原文, 原稿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a translation; the original is in French.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是译文, 原文是法文。</font><br>\n
ornament	<h3>ornament</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>装饰; 点缀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flowers were put on the table for ornament.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 花放在桌子上做装饰用。</font><br>装饰品, 点缀品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a lot ornaments on the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上有许多装饰品。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room was full of pictures and other beautiful ornaments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个房间布满了图画和其他漂亮的装饰品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装饰, 点缀, 美化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are ornamenting a Christmas tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在装饰圣诞树。</font><br>\n
other	<h3>other</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>别的, 其他的, 另外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are there any other problems?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 还有其他的问题吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Moral beauty ought to be ranked above all other beauty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 品德之美应列于其他美之上。</font><br>(两个中的)另一个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There must be some other reason for him refusing to help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不肯帮忙, 一定另有原因。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every member must bring one other person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个会员必须带一个人来。</font><br>其余的, 剩下的(人或物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The other students in my class work in Jinan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我班其余的同学都在济南工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is older than me but my other sisters are younger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她比我大, 其余都是我妹妹。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>其他的, 别的, 另外的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people came by car, others came on foot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人是坐汽车来的, 其他的是走着来的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like this dress.Show me some others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢这件衣服, 请另外拿几件给我看看。</font><br>其余的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I went swimming while the others played basketball.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我去游泳, 其余的人都去打篮球了。</font><br>\n
otherwise	<h3>otherwise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>用别的方法, 不同地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He says it's genuine, but we think otherwise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说这是真的, 但我们不这样认为。</font><br>在其他方面; 除此以外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soup was cold, but it was otherwise an excellent meal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了汤是凉的以外, 那顿饭菜是很好的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>否则; 要不然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better go now, otherwise you'll miss the train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好现在就走, 要不然就赶不上火车了。</font><br>\n
ouch	<h3>ouch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>哎唷！痛呀！<br>\n
ought	<h3>ought</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>应该(指道义上有责任)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel that we ought to accept his proposal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得我们应该接受他的建议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You ought to work hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该努力工作。</font><br>应当(显示所采取行动正确或明智)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ought to have been more careful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他本该更小心些。</font><br>可能会; 预料会做(某事)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They ought to win easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们应该很容易就能获胜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These plants ought to reach maturity after five years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些植物五年后就该长成了。</font><br>\n
ounce	<h3>ounce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盎司<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Six ounces of cheese, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请称6盎司的乳酪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is sold by ounce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是论盎司卖的。</font><br>〈口〉少量; 一点儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has used up the last ounce of oil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已用完最后一滴油。</font><br>\n
our	<h3>our</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>我们的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is our classroom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我们的教室。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our school is on a river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的学校在河边。</font><br>\n
ours	<h3>ours</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>我们的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their children study hard while ours never study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的孩子学习很刻苦, 而我们的孩子从来不学习。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's clean their room first and then ours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们先打扫他们的房间, 再打扫我们的房间。</font><br>\n
ourselves	<h3>ourselves</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(we的反身代词)我们自己<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We try and keep ourselves informed about current trends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们设法随时了解形势的发展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have to find ourselves a new home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们得给自己找个新家。</font><br>(we的强调形式)我们亲自<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We built the house ourselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幢房子是我们亲自建造的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We ourselves will do the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将亲自做这项工作。</font><br>\n
out	<h3>out</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>离开某地, 不在里面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's go out for a walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们出去走走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Open the bag and put the money out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 打开提包, 把钱拿出来。</font><br>不在家, 不在工作地点; (书等)已借出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's have an evening out at the theatre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们出去到剧院消磨一个晚上吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stays out late at nights.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他晚上经常在外面逗留到很晚。</font><br>表示远离陆地、祖国、城镇等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are all out at sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们都已出海。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His son is out in America.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他儿子远在美国。</font><br>显露, 暴露, 问世<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The apple blossom is out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 苹果花开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their secret is out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的秘密泄露了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His new book is just out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的新书刚刚出版。</font><br>过时, 不再流行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Long skirts went out last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长裙子去年就不流行了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That dress is out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那种女服已过时了。</font><br>大声地; 出声地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Read out the names.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大声把名字念出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you disagree you should speak out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果不同意, 你就该大声地说出来。</font><br>到尽头; 全部, 彻底<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm tired out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我筋疲力尽了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Supplies are running out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 供应品快用完了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has worked out a mathematical problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他算出了一道数学题。</font><br>无知觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's been out for ten minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已昏迷了十分钟。</font><br>(火或灯)熄灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire is out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火灭了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please put your cigarette out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把香烟弄灭。</font><br>\n
outcome	<h3>outcome</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book was the outcome of a tremendous amount of scientific work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书是大量科学研究工作的成果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are anxiously awaiting the outcome of their discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们急切地等待着他们讨论的结果。</font><br>\n
outdoor	<h3>outdoor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>户外的, 露天的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes watching most outdoor games.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢观看大部分的室外运动项目。</font><br>喜欢户外活动的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He used to lead an outdoor life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以前习惯过野外生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an outdoor college student.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一名爱好野外活动的大学生。</font><br>\n
outdoors	<h3>outdoors</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在户外<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children like to play outdoors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们喜欢在户外玩耍。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's cold outdoors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外面很冷。</font><br>\n
outer	<h3>outer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外面的, 外表的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outer door needs repairing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外面的门需要修理一下。</font><br>远离内部[中心]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll move to the outer suburbs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将搬到市郊。</font><br>\n
outlet	<h3>outlet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>出口, 出路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outlet of a water pipe was blocked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水管的出水口堵住了。</font><br>发泄的途径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Running is a good outlet for his energy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跑步是他发泄过剩精力的好方法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He needs an outlet for his pent-up anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的满腔怒火需要有机会发泄。</font><br>经销店<br>\n
outline	<h3>outline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>提纲, 要点, 概要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Make an outline before trying to write a composition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 写作文之前先写个提纲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They agreed on the broad outlines of a wage settlement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们就工资解决的办法达成框架协议。</font><br>外形, 轮廓, 略图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outline of Italy suggests a boot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 意大利的轮廓像只长统靴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>画[标]出…的轮廓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He outlined the triangle in red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用红笔画出三角形。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man's figure was outlined by the light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 灯光照出这个人的轮廓。</font><br>概述, 列提纲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He outlined his responsibilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他概述了自己的职责。</font><br>\n
outlook	<h3>outlook</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>景色, 景致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a good outlook from my bedroom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的卧室有很好的窗景。</font><br>观点; 见解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a broad outlook on life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的人生观十分豁达。</font><br>展望; 前景<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outlook for the economy is bright.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经济前景光明。</font><br>\n
output	<h3>output</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>产量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Grain output reached a new high in the three years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谷物产量达到三年中最高水平。</font><br>输出, 输出功率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The output should be proportional to the input.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 输出应当与输入成比例。</font><br>\n
outset	<h3>outset</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>开始, 开端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I warned you at the outset not to trust him, and you wouldn't listen to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一开始我就警告过你不要信任他, 可你不肯听我的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was not here at the outset of the experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 实验开始时他不在这里。</font><br>\n
outside	<h3>outside</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在外面, 向外面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's quite dark outside, there's no moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外面很黑, 没有月亮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wilson was waiting for him outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 威尔逊在外面等他。</font><br>在户外; 露天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please let us in, it's cold outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请让我们进去吧, 外面很冷。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外面, 外部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door was locked on the outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那扇门从外面锁上了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One should not judge a thing by the outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不能从外表来判断事物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was annoyed with complaints made from outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因外界的种种怨言而感到烦恼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外部的, 在外面的, 对着外面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the outside doors have locks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有外面的门都上了锁。</font><br>不在主建筑物内的; 外面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Work went on as usual inside, uninterrupted by outside repairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外部装修, 内部照常营业。</font><br>集团外的, 组织外的, 外界的, 局外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They needed the outside help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们需要来自外界的帮助。</font><br>(选择余地、可能性等)非常小<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's just an outside chance we'll get the contract after all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 说到底, 我们得到那份合同的希望极其渺茫。</font><br>可能性最大的, 最可能的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 150 is an outside estimate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 150是最高的估计。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在[向]…的外面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They stood outside the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们站在门外。</font><br>(表示范围)超出…的范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to do it outside office hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得在上班以外的时间做这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The matter is outside my area of the responsibility.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 此事超出我的责任范围。</font><br>(表示排斥)除了(某人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Outside Tom she has no real friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她除了汤姆之外没有真正的朋友。</font><br>\n
outsider	<h3>outsider</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>局外人, 圈外人, 门外汉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People in that small town avoid talking to outsiders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个小镇上的人们不愿意与外来的人说话。</font><br>\n
outstanding	<h3>outstanding</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>突出的; 杰出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her late husband was an outstanding scientist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已故的丈夫是位杰出的科学家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 得奖学金的女孩是相当杰出的。</font><br>未偿付的, 未解决的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The outstanding bill must be paid next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这笔未偿还的账下周必须还清。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good lot of work is still outstanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不少工作尚未完成。</font><br>地位显著的; 为人瞩目的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a painter outstanding for her landscapes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位以风景画而出名的画家。</font><br>\n
outward	<h3>outward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外出的, 往外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got injured on the outward journey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他外出旅行时受了伤。</font><br>外表的, 表面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medicine is for outward application only.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这药只供外用。</font><br>\n
oval	<h3>oval</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>椭圆形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shape of the earth is an oval.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球的形状是个椭圆形。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>椭圆形的<br>\n
oven	<h3>oven</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>烤箱, 炉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bread is hot from the oven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面包是刚出炉的, 还热着呢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You put food inside an oven to cook it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把食物放进烤箱里热一下。</font><br>\n
over	<h3>over</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…的正上方; 在…的上面; 在…的上空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a lamp over the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桌子正上方有一盏灯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clouds are right over us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在云正在我们的头顶上。</font><br>(表示位置)遍布在…上面, 扩展到…全部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A smile came over her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的脸上露出了笑容。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Brilliant light poured over me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 耀眼的光洒遍我的全身。</font><br>(表示方向)越过, 从一边至…的另一边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Instead of opening the gate, we climbed over it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有开门, 而是从门顶上爬过去的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We moved through fields and over ditches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们穿过田野, 跨过沟渠。</font><br>(表示方向)从…的边缘向下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weight of the net pulled him over the edge and into the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沉重的鱼网把他拖下崖边坠入海中。</font><br>(表示等级或数目)高于; 在…之上, 超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not in charge of the department; I have two people over me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不是这个部门的主管, 我还有两位上级。</font><br>(表示时间或过程)在…期间; 在从事…的时候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you be at home over Christmas?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你圣诞节期间在家吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The leaders met over informal lunches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 领袖们在非正式午餐时进行会晤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They discussed it over a game of golf.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一边打高尔夫球, 一边讨论。</font><br>(表示论及)关于, 在…方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These men have quarreled over the price of a load of hay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这帮人为了一车干草的价钱争吵不休。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>(倒)下, (掉)下, 翻过来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She knocked the vase over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她碰倒了花瓶。</font><br>从一边至另一边, 从一方至另一方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's change these two pictures over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把两张画对调一下位置。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rowed over to the other side of the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们划船到河的对岸。</font><br>全部地, 从头至尾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have read the paper over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把报纸全部看完了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have looked all over for him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我到处都找过他了。</font><br>再一次, 重复地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My sums were wrong and I had to do them over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的总数错了, 只好再算一遍。</font><br>过分地; 太<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is over polite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她太客气了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was over nervous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他太紧张了。</font><br>结束, 了结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The war was all over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争结束了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His suffering will soon be over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的苦难就要结束了。</font><br>\n
overall	<h3>overall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>总体的; 全面的; 综合的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have finished overall homework.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已完成所有的家庭作业。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Overall industrial production was up compared with last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与去年相比, 整个工业产值上升了很多。</font><br>全面考虑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We did an overall consideration of the matter at last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后我们又对这个问题作了全盘考虑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>大体上, 总的来说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Overall, prices are still rising.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总的说来, 价格仍在上涨。</font><br>一切包括在内, 全部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How much will it cost overall?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一共多少钱?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>长罩衣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shop assistant was wearing a white overall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那店员穿着白色长罩衣。</font><br>工装裤; 工作裤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is in overalls today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他今天穿的是工作裤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was wearing a pair of blue overalls.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着蓝色的工作裤。</font><br>\n
overcoat	<h3>overcoat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大衣<br>\n
overcome	<h3>overcome</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>战胜; 克服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He believed the faith that truth would overcome.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他相信真理终会得胜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They overcame the enemy easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们轻松地战胜了敌人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has enough courage to overcome the difficulty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有足够的勇气来克服这个困难。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>被(烟、感情等)熏[压]倒, 使受不了<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were overcome with sadness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们悲痛欲绝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was overcome by smoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被烟熏倒。</font><br>\n
overhead	<h3>overhead</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>离地面的; 头顶上的; 上空的, 架空的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The overhead bird flew away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 头上的鸟飞走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many stars overhead are invisible to the naked eye.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天上的许多星星是肉眼看不到的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在头顶上; 在空中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A plane flew overhead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一架飞机从空中飞过。</font><br>在楼上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people in the room overhead were very noisy yesterday evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨晚在楼上那个房间的人很吵。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(企业的)经费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Heavy overheads reduced his profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经费开支大因而减少了他的利润。</font><br>\n
overheads	<h3>overheads</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(企业等的)经费(如房租、电费、取暖费、薪金)<br>\n
overlook	<h3>overlook</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>忽视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't overlook the slower students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别忽视后进同学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How could you overlook paying the rent?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你怎么会忘了付房租?</font><br>原谅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We decided to overlook his mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们决定宽容他的过错。</font><br>监督, 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foreman overlooked a large number of workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工头监督着许多工人。</font><br>俯视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We overlooked the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们俯瞰大海。</font><br>\n
overnight	<h3>overnight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在晚上, 在夜里<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She stayed overnight in the hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在旅馆过了一夜。</font><br>突然, 很快<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our success is not won overnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的成功不是一夜之间得来的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>一整夜的, 晚上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She took the overnight train to New York.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她乘夜车去纽约。</font><br>突然的; 很快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The show was an overnight success on Broadway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在百老汇的演出一炮打响。</font><br>\n
overseas	<h3>overseas</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在[向]海外; 在[向]国外<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(在)海外的, (在)国外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man is a patriotic overseas Chinese.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人是一位爱国华侨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We enjoyed the overseas travel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们喜欢去国外旅行。</font><br>(向或来自)外国的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The overseas trades have been developing these years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些年对外贸易得到了发展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The radio station sets up an overseas broadcast program.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电台新设置了一个对外广播节目。</font><br>\n
overtake	<h3>overtake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>追上, 赶上, 超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's dangerous to overtake at a corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 转弯时超车危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one could overtake him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人能超过他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Exports have already overtaken last year's figure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 出口量已超过了去年。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>突然来临, 突然遭遇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A storm overtook the little boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小船突然遇到了暴风雨的袭击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film star was overtaken with another trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位影星又遇上了别的麻烦。</font><br>\n
overwhelm	<h3>overwhelm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>覆盖, 淹没<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A great wave overwhelmed the boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个巨浪吞没了那只小船。</font><br>压倒, 制服; 打败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Invading armies overwhelmed the town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入侵的军队控制了这个城镇。</font><br>使某人不知所措<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was overwhelmed by the death of his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为父亲的去世而悲痛至极。</font><br>\n
owe	<h3>owe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>欠…债; 应当给予<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He paid me the ten dollars he owed me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已还了欠我的十美元。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You still owe so much debt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你还欠这么多债。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You owe yourself a holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该休息一天。</font><br>应把…归功于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He owes his good health to plenty of exercise and a regular life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把他身体健康归功于运动和有规律的生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I owe it to you that I survived the catastrophe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 亏得你我才大难不死。</font><br>感激<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave me a lot of help.I owed much to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我许多帮助, 我非常感激他。</font><br>\n
own	<h3>own</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>属于自己的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bananas have their own characteristic smell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 香蕉有其特有的香味。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My time isn't my own.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的时间不属于我自己。</font><br>自己做的, 为自己的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She makes all her own clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的衣服都是自己做的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was my mother's very own engagement ring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这正是我母亲自己的订婚戒指。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拥有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who owns this house?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房子归谁所有?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Julie's father owned a business that dealt in bulk orders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 朱莉的父亲拥有自己的公司, 专门从事大宗订货。</font><br>承认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man refused to own the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人拒绝承认自己是小孩的父亲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I own that you are right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我承认你是对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He owned himself to be guilty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认自己有罪。</font><br>\n
owner	<h3>owner</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物主, 所有人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know the name of the owner?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道主人的名字吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The owner of the shop came up to see what was the matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 店主走过来, 看看出什么事了。</font><br>\n
ownership	<h3>ownership</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物主的身份; 所有(权), 所有制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is under new ownership.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那栋房子已易新主。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He claimed ownership of the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他声称那幢房子归他所有。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ownership of the restaurant is disputed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那餐厅的所有权有争议。</font><br>\n
ox	<h3>ox</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>牛, 阉牛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were several oxen on the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 路上有几头牛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is as strong as an ox.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他体壮如牛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm willing to be an ox serving the country all my life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我甘当孺子牛, 终生为国家服务。</font><br>\n
oxygen	<h3>oxygen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈化〉氧, 氧气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oxygen is one of the basic elements of substance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 氧是物质的基本元素之一。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No living things can live without oxygen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有氧生物就无法生存。</font><br>\n
pace	<h3>pace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>踱步于, 走动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned on the light and began to pace backwards and forwards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打开电灯并开始走来走去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lion paced the floor of its cage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那头狮子在笼子里走来走去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以步测量, 步测<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think the hall is 80 metres long;  I'll pace it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我估计这大厅有80米长; 我来步测一下。</font><br>为…定步速<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She knew how fast she was running, because her trainer was pacing her on a bicycle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她知道她当时跑得多快, 因为她的教练骑着自行车在为她定步速。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>步速; 计划进度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot walk at that pace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能以那种速度行走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work progressed at a slow pace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项工作进展缓慢。</font><br>一步, 步子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She finished only a few paces behind the winner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到达终点时, 她仅比获胜者落后几步。</font><br>溜蹄, 步法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The natural paces of the horse include the walk, the trot and the gallop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马的自然溜蹄包括走步、小跑和飞奔。</font><br>\n
pack	<h3>pack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>包裹; 背包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His pack was undone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的背包打开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The climber carried some food in a pack on his back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那名登山者背着一袋食品。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This pack of clothes is mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这包衣服是我的。</font><br>小纸盒, 小纸包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A pack of cigarettes lasts him two days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一包香烟够他抽两天的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy bought three packs of gum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩买了三小盒口香糖。</font><br>一群; 一伙; 一堆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pack of hounds was baying loudly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那群猎狗在大声吠叫着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has faced a pack of troubles since the end of the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从战争结束以来, 他已遇到一大堆麻烦。</font><br>(纸牌的)一副<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dealt the pack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发牌。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)打包, 收拾行李<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm leaving in an hour and I haven't packed yet!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一小时之后就要走了, 可行李还没有收拾好哩！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This dress packs beautifully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件连衣裙包装得很漂亮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pack your things at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马上把你的东西收拾好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please pack the food for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请为我把这些食品打包。</font><br>塞进; 拥进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you packed me a razor?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你替我把剃须刀装进包里了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp About two thousand people packed the hall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约有两千人把礼堂挤得满满的。</font><br>(使)聚集成团<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snow had packed against the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙根的雪形成了雪团。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind packed the snow against the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风把雪吹到墙边堆积起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装罐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She packed her husband some bread and cheese for his lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为丈夫备好面包和乳酪作为午餐。</font><br>把…裹起来<br>携带; 装备有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They knew all along that he was packing a gun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们向来都知道他身上带着枪。</font><br>挑选…使之偏袒自己<br>\n
package	<h3>package</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…包成一包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They package their goods in attractive wrappers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把货物包在好看的包装袋里。</font><br>包装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those chocolates have been packaged very attractively.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些巧克力包装得很吸引人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>包, 包裹, 包在一起的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He brought me a large package.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我送来一个大包裹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sent him a large package of books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她寄给他一大包书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought a new software package.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一个新的软件包。</font><br>一整套东西, 一揽子交易<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are trying to put together a package that will end the dispute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们力图搞一揽子交易结束这场争论。</font><br>\n
packet	<h3>packet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小包, 小盒; 小包裹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The contents of the packet may settle down in travelling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 袋里的东西在旅行中会沉到底部。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has clapped an extra ten pence on a packet of cigarettes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府对每包香烟加价10便士。</font><br>大笔款项<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That car cost me a packet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那辆小汽车花了我一大笔钱。</font><br>邮船, 班轮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the captain of the packet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是这班邮船的船长。</font><br>\n
pad	<h3>pad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…装衬垫, 加垫子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child let his mother pad the chair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小孩让他妈妈把椅子加上垫子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cell is padded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小房间装有护垫。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>步行, 放轻脚步走<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>垫, 护垫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Get a pad to lie on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拿一个垫子来躺在上面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Elbow pads and knee pads are essential on a skateboard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 滑滑板时带护肘和护膝是必要的。</font><br>便笺本, 拍纸簿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each student should have a pencil and pad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个学生应该有一支铅笔和一本拍纸簿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made a brief note on the telephone pad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在电话通讯簿上记下简短的话。</font><br>肉趾, 肉垫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog had a thorn in its pad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只狗的爪垫上扎了根刺。</font><br>发射台<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The helicopter was hovering about 100 metres above the pad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 直升机在离发射台一百米的上空盘旋。</font><br>住所, 房间, 公寓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come back to my pad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回到我的住处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm going over to his pad this evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今晚要去他的住所。</font><br>\n
page	<h3>page</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>页; 张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The first page of the book is shown on the screen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 屏幕上映出了这本书的第一页。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I make several pages of notes on his talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对他的谈话做了几页笔记。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was originally published in the pages of a magazine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇文章原先发表在一本杂志上。</font><br>〈文〉重要事件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These years will be remembered as some of the finest pages in our country's history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人民会把这些年看成是我国历史上最美好的几页。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>标记…的页数; 翻页<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He paged the book without interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他毫无兴趣地标书页。</font><br>喊出名字以寻找<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He paged his wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喊叫着妻子的名字。</font><br>\n
pain	<h3>pain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>痛苦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pain eased slightly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 痛苦稍有减轻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His behaviour caused his parents a great deal of pain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的所作所为使他的父母极为难过。</font><br>身体某部分的疼痛[不适]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother has a pain in her chest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲胸口疼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked after the aches and pains of all the old people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她询问了所有老人的各种病痛。</font><br>令人厌烦的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a real pain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她真是个讨厌的人。</font><br>劳苦, 辛劳, 烦劳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My pains have been rewarded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的努力已得到报偿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)疼痛; (使)痛苦; 伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My tooth is paining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我牙痛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her injured arm pained her sharply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她那受伤的手臂使她感到剧烈疼痛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It pains me to have to leave, but I must.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不得不离开使我感到痛苦, 但我必须离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It pained him that his father talked like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父亲那样说使他痛苦。</font><br>\n
painful	<h3>painful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>痛苦的, (肉体)疼的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had a painful cut on her thumb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的拇指上有个疼痛的伤口。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The duty is painful to me, but it must be done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这义务对我来说很痛苦, 但它是无法避免的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story of her sufferings was painful to listen to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她苦难的故事使人听得难受。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It must have been very painful for you to tell her about the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这件事情告诉她对你来说一定是很痛苦的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is painful that Tom will fail this exam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆这次考试如不及格, 会叫人痛心的。</font><br>费力的, 伤脑筋的, 棘手的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This has been a painful lesson to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对我来说, 这节课很伤脑筋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His writing was slow and painful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他写得既慢又费力。</font><br>\n
paint	<h3>paint</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>油漆, 涂料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't touch the door; the paint is wet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别碰这门, 油漆未干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If workmen breathed in the fine paint spray, their lungs would be damaged.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果工人吸入这种细微的喷漆, 他们的肺部就会受到损伤。</font><br>颜料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I left my paints at home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把颜料忘在家里了。</font><br>涂层, 漆层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sulphuric acid ate into the parts of the metal where the coat of paint had peeled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 硫酸腐蚀了这块金属上涂层剥落的地方。</font><br>化妆品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That girl wears far too much paint.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个女孩妆化得太浓了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>画; 绘画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl paints nicely in watercolours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小姑娘的水彩画画得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He painted this picture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他画了这幅画。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is painting her a picture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在为她作画。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She painted a beautiful portrait for us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为我们画了一幅漂亮的肖像。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The artist painted her strolling her garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美术家画了一张她在花园里漫步的画。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…上涂涂料[油漆]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will you paint the wall?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们什么时候粉刷墙?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I painted the door a bright colour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把门漆成鲜艳的颜色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have painted the table red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把桌子漆成红色。</font><br>涂, 搽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Taking out her lipstick, she began to paint her lips.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拿出口红, 开始往嘴唇上抹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She painted herself thick and ugly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她脸上粉搽得又厚又难看。</font><br>描绘, 描述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The writer paints a vivid picture of his early life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位作家生动地描绘了他早年的生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A lot of propaganda has painted him as bad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大量宣传把他说得很坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They painted him to be indecisive, negative, and selfish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被描绘成一个优柔寡断、消极又自私的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know you dislike him, but you paint him too black.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道你讨厌他, 不过你把他说得太坏了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His imagination paints himself hovering in the sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想像自己在天空飞翔。</font><br>\n

pair	<h3>pair</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一副, 一条, 一把; 一双, 一对<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This pair of shoes fits me well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这双鞋我穿很合脚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pairs of socks are pinned together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 成双的袜子是别在一起的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought six pairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买了六双。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A pair of robbers were trying to kidnap his wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两个强盗正试图绑架他的妻子。</font><br>一对男女, 一对夫妇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They will make a good pair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他俩能结成美满的伉俪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are a fine pair coming as late as this!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你俩来得这么晚, 真是一对宝货！</font><br>雌雄成对的动物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A pair of orioles alighted on the frisking branch of a weeping willow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一对黄鹂飞落在拂动着的柳树枝条上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pair of swans nested by the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对天鹅栖息在河边。</font><br>套在一起的两匹马<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a coach and pair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是双驾马车。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使…)成对, (使…)成双<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I thought those two would pair well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为那两个人将能配成很好的一对。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>交配, 交尾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Birds pair and build nests in spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟在春天交配、筑窝。</font><br>\n
palace	<h3>palace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宫, 宫殿<br>\n
pale	<h3>pale</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>苍白的, 灰白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a pale face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她脸色苍白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She turned pale at the sight of the miserable condition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一看到这惨状就面容失色。</font><br>浅色的; 淡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The walls were painted a pale green.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些墙壁被漆成浅绿色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>变得苍白, 失色, 变得暗淡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He paled at the sight of the blood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一看见血就脸色发白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother paled with shock at the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈听到那消息大惊失色。</font><br>\n
palm	<h3>palm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手掌, 掌状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Buddhist monk sat with folded palms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和尚合掌打坐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their fists were clenched so tightly that their nails dug deep into their palms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们紧握着拳头, 指甲深深地捏进了手心。</font><br>(象征胜利的)棕榈叶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The coconut palm trees planted after the war added to the beauty of the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战后栽植的这些椰子树使这个城市显得更加美丽。</font><br>\n
pan	<h3>pan</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平底锅; 盘子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He started tipping beans into a pan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开始把豆倒进锅中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Usually cooking pots have two small handles but pans have one long handle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 通常炊锅有两个小柄, 而平底锅有一个长柄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He used a pan of water to mix the wheatflour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一锅水和面。</font><br>\n
panel	<h3>panel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>专门小组<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A panel of experts gave its opinion on ways to solve the traffic problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 专家小组就如何解决交通问题发表了意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jury panel was drawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 陪审员名单通过抽签决定了。</font><br>面; 板<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This panel has a crack on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块镶板有裂痕了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The builders set the panels in very carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 建筑工人把嵌板非常小心地镶上去。</font><br>控制板, 仪表盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The unusual control panel on the walls caught our attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上不同寻常的控制板引起了我们的注意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vibrations shook the panel loose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 仪表板震松了。</font><br>\n
panic	<h3>panic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)恐慌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gunfire panicked the baby.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炮声使婴儿受到了惊吓。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>恐慌, 惊慌, 慌乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a panic when the building caught fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大楼起火时, 人们一片惊慌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thought of flying fills me with panic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一想到飞行就吓得战战兢兢。</font><br>\n
pants	<h3>pants</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈英〉(紧身的)短裤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rushed out in pants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着短裤就冲出来。</font><br>〈美〉 裤子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My new pair of pants is being altered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的新裤子正在修改。</font><br>\n
paper	<h3>paper</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>纸, 墙纸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The public are requested not to throw waste paper in the park.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公众被要求不得在公园里乱扔废纸。</font><br>〈口〉报纸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The papers forecast clear skies tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报纸预报明天晴天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I asked him to fetch me the evening paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我请他去给我把晚报拿来。</font><br>文件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Assemble your papers and put them in the file.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把你的文件归拢放在这个文件夹内。</font><br>文章, 论文<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My paper consists of ten pages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的论文共10页。</font><br>试卷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The geography paper was difficult.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地理试题很难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher demands that students should turn in their test papers within two hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师要求学生两小时内交卷。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>贴纸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When did your father last time paper the room?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上次, 你父亲是什么时候用纸裱糊房间的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're papering the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正在给这间屋子贴壁纸。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用纸覆盖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She papered the oranges carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很仔细地用纸把橘子包起来。</font><br>隐瞒; 掩饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He agreed to paper over the cracks for the period of the election.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他同意在选举期间暂时把分歧掩盖起来。</font><br>\n
paperwork	<h3>paperwork</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>文书工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the best girl for the paperwork.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是最适合做这项文书工作的女孩。</font><br>\n
parade	<h3>parade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)集合接受检阅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The colonel paraded his troops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上校检阅自己的部队。</font><br>游行; 列队行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army paraded round drill squares.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军队绕训练场列队行进。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>展示; 炫耀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is parading his knowledge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在炫耀他的知识。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(部队的)检阅<br>游行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Olympic Games began with a parade of all the competing nations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奥运会以所有参赛国列队进场开始。</font><br>\n
