paragraph	<h3>paragraph</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>段落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each paragraph begins on a new line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每段都另起一行。</font><br>短篇报道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a paragraph on the matter in the paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报纸对这件事有一短篇报道。</font><br>\n
parallel	<h3>parallel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(指至少两条线)平行的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two parallel lines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这有两条平行线。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These two roads are parallel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两条路是平行的。</font><br>类似的; 相对应的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the parallel points in the characters of different men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是不同人物间个性上的类似之处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The growth of the two towns was almost parallel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个城镇的发展几乎相同。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平行线[面]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This line is a parallel with that one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条线和那条线平行。</font><br>极相似的人[事物]<br>类似(点), 相似(之处)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are some interesting parallels between the educational systems of these two countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两国的教育制度之间有些有趣的相似之处。</font><br>比较<br>纬线, 纬圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This city is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市靠近北纬40度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>与…平行; 与…相当<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The street parallels the railway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条街与铁路平行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one has paralleled his successful business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人赶得上他在事业上的成就。</font><br>\n
parcel	<h3>parcel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>包裹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am going to take the parcel to the post office this afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天下午我打算去邮局寄包裹。</font><br>一块地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This parcel of land consists of 18 acres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这片土地有18英亩。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…打成包裹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sales clerk parceled his purchase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 售货员把他买的东西打成包裹。</font><br>分成若干部分<br>\n
pardon	<h3>pardon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>宽恕, 原谅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She asked him to pardon her rudeness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她请求他原谅她的无礼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope you'll pardon me saying so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 希望你原谅我这么说。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>饶恕, 原谅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last, he obtained his father's pardon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他终于得到了父亲的原谅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I beg your pardon, what you say is not exactly correct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 你说的话并不完全对。</font><br>赦免<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His pardon came through only three hours before he was due to be executed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在他要被处死之前三个小时传来了对他的赦免。</font><br>\n
parent	<h3>parent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>父亲, 母亲; 家长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As an only child he was the idol of his parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为独子, 他是父母的宠儿。</font><br>\n
park	<h3>park</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jane was willing to accompany you to the park to go out for a walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简愿意陪你去公园散步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hyde Park isn't far from my home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海德公园离我们家不远。</font><br>停车场<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>泊车, 停车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A car parked in front of the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 楼房前面停着一辆车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I parked the car in the front yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把车停在前院里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>将…放置在某处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She parked her bag at the club.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她将她的包留在俱乐部。</font><br>\n
parking	<h3>parking</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(车辆等的)停放<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Parking is something I'm very bad at.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我最不在行的就是停车。</font><br>停车场所, 停车位<br>\n
parliament	<h3>parliament</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>议会, 国会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The British Parliament consists of the House of Lords and the House of Commons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国议会由上院和下院组成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several new laws have been passed in the present parliament.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几项新法律已在本届议会上获得通过。</font><br>\n
part	<h3>part</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一部分; 局部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A whole consists of parts, the parts constitute the whole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整体由部分组成, 部分构成整体。</font><br>零件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She carried some machine parts from this city to that one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她将一些机器零件从这个城市运送到那个城市。</font><br>角色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do the actors all know their parts yet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 演员们都熟悉他们的角色吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)分裂成几部分, 断裂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cable suddenly parted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 缆索突然断裂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The strain parted the rope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 绳索因拉得太紧而断了。</font><br>(使)分离[开]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The couple parted amicably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对夫妻客气地分手了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd parted to let the soldiers through.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人群分开好让士兵们通过。</font><br>\n
partial	<h3>partial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>部分的, 不完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I could give it only partial support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只能给它部分的支持。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The victory is only partial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 胜利只是局部的。</font><br>\n
participate	<h3>participate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>参加, 参与<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several experts will participate as technical advisers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几位专家将作为技术顾问参加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher participated the students' games.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师参加了学生们的游戏。</font><br>\n
particle	<h3>particle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>微粒, 颗粒, 〈物〉粒子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are particles of dust in the air.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 空气中有尘粒。</font><br>极少量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's not a particle of truth in her story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她讲的没有一句实话。</font><br>小品词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prepositions and conjunctions are particles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 介词和连词是小品词。</font><br>\n
particular	<h3>particular</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>特定的, 某一的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is his particular problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是他个人的问题。</font><br>特殊的, 特别的, 特有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a particular case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种特殊情况。</font><br>(过分)讲究的, 挑剔的<br>详细的, 详尽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a particular account of the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一份全面而详尽的事故报告。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor had been particular in examining her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生对她进行了仔细的检查。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>详情; 细目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your mother must be anxious to know the particulars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的母亲一定急于了解详情。</font><br>\n
particularly	<h3>particularly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>特别; 尤其<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He isn't particularly clever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他并不特别聪明。</font><br>\n
partly	<h3>partly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在一定程度上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What you say is partly true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你所说的有几分是真实的。</font><br>部分地, 不完全地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is partly a political and partly a legal question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个问题部分是政治问题, 部分是法律问题。</font><br>\n
partner	<h3>partner</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伙伴, 同伙, 合伙人, 股东<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can men of different races live as partners?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不同种族的人们能成为伙伴一起生活吗?</font><br>同伴, 搭档<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is my bridge partner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我的桥牌搭档。</font><br>配偶, 情人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you sure you want him as your partner for life?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你决定要他做你的终生伴侣吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>做…的搭档<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She partnered me at the dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在舞会上做我的舞伴。</font><br>\n
part-time	<h3>part-time</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>兼职的,部分时间的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>部分时间,兼职地<br>\n
party	<h3>party</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>社交聚会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party was fresh in her memory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那次聚会在她脑海中记忆犹新。</font><br>党, 政党<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party split up into small groups.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该党分裂为若干小派系。</font><br>一方, 当事人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parties to the dispute should be more polite to each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 争执双方应相互礼貌些。</font><br>\n
pass	<h3>pass</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>走过, 经过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parade passed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游行队伍走过去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will the ship pass the channel?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那轮船什么时候通过这海峡?</font><br>通过; 批准<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bill passed and became law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法案通过了, 成了法律。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Parliament passed the bill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国会通过了那个法案。</font><br>度过; 花费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A week passed quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一星期很快就过去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Helen passed her weekend at her uncle's.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海伦在她叔叔家过周末。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>递给; 传<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dick passed the football quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狄克传球迅速。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>越过, 通过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The aircraft made a few passes over the enemy camp, but didn't drop any bomb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机几次飞越敌营, 但没有投弹。</font><br>通行证, 许可证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom gave him a free pass on the railway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆给了他一张火车免费乘车券。</font><br>通道, 山口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a bus passing through the Brenner Pass every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每天都有一辆穿过布里纳山口的公共汽车。</font><br>\n
passage	<h3>passage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>通道, 过道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house has an underground passage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房子有一条地下通道。</font><br>(文章的)一段, 一节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll read you another passage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我来读另一段给你们听。</font><br>经过, 通过; 消逝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With the passage of time the incident was forgotten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着时间的消逝, 那个事件被忘却了。</font><br>\n
passenger	<h3>passenger</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乘客, 旅客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train drew in and all the passengers got off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车到站了, 所有的乘客都下了车。</font><br>\n
passion	<h3>passion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>激情, 热情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not control his passion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他无法控制自己的激情。</font><br>狂怒, 盛怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his passion, he tore the letter into pieces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在盛怒之下, 他把那封信撕得粉碎。</font><br>爱好, 酷爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a passion for music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他酷爱音乐。</font><br>\n
passive	<h3>passive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>被动的; 消极的; 不抵抗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a passive disposition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他个性消极。</font><br>冷漠的, 不关心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a passive expression on his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸上有一种漠然的表情。</font><br>\n
passport	<h3>passport</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>护照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your passports expire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们的护照满期了。</font><br>手段, 保障<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He views boxing as his passport out of poverty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把拳击看作自己摆脱贫困的手段。</font><br>\n
password	<h3>password</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>密码,口令<br>\n
past	<h3>past</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>以前的, 过去的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These things happened in the past years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些事情都发生在过去的年代里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Winter is past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冬天已经过去了。</font><br>结束了的; 不复存在的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His prime is past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的青春已经不复存在了。</font><br>前任的; 已卸任的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the past vice-president.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他就是前任副总裁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>过去, 昔时; 往事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The past is past.Let us look ahead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过去的事已成过去, 让我们向前看吧。</font><br>过去的生活[经历]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We know something of his past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对他的经历略知一二。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示时间)迟于, 在…之后, 晚于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dancing was kept up till past two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 舞会一直开到两点以后。</font><br>(表示距离)远于, 在…的更远处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hospital is about a mile past the school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医院在离学校一英里以外的地方。</font><br>(表示关涉)从…旁边过去, 通过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They went past the department store.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从百货公司的旁边经过。</font><br>(表示程度)超出, 超越<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is past my ability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我力所不及的。</font><br>(表示数目)超过, 过于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child can't count past 20.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子不能数过20。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>经过, 过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A car ran past at full speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一辆汽车以全速驶过。</font><br>\n
paste	<h3>paste</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面团, 糊状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She mixed the flour and water to a paste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用水和面做成面团。</font><br>糨糊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stick the paper with paste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用糨糊粘纸。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>粘, 贴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please paste these sheets of paper together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请将这几张纸粘在一起。</font><br>鞭笞; 打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We pasted the enemy's greatest source of supply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对敌人的最大补给来源予以重击。</font><br>\n
pat	<h3>pat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>轻拍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He patted my curly head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他轻拍我卷发的头。</font><br>拍成, 拍至<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He patted his face dry with a towel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用手巾轻轻地把脸拍干。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轻拍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With a reassuring pat on her arm, he left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他鼓励地拍了拍她的手臂就离开了。</font><br>轻拍某物发出的声音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could you hear the pat?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能听到轻轻的拍击声吗?</font><br>小团, 小块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give me a pat of butter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给我一块儿黄油。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>恰好的; 适当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A pat tale aroused a big laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个贴切适时的故事引起一阵大笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her answer was too pat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的回答很恰当。</font><br>过于快的; 伶牙俐齿的<br>\n
patch	<h3>patch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>补丁, 补片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a patch on the elbow of his jacket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的上衣肘部有一块补丁。</font><br>眼罩<br>斑, 块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog's coat is white with black patches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只狗的皮毛白色中带有黑斑。</font><br>小块, 小片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only a tiny patch of blue was visible in the cloudy sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多云的天空中只见到一小块儿湛蓝。</font><br>小块土地<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>补<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give me some cloth to patch your trousers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给我一点布来补你的裤子。</font><br>修理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workman patched the ceiling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人修补了天花板。</font><br>调停, 解决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We managed to patch our quarrel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们设法平息争吵。</font><br>\n
path	<h3>path</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小路, 小径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The path was completely covered by the dense foliage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小路被树叶厚厚地盖了一层。</font><br>路线, 途径, 路径, 轨迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The path of an arrow is a curve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 箭的轨迹是一条曲线。</font><br>\n
patience	<h3>patience</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>耐性, 忍耐力, 耐心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We haven't the patience to hear such an empty talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们可没耐心去听这种空谈。</font><br>坚忍, 坚持, 毅力<br>\n
patient	<h3>patient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>忍耐的, 有耐心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young cashier gave a patient sigh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年轻的出纳员忍耐地叹了一口气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your patient answer just adds up to refusal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的耐心的回答等于拒绝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please be patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请忍耐些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Facing the trouble he is patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面对麻烦时他表现得很有耐心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is patient of cold and hunger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能忍饥挨冻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This sentence is patient of two interpretations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这句话可作两种解释。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Enid was a good teacher.She was very patient with her pupils.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伊妮德是位好教师, 她对学生很有耐心。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>患者, 病人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The patient was amused at the music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到音乐, 病人感到快乐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Blacks are patients of mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些黑人是我的病人。</font><br>\n
pattern	<h3>pattern</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>型, 样式<br>花样, 图案<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She cut a pattern for her own coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给自己的外衣剪了一个样子。</font><br>方式, 形式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why should all writers follow a pattern?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为什么作家都遵循一个模式写作呢?</font><br>榜样, 典范<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The success of the course set a pattern for the training of new employees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该课程的成功为新雇员的训练树立了榜样。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>模仿;  仿制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They patterned a new machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们仿制了一种新机器。</font><br>以图案装饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He patterned the hall all the day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一整天都在用图案装饰大厅。</font><br>\n
pause	<h3>pause</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>停顿, 暂停<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came to a pause in reading and then went on reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在阅读中停顿了一下, 又继续念下去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>停顿; 暂停<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He broke off and paused a moment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说不下去了, 停了一会儿。</font><br>\n
pave	<h3>pave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>铺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The street is paved with asphalt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 街道被铺上柏油。</font><br>为…铺平道路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I do hope the treaty will pave the way to peace in the Middle East.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真希望这个条约将为中东的和平铺平道路。</font><br>\n
paw	<h3>paw</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>爪子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a black cat with white paws.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一只长着白爪子的小黑猫。</font><br>手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take your dirty little paws off me!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别用你的小黑手抓着我。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用爪抓, 用蹄触<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog was pawing the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗正在用爪子抓门。</font><br>摸弄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cannot be near a woman without pawing her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一接近女人就忍不住动手动脚。</font><br>\n
pay	<h3>pay</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>付给; 付款<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This job pays well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份工作报酬不错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had to pay rather heavily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们得付出沉重的代价。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have paid the milkman this month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我这个月付款给送奶人了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ought to pay the rent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应该付房租。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We refused to pay them their wages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们拒绝付给他们工资。</font><br>有利可图; (对…)有利, (对…)值得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Crime doesn't pay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 犯罪得不偿失。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It pays to advertise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 登广告很有用。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给予<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager paid her a compliment on her work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经理赞扬了她的工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工资<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His pay goes up every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的工资每年都有增加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trade unions bargained away their rights in exchange for a small pay rise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工会不惜牺牲自己的权利以换取微薄的加薪。</font><br>\n
payment	<h3>payment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>支付, 付款, 缴纳, 报酬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gave ten pounds in payment for the goods I bought.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买那些东西付了10英镑。</font><br>付出的[要付出的]款项<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Payment of subscriptions should be made to the club secretary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会费应交给俱乐部秘书。</font><br>报答, 报偿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'd like you to accept this picture in payment for your kindness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们奉上此画聊表谢意。</font><br>\n
pea	<h3>pea</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>豌豆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My little sister picked up many green peas in the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小妹从田野里拾到许多豌豆。</font><br>\n
peace	<h3>peace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>和平, 和平时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people desire peace, security and happiness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人民向往和平、安全与幸福。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a brief peace, war broke out again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在短暂的和平之后, 战争又爆发了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had a silver peace symbol hanging on a chain around her neck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一个银制的和平标志挂在项链上。</font><br>治安, 社会安定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were charged with disturbing public peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们被指控扰乱社会治安。</font><br>安心; 平静<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Knowing that she had arrived safely restored my peace of mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 得知她平安到达, 我就安心了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All I want is a bit of peace and quiet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我所希望的只是一点平静。</font><br>\n
peaceful	<h3>peaceful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>和平的, 没有战争的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a peaceful solution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个和平的解决方法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should take part in the peaceful uses of atomic energy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该参与原子能的和平应用。</font><br>爱好[寻求]和平的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As everybody knows, Switzerland is a peaceful country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 众所周知, 瑞士是一个爱好和平的国家。</font><br>安静的, 平静的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She spent a peaceful afternoon by the river, reading a novel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在河边看小说, 度过了一个宁静的下午。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How peaceful it is in the country now!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在乡下多么平静啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looked curiously peaceful as she lay there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她躺在那儿, 神情安详得出奇。</font><br>\n
peach	<h3>peach</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>桃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pulled a peach from the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从树上摘下一只桃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My granny likes eating tinned peaches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我奶奶喜欢吃桃罐头。</font><br>桃树<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two peaches in our yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的院子里有两棵桃树。</font><br>〈口〉美人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a real peach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她真是个美人。</font><br>〈口〉(同类事物中)极好的[极吸引人的]事物<br>\n
peak	<h3>peak</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>山峰, 山顶; 有尖峰的高山<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane flew over the peaks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机在山峰上飞过。</font><br>尖端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind blew the waves into great peaks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风把浪刮得高高耸起。</font><br>最高点, 最高水平; 高峰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's at the peak of his career.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正处于事业的巅峰。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Traffic reaches a peak between 8 and 9 in the morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 早晨八九点钟是交通的高峰时刻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Athletes have to train continuously to stay in peak condition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运动员必须不断训练才能保持最佳竞技状态。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>达到高峰, 达到最大值<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Toy sales peaked just before Christmas and are now decreasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玩具销售额在圣诞节前夕达到最高峰, 现已逐渐下降。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Middle school enrolments will peak this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年中学入学人数将达到高峰。</font><br>\n
pear	<h3>pear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>梨(树)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pear is a delicious fruit and I like it very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 梨是好吃的水果, 我喜欢它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She pulled a pear from the pear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她从树上摘下一只梨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We carried the pears with a boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用小船运那些梨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His cheek is stuffed with pear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的腮帮子里塞满梨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pear blossom is beginning to drop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 梨花开始落下。</font><br>\n
peasant	<h3>peasant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>农民, 农夫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His father is a peasant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他父亲是一位农民。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They supplied large numbers of tractors to peasants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们向农民供应了大批拖拉机。</font><br>\n
peculiar	<h3>peculiar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>奇怪的, 异常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wine has a peculiar taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种酒有种怪怪的味道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked at me with a very peculiar expression.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一种很奇怪的表情看着我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's always been a little peculiar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为人总是有点儿古怪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My books have disappeared—it's most peculiar!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的书不见了——这可太奇怪了！</font><br>特有的, 独具的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book has a peculiar value.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书有特殊的价值。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Language is peculiar to mankind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 语言是人类所特有的。</font><br>〈非正〉不舒服, 有病的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Seeing blood makes me feel a bit peculiar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看见血会使我感到有点儿不舒服。</font><br>\n
peer	<h3>peer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>凝视, 盯着看<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He peered at his father's face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他凝视着他父亲的脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She peers into my eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她盯着我的眼睛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>贵族<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a peer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个贵族。</font><br>同辈; 同龄人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As peers, we should help each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为同龄人, 我们应该互相帮助。</font><br>\n
pen	<h3>pen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>笔; 钢笔; 圆珠笔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two pens on the desk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桌子上有两支钢笔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My pen writes well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的笔好使。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He must write the letter with a pen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他必须用钢笔写这封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Students are required to write their exercises in pen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们被要求用钢笔做练习。</font><br>写作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp George is clever with his pen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乔治善于写文章。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives by his pen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以写作为生。</font><br>圈, 围栏<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>写(信等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pen it before you forget it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 记下来, 免得忘了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often pens poems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他常写诗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I penned a few lines to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我略写几行给他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I penned a few words to father today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天我给父亲写了一封短信。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…关入栏中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shepherds penned their flocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牧羊人把他们的羊群关入栏中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She feels penned by her life as a housewife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她觉得做家庭主妇很受束缚。</font><br>\n
penalty	<h3>penalty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>惩罚, 处罚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you knock the ball with your hand in football, you will suffer a penalty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果在踢足球时你用手碰到球, 你将受到处罚。</font><br>不利后果, 损失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One of the penalties of fame is that people point at you in the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当了名人的麻烦之一是人们在街上对你指指点点。</font><br>\n
pencil	<h3>pencil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铅笔, 彩色铅笔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pens and pencils are writing utensils.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 钢笔和铅笔是书写工具。</font><br>光线锥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is a pencil of rays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一束光线。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用铅笔写、画或标记(某物)<br>\n
penetrate	<h3>penetrate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>穿过, 刺入, 渗入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The knife penetrated his finger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刀子刺入他的手指。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water penetrated the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水渗入房间里。</font><br>了解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She could penetrate what I was thinking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她了解我在想什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard what you said, but it didn't penetrate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的话我听见了, 但是没有听懂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>看穿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He penetrated our thoughts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看穿了我们的心思。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spy's disguise was soon penetrated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 间谍的伪装不久便被识破了。</font><br>\n
penny	<h3>penny</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>便士<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were nine pounds left, besides some pennies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除几枚便士硬币外, 还剩下九英镑。</font><br>(美国、加拿大的)一分钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spends every penny he earns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把赚得的每一分钱都花掉了。</font><br>少量的钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's never turned an honest penny in his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一生中没有用正当手段赚过一点钱。</font><br>\n
pension	<h3>pension</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>退休金, 养老金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the company to draw her pension.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她去公司领退休金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country provided a pension to the old person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国家给老人们提供养老金。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>发给…养老金[退休金]<br>\n
people	<h3>people</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人, 人们; 一般的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doorman allowed the people in one by one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看门的让人们一个一个进去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Were there many people at the meeting?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 参加会议的人多吗?</font><br>人民; 平民; 老百姓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wisdom of the people is inexhaustible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人民的智慧是无穷无尽的。</font><br>种族, 民族<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Japanese are an industrious people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 日本人民是勤劳的民族。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peoples of Southeast Asian countries all denounced the treaty between these two countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 东南亚各族人民一致声讨这两个国家签订的条约。</font><br>家人, 亲属<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My husband's people are staying with us now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我丈夫家里的人现在在我们这儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>居住于; 使…充满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His race has peopled this island through all recorded history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自有历史记载以来, 他的族人都居于此岛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meadow is peopled with wild flowers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 草地长满了野花。</font><br>\n
pepper	<h3>pepper</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>胡椒粉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He put some pepper in the bowl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他放了一些胡椒粉在碗里。</font><br>辣椒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She takes a few peppers in the hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拿了一些辣椒在手里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…上撒胡椒粉; 使布满<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He peppered food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在食物上撒胡椒粉。</font><br>以…密击, 接二连三地提问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They peppered the enemy's lines with their shots.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用炮弹向敌人阵地密击。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Members of the city council peppered him with questions about the details of his plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市议员们对他计划的详情问个不休。</font><br>\n
per	<h3>per</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>〈拉〉(表示关涉)通过, 由<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you send the goods per rail, or per plane?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你送这个商品是通过铁路还是飞机?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your car, per Mary, has reached me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的车由玛丽给我。</font><br>(表示根据)依照, 根据<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You bought goods per list price.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你按照所列价格买商品。</font><br>(表示比率)(尤指数量, 价格, 时间)每<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These apples cost 40 pence per pound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些苹果每磅40便士。</font><br>\n
perceive	<h3>perceive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>感觉, 察觉, 理解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has perceived the danger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已觉察到那危险了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They perceived the faults of their own children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们知道了他们自己儿女的过失。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't perceive any difference between these coins.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看不出这些硬币的区别。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you perceive a red colour or a green one?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看出来是红颜色还是绿颜色?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That rule is not easily perceived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条规则不容易理解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such fallacies are not easily perceived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 识别这种谬论并非易事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They perceived that they were unwelcome and left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们意识到他们是不受欢迎的, 于是就离开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I perceived that I could not make him change his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我意识到我不能使他改变主意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They perceived that the enemy was trying to wear down their resistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们明白敌人是想用消耗的办法来制服他们的抵抗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can easily perceive what he wants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可轻而易举地看出他要什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He perceived what the shy little man wanted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看出了这个害羞的小人想要什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We perceive him wish to make progress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们看得出他是要求进步的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I plainly perceive some objections remain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我清楚地察觉到还有一些反对意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are perceived to accept his offer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人得知, 你要接受他的条件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief was perceived to steal into the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人看见小偷溜进那房子里去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you perceive anyone entering the laboratory?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你看见有人进入实验室吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They perceived a stranger wandering in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们看到一个陌生人在花园里闲逛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We perceived a little girl coming toward us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们发觉一个小女孩正朝我们这边走来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was perceived dancing alone in her room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人看见她正在自己的房子里独自起舞。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Soon the boy perceived the snake to be a dead one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 男孩很快发觉那条蛇是死的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On entering his house, we at once perceived him to be tasteful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一进他的房子, 立刻感觉到他是个高品位的人。</font><br>\n
percent	<h3>percent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>百分比,百分数<br>\n
percentage	<h3>percentage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>百分比, 百分率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Television attracts a large percentage of the people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电视吸引了大部分观众。</font><br>比例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the percentage of nitrogen in air?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 空气中所含的氮的比例是多少?</font><br>\n
perception	<h3>perception</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>感知(能力); 觉察(力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a man of keen perception.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个感觉敏锐的人。</font><br>认识, 观念, 看法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's your perception of the matter?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对此事有什么看法?</font><br>\n
perfect	<h3>perfect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>完美的, 完善的, 理想的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shoes are a perfect fit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这双鞋子穿着很合脚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a perfect wife and mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是位贤妻良母。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His technique is almost perfect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的技巧近乎完美。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather is perfect for a picnic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种天气举行野餐好极了。</font><br>完整的; 完好无损的; 无缺陷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Practice makes perfect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 熟能生巧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work is perfect in craftsmanship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这副作品工艺完美。</font><br>完全的, 绝对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband is a perfect jellyfish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她丈夫是个典型的优柔寡断的人。</font><br>正确的, 精确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She speaks perfect English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她英语说得好极了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使…完美; 改善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went to Italy to perfect his singing voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去意大利提高自己的歌唱技艺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tried to perfect the working conditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们努力完善工作条件。</font><br>\n
perfection	<h3>perfection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>完美; 完善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His performance was sheer perfection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的表演达到了尽善尽美的地步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are working on the perfection of their new paint formula.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在研制完善的新颜料配方。</font><br>\n
perform	<h3>perform</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>执行; 履行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He not only promised, but performed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不仅许下诺言, 而且做到了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always performs his duties faithfully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一贯忠实地履行自己的职责。</font><br>表演; 扮演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He performed well under pressure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在压力之下表现得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The monkey performed several tricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猴子耍了几招把戏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They performed a dance for the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为儿童表演了一个舞蹈。</font><br>\n
performance	<h3>performance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>演出, 表演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pianist gave a fine performance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 钢琴家演奏得很出色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come and see him in performance with the new band.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 来看他在新乐队中的演奏吧。</font><br>履行, 执行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very conscientious in the performance of his duties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常认真地履行职责。</font><br>表现, 行为, 成就<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His performance in the exams was not very good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他考得不很好。</font><br>性能, 工作情况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you satisfied with the performance of your new car?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对你新车的性能满意吗?</font><br>\n
perhaps	<h3>perhaps</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>或许, 大概, 可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you are good I shall perhaps take you for a walk this afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你乖, 我今天下午可能带你出去散散步。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I perhaps come across him tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我明天也许会偶然遇到他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You want to make stay long in Beijing, perhaps?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要在北京呆很长一段时间吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps I am wrong, but I think she is over 60 years old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我也许记错了, 不过我想她已60出头了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps it will rain in the afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下午可能有雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps they are in need of our help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 或许他们需要我们的帮助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps I can help you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 也许我能帮帮你的忙吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps this is his finest novel yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这也许是至今为止他写得最好的一部小说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps you would be good enough to explain this for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请您为我解释这个, 行吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps you would be kind enough to read this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就请你把它念一念好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Perhaps you would like to see it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可能想看这东西吧?</font><br>\n
period	<h3>period</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(一段)时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary was restored to health after a period of medical treatment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过一段时间治疗, 玛丽康复了。</font><br>时期, 时代<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is his most difficult period.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是他最困难的时期。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He excels all other composers of his period.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他胜过同时代的所有其他作曲家。</font><br>学时, 课时<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school day is divided into seven periods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校一天有七节课。</font><br>句号, 句点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Use a period at the end of the sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在一个句子的末尾用句号。</font><br>\n
periodical	<h3>periodical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>期刊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have already put out a new periodical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已经出版了一种新的期刊。</font><br>\n
permanent	<h3>permanent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>永久(性)的, 固定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The coat gives permanent protection against heavy rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种防雨衣经久耐用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is one of our permanent employees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我们的终身雇员之一。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is unchangeable and permanent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是持久不变的。</font><br>\n
permission	<h3>permission</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>允许, 许可, 准许<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did he give you permission to take that?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他允许你拿那个东西了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have obtained a written permission from the chairman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从主席那里获得了书面许可。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With your permission I'll leave now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有你的允许, 我这就离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The article was reproduced by the special permission of the President.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于总统的特殊允许, 这篇文章被复印了一份。</font><br>\n
permit	<h3>permit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>允许; 许可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I would like to do it with you, but I am not sure whether my parents permit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我愿意和你一起做, 但不知我父母是否允许。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will have our meeting here, if you permit us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你允许的话, 我们的会就在这里开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Papa would not permit the waste of a single drop of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爸爸不允许浪费一滴水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The words hardly permit doubt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些话不容置疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We do not permit smoking in the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不允许在屋里吸烟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Circumstances do not permit my going with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况不允许我和你们一道去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Time does not permit that I stay longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时间不允许我久留。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His illness would not permit that he (should) work hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病魔不允许他辛苦工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor has permitted him only two meals a day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生只允许他每天吃两顿饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He permitted himself three cigars a day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他允许他自己一天抽三支雪茄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You permit your children too much freedom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对孩子们太放纵了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She permitted me to borrow the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她允许我借那本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't permit this to happen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能容许这事发生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Circumstances do not permit me to leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况不允许我离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor will not permit mother up until her leg is better.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在母亲的腿好些之前, 医生不允许她起床。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't permit yourself in dissipation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要放任自己。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>许可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't take pictures here without special permit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未经特许, 你不能在这里拍照。</font><br>许可证, 执照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't got a driving permit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我还没有得到驾驶执照。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building permits are granted by the City Building Department.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 建筑许可证由城建局签发。</font><br>\n
persist	<h3>persist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>坚持, 固执<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the tops of very high mountains snow persists throughout the year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 高山顶上, 积雪终年不化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bad weather will persist all over the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种坏天气将在全国各地持续下去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His strength of will enabled him to persist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的意志力使他能坚持下去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tendency still persists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种倾向一直存在。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He persisted that he (should) walk there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坚持要步行去那里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He persisted that he did the work alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坚持他一个人做那件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She persisted that she was strong enough to go back to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她反复地说她身体已经好了, 可以去上班了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They persisted in going there in spite of the bad weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管天气很坏, 他们还是坚持去那里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She persisted in singing although I asked her not to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管我叫她别唱歌, 她还是坚持要唱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of them persist in setting strict demands on themselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大多数人坚持严格要求自己。</font><br>\n
person	<h3>person</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a person to be shunned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个谁见着谁就躲避的人。</font><br>(语法)人称<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “He” is the third person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “他”是第三人称。</font><br>\n
personal	<h3>personal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>个人的; 私人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On his release the police returned all his personal effects.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被释放的时候, 警察退还了他的全部个人财物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a personal letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是私人信件。</font><br>亲自的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wanted to have a personal visit to that factory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他想亲自去参观那家工厂。</font><br>人身攻击的, 无礼的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't make personal abuse on her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不可对她进行人身攻击。</font><br>\n
personality	<h3>personality</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人格, 个性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His personality is in good taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的品格很高尚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a powerful personality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有坚强的个性。</font><br>人物, 名人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Einstein was a great personality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爱因斯坦是个伟大的人物。</font><br>人身攻击, 诽谤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There seemed to be a degree of personalities in her remarks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她话里有些人身攻击的成分。</font><br>\n
personally	<h3>personally</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>亲自地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The owner of the hotel welcomed us personally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆的主人亲自欢迎我们。</font><br>就个人而言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Personally, I think he is a very good man, but you may not agree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就个人而言, 我认为他是个很好的人, 但你也许不同意。</font><br>就人而论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like him personally, but I hate what he believes in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢他这个人, 但我讨厌他所信仰的东西。</font><br>\n
personnel	<h3>personnel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(总称)人员; 员工<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The personnel are not happy to change these rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全体工作人员对改变这些规定很不高兴。</font><br>人事部门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Personnel has[have] lost my tax forms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人事部门把我的税收表格给弄丢了。</font><br>\n
perspective	<h3>perspective</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>远景, 景<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can get a perspective of the whole city from here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从这里你可以看到城市的全景。</font><br>前途; 希望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We may get a clear perspective of the people's happy lives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们知道人民对幸福生活的展望。</font><br>透视<br>透视图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has drawn a good perspective.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她画了一幅很好的透视图。</font><br>观点, 想法<br>\n
persuade	<h3>persuade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>说服, 劝告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy persuades easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子听劝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is easy to persuade oneself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 说服自己往往很容易。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall persuade him to take the medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将说服他把药吃下去。</font><br>\n
persuasion	<h3>persuasion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>劝说; 说服(力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He decided to leave only after much persuasion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过多方劝说, 他才决定离开。</font><br>信仰<br>\n
pessimistic	<h3>pessimistic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>悲观的; 悲观主义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no reason to be pessimistic about the future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有理由对未来悲观。</font><br>\n
pet	<h3>pet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宠物; 宠儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want a cat as a pet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想要只宠物猫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That boy is the teacher's pet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男生是老师的得意门生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>宠爱, 抚摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be afraid to pet the dog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要怕抚摸这条狗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>〈非正〉亲吻; 爱抚<br>\n
petrol	<h3>petrol</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>汽油<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our car was useless for want of petrol.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于缺少汽油, 我们的汽车派不上用场。</font><br>\n
petroleum	<h3>petroleum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>石油<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They refined crude oil into various petroleum products.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将原油提炼成各种石油产品。</font><br>\n
phase	<h3>phase</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阶段, 时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a very important phase of history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它是一个非常重要的历史阶段。</font><br>(月亮、行星的)位相<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The phases of the moon include the new and the full moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 月相包括新月和满月。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分阶段计划[安排]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The modernization of the industry was phased over at 20-year period.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工业现代化分20年逐步实现。</font><br>\n
phenomenon	<h3>phenomenon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>现象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One of businesses of the sociologists is to study the social phenomenon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 社会学家的任务之一是研究社会现象。</font><br>特殊的人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Beethoven was a phenomenon among many musicians.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贝多芬是众多的音乐家中的天才。</font><br>\n
philosopher	<h3>philosopher</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>哲学家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A few years after his graduation from a university the man acquired the reputation of being a philosopher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个人从大学毕业后不久就获得了哲学家的名声。</font><br>豁达的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you've had as much trouble as I've had in my life, you need to be a bit of a philosopher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你像我在生活中吃过同样多的苦头, 那么你就得做个豁达的人。</font><br>\n
philosophy	<h3>philosophy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>哲学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He believed in the philosophy of Russell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他信奉罗素的哲学。</font><br>人生哲学, 人生观<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't sum up his whole philosophy in one sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法用一句话来概括他的全部人生观。</font><br>达观<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The philosophy of them during their worst sufferings impressed even their captors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在最困苦时仍处之泰然, 连捉住他们的人都深有感触。</font><br>\n
phone	<h3>phone</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>电话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you have no other business, you may hang up the phone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你没有其他事, 你就可以挂机了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打电话(给某人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must phone for a doctor at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须马上打电话请医生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary phoned that her son was lost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽打电话来说她儿子失踪了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She phoned me that she was leaving by the first train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她打电话告诉我说她要乘首班车走。</font><br>\n
photo	<h3>photo</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>照片, 相片<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(给…)拍照<br>\n
photograph	<h3>photograph</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>照片, 相片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's getting too dark to take photographs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对照相来说天太暗了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(给…)拍照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wonder what she photographs like.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道她在照片上是什么模样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scene photographed itself on my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一景象深印在我脑海中。</font><br>\n
phrase	<h3>phrase</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈语〉短语, 词组; 成语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's exactly the phrase I was looking for.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是我一直找的那个短语。</font><br>说法, 简洁的语句, 警句<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was—what is the phrase I'm looking for—not intimately acquainted with his subject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他——我该怎么说呢——对自己的课程很不熟悉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>叙述; 措词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moment I'd said, I could see that I'd phrased it wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我一说完那句话就知道措词不对。</font><br>\n
physical	<h3>physical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>身体的, 肉体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her spiritual beauty outshone her physical beauty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的心灵美胜于外表美。</font><br>物质的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one knows how large the physical universe is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人知道这物质世界有多大。</font><br>自然规律的, 按自然法则的<br>自然(界)的<br>物理学的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This change of the state is a physical change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种状态的变化是物理变化。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>身体检查, 体格检查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company insisted that he had a complete physical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该公司坚持要他做全面的体格检查。</font><br>\n
physician	<h3>physician</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>医生, 内科医生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a prominent physician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位著名的(内科)医生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In case of diabetes, physicians advise against the use of sugar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对于糖尿病患者, 医生告诫他们不要吃糖。</font><br>\n
physicist	<h3>physicist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物理学家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband is a world-known physicist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的丈夫是一位世界著名的物理学家。</font><br>\n
physics	<h3>physics</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物理学<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a degree in physics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她获有物理学学位。</font><br>\n
pianist	<h3>pianist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钢琴家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One of his ideals is to become a pianist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的理想之一是成为钢琴家。</font><br>\n
piano	<h3>piano</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钢琴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pianist played several pieces of music on a grand piano.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 钢琴家在一架大钢琴上弹了几首乐曲。</font><br>\n
pick	<h3>pick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>采, 摘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ripe apples pick easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 熟了的苹果容易摘。</font><br>啄, 叼, 啃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chicken picked about the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小鸡在院子里到处啄食。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog picked the bone clean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这狗把骨头啃得光光的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挑选, 选择<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It took her two hours to pick a dress that suited her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她花了两个小时才挑选了一件合适的衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dade picked a dress in fashion for his girlfriend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 达德给他的女朋友挑了一件时髦的裙子。</font><br>挖, 剔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's bad form to pick one's teeth in public.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在公共场合剔牙很失礼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>挑选; 选择<br>最佳选择, 精华<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the pick of this month's new films.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是本月新上映的影片中的精品。</font><br>镐, 锄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He breaks up strong ground with a pick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用镐刨开坚硬的地面。</font><br>\n
picnic	<h3>picnic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>郊游, 野餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One spring day the school arranged a picnic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一年春天, 学校安排了一次郊游。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The territory was too expensive for any purchaser, so the two couples parceled out a picnic lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这地方什么都贵, 因此, 两对夫妇分享一顿野餐。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>去郊游; 去野餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We picnicked on the beach yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我们去海边野餐了。</font><br>\n
picture	<h3>picture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>图画, 肖像; 照片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the pictures should be faced forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的图片都应朝前摆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stamp bears the picture of George Washington.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张邮票上印有乔治·华盛顿的肖像。</font><br>(生动的)描述, 写照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The writer paints a vivid picture of his early life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位作家生动地描绘了他早年的生活。</font><br>影片; 电影; 画面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This picture attracts a large audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部影片吸引了大量的观众。</font><br>美景, 景色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The park is a picture when flowers are in bloom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当鲜花盛开时, 这个公园的景色美极了。</font><br>情况, 事态, 局面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is hard to form a true picture of conditions in that country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很难想像那个国家的真实情况。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>绘画; 描绘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speaker pictured the suffering of the poor vividly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 演讲者很生动地描述了穷人的生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please picture what you have seen at the park for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请为我描述你在公园里看到的景象。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They pictured their manager as a buffoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把经理描绘成一个小丑。</font><br>想像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could picture all too easily the consequences of being caught.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能很容易地想像被抓住的后果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't quite picture him as a family man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很难想像他是个有家室的人。</font><br>\n
pie	<h3>pie</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>馅饼, 派<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you like some apple pie for dessert?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你想不想要些苹果派当甜点?</font><br>\n
piece	<h3>piece</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>片, 块, 段, 件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog seized the meat and bit a piece off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗抓住那块肉, 咬下了一块。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This piece of material may be cut up to make a pair of trousers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这段布料可以裁一条裤子。</font><br>断片, 碎块<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I dropped the plate and it fell to pieces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把盘子摔得粉碎。</font><br>部分, 部件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His claim to that piece of property is being challenged.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人就他对那份财产的声明提出异议。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>凑合; 凑成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She likes to piece one cloth to another when she does some sewing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当她做针线活时, 喜欢把一块布拼凑到另一块布上。</font><br>修补, 补缀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you think you can piece this torn curtain?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为你能把这撕破的窗帘补好吗?</font><br>\n
