prefer	<h3>prefer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>选择某事物(而不选择他事物); 更喜欢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She preferred that nobody should come to see her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她宁愿没有人来看她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd prefer vegetable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我宁愿吃蔬菜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He preferred to die instead of stealing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他宁愿死也不愿意偷窃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They prefer living in the suburbs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们更愿意住在郊区。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I should have preferred him to do it in a different way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我倒愿意他用另一种办法做。</font><br>对…起诉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since they are so young, the police have decided not to prefer charges.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于他们很年轻, 警方决定不对他们起诉。</font><br>\n
preferable	<h3>preferable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>更好的, 更适合的, 更可取的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Health without riches is preferable to riches without health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好。</font><br>\n
preference	<h3>preference</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>较喜欢的东西, 偏爱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My preference is that we (should) challenge the other groups to a friendly competition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢向别的组挑战, 来一个友谊竞赛。</font><br>优待, 优惠, 优先权<br>\n
pregnant	<h3>pregnant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>怀孕的, 怀胎的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a pregnant woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一名孕妇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is pregnant with her first child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她怀了第一胎。</font><br>含蓄的, 意味深长的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His words were followed by a pregnant pause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说完话, 接着是一段意味深长的停顿。</font><br>孕育着…的, 预示着…前景的<br>\n
prejudice	<h3>prejudice</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>成见, 偏见, 歧视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They accused him of having a prejudice against his women employees.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们指责他歧视女雇员。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使有偏见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His voice and manner prejudice his audience against him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的声音和举止都使听众反感。</font><br>不利于, 损害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your bad spelling may prejudice your chances of getting this job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你糟糕的拼写会妨碍你获得这个工作的机会。</font><br>\n
preliminary	<h3>preliminary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>初步的, 预备的, 开端的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are taking preliminary steps in preparation for a possible war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在为应付一场可能的战争做初步的准备。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准备工作, 初步行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are a lot of preliminaries to be gone through before you can visit certain foreigners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在访问某些外国人之前要做好许多准备工作。</font><br>\n
preparation	<h3>preparation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准备, 预备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't do enough preparation for his exam, and failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他考试前没有充分准备, 结果不及格。</font><br>安排, 筹备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Preparations for the Queen's visit are almost complete.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女王访问的筹备工作已基本就绪。</font><br>配制剂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The druggist suggested a preparation to relieve the ache.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 药剂师建议配一种止痛剂。</font><br>\n
prepare	<h3>prepare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>准备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You shouldn't have troubled yourself to prepare such a feast!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不该准备这样丰盛的饭菜, 这样太麻烦你了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>筹备, 进行各项准备工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The defence lawyers asked for another week to prepare their case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 辩护律师要求再给他们一周时间准备案件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is preparing herself as a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在为当教师做准备。</font><br>做好思想准备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He prepared himself to accept defeat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他做好认输的准备。</font><br>\n
preposition	<h3>preposition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>介词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lays a lot of emphasis on the usage of prepositions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把重点放在介词的使用上。</font><br>\n
prescribe	<h3>prescribe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>开药方; 指示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor prepared to prescribe a receipt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生准备开个药方。</font><br>规定, 指定遵守<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The law prescribes how to punish this crime.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律对如何处罚这种犯罪做出规定。</font><br>\n
presence	<h3>presence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>出席, 到场, 存在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your presence at the party is requested.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敬请光临。</font><br>仪表, 仪态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a tremendous physical presence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他仪表堂堂。</font><br>\n
present	<h3>present</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>出席的, 到场的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many of the group are present today?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天该组有多少人出席?</font><br>现在的, 目前的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He judged the present situation badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很糟糕地错估了当前形势。</font><br>存在的, 含有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Analysis showed that water was present in the mixture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 分析的结果表明混合物中含有水。</font><br>正在处理或讨论中的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We hesitated to accept the present proposal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对是否接受这一正在讨论的建议犹豫不决。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>现在; 目前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Writers of history books often attempt to integrate the past with the present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 写历史书的人总是力图把过去与现在联系起来。</font><br>礼物, 赠品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave me a handsome present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我一份很好的礼物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>出现; 出席; 显示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The question naturally presented itself in my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的脑海中自然而然地出现了这个问题。</font><br>介绍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Miss Smith, may I present Mr. Brown?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯小姐, 让我把布朗先生引荐给你好吗?</font><br>赠与; 交给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We presented him a basketball on his birthday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他生日那天我们送给他一个篮球。</font><br>\n
presentation	<h3>presentation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>提供, 显示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产。</font><br>外观<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The presentation of food can be as important as the taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 食物的外观和味道同样重要。</font><br>授予(物), 赠送(仪式)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Queen will make the presentation herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女王将亲手赠送礼品。</font><br>报告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His presentation was clear and incisive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的报告清晰而犀利。</font><br>表演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Last week we went to the presentation of a new play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上星期我们去观看了一场新剧的演出。</font><br>\n
presently	<h3>presently</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不久, 一会儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Presently I got the whole story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不久便了解到了全部情况。</font><br>现在, 目前<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is presently living in New York.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他目前住在纽约。</font><br>\n
preserve	<h3>preserve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must preserve our natural resources.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须保护自然资源。</font><br>维持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is the duty of the police to preserve public order.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 维护公共秩序是警察的职责。</font><br>\n
president	<h3>president</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>总统, 主席<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President fastened on the idea at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统立即拿定了这个主意。</font><br>(大学)校长; 会长; 董事长; 总裁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They approached the president with the suggestion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们找校长提出这一意见。</font><br>\n
press	<h3>press</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>压; 按; 挤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give the button a slight press and the music would die.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把按钮轻轻一按, 音乐就会停止。</font><br>印刷机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This type of press can feed out papers much faster than ordinary one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种印刷机印刷报纸比普通印刷机快得多。</font><br>出版社; 通讯社<br>报刊, 报界, 新闻界<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The press are[is] interested in sports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新闻界对体育运动感兴趣。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>按, 压<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Press the button, then the machine will work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按下电钮, 机器就能转动了。</font><br>逼迫, 强迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man was pressed to pay off his debt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人被逼还债。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>紧迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The matter is pressing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事情很紧迫。</font><br>\n
pressure	<h3>pressure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>压(力), 压强<br>强制, 压迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He changed his mind under the pressure from others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在别人的逼迫之下改变了主意。</font><br>\n
presumably	<h3>presumably</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>据推测, 大概, 可能<br>\n
pretend	<h3>pretend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>假装, 伪装<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp So you don't need to pretend, do you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所以你不必装假了, 对吧?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pretended illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他假装病了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pretended to fall over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他假装跌倒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They pretended that they were tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们假装是旅行者。</font><br>\n
pretty	<h3>pretty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>漂亮的, 可爱的, 精致的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They competed for a pretty girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们曾为一个漂亮女孩而竞争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What a pretty little house it is!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么小巧玲珑的房子啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Though she was pretty, she fell from grace at last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 虽然她长得很漂亮, 最后却失宠了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>相当; 颇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She seemed pretty satisfied with the result.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对那结果似乎相当满意。</font><br>\n
prevail	<h3>prevail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>说服, 劝说; 诱使<br>盛行, 流行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This fashion still prevails.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种式样仍在流行。</font><br>获胜; 占优势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Justice has prevailed; the guilty man has been punished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 正义得到伸张, 罪犯受到惩罚。</font><br>\n
prevent	<h3>prevent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>预防<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vitamin C is supposed to prevent colds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 维生素C可以预防感冒。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>阻止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall come tomorrow if nothing prevents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如没有什么阻碍的话, 我们明天来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nobody can prevent our getting married.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁也阻止不了我们结婚。</font><br>\n
previous	<h3>previous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>先前的, 以前的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The author mentioned it in the previous paragraph.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作者在前一段里提到这件事。</font><br>过早的, 过急的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be too previous about refusing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别过急地拒绝。</font><br>\n
price	<h3>price</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>价格, 价钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is rather cheap at this price.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这东西卖这个价钱是相当便宜的。</font><br>代价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No price is too high for winning their support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了获得他们的支持, 任何代价均在所不惜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>标价; 定价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They priced the garments before putting them on display.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们先给服装标好价格再摆出来卖。</font><br>问价; 估价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know enough about pictures to be able to price these pictures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不太懂画, 估计不出这些画的价钱。</font><br>\n
pride	<h3>pride</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>得意, 自豪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His pride in his achievements is justified.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为自己的成就而自豪, 这是理所当然的。</font><br>自尊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Having to accept the money was a blow to my pride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不得不接受这笔钱, 这是对我的自尊心的打击。</font><br>骄傲; 傲慢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has far too much pride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他太妄自尊大了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以…而自豪, 得意于…<br>\n
priest	<h3>priest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(基督教和罗马天主教的)神父, 牧师<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed his sin to the priest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向神父坦陈了自己的罪孽。</font><br>\n
primarily	<h3>primarily</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>主要地, 首要地; 本来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am primarily interested in history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我主要对历史感兴趣。</font><br>首先<br>\n
primary	<h3>primary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>首要的; 主要的; 基本的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The primary cause of Tom's failure is his laziness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆失败的根本原因是懒惰。</font><br>最初的; 初级的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People have no letters at the primary stage of civilization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在文明的初期, 人类是没有文字的。</font><br>\n
prime	<h3>prime</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>首要的; 主要的; 基本的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a matter of prime importance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个首要的问题。</font><br>最好的, 第一流的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Spring is the prime time for planting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 春天是种植的最好时节。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>全盛时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is at the prime of his career.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正处于事业的巅峰。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使准备好, 使完成准备工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have primed the explosive device.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们已使爆炸装置准备起爆。</font><br>事先指导, 事先向…提供情况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The witness at the trial had been carefully primed by defence lawyers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 被告律师对出席审讯的证人事先作了仔细的指导。</font><br>\n
primitive	<h3>primitive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>原始的, 早期的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Primitive man made himself primitive tools from stones and bones.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原始人用石块和骨头做原始的工具。</font><br>简单的; 粗糙的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a primitive boat out of some pieces of wood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用几块木头做了艘简易的小船。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>文艺复兴前的画家或雕刻家; 早期的艺术家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was an Italian primitive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位意大利早期的艺术家。</font><br>原始人, 原始事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The anthropology of the future will not be concerned above all else with primitives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 未来的人类学不会以原始人为主要的研究对象。</font><br>\n
prince	<h3>prince</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>王子, 亲王<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Prince Imperial passed away last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 皇太子昨晚去世了。</font><br>小国的君主<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In former times parts of India were ruled by princes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从前印度的一些地区由许多王公统治。</font><br>巨头, 巨子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His father is a merchant prince.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的父亲是一位商业巨擘。</font><br>\n
princess	<h3>princess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公主; 王妃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The youngest princess is only 13 years old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最小的公主才十三岁。</font><br>\n
principal	<h3>principal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最重要的; 主要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Drinking is a principal cause of highway deaths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酗酒是公路死亡事故的最主要的原因。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>负责人, 校长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the principal of this school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是该学校的校长。</font><br>资本, 本金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a shortage of principal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 资金有些短缺。</font><br>被代理人, 委托人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must consult my principals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得同委托人商量一下。</font><br>\n
principle	<h3>principle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>原则, 原理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each side declared that it would never abandon its principle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各方都说绝不放弃自己的原则。</font><br>准则, 规范<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has no principles at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他毫无行为准则。</font><br>操守, 道义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quite without principle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他完全没有道德观念。</font><br>工作原理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These machines both work on the same principle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两台机器的工作原理是一样的。</font><br>\n
print	<h3>print</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>印刷字体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book has clear print.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书印刷字体很清晰。</font><br>印成的图画, 图案, 版画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are identical prints made from a wood-block.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是用一块木板印出来的完全相同的画。</font><br>(由底片印出的)照片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prints were underdeveloped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些照片显影不足。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>印刷, 出版<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The publisher has printed 10, 000 copies of the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书出版社已印了一万册。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用印刷体写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please print plainly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请用印刷体清楚书写。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please print your address clearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请用印刷体写清楚你的地址。</font><br>冲洗(照片)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This snapshot hasn't printed very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张快照印出来不太清楚。</font><br>\n
printer	<h3>printer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>印刷业从业人员, 印刷工人<br>印刷机, 印照片机<br>打印机<br>\n
printing	<h3>printing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>印刷(术)<br>一次的印数, 印刷次数<br>用印刷体书写的英文字<br>\n
prior	<h3>prior</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>优先的; 在前的; 较早的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a prior engagement at five.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已经先有一个在五点钟的约会。</font><br>\n
priority	<h3>priority</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>优先权, 重点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have priority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有优先权。</font><br>优先考虑的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The development of the national economy is a top priority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发展国民经济是应予以最优先考虑的事。</font><br>\n
prison	<h3>prison</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>监狱, 看守所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a large prison in this town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 城里有座大监狱。</font><br>牢笼, 禁锢之地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom hates school; it's a prison to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆不喜欢上学, 学校对他来说好像是个牢笼。</font><br>监禁; 入狱; 坐牢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人认为监禁并不是治愈犯罪的良方。</font><br>\n
prisoner	<h3>prisoner</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>囚徒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two prisoners have escaped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有两个囚犯逃走了。</font><br>俘虏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy prisoners were kept in prison camps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌军俘虏拘禁于战俘集中营。</font><br>被夺去自由的人[动物]等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My work kept me a prisoner all summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个夏天我忙得不可开交。</font><br>\n
private	<h3>private</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>私人的; 个人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President is paying a private visit to Europe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统正在对欧洲作私人访问。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news about the President's private life caused a scandal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于总统私生活的消息激起了人们的愤慨。</font><br>秘密的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't repeat what I've told you to anyone, it's private.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要向别人转述我告诉你的事, 这是保密的。</font><br>私有的, 私营的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a private car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一辆私家车。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>列兵, 士兵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a buck private.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一名列兵。</font><br>\n
privilege	<h3>privilege</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>特权, 特别待遇<br>(因财富和社会地位而仅有部分人享有的)权益<br>特殊荣幸<br>\n
prize	<h3>prize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奖赏, 奖金, 奖品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was awarded the Nobel Prize for literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被授予诺贝尔文学奖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He received his prize with a proud step.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他骄傲地走去领奖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prizes were distributed among five winners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奖品分发给五位优胜者。</font><br>值得竞争的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp See what a prize I have found!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看我发了多大的一笔横财！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>珍视, 珍惜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother prizes her best china.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲珍藏着她的最好的瓷器。</font><br>\n
probable	<h3>probable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>很可能的, 大概的; 或有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The probable outcome of the talks is a compromise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会谈的结果很可能是妥协。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is probable to finish the job before dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天黑之前有可能完成这项工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is hardly probable that he will succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不会成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is probable that she might change her mind at the last minute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她大概会在最后时刻改变主意。</font><br>\n
probably	<h3>probably</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>大概; 或许; 可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He'll probably find himself in pocket in a good year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年头好时, 他会发现自己赚钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Next year I shall probably be looking for a job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明年我很可能找份工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're going on holiday soon, probably next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们很快要去度假了, 可能是下个月。</font><br>\n
probe	<h3>probe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>探索, 调查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police probe into organized crime led to several arrests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方对有组织犯罪的调查使数人受到拘捕。</font><br>探针, 探测器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A doctor used a probe to remove metal fragments from a wound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生用探针将伤口中的金属碎片取出。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>探索; 用探针(或探测器等)探查, 探测<br>\n
problem	<h3>problem</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>问题, 疑难问题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These problems are the result of years of bad management.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些问题是多年经营不善造成的后果。</font><br>习题, 思考题, 讨论题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Somehow he again made a mistake in solving the mathematical problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不知怎么地, 他在解这道数学题时又算错了。</font><br>\n
procedure	<h3>procedure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>程序, 步骤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a set procedure for making formal complaints.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要正式提出投诉是有固定程序的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They followed the usual procedures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们遵循正常程序。</font><br>手续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The procedure is standard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一手续是正常的。</font><br>\n
proceed	<h3>proceed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>前进; 行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was proceeding along the High Street in a northerly direction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我正在沿着大街向北走去。</font><br>进行; 继续下去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They will proceed to build another laboratory building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将着手建造另一座实验大楼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trial is proceeding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 审问正在进行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It proceeded smoothly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情进展得很顺利。</font><br>\n
process	<h3>process</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>过程, 进程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Adolescence is the process of going from childhood to maturity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青春期是从少年到成年的过渡期。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge is in the process of being built.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大桥正在建设中。</font><br>工序, 制作法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They adopted a new process for making steel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们采用了新的制钢工艺。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>加工; 处理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The factory processes leather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个厂加工皮革。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How fast does the computer process the data?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台计算机处理数据有多快?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>列队行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The congregation processed into the church.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教徒们排着队走进教堂。</font><br>\n
procession	<h3>procession</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>队伍, 行列<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A funeral procession filled the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 送葬队伍挤满了街道。</font><br>列队行进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The students entered the school in procession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们排队进入学校。</font><br>\n
proclaim	<h3>proclaim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>正式宣布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has proclaimed a new law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府已公布了一项新法令。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ringing bells proclaimed the birth of the prince.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 响亮的钟声宣布王子的诞生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The constitution proclaims that public property shall be inviolate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宪法宣告公共财产不可侵犯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government proclaimed both of them national heroes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府宣布他们两人为民族英雄。</font><br>显示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His accent proclaimed that he was a southerner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的口音表明他是南方人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His manners proclaimed him a gentleman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的风度显示出他是绅士。</font><br>\n
produce	<h3>produce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>生产, 产生, 出产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is an oil well that no longer produces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一口不再出油的井。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp However, this failed to produce the desired effect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 但是这并没有产生预期的效果。</font><br>制作, 创作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This famous author has produced little in the last few years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位著名的作家近几年来作品甚少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He produced three short plays between May and July.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从五月到七月创作了三部短剧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>出示, 提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He produced his railway ticket when asked to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当验票时, 他出示了火车票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl is an authentic girl.I'll produce her for you if you want.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个女孩很可靠, 如果你要见她, 我会带她来给你看看。</font><br>引起; 导致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hard work produces success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 努力工作就会成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jimmy's jokes produced a great deal of laughter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吉米的笑话逗得人们哈哈大笑。</font><br>出版; 上演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The troupe produced a new play last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧团昨晚上演了一部新剧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>产品, 农产品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is all locally grown produce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这都是本地农产品。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company markets its new produce.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该公司出售它的新产品。</font><br>\n
product	<h3>product</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>产品, 产物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My bike is a home product.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的自行车是国产的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Today's housing problems are the product of years of neglect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天的住房困难是多年来忽视的结果。</font><br>乘积<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The product of 4 and 10 is 40.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 四与十的乘积是四十。</font><br>\n
production	<h3>production</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生产, 制作; 产量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It plays an important role in developing production.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它在发展生产中起着重要作用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are aiming at a higher production level.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们旨在提高生产水平。</font><br>产品, 作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I read this writer's early productions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我读过这位作家的早期作品。</font><br>出示, 提供<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Entrance is permitted only on production of a ticket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 出示门票才可进入。</font><br>\n
productive	<h3>productive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>多产的, 富饶的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lived on the produc -tive land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们生活在富饶的土地上。</font><br>富有成效的; 有益的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a productive meeting that solved some problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们开了一个富有成效的会议, 解决了一些问题。</font><br>\n
productivity	<h3>productivity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>生产率, 生产力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Computers have greatly increased productivity in business offices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 计算机大大提高了商务办公室的工作效率。</font><br>\n
profession	<h3>profession</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>职业, 自由职业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Medicine is her destined profession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医学是她命中注定要从事的职业。</font><br>同业, 同行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The legal profession has[have] always resisted change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律界人士对变革总是加以抵制。</font><br>\n
professional	<h3>professional</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>职业的, 专业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a professional actress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是职业演员。</font><br>内行的, 有经验的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You had better get professional advice before buying stocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在买股票前, 最好听听行家的意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The arson is professional.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 放火是内行人干的。</font><br>有意的, 故意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The footballer made a professional foul.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位足球运动员故意犯规。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>具有某专业资格的人, 专业人士<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I need a professional to sort out my finances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我需要专业人士为我管理财务。</font><br>内行, 专家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a real professional.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她真内行。</font><br>专门职业者, 职业选手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professionals played football very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些专业足球运动员踢得棒极了。</font><br>\n
professor	<h3>professor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>教授<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professor adapted his lecture to his audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教授使他讲的课适合于听众。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prof. John Willis is our teacher of English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰·威利斯教授是我们的英语老师。</font><br>\n
proficiency	<h3>proficiency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>熟练, 精通<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His proficiency as a surgeon is well known.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他作为一名外科医生的水平是有名的。</font><br>\n
profile	<h3>profile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>侧面, 侧面像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew her profile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给她画侧面像。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat in profile to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他侧面朝我坐着。</font><br>轮廓, 外形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We could see the profile of a distant hill if it is very clear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果天气晴朗, 我们可看到远山的轮廓。</font><br>简介, 概况, 传略<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspaper publishes a profile of a leading sportsman every week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该报每周刊登一篇关于一名优秀运动员的简介。</font><br>\n
profit	<h3>profit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>利润, 收益, 赢利<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's profit you're after.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你所追求的是利润。</font><br>益处, 得益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the profit of doing that?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做那件事有什么好处呢?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>获益; 得利于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Taking these courses profited him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选修这些课程对他有好处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hoped to profit from his investments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他希望从投资中获利。</font><br>\n
program	<h3>program</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>程序<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are working hard to produce a program-controlled computer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在努力制造一台程序控制计算机。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>为(计算机)编制程序<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please program the computer to give me more information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给计算机编制程序以给我更多的信息。</font><br>\n
programme	<h3>programme</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>节目; 节目单<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The television programme is designed to educate and not merely to entertain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个电视节目不仅是为了娱乐而且是为了教育而设计的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you buy a programme?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你买节目单了吗?</font><br>计划; 规划; 大纲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They favour our programme with a large contribution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大力捐助, 以支持我们的计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>计划, 安排<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A trip to the museum is programmed for next Tuesday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 已计划下星期二去参观博物馆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their early training programmes them to be obedient and submissive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们早期受过的教育把他们训练得俯首帖耳、惟命是从。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've programmed you to appear on the stage next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们安排你在下星期出场演出。</font><br>\n
progress	<h3>progress</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>前进; 进展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our progress was embarrassed by lots of baggage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大量的行李使我们行进困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During these years the labour movement of the United States has made great progress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些年来, 美国的工人运动已取得巨大的进展。</font><br>进步, 发展<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Victorian Age is often boasted of as an age of progress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 维多利亚时代常常被夸耀为进步时代。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)进步; (使)进行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The work is progressing steadily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工作在稳步地取得进展。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In order to progress their project smoothly, they revised the plan several times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了使工程能顺利进展, 他们几次修改方案。</font><br>\n
progressive	<h3>progressive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不断前进的, 有进展的, 逐渐上升的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a progressive course in English study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是英语学习的渐进课程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a progressive disease and he would suffer more and more.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病情逐渐加剧, 他将忍受越来越大的痛苦。</font><br>进步的, 先进的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a progressive idea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种进步的思想。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a progressive firm that uses the most modern systems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一家使用非常现代化系统的先进企业。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many young politicians are progressive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多年轻的政治家是进步的。</font><br>\n
prohibit	<h3>prohibit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>禁止; 阻止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 禁止出售含酒精的饮料。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The high cost prohibits the widespread use of the drug.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该药昂贵, 影响广泛应用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rainy weather and fog prohibited flying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多雨的天气和雾妨碍了飞行。</font><br>\n
project	<h3>project</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>规划<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you project a new working scheme for us?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能为我们设计一个新的工作计划吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He project-ed himself into the hero's situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他设想自己处于那个英雄的处境中。</font><br>抛; 投; 射<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had no screen, so I projected the slides onto an old white sheet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有幕布, 所以我把幻灯片投射到一块旧的白床单上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>伸出, 突出; 表达特点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stood at a balcony that projects over the entrance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他站在入口上面突出的阳台上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wall is projected in the middle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙壁中部凸出。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>项目, 计划, 方案, 课题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In their geography class, the children are doing a special project on North American Indians.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在地理课上, 孩子们正在做一个有关北美印第安人的特别作业。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new dam is a major construction project, funded by the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新水坝是政府出资建造的一个大工程项目。</font><br>\n
prominent	<h3>prominent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>突起的, 凸出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a prominent nose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一个突起的鼻子。</font><br>显著的; 突出的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our house is the most prominent one in the street; it's painted red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的房子是街上最突出的, 它被漆成了红色。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A single tree in a field is prominent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 田野中独立的一棵树是极为明显的。</font><br>杰出的, 著名的, 卓越的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a prominent physician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位著名的医生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is prominent in science.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是科学界杰出的人物。</font><br>\n
promise	<h3>promise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>允诺; 答应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't promise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能应允。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want you to promise me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想让你对我做出承诺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I promised that I would write regularly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我答应要经常写信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't give you the book; I've promised it to Susan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能把这本书送给你, 因为我已经答应把它送给苏珊了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She promised me to try her best to help him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她向我保证要尽力帮助他。</font><br>有…希望; 预示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He promises highly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的前途远大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A timely snow promises a good harvest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 瑞雪兆丰年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She promised to be a brilliant musician.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有迹象表明她会成为有才华的音乐家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father seems to promise himself his first journey abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲好像盼望他的第一次海外旅行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>承诺, 诺言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to come with you but that's not a promise, don't rely on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我愿意和你一起去, 但这不是允诺, 别指望我一定去。</font><br>希望, 前途<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You show promise as a musician but your lack of practice is keeping you back.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有希望成为音乐家, 但是缺乏实践会影响你的发展。</font><br>\n
promising	<h3>promising</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有希望的, 有前途的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have found a promising iron deposit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经发现了一个有开采价值的铁矿床。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The results of the experiments are very promising.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 实验的结果充满了希望。</font><br>\n
promote	<h3>promote</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提升, 提拔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son's just been promoted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我儿子刚被提拔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They promoted him to be a general.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将他提拔为将军。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They promoted him captain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们提升他为上尉。</font><br>筹划, 发起, 创立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are promoting a boxing match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在筹划一次拳击比赛。</font><br>推销<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was in town to promote his new books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在城里推销他的新书。</font><br>〈正〉促进; 推动; 增进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The organization works to promote the trade between nations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该组织旨在促进各国之间的贸易。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Milk promotes health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛奶可增进健康。</font><br>\n
prompt	<h3>prompt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>立刻的, 迅速的, 准时的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prompt payment of bills is greatly appreciated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如蒙即期结账, 则不胜感激。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't understand it; he's usually very prompt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不明白这是怎么回事, 他通常很准时的。</font><br>准时到达的; 行动迅速的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company was prompt in its response to these accusations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该公司对这些指责迅速做出反应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's always prompt to criticize other people's ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对别人想出的主意总是迫不及待地进行评价。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>为(演员)提示台词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you prompt for us at the performance?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 演出时你给我们提示台词好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actress needed to be prompted frequently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那女演员经常需要提示。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>促使, 推动, 引起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sight of the ships prompted thoughts of his distant home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到船使他想起遥远的家乡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What prompted him to be so generous?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是什么原因使得他如此大方呢?</font><br>为(发言者)提示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actress needed to be prompted frequently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那女演员经常需要提示。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His evasive reply prompted me to ask another question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的含糊其辞的答复促使我又提了一个问题。</font><br>\n
pronoun	<h3>pronoun</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈语〉代词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “I”, “you”and “he” are all personal pronouns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I, you和he都是人称代词。</font><br>\n
pronounce	<h3>pronounce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>发音, 读<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please pronounce after me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请跟我发音。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the student who pronounces best in the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是班上发音最好的学生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>宣布; 宣称<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Has judgement been pronounced yet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 判决宣布了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pronounced that we were dismissed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他宣布我们被解雇了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jeweller pronounced the diamond to be genuine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 珠宝商宣称这钻石是真的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>宣判<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The judge pronounced against the prisoner, and he was led away by the policeman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法官对囚犯宣告判决后, 警察就把他带了下去。</font><br>\n
pronunciation	<h3>pronunciation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(一种语言的)发音(法)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Chinese differs from English in pronun-ciation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汉语和英语在发音上有差别。</font><br>(某个单词的)读法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wrong pronunciation of the word is sanctioned by public usage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们接受了这个字的错误读法, 因为大家都这样念。</font><br>(一个人的)发音, 发音方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please correct my pronunciation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请纠正我的发音。</font><br>\n
proof	<h3>proof</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>证明, 论证; 证据, 证物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the claim capable of proof?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这要求能证明是合理的吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blood on his shoes was a proof of his guilt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他鞋子上的血迹就是他犯罪的证据。</font><br>校样, 样张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Miss Ada has just sent me the proofs of her new book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 埃达小姐刚把她新书的校样送给我。</font><br>\n
proper	<h3>proper</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>适合的; 适当的; 适用的; 恰当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave us a proper example.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我们举了一个恰当的例子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To be rude to the old is not proper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对老人粗鲁是不适当的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It isn't proper to act like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那样的行为是不恰当的。</font><br>遵守规则的; 正确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is proper that you should ask your father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你当然应该问你的父亲。</font><br>严格意义的; 本身的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're in a proper mess now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们现在真是一团糟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That guy is a proper terror.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家伙真是讨厌。</font><br>合乎体统的; 正派的<br>固有的; 特有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Language is proper to mankind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 语言是人类所特有的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nesting instinct is proper to birds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 筑巢是鸟类的本能。</font><br>\n
property	<h3>property</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>财产; 资产; 所有物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That car is my property; you mustn't use it without my permission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆车是我的财产, 你必须得到我的允许才能使用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The jewels were her personal property.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些首饰是她的私人财产。</font><br>房地产, 不动产; (一处)房地产<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He invested his money in property.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他进行房地产投资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several properties in this street are for sale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条街上有几处房地产正在出售。</font><br>性质, 特性, 性能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These plants have medicinal properties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些植物具有药物效用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oil has the property of floating on water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油有浮在水上的特性。</font><br>\n
proportion	<h3>proportion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>均衡; 相称, 协调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His success bore no proportion to his abilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的成就与他的才能不相称。</font><br>一物与他物在数量、大小等方面的关系; 比例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The proportion of imports to exports is worrying the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 进口与出口的比例令政府担忧。</font><br>部分; 份儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A large proportion of the children come to school by bus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很大一部分儿童乘公共汽车上学。</font><br>\n
proportional	<h3>proportional</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>比例的, 成比例的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dwarf's long arms were not proportional to his height.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那侏儒的长臂与他的身高不成比例。</font><br>\n
proposal	<h3>proposal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>提议; 建议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They presented concrete proposals for improvement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们提出了具体的改进建议。</font><br>求婚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had had many proposals but preferred to remain single.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人向她求过婚, 但她愿过独身生活。</font><br>\n
propose	<h3>propose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>提议; 建议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They proposed to make arrangement beforehand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们提议事先做好安排。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I proposed to go to London on Tuesday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我打算星期二到伦敦去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I propose resting for an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我建议休息一小时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I propose that he should leave now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我建议他现在就走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I propose him as a candidate for the presidency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我提名他为总统候选人。</font><br>\n
prospect	<h3>prospect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>景象, 景色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp From the top of the hill there's a beautiful prospect over the valley.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从山顶俯视, 山谷间的美景一览无余。</font><br>前景; 前途<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is in high spirits at the prospects.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰对前景充满希望。</font><br>可能成为主顾的人; 有希望的候选人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a good prospect for the national team.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有可能选入国家队。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>勘探; 勘察<br>\n
prosperity	<h3>prosperity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>幸运; 顺利<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wish you the life of happiness and prosperity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我祝你生活幸福、万事如意。</font><br>兴旺, 繁荣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新的协议唤起了人们对繁荣与和谐前景的期望。</font><br>\n
prosperous	<h3>prosperous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>成功的, 繁荣的, 兴旺的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It used to be a very prosperous town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城镇过去很繁荣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After their misfortunes the family slowly became prosperous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 灾难过后, 他们家又慢慢地兴盛起来。</font><br>\n
protect	<h3>protect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保护; 保卫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The troops were there to protect the townspeople.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队驻扎在那里以保护市民。</font><br>关税保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country's car industry is so strongly protected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国对本国的汽车工业严加保护。</font><br>\n
protection	<h3>protection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保护, 保卫<br>贸易保护措施<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Textile workers favoured protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纺织工人拥护贸易保护措施。</font><br>防护物<br>(向歹徒缴纳的)保护费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was paying out half his profits as protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把所得利润的一半交给歹徒作为保护费。</font><br>\n
protective	<h3>protective</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>保护的, 防护的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We feel safe with a protective device in the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们因为家里有了防护装置而感到安全。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mother naturally feels protective towards her children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做母亲的天生要保护自己的孩子。</font><br>显示保护意愿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's too protective towards her children; she should let them be more independent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对孩子太过于爱护, 她应当给他们更多的独立性。</font><br>\n
protein	<h3>protein</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蛋白质<br>\n
protest	<h3>protest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抗议; 反对<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't pass the matter by without a protest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能对此事视而不见, 我要提出抗议。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>声明; 抗议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were formally protesting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正式提出抗议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He protested the decision made by the committee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抗议委员会做出的决议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accused man protested his innocence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 被告申明自己是无辜的。</font><br>\n
proud	<h3>proud</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有自尊心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had been too proud to ask for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的自尊心太强, 从不求助于人。</font><br>自豪的, 得意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are proud of our motherland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们为祖国感到自豪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was proud of having such a good friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为有这样的好朋友而自豪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are proud for you to win the championship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们为你赢得冠军而骄傲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are very proud that a pupil from our school has won the prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们学校的一个小学生得了奖, 我们感到很自豪。</font><br>骄傲的, 傲慢的, 妄自尊大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is too proud to see her own mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她太骄傲了, 看不到自己的错误。</font><br>\n
prove	<h3>prove</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>证明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were not able to prove these suspicions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些怀疑他们无法证实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can you prove that you are right?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你如何能证明你是正确的呢?</font><br>检验; 试验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The students are asked to prove the purity of copper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要求学生们检验铜的纯度。</font><br>\n
provide	<h3>provide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>提供; 供给; 供应<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>规定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The law provides that valuable ancient buildings should be preserved by the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法律规定有价值的古代建筑必须由政府来保管。</font><br>\n
provided	<h3>provided</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>如果, 假如<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Provided it's fine we will have a pleasant holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果天气良好, 我们的假日将过得非常愉快。</font><br>只有…才…; 以…为条件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will go, provided you go too.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有你去, 我才去。</font><br>\n
province	<h3>province</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>省份, 大行政区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Canada is divided into 10 provinces and 2 territories.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 加拿大分为十个省和两个区。</font><br>范围, 职责, 领域<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sales forecasts are outside my province—you should discuss them with the sales manager.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 销售预测不是我的领域——你应该同销售经理讨论这个问题。</font><br>\n
provision	<h3>provision</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>供应, 提供, 供给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government is responsible for the provision of education for all the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府有责任向所有儿童提供教育。</font><br>准备, 防备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made no provision against the unforeseen expenses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有准备意外费用。</font><br>食物和饮料<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The campers got their provisions at the village shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 野营者在乡村商店买食物。</font><br>规定, 条款, 条件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They failed to carry out the provisions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没有按照规定办事。</font><br>\n
provoke	<h3>provoke</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>激起; 惹怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her constant nagging provoked him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不断地唠叨激怒了他。</font><br>\n
psychological	<h3>psychological</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>心理的; 精神的<br>心理学的; 关于心理学的<br>\n
psychology	<h3>psychology</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>心理学<br>心理; 心理特点<br>\n
pub	<h3>pub</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>酒店, 酒馆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They've gone down to the pub for a drink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们到酒店喝酒去了。</font><br>\n
public	<h3>public</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>公众的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a matter of great public interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个公众普遍关心的问题。</font><br>公共的, 公用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must be careful of public property.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须爱护公共财物。</font><br>公开的, 当众的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公众, 大众, 民众<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The public is[are] the best judge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公众是最好的裁判。</font><br>…界; 某一阶层的人们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a large circulation in the musical public.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在音乐界销路很广。</font><br>\n
publication	<h3>publication</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>发表, 公布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has delayed publication of the trade figures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府已将贸易统计数字延后公布。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They don't think this article is suitable for publication.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们认为这篇文章不宜发表。</font><br>出版, 刊行, 发行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is ready for publication.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书已准备好, 随时可以出版。</font><br>出版物, 书刊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The library gets the usual monthly publications.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家图书馆订的是那些常见的月刊。</font><br>\n
publicity	<h3>publicity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>公众的注意, 众所周知<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The singer star's marriage got a lot of publicity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位歌星的婚事引起了公众的关注。</font><br>宣传, 宣扬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The British press has given considerable publicity to it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国出版界已经对它作了很多宣传。</font><br>\n
publish	<h3>publish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>出版<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The only daily newspaper in the city did not publish yesterday because of a strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天市内惟一的日报因罢工而没出版。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has recently published her fourth book with the Commercial Press.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最近在商务印书馆出版了她的第四本专著。</font><br>公布<br>\n
pull	<h3>pull</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拉, 扯, 拔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse on the left side isn't pulling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 左边的那匹马没有用力拉车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's go over and help them pull the cart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们过去帮他们拉车。</font><br>拉过来, 拉动, 移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You push and I'll pull.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你推我拉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She pulled the fence to pieces with her bare hands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用双手把篱笆拆了下来。</font><br>划(船)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This boat pulls four oars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条船是由四只桨划的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>赢得, 招来, 吸引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's not popular enough to pull many votes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因不受爱戴而未能赢得更多选票。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's hoping to pull the girl with his new car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他希望用自己那辆新车吸引那个女孩子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拖, 拉, 拔<br>爬, 攀登<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a long hard pull for him to get to the top of his position.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他费了九牛二虎之力终于爬上了最高位置。</font><br>影响力, 吸引力<br>\n
pulse	<h3>pulse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>脉搏<br>脉冲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This radar is operated by an electronic pulse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台雷达依靠电子脉冲来操作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(心脏)跳动; 脉动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His heart pulsed with excitement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的心激动得怦怦直跳。</font><br>\n
pump	<h3>pump</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>泵, 打气筒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the farm there was an old-fashioned pump for drawing water from a well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个农场有一台老式的用来从井里抽水的抽水机。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用抽水机汲水; 给…打气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was pump-ing away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正用抽水机抽水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is autumn and they are pumping water out of the swimming pool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入秋了, 他们正在抽游泳池的水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pump the tire up hard before going out on the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在出去上路之前, 要把轮胎打足气。</font><br>\n
punch	<h3>punch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用拳猛击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He punched the man on the head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一拳狠狠打在那个男人的头上。</font><br>打孔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy punched holes in the paper so it would fit in his notebook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩在纸上打洞以便装在笔记本上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猛击, 拳打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳。</font><br>冲床, 穿孔机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This kind of punch is easily operated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种冲床易于操作。</font><br>力量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a speech with plenty of punch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他作了一次有力的发言。</font><br>\n
punctual	<h3>punctual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>严守时刻的; 准时的; 正点的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not myself a particularly punctual person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我本人不是一个严守时间的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have to go now because I must be punctual for class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我现在不得不走了, 因为我得准时去上课。</font><br>\n
punish	<h3>punish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>罚, 处罚, 惩罚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The parents punished their disobedient child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父母惩罚了他们不听话的孩子。</font><br>粗暴地对待, 痛打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He punished his opponent with fierce punches to the body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他猛击对手的身体。</font><br>\n
punishment	<h3>punishment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>处罚, 受罚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you have capital punishment in your country?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贵国有死刑吗？</font><br>\n
pupil	<h3>pupil</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>学生, 小学生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupils replied in one voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小学生异口同声地回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tenor was a pupil of a singer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位男高音歌手师承一位歌唱家。</font><br>瞳孔<br>\n
purchase	<h3>purchase</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>购买<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We purchased a car before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以前我们买过一辆车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Farm and sideline products of the peasants are purchased by the state at reasonable prices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农民的农副产品由国家按合理价格收购。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>购买, 购置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They made the purchase of a car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们购置了一辆小汽车。</font><br>买到的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That hat was a good purchase.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那顶帽子买得好。</font><br>\n
pure	<h3>pure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>纯的; 纯净的; 贞洁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is pure drinking water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是纯净的饮用水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a pure young girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个纯真无邪的姑娘。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is pure in heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她心灵纯洁。</font><br>血统纯的, 纯种的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That girl is a pure Red Indian.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个女孩是血统纯正的美洲印第安人。</font><br>纯理论的; 非实用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's entirely pure research.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这完全是纯理论研究。</font><br>单纯的; 仅仅的; 完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a pure accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这全然是意外事故。</font><br>\n
purple	<h3>purple</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>紫的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How beautiful the purple flower is!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那朵紫色的花多漂亮啊！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His hands were purple with cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的双手冻紫了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>紫色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is in purple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着紫色的衣服。</font><br>紫(红)衣, 紫(红)袍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those born to the purple are destined to live in the public eye.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些出身贵族的人们的一言一行势必要受到公众的注意。</font><br>\n
