purpose	<h3>purpose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>目的; 意图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He returned to his homeland with the purpose of serving his own people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他返回祖国, 意在为祖国人民服务。</font><br>作用; 用途; 效果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This machine serves a double purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部机器有双重用途。</font><br>意志; 毅力; 决心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know she is steady in her purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道她意志坚定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>有意, 打算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They purpose a further attempt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们意图做进一步的尝试。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He purposes to write the history of India.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他意欲撰写印度史。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I purpose going to London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想去伦敦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He purposed that he would marry after graduation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打算毕业后结婚。</font><br>\n
purse	<h3>purse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钱包; 女用小提包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's no money left in the purse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 钱包里没有钱了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her red purse matches her shirt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的红手袋和她的裙子很相配。</font><br>钱; 资财<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who ever holds the purse rules the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有钱就有势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They collected a purse to help the flood victims.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们收集了一笔钱以帮助洪灾难民。</font><br>款项, 奖金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The footballer was unwilling to play for a purse of less than 1, 000, 000.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这名足球运动员不愿为100万美元以下的奖金踢球。</font><br>\n
pursue	<h3>pursue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>追捕, 追击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policemen pursued the bank robbers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察追捕银行抢劫犯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Foxes, wild cats and other animals pursue the hare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狐狸、野猫及其他一些动物都捕食野兔。</font><br>追求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to pursue an easy and comfortable life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开始追求安逸舒适的生活。</font><br>继续; 从事, 经营<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pursued his studies after leaving school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他离开学校后仍继续进行研究。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country has always pursued a policy of peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国一直奉行和平政策。</font><br>\n
push	<h3>push</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>推, 推动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door pushes easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这门一推就开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They pushed past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从旁边挤了过去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you push the car, I'll steer it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你来推车, 我就来驾车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She pushed the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把门推开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She pushed the drawer closed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把抽屉推上了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>对…施加压力, 按<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pushed the button.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他按动按钮。</font><br>逼迫, 驱策, 敦促<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One has to push the child or she will do no work at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子要有人督促, 否则她什么也不干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you always push him too hard, he may make mistakes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要是你总逼他太紧, 他可能会出错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He pushed her to make a decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他催她快做决定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>推<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He opened the gate with a push.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一下就把大门推开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gate slid opened at the push of a button.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一按电钮, 大门就滑动开启。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They gave the car a push to start it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了使汽车起动, 他们推了它一下。</font><br>大规模攻势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy made a push on the western front.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人在西线发动猛攻。</font><br>毅力; 推动力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has plenty of push.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很有进取心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hasn't enough push.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他缺乏闯劲。</font><br>\n
put	<h3>put</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>放; 置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy forgot where he put his textbook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩忘记把课本放在什么地方了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll put you a chair over there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在那边给你放一把椅子。</font><br>使处于(某种状态)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a wonderful scheme, and he's just the man to put it into effect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个很好的计划, 而他正是实施这个计划的人选。</font><br>表达, 叙述, 说明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The councillors put the problem of downtown parking before the mayor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 议员们向市长提出了市内停车的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have put the case clearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把情况讲清楚了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to put a question to the speaker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想向演讲者提个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A short note put the matter right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一封短函把事件解释清楚了。</font><br>\n
puzzle	<h3>puzzle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使迷惑, 使难解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The letter puzzled me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这封信使我迷惑不解。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>为难, 伤脑筋, 苦思<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spelling of English is often puzzling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语的拼写法常常使人伤脑筋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He puzzled his brains to find an answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他冥思苦想寻求答案。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>智力测验, 智力玩具, 谜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shows a great interest in crossword puzzles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对填字游戏表现出很大兴趣。</font><br>难题; 令人费解的事[人]; 谜一般的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their reason for doing it is still a puzzle to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为什么干那件事仍然让我费解。</font><br>\n
quake	<h3>quake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>颤抖, (因害怕或寒冷而)发抖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She quaked with fright.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她吓得发抖。</font><br>(地面)震动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our house is quaking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的房屋在震动。</font><br>\n
qualification	<h3>qualification</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>合格证书<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jack has obtained a medical qualification.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰克取得了行医资格证书。</font><br>资格, 条件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have all qualifications to do the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你有资格做这份工作。</font><br>限制, 限定性条件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The contract has several qualifications for both parties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该合同对双方都提出了几个限制性条件。</font><br>\n
qualify	<h3>qualify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)具有资格, (使)合格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I won't qualify until next year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我明年才具备资格。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This certificate qualifies the products.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份证书证明产品合格。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His past experience qualified him to handle such a delicate matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过去的经验使他有办法处理好这件微妙的事情。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>限定, 修饰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to qualify my last statement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想修正一下最后一句话。</font><br>\n
quality	<h3>quality</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>质, 质量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are leather goods of high quality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是高质量的皮革制品。</font><br>优点, 优质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He possesses the quality of inspiring confidence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有本事能让别人信任他。</font><br>品质, 特征, 特性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sympathy is his best quality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 同情心是他最好的品质。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Decision is a quality requisite to a commander.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 决断是指挥员必须具备的品质。</font><br>特点, 特色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One quality of this kind of timber is that it can be sawn easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种木料的一个特点是容易锯开。</font><br>\n
quantity	<h3>quantity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>数目, 数量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mathematics is the science of pure quantity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数学是研究纯数量的科学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What quantity do you require?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要求多大的数量?</font><br>量, 大小<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A large quantity of beer was sold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 售出了大量的啤酒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are only a small quantity of flowers left in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 花园里只剩下少量的花了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Quantities of food were spread out on the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多食品被摊放在桌子上。</font><br>\n
quarrel	<h3>quarrel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>争吵, 不和, 口角<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The quarrel resulted in his mother leaving the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 争吵导致了他母亲离家出走。</font><br>抱怨…的原因[理由]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is part of my quarrel against them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是我与他们争吵的部分原因。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>争吵, 争辩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now, boys, don't quarrel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们, 不要吵了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know you've been quarrelling a good deal lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道你们近来时常吵嘴。</font><br>不同意; 挑剔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't quarrel with the decision of the court; it's very fair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不能反对法院的判决, 它判得很公正。</font><br>\n
quarter	<h3>quarter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>四分之一<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three quarters of the theatre was full.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧院的座位坐满了四分之三。</font><br>每小时之前或之后的一刻钟, 第十五分钟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will have a bad quarter of an hour of it, I assure you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我敢保证, 你准得受一刻钟的罪。</font><br>两角五分的硬币; 四分之一元<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It'll cost you a quarter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得花两角五分钱。</font><br>三个月, 一个季度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The output value in the first quarter was 10 percent over the same period of last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第一季度产值比去年同期高出百分之十。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the first week the moon is in its first quarter, in the third week it is in its last quarter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第一个星期月亮处于上弦月的状态, 第三个星期月亮处于下弦月的状态。</font><br>上弦[下弦]; 月球周期的四分之一<br>方向; 地区; 城镇的一部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city has a busy Chinese quarter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市有个热闹的华人区。</font><br>住处; 营房<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lives in single quarters now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在她住在单人营房。</font><br>人, 团体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This decision is seen in some quarters as a change of policy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项决定被一些人看成是政策的改变。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…四等分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should quarter a pineapple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该把这个菠萝分成四等份。</font><br>使(士兵)驻扎, 供…住宿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The troops were quartered in the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军队驻扎在城里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are quartered in a beautiful villa.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们住在一栋漂亮的别墅里。</font><br>\n
queen	<h3>queen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>女王<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Queen of England is a hereditary ruler.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国女王是世袭的统治者。</font><br>王后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The royal family consists of the king and queen and their relatives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 王室成员包括国王、王后及其亲属。</font><br>出众的女性[地方, 事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the most famous of all American movie queens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是全美最著名的影后。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp London is the queen of British cities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伦敦位列英国各城市之首。</font><br>雌蜂, 雌蚁; 蜂王, 蚁王<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A hive can't exist without a queen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜂房不可无蜂王。</font><br>\n
quest	<h3>quest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>探求, 寻找<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man will suffer many disappointments in his quest for truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人类在探索真理过程中必然会遭受挫折。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>寻找; 探索<br>\n
question	<h3>question</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>问题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I asked you a question and you didn't answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我问了你一个问题, 但你没有回答。</font><br>议题; 难题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the end of the meeting, a number of important questions were still unresolved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议结束时, 一些重大的问题仍悬而未决。</font><br>疑问, 不能肯定的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you have any questions, ask the director.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 若有问题, 你可问主任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been some question as to whether or not the President will resign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统是否会辞职还不确定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a difficult question to decide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个难以决定的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think that I've managed to solve the question of what to buy my mother for her birthday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为我自己解决了给妈妈买什么东西来作生日礼物的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are questions that lie outside the purview of our inquiry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些都不是属于我们调查范围的问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>问(某人)问题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I prefer questioning my pupils to lecturing them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢少讲课, 多提问我的学生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police questioned the witness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察询问了证人。</font><br>对(某事物)表示[感到]怀疑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I would never question his honesty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我绝不会怀疑他的诚实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I question if you can do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对你能否做这件事表示怀疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He questioned whether she could have arrived in time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怀疑她是否能准时到达。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It can't be questioned that we will win the final victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将最终取得胜利, 这是确定无疑的。</font><br>\n
queue	<h3>queue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(人或车辆)行列, 长队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To what window are you standing in a queue?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在排哪个窗口的队?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp By 10 o'clock a long queue had formed outside the bank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到十点钟时, 银行门外已经排成了长队。</font><br>\n
quick	<h3>quick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>快的, 迅速的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They took a quick train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们乘坐快车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who will be there quickest?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁将最快到那里?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quick at calculation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他计算的速度很快。</font><br>短时间做成的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After a quick courtship they married.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们经过一番短暂的恋爱就结婚了。</font><br>易受激发的; 敏感的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is quick at taking offence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她容易生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quick to take offence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他容易发怒。</font><br>灵活的, 灵敏的; 伶俐的, 机警的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing can escape her quick ear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有什么能逃过她灵敏的耳朵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her quick wits saved the boy's life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她靠机智救了那男孩一命。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quick of perception.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他感觉灵敏。</font><br>聪明的, 有能力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son is a quick student and always has high grade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我儿子是个聪明的学生, 总是得高分。</font><br>\n
quiet	<h3>quiet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>轻声的, 安静的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was so quiet that you could hear a pin drop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 安静得连掉一根针的声音都听得见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can't you keep the children quiet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能不能让孩子们静一静?</font><br>不激动的; 平静的; 宁静的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a quiet inoffensive person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位安静、不冒犯别人的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lived in a quiet village near the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住在海边的一个僻静的村子里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea seems quieter now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大海现在显得平静多了。</font><br>不起眼的, 不显眼的; 暗中的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can I have a quiet word with you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我能私下和你谈几句吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>安静下来; 使…安静, 平静<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The principal tried to quiet the students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校长试图让学生们安静下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Boon walked in and quieted the engine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 布恩走进来, 关掉发动机。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The aspirin seems to quiet the headache.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阿司匹林似乎使头痛减轻了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He quieted my suspicions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他消除了我的疑虑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The frightened child was quieted by his mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈正在安慰那个受惊吓的孩子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crying boy must be quieted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个正哭的孩子必须得到安慰。</font><br>\n
quit	<h3>quit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>从(某处)离开; 离去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If I don't get a pay rise I'll quit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 若不给加薪, 我就不干了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've quit my job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我辞职了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I got my present job when I quit the army.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我退伍后得到了现在这份工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>停止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father has quit smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲已戒烟了。</font><br>\n
quite	<h3>quite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地; 整体地; 十分地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you quite ready?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你完全准备好了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news is quite amazing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息十分惊人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I quite like some rock music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很喜欢某些摇滚乐。</font><br>有几分; 颇; 相当<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was quite good, but not perfect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它相当不错, 但还不完善。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a quite skilled worker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个相当熟练的工人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our meeting in London was quite by chance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在伦敦的会面颇为偶然。</font><br>〈尤英〉同意, 不错; 对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quite drunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他确实喝醉了。</font><br>\n
quiver	<h3>quiver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>微颤, 抖动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bird quivered its wings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只鸟抖动它的翅膀。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blades of grass quivered in the wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 草叶随风颤动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使震动<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抖动; 颤音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you feel a quiver of her hands?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你感觉到她的手在发抖吗?</font><br>\n
quiz	<h3>quiz</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>问答比赛(游戏)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took part in a television quiz and won a prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他参加了一个电视知识竞赛并得了奖。</font><br>〈尤美〉小测验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are having a quiz now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正进行小测验。</font><br>\n
quotation	<h3>quotation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>引用, 引述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Support your argument by quotation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 引用他人的话来证明你的论点。</font><br>引文, 引语, 语录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He finished his speech with a quotation from Shakespeare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讲话结束时引用了莎士比亚的语录。</font><br>时价, 报价, 行情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The insurance company requires three quotations for repairs to the car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保险公司要修理这辆汽车的三家修理厂的报价单。</font><br>\n
quote	<h3>quote</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>引用, 援引<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The author frequently quoted Shakespeare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作者不断地引用莎士比亚的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't quote me on this, but I think the company is in serious difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要向公司重复我所说的, 可我认为公司面临着严重的困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She quoted from the report to support her point.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她援引报告中的话来支持自己的论点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提到…以支持某论点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you quote me an example of what you mean?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能否给我举个例子来说明你的意思?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is quoted as saying he disagrees with the decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用他的话说, 他不同意这一决定。</font><br>报(价); 开(价)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company's shares are currently being quoted at 62 pence a share.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该公司股票的现在报价是每股62便士。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They quoted 756 dollars for the single New York—London fare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对纽约到伦敦的单程机票开价是756美元。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the best price I can quote you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我给你开出的最有利的价钱了。</font><br>\n
rabbit	<h3>rabbit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>兔子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rabbits breed quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兔子繁殖很快。</font><br>兔子皮毛, 兔子肉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wears a pair of gloves lined with rabbit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她戴着一副兔毛衬里的手套。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have another piece of rabbit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 再吃块兔肉吧。</font><br>\n
race	<h3>race</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人种, 种族<br>(速度)比赛, 赛跑; 竞争<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>和…比速度; (使)参加比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a very good swimmer and often races.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个优秀游泳选手, 经常参加比赛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you going to race your horse at Newmarket next week?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要让你的马参加下周在纽马克特的赛马会吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My horse has hurt his toe so I can't race him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的马伤了脚趾, 我不能骑它比赛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some medieval towns raced donkeys or buffaloes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些中世纪的城市用驴子或水牛竞赛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll race you home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我和你比赛看谁先到家。</font><br>(使)快速移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children raced towards me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们飞快地向我跑来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He raced his car across the desert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开车驶过那片荒漠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's race to see what is happening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们跑去看看发生了什么事情。</font><br>\n
racial	<h3>racial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>种族的; 存在或发生于种族之间的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech did nothing for racial concord.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的讲话对种族和谐没有作用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have long been involved in a crusade for racial equality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长期以来他们一直致力于争取种族平等的运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have the same racial type.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们有相同的种族类型。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should have racial pride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应该有种族优越感。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They abhor all forms of racial discrimination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们憎恶任何形式的种族歧视。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spoke out against racial discrimination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他声言反对种族歧视。</font><br>\n
rack	<h3>rack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>行李架<br>刑架, 拷问台<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使痛苦, 使焦虑; 绞尽脑汁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pain racked him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 痛苦折磨着他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Conscience racks me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我受良心责备。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cough seemed to rack his body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他咳得全身震动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The storm racked the town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风暴在全城肆虐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He racked no rents to maintain the expenses of his establishment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不向租户索取过高的租金来维持公司的开支。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was racked by remorse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他悔恨交加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was racked by doubts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她满腹疑虑, 痛苦极了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have been racked by bitter quarrels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 激烈的争吵使他们不得安生。</font><br>\n
radar	<h3>radar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雷达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship, with the help of radar, sailed in thick fog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船借助于雷达在浓雾中航行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are following the flight of an aircraft by radar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在用雷达追踪一架飞机的飞行。</font><br>雷达装置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Enemy ships were detected on the radar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌舰的影像已显现在雷达上。</font><br>\n
radiation	<h3>radiation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>辐射(能); 放射<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun, a lamp, or an electric heater all warm us by radiation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳、灯或电热器都可以通过辐射来温暖我们。</font><br>放射物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This apparatus produces harmful radiations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种仪器会产生有害的辐射物。</font><br>\n
radical	<h3>radical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>根本的, 基本的; 彻底的, 完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The patient got a radical cure in the hospital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人在医院得到了根治。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a radical change in the plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对计划做了彻底的修改。</font><br>激进的, 激进派的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His opinions are very radical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的观点很激进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is radical in her demands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的要求十分偏激</font><br>\n
radio	<h3>radio</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收音机, 无线电设备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The radio receiver cut out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无线电接收机突然停了。</font><br>无线电广播台<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The radio broadcast the news in detail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无线电台详细地广播了那则消息。</font><br>无线电, 无线电传送, 无线电广播<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We contacted with the ship by radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们通过无线电与那只船取得了联系。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用无线电发送讯息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They'll radio for instruction.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们要通过无线电去请示。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship radioed for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘船发出无线电求救信号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Coast guards radioed in the information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各海岸警卫队员用无线电发来了信息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you radioed her?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给她发无线电报没有?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Every ship is required to radio its position.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要求每一艘船用无线电报告各自所在的位置。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They radioed London for advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们利用无线电向伦敦请示。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship radioed a call for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘船用无线电发出求救信号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He radioed that her report didn't agree with facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用无线电发出信号, 说她的报告与事实不符。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He radioed that he could't allow her to stay here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用无线电发出信号, 说他不能允许她留在此地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The commander radioed him orders to stop and wait.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 指挥员通过无线电命令他停止行动, 就地待命。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better radio your reply to me as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好尽快发电报告诉我你的答复。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship radioed a message to the shore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘船向岸上发出电报。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We radioed headquarters that we were in trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们向总部报告, 说我们遇到了困难。</font><br>\n
rag	<h3>rag</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>破布, 碎布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The highest quality paper is made mostly from rags.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上好的纸多半是用破布制造的。</font><br>破旧衣服<br>(质量差的)报纸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like the local rag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢本地报纸。</font><br>\n
rage	<h3>rage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>大发脾气, 动怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She raged when her jewels were stolen while under police protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在有警察保护的情况下她的珠宝被偷, 她十分生气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “The hell with, ” Pilar raged.“It is speed that counts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp ”“见鬼去吧!”皮拉怒气冲冲地嚷道, “速度才是重要的。”</font><br>猛烈地继续下去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dispute raged on for a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场辩论激烈地进行了一年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The argument over the new airport is still raging.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于新机场的争论仍然十分激烈。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>狂怒, 盛怒<br>\n
raid	<h3>raid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>突然袭击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In an air raid last night the enemy aircraft bombed the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在昨晚的空袭中敌机轰炸了该城。</font><br>劫掠, 劫夺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a raid on a bank by armed mobs yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天发生了一起武装暴徒抢劫银行的事件。</font><br>突然查抄[搜捕]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During their raid on the house, the police found a lot of drugs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在对这所房子的搜查中, 警方发现了大量的毒品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>突然袭击[抢劫]; 突然搜查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy raided the docks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人突然袭击了码头。</font><br>\n
rail	<h3>rail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>将…围起来, 隔开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cliff edge is dangerous and should be railed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 崖边危险, 应该用栏杆围起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>责备; 辱骂; 抱怨<br>\n
railroad	<h3>railroad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br><br>铁路, 铁道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The railroad slopes up slightly at this point.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁路从这儿开始微微向上倾斜。</font><br>铁路系统<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother is working on the railroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我兄弟在铁路系统工作。</font><br>\n
railway	<h3>railway</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铁路, 铁道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The railway slopes up slightly at this point.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁路从这儿开始微微向上倾斜。</font><br>铁路系统<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother is working on the railway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我兄弟在铁路系统工作。</font><br>\n
rain	<h3>rain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雨<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(雨)降下; (使)降落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's raining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天正在下着雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It will rain in the afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 午后将会下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went out though it was raining hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管雨下得很大, 他还是出去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It has rained over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨停了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It never rains but pours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不雨则已, 雨则倾盆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It rained large drops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨点很大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll have to cancel the cricket match, it's raining cats and dogs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨下得太大了, 我们将只得取消板球比赛了。</font><br>\n
rainbow	<h3>rainbow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>彩虹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the sun shines through a light rain, it makes a rainbow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当太阳的光线穿过小雨时便形成了虹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bright rainbow arched above.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一弯明亮的彩虹悬挂在天空。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rainbow forms an arc in the sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彩虹在天空中呈一个弧形。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rainbow described an arc in the dark sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彩虹在昏暗的天空划出了一道圆弧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At sight of the rainbow, the children were more glad than the parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看见彩虹, 孩子们比大人更高兴。</font><br>\n
raincoat	<h3>raincoat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雨衣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took his neighbour's raincoats by mistake, so he hung them back outside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他错收了邻居家的雨衣, 于是又把它们挂回原处。</font><br>\n
rainy	<h3>rainy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>下雨的, 多雨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a rainy day today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天是一个雨天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Soon the rainy season sets in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很快雨季到了。</font><br>\n
raise	<h3>raise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提起; 举起; 竖起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he saw the principal, he raised his hand in salutation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看到校长时举手敬礼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll raise both hands in favour of damming the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我举双手赞成拦河筑坝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp From then on we raised our heads and became our own masters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从此我们抬起头来当家做主了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Slowly he raised his bow and began to take aim at the bird.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 慢慢地他举起弓, 开始瞄准那只鸟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Raise the overturned lamp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 扶起倒了的灯。</font><br>增加; 提升<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They raised their output by more than half in less than three years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不到三年, 他们把产量提高了一半还多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must do everything we can to raise the people's living standards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要想一切办法来提高人民的生活水平。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of them raised any objection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们谁也没提出反对意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why didn't you raise the question at the meeting?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这问题你怎么没有在会上提出来?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As no one raised his voice against the plan, it was agreed on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于没有人提反对意见, 那项计划便通过了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They decided to raise money by subscription.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们决定靠募捐的办法来筹集这笔款子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How were they going to raise enough money for it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们怎样来为此筹集足够的资金呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They increased their income by raising silkworms and so on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们靠养蚕等增加了收入。</font><br>抚养; 饲养<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man likes raising rabbits, chickens, dogs and horses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个老人喜欢养兔子、鸡、狗和马。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They raised five thousand chrysanthemums last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年他们种了五千株菊花。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We want to raise our children to be decent men and women.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们盼望把孩子们培养成优秀人才。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(工资、薪金的)提升, 增加<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went to ask for a raise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要求增加工资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers went on strike for a raise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人举行罢工, 要求增加工资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trade unions bargained away their rights in exchange for a small pay raise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工会不惜牺牲自己的权利以换取微薄的加薪。</font><br>\n
rally	<h3>rally</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>集会, (群众)大会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They held a celebration rally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们举行了一次庆祝大会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some higher officials attended the celebration rally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一些高级官员参加了庆祝大会。</font><br>公路汽车赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He won the last week's rally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在上周赛车中获胜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He attended two rallies last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年他参加了两场汽车拉力赛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>集合起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The troops rallied.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队重新集结。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers rallied at the foot of a hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战士们在一座小山脚下重新集结。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy's forces rallied, and made a fresh attack on the town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌军重新调集兵力, 对该城发动了又一次进攻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The leader rallied his scattered men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 指挥官重整溃兵。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher rallied the pupils before setting out for the museum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在出发参观博物馆之前, 教师把学生们集合起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the villagers should be rallied to rescue the crops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 应该把全体村民动员起来抢救庄稼。</font><br>恢复; 复原<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As the referee counted, the boxer rallied and got to his feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁判在数点的时候, 那位拳击手恢复了体力, 站了起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The market will soon rally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市场很快会繁荣起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pound rallied just before the foreign exchange market closed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外汇市场将要收盘时, 英镑价格回升了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before long the dying plants began to rally.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 快要枯死的植物不久就开始复苏了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has rallied her spirits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已恢复了精神。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Bank of England tried to rally the pound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英格兰银行试图使英镑重新坚挺。</font><br>\n
range	<h3>range</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一系列<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A range of buildings have sprung up along the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沿河建起了一排楼房。</font><br>变化幅度, 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several cars are available within this price range.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个价格范围内, 有好几种汽车可供选购。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a marvellous voice with an extraordinary range.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她歌喉甜美, 音域奇广。</font><br>射程, 距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This weapon can kill at a range of 200 yards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种兵器在200码内有杀伤力。</font><br>(山)脉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two countries are separated by a range of mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个国家被一条山脉隔开。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>变化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prices range from ￡6 to ￡10.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价钱从六英镑到十英镑不等。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>排列<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Range the books by size.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这些书按大小分类排列。</font><br>\n
rank	<h3>rank</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>军衔, 职衔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain was promoted to the rank of major.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那上尉被提升为少校。</font><br>地位; 社会阶层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a physicist of the first rank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一流的物理学家。</font><br>排; 横列; 行列<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers stood in two ranks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵站成两排。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>分属某类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ranks among the best pupils of his grade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是他们年级最好的学生之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>超过; 高于<br>\n
rapid	<h3>rapid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>〈正〉快的; 急速的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They asked their questions in rapid succession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们连珠炮似地提出了一系列问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The current was rapid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水流得很急。</font><br>\n
rare	<h3>rare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>稀少的, 罕见的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a temple of rare architectural beauty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 论建筑之美, 那是一座极少有的寺院。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is rare to see a man over 160 years old.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很少见到一个人能活到160岁。</font><br>稀薄的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The air is rare at high altitudes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 高处空气稀薄。</font><br>极好的, 极度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a rare old time at the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在聚会中尽情欢乐。</font><br>\n
rarely	<h3>rarely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不常, 很少地, 难得地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She rarely went anywhere except to her office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她除了去办公室以外, 很少去别的地方。</font><br>\n
rat	<h3>rat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大老鼠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rats have eaten holes in those bags of flour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大老鼠把那些面粉袋嗑出了窟窿。</font><br>卑鄙小人, 叛徒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp But you promised to help us, you rat!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可是你答应过要帮我的忙, 你这言而无信的小人！</font><br>\n
rate	<h3>rate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比率, 率<br>(运动、变化等的)速度; 进度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We drove at a steady rate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们以平稳的速度开车。</font><br>费用, 价格<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have to offer higher rates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不付更高的价钱。</font><br>房地产税, 市政服务税<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rates have gone up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房地产税已经提高了。</font><br>等级, 水准<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a first-rate restaurant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一级饭店。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>估价; 评估征税现值<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>认为; 把…算作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hong Kong rates as the biggest trade centre in Asia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 香港被认为是亚洲最大的贸易中心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How do you rate our team's chances of winning?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为我们队获胜的概率是多少?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I would rate this wine as the finest I have ever tasted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为这种酒是我所品尝过的最好的酒。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt., link v.</i></font><br>定级<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her performance didn't rate high in the competition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的表演在这次比赛中等级不算高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They rated the new film.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们给那部新片定了级。</font><br>\n
rather	<h3>rather</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在一定程度上; 颇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is rather too easy for this boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书对于这个孩子来说太简单。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I reckon that he is rather too old to marry again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他的年龄太大, 不太适于再婚。</font><br>或多或少; 有几分; 相当<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This restaurant is rather more expensive than that one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家餐厅的收费比那家贵得多。</font><br>\n
ratio	<h3>ratio</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>比, 比率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ratio of pupils to teachers was 30 to 1.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生和老师的比率是30比1。</font><br>\n
rational	<h3>rational</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>神智清楚的<br>理性的; 理智的; 合理的; 出于理性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a rational plan and bound to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个合理的计划, 肯定会成功。</font><br>\n
raw	<h3>raw</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>生的, 未煮过的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Japanese often eat raw fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 日本人常吃生鱼。</font><br>天然的; 未加工过的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a raw story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个未润色的故事。</font><br>未经过训练的; 没有经验的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man is a raw beginner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻人是个生手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is raw to his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对工作还不熟练。</font><br>刺痛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soles of his feet were raw with chilblain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的脚底生了冻疮很疼痛。</font><br>\n
ray	<h3>ray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>光束, 光线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He focused the sun's rays on a paper with a burning-glass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一面凸透镜把阳光聚焦在纸上。</font><br>射线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cathode rays are attracted by a positive charge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阴极射线被正电荷所吸引。</font><br>微量, 丝毫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There isn't a ray of hope left for us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们连一线希望也没有了。</font><br>\n
reach	<h3>reach</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>到达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They reached Paris by plane on March 8.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们于三月八日乘坐飞机到达巴黎。</font><br>联络<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news reached every part of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 消息传到世界各地。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>伸出手臂; 延伸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't reach so high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我够不到这么高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She reached me a slice of bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她递给我一片面包。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>伸手可及的距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One would need a long reach to be able to touch the ceiling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 必须把手伸得很长才能够到天花板。</font><br>(江河的)河段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We often divide a river into three parts, that is the upper, middle and lower reaches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们经常把一条河分成三部分:上游、中游和下游。</font><br>\n
react	<h3>react</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>起反应; 有影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She didn't look up or react in any way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她既不抬头, 也没有任何反应。</font><br>反对; 对抗<br>\n
reaction	<h3>reaction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>反应; 回应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their reaction to the joke is to laugh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对这个笑话的反应是笑。</font><br>反作用力<br>回复到以前的状态, 倒退<br>反动<br>\n
read	<h3>read</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>读; 看懂, 理解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy can read quite well now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小男孩的阅读能力相当不错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He read Shakespeare to help his English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他阅读莎士比亚的作品以提高自己的英语水平。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>显示; 标明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clock reads four-twenty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这钟显示的时间是4点20分。</font><br>\n
reader	<h3>reader</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>读者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother is a great reader.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我弟弟是个很爱看书的人。</font><br>审稿人, 校对员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She works as a publisher's reader.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在出版社当校对员。</font><br>初级读物<br>\n
readily	<h3>readily</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>乐意地,欣然,容易地<br>\n
reading	<h3>reading</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阅读, 读书<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children learn reading and writing at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们在学校学习阅读和写作。</font><br>读物, 选读<br>读数, 仪表指示数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the temperature reading for that moment?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个时候温度计读数是多少?</font><br>\n
ready	<h3>ready</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>准备就绪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bade us keep in a ready posture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他嘱咐我们做好准备。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please get the plates ready.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请备好碟子。</font><br>乐意的, 情愿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is always ready with advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰总是乐于给人出主意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was quite polite, but he wasn't ready to help me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他相当有礼貌, 但他并不愿意帮我。</font><br>(思维)敏捷的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a ready writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一位才思敏捷的作家。</font><br>\n
real	<h3>real</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>真的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a real pearl, not an imitation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是真的珍珠, 不是仿制品。</font><br>真实的; 现实的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a real experience, not a dream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一次真实的经历, 并不是做梦。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>非常<br>\n
realise	<h3>realise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>实现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He realised his dream when he passed the entrance examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入学考试通过了, 他的梦想就实现了。</font><br>了解; 认识到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you were in the Sahara, you would realise the value of fresh water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你在撒哈拉大沙漠, 你就会知道淡水的价值了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Columbus had not realised that this new land was not India.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哥伦布当时还没有认识到这块新大陆不是印度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They realised the situation to be against them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们意识到形势对他们不利。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>变卖; 赚得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How much did you realise on the house?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所房子你们出售后赚了多少钱?</font><br>\n
realistic	<h3>realistic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>现实的, 实际可行的; 现实主义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a realistic woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是位很实际的女人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our income has got smaller, so we must be realistic and give up our car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的收入减少了, 所以我们得面对现实, 把车卖掉。</font><br>\n
reality	<h3>reality</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>现实, 实际<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We thought he was serious but in reality he was joking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们以为他是认真的, 但实际上他是在开玩笑。</font><br>真实的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film showed life in the poor areas with great reality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 影片非常逼真地展现了贫困地区的生活。</font><br>\n
realize	<h3>realize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>实现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He realized his dream when he passed the entrance examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入学考试通过了, 他的梦想就实现了。</font><br>了解; 认识到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you were in the Sahara, you would realize the value of fresh water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你在撒哈拉大沙漠, 你就会知道淡水的价值了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Columbus had not realized that this new land was not India.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哥伦布当时还没有认识到这块新大陆不是印度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They realized the situation to be against them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们意识到形势对他们不利。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>变卖; 赚得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How much did you realize on the house?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所房子你们出售后赚了多少钱?</font><br>\n
really	<h3>really</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>真正地; 确实地; 实际上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Really, that was a terrible mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 说真的, 那是非常严重的错误。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I see you worrying on my account, but really I don't mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看得出你在为我着急, 但其实我并不在意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't really mean to hurt you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真的不是存心得罪你的。</font><br>很, 十分, 全然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's really cold today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天非常冷。</font><br>\n
realm	<h3>realm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>领域; 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their failures in the realm have damaged their self-confidence and creditability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在本领域的失败使他们的自信心和可信度受损。</font><br>王国, 国度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king was concerned about the safety of the realm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国王十分关心王国的安全。</font><br>\n
reap	<h3>reap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>收割庄稼; 收获<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peasants reaped their rice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农民们收割了水稻。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(因自己或他人所为)获得(某事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As a man sows, so he shall reap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 种瓜得瓜, 种豆得豆。</font><br>\n
rear	<h3>rear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>饲养; 养育<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rears all kinds of birds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他饲养各种鸟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>抬起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The snake reared its head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蛇抬起了头。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>后部, 背<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hall is in the rear of the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 礼堂在大楼的后部。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We attacked the enemy in the rear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们从敌人的背后袭击。</font><br>臀部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got kicked in the rear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他屁股上挨了一脚。</font><br>\n
reason	<h3>reason</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>理由; 原因<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can only guess the reason.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只能猜测原因。</font><br>理性, 理智<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His actions showed a lack of reason.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的行动表明缺乏理智。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>推理; 思考<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A man can reason but an animal can't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人能推理, 而动物则不能。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I reasoned that since she had not answered my letter she must be angry with me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想她没有给我回信一定是在生我的气。</font><br>争辩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reasoned that if we start at now, we could arrive before noon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他争辩着说如果我们现在出发, 中午之前一定能到达。</font><br>\n
reasonable	<h3>reasonable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>通情达理的, 合理的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a reasonable fellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是位通情达理的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your answer is not reasonable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的回答不合理。</font><br>适度的; 公道的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fresh vegetables are reasonable in winter too.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冬季新鲜蔬菜的价格也不贵。</font><br>\n
rebel	<h3>rebel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>反政府的人; 反叛者; 造反者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Few people knew exactly what the rebels planned to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人知道叛军究竟打算做什么。</font><br>叛逆者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the rebels have been captured.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 叛逆者全部被捕了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>反抗政府; 造反<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tribes rebelled against the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各部落反叛政府。</font><br>反抗权威; 叛逆<br>\n
recall	<h3>recall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>回忆起, 回想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As you may recall, he was in the army then.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可能记得当时他正在从军。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scene recalled her childhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一情景使她想起了童年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't recall where to meet her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能记起在哪儿见过她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John recalled attending school with Mary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰回想起同玛丽一起上学的情景。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I recalled that he had mentioned the problem once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我回忆起他曾经有一次提到过这个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't recall where he lives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想不起他住在哪儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>召回, 收回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Recall your messenger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 召回你的使者。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>召回, 唤回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The recall of the Ambassador was embarrassing for the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大使被召回使这个国家感到难堪。</font><br>记忆力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has complete recall and never forgets anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有很好的记忆力, 从不忘记任何事。</font><br>\n
receipt	<h3>receipt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收据, 发票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I asked for a receipt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要一张发票。</font><br>收到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to sign here and acknowledge receipt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得在这儿签名, 表示已收到。</font><br>收入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The receipts have increased since last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自去年起收入已增加。</font><br>\n
receive	<h3>receive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>收到, 接到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our TV receives well since we had a new antenna put on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从安装了新天线以来, 我们的电视接收良好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like to receive presents on my birthday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢在生日那天收到生日礼物。</font><br>接纳; 接待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lady Jones receives on Monday afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 星期一下午琼斯夫人接见来访者。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There we received several weeks of training.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那里我们接受了几星期的训练。</font><br>\n

recent	<h3>recent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不久前的, 近来的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her eyes were red with recent sobbing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的眼睛因刚哭过而发红。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things have changed in recent weeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近几周来情况发生了变化。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The photo is quite recent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张照片是新近照的。</font><br>\n
