reckon	<h3>reckon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>猜想; 估计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Reckon the cost before you decide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 先算一下费用, 然后再作决定。</font><br>〈非正〉思忖; 设想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I reckon that he will come soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他很快就会来。</font><br>考虑; 认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I reckon that he is old enough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他的年龄已经够大了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has always been reckoned as clever.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大家一直认为她是个聪明人。</font><br>〈正〉计算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our pay is reckoned from the 1st of the month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的薪水从每月的第一天算起。</font><br>\n
recognise	<h3>recognise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认出, 识别出某人[某事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I recognised Mary by her red hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我凭玛丽的红帽子认出了她。</font><br>承认…有效[属实]; 认可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't recognised him to be the lawful heir.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不承认他为合法继承人。</font><br>承认[认清](某事物); 认识到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He recognised that he was not qualified for a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认识到自己没有资格担任教师。</font><br>\n
recognition	<h3>recognition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>认识; 认出; 承认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She hoped she would avoid recognition by wearing dark glasses and a hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她戴上墨镜和帽子, 希望人们认不出她来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their recognition of the new law is unlikely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项新法律不大可能获得他们的承认。</font><br>〈正〉酬谢, 酬劳<br>\n
recognize	<h3>recognize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认出, 识别出某人[某事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I recognized Mary by her red hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我凭玛丽的红帽子认出了她。</font><br>承认…有效[属实]; 认可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't recognized him to be the lawful heir.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不承认他为合法继承人。</font><br>承认[认清](某事物); 认识到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He recognized that he was not qualified for a teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认识到自己没有资格担任教师。</font><br>\n
recommend	<h3>recommend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>推荐, 介绍, 赞许某人[某事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you recommend a classmate who can take up the job?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能不能推荐一位能承担这项工作的同学?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you recommend me a good book?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能给我介绍一本好书吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can recommend this play to all lovers of good theatre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把这个剧推荐给所有爱好优秀戏剧的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My neighbour recommended her own daughter as an excellent secretary!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的邻居自荐她的女儿, 说她是个极好的秘书！</font><br>劝告, 建议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I recommend caution in dealing with this matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我建议慎重处理此事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He recommends wearing safety equipment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他建议佩戴安全装备。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee has recommended that the training program (should) be improved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会建议培训计划应当改进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wouldn't recommend him to go there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我劝他不要到那里去。</font><br>(特质等)使…显得可取<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This plan has much to recommend it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这项计划有很多可取之处。</font><br>\n
recommendation	<h3>recommendation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>推荐, 劝告, 建议(尤做法)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has agreed to implement the recommendation in the report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府已同意实施报告中的建议。</font><br>推荐信, 介绍信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wrote him a good recommendation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我为他写了一封很好的推荐信。</font><br>\n
reconcile	<h3>reconcile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使和好; 和解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had been reconciled with his family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他与家人言归于好。</font><br>使一致, 使和谐<br>\n
record	<h3>record</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>记录; 录音, 拍摄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His voice does not record well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的声音录下来不好听。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This volume records the history of the country's revolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这卷书记载了这个国家的革命历史。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The document recorded that there had been a lot of earthquakes in this area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份文献记载说这个地带以前发生过多次地震。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Listen to the speaker and record what he says.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 认真听讲演并记下他的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is recorded to have made this canal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有书记载他曾挖过运河。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>显示; 自动记下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thermometer recorded 37℃.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 温度计显示摄氏37度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The amount of electricity used is recorded by a meter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电表记录下耗电量。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>记录, 记载<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some records of ancient civilization were discovered recently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近发现了一些古代文明的记录。</font><br>最好的成绩, 水平; 纪录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He broke a record in running.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打破了一项赛跑的纪录。</font><br>经历, 履历; 功过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His record is against him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的履历对他不利。</font><br>\n
recorder	<h3>recorder</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>录音机, 录像机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A recorder is often used in our English class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语课堂上我们经常使用录音机。</font><br>\n
recover	<h3>recover</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>恢复; 重新获得, 找回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police recovered the stolen jewellery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察追回了失窃的珠宝。</font><br>〈正〉恢复(适当的状态或位置)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The skater stumbled but at once recovered himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 滑冰的人绊了一下, 但立刻恢复了平衡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>恢复健康(体力、能力等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very ill and unlikely to recover.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病得很重, 不大可能恢复健康了。</font><br>\n
recovery	<h3>recovery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重获, 复得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The owner has offered a reward for the recovery of the stolen goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失主已经悬赏寻找被窃物品。</font><br>恢复健康, 复原<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a quick recovery from his illness and was soon back at work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他生病后康复得很快, 不久就去上班了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will the government's policies lead to an economic recovery?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府的政策能使经济复苏吗?</font><br>\n
recreation	<h3>recreation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>娱乐(方式); 消遣(方式)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rest of the day was entirely at his disposal for reading and recreation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当天剩余时间完全由他支配, 看看书, 消遣消遣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My only recreations are drinking beer and working in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我仅有的消遣方式就是喝啤酒和在花园里种花草。</font><br>\n
recruit	<h3>recruit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>新兵<br>(机构中的)新成员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp New recruits to our table tennis club are always welcome.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的乒乓球俱乐部随时欢迎新成员的参加。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>招聘; 吸引(新成员)<br>吸收某人为新成员<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>招募, 征募(新兵)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Were men for the Navy recruited from men on merchant ships?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海军的人员是从商船的水手中征募的吗?</font><br>恢复健康, 恢复体力<br>\n
recycle	<h3>recycle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>回收利用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Recycling of rubbish costs money and requires special equipment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 回收利用垃圾的造价很高, 又需要专用设备。</font><br>\n
red	<h3>red</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>红色的; 褐红色的; 深红的; 深紫色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a red hat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一顶红帽子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sky is red when the sun rises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳升起时, 红霞满天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Older boys put them up to painting the statue red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大孩子唆使他们把塑像漆成红色。</font><br>布满血丝的; 眼眶发红的; 充血的; 涨红的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl had been crying and her eyes were red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小女孩一直在哭, 眼睛都红了。</font><br>支持左翼政治观点的; 社会党的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Red Ken won seat in Parliament.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 左翼的肯赢得了议会席位。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>红色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I prefer red to blue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢红色而不喜欢蓝色。</font><br>红衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall wear red for the ceremony.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将穿红衣服参加那个仪式。</font><br>拥护社会主义和共产主义的人; 革命分子, 激进分子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people are not the Reds, but they have communist beliefs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人不是共产党员, 但有共产主义信念。</font><br>\n
reduce	<h3>reduce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>缩减, 减少; 降低<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He won't reduce the rent of our house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不肯减少我们住房的租金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The driver reduced the driving speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 司机减低了车速。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must try our best to reduce the likelihood of war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须尽最大努力减少战争的可能性。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The price was considerably reduced.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价格大幅降低了。</font><br>降低某人的级别或地位; 降职<br>使…陷入某种状态[状况]中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hunger reduced him to steal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 饥饿使他不得不行窃。</font><br>将…概括[简化]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rising sun quickly reduced the fog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 升起的太阳很快驱散了晨雾。</font><br>将…还原<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A doctor can reduce a fracture or dislocation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生能使骨折或脱臼复位。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>减轻体重; 节食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has been reducing for the last few weeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近几个星期她一直在节食。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must reduce to get into that fine dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要想穿上那件好衣服, 我就得减肥。</font><br>\n
reduction	<h3>reduction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>减少, 缩小; 减少的量, 降价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The reduction in white blood cell counts lowers resistance to disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白细胞总数的减少, 会降低对疾病的抵抗力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will have a reduction for cash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 付现金可以打折扣。</font><br>\n
refer	<h3>refer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>提到; 针对; 关系到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't refer to the matter again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要再提这件事了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does your remark refer to all of us?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的评论是针对我们所有人的吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>送交; 提交<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He referred the case to the High Court.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把案子提交给高级法庭处理。</font><br>归于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people refer all the troubles to bad luck instead of lack of ability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人把自己所有的苦恼都归咎于运气不佳, 而不认为是缺乏能力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>参考; 查阅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Refer to the dictionary when you don't know how to spell a word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当你不知道怎么拼写一个词时, 查阅一下词典。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 星号是让读者参看脚注。</font><br>\n
reference	<h3>reference</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>提及, 涉及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play is full of references to the political events of those days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剧本涉及当时的许多政治事件。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Avoid any reference to his illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 千万别提起他的病。</font><br>参考, 查阅<br>引文; 参考书目<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The author does not give references.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作者没有注明参考文献的出处。</font><br>证明书; 推荐信; 证明人; 推荐人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does he have references from former employers?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有以前的雇主写的证明吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The headmaster supplied him with a reference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校长给他提供证明人。</font><br>\n
refine	<h3>refine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>精炼; 精制; 使纯净<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They refine sugar using this way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用这种方法精制糖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油。</font><br>使文雅高尚; 使去掉粗俗言行; 使变得完善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has refined his taste and manners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已使自己的趣味爱好和举止仪态变得高雅完美。</font><br>\n
reflect	<h3>reflect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>反射(光、热、声或影像)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mirror reflects.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 镜子能映出影像。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The white sand reflected the sun's heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白色的沙子能反射太阳的热量。</font><br>考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After reflecting for a time he decided not to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 思考了一会儿以后, 他决定不去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are reflecting how to fulfil the task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正考虑如何完成这项任务。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She reflected that life is short.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她沉思着生命是短暂的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reflected how difficult it would be to escape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在考虑逃走会有多大困难。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>表达; 反映<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does this letter reflect how you really think?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这封信反映你的真实想法吗?</font><br>\n
reflection	<h3>reflection</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>映像, 倒影<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The reflection of the sun on the glass wall was blinding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玻璃墙上反射的太阳光令人目眩。</font><br>反映, 表达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a reflection of their frailty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是他们虚弱的反映。</font><br>深思; 回忆; 考虑; 看法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A moment's reflection will show you are wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要略加考虑就可看出你错了。</font><br>\n
reform	<h3>reform</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>改革, 改良, 改造<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The reform in teaching methods is warmly welcomed by students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教学方法的改革受到了学生们的热烈欢迎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new law brought many social reforms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新法引起了许多社会改革。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>改革; 改造; 改善<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers reformed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 军队重新改编了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have had every chance to reform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你已有了改过自新的各种机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are reforming our economic system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正在改革我们的经济体制。</font><br>\n
refresh	<h3>refresh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使恢复; 使振作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think I'll just refresh myself with a cup of tea before I go to meet the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想在见孩子们之前先喝杯茶来恢复一下精神。</font><br>使…记起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I looked at the map to refresh my memory of the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看看地图以唤起对这条路的回忆。</font><br>\n
refrigerator	<h3>refrigerator</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>冰箱<br>\n
refugee	<h3>refugee</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>避难者; 难民<br>\n
refusal	<h3>refusal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拒绝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan was doomed to fail by their refusal to give it any financial support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于他们拒绝给予任何资助, 该计划注定要失败。</font><br>优先取舍权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you ever decide to sell your car, please give me the first refusal of it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你决定把汽车卖掉, 请给我优先购买权。</font><br>\n
refuse	<h3>refuse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拒绝; 回绝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We asked him to come, but he refused.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们叫他来, 可是他拒绝了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It never occurred to me that he would refuse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从没想到他会不肯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think he won't refuse me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他不会拒绝我的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She refused their invitation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拒绝了他们的邀请。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was refusing his gift.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坚持不收他的礼物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He refused to change his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拒绝改变主意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My legs refused to carry me further.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我实在走不动了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane absolutely refused to start.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这架飞机完全发动不起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't refuse her anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她要什么他就给什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bank refused him the loan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 银行拒绝向他贷款。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wouldn't refuse help to an old friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不会拒绝给予老朋友帮助。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>废物; 垃圾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Refuse is collected twice a week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 垃圾每周收两次。</font><br>\n
regard	<h3>regard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>注视; 注意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't regard this very seriously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对此不必过分介意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They all regarded him highly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们都对他很尊重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You never regard what I say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我说的话你从不重视。</font><br>认作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They didn't regard the prospects favourably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对前途不太乐观。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all regarded him as a hero.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都把他看作英雄。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>注意, 关心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp More regard must be paid to safety on the roads.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 必须更加注意公路上的交通安全。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have no regard for my feelings!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你没有考虑到我的感情！</font><br>尊重; 尊敬<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hold her in the greatest regard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常尊敬她。</font><br>致意; 问候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please give my regards to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请代我向他致意。</font><br>\n
regarding	<h3>regarding</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示论及)关于; 至于; 就…而论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Regarding John, I will write to him at once.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 至于约翰, 我将立即给他写信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Regarding the punishment, what would you advise?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于处罚, 你有何意见?</font><br>\n
regardless	<h3>regardless</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>不顾后果地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I protested, but she carried on regardless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我极力反对, 但她仍一意孤行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Regardless of danger, he climbed the tower.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不顾危险地爬上了高塔。</font><br>不管怎样, 无论如何<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Get the money, regardless!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不管怎样, 拿钱再说！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall go regardless of the weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论天气好坏我都要去。</font><br>\n
region	<h3>region</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>地区; 地带; 区域; 范围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The warm region is crowded with birds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 温暖的地区鸟类云集。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The paper is largely circulated in the rural regions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家报纸主要在农村地区发行。</font><br>\n
register	<h3>register</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>记录; 登记; 注册<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An increasing number of students are registering for degree courses each year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每年, 越来越多的学生注册学习学位课程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many members have officially registered in the club?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该俱乐部正式登记的会员有多少?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you registered the birth of your baby?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给婴儿的出生登记了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In former times, only property owners could be registered as voters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从前, 只有有财产的人才能登记作选民。</font><br>显出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A surprise that he was unable to hide registered on his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸上露出掩饰不住的惊讶的表情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His face registered both surprise and joy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸上显露出惊喜交集的表情。</font><br>注意到, 记住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told me he was married but I'm afraid it didn't register.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他告诉我他已经结婚了, 不过我想当时我并未把这事记在心上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I registered that she was late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我注意到她迟到了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>登记(表), 注册(簿)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was looking over a hotel register.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在仔细检查旅馆住宿登记表。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each class has a register of 50 students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每班注册有50个学生。</font><br>记录器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A register indicated the number of people who had gone through.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 记录器上显示出经过的人数。</font><br>暖气, 调风器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We turned the house registers off during the summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏天, 我们关掉室内的暖气。</font><br>\n
