regret	<h3>regret</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>懊悔, 惋惜, 遗憾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She will regret and she will want you here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她会后悔, 她会要你留在这里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't regret the choice I had made.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我作了这个选择并不后悔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll regret this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事你将会后悔的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret to say that he is badly ill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很遗憾他病得很重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret to say you are wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 十分抱歉, 你错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret to have told him the thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我后悔告诉了他这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret selling the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我后悔卖了房子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He said he much regretted not being able to help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说, 他帮不上忙, 深感遗憾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret that I shall not be able to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很遗憾, 我不能来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret that you see it like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很遗憾你那样看这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret what I've done to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我后悔不该那么对她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a matter to be regretted that he should have failed again in the examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他竟然又一次考试不及格, 这是一件令人遗憾的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret being unable to say that I cannot come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能来, 甚为抱歉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I regret having to tell you to leave[I regret to have to tell you to leave].</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很抱歉, 我现在得叫你走。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>痛惜, 懊悔, 遗憾, 失望, 悔恨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have no regret about leaving.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对离去一事毫不后悔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Prime Minister expressed her regret at the failure of the talks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 首相对谈判失败表示遗憾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To his regret, he couldn't catch the train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没能赶上火车, 很后悔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I declined with much regret your kind invitation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很遗憾, 我不能接受您的盛情邀请。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot come—please give them my regrets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能来——请代我向他们致歉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have had four acceptances and one regret.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已收到了四张应邀帖和一张辞谢帖。</font><br>\n
regular	<h3>regular</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有规律的, 定期的, 定时的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He leads a regular life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过着有规律的生活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He heard the regular noise of the clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听到时钟有规律的滴嗒声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You need to take regular exercise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要经常运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Saturday is my regular day for shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我通常在星期六到商店买东西。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We meet on a regular basis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们定期会面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That sort of thing is quite occasional and not regular.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那种事十分偶然, 没有规律。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The verb “dance” is regular, but the verb “be” is not.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动词dance的变化是规则的, 但be的变化是不规则的。</font><br>合乎原则的; 符合规定的; 正当的; 适当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A period is the regular ending for a sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 句点是一个句子符合规则的结尾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think your method isn't quite regular.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为你的方法不正当。</font><br>均匀的; 整齐的; 对称的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chairs were placed at regular distances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 椅子等距摆放着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His nose is regular.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的鼻子很匀称。</font><br>正常的, 经常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had no regular education.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有受过正规教育。</font><br>连续的; 习惯性的; 固定不变的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has no regular work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有固定职业。</font><br>\n
regulate	<h3>regulate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>控制, 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The policeman regulated traffic at the intersection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察在交叉路口指挥交通。</font><br>调整; 调节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He regulated his watch according to the radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听收音机校准了他的表。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This system can regulate the temperature of the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种系统能调节室内温度。</font><br>\n
regulation	<h3>regulation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>管理, 控制<br>规章; 规则<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The regulation has no application to this particular case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那项规则不适用于这一特定情况。</font><br>\n
reinforce	<h3>reinforce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>增强; 加强<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They reinforced a coat by sewing pieces of leather on the elbows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在外衣肘上缝皮革使衣服更耐穿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This evidence reinforces my view.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个证据证实了我的看法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We reinforce a troop again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们又增援一支军队。</font><br>\n
reject	<h3>reject</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拒绝, 谢绝; 驳回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was afraid she would reject him because he was a foreigner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他担心她会因他不是本国人而拒绝他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The board rejected all our ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 董事会拒绝审议我们的所有意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They rejected his application for membership.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拒绝考虑他的成员资格申请。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She rejected telling us the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拒不对我们讲实情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rejected changing his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拒绝改变主意。</font><br>舍弃, 排斥, 退掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Choose the good apples and reject the bad ones.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把好的苹果挑出来, 把坏的剔出去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rejected the old records.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他丢弃了那些旧唱片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The patient rejected the transplanted heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人的躯体排斥移植的心脏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is hard for me to reject religious beliefs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要我抛弃自己的宗教信仰是困难的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rejected the idea of settling in England.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他放弃了在英国定居的想法。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>被拒货品, 不合格产品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the reject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是次品。</font><br>\n
relate	<h3>relate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)联系起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His remarks didn't relate to the topic under discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说的话与讨论的问题无关。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't relate those two ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很难把这两种想法联系起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is difficult to relate the two cases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要把那两件事联系起来是很困难的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you relate what happened in your childhood to your present state of mind?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能将童年的经历与现在的心情联系起来吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is difficult to relate these results with any known cause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很难把结果与任何已知原因联系起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>讲述; 叙述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then he related what had passed between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 然后他讲述他们之间发生的情况。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He related some amusing stories in his childhood to his children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向孩子们述说了他少年时代的一些趣事。</font><br>\n
related	<h3>related</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>与…有亲戚关系的<br>有关系的<br>\n
relation	<h3>relation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>关系, 联系, 交往<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's no relation between the two things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两件事没有联系。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The relation of disease to poverty and ignorance is easy to see.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 疾病与贫穷、无知之间的关系是显而易见的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Race relations are an explosive issue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 种族关系是一个爆炸性的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two countries began to discuss their tense relations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两国开始讨论他们之间的紧张关系。</font><br>亲戚(关系); 亲属(关系)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a distant relation of mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我的远房亲戚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They invited all their relations to stay at Christmas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们邀请所有亲戚住下来共度圣诞节。</font><br>\n
relationship	<h3>relationship</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>关系, 联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are certain things that are absolutely basic to the maintenance of a good relationship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要保持良好的关系, 有些条件是必不可少的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is there any relationship between them?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它们之间有联系吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are not of the same family relationship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不属于同一血统。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They aren't married, but they have a pretty close relationship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没有结婚, 但关系很密切。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Marshall has an unwise sexual relationship with other girls before he met Jessica.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 遇见杰西卡之前, 马歇尔与其他女孩曾有过不当的性交往。</font><br>\n
relative	<h3>relative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相对的; 比较的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He retired and lived in relative isolation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他退休后, 生活比较孤寂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's make a relative study of the two languages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们将这两种语言作一下比较研究。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All things are relative.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一切事物都是相比较而存在的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>亲属, 亲戚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My uncle is my nearest relative.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 叔叔是我最近的亲人。</font><br>\n
relativity	<h3>relativity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈物〉相对论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Finally they accepted Einstein's relativity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们终于接受了爱因斯坦的相对论。</font><br>相关性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is no relativity between the two matters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两件事毫无关系。</font><br>\n
relax	<h3>relax</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)轻松<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Relax when you dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跳舞时要放松。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A good massage always relaxes me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有效的按摩总是使我放松。</font><br>(使)松弛; 放宽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His index finger tightened on the trigger but then relaxed again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的食指扣住扳机, 然后又松开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shouldn't relax our vigilance at any time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何时候我们都不应该放松警惕。</font><br>\n
release	<h3>release</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>释放; 放开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They released the prisoners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们释放了俘虏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Release the dog.He has been chained up for hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把狗放开, 它已被拴了好几个钟头了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He released her arm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他放开了她的手臂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He released me from my torments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他解除了我的痛苦。</font><br>发布; 发行; 发售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The commission released its findings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会公布了调查结果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When is the best moment to release the date of the election to the newspapers?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 什么时候是向报界透露选举日期的最好时机?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>释放, 排放, 解除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After my examination I had a feeling of release.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 考完试后我有如释重负之感。</font><br>释放令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The warden of the prison signed the release.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 监狱长签发释放令。</font><br>公映的新影片, 发布的新闻[消息]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On this show they played the latest release.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次公演, 他们放映了最新的影片。</font><br>\n
relevant	<h3>relevant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有关的, 切题的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Museums should have a more involved or relevant public role.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 博物馆应起到进一步介入公众生活或更加举足轻重的社会作用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This point is really relevant and we had better move on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一点至关重要, 我们还是接着谈吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These materials are relevant to the case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些材料与这案件有关。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her appearance is not relevant to whether she can be a good teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的长相跟她能否当个好老师无关。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think his remarks are relevant to our discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他的话不切我们的议题。</font><br>\n
reliable	<h3>reliable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可靠的, 可信赖的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager thought he was a reliable person and told him all about the new plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经理认为他是一个可靠的人, 并把关于新计划的全部内容都告诉了他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John is very reliable; if he says he'll do something he will do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰非常可靠, 他说过要做的事就一定会做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is your watch reliable?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的表准吗?</font><br>\n
relief	<h3>relief</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(痛苦等)缓解, 减轻, 解除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This medicine will give you some relief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这药会为你减轻一些痛苦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A doctor's task is to work for the relief of patient's suffering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生的工作是解除病人的痛苦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They send relief to those who made homeless by floods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们给水灾中无家可归的人发送救援物资。</font><br>轻松, 宽慰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His words provided some comic relief in what was really a dull speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话给极沉闷的讲话增添了几分轻松的气氛。</font><br>换班[接替]人, 加班[增开]的公共汽车、火车等<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The relief for the military guard is expected soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 预计卫队很快就来换班。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had to provide a relief bus because there were so many passengers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不得不增加一辆公共汽车, 因为乘客很多。</font><br>\n
relieve	<h3>relieve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>缓解, 消除, 减少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctors did their best to relieve the patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生们尽力减轻病人的痛苦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were relieved to hear that she was out of danger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听说她脱险了, 我们的心才放下来。</font><br>换班, 换岗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He will relieve a sick teacher tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他明天要为一个生病的老师代课。</font><br>\n
religion	<h3>religion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宗教, 宗教信仰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many religions in the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在世界上有许多种宗教。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He married outside his religion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他和不同宗教信仰的人结了婚。</font><br>支配自己生活的大事<br>\n
religious	<h3>religious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>宗教的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's a religious question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是个宗教问题。</font><br>笃信宗教的, 虔诚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a very religious person who goes to church every Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她十分虔诚, 每星期都上教堂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very religious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很虔诚。</font><br>谨慎的, 认真的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gave religious attention to the doctor's orders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一丝不苟地遵照医生嘱咐。</font><br>\n
reluctant	<h3>reluctant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不情愿的, 勉强的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave me a reluctant assistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很不情愿地给了我帮助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am reluctant about asking him to do this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我极不愿意让他去干此事。</font><br>\n
rely	<h3>rely</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>信任; 信赖; 依赖, 依靠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can rely upon Jacelin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以信赖杰斯林。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can always rely on Jim, he won't fail you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以永远信任吉姆, 他不会让你失望的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can rely on me for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可指望我来帮忙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may rely upon my early arrival.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你放心好了, 我会早到的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may rely upon his words absolutely, for he always speaks the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以绝对信赖他的话, 因为他总是说老实话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't rely on the weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气是靠不住的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should rely on your own efforts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该靠自己的努力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I relied on the map but it was wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我依靠这张地图, 但它是错的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to come with you but that's not a promise, don't rely on it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我愿意和你一起去, 但这不是允诺, 别指望我一定去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The town relies on the seasonal tourist industry for jobs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城镇全靠季节性的旅游业提供就业机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on mainland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于大陆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This young man cannot be relied on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人不可靠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had proved that he could be relied on in a crisis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已表明, 在紧要关头他是可以信赖的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can always be relied upon for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的帮助总是靠得住的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We know such people are not to be relied upon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们知道这种人是靠不住的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This story cannot be relied upon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这话可靠不住。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't rely on going abroad for our holiday, we may not be able to afford it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要指望去国外度假, 我们可能负担不起费用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't rely on going to Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别指望能去日本。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rely on his finishing the work today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们信赖他今天能完工。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't rely on me going to Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别指望我去日本。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I rely upon you to finish the work on time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信你会准时完成这项工作的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can rely on our children to do such work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样的工作我们可以放心地让孩子们去做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They cannot be relied on to offer much support or advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不能指望他们提供很多支持和意见。</font><br>\n
remain	<h3>remain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>剩余物; 残余<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The remains of the meal were[was]fed to the dog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剩饭喂狗了。</font><br>残骸; 遗体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mortal remains are buried in the churchyard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的遗体埋葬在教堂的墓地里。</font><br>遗迹, 遗址, 废墟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Here is the remains of a temple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里是一所寺院的废墟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>留下, 逗留<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They remained there all through the year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在那里一直待到了年底。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remained six days in London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在伦敦逗留了六天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He'll remain to accompany you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将留下来陪你。</font><br>剩下, 余留<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Though the sore being healed, yet a scar may remain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伤口虽然痊愈, 却可能留下伤疤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There remained in the village only women and children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 村子里只剩下妇女和儿童了。</font><br>留待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't let the room remain like this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不能把房间老是弄成这样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That remains to be proved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这尚待证实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>仍然是, 依旧是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The decision remains with the Government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 决定权在于政府。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fact remains that we are still lagging behind the other classes in maths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事实是我们在数学方面仍然比别的班落后。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peter has become a judge but John remains a fisherman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彼得当了法官, 但约翰仍是个渔民。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He remained firm in the face of the enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在敌人面前始终很坚定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I got back home, he remained listening to the radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我回到家的时候, 他还在听收音机。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let things remain as they have been in the past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让事情照旧吧！</font><br>\n
remark	<h3>remark</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>话语, 评论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the light of his remarks, we rejected her offer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鉴于他的评语, 我们拒绝了她的提议。</font><br>注意; 看; 观察<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>谈论, 评论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mrs. Morse remarked that she seemed a very nice girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莫斯太太评论说她像是个好女孩。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>注意到…<br>\n
remarkable	<h3>remarkable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>异常的; 引人注目的; 不寻常的<br>\n
remedy	<h3>remedy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>药品, 治疗法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This doctor often uses herbal remedies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个医生常用草药治病。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is as yet no known remedy for cancer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尚无治愈癌症的办法。</font><br>补救办法, 纠正办法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your only remedy is to appeal to law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的惟一补救办法是诉诸法律。</font><br>\n
remember	<h3>remember</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>记得; 牢记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was from Henan, if I remember correctly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是河南人, 如果我没记错的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have never had this kind of experience since I can remember.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自我记事以来, 我从来没有这样的经历。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't remember him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记不起他了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will always remember your kindness to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将永远记住你对我的好意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then he remembered a poem that he had learned when he was a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这时他记起小时候学过的一首诗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please remember to give her the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请记着把这本书给她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please remember to give me a phone call when you get there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请记住你到那儿时给我来个电话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Remember to mail the letter for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 记住帮我把信寄出。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Remember to post the letter for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别忘了替我把信寄出。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Remember to use postal code.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 勿忘使用邮政编码。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you remember getting some medicine for her last week?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你还记得上星期给她买药的事吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remember having asked her to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记得曾经要她来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remember having seen someone take it away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记得曾看见有人把它拿走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remember having heard you speak on that subject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记得曾听你谈论过那个题目。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I never remember having come across a man like that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怎么也记不起碰到过这样一个人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I remember that I wrote to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我记得给他写过信了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She remembers that he visited her but she can't remember when.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她记得他曾来看过她, 但记不清是什么时候了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you remember where he lives?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你记得他住在哪里吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not remember where he had seen her before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他记不起在什么地方见过她了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>送钱[礼物]给…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She always remembers me at Christmas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每逢圣诞节她总给我送礼品。</font><br>\n
remind	<h3>remind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使想起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If my father forgets it, I hope you would remind him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我父亲忘了的话, 希望你能提醒他一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I reminded her, she nodded her head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我提醒她时, 她点了点头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please remind me in case I should forget.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我忘了, 请你提醒我一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lady didn't like to be reminded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位太太不喜欢人们提醒她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be sure to remind her to come back early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一定要提醒她早点回来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reminded himself to thank her for the present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提醒自己要感谢她送的礼物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reminded me to lock up the house when I go out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提醒我外出时把屋子锁起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These notes will remind you what to say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些笔记可以帮你记起要说哪些话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These notes will remind you how to present your ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些笔记可以帮你记起怎样讲清楚你的意思。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reminded me when to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提醒我是不是我该走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She reminded me that I hadn't written to Mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她提醒我还没有给母亲写信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That suddenly reminded her that she had promised to ring them up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这突然使她想起她说过要给他们打电话的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please remind him that we are leaving at six tomorrow morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请提醒他我们明晨6时出发。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must remind him that time is money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须提醒他时间就是金钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That reminds me that I have a meeting to attend this evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这使我想起今晚我还有一个会要参加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I remind you that time will soon be up?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我可以提醒你时间快到了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sight of the clock remind-ed me that I was late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到时钟使我想起我迟到了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We reminded them that the meeting had been postponed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们提醒他们会议已经延期。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I always remind myself that time and tide wait for no man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我总是提醒自己岁月不待人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reminded her that they had resolved to stick together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提醒她说, 他们曾经决定过彼此要在一起, 不要单独行动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They reminded me that one can be strong only when united with the collective.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们使我想到, 只有和集体结合才有力量。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Travellers are reminded that inoculation against yellow fever is advisable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 提醒旅游者接种预防黄热病的疫苗是明智的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This reminds me what we did together during our holidays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这使我想起我们在假日里一起做的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The time of year reminds me how the months have gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每年这个时候都使我想起那些月份是怎么过去的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom reminded me when I must go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆提醒我是不是我该走了。</font><br>\n
remote	<h3>remote</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(时间上)遥远的; (亲属关系上)远的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thing happened in the remote past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事发生在遥远的过去。</font><br>远离的, 遥远的; 偏僻的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At night I like to look at the remote stars in the clear sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 晚上我喜欢观看晴朗的夜空中遥远的星星。</font><br>冷淡的, 疏远的, 漠不关心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her manner was polite but remote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她彬彬有礼, 却十分冷淡。</font><br>微小的; 轻微的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm afraid your chances of success are rather remote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我担心你成功的机会极小。</font><br>\n
removal	<h3>removal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>移走, 脱掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the removal of the soup, fish was served.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤撤去后, 鱼就上来了。</font><br>\n
remove	<h3>remove</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>移走; 排除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He removed the picture and put it in the drawer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把画取下来, 放到抽屉里。</font><br>开除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They removed him from his position.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们撤销了他的职务。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>迁移; 移居<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our office has removed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的机关迁移了。</font><br>\n
render	<h3>render</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>报答; 归还; 给予<br>呈递; 提供; 开出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She needed him to hear her out and render advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她需要他把话听完并提出建议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will have to render an account of your expenditure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的开支必须报账。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are going to render them economic assistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们打算向他们提供经济援助。</font><br>演出; 扮演; 演奏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The piano concerto was wonderfully rendered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这首钢琴协奏曲演奏得很好。</font><br>翻译<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sentence cannot be literally rendered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个句子不能直译。</font><br>使; 致使<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have rendered a great service to the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为国家做了一件大事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shock of the discovery rendered him speechless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一发现使他吃惊得一句话也说不出来。</font><br>\n
renew	<h3>renew</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)复原; (使)更新; 赋予新的生命和活力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He feels his youth renewing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他觉得越活越年轻了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The most important thing is to renew your health.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最重要的是恢复你的健康。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>重新开始; 继续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trees renew their foliage every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木每年都重新长出叶子。</font><br>补充; 加强<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship renewed its provisions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘船补充了给养。</font><br>延长…的期限<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must renew the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我必须续借这本书。</font><br>\n
rent	<h3>rent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>租金; 地租<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>租用; 出租(房屋等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He decided to rent the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他决定租这房子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have rented a house and paid the rent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已租了房子, 并交了租金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rented a colour TV soon after moving in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 搬进后不久他就租了一台彩色电视机。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rented a small house in Newtown for a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在新镇租了一栋小房子, 租期为一年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rented a cottage at the seaside for Christmas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在海边租了一栋小别墅度圣诞节。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rented a house in the suburbs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在郊外租了一所房子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farm has been rented by my father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个农场已被我父亲租用了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She rented me a room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她租给我一个房间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We rented the cabin to a young couple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将小屋租给了一对年轻夫妇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr. Hill rented this land to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 希尔先生把这块土地租给我们了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farm has been rented to Mr. Jackson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个农场租给杰克逊先生了。</font><br>\n
repair	<h3>repair</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>修理, 修补<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is in need of repair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那房子需要修理。</font><br>修补的地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This coat has many repairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件上衣有许多修补过的地方。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修理; 修补<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was repairing a glove when I came in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我进去时, 她在补手套。</font><br>纠正, 补救<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can I repair the wrong I have done her?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怎样才能补偿对她做过的错事呢?</font><br>\n
repeat	<h3>repeat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>重说, 重做<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't repeat, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要重复。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy repeated his question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子又问了一遍他的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I repeat that we cannot undertake the task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我再说一遍, 我们不能承担这项任务。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>复述, 背诵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children repeated the words after her in chorus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们跟她齐声朗读单词。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please repeat what I said.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把我说的话重复一遍。</font><br>再次供应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We regret that we cannot repeat this article.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很抱歉, 我们无法再次供应此物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>吃后仍留有余味<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medicine repeats even after one has drunk many glasses of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吃过这种药后, 即使多喝几杯水, 嘴里仍然有药味。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重复; 复述; 背诵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm tired of seeing all these repeats on television.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些重复的电视节目我都看腻了。</font><br>(节目)重演, 重播<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There will be a repeat of this programme next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下星期将重播这个节目。</font><br>\n
repeatedly	<h3>repeatedly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>重复地,再三地<br>\n
repetition	<h3>repetition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重复, 反复, 重复的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is a mere repetition of what you said before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那不过是重复了你以前讲的话。</font><br>复制品, 副本<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a repetition of a previous talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有前次会谈的副本。</font><br>\n
replace	<h3>replace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>取代, 代替; 更换, 替换<br>把…放回原位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He picked them up and replaced them in the bag.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把它们捡了起来, 放回包里。</font><br>\n
replacement	<h3>replacement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>代替, 替换, 更换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bike is in need of replacement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆自行车该更换了。</font><br>替换的人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As Jack is ill, we have to get a replacement for him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰克生病了, 我们必须找一个人代替他。</font><br>\n
reply	<h3>reply</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>回答, 答复<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My reply may not have been polite, but he asked for it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的回答也许不太礼貌, 但这是他自找的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>回答, 答复<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom replied that he had finished the work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆回答说他已完成了那项工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>作答; 回答<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He failed to reply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他未作回答。</font><br>\n
report	<h3>report</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>报告, 报道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All reports must be sent in by the end of this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的报告必须在本星期以前交齐。</font><br>成绩报告单, 工作鉴定书<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My daughter got a good report last term.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我女儿上学期成绩出色。</font><br>传闻; 流言蜚语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Report has it that the ballet will visit England before long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据说这个芭蕾舞团不久将访问英国。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>报告; 报道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee will report at twelve o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会将在12点钟提出报告。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She reported the success of a new experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她报告说一次新的试验成功了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reported seeing a new star.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他报告说看见一颗新星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspaper reported that prices were going up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报纸报道说物价正在上涨。</font><br>公布; 宣告; 当记者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What time do we have to report?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们该什么时候公布?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Police reported the closure of the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方宣布那条道路禁止通行。</font><br>报到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the representatives must report themselves on time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的代表都必须准时报到。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>告发, 举报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They reported what they had seen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把看到的情况作了举报。</font><br>\n
reporter	<h3>reporter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>记者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told his story to a reporter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向一个记者讲述了自己的经历。</font><br>\n
represent	<h3>represent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>表现, 描绘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The painting represents the scene of a bumper harvest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画描绘了丰收的景象。</font><br>代表, 象征, 表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pilots respectfully represented that they were not at all tired.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞行员郑重表示他们一点也不累。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He represented himself to be the Son of God.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自称是救世主。</font><br>作为…的代表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Foreign Minister represented the country at the conference.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外交部长代表该国出席大会。</font><br>\n
representation	<h3>representation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>表现, 表示, 代理<br>表现…的事物, 图画, 雕塑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The painting is a representation of a storm at sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画描绘的是海上的暴风雨。</font><br>\n
representative	<h3>representative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>代表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I sent my representative to the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我派了代表参加会议。</font><br>代理人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a representative for a large steel company.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一家大型钢铁公司的代理人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有代表性的, 典型的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a representative sample.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有一个代表性的样品。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This question is very representative.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这问题非常典型。</font><br>\n
reproduce	<h3>reproduce</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>复制; 重现; 再版<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The picture will reproduce well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这照片会印得很清楚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The picture reproduced too dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 图画显得很暗淡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The machine can reproduce a key in two minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这机器能在两分钟内复制一把钥匙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The computer reproduces the data as a set of diagrams.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电脑使这些数据再现为一系列图表。</font><br>生殖, 繁殖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rabbits reproduce quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兔子繁殖速度很快。</font><br>\n
republic	<h3>republic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>共和国, 共和政体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Andora is a small mountain republic between France and Spain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 安道尔是一个位于法国和西班牙之间的小山地共和国。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of the countries in the world are republics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 世界上大多数国家是共和政体。</font><br>成员具有平等权利的)团体，界<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lu Hsun attained a high position in the republic of letters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鲁迅在文坛上获得崇高的地位。</font><br>\n
republican	<h3>republican</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>共和国的, 共和政体的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拥护共和政体者, 共和主义者<br>\n
reputation	<h3>reputation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>名气, 名声, 名誉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该商店因买卖公道而享有极高的声誉。</font><br>\n
request	<h3>request</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>要求, 请求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teachers were deaf to our requests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师对我们的请求一点都听不进去。</font><br>所请求的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should have your request.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会得到你所要的东西。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>请求, 要求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Workers requested a raise in the wage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们要求提高工资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I requested to go to the railway station to meet a friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要求到火车站去接一个朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He requested that they should come early.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他请求他们要早来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is requested that he should leave before seven o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请求他7点前离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They requested us to help them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们要求我们帮助他们。</font><br>\n
require	<h3>require</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>有赖于…; 需要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All living beings require food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一切生物都需要食物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The problem requires dealing with immediately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个问题要马上处理。</font><br>命令, 指示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The court required that he should pay the fine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 法院下令他交付罚款。</font><br>要求, 规定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The occasion requires formal dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场合要求穿礼服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He required to see my passport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要看我的护照。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They required that I (should) go there tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们要求我今晚到那里去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The border police required the traveler to unlock his luggage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 边防警察要求旅客打开行李。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher requires us that we must read English every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师要求我们每天早晨读英语。</font><br>想要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you require coffee?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要咖啡吗?</font><br>\n
requirement	<h3>requirement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>要求, 必要条件<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your requirement that she wait till next week is reasonable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要求她等到下周是有道理的。</font><br>需要, 需要的东西<br>\n
rescue	<h3>rescue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>营救, 救援<br>营救[救援]行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are performing an attempt of a rescue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在进行营救行动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>营救, 救援; 使免遭损失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They rescued the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们救出了那个小孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has rescued the firm from bankruptcy by giving them a grant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府通过给企业拨款使他们免遭倒闭。</font><br>\n
research	<h3>research</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>研究; 探讨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Research has shown that women live longer than men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 调查表明女性比男性寿命长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>做研究, 探究, 研究, 探讨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have been researching for three years with no results.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已研究了三年, 但没有什么结果。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>从事…的研究, 为…而做研究<br>\n
resemble	<h3>resemble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>像…, 类似于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother resembles me in looks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我弟弟和我长得很像。</font><br>\n
resent	<h3>resent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>对…感到愤怒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He resented his friend's remark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怨恨他朋友所说的话。</font><br>\n
reservation	<h3>reservation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保留的座位[住处]等; 预订<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you made the reservations for our holiday yet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为我们度假做好预订安排了吗?</font><br>保留意见; 保留态度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have my reservations about his ability to do the job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对于他做该项工作的能力保留看法。</font><br>(美洲印第安部落的)居留地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of these workers are American Indians living on reservations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些工人中的大多数是住在居留地的美洲印第安人。</font><br>\n
reserve	<h3>reserve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保留[储备]某物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll reserve the ticket for you till tomorrow noon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 票为您保留到明天中午。</font><br>具有或保持(某种权利)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The management reserves the right to refuse admission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 资方有权拒绝接纳。</font><br>预订或保留(座位、住处等); 订购<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These seats are reserved for teachers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些座位是留给老师的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>贮藏; 储备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must keep back a reserve of food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须贮存一些食品。</font><br>保护区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This area was once a wildlife reserve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该地区曾是一个野生动物保护区。</font><br>矜持, 拘谨; 寡言<br>\n
reservoir	<h3>reservoir</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水库<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The big storms in August refilled the reservoirs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 八月的暴雨又使水库积满了水。</font><br>储藏, 汇集<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Enterprise must have a reservoir of cheap labour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 企业应储备廉价的劳动力。</font><br>\n
residence	<h3>residence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>住处; 住宅; 公馆<br>居住; 居留期间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took up residence in Australia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去澳大利亚居住。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are only allowed one month's residence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们获准只逗留一个月。</font><br>\n
resident	<h3>resident</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>定居的; 常驻的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They engaged a resident tutor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们聘用了一名住家的家庭教师。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've been resident in this place for five years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已经在这个地方住了五年。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>居民<br>(旅馆的)住宿者<br>\n
resign	<h3>resign</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>辞职, 放弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mander resigned from office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 曼德辞职了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He resigned his directorship and left the firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他放弃了董事职务, 离开了公司。</font><br>\n
resist	<h3>resist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>使用武力阻止(某事)发生[取得成功]; 抵抗; 对抗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could resist no longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他再也抵抗不住了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city resisted the enemy onslaught for two weeks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个城市反抗敌人的猛攻达两个星期之久。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>不受(某事物的)损害[影响]; 抗; 耐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lack of proper nourishment reduces their power to resist disease.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 营养不良降低了他们抵抗疾病的能力。</font><br>不屈从(某事物或某人); 经得住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I couldn't resist telling him the secret.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我忍不住把那个秘密告诉了他。</font><br>\n
resistance	<h3>resistance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抵抗, 反抗, 抵抗能力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The defenders put up a strong resistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 守军顽强抵抗。</font><br>阻力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The aircraft is streamlined to cut down wind resistance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机设计成流线型以减小风的阻力。</font><br>电阻, 热阻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Copper has less resistance to electricity than lead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铜比铅的电阻要小。</font><br>\n
resistant	<h3>resistant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有抵抗力的, 抵抗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They imposed their government by force on the resistant population.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以武力把自己的统治强加在持反抗态度的人民头上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种新传染病对抗菌素有抗药力。</font><br>\n
resolution	<h3>resolution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>正式决定, 决议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee have passed a resolution that conditions (should) be improved.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会通过了改善环境的决议。</font><br>决心, 决定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's always making good resolutions but he never carries them out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他决心经常下得很大, 但从不实行。</font><br>坚决; 坚定; 坚毅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech ended on a note of resolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他演讲结束时语气很坚决。</font><br>解决, 解答<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lawyer's advice led to the resolution of this difficult problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 律师的劝告帮助解决了这个难题。</font><br>分辨力, 分辨率[度]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are satellites that supply high-resolution photography.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些卫星能提供高分辨率的摄影图像。</font><br>\n
resolve	<h3>resolve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>决定; 决心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She resolved against going.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她决定不去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She resolved never to see him again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她决心不再见他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(指委员会或集会)表决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The union resolved to strike by 40 votes to 18.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工会以40票对18票通过决议举行罢工。</font><br>解决(问题、疑问等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Cabinet met to resolve the crisis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 内阁开会, 寻求解决危机的办法。</font><br>分解, 解析(某物)<br>\n
resort	<h3>resort</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>求助于或诉诸某事物; 采取某手段或方法应急或作为对策<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One has sometimes to resort to these little devices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们有时还得依靠这些小玩意儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>求助, 凭借, 诉诸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He couldn't have passed the exam without resort to cheating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要不是靠作弊是通不过这次考试的。</font><br>求助[凭借]的对象; 采用的办法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Friends are the best resort in trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在困难中, 朋友是最好的可以求助的人。</font><br>度假胜地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The park is one of his favourite resorts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这公园是他最喜欢去的地方之一。</font><br>\n
resource	<h3>resource</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>资源<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This country is rich in natural resources.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该国自然资源丰富。</font><br>(必要时可给予)帮助、支持或安慰的事物<br>才智; 机敏; 创造精神<br>\n
respect	<h3>respect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>尊重, 敬佩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please respect yourself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请尊重你自己。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尊敬, 尊重<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new teacher soon won the respect of his students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位新来的老师很快就赢得了学生们的尊重。</font><br>考虑, 关心, 顾虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must have respect to the needs of the general readers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须考虑一般读者的需要。</font><br>细节, 方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan is faulty in every respect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论从哪个方面来看这项计划都不完善。</font><br>敬意, 问候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please send them my respects when you write.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你写信的时候请代我向他们致意。</font><br>\n
respective	<h3>respective</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>各自的; 各个的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He and I are each going to visit our respective teachers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我和他分别要去拜访各自的老师。</font><br>\n
respectively	<h3>respectively</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>各自地, 各个地, 分别地<br>\n
respond	<h3>respond</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>回答; 回报; 响应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I offered him a drink but he did not respond.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我请他喝酒, 但他未作回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They responded my joke by laughing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对我的笑话报以大笑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>有反应; 有效果; 有影响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their envoy showed no sign of responding to our proposals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的代表对我方的提议毫无回应的迹象。</font><br>\n
response	<h3>response</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>回答; 回音; 答复<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has received a response from that college to her application.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已经收到那所大学对她申请的答复。</font><br>反应, 响应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been very little response to our call for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们求助的号召没有多少响应。</font><br>\n
responsibility	<h3>responsibility</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>责任<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has no responsibility for that accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对那个事故没有责任。</font><br>责任感, 可信赖性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The father of a family should have more sense of responsibility.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一家之父应有更多的责任感。</font><br>职责, 所负责任的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know the responsibilities of the government workers?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道政府工作人员的职责吗?</font><br>\n
responsible	<h3>responsible</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>负有责任的, 需承担责任的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He must be responsible to me for this matter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事他必须对我负责。</font><br>需对…负责的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is responsible to me for it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事他对我负责。</font><br>尽责的, 可靠的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a responsible secretary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个尽职尽责的秘书。</font><br>责任重大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He holds a very responsible position in the firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在公司里担任一个非常重要的职务。</font><br>\n
rest	<h3>rest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>休息, 睡眠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You need enough rest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你需要充足的休息。</font><br>静止(状态)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rolling ball came to rest at the foot of the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 滚动的球在山脚停住了。</font><br>支持物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This wall will do as a rest for your camera.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这墙可以作为你的照相机的支架。</font><br>剩余(部分), 余下的人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Throw the rest away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把剩下的丢掉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lived the rest of her life in Vienna.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在维也纳度过了余生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)休息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We stopped to rest the horses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们停下来让马休息一下。</font><br>(使)倚靠[支撑]<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>停止, 不再谈论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The matter cannot rest here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件事不能到此为止。</font><br>\n
restaurant	<h3>restaurant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>饭店, 餐馆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The service in that restaurant was very poor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家餐馆的服务很差。</font><br>\n
restless	<h3>restless</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>焦躁不安的, 不安静的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looks like a restless man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看上去坐立不安。</font><br>不得休息的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I passed a restless night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我度过了一个不眠之夜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been very restless all day and he awoke nearly all last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一整天都心神不定, 昨夜几乎一整夜没有合眼。</font><br>\n
restore	<h3>restore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>归还; 交还<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His conscience overcame him and he restored the books he had taken from the shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的良心战胜了自己, 他把从书店拿的几本书放回了原处。</font><br>使恢复<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At present the doctor is giving him daily massages to help restore the function of his limbs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 目前医生每天在给他按摩, 帮助他恢复腿臂的功能。</font><br>修复; 重建<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old painting was damaged in the flood and had to be painstakingly restored.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那幅古画在洪水中遭到毁坏, 必须精心修复。</font><br>\n

restrict	<h3>restrict</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>限制; 约束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He feels this new law will restrict his freedom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他觉得这一新法律会限制他的自由。</font><br>\n
result	<h3>result</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结果; 效果; 后果; 成效<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The result was quite opposite to what we had expected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 结果和我们所期望的完全相反。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Success depends on the results of this experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 成功与否取决于这次实验的效果。</font><br>比分, 成绩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will you get your exam results?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你什么时候可以知道考试成绩?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>发生, 产生; 导致, 结果是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the government policies are expressed imprecisely, confusion results.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府政策的措辞含混不清就会产生混乱。</font><br>\n

retail	<h3>retail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>零售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The retail dealer buys at wholesale and sells at retail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 零售商批发购进货物, 以零售价卖出。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>零售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In this shop they retail tobacco and sweets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家铺子零售香烟和糖果。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>传播, 转述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is fond of retailing the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢传播消息。</font><br>\n

return	<h3>return</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>返回, 回来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll return at 10 this evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今晚十点回来。</font><br>恢复<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>还, 归还, 退回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you return my car key?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把汽车钥匙还给我, 好吗?</font><br>回报<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>回来, 回程, 回路<br>偿还, 归还<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Police announced the return of the stolen goods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察宣布将偷窃的物品送还原主。</font><br>回复; 回归; 复发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope you will not have any return of your illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 希望你的病不再复发。</font><br>归还之物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That bookstore would not accept returns even ones in good condition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家书店不接受退还的书, 即使是完好无损的书也不要。</font><br>利润, 收益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These shares have brought in good returns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些股票带来很好的收益。</font><br>\n

reunite	<h3>reunite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某人或某物)再次联合, 重聚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is trying her best to reunite with her father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她想方设法与父亲团聚。</font><br>\n
reveal	<h3>reveal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>显示; 露出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her laugh revealed her even teeth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一笑就露出了她那整齐的牙齿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Research has revealed that he is a monster of iniquity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 调查结果显示他是一个不法之徒。</font><br>泄露; 透露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never revealed his identity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从未暴露过自己的身份。</font><br>\n
revenue	<h3>revenue</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>收入, 收益; 财政收入, 税收<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A government's revenue and expenditure should be balanced.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府的财政收入和支出要平衡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Diminish the revenue by reducing tax.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于减税而使这个国家的税收减少。</font><br>\n
reverse	<h3>reverse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)反转; (使)颠倒; (使)翻转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please reverse the positions of two pictures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把两张图片的位置倒转过来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their positions are now reversed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们现在的位置颠倒了。</font><br>推翻, 取消<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The appeal court reversed the original verdict and set the prisoner free.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上诉法庭撤销了原判, 把那个犯人释放了。</font><br>使倒退, 逆转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car reversed out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车倒退出去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car was reversed through the gate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 车子倒出门了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>相反的, 颠倒的, 反向的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please read the names on this list in reverse order.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请看看这张单子上的名字, 先从末尾看起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please write down your name on the reverse side of the envelope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请在信封的背面写下你的名字。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>相反<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His answer was just the reverse of what I expected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的回答正好与我期望的相反。</font><br>钱币的反面[背面]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The coin has a crowned lion on its reverse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这枚硬币反面的图案是个戴皇冠的狮子。</font><br>失败, 挫败<br>\n
review	<h3>review</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>回顾; 检查; 检讨; 重新考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These arrangements are subject to periodic reviews.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这几项安排须定期检查。</font><br>评论性刊物, 评论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The college published a drama review.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学院出版了一份戏剧评论刊物。</font><br>检阅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soldiers were in full uniform for the review.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 士兵们身着全套军礼服准备接受检阅。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>回顾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before falling asleep, Helen reviewed the day's happenings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海伦在入睡以前回想了当天发生的事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you reviewed what we covered in class yesterday?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我们课堂上讲的东西你们复习了吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>写…的评论文章<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He reviews articles in his spare time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在业余时间写评论文章。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you reviewed for this newly published novel?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给这本新出版的小说写书评了吗?</font><br>\n
