revise	<h3>revise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修订, 修改<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are revising a dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在修订一部词典。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should revise your opinion of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该纠正对他的看法。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>复习<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must revise for the examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应当复习功课以迎接考试。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is revising her notes for the examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在阅读笔记准备考试。</font><br>\n
revolt	<h3>revolt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)厌恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The violence in the movie revolted me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电影里的暴力行为使我反感。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>反叛; 背叛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His whole nature revolted against deceit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他生来就对欺骗行为反感。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tribesmen will revolt if you ask them to pay taxes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你若要求部落里的人们交税, 他们会反叛的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>造反, 起义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The governor convened his troops to put down the revolt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总督召集他的部队去镇压叛乱。</font><br>\n
revolution	<h3>revolution</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>革命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Russian Revolution occurred on November 7, 1917.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 俄国十月革命发生于1917年11月7日。</font><br>彻底改变, 重大变革<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That country must have an industrial revolution.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国家必须进行工业革命。</font><br>旋转; 运行, 公转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The earth makes one revolution around the sun in about 365 days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球约在365天内绕太阳公转一次。</font><br>\n
revolutionary	<h3>revolutionary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>革命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suffered for his revolutionary principles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为了自己的革命原则而蒙受苦难。</font><br>革命性的, 创新的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a revolutionary new way of growing rice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种全新的种稻方法。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>革命者, 革新者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The revolutionaries are attacking the palace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 革命分子在攻打王宫。</font><br>\n
revolve	<h3>revolve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)旋转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wheel revolved on its centre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轮子绕中心转动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He revolved the pencil between his fingers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他转动着夹在手指间的铅笔。</font><br>细想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He revolved the main points in his mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脑子里反复思考着这些问题。</font><br>\n
reward	<h3>reward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>报酬, 报答, 奖赏, 报偿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He will expect some reward after working so hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他工作很努力, 会得到报偿的。</font><br>赏金, 酬金<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police are offering a big reward for information about the robbery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方出大笔赏金要求提供那起抢劫案的破案线索。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>酬谢, 奖赏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can I reward your kindness?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怎样才能报答你的好心呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those who protect the oil field will be rewarded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保护油田者有奖。</font><br>\n
rhythm	<h3>rhythm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>节奏, 韵律<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His poem has a pleasing rhythm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的诗有和谐的韵律。</font><br>\n
rib	<h3>rib</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肋骨, 排骨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suffered three cracked ribs in the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在一次事故中折断了三根肋骨。</font><br>肋骨状的东西; 骨架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ribs of the umbrella are strong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨伞的骨架非常结实。</font><br>\n
ribbon	<h3>ribbon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>带, 缎带, 丝带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her hair was tied up with a ribbon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用一条丝带系着头发。</font><br>(打印机的)色带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Typewriter ribbons may be all black or black and red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 打字机的色带可以是全黑的或黑红色的。</font><br>\n
rice	<h3>rice</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>稻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little bird is eating a grain of rice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只小鸟正在吃一粒米。</font><br>稻米, 大米<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmers grow rice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农民种稻子。</font><br>\n
rich	<h3>rich</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>富裕的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came from a rich family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他出身于富裕家庭。</font><br>贵重的; 昂贵的; 豪华的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rich man lives in luxurious surroundings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位富人生活在奢侈的环境中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a rich present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一件贵重的礼物。</font><br>盛产的, 丰富的, 多的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is rich in the inner feelings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她内心的感情丰富。</font><br>丰产的; 肥沃的<br>油腻的, 味浓的; 富于营养的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was prone to indigestion after rich restaurant meals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上饭馆吃过油腻食物之后, 他常受消化不良之苦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oranges are rich in vitamin C.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 橙子富含维生素C。</font><br>深的; 鲜艳的; 深沉的; 洪亮的; 浓烈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The studio was filled with the rich odour of roses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工作室里弥漫着玫瑰花浓郁的香气。</font><br>\n
rid	<h3>rid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使摆脱, 解除…的负担, 从…中清除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They swore that they would rid the country of its military rulers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们发誓要为国家除掉军事统治者。</font><br>\n
ride	<h3>ride</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>乘, 骑, 驾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His horse rides well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的马好骑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She rides easy in the saddle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在马鞍上骑得很轻松。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We ride our horses in the park each morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每天早晨在公园里骑马。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>乘骑, 乘坐, 搭乘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had a ride on a horse for an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我骑马骑了一个小时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The luxury model gives a smoother ride.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坐这种豪华型汽车感觉很平稳。</font><br>\n
ridge	<h3>ridge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>脊, 山脊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We walked along the mountain ridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们顺着山脊行走。</font><br>脊状突起<br>\n
ridiculous	<h3>ridiculous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可笑的, 荒谬的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard in my life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我有生以来听到的最为荒唐可笑的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is ridiculous to dispute about such things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 争论这样的事情是可笑的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's ridiculous that we should have to queue, when we have already got our tickets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经拿到了票, 居然还要排队, 未免可笑。</font><br>\n
rifle	<h3>rifle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>步枪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have a few rifles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们有几支步枪。</font><br>\n
right	<h3>right</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>正当的, 适当的, 合法的, 符合要求的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll try to do whatever is right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要是正当的事, 我都尽力去做。</font><br>对的, 正确的, 准确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave the right answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他做出了正确的回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Actually, that's not quite right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 实际上, 那不完全对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was right that I should be present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我自然应当到场。</font><br>右边的, 右方的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take a right turn at the crossroads.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在十字路口右转弯。</font><br>切合实际的, 最适宜的, 最恰当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's the sort of woman who always says the right things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个说话总能恰到好处的女人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their ages were just right for a match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他俩的年龄结婚匹配正相宜。</font><br>良好的, 正常的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Things are right now again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事情又恢复正常了。</font><br>真实的, 完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That man's a right idiot!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男子完全是个白痴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>准确地; 直接地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go right home at once, don't stop off anywhere on the way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 直接回家去, 别在路上的什么地方呆下来。</font><br>彻底地; 完全地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm right behind you there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我完全支持你。</font><br>向右, 往右<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Turn right at the end of the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这条街的尽头向右拐。</font><br>正确地; 令人满意地; 恰当地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have I guessed right or wrong?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜得对不对?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing seems to be going right for me at the moment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我现在好像事事不顺心。</font><br>立即, 马上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll go right after lunch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 午饭后我马上去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>正确; 正当; 公正; 正义<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're old enough to know the difference between right and wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你已经长大了, 能够分辨是非了。</font><br>权利<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We fought for the right of access to government information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们争取查看政府资料的权利。</font><br>右边, 右面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tony was sitting on my right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 托尼坐在我的右边。</font><br>右手, 右手拳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got me with a right to the jaw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用右手朝我下巴打了一拳。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使回复到适当的[正确的, 直立的]位置<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The inventory situation was righting itself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 库存局面正在恢复正常。</font><br>纠正, 改正<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mistake is being righted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 错误正在得到纠正。</font><br>\n
right-handed	<h3>right-handed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>用右手的,向右旋地<br>\n

right-wing	<h3>right-wing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>右翼的,右派的<br>\n
rigid	<h3>rigid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>刚硬的; 僵硬的; 不弯曲的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We just need a tent supported on a rigid framework.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正需要一座有坚硬架子支撑的帐篷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was rigid with fear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她害怕得全身僵住了。</font><br>严格的; 死板的; 不变的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is rigid about points of procedure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坚持议事程序上的要点。</font><br>\n
ring	<h3>ring</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>戒指, 指环<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a gold ring on his finger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他手指上戴着一枚金戒指。</font><br>环状物, 圆圈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wears a pair of pretty ear rings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她戴着一副漂亮的耳环。</font><br>团伙, 帮派<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The auctioneers organized a secret ring to control the sales.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拍卖商们组织起一个秘密团伙来操纵货物的拍卖。</font><br>铃声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a ring at the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人按门铃。</font><br>打电话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will give you a ring tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天晚上我给你打电话。</font><br>特性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a ring of sincerity in his promise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的许诺中有一种真诚的语气。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…圈起来; 环绕; 包围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ring the spelling mistakes with red ink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用红墨水把拼写错误圈出来。</font><br>打电话给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please ring the doctor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请打电话给医生。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)鸣, 响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The church bells are ringing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教堂的钟声在响着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bell rang clear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铃声清脆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man on duty rang an alarm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 值班员发出警报。</font><br>按铃; 敲钟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you ring, sir?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是你按的铃吗, 先生?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please ring the bell if you want anything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是需要什么, 请按铃。</font><br>\n

roar	<h3>roar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>咆哮, 怒吼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who dares to answer back when he roars like a lion?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他像狮子般地咆哮时, 谁敢和他顶嘴?</font><br>大笑, 狂笑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His jokes made us all roar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的玩笑让我们大家哄笑不止。</font><br>大哭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to roar when I took the chocolate away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当我把巧克力拿走时, 他大哭起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>大声喊出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He roared that was a violation of the rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声说, 那是违反规则的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was too excited and roared himself hoarse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过于激动, 嗓子都喊哑了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>吼叫声; 咆哮声; 呼啸声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was frightened by the roars of a lion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被狮子的吼叫声吓呆了。</font><br>\n

rock	<h3>rock</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>岩石<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To build this tunnel we had to cut through the solid rock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了修建这条隧道, 我们必须凿开坚硬的岩石。</font><br>岩块, 石块; 礁; 暗礁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship came close to the rocks and then sheered away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条船驶近岩礁, 然后迅速转向避开。</font><br>石头, 石子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's danger from falling rocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里有石块儿崩落的危险。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lifted the rock without effort.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他毫不费力地举起了那块石头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That boy threw rocks at me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩向我扔石子。</font><br>摇滚乐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She likes rock music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她喜爱摇滚乐。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)来回摆动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trees rocked in the wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树在风中摇摆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The movement of the ship rocked us to sleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船的摇晃使我们进入了梦乡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使震惊; 使受震动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His sudden death rocked the village.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的突然死亡震惊了全村。</font><br>\n
rocket	<h3>rocket</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>火箭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The space rocket was launched and went into orbit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宇宙火箭发射后进入轨道。</font><br>斥责<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll really get a rocket if you're late again!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是再迟到, 肯定会受到斥责！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>飞快地移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film has rocketed overseas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部电影以最快的速度传到国外。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train rocketed through the station at 90 miles an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那列火车以一小时九十英里的速度飞速驶过车站。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rocketed to star overnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一夜之间成了明星。</font><br>急速上升<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp House prices are rocketing up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房价在飞涨。</font><br>\n

role	<h3>role</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>作用, 职责<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The success of her business made it difficult for her to fulfil her role as wife and mother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在事业上的成功使她难以尽到当妻子和母亲的职责。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The headmaster plays an important role in the good running of a school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 办好一所学校, 校长起重要作用。</font><br>角色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She prefers to play comic roles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她更喜欢扮演滑稽角色。</font><br>\n
roll	<h3>roll</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)打滚, (使)转动, 滚动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Round things roll easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 圆的东西容易滚动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child was rolling a hoop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个孩子在滚铁环。</font><br>卷, 把…卷成筒状<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wire rolled easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种金属线便于卷绕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rolled a cigarette for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我卷了一支烟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>碾平<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lawn should be well rolled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这草地该好好地碾一碾了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Roll the road surface flat!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把路面碾平！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>左右摇晃, 摇摆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship was rolling badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船左右摇晃得厉害。</font><br>发出隆隆声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The drums rolled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鼓声隆隆。</font><br>开始工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are the cameras rolling?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拍摄开始了没有?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一卷<br>面包卷, 圆面包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Six brown rolls, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我来六卷黑面包。</font><br>名册<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher read the roll of graduates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师宣读毕业生名单。</font><br>打滚; 滚动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our dog loves a roll on the grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的狗喜爱在草地上打滚。</font><br>轰隆声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We heard the distant roll of the big guns.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听到远处的隆隆的大炮声。</font><br>\n
roller	<h3>roller</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>滚压机; 滚杠, 滚柱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They pushed the boat down to the water on rollers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们利用滚杠把小船推下水。</font><br>定型卷夹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She put her hair in rollers to make it curl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用卷发夹子把头发弄鬈曲。</font><br>巨浪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The great Atlantic rollers surged in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大西洋的巨浪翻滚到岸边。</font><br>\n
romantic	<h3>romantic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>多情的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a romantic nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她天生多情。</font><br>富于浪漫色彩的, 充满传奇情调的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Romantic fiction can no longer attract her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 浪漫小说已不再能吸引她了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband is very romantic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她丈夫非常浪漫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She thinks it will be romantic to be an actress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她认为当个女演员会很浪漫。</font><br>空想的, 不实际的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't get carried away with romantic notions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要被不切实际的想法弄得忘乎所以。</font><br>浪漫主义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The professor was a person with romantic ideals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个教授是一个浪漫主义者。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tends to be romantic owing to lack of experience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于缺乏经验, 他有浪漫主义的倾向。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>富于浪漫气息的人<br>浪漫主义作家[画家等]<br>\n
roof	<h3>roof</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>屋顶; 顶部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The roof of the burning house fell in with a crash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 着火房子的屋顶哗啦一声塌下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is difficult to get them all together under one roof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把他们都聚集到一起是困难的。</font><br>\n
room	<h3>room</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>房间; 室<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They blasted her into a black room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把她送进一间黑屋子。</font><br>空间, 地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Buy the children's shoes big enough to allow room for growth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子的鞋要买得大些, 脚还要长大。</font><br>\n
root	<h3>root</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>根, 根部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The roots of this plant go deep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种植物的根扎得很深。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Five is the square root of 25.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 五是二十五的平方根。</font><br>根源, 根基, 根本, 基础<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Money is the root of all evil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金钱是万恶之源。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unhappiness is the root cause of his illness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不开心是他生病的根源。</font><br>祖籍, 原籍, 老家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has no real roots in this area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他原籍不在这儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(指植物)生根成长; 种植(植物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do roses root easily?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玫瑰容易生根成长吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Root this bundle of peonies in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 使这束牡丹在花园里生根成长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(某人)站立不动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fear rooted her to the spot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她吓得呆若木鸡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her affection for him is deeply rooted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对他的爱是坚定不移的。</font><br>使(某事物)深深扎根; 牢固地树立(某事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our movement is rooted in the hearts of the people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的运动在人民的心中根深蒂固。</font><br>\n
rope	<h3>rope</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>粗绳, 绳索, 缆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tied the ship to the quay with ropes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用绳子把船拴在码头上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When you go to a new school it takes a while to learn the ropes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当你上一所新的学校时, 你需要花一段时间熟悉内情。</font><br>一串<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(用绳子)捆, 绑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He roped his horse to a nearby tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把马拴在附近的一棵树上。</font><br>\n
rose	<h3>rose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>玫瑰, 玫瑰花; 蔷薇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He picked her a rose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给她采了一朵玫瑰花。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those roses perfume the whole garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些玫瑰花使满园飘香。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A vase of roses cheered up the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一瓶玫瑰花使得房间里生气盎然。</font><br>\n
rotate	<h3>rotate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某物)旋转[转动]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The earth rotates around the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球绕着太阳转。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor asked the patient to rotate his eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生叫病人转动一下眼球。</font><br>(使某人或某物)轮流[按顺序循环]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The post of chairman rotates among members of the committee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主席一职由委员会的成员轮流担任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can rotate the wheel with your hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以用手转动轮子。</font><br>\n
rotten	<h3>rotten</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>腐烂的; 腐朽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The smell of the rotten meat was enough!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这腐臭的肉闻一下就够人受的了！</font><br>道德败坏的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man's morals are rotten to the core.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个人道德败坏至极。</font><br>极坏的; 极讨厌的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a rotten cook.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她做的饭很差劲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book was pretty rotten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书糟透了。</font><br>\n
rough	<h3>rough</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>粗糙的; 不平的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rough road made the car vibrate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坑坑洼洼的道路使车颠得厉害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This paper feels rough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这纸摸起来很粗糙。</font><br>粗鲁的; 粗暴的; 粗野的; 剧烈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Football is a rough sport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 足球是一种很剧烈的运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His reply was a bit rough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的答复过于粗鲁了一点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be so rough with the child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对小孩不要这样粗暴。</font><br>粗制的; 粗略的; 概略的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As the jewel was in the rough state, he had no idea what size it would be when cut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块宝石未经琢磨, 他不知道加工后有多大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's just a very rough translation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只是一篇非常粗糙的译稿。</font><br>(味道、声音等)令人不快的; 难吃的; 刺耳的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little boy has a rough tongue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小男孩讲话很不中听。</font><br>不舒服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had rather a rough time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们经历了一段艰苦的日子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>过艰苦生活<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The explorers had to rough it when they got into the jungle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些探险者进入丛林后, 不得不过着艰苦的生活。</font><br>\n
round	<h3>round</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>圆形的, 球形的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child had a round face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那孩子脸蛋圆润。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The area was perfectly round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那区域完全是圆形的。</font><br>滚圆的, 丰满的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a short and round man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个矮胖的男人。</font><br>用整数表示的, 取整数的, 整整的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give me a round dozen and I'll pay in cash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给我一整打, 我将付现金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What he said is a round lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他所说的是十足的谎话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>绕圈子; 围绕地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse is running round the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马在场上兜着圈子跑。</font><br>在周围; 在附近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A crowd soon gathered round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群人很快围了上来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He visited all the people round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他访问了附近所有的人。</font><br>到各处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me show you round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我领你到处转转。</font><br>去某地点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He invited us round for drinks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他请我们到家里喝几杯。</font><br>到处, 各处, 逐一地, 挨个地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't got enough candies to go round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有足够的糖果可让每人都分到。</font><br>朝反方向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Turn the picture round to face the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把画转过去面对墙。</font><br>大约, 大概<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was the face of a man round fifty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个五十岁光景的男人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…四周, 围绕于…; 向[在]…各处, 遍及; 在…附近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They swarmed close round her to hear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们挤在她的周围听着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives in a village round the town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住在这个小镇附近的一个村庄里。</font><br>(表示时间)从…的开始到结束; 在…整个期间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shops are always crowded with people all round the year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 商店一年到头总是挤满了人。</font><br>(表示方向)环绕, 围绕; 往[在]…的另一边, 绕过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a mile by water, four miles round the shore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由水路去只有一英里, 沿岸绕行要四英里。</font><br>(表示状态)团结在…周围, 跟随着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The reformer soon gathered a band of followers round him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 改革者很快就获得一群追随者支持他。</font><br>(表示论及)关于…的解决办法[途径]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are several solutions round this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于这一点有几个解决办法。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>圆(片)形食物; 圆; 圆形物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cut the pastry into small rounds, one for each pie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把油酥面团切成小圆片, 每个馅饼用一片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are ６ whole rounds of bread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是六整份的面包。</font><br>一回合, 一局, 一场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each round of the boxing match lasts three minutes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拳击比赛每回合时间是三分钟。</font><br>一连串, 一系列, 一套, 一组; 一阵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A round of parties ushered in the New Year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一系列的晚会迎来了新年。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech won round after round of enthusiastic applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的演讲博得了一阵又一阵的热烈掌声。</font><br>巡视(路线); 巡回(路线)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The night watchman makes the rounds of the building every hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 巡夜人员每小时都巡视这建筑物。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)成圆形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children's eyes rounded with excitement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小孩子们兴奋得瞪圆了眼睛。</font><br>绕行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bear rounded and faced the hunters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 熊转过身, 面对着猎人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He rounded a corner and walked into a narrow street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拐过弯走进一条狭窄的街道。</font><br>\n
rouse	<h3>rouse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>醒来; 唤醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I usually rouse at six in the morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我通常在早晨6点钟醒来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's time to rouse the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该叫醒孩子们了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使…活跃起来[产生兴趣]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their rejection of these measures roused the people to indignation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拒不采取这些措施, 引起了人民的愤慨。</font><br>\n
route	<h3>route</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>路, 路途, 路线, 路程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The climbers tried to find a new route to the top of the mountain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 登山者试图寻出一条通到山顶的新路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the quickest route to Europe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是去欧洲最快的路线。</font><br>\n
routine	<h3>routine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>例行公事, 惯例, 惯常的程序<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The security men changed their usual routine and collected the money at a different time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保安人员改变了他们通常的做法, 在不同的时间取款。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>例行的; 常规的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's just a routine medical examination, nothing to get worried about.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只是例行的体格检查, 没有什么可担心的。</font><br>\n
row	<h3>row</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一排, 一行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The audience in the front rows made room for the late comers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 前排的观众为迟来的人让出座位。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A row of children are standing in front of a row of chairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一排小孩站在一排椅子前。</font><br>划船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A long row is very tiring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长时间的划船是很累的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>划船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was rowing steadily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不慌不忙地划着船。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you row a boat?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会划船吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>争吵, 吵闹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son and his girlfriend have had yet another row, but no doubt they'll patch it up by the weekend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我儿子和他女朋友又吵了一架, 但到周末他们会和好的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>争吵, 吵闹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She rowed the driver about the fare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她为车费跟司机吵闹。</font><br>\n
royal	<h3>royal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>国王的, 女王的<br>大规模的; 极大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a royal mess of the kitchen when he tried to bake a cake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图烤蛋糕时, 把厨房搞得一团糟。</font><br>\n
rub	<h3>rub</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>擦; 搓; 揉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go and rub your hands dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去把你的双手擦干。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>接触; 摩擦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My shoe rubbed my heel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的一只鞋子硌脚跟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The journal rubs against the bearing surface.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轴颈在轴承面上摩擦。</font><br>\n
rubber	<h3>rubber</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(合成)橡胶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rubber will not let water through.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水浸不透橡胶。</font><br>橡皮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Leather, rubber and wire are flexible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 皮革、橡皮和电线都是易弯曲的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pencil marks can be erased with a rubber.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铅笔的痕迹可被橡皮擦掉。</font><br>黑板擦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher is cleaning the blackboard with a board rubber.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师正在用黑板擦擦黑板。</font><br>橡胶套鞋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We wear rubbers on our feet when it rains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下雨时我们穿橡胶套鞋。</font><br>\n
rubbish	<h3>rubbish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>垃圾, 废弃物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a pile of rubbish in the corner of the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在街道的拐角处有一堆垃圾。</font><br>无意义的东西; 废话, 胡说八道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is all rubbish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书全是胡言乱语。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>〈英澳·非正〉把…说得一钱不值; 贬损…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book was rubbished by them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书被他们贬得一无是处。</font><br>\n
rude	<h3>rude</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>粗鲁的; 不礼貌的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't make rude remarks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要说粗话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is rude to point.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 指指点点是不礼貌的。</font><br>近乎下流的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His brother is being rude.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的哥哥变得粗暴无礼起来了。</font><br>狂暴的; 惊人的; 突然的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship got a rude shock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船受到猛烈的震荡。</font><br>简陋的, 粗制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They only have rude tools.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们只有些简陋的工具。</font><br>\n
rug	<h3>rug</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小块地毯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bargained with the merchant for an hour before he bought a rug.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他与那商人讨价还价了一个小时才买下一块地毯。</font><br>\n
ruin	<h3>ruin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>破坏, 毁掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The storm ruined our wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴风雨毁坏了我们的小麦。</font><br>使破产, 使沦落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was ruined by that law case, I'm a ruined man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我被那场官司搞垮了, 现在已经倾家荡产。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>毁坏, 毁灭, 灭亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This news meant the ruin of all our hopes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息使我们的一切希望都破灭了。</font><br>完全丧失, 断送; 垮台(的原因)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This flood will be the ruin of the harvest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场洪水将是没有收成的祸根。</font><br>破败、坍塌或毁坏的状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The church has fallen into ruin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那教堂已破败不堪。</font><br>废墟; 遗迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The abbey is now a ruin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那座修道院现已成废墟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many ruins of Roman date are to be seen in the south of France.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多古罗马时期的遗迹可以在法国南部看到。</font><br>\n
rule	<h3>rule</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>规则, 规章, 规定, 条例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should be observant of the traffic rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该遵守交通规则。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He knows the decimal rules.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他懂得十进制的用法。</font><br>习惯; 惯常的做法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She makes a rule of going for a walk every afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有每天下午散步的习惯。</font><br>统治; 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These are the countries that were once under French rule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些是曾由法国统治的国家。</font><br>尺, 折尺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Use a rule to measure the width of that cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用尺子量一下那块布的宽度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>统治; 控制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Obviously economic forces rule.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很显然经济力量起决定作用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ruled supreme.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他享有最高统治权。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The King ruled his people well and wisely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位国王贤明地统治着他的臣民。</font><br>判定, 裁定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The king rules in that country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个国家一切听从国王裁决。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The judge ruled that the witness (should) be heard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位法官裁定要传唤证人问话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用尺子划; 在…上划平行线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ruled the test paper carefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他小心地在考卷上画直线。</font><br>\n
ruler	<h3>ruler</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尺, 直尺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Draw a line with a ruler.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用尺子画一条线。</font><br>统治者, 支配者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A wise ruler is generous in victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明智的统治者对待被击败的敌人是宽大的。</font><br>\n
rumor	<h3>rumor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈美〉传闻, 风闻; 谣言, 谣传<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are all sorts of rumors in the air that dozens of people were dead in the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有各种传闻说许多人在那场大火中死亡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been a rumor mill on him for years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几年来, 一直有谣言产生，对他进行中伤。</font><br>\n
rumour	<h3>rumour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>传闻, 风闻; 谣言, 谣传<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are all sorts of rumours in the air that dozens of people were dead in the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有各种传闻说许多人在那场大火中死亡。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There has been a rumour mill on him for years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几年来, 一直有谣言产生，对他进行中伤。</font><br>\n
run	<h3>run</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rabbits run fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兔子跑得快。</font><br>移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some of these old cars are still running.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些这样的老车仍在行驶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me run the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我来开动这台机器。</font><br>(使)流动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you left the bath running?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你忘了关浴缸的水龙头了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please run me a nice hot bath.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请帮我放上热水, 让我好好洗个澡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跑, 奔跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Catching sight of the dog, he broke into a run.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一看见那只狗, 就赶紧跑。</font><br>旅行, 旅程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oxford to London is about an hour's run by train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从牛津到伦敦乘火车大约有一小时行程。</font><br>行驶路线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boat operates on the Dover—Calais run.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘船运行的是多佛——加莱航线。</font><br>时期; 一段时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play had a good run of six months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那出戏演了六个月。</font><br>\n
rural	<h3>rural</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>农村的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We left the city for a rural home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们离开城市, 去农村安家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lived a rural life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过着田园生活。</font><br>\n
rush	<h3>rush</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)急速行进; 仓促完成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't rush, take your time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别急急忙忙的, 慢慢来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They rushed to see what was happening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们冲出去看发生了什么事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fans rushed the stage after the concert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 音乐会结束后, 乐迷涌向舞台。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please rush me your recent books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请贵方将新书速寄来为盼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>催促<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't rush me.I must think it over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别催我, 我要仔细想想。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>冲, 奔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a mad rush to seats on the bus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公共汽车上乘客疯狂抢占着座位。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's been a rush to see the new film.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们争先恐后地去看那部新影片。</font><br>繁忙的活动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the rush was over, he insisted that everybody take a day off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那一阵忙过之后, 他一定要大家休假一天。</font><br>大量急需<br>\n
rust	<h3>rust</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铁锈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mower is covered with rust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 割草机布满了锈。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)生锈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My bike has rusted and needs oil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的自行车生锈了, 需要上油。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain will rust the iron roof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨水会使铁皮屋顶生锈。</font><br>\n
sack	<h3>sack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>麻袋, 包<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Coal used to cost 3 shillings a sack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 以往一袋煤值三先令。</font><br>一袋的量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought three sacks of rice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买了三袋米。</font><br>开除, 解雇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got the sack for petty thiev-ing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因小偷小摸而被开除了。</font><br>洗劫, 劫掠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The invaders put all to the sack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 入侵者把所有的东西洗劫一空。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>装入袋中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were sacking the potatoes in the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在地里把土豆装袋。</font><br>解雇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Facer was sacked five days ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 费塞五天前被解雇了。</font><br>洗劫, 劫掠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The invaders sacked the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 侵略者把这座城市洗劫一空。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew his rifle from its sacking cover.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从麻布枪套里抽出步枪。</font><br>\n
sacrifice	<h3>sacrifice</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>牺牲, 舍身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His parents made a lot of sacrifices to make sure he got a good education.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的父母为确保他得到良好的教育而作了很多牺牲。</font><br>献祭, 供奉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Before the battle, the commanders ordered the sacrifice of two bullocks to the god of war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 打仗之前, 指挥官下令给战神供奉两只小公牛。</font><br>祭品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They killed a sheep as a sacrifice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们宰了一只羊作为祭品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>献祭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ancient Greeks sacrificed lambs or calves before engaging in battle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 古希腊人在打仗前用羊和小牛作祭品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>牺牲, 献出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jacelin sacrificed his life to save the child from the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰斯林牺牲自己的生命把孩子从火中救了出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sacrificed his holiday to help his brother's business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了帮助兄弟经商, 他放弃休假。</font><br>\n
sad	<h3>sad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>悲哀的, 忧愁的, 难过的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I am sad, I take refuge in remembering happier times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当我悲伤时, 就从回忆过去快乐的时光中寻求安慰。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was sad to hear that you're sick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听说你病了, 我心里很难过。</font><br>糟糕的, 不成样子的, 不像话的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a sad state of affairs when children aren't taught to read properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不教好孩子如何读书是一件很糟糕的事。</font><br>\n
saddle	<h3>saddle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(马)鞍, 鞍状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please give me a lift onto the saddle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请扶我上马鞍。</font><br>车座<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bicycle saddle is too high for this child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆自行车车座对这孩子来说太高了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>给(马)装鞍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saddled his horse, mounted, and rode away at a gallop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给马套上鞍子, 跨上马背疾驰而去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使承担<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saddled his parents with heavy debts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他让父母背上了沉重的债务。</font><br>\n
safe	<h3>safe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>安全的; 不会有危险的; 不受威胁的; 受保护的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building was locked, and all of us within felt safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大楼被锁上了, 我们在里面感到安全。</font><br>没有受到损害的; 平安的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all wished him a safe journey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都祝他一路平安。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car crashed but he was safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车撞毁了, 但他却安然无恙。</font><br>不致导致损害[损伤, 损失]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is safe to cross the river in this boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坐这艘船过河很安全。</font><br>不冒险的, 小心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher appointed a safe student as monitor of our class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师任命了一个谨小慎微的学生担任我们的班长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保险箱, 保险柜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A worker put metal bands around the safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一名工人用金属箍箍那保险箱。</font><br>\n
safety	<h3>safety</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>安全; 平安<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The safety of the ship is the captain's responsibility.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 确保船的安全是船长的责任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was worried about the safety of me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我的安全担心。</font><br>\n
sail	<h3>sail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>帆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The men took in sail when the storm approached.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水手们在暴风雨来临时落下了船帆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship was in full sail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该船正满帆而行。</font><br>航行游览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's go for a sail this afternoon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天下午我们乘船出游吧。</font><br>航程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This port is within two days' sail of New York.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个港口离纽约的航程不到两天。</font><br>船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fishing boats were 15 sail in number.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些渔船的数量是十五艘。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>驾驶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you know how to sail the boat?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你知道怎样驾驶这艘船吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>起航, 开船；坐船旅行, 航行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When does the ship sail?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘船何时起航?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We sailed the Atlantic in five days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用了五天时间乘船驶过了大西洋。</font><br>\n
sailing	<h3>sailing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>帆船运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I love sailing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我爱帆船运动。</font><br>(轮船的)航班; 起船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company provided two sailings a week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家公司每周开两个航班。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When is the next sailing to Ostend?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去奥斯坦德的下一班船什么时候开?</font><br>\n
sailor	<h3>sailor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水手, 海员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the after years the sailor did not get home often.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在往后的几年里这个水手经常不回家。</font><br>\n
saint	<h3>saint</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>圣徒, 圣人；道德崇高的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was made a saint.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被封为圣人。</font><br>圣…(冠于人名、地名之前)<br>\n
sake	<h3>sake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缘故; 理由<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He loves poetry for beauty's sake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因为爱美而喜欢诗歌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We did it for convenience's sake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们为了方便起见才这么做。</font><br>\n
salad	<h3>salad</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>色拉, 凉拌菜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You haven't finished your salad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你还没有吃完色拉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a steak and a green salad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要了一块牛排和一份生菜色拉。</font><br>\n
salary	<h3>salary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>薪水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was engaged at a salary of 1000 a month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以月薪一千美元受聘。</font><br>\n
sale	<h3>sale</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>卖, 出售, 销售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got 100 from the sale of his bike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将自行车卖掉, 得了100美元。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My agent arranged the sale of the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的代理人对房子的出售作了安排。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This store always has a marvellous New Year's sale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家商店新年前后销售情况极好。</font><br>销售额, 销售量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sales are up this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本年度销售量增加。</font><br>贱卖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This shirt was a bargain — only ￡15 in a sale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件衬衫是便宜货, 大减价时只卖十五英镑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They bought a lot of sale goods yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们昨天买了许多廉价货。</font><br>销路, 市场需求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's no sale for cotton dresses in the autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在秋季, 棉布服装没有销路。</font><br>\n
salesman	<h3>salesman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>售货员, 推销员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The salesman showed her nearly all the hats in the shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位售货员几乎把店里的帽子都拿给她看了。</font><br>\n
salt	<h3>salt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盐, 食盐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Salt occurs naturally in sea water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盐天然存于海水中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is considerable salt in the kitchen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 厨房里有相当多的盐。</font><br>味道或外观等像盐的物质; 药用盐类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Salts is a medicine that causes movements of the bowels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 泻盐是一种促使肠子运动的药物。</font><br>增添趣味[活跃气氛]的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her witty remarks added a little salt to the conversation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的妙语使谈话增添了一些风趣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Adventure is the salt of life to some men.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对有些男子而言, 冒险是生活的乐趣。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>加盐于…以调味; 用盐腌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I forgot to salt the dish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这盘菜我忘记放盐了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fish are cut and salted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鱼被切成块腌起来了。</font><br>撒盐于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The main roads have been salted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主要公路上撒了盐。</font><br>使更有趣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He employs an irreverent humour to salt his observation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他运用玩世不恭的幽默使他的评论更加有趣。</font><br>\n
same	<h3>same</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>同一的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I live in the same house as he.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我跟他同住一所房子。</font><br>相同的; 同样的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her success encouraged me to try the same thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的成功激励我去做同样的尝试。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is the same size as that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书同那本书一样大小。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>同一事物; 同样的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mother scrubbed the floor and her child did the same.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲擦洗地板, 孩子也跟着干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must all say the same.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须口径一致。</font><br>\n
sample	<h3>sample</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>样品, 标本, 样本<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The salesman brought some samples of his firm's products.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 推销员带来了一些他公司的产品货样。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>抽样调查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sampled the population to find out the state of public opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从人口中抽样以了解民意状况。</font><br>品尝; 尝试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made us sample her cooking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她让我们品尝她做的饭菜。</font><br>体验; 尝试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They can learn English and sample the British way of life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们可学习英语并体验英国人的生活方式。</font><br>\n
sanction	<h3>sanction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈正〉批准, 认可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Official sanction has not yet been given.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尚未获得正式批准。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The custom will never receive the sanction of tradition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那种风俗绝不会作为传统的东西而被提倡。</font><br>〈正〉制裁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The United Nations Security Council took sanctions against the aggressor country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 联合国安理会对侵略国采取了制裁措施。</font><br>〈正〉约束力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prison is the best sanction against a crime like this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为遏止这类罪行, 监禁手段是上策。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>批准; 认可<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can you sanction such rudeness?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你怎么会准许这种粗鲁的行为呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our plan wasn't sanctioned by the board of directors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的计划没有得到董事会的批准。</font><br>\n
sand	<h3>sand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>沙, 沙子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mix the sand and cement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 将沙和水泥和在一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a mass of sand in the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 院里有一堆沙子。</font><br>沙滩; 沙洲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sands are a large area of sand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沙漠就是大面积的沙地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children enjoy playing on the sands.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们喜欢在沙滩上玩耍。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用砂纸磨光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The surface of the table must be sanded down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张桌子的表面得用砂纸磨光。</font><br>在某物上撒沙, 用沙覆盖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The icy roads were sanded after the snowstorm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴风雪过后, 冰冻的道路被撒上了沙。</font><br>\n
