seventy	<h3>seventy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>七十<br>从七十到七十九的数目、年数或温度<br>\n
several	<h3>several</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>几个, 数个, 一些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I go there several times each year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每年去那里几次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you give several other examples?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能再举几个例子吗?</font><br>各自的, 各别的; 不同的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They went their several ways.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们各走各的路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each has his several ideal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 各人有各人的理想。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>几个; 数个<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several of the children were in the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有几个小孩在花园里。</font><br>\n
severe	<h3>severe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>严重的, 剧烈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a severe shortage of fuel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 燃料严重短缺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Competition for the job is very severe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份工作的竞争是很激烈的。</font><br>严厉的, 严肃的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general had a severe manner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位将军态度严肃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Was his mother too severe on him?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的母亲是不是对他太严厉了?</font><br>艰难的, 严峻的, 辛苦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a severe test.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一次严峻的考验。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pace was too severe to be kept up for long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跟上这步伐太难了, 无法持久。</font><br>朴素的, 纯朴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is wearing a severe dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着一条朴素的裙子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That dress looks too severe on you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那衣服穿在你身上太朴素了。</font><br>\n
sew	<h3>sew</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>缝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has been sewing all morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她早上一直在做针线活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother sewed a new cotton-padded jacket for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈给我缝制一件新棉袄。</font><br>\n
sex	<h3>sex</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>性别; 性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What[Which] sex is this fish?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条鱼是雌的还是雄的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are members of both sexes in the team.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 队里男女队员都有。</font><br>男性; 女性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never associated with the sex.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从不和女性交往。</font><br>性关系<br>性活动, 性行为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He did not agree with his mother's views on premarital sex.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不同意母亲关于婚前性行为问题的观点。</font><br>\n
sexual	<h3>sexual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>性交的, 性行为的, 性吸引的, 两性的, 肉体吸引的<br>性别的, 性的, 男性或女性的<br>生殖的, 有性生殖的<br>\n
shade	<h3>shade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>荫; 阴凉处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These trees afford a pleasant shade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些树下有一片宜人的树阴。</font><br>阴暗部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This artist uses light and shade to good effect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位艺术家很会运用明暗效果。</font><br>遮光物, 遮棚; 窗帘; (灯)罩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought a green shade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一个绿色灯罩。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>遮蔽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A big hat shades the eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一顶大帽子遮住了眼睛。</font><br>画阴影于…之上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was trying to shade the face of the man in the picture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在试图加深画中人面部的颜色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>逐渐变化<br>\n
shadow	<h3>shadow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阴影, 阴暗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp So dark are the shadows that a man standing there could not be seen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阴影很暗, 人站在里面不会被看见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her face was in deep shadow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的脸部在一片很暗的阴影中。</font><br>影子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tree casts a shadow on the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树的影子映在地上。</font><br>阴暗部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walked along in the shadows hoping no one would recognize him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他走在暗处, 希望没有人认出他来。</font><br>虚幻的事物, 失去实质的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spent his life chasing after shadows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用毕生精力追求不存在的东西。</font><br>形影不离的人[物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My girlfriend is my shadow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的女朋友与我形影不离。</font><br>少许, 微量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have not the slightest shadow of doubt about that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对那件事没有丝毫的怀疑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>遮蔽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grass is shadowed by huge oaks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 草被巨大的橡树所遮蔽。</font><br>跟踪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our planes shadowed the enemy fighter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的飞机一直跟踪着敌人的那架战斗机。</font><br>\n
shake	<h3>shake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>摇动, 震动, 颠簸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give the bottle a couple of shakes before pouring the juice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 倒果汁前先把瓶子摇动几下。</font><br>哆嗦, 发颤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shakes of the speaker's hands betrayed his nervousness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 发言者双手颤抖, 可见他很紧张。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>摇动, 摇撼, (使)颤抖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The earth shook under us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大地在我们脚下震动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his anger he grasped the child and shook him violently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 愤怒之下, 他抓住孩子狠命地摇。</font><br>握手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shook her hand warmly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他热情地与她握手。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使心绪不宁[烦恼, 惊吓]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were shaken badly by the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那消息令他们吃惊。</font><br>动摇; 减弱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing can shake the basis for my belief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 什么也动摇不了我信念的基础。</font><br>\n
shall	<h3>shall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>(有时与I和we连用, 表示一般将来时)将要, 会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall go to London next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个月我将去伦敦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shan't know the results of the test until tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们明天才能知道考试结果。</font><br>(尤用于与I和we连用的要求听者作决定的问句中)…好吗?要不要…?<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shall we go to the theatre this evening?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们今晚去看戏好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's look at that book again, shall we?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们再看一看那本书好吗?</font><br>(尤用于正式文字中表示允诺、命令或法令)〈正〉可; 必须; 必将<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Candidates shall remain in their seats until all the papers have been collected.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 试卷全部收回后考生才可离开座位。</font><br>\n
shallow	<h3>shallow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>浅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got in at the shallow end of the swimming pool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在游泳池的浅水区下水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dish is too shallow to serve soup in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盘子太浅, 盛不了汤。</font><br>肤浅的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a shallow thinker whose opinions aren't worth much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看问题很浅薄, 他的意见没有多大价值。</font><br>\n
shame	<h3>shame</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>羞愧, 羞耻, 惭愧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her cheeks glowed with shame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她面颊羞得发红。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To my shame, I never did help them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我感到惭愧的是, 我从来没有帮助过他们。</font><br>羞愧感, 羞耻之心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you no shame?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 难道你不知羞耻吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is completely without shame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她毫无廉耻之心。</font><br>羞辱; 耻辱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His bad behaviour brings shame on the whole school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的恶劣行为使整个学校蒙受耻辱。</font><br>可耻的人[事]; 令人惋惜的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a shame you can't stay with us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不能留下来和我们在一起, 真是太遗憾了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使蒙羞, 玷辱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have shamed my family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我使我们家蒙羞了。</font><br>使感到羞愧, 使觉得丢脸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The class's unruly behaviour shamed the teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这班学生不守规矩的行为使老师感到羞愧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was shamed by how much more work the others had done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别人工作做得更多, 他感到很难为情。</font><br>使相形见绌, 使黯然失色<br>\n
shape	<h3>shape</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外形, 形状, 样子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are uniform in size and shape.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它们的尺寸大小和形状都相同。</font><br>模糊的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I made out two dim shapes in my dream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在梦中看到有两个模糊的影子。</font><br>〈口〉情况; 状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The market has been in poor shape lately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近来市场情况不好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>做成某物的形状<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children shaped the wet sand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们把湿沙子堆成各种形状。</font><br>对(某人或某事物)有重大影响; 决定(某事物)的性质<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can they shape public opinion?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们能左右舆论吗?</font><br>使(服装)合身<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This dress is shaped at the waist and doesn't need a belt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件连衣裙腰部合身，不需要腰带。</font><br>\n
share	<h3>share</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(分享到的或贡献出的)一份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gave him a minor share of my wealth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把小部分财产给了他。</font><br>(参与、得到等的)份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've had more than my fair share of troubles in my time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在任期内遇到了不少麻烦。</font><br>股, 股份, 股票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I deem it advisable to purchase the shares in the railway now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为现在购买铁路股票是明智的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>共有, 共用, 均摊, 参与<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Children should learn to share.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小孩应该学会与人分享东西。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you share my umbrella?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你愿意和我共用这把伞吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分配, 均分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They shared the cake between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们分吃了那块蛋糕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his death his property was shared between his children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他死后, 财产由孩子们平分。</font><br>\n
sharp	<h3>sharp</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>锋利的, 尖锐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Be careful with that sharp axe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那把斧子很锋利, 你要当心。</font><br>急转的, 陡峭的; 突然的, 急剧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a sharp bend in the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 路上有一个急转弯。</font><br>轮廓鲜明的; 明显的; 清晰的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Black hair is a sharp contrast to a fair skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黑色的头发与白皙的皮肤形成鲜明对比。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were sharp differences of opinion between the two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两者的意见存在着明显的分歧。</font><br>灵敏的, 机警的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Birds have sharp eyes and dogs have sharp noses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟有敏锐的视力, 而狗有灵敏的嗅觉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl is sharp at music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个女孩对音乐的感受力很敏锐。</font><br>辛辣的, 刺骨[鼻, 眼, 耳]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The branch broke with a sharp crack.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树枝折断时发出刺耳的劈啪声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This salad dressing has a sharp taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种色拉调味品味道辛辣。</font><br>蓄意中伤的; 尖刻的; 严厉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She got a sharp reproach from her boss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她受到了上司的严厉训斥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have to be sharp with him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不得不对他严厉些。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>准时地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please be on hand at 12 sharp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请在十二点整到这里来。</font><br>突然地, 急剧地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road turns sharp to the left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公路向左急转弯。</font><br>\n
sharpen	<h3>sharpen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)变锋利; 削尖, 磨快<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Knives can be sharpened by grinding them against a rough stone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刀能在一块粗石上磨快。</font><br>\n
shave	<h3>shave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(用剃刀)刮(胡须等); 为(某人)剃毛发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shave every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每天早上刮脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shaved his head bald.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把头发剃光了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>刨(木头等); 削; 刮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shaved a few millimetres from the bottom of the door to make it close properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把这门的底部薄薄地刨去几毫米使它能关严。</font><br>〈口〉掠过, 擦过(某人或某物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car just shaved the wall while it was cornering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车在拐弯时恰好擦过墙边。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>剃, 刮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A sharp razor gives a close shave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剃刀锋利刮得就干净。</font><br>\n
shaver	<h3>shaver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>剃刀, (尤指)电动剃须刀<br>\n
she	<h3>she</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>她, 它<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is my wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是我妻子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the farmer's best cow.she gives lots of milk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是这位农夫最好的母牛, 因为它可以产很多奶。</font><br>\n
shed	<h3>shed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>棚, 库<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He built a bicycle shed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他盖了一间自行车棚。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>流出, 流下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shed his blood for his country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为国家流血牺牲了。</font><br>蜕皮, 树叶脱落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many trees shed their leaves in autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多树在秋天落叶。</font><br>\n
sheep	<h3>sheep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>羊, 绵羊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look, there are three sheep eating grass under the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看!树下有三只羊在吃草。</font><br>\n
sheer	<h3>sheer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>完全的; 十足的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He achieved his aim by sheer strength of will.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他纯粹靠意志力达到了目的。</font><br>陡峭的; 垂直的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waterfall makes a sheer drop of one thousand feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 瀑布从一千英尺的高处直泻而下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mountain was too sheer to climb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这山太陡峭了, 无法攀登。</font><br>极薄的, 轻的, 透明的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wears a pair of sheer stockings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着一双透明的丝袜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That dress is too sheer to wear without a slip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条连衣裙太透明了, 没有衬裙不能穿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>垂直地, 陡峭地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mountain rises sheer from the plain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座山几乎是从草原上拔地而起。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>避开, 突然转向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boat came close to the rocks and then sheered away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船靠近岩石时突然掉转航向。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw her in the High Street, but she sheered off so as not to meet me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在大街上看见她, 但她故意避开我。</font><br>\n
sheet	<h3>sheet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>被单, 褥单, 床单<br>薄板, 薄片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This type of sheet steel could stand high pressure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种薄钢板能抗高压。</font><br>纸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Each sheet was covered with small, neat handwriting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每张纸上都写满了工整的小字。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wrapped a sheet of paper around the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用一张纸把这本书包起来。</font><br>一团, 一片, 一层<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A sheet of frost covers the windshield.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一层霜覆盖了挡风玻璃。</font><br>\n
shelf	<h3>shelf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>架, 棚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My shelves are full of books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的书架上摆满了书。</font><br>沙洲; 暗礁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship ran into a shelf and sank to the bottom of the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船撞上了暗礁, 沉入了海底。</font><br>\n
shell	<h3>shell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(贝、卵、坚果等的)壳<br>外壳, 框架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the fire, all that was left was the burned-out shell of the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大火以后所剩下的就是被烧焦的建筑物的外壳了。</font><br>炮弹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A shell exploded right beside his office.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一颗炮弹就在他的办公室旁边爆炸了。</font><br>\n
shelter	<h3>shelter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>遮蔽; 保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We took shelter from the rain in a cave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在一个山洞里避雨。</font><br>避难所; 庇护所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trees are a shelter from the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木可以遮挡阳光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>掩蔽; 庇护, 保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sheltered himself behind a hedge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他躲在树篱后面。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>躲避, 避难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We sheltered under a tree until the shower passed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在树下躲雨, 直到雨过天晴。</font><br>\n
shield	<h3>shield</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盾, 盾牌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sword glanced off the knight's shield.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 剑掠过武士的盾。</font><br>护罩; 防护物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dark glasses are an effective shield against the glare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墨镜能有效地遮挡强光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>保护, 掩护, 庇护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These trees will shield off arid winds and protect the fields.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些树能挡住旱风, 保护农田。</font><br>\n
shift	<h3>shift</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>改变, 变换, 转移, 移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lend me a hand to shift this box, will you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 来帮一下忙, 把这箱子搬开, 好吗?</font><br>去掉; 摆脱掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the stain still doesn't shift, try this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果污渍还没有清除掉, 试试这个吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thieves couldn't shift any of those stolen colour televisions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这伙盗贼无法把任何一部偷来的彩色电视机脱手。</font><br>换挡<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>快速行进<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>转换, 转变<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风向的突然改变预示暴风雨来临。</font><br>轮[换]班<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day shift arrives[arrive] at eight o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白班工人八点钟来换班。</font><br>轮班工人<br>计谋, 手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He uses some dubious shifts to get money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一些可疑的手段去赚钱。</font><br>切换键<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Press “Shift” and type “C”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按切换键然后打字母C。</font><br>\n
shine	<h3>shine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>发光; 反射光; 照耀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain has stopped and the sun is shining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨停了, 太阳照耀着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moon is shining bright.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 月亮发出了明亮的光。</font><br>表现突出, 出众<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a pretty good student, but sports are where he really shines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个很好的学生, 可体育运动才是他真正出色之处。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>照射<br>〈美〉擦亮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you shined your shoes?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的鞋擦亮了吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>光亮; 光泽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The windows gleamed gold in the shine of the setting sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗子在落日的余晖中金光闪闪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wooden surface had a beautiful shine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那木质的表面有美丽的光泽。</font><br>磨, 擦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those shoes need a shine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些鞋需要擦一擦</font><br>\n
ship	<h3>ship</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>船, 舰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A ship sank at the junction of the two rivers last month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上个月一条船在两条河的交汇点沉了。</font><br>〈口〉宇宙飞船, 太空船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They assembled the model ship bit by bit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一块一块地装配宇宙飞船的模型。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>运送<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some fruit doesn't ship well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些水果不便运送。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are today shipping you another machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们今天把另一台机器运给你们。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>舷侧进水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waves were very high, and the boat began to ship water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 浪很高, 船的舷侧开始进水。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>当船员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She escaped her family and shipped on a voyage to Australia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她逃离家庭，在一趟驶往澳洲的船上工作。</font><br>\n
shirt	<h3>shirt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>衬衫, 衬衣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was wearing a white shirt and a red tie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着一件白衬衫, 系了一条红领带。</font><br>\n
shiver	<h3>shiver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(因寒冷, 害怕等)颤抖, 哆嗦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A sudden gust of cold wind made me shiver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一股突然刮来的冷风吹得我打哆嗦。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>颤抖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accident gave me the shivers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事故使我不寒而栗。</font><br>\n
shock	<h3>shock</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>震动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shock of the explosion was felt far away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爆炸引起的震动很远都可感觉到。</font><br>电击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You get an electric shock if you touch a live wire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果触动电线你会触电的。</font><br>打击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His death was a great shock to the family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的死对他的家庭是一个很大的打击。</font><br>激动, 震惊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The news gave me a very great shock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这消息使我非常震惊。</font><br>休克<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She died of shock following an operation on the brain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她死于脑手术之后的休克。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使…震惊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电视节目中的暴力场面和污秽语言使许多观众震惊。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were shocked to hear of the bad news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听说这则坏消息他们很震惊。</font><br>使受电击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She got shocked when she touched the bare wire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她摸了裸线, 遭电击了。</font><br>使…感到厌恶[恐惧]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was shocked at her smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对她抽烟感到很厌恶。</font><br>\n
shoe	<h3>shoe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鞋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She took off her left shoe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她脱下了左脚的鞋。</font><br>蹄铁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse has cast a shoe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这匹马掉了一个马蹄铁。</font><br>煞车; 金属箍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accident was caused by worn brake shoes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事故是因煞车过度磨损而造成的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>为…钉蹄铁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A man who shoes horses is called a farrier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为马钉蹄铁的人叫做蹄铁匠。</font><br>\n
shoot	<h3>shoot</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>开枪, 射击; 射中, 射死<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shoots well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他枪打得好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our striker got into a good position to shoot, but then missed his kick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的前锋取得一个有利的位置射门, 可惜没有射中。</font><br>拍摄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film was shooting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部影片正在拍摄中。</font><br>疾驰; 飞速通过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boat shot the rapids.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小船迅速通过急流。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(用枪等)打猎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has shot the wolf wounded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已经把那只狼打伤了。</font><br>\n
shop	<h3>shop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>商店, 店铺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That shop deals in men's clothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那家商店经营男式服装。</font><br>工厂; 工作处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He worked in a carpenter's shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在一家木工厂工作。</font><br>办事处; 机构; 企业<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(到…)去买东西[购物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has gone out to shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她出去买东西了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shopped all the main shops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把主要的商店都逛遍了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>告发<br>\n
shopping	<h3>shopping</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一次购物中买来的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me carry your shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我来帮你拿你买的东西吧。</font><br>买东西, 购物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I normally do all my shopping on Saturdays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我通常在星期六买东西。</font><br>\n
shore	<h3>shore</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>岸, 滨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are lighthouses all along the eastern shore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沿着东海岸都有灯塔。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>支撑; 支持<br>\n
short	<h3>short</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>短的; 简短的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A straight line is the shortest distance between two points.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 直线是两点之间最短的距离。</font><br>矮的, 低的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jack is shorter than Tom by a head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰克比汤姆矮一头。</font><br>短期的, 即将兑现的<br>短缺的, 未达标的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was here only a short hour ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不到一小时前她还在这儿。</font><br>简称的, 简略形式的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp NATO is short for North Atlantic Treaty Organization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp NATO是“北大西洋公约组织”的缩写。</font><br>不够; 缺乏, 缺少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The poor orphans were kept on short commons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 贫苦的孤儿们吃不饱饭。</font><br>唐突的, 无礼的; 急躁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm sorry, I was short with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 我对你有所失敬。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>突然; 唐突地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The arrow landed short.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 箭未射到目标便落地了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>短路<br>短裤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will be needing a new pair of shorts soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很快就需要一条新短裤。</font><br>\n

shot	<h3>shot</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>开枪, 射击; 枪炮声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fired two shots, both missed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打了两枪, 都没有打中。</font><br>击球, 射门, 投篮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His shot went to the right of the goal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一脚射门, 球向球门右边飞去。</font><br>射手, 炮手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hunter is an excellent shot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那猎人是个优秀射手。</font><br>试图; 设法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am doubtful whether I can solve the puzzle, but I'll have a shot at it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我怀疑能否解决这难题, 我将试试看。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>颜色会变化的; 用旧的, 耗尽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bought a shot silk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一匹闪光的丝绸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm just shot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真筋疲力尽了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This old machine is shot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器已旧了。</font><br>\n
should	<h3>should</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>应该<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day was drawing near when we should have completed the reservoir.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们完成水库工程的日子不远了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The suggestion is that they should start from scratch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 提出的建议是, 他们从头开始。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should be careful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要当心。</font><br>有可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If I didn't write them down I should probably forget all about them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我不把它们写下来, 就可能忘得一干二净。</font><br>将会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I never realized that some day I should be living in Hong Kong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从未想到将来有一天会在香港居住。</font><br>\n
shoulder	<h3>shoulder</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>肩, 肩部, 肩膀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel a dull ache in the shoulder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的肩膀感到隐约疼痛。</font><br>背的上部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His shoulders bowed with age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因年老而佝偻了。</font><br>有责任[须承担责任]的人<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>扛, 担, 挑<br>用肩顶…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy shouldered a basket of fruits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个男孩扛了一筐水果。</font><br>承担<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The oldest son should shoulder the burdens of the family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长子该担负起家庭的重担。</font><br>\n
shout	<h3>shout</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>呼, 喊, 叫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why are you shouting?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为什么大喊大叫?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She shouted to attract their attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她大声叫嚷以引起他们的注意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>大声讲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The demonstrators shouted slogans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游行者高呼口号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Suddenly Jack shouted that he had lost five pounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 突然杰克大喊他丢失了五英镑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>呼喊, 喊叫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They heard him give a loud shout of astonishment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们听见他惊奇地大叫一声。</font><br>轮到请客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What will you have?It's my shout today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要喝什么?今天我请客。</font><br>\n
shove	<h3>shove</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>推, 猛推, 乱推<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The people shoved to get on the bus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们你推我挤争着上公共汽车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Help me shove this furniture aside.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 帮我把这家具推到一边去。</font><br>\n
show	<h3>show</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>给…看, 显示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sky began to show red in the early morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 清晨天空呈现出一片红色。</font><br>表现出; 显露出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The first signs of a split were beginning to show.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 分裂的初步迹象已开始显露出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She never shows her feelings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的感情从不外露。</font><br>上演, 展出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film is now showing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部电影正在上演。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film will be shown in this theatre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那部电影将在这家影院上演。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>说明; 表明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have shown the falsity of the story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已说明那个报道不真实。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wanted to show that I didn't care.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要表明我并不介意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you show me how I can handle this camera?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能教我如何使用这个照相机吗?</font><br>为…带路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were shown into the reading room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人把我们领进阅览室。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He showed me into the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他领我进入房间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>表演, 演出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was giving three shows a day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一天演三场。</font><br>展览; 展览物; 展览会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a flower show in the park.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公园里正在举行花卉展览。</font><br>显示; 展示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl likes to make a show of herself before strangers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这小姑娘喜欢在生人面前显示自己。</font><br>\n
shower	<h3>shower</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阵雨, 阵雪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather was good except for an occasional shower.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除下了一阵大雨外, 天气还是很好的。</font><br>淋浴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have to take several cold showers to keep us cool every day in summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夏季, 我们一天得冲几次凉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>下阵雨; 似阵雨般降落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It has started to shower; I'm sure to get wet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天已开始下阵雨, 我一定会被淋湿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>大量地给予<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We showered gifts on her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们纷纷向她赠送礼物。</font><br>\n
shrink	<h3>shrink</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>收缩; 退缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The number of students of this school has shrunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所学校的学生人数在减少。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Washing wool in hot water will shrink it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在热水中洗毛织品会使其缩水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will this soap shrink woolen clothes?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种肥皂会使毛织品缩水吗?</font><br>\n
shrug	<h3>shrug</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>耸肩(以表示冷淡, 怀疑等)<br>\n
shut	<h3>shut</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>关, 关上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He shut the book and put it away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把书合起来, 放到一边。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She would shut her eyes tight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把眼睛闭得很严。</font><br>\n
shy	<h3>shy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>怕羞的; 腼腆的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary is a shy girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽是一个害羞的女孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little girl blazed shy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小女孩满脸的羞涩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy is shy of strangers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这小孩怕陌生人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is too shy to go to parties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很怕羞, 不敢去参加舞会。</font><br>害羞的; 胆怯的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why is the moon so shy that it never shows us the other side of its face?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 月亮为什么那么害羞, 总不给我们看它的那半边脸?</font><br>有戒心的, 不喜欢…的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is shy of speaking in public.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她怯于在公众面前讲话。</font><br>〈美〉缺乏的; 不足的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a lot of pens, but we're shy on ink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有许多钢笔, 但墨水不够。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're still ten men shy of a full class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们还差十个人才能凑成一个班。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>惊退, 畏缩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse shied at the loud noise and threw its rider.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那匹马听到响声吓得向后倒退, 把骑手摔了下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ade bashfully shied.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 艾德羞得退缩了。</font><br>\n
sick	<h3>sick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不舒服的; 有病的, 患病的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must inquire after my sick friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得去问候我那得了病的朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's sick, but she doesn't show it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她病了, 但无病态。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fell sick with flu.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他得了流感。</font><br>恶心的; 想吐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to feel sick as soon as the ship started to move.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船一启动他就开始呕吐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is sick from overeating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他因暴饮暴食而呕吐。</font><br>腻烦的, 厌恶的, 讨厌的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel sick at my work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌我的工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am heartily sick of them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我深觉他们讨厌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are sick of your complaining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们讨厌你抱怨。</font><br>心烦意乱的, 恼火的, 不高兴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is sick at heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她心里烦闷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was awfully sick at being beaten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因被击败他极不愉快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is sick with me for being so late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对我来得这样迟感到不高兴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈口〉呕吐物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bed was full of sick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 床上全是吐的东西。</font><br>\n
side	<h3>side</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面; 侧面; 边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A box has a top, a bottom and four sides.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一个盒子有顶面、底面和四个侧面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child ran to the side of the swimming pool and dived in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位小孩跑到游泳池边, 一头扎入水中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The village sits on the side of the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这村庄坐落在山腰上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She stayed at his side taking care of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一直守在他身边精心照顾。</font><br>方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you considered both sides of the question?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是否把问题的两个方面都考虑到了?</font><br>一方, 一边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should do justice to both sides.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对双方都应公正。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are on my side in this issue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个问题上, 他们跟我们的立场一致。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>侧面的, 边的<br>枝节的, 次要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't divert the subject into a side issue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别把话题转向枝节问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The main dish was meat, with various vegetables as side dishes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主菜是肉, 加上各种蔬菜作为小菜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>支持, 站在…的一边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr. White sided with me in the argument.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在辩论中怀特先生站在我一边。</font><br>\n
sidewalk	<h3>sidewalk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>人行道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He avoided stepping on the crack in the sidewalk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他避免踩到人行道的裂缝上。</font><br>\n
sideways	<h3>sideways</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>斜着, 斜向一边<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked sideways at me in the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在会议上斜着眼看我。</font><br>以侧面对着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bring the table through the door sideways.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把这张桌子侧过来搬进门去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>斜向一边的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy gave the girl a sideways look.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩斜视了那姑娘一眼。</font><br>\n
siege	<h3>siege</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>围攻; 围困; 围城(期间)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy lay siege to the town in attempt to starve the people to death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌人围城, 企图将人们饿死。</font><br>\n
sigh	<h3>sigh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>叹气, 叹息<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sighed and looked sad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她叹了口气, 显得很伤心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sighed with relief when she heard the good news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听到这个好消息时, 她宽慰地舒了口气。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>叹息, 叹气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man gave a deep sigh.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那老人深深地叹了口气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all make a sigh of relief when we heard that he was safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听说他平安无事, 我们都松了一口气。</font><br>\n
sight	<h3>sight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>视力; 视觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had his sight tested by a doctor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他让医生给他检查了视力。</font><br>视野, 视界<br>看见, 瞥见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sight of the garden bears back the days when we lived in Paris.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 见到那个花园使我们回想起当年住在巴黎时的日子。</font><br>情景, 景象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The view burst upon our sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那景象突然出现在我们眼前。</font><br>风景; 名胜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sunset was a very beautiful sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那落日真是一幅美景。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Great Wall is one of the sights of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长城是世界名胜之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>看见; 发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After five days at sea, we sighted land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在海上航行了五天后见到了陆地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Crewmen aboard the tanker sighted a ship in distress off the coast of Senegal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油船上的船员们在塞内加尔的近海发现了一艘失事的船。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(用仪器)瞄准[观测, 察看]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sight along the edge to see if it's straight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 顺着边目测, 看看直不直。</font><br>\n
sightseeing	<h3>sightseeing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>观光, 游览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people like to lie on the beach, but I prefer to go sightseeing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人喜欢在海滩上躺着, 但我喜欢去游览。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of our time was spent in sightseeing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的大部分时间用在游览上。</font><br>\n
sign	<h3>sign</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>标记, 符号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll be waiting for you at the entrance of the pub which has a sign painted with a red lobster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将在画着红龙虾招牌的酒吧门口等你。</font><br>手势, 姿势, 信号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw him making signs at us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我看见他向我们做着手势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She put her finger to her lips as a sign to be quiet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她将手指放在唇上表示应安静。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They waved the white flag as a sign that they wish to surrender.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们挥动白旗表示愿意投降。</font><br>征兆, 迹象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the signs at the moment point to an early resumption of the fighting between the two countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼下的一切迹象都表明, 这两个国家将很快重新开战。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The roof of the new tunnel hasn't been properly supported; it shows signs of falling in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新隧道的顶部支撑得不好, 已显出坍塌的迹象。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is every sign to show that the enemy will retreat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 种种迹象表明敌人要退却。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>签名, 签字<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wants all of us to sign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要我们大家都签字。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When we arrive at the office each morning we have to sign on the dotted line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每天早上到达办公室的时候, 得在签到簿上签到。</font><br>发信号, 做手势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher signed his approval.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师做了手势表示同意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Glancing to door, he signed that he was ready to leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看着门口打手势表示他随时可以离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed her to lower her voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他摆摆手要她把声音放低点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed me to be quiet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他示意我要安静。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp While we were crossing the street, the policeman signed for us to stop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们正横穿马路时, 警察做手势叫我们停住。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed to the waiter to bring the bill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向服务生示意拿账单过来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signed to his student where to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他示意他的学生该去何处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police signed to the driver that it was time to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察示意司机该走了。</font><br>\n
signal	<h3>signal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信号, 暗号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Signals are made with flags or lamps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用旗或灯传递信号。</font><br>(无线电或电视所传送的)讯号, 讯息, 图像<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We live too far from the city to get a strong television signal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们住的地方离城里太远, 不能收到清晰的电视图像。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>发信号; 用信号传达; 用信号通讯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is signaling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在发送信号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The submarine signaled for help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 潜水艇发出求救的信号。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She signaled the advance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她发出信号前进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She signaled that he was about to turn left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她打手势表示他就要转到左面去了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They signaled which way one is going to turn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们打信号示意走哪一条路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signaled a message to his brother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用信号向他哥哥发信息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He signaled the waiter to bring the menu.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他作手势要侍者拿菜单来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conductor signaled the orchestra to rise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 指挥打手势让乐队起立。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom signaled his friend which way to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆示意他的朋友走哪条路。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>明显的, (非常)显著的, 非凡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a signal failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是明显的失败。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp People speak of Mark Twain as a signal humourous writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们称马克·吐温为杰出的幽默作家。</font><br>\n
signature	<h3>signature</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>签名, 签字<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These two signatures are very similar, can you tell them apart?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两处签名非常接近, 你能把它们区分开来吗?</font><br>\n
significance	<h3>significance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>意义, 意思<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This fact has little significance for us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一事实对我们没有什么意义。</font><br>重大意义, 重要性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They failed to appreciate significance of the precautions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们没有意识到这些预防措施的重要性。</font><br>\n
significant	<h3>significant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>重要的, 重大的, 可观的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a significant contribution to knowledge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是对知识的重大贡献。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your success today may be significant for your whole future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你今天的成功对你的整个未来可能是重要的。</font><br>有意义的, 有用意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think that is significant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为那没有什么用意。</font><br>意味深长的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave her a significant look.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他意味深长地看了她一眼。</font><br>\n
silence	<h3>silence</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>寂静; 无声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now and then a bird's song broke in upon the silence of the wood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟鸣声不时打破林中的寂静。</font><br>沉默<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the reason for your long silence?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你长时间沉默的原因是什么?</font><br>无音信, 失去联系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Forgive me for my long silence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请原谅我好久没给你写信。</font><br>寂静[沉默, 无音信]的时刻[期间]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's observe a minute's silence in memory of the dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们为死者静默一分钟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使安静, 使沉默<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The arrival of the teacher silenced the class.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师的到来使全班安静下来。</font><br>\n
silent	<h3>silent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>寂静的; 无声的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cat moved on silent feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只猫无声地走动着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old house was quite silent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这间旧房子非常肃静。</font><br>沉默的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a silent type.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个沉默型的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Gradually he became silent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 渐渐地他变得沉默寡言了。</font><br>不发音的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The “e” in “ time” is a silent letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp time中的e不发音。</font><br>\n
silicon	<h3>silicon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈化〉硅<br>\n
silk	<h3>silk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>丝, 绸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you match me the silk?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能帮我找一块和这相配的绸子吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She banded the birthday gift with a silk strip.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用一根丝带扎好了生日礼物。</font><br>\n
silly	<h3>silly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>蠢的, 傻的; 糊涂的, 可笑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I could not conceive that he would do such a silly thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能想像他竟会干这种傻事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can't be excused for such a silly reason.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不能因为这样一个可笑的理由而原谅你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be silly!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别傻了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was silly to get out in the cold without a coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真傻, 大冷天没穿外衣就出门了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's silly to get out in the rain if you don't have to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除非万不得已, 跑到外面淋雨就是愚蠢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was silly of him to do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他居然会那么做, 真是太傻了。</font><br>〈非正〉不省人事的, 失去知觉的; 晕头转向的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I took a swing at him and knocked him silly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我挥拳打了他一下, 把他打得晕头转向。</font><br>\n
silver	<h3>silver</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>银<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can distinguish between gold and silver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们能区分金和银。</font><br>银币; 银制品, 银器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All I've got is a 20 pound note and about a pound in silver.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我所有的钱是一张二十英镑的钞票和一枚一英镑的银币。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>银制的; 像银的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had a silver peace symbol hanging on a chain around her neck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一个银制的和平标志挂在项链上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I like taking a walk under the silver moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我喜欢在银色的月光下散步。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(在某物上)镀银<br>\n
similar	<h3>similar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>类似的; 同类的; 相似的; 同样的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two boys look very similar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两个孩子看上去很相似。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are similar in appearance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在外貌上相似。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My problems are very similar to yours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的问题和你的差不多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Similar triangles have equal angles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 相似三角形有相等的角。</font><br>\n
similarly	<h3>similarly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>相似地; 类似地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The brothers dress similarly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 兄弟俩穿得差不多。</font><br>也; 同样<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was late and I similarly was delayed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他迟到了, 我也晚了。</font><br>\n
simple	<h3>simple</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>简单的; 容易的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote a story in simple English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用简单的英语写了一则故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The point I am making is a very simple one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想提出的论点很简单。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It should be quite simple; I don't envisage any difficulty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事应该很简单, 我想不会有什么困难。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book is quite simple to use.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书使用简单。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan sounds simple enough but it won't be so simple to put it into action.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个计划听起来相当简单, 但是要将它付诸实施却没有那么容易。</font><br>朴素的; 简朴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We use bricks and branches of trees to form a simple shelter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们用砖和树枝搭成一个简陋的避难所。</font><br>自然的; 率直的; 天真的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a simple and well liked man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个纯朴可爱的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was as simple as a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他像孩子一样天真。</font><br>易受骗的; 迟钝的, 头脑简单的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may be joking but she's simple enough to believe you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你也许是在开玩笑, 但她却愚蠢得信以为真。</font><br>\n
simplicity	<h3>simplicity</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>简单, 朴素, 率直<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The advantage of the idea was its simplicity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个主意的优点是简单明了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dressed with elegant simplicity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着朴素高雅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He believes everything with childlike simplicity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他像孩子一样单纯, 对一切都信以为真。</font><br>\n
simplify	<h3>simplify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(某事物)简单[简明]; 简化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try to simplify your explanation for the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给孩子们讲解要设法讲得简单明了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That will simplify my task.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那可简化我的工作。</font><br>\n
simply	<h3>simply</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>简单地; 简易地; 朴素地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To put it simply, the new proposals mean that the average worker will be about 10% better paid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简单地说, 新建议意味着一个普通工人的工资将增加10%。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dressed neatly and simply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们衣着整洁朴素。</font><br>仅仅; 只不过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have never met our new neighbours; I simply know them by sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从未接触过我们的新邻居, 只见过面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What we need is simply money, money and money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们所需的仅仅是钱而已。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The drink consists simply of fresh oranges.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这饮料仅含新鲜橘汁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like driving; I do it simply because I have to get to work each day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢开车, 只是因为我每天必须开车上班。</font><br>〈非正〉实在, 简直, 非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother's English pronunciation is simply terrible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我兄弟的英语发音实在糟透了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is simply ridiculous to attempt such a thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 试图干这种事, 简直可笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meat was so tough that I simply couldn't get it down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这肉太老了, 我简直咽不下去。</font><br>\n
sin	<h3>sin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>违背宗教[道德原则]的恶行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live a life of sin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们过着不道德的生活。</font><br>罪恶, 罪孽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a sin to waste food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 浪费食品是一种罪过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lying, stealing, dishonesty and cruelty are sins.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 说谎、偷窃、不诚实和残忍都是罪孽。</font><br>过错, 罪过; 愚蠢的事, 可耻的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Being late is an unforgivable sin round here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 迟到在这里是一种不可原谅的失礼行为。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a sin to be indoors on holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 假期中待在家里实在是罪过。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>犯罪; 犯过错<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sinned against the unwritten rules of this meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们违反了这次会议的不成文规定。</font><br>\n
since	<h3>since</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示时间)从…以来; 自从…之后<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have lived here since January.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自一月份以来, 我一直住在这里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had seen her only once since the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从那次会议以来, 他只见过她一次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's been working in a bank since leaving school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从毕业后, 他就一直在一家银行工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have not seen him since then.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从那以后我再也没见过他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>从过去某时间以来[以后, 到现在]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He disappeared many years since.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他多年以前就不知去向。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her husband died 10 years ago but she has since remarried.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她丈夫于十年前去世, 但她后来又嫁人了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've long since forgotten what our quarrel was about.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我早就忘掉我们为什么吵架了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was not long since that I returned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我是在不久前回来的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He came to London 3 years ago and has lived here ever since.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他三年前来到伦敦, 此后就一直住在这里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>自从(过去某事)以来[以后, 到现在]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since I left college, I have not seen him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从我离开大学以后, 就没有见过他了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have never been to see me since I was ill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从我生病之后, 他们一直没来看过我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since I have owned a bicycle, I have gone to school by it every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从我有了一辆自行车后, 我每天骑车上学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have known him ever since I was a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我自孩提时代起就已经认识他了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is ten years since she left me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自从她离开我已经十年了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is five years since he left here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他离开这儿已有五年了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is three years since I have seen him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已经三年没见到他了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was four months since we had been here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经有四个月没来这了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His health is much improved since he gave up smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自戒烟以来, 健康状况大大改善了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I met him last week.Since we left school, we had often written to each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上周我遇见了他。自从我们离开学校后, 我们曾经常互相写信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man has been drinking beer ever since the party started.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 晚会开始以来, 那个男人就一个劲儿地喝啤酒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has been collecting stamps since she was a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她从小起就一直在集邮。</font><br>因为; 既然; 由于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since it is late I shall go home now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于时间晚了, 我现在要回家了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since you are so sure of it he'll believe you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 既然你对此这么有把握, 他会相信你的。</font><br>\n
sincere	<h3>sincere</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(指感情或行为)真实的; 诚挚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He offered a sincere apology for his behaviour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他主动对自己的行为诚恳地道了歉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His apology was sincere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的歉意是出自内心的。</font><br>(指人)诚实的; 直率的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His mother is a sincere Christian.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他母亲是个虔诚的基督教徒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is sincere in her political beliefs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她忠实于自己的政治信仰。</font><br>\n
sing	<h3>sing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>唱; 歌唱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How beautifully you sing!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你唱得多美呀！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you sing before breakfast, you'll cry before dinner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乐极生悲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother can't sing a note.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的兄弟一点也不会唱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Miss Rose will sing a song now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在露丝小姐将唱一支歌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mother sang her baby a lullaby.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 妈妈给孩子唱了一支催眠曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you sing a song for[to] us?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你给我们唱支歌好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sang themselves hoarse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们嗓子都唱哑了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(鸟)鸣, 啭, 啼; 嗡嗡叫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As I walked on, some birds were singing in the woods.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我走着, 林中鸟在鸣叫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The kettle was singing on the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水壶在炉火上嗡嗡作响。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Birds sing loudest in the early morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 清晨鸟叫得最欢。</font><br>\n
single	<h3>single</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>单一的; 单个的; 仅有一个的; 单独的<br>适于一人的, 一人用的, 一人做的<br>未婚的, 独身的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She remained single all the life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她一直单身。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>单程票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two second-class singles to Leeds, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我两张到利兹的二等车厢单程票。</font><br>单打比赛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bore off the first prize in the men's singles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他获得男子单打冠军。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挑选<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why have you singled this out for criticism?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为什么单挑这件事批评啊?</font><br>\n
singular	<h3>singular</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>〈语〉单数的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The noun “mouse” is the singular form of “mice”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 名词mouse是mice的单数形式。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “One box” is singular; “two boxes” is plural.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “One box”是单数, “two boxes”是复数。</font><br>〈正〉突出的, 卓越的, 非凡的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man has a singular ear for music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人对音乐有非凡的欣赏力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>单数形式(的词)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The noun is in the singular.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个名词是单数形式。</font><br>\n
sink	<h3>sink</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)下沉; (使)沉没<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship struck against the rocks and sank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那艘船触礁沉没了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun is sinking in the west.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳西下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The foundations have sunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地基下陷了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His heart sank at the thought.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 想到这个他情绪低落下来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prices are sinking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 物价下跌了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her voice had sunk even lower as she went on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的声音越来越低。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lack of money will certainly sink our plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 资金短缺准会毁了我们的计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水池, 水槽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dirty dishes are in the sink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 脏碟子在洗涤槽中。</font><br>\n
