sister	<h3>sister</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>姐, 妹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I believe my sister to be honest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为我姐姐是诚实的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your little sister is sick, try to bear with her when she cries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你小妹病了, 她哭时你忍耐一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his parents died, responsibility for his three younger sisters bore down upon the young man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 双亲去世后, 照顾三个妹妹的重担就压在这个年轻人的肩上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bless you, my sister!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 祝福你, 我的妹妹！</font><br>\n
sit	<h3>sit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)坐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd rather stand than sit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我宁肯站, 不愿坐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat there (as) a guest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他像个客人似的坐在那儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sat silent in her own room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在自己的房间里一动不动地坐着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat propped up in the bed by pillows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他靠着枕头坐在床上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sat thinking for a long time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他坐着想了很久。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sat the baby on the grass.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她让婴儿坐在草地上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sits her horse well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她善骑马。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(动物或鸟)栖息; 蹲, 坐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a bird sitting on the branch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一只鸟栖息在树枝上。</font><br>坐落; 位于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel sits on a hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家旅馆位于一座小山上。</font><br>\n

situation	<h3>situation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>形势; 情况<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The situation will soon come clear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况不久就会明朗的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The economic situation has changed considerably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经济形势已发生了相当大的变化。</font><br>〈正〉职业, 职位, 工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In August he was appointed to the situation of secretary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在八月份, 他被指定担任秘书。</font><br>位置, 环境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house has a fine situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房子占了个好位置。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These houses seem to blend well with the trees and the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些房屋与树木和周围的环境十分协调。</font><br>\n

skeleton	<h3>skeleton</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>骨骼; 骷髅<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨。</font><br>骨干, 框架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The block is still just a skeleton of girders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这片建筑还只是仅有主梁的骨架。</font><br>梗概, 提要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her notes gave us just the bare skeleton of her theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的笔记只给我们提供了她的理论的梗概。</font><br>\n

skim	<h3>skim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>撇去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She skimmed the milk of its cream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她撇去牛奶上的奶油。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>掠过, 轻轻擦过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The swallows skimmed the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 燕子掠过水面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The little bird skimmed over the waves looking for food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只小鸟掠过波浪寻找食物。</font><br>略读, 浏览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's important for you to skim through the text.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 浏览课文对你来说很重要。</font><br>\n
skin	<h3>skin</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>皮(肤)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nurse pierced the skin of the boy with a lancet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 护士用刺血针刺入男孩的皮肤。</font><br>兽皮, 毛皮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cats are covered with soft skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猫身上长着柔软的毛。</font><br>(蔬菜, 水果等)外皮, 外壳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I slipped on a banana skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我踩在香蕉皮上滑倒了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>剥皮; 擦破皮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy skinned the banana.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩剥去了香蕉皮。</font><br>欺骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you trying to skin the old lady?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你想骗老太太的钱吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>紧身衣服<br>\n
skirt	<h3>skirt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>裙子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has several beautiful skirts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有几条很漂亮的裙子。</font><br>边缘, 外围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives on the skirts of the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住在市郊。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>位于…的边缘; 沿…的边缘走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We skirted along one side of the valley.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们沿着山谷的一侧前进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers skirted the edge of the cliff on a geological survey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们沿着崖壁作了一次地质勘察。</font><br>绕开, 避开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They skirted round the village.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们绕过了村子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As he walked through the lobby, he skirted a group of ladies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿过门厅时, 绕过了一群女士。</font><br>\n
sky	<h3>sky</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>天(空)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What colour is the sky?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天空是什么颜色?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The papers forecast clear skies tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报纸上预报明天晴天。</font><br>\n
slam	<h3>slam</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>砰地关上(门或窗)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The door slammed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门砰地关上了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In a fury he slammed the windows.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怒气冲冲, 砰地把窗户关上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slammed the door shut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他砰地把门关上了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>猛烈抨击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film was slammed by many reviewers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部电影受到许多评论者的猛烈抨击。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猛然关闭的声音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were surprised by the slam of a car door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关汽车门时发出的声音使他们很吃惊。</font><br>\n
slap	<h3>slap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>掌击; 拍打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waves slapped against the boat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 波浪拍打着小船。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you touch me again I'll slap your face!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你若再碰我一下, 我就打你耳光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>制止; 镇压<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They slapped the workers who had gone on strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对参加罢工的工人大加镇压。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>掌击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gave the scoundrel a slap in the face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我打了那坏蛋一耳光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>直接; 径直; 恰恰; 正好<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This path leads slap to the playground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条小路直接通到运动场。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief ran slap into a policeman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那小偷与警察撞个满怀。</font><br>\n
slave	<h3>slave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奴隶; 苦工<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Slaves could be bought and sold like horses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奴隶可以像马匹那样买卖。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>奴隶般地工作; 做苦工<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been slaving in the garden for hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在花园里干了数小时。</font><br>\n
slavery	<h3>slavery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>奴隶身份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Its people were thus reduced to slavery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就这样它的人民都沦为奴隶了。</font><br>奴隶制度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He struck a blow against slavery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他反对奴隶制度。</font><br>\n
sleep	<h3>sleep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>睡眠; 睡眠的时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had only a brief sleep that night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那天晚上他只睡了一会儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi. & link v.</i></font><br>睡眠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Of course, I don't always sleep in the afternoons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当然, 我并不总是在下午睡觉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He began to drink, drank himself to intoxication, till he slept obliterated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直喝, 喝到他快要迷糊地睡着了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She slept herself sober.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她睡了一觉清醒了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>为…提供床位<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel sleeps 400 guests.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这旅馆可供四百人住宿。</font><br>\n
sleeve	<h3>sleeve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>衣服袖子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wiped away her tears with her sleeve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用袖子拭眼泪。</font><br>套管, 套筒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't touch these metal cables inside a plastic sleeve.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不要碰那些套着塑料管的金属电缆。</font><br>\n
slender	<h3>slender</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>苗条的; 修长的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everybody of us admired her slender figure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们人人都羡慕她的苗条身材。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl was pretty and slender.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那姑娘长得美丽苗条。</font><br>细长的; 薄的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spider hung suspended on its slender thread.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜘蛛悬吊在它细长的丝上。</font><br>微薄的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They won the election but only with a very slender majority.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们仅以微弱的多数赢得了选举。</font><br>\n
slice	<h3>slice</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>切<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sliced the pineapple.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把菠萝切成薄片。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sliced me a piece of meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给我切了一片肉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sliced the bread thin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把面包切得很薄。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>斜击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sliced the ball.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他斜击球。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>片, 薄片, 切片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please cut bread into thin slices.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把面包切成薄片。</font><br>部分; 份<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They wanted to make sure they got a slice of the profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们想确保自己可得到一份利润。</font><br>\n
slide	<h3>slide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>滑动; 滑行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She slid along the ice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她沿着冰面滑行。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>滑落, 跌落<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>滑行, 滑落<br>幻灯片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a slide show every other week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们每隔一周观看一次幻灯片。</font><br>\n
slight	<h3>slight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>微小的, 轻微的, 微不足道的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a slight cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我患了轻微的感冒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The difference is so slight, that I can hardly see it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 差别很小, 我几乎看不出来。</font><br>不结实的, 纤弱的; 脆弱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind seemed to lift her slight body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风似乎要把她瘦弱的身体吹起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轻蔑, 忽视; 冷落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm afraid he took your remark as a slight on his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怕他把你的话当作是对他工作的一种轻蔑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>轻蔑, 忽视, 怠慢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slighted no one.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不轻视任何人。</font><br>\n
slim	<h3>slim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>苗条的; 修长的<br>微小的; 渺茫的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>减肥<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't want any cake, I'm slimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想吃蛋糕, 我正在减肥。</font><br>\n
slip	<h3>slip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>滑, 滑倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slipped and fell down the stairs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他滑倒了, 从楼梯上摔了下来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>偷偷[悄悄]地塞给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Passers-by would slip the beggar some change as they passed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过路人从那乞丐身边走过时, 总会塞给他一点零钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tom slipped a stamp to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤姆悄悄地给我一张邮票。</font><br>摆脱, 挣脱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog slipped its collar and ran away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条狗挣脱了项圈逃走了。</font><br>逃过; 被遗忘, 被忽视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your name has slipped my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的名字我忘了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>滑, 溜, 滑倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One slip and you could fall off the building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 脚下一滑就可能从建筑物上跌下去。</font><br>小过失, 失误<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are a few trivial slips in this lesson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这篇课文中有几个小错误。</font><br>\n
slippery	<h3>slippery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>光滑的; 滑溜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We found it very slippery under foot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们感到地上很滑。</font><br>\n
slogan	<h3>slogan</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>标语, 口号, 广告语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd chanted slogans and waved banners.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人群有节奏地呼喊着口号并挥舞着旗帜。</font><br>\n
slope	<h3>slope</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>斜坡, 斜面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On both slopes of the roof there are broken tiles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 屋顶的两面斜面都有破瓦片。</font><br>倾斜, 坡度, 斜率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The floor is on a slight slope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地面略有倾斜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>倾斜; 有斜度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The floor slopes badly here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地板在这儿倾斜得很厉害。</font><br>\n
slow	<h3>slow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>慢的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the slow lane of a motorway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是高速路的慢车道。</font><br>迟钝的; 不灵巧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm sorry I'm so slow today, I didn't get much sleep last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对不起, 我今天反应太迟钝, 我昨天晚上没睡多少觉。</font><br>(生意等)清淡的; 不忙碌的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Business is slow just now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 目前生意清淡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>慢慢地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The watch runs slow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 表走着走着就慢了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How slow would you like me to play?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要我弹奏多慢?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)缓行, (使)减速<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river slows on the flat bottom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 河水在平坦的河床上减慢了流速。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She slowed the car to a crawl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把车开得很慢。</font><br>\n
small	<h3>small</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>小的, 少的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pitch is too small to play football on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球场太小了, 无法踢足球。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A ragged shout went up from the small crowd.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一小群人发出了刺耳的喊叫。</font><br>年幼的, 幼小的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I lived in the country when I was small.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我小时候住在乡下。</font><br>小规模的, 小范围的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The small shops were merged into a large market.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些小商店合并成为一个大商场。</font><br>不重要的; 微不足道的; 微小的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My influence over her is small.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对她的影响不大。</font><br>小气的, 心胸狭窄的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a man with a small mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个心胸狭窄的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is small of her to wish for payment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她还希望得到报酬, 真小气。</font><br>\n
smart	<h3>smart</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>整洁漂亮的; 衣着讲究的; 时髦的<br>思维敏捷的, 伶俐的; 聪明的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a smart businessman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个精明能干的生意人。</font><br>有力的, 猛烈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had to put up with a smart rebuke from the teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不得不忍受老师的严厉指责。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>感到刺痛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was still smarting from[over] his unkind words.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对他的那些无情话仍感到很难受。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>创伤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt the smart of their insult for many days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他受到他们的侮辱后好多天都感到难受。</font><br>\n
smash	<h3>smash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>破碎(声)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We heard the smash of plates breaking in the kitchen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听到厨房里盘子破碎的声音。</font><br>猛击; 猛撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave me a smash on my head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他猛击我的头部。</font><br>大成功; 极为成功的新书[新戏, 电影等]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gifted author wrote one smash after another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个天才作家创作了一篇又一篇轰动一时的作品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>打碎; 捣烂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cup fell and smashed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杯子落下来摔碎了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dropped the plate and smashed it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她失手把盘子掉在地上打碎了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The key was lost, so we had to smash the door open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 钥匙丟了, 所以我们只得将门砸开。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>重击; 打败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We smashed his intrigues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们粉碎了他的阴谋。</font><br>\n
smell	<h3>smell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>嗅觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dogs have a marvellous sense of smell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗有非常敏锐的嗅觉。</font><br>嗅, 闻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have a smell of this wine, does it smell all right?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 闻闻这酒, 没问题吧?</font><br>气味; 臭味<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a sweetish smell, vaguely reminiscent of coffee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一股甜甜的气味, 使人隐隐觉得像是咖啡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.&link v.</i></font><br>嗅; 闻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can a bee smell?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜜蜂有嗅觉吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The milk smells sour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛奶闻起来酸了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>闻到; 嗅出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The poor boy smelled the delicious odour of cooked meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这可怜的孩子闻到了香喷喷的肉味。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother can smell burning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我母亲闻到什么东西烧焦的味道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My horse can always smell when rain is coming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的马凭嗅觉总能知道何时下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then he smelled food cooking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 接着他闻到了烧饭的气味。</font><br>\n
smelly	<h3>smelly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>发出难闻气味的; 有臭味的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The toilets in that restaurant were horribly smelly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个餐馆的卫生间气味难闻。</font><br>\n
smile	<h3>smile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>微笑, 笑容<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A smile of pleasure passed across his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脸上露出高兴的微笑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was all smiles at the good news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听到这个好消息时喜形于色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>微笑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was smiling all over his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他满面笑容。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She smiled a bitter smile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她苦笑了一下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以微笑表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Father smiled his approval.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲以微笑表示赞许。</font><br>\n
smoke	<h3>smoke</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>烟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house is full of smoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 满屋子都是烟。</font><br>吸烟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm dying for a smoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真想抽支烟。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>冒烟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fireplace smokes badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这壁炉冒烟太多。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>抽烟<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor told me not to smoke.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生告诫我不要抽烟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He smoked one cigarette after another.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一根接着一根地吸着香烟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He smoked his throat raw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抽烟抽得嗓子都疼了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用烟熏制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He smoked a sheet of glass to look at the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他熏黑了一块玻璃用以观察太阳。</font><br>\n
smooth	<h3>smooth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>光滑的; 平坦的; 平静的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a smooth skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她皮肤光滑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He planed the board smooth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他刨平了这块木板。</font><br>平稳的, 不颠簸的, 不摇晃的<br>顺利的, 没有困难的, 没问题的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a smooth style of writing in this novel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本小说文体流畅。</font><br>过分殷勤的, 圆滑的; (过分)礼貌的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)光滑, (使)平坦; (使)顺利<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This agreement will smooth the way to peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一协议将为和平铺平道路。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Speaking the language fluently certainly smoothed our path.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们说这种语言很流利, 确实给我们带来了许多方便。</font><br>\n

snap	<h3>snap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>猛地咬住<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enormous fish snapped the line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一条大鱼咬住了线。</font><br>(使某物)发出尖厉声音地突然断裂[打开, 关闭]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The branch suddenly snapped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树枝突然折断了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weight of fish snapped the fishing rod in two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鱼的重量很大, 把鱼竿啪的一声压成两截了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She snapped the door shut.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她喀哒一声关上了门。</font><br>厉声地说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She snapped at me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她厉声对我说话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拍…的快照<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The photographer snapped a nice photograph of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 摄影师给他拍了一张很棒的快照。</font><br>\n

so	<h3>so</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>那么, 非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be so childish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别那么幼稚。</font><br>这样, 那样<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp First, you turn the engine on so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 首先, 你这样开动引擎。</font><br>同样; 也<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “He can play football.”“So can I.”</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “他会踢足球。”“我也会。”</font><br>当然; 是的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “He will go to Hong Kong.”“So he will.”</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “他将要去香港。”“是的, 他将要去。”</font><br>很<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am so glad that you have come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对你的到来我感到很高兴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>因此, 所以<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog was hungry, so we fed it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗饿了, 所以我们喂它。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I gave you a map so you wouldn't get lost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我给你一张地图, 这样你就不会迷路了。</font><br>\n

soft	<h3>soft</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>软的; 柔软的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Snail is a small plant-eating creature with a soft body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜗牛是一种软体草食动物。</font><br>(声音)温柔的, 轻柔的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When she woke, her ear caught the sound of soft knocking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她醒来时听到了轻轻的敲门声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soft music put her to sleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 柔和的音乐使她睡着了。</font><br>(颜色、光线)柔和的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dog has a soft, silky coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条狗有一身柔滑而有光泽的皮毛。</font><br>柔弱的, 娇嫩的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Baby has a soft skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婴儿的皮肤很细嫩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Kids were getting soft these days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子如今变得娇嫩了。</font><br>温和的; 和蔼的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are too soft with him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你对他太温和了。</font><br>不含酒精的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Coca-cola is a soft drink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可口可乐是一种不含酒精的软性饮料。</font><br>\n

solid	<h3>solid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>固体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ice is water in a solid state.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰是固态的水。</font><br>实心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bar of iron is solid; a pipe is hollow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁棍是实心的, 而管子是空心的。</font><br>结实的; 稳定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This old house has a very solid foundation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所旧房子有非常结实的地基。</font><br>可靠的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know that James is a solid type of person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道詹姆斯是个可信赖的人。</font><br>纯粹的; 纯质的; 纯色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The curtains are solid blue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗帘都是纯蓝色的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>固体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Iron, wood and ice are solids.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铁、木和冰是固体。</font><br>\n

sound	<h3>sound</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>声音; 响声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sound travels slower than light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 声音传播比光慢。</font><br>印象, 感觉, 含义<br>播音, 录音<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)发出声音; 响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bell sounded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门铃响了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>发出…的信号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sounded a note of danger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她发出危险的信号。</font><br>探测<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were sounding the river.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在探测河水的深度。</font><br>试探, 探询<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you sound John as to whether he would accept the post when offered?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你试探一下约翰的意见, 如果让他干的话, 他是否会接受这个职位。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>健全的, 完好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child has a sound mind in a sound body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子身心健康。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His heart is basically sound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的心脏基本上健康。</font><br>明智的, 有判断力的, 正确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's very sound advice; you should take it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是非常明智的忠告, 你应当接受。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His theory is perfectly sound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的理论完全正确。</font><br>彻底的, 完全的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They made a sound investigation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们做了彻底的调查。</font><br>\n

sour	<h3>sour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有酸味的, 酸的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lemons have a sour taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 柠檬有股酸味。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most green fruit is sour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数未熟的水果都是酸的。</font><br>有发酵味道的, 酸腐的, 馊的<br>坏脾气的; 别扭的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She really looks sour this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她今天上午脾气的确有些坏。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某物)变酸, 变馊; (使某人)阴郁<br>\n
source	<h3>source</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>河流的源头, 发源地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where is the source of the Nile?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尼罗河发源于何处?</font><br>来源, 出处<br>原因<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This faulty connection is the source of the engine trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种错误的连接法是引擎出毛病的原因。</font><br>提供资料者, 资料来源<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've heard from a reliable source that company is running very badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已从一位可靠人士那儿获悉, 这家公司经营得非常糟糕。</font><br>\n
south	<h3>south</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>南, 南方, 南面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm lost, which direction is South?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我迷失方向了, 哪个方向是南?</font><br>南部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Spain lies in the south of Europe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 西班牙位于欧洲的南部。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>南的, 南方的, 向南的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a hospital on the south side at the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条街的南边有所医院。</font><br>(风)来自南方的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The south wind blows warm air across the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 南风把温暖的空气吹遍全国。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向南方, 在南方<br>\n
southeast	<h3>southeast</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>东南, 东南方, 东南部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Austria lies to the southeast of Germany.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 奥地利位于德国东南。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向东南<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>东南的, 东南部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a garage in the southeast corner of his house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他房子的东南角有一个车房。</font><br>\n
southern	<h3>southern</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>南方的, 南部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has traveled in southern cities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他游历了南方各市。</font><br>\n
southwest	<h3>southwest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>西南, 西南方, 西南部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Spain lies to the southwest of France.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 西班牙位于法国西南。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向西南<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>西南的, 西南部的<br>\n
sow	<h3>sow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>播(种), 播种于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is too soon to sow yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在还不到播种的时候。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We sowed our vegetable seed yesterday.Have you sown yours?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我们播下了菜籽, 你也播了吗?</font><br>\n
space	<h3>space</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>空间; 距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep some space between you and the car ahead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跟前面的汽车保持一定距离。</font><br>范围, 处所, 场地, 空地<br>太空; 天空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think he saw me, he was just staring into space.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他并没有看见我, 他只是凝视着天空。</font><br>间隔, 空白处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please write your name in the blank space at the top of the page.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把姓名写在这页上面的空白处。</font><br>一段时间, 期间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let us rest a space.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们休息一会儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…分隔开, 留间隔于…之间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Space the chairs so that there is room for people to walk between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把椅子间隔摆放, 以便人们从中走过。</font><br>\n
spacecraft	<h3>spacecraft</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>航天器; 宇宙飞船<br>\n
spaceship	<h3>spaceship</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(尤指小说中的)宇宙飞船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spaceship made a successful reentry into the Earth's atmosphere.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 宇宙飞船成功地重返大气层。</font><br>\n
spade	<h3>spade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铁锹, 铲子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dad uses a spade to dig the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爸爸用铁锹翻花园里的土。</font><br>\n
span	<h3>span</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>跨度, 跨径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge has a span of 100 metres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座桥跨度为一百米。</font><br>两个界限间的距离<br>一段时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupil's attention span was short.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小学生的注意力持续时间很短。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>建造跨越(某物的)桥或拱; 横跨<br>跨越, 穿越, 贯穿<br>\n
spare	<h3>spare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>节省, 节约, 舍不得, 吝惜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She never spares the butter when baking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她煎饼时从不吝惜黄油。</font><br>抽出, 让给, 分出, 匀出, 腾出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could you spare some time to come to our art exhibition?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能抽出时间来看看我们的画展吗?</font><br>省去, 免除<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor tried to spare him from pain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生尽力使他免受痛苦。</font><br>饶恕, 赦免, 不伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoner was spared.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个囚犯被赦免了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>多余的; 备用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you carry a spare wheel in the back of your car?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在车后带了一个备用的轮胎吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These pieces of bread are spare, I don't need them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些面包是多余的, 我不需要。</font><br>薄弱的, 瘦的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His tall and spare frame cut an impressive figure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他那修长的身材给人以深刻印象。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>备用零件; 备用轮胎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll show you where the spares are kept.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会指给你看放备件的地方。</font><br>\n
spark	<h3>spark</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>火花; 火星<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cigarette spark started the forest fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 香烟的火星引起了这场森林火灾。</font><br>丝毫, 略微, 一点点<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>发出火星; 发出闪光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fireflies sparked in the darkness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 萤火虫在黑暗中发光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使大感兴趣<br>导致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This accidental killing sparked major riots in the cities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次意外的杀人事件导致了不少城市的大骚乱。</font><br>\n
sparrow	<h3>sparrow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>麻雀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many sparrows on the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树上有很多麻雀。</font><br>\n
speak	<h3>speak</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>讲; 谈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby is learning to speak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个婴儿在学说话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She speaks a little French.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她会讲一点法语。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>演说; 演讲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr. Brown will speak now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在布朗先生发言。</font><br>从某种观点来说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To speak frankly, I don't like the idea at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老实说, 我一点也不赞成这个主意。</font><br>\n
speaker	<h3>speaker</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>演讲者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our first speaker tonight is Mr. White.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚我们的第一个演讲者是怀特先生。</font><br>说某种语言的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an English speaker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是讲英语的。</font><br>议长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to propose a motion, Mr. Speaker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 议长先生, 我想提出一项动议。</font><br>扬声器, 喇叭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The president addressed the students on the speaker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校长用扬声器向学生们讲话。</font><br>\n
special	<h3>special</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>特殊的, 特别的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The best students are awarded special scholarships.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最好的学生将授予特殊奖学金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His accent is quite special.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的口音非常特别。</font><br>专门的, 特设的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is making a special study of modern French literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他专门研究当代法国文学。</font><br>特别亲密的; 格外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a special friend of mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我的挚友。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>特别的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train was a special for the football game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那班火车是为足球赛开的专车。</font><br>特价<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ice cream is on special this week only!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冰淇淋特价优惠, 只限本周！</font><br>\n
specialise	<h3>specialise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>专门从事, 专攻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his first degree he wishes to specialise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 获得学士学位之后, 他希望专攻某科。</font><br>\n
specialist	<h3>specialist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>专家, 行家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a specialist in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位英语专家。</font><br>专科医生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The local doctor couldn't tell what was wrong, so he sent her to see a specialist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当地医生未能诊断出她是什么病, 所以他叫她去看专科医生。</font><br>\n
specialize	<h3>specialize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>专门从事, 专攻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his first degree he wishes to specialize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 获得学士学位之后, 他希望专攻某科。</font><br>\n
species	<h3>species</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>物种, 种<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The species is[are] valuable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一物种很珍贵。</font><br>种类; 类型<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a fault of the species.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是这号人的通病。</font><br>\n
specific	<h3>specific</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>明确的, 确切的, 详尽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What's the specific time of his arrival?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他确切的到达时间是几点钟?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you be specific?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请讲清楚些, 好吗?</font><br>具体的, 特有的, 特定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We haven't fixed a specific date for our meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们会议的具体日期还没有定下来。</font><br>仅限于…的; 只发现于…的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This disease is specific to this area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种疾病只发生在这一地区。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>特效药<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a specific for cancer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一种治疗癌症的特效药。</font><br>具体方面, 细节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He never talked in specific about his work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从不谈论有关自己工作的详情。</font><br>\n
specifically	<h3>specifically</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>特有地, 特定地, 具体地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book was written specifically for children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书是特地为儿童编写的。</font><br>明确地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I told you specifically not to do that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我明确地告诉你不要那样做。</font><br>说明确些, 亦即, 就是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several people, specifically Tom, Mike and Joan have agreed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有几个人, 即汤姆、迈克和琼已经同意了。</font><br>\n
specify	<h3>specify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>详述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please specify what you will do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请你详述一下你将做什么。</font><br>指定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We should specify a time and a place for the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们应指定会议的时间和地点。</font><br>\n
specimen	<h3>specimen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>范例, 典范, 实例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a specimen of his generosity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是他慷慨大方的一个实例。</font><br>样品, 标本<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The traveler brought back some specimens of the rocks from the mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位旅行者从山上带回了一些岩石标本。</font><br>某种类型的人, 家伙, 怪人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an odd specimen in our school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在我们学校是一个古怪的人。</font><br>\n
spectacular	<h3>spectacular</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>壮观的, 雄伟的, 引人入胜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a spectacular film.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一部场面壮观的电影。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ceremonial opening of the exhibition was very spectacular.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 展览会的开幕式非常壮观。</font><br>\n
speculate	<h3>speculate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>思索; 猜测, 推测<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't know all the circumstances, so it would be pointless to speculate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不了解所有的情况, 妄加推测是没有意义的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speculated that he would succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他推测他将成功。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>投机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would he be what he is if he hadn't speculated on the stock of exchange?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果不搞证券投机买卖, 他会成为今天这个样子吗?</font><br>\n
speech	<h3>speech</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>说话, 言谈, 言语, 说话能力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost his power of speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他失去了说话的能力。</font><br>说话方式<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think young people are sometimes disrespectful in their speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为年轻人有时说话失礼。</font><br>演说, 演讲, 讲话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech was cheered by the audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的演说博得听众的喝彩。</font><br>\n
speed	<h3>speed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>速度, 速率<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our speed averaged out at 50 km an hour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的平均速度是每小时50公里。</font><br>快速, 迅速<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everyone was surprised by the speed with which the dispute was settled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个人都为这一争端解决得如此之快而感到吃惊。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>急行; 加速<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sped his car through the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开车飞速地穿过街道。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>超速行驶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Was I really speeding, officer?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警官, 我真的超速行驶了吗?</font><br>\n
spell	<h3>spell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拼写, 拼读<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pupils learn to spell in school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小学生在学校学习拼写。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How do you spell this word?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个词怎么拼?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>招致, 带来(不好的结果)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>咒语; 符咒<br>中魔<br>魅力, 魔力; 威势<br>(某事物持续的)一段时间<br>活动或工作的一段时间; 轮班的时间<br>\n
spelling	<h3>spelling</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拼写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spelling of the word is wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个词的拼写是错误的。</font><br>拼法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This word has two spellings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个词有两种拼法。</font><br>\n
spend	<h3>spend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用钱, 花钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She would rather spend than save.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有钱宁愿花掉, 也不肯积蓄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has spent all his money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把所有的钱都花光了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>度过; 用尽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spent himself in the service of humanity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他耗尽了毕生的精力为人类服务。</font><br>\n

spider	<h3>spider</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蜘蛛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A spider spins a web in which it catches insects and bugs for its food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜘蛛结网, 用于捕捉各种昆虫。</font><br>\n
spill	<h3>spill</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>溢出; 泼出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The coffee is so full that it might spill over.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咖啡太满可能会溢出来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship spilled oil while in port.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘船停泊港内时漏油。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使跌落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The carriage upset and we were all spilled into the ditch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马车翻了, 我们都摔到了沟里。</font><br>泄露机密<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spilled it that Bill was their ringleader.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他透露比尔是他们的主谋。</font><br>\n

spirit	<h3>spirit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>精神, 心灵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cancer destroyed her body but not her spirit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 癌症摧残了她的身体, 却摧毁不了她的精神。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The article breathes the spirit of the age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇文章反映出时代精神。</font><br>神灵, 幽灵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was one of the spirits in heaven.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是天国的精灵之一。</font><br>情绪; 心情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt in excellent spirits when he arrived home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他回到家里时情绪非常好。</font><br>酒精; 烈酒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grocer sells wine and spirits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位食品商出售葡萄酒和烈性酒。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>秘密地带走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fact is that Paul kidnapped him and spirited him back to Russia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事实是, 保罗绑架了他并把他秘密地带回俄罗斯去了。</font><br>\n

splash	<h3>splash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>溅泼声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fell into the water with a splash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他扑通一声跌入水中。</font><br>溅上的斑点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are some splashes of mud on your trousers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的裤子溅上泥点了。</font><br>(光、色等的)斑点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her dog is brown with white splashes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的狗是带白花的黄狗。</font><br>溅泼的量<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使(液体)溅起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children love splashing water over each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 儿童喜欢互相泼水。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(指液体)溅落<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water splashed into the bucket from the tap.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水从龙头里喷溅着注入水池。</font><br>\n

sport	<h3>sport</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All over the world men and women, boys and girls enjoy sports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全世界的男女老少都喜爱运动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He played badminton for sport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打羽毛球是打着玩的。</font><br>运动会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They're going to have a sports meet very soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不久将开运动会。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>炫耀, 给人看, 玩弄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sports an ivory-handled cane these days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些天来, 他一直在炫耀一只象牙柄手杖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sported with her affection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他玩弄她的感情。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>嬉戏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lambs sport in the field.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小羊在田里嬉戏。</font><br>\n

spot	<h3>spot</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>斑点, 污点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have a grease spot on your shirt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的衬衣上有块油斑。</font><br>地点, 场所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's meet at this spot tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明天我们就在这个地方见面吧。</font><br>少量<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>弄上污渍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fabric will spot easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种织品很容易玷污。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spotted his clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他弄脏了他的衣服。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>看出, 认出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I spotted him in the crowd.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在人群中认出了他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How did you spot those fifties were counterfeited?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你怎样察觉出那些50元面值的纸币是伪造的?</font><br>\n

spray	<h3>spray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>喷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water sprayed out all over me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水喷出来浇了我一身。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is spraying insecticide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在喷杀虫剂。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>浪花, 飞沫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were wet with the sea spray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们被海水的浪花溅湿。</font><br>喷雾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The liquid came out of the bottle in a spray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 液体从瓶子里呈雾状喷出。</font><br>\n
spread	<h3>spread</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>伸开, 展开, 摊开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Its branches spread far and wide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它的枝条向四面八方伸展开来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Spreading her wings, the bird headed for the island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟儿展开翅膀向岛上飞去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please spread me some bread with butter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请给我一些抹了黄油的面包。</font><br>(使)传播, (使)散布<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who spread these rumours?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁散布的这些谣言?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They spread themselves to entertain the visitors.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大肆铺张招待来访客人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>范围, 宽度, 宽阔度; 连续的一段时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The survey revealed a wide spread of opinion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 调查结果表明各种意见差别很大。</font><br>传播, 蔓延<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The spread of cholera alarmed the whole city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 霍乱流行使全城的人都恐慌了。</font><br>\n
spring	<h3>spring</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>春, 春天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trees put forth buds and leaves in spring.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树木在春天发芽长叶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He returned to his hometown in the spring of 1969.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在1969年春天回到了故乡。</font><br>弹簧, 发条<br>泉, 源泉<br>跳, 跳跃<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>蹦, 跳, 跃起, 突然活动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lowered her eyelids, then sprang them open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她低垂着眼睑, 然后突然睁开。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某物)借机械装置操作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sprang the lock open.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打开了那把锁。</font><br>\n
spur	<h3>spur</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>马刺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He dug in his spurs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用马刺策马。</font><br>激励因素; 刺激, 鞭策<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp International competition is a spur to modernization.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 国际间的竞争是走向现代化的动力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Such stories serve as a spur to children's imagination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这类故事能激发儿童的想像力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以马刺策(马)使其快跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The riders spurred their horses forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骑手们策马前行。</font><br>激励<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girl's loving care spurred his recovery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 姑娘的悉心照料使他康复得很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pride spurs him to work hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自尊心促使他努力工作。</font><br>\n
spy	<h3>spy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>间谍<br>秘密侦察他人行动者, 密探<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>看见, 发现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We spied three figures in the distance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们望见远处有三个人影儿。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>当间谍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was accused of spying for the enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被指控为敌方间谍。</font><br>暗中监视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm sure my neighbours spy on me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我肯定邻居暗中监视我。</font><br>\n
square	<h3>square</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>正方形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's construct a square on this line.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们以这条线做一个正方形。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She formed the dough into squares.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把生面团捏成四方块。</font><br>广场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The town council decided to pave the square before the Hall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市议会决定把市政厅前的广场铺上石板。</font><br>平方<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>正方形的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tools are in a square box.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工具在一个方盒中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room is square.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间是正方形的。</font><br>成直角的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a square jaw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有个方下巴。</font><br>平方的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The campus covers an area of twenty square kilometres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个校园占地二十平方公里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The square root of 144 is 12.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 144的平方根是12。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使成方形<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They squared a block of granite.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把一块花岗岩加工成四方形。</font><br>与…一致<br>结账<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The money will square him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这钱可以让他还清账了。</font><br>贿赂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been squared to hold his tongue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已经被钱封住了嘴。</font><br>\n
squeeze	<h3>squeeze</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>挤, 榨, 捏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can't squeeze the wet coat dry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拧不干湿上衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room was crowded but I managed to squeeze in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间人很多, 不过我还是设法挤了进去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This only gave them opportunity to squeeze profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只能为他们提供机会榨取利润。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>榨取, 挤出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We squeezed the juice from an orange.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们从橙子中挤出汁来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>挤, 榨, 捏<br>亲切的拥抱或握手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave her an affectionate squeeze.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他亲热地拥抱她。</font><br>拥挤, 积压<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a tight squeeze in the crowded bus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公共汽车上载客太多, 挤得很。</font><br>缺乏钱或时间等所引致的困难或困苦, 拮据, 短缺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the government is in a tight squeeze it usually tries to borrow money from abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每当政府陷入财政困难, 总是试图借贷外债。</font><br>\n
stability	<h3>stability</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>稳定(性), 稳固<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lacks emotional stability.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的情绪不稳定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stability of affairs is very serious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事态非常严重。</font><br>\n
stable	<h3>stable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>稳定的; 安定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need a stable government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要一个稳定的政府。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fields give high and stable yields regardless of climatic circumstances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不管气候条件如何, 这块地总是保持高产稳产。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This chair isn't very stable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这把椅子不大稳固。</font><br>沉稳[持重]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm glad she has become such a stable character.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很高兴她变得如此沉稳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mentally she's very stable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她情绪十分稳定。</font><br>\n
stack	<h3>stack</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>堆积<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are specially packaged so that they stack easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它们经过特别包装以便于堆放。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole garden was stacked with bricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这园子里堆满了砖。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>堆, 垛<br>大量, 一大堆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a whole stack of bills waiting to be paid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一大堆账要付呢。</font><br>大烟囱; (船上的)烟囱<br>(图书馆或书店的)书架<br>\n

staff	<h3>staff</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>全体职员; 教职员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school's teaching staff is[are] excellent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该校的教师队伍是优秀的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This company has a staff of fifty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司有五十名职员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager fired an old staff yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经理昨天解雇了一名老职员。</font><br>参谋, 幕僚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He works at the General Staff.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在总参谋部工作。</font><br>\n
stage	<h3>stage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阶段; 时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was suffering from cancer which had already reached an advanced stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的癌症已经到晚期了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cautioned that the Russia-American discussions were still in an exploratory stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他警告说俄美会谈尚处于探索阶段。</font><br>舞台<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The moment the clown appeared on stage, the audience folded up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小丑一出现在舞台上, 观众们个个笑得前俯后仰。</font><br>演员的职业; 戏剧表演; 舞台生涯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are arranging a novel for the stage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在把一本小说改编成戏剧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>上演<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That scene will not stage well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那场戏不会演好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My aunt decided to stage a series of performances of a one-act play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我姨妈打算上演一系列的独幕剧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>举行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The union staged a one-day strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工会筹划举行一天的罢工。</font><br>\n

stain	<h3>stain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)染色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Does this material stain easily?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种料子容易染色吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stain the table before you varnish it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 先给桌子着色, 然后才能上清漆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stained the wood brown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给木头涂上了褐色。</font><br>褪色, 变污<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White clothes stain quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白色衣服会很快弄脏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His crimes stained the family honour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的罪行玷污了家庭的名誉。</font><br>\n
