suffer	<h3>suffer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>受痛苦; 受损害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll make you suffer for this insolence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会因你无礼而使你受苦的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She suffered greatly as a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她童年深受苦难。</font><br>变糟, 变差<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>忍受, 容忍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could not suffer criticism.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不能忍受别人批评他。</font><br>容许, 允许<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suffered nobody to touch his flower.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不允许任何人碰他的花。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoner was not suffered to say a word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该囚犯被禁止发言。</font><br>遭受, 蒙受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suffered the humiliation of being forced to resign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他蒙受了被迫辞职的羞辱。</font><br>\n
suffering	<h3>suffering</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>身体或心灵的痛苦, 苦难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The medication should ease the suffering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种疗法能减轻痛苦。</font><br>各种苦恼; 折磨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bore her sufferings bravely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她勇敢地承受苦难的遭遇。</font><br>\n
sufficient	<h3>sufficient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>足够的; 充足的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have gained sufficient experience to tackle this problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已经有了足够的经验来处理这个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A word to the wise is sufficient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有灵犀者一点就通。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His income is sufficient for his needs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的收入能满足他的需要。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rain was not sufficient to do any harm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨量不足对庄稼有害。</font><br>\n
sugar	<h3>sugar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>糖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you have sugar in your tea?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你茶里放糖吗?</font><br>一块[茶匙等]糖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three sugars in my coffee, please!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请在我的咖啡里放三块糖！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She put two spoonfuls of sugar in her tea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在茶里放了两匙糖。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…加糖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you sugar my tea?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在我茶里加糖了吗?</font><br>给…裹上(糖衣或类糖物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They sugared trees to catch moths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在树上撒糖捕蛾。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The roads had been cleaned of snow, but the roof tops, grass and trees were still sugared white.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 道路上已无积雪, 但屋顶、草地和树上依然披着银装。</font><br>\n
suggest	<h3>suggest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>建议, 提议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They accepted the paper and suggested only one change.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们接受了这篇论文, 只提出改动一个地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What I suggest to do in this matter is this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个问题上, 我建议这样做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I suggested waiting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我建议等候。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I suggest you closing the door?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要求你把门关起来好吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We suggested Eby's doing it in a different way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们建议伊比换一种方式做。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suggested we should visit a class right away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们建议我们马上去听课。</font><br>暗示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her smile suggests her consent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的微笑意味着同意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His attitude suggests that he isn't really interested.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的态度表明他并不真的感兴趣。</font><br>使想起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sight of birds suggested a new idea for flying machines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鸟的形象使人产生一个制造航空机的新主意。</font><br>\n
suggestion	<h3>suggestion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>建议, 意见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your suggestions are unworkable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的建议是行不通的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made the suggestion that the political prisoners (should) be set free.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他提议释放政治犯。</font><br>细微的迹象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I detected a suggestion of malice in his remarks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉察出他说的话略带恶意。</font><br>\n
suicide	<h3>suicide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>自杀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The number of suicide has increased.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 自杀案件的数量增加了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The death was adjudged a suicide by sleeping pills.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该死亡事件被判定为服用安眠药自杀。</font><br>自取灭亡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It will not be suicide to admit your mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 承认你的错误并不等于自毁前程。</font><br>\n
suit	<h3>suit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一套衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He changed his overalls for a suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他脱下工装裤, 换上了一套西服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll take my swimming suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将带着我的游泳衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The piece of cloth will cut up into three suits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块布可以裁成三套衣服。</font><br>诉讼案件; 法律程序<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the plaintiff in the suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是那件诉讼案中的原告。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>适合于(某人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That song doesn't suit her voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那首歌不适合她的嗓子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些式样可以加以更改, 以适合个人的喜好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>对…方便, 使满意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will that time suit?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个时间合适吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All this suits my purpose very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一切都很合我意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It doesn't suit her to have her hair cut short.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她不适合剪短发。</font><br>\n
suitable	<h3>suitable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>适当的, 适宜的, 恰当的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hasn't any suitable shoes for the wedding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 婚礼上穿的鞋他一双也没有。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tomorrow will be quite suitable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明天挺合适。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This wine is not suitable to my taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这酒不合我胃口。</font><br>\n
suitcase	<h3>suitcase</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>手提箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The suitcase is fairly heavy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只衣箱相当重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll have your suitcases sent forward to the hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会叫人先把你的箱子送到旅馆去的。</font><br>\n
sum	<h3>sum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>总数, 总和<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The expenses came to an enormous sum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开支总数巨大。</font><br>金额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sum will be increased by fifteen per cent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金额将要增加15%。</font><br>算术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is better at sums than I am.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的算术比我好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>合计<br>总结, 归纳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Contributions summed into several thousand dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 捐款总数达数千美元。</font><br>\n
summarise	<h3>summarise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>总结, 概述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He summarised the book in ten pages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用十页篇幅概述了这本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will summarise what I have done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将概述我所做的事情。</font><br>\n
summarize	<h3>summarize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>总结, 概述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He summarized the book in ten pages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用十页篇幅概述了这本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will summarize what I have done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将概述我所做的事情。</font><br>\n
summary	<h3>summary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>摘要, 概要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a summary of what had been done.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总结了所做的事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm giving you a summary of facts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我将概述一下事实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>即刻的, 立即的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was given the summary punishment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他当场就受到了处罚。</font><br>匆忙的, 草率的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She complained about the summary treatment given her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她抱怨对她草率的对待。</font><br>概括的; 简要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave a summary account.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给出了简要的说明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is a summary and ironic end.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个具有概括性和讽刺意味的结局。</font><br>\n
summer	<h3>summer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>夏, 夏天, 夏季<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Summer is my favourite season.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我最喜欢夏季。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Peter died in the summer of 1702.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 彼得死于1702年夏天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a hot summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个炎热的夏季。</font><br>黄金时代, 鼎盛时期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was the high summer of English literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是英国文学的黄金时代。</font><br>岁数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked younger than his 70 summers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他看起来不到七十岁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I went there two summers ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我两年前去过那里。</font><br>\n
summit	<h3>summit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(山等的)最高点; 峰顶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They climbed up the mountain and reached the summit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们爬山, 最终达到了山顶。</font><br>高层会议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A Western European summit was held in Bonn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在波恩举行了西欧各国首脑会议。</font><br>\n
sun	<h3>sun</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日, 太阳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At last the sun broke through the clouds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳终于穿云而出。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was the first of August, a perfect day, with a burning sun and cloudless sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 八月一日这天, 阳光普照, 万里无云。</font><br>日光, 阳光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room never gets any sun at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个房间从来不见阳光。</font><br>恒星<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our sun is only one of many suns in the heavens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的太阳只是天际中许多恒星之一。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>晒太阳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sunned herself on the beach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在海滩上晒太阳。</font><br>\n
Sunday	<h3>Sunday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>星期日, 星期天, 礼拜天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My birthday is on a Sunday this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我今年的生日是在一个星期天。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They will come on Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将于星期天来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is very religious person who goes to church every Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她十分虔诚, 每个星期天都上教堂。</font><br>\n

sunny	<h3>sunny</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>阳光充足的, 阳光明媚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a warm sunny day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是个温暖的阳光明媚的日子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This room is very sunny.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这间房阳光充足。</font><br>令人愉快的, 快活的, (性格)开朗的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waiter has a sunny disposition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位侍者性格开朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His nature was sunny.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他性情开朗。</font><br>\n
sunrise	<h3>sunrise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日出(时分); 黎明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got up at sunrise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们黎明时起床。</font><br>\n
sunset	<h3>sunset</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日落(时), 薄暮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They stopped work at sunset.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们日落时收工。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You get beautiful sunsets in the tropics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在热带地区可以看到美丽的落日余晖。</font><br>\n
sunshine	<h3>sunshine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阳光, 日光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We lie in the sunshine for hours, getting a tan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们躺在日光下几个小时进行日光浴。</font><br>快活, 愉快; 开朗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has brought some sunshine into my life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给我的生活带来了几分快乐。</font><br>\n
super	<h3>super</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极好的; 超级的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She got a super new dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一套很漂亮的新衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a super car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一辆超级轿车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll like her; she's super.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你一定喜欢她, 她好极了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That sounds super!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那听起来棒极了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You look super in your new clothes!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你穿着这套新衣服漂亮极了！</font><br>\n
superb	<h3>superb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>卓越的, 杰出的, 极好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a superb singer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位超级歌星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actor gave a superb performance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位演员表演极佳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sports facilities are superb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运动设施是第一流的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His medical skill is so superb that he can hardly be filled in for an emergency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他医术高超, 在紧急情况下几乎无人企及。</font><br>\n
superficial	<h3>superficial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>表面(上)的; 表皮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A superficial injury is not serious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 表面的伤不太严重。</font><br>肤浅的, 浅薄的; 缺乏深度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a superficial book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一本立论肤浅的书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a superficial knowledge of this subject.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对这门学科略知皮毛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's so superficial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他非常浅薄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're too superficial to appreciate great literature like this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你太肤浅, 无法欣赏这类文学巨著。</font><br>\n
superior	<h3>superior</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(级别、地位)较高的; (品质、程度)优良的, 较好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're a very superior young woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你是一个非常优秀的年轻女性。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He may be capable of jealousy when you have made superior progress in your work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当你在工作中取得较大进步时, 他也会嫉妒你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book is superior to that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书比那本书好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The army was superior in number to its enemies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队在数量上超过了敌人。</font><br>上等的, 优秀的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The test showed he was the superior player.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次测试显示出他比较优秀。</font><br>有优越感的, 高傲的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She affected a superior air.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她摆出一副高不可攀的样子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why does he look so superior?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为什么看上去那么傲慢?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>上级, 长官, 上司<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John was his direct superior.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰是他的顶头上司。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He always does what his superiors tell him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惟上级之命是从。</font><br>较好的人[事物], 优胜者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As a violin player, he has no superior.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 作为小提琴手, 没有人能胜过他。</font><br>\n
superman	<h3>superman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>具有超常能力的人, 超人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film portrays Gandhi as a kind of superman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部电影把甘地描绘成一个超人。</font><br>\n
supermarket	<h3>supermarket</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>超级市场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They bought food at the supermarket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在超级市场买了食物。</font><br>\n
supervise	<h3>supervise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>监督, 管理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The group leader supervises a dozen workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 组长管十二个工人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The architect supervised the building of the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 建筑工程师监督房子的施工。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tomorrow he will supervise all the pupils taking the English examination.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 明天全体学生考英语, 他将担任监考。</font><br>\n
supper	<h3>supper</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>晚饭, 晚餐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is at supper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在吃晚饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had a wonderful supper yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天我吃了一顿很棒的晚饭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hotel is famous for its suppers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个酒店以晚餐而著称。</font><br>\n
supplement	<h3>supplement</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>增补l<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They had to get a job to supplement the family income.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不得不找一份工作以贴补家庭收入。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She supplements her diet with eggs and fruit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她以鸡蛋和水果来补充饮食。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>补遗, 补编<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A supplement to this dictionary may be published next year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该词典的补编或许将于明年出版。</font><br>\n
supply	<h3>supply</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>供给, 供应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our task is to supply vegetables all the year round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的任务是全年供应蔬菜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The school supplies books for the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校为儿童提供书本。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He supplied food and clothing for his reputation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为了自己的名誉而赞助衣食。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It supplies an urgent need.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这满足了急需。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rocks and stumps supplied the place of chairs at the picnic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 野餐时石头和树桩都充当了椅子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shop was unable to supply what she wanted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这商店不能供应她所需要的商品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>供给, 供应, 补给<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water supply to the room failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房间的供水中断了。</font><br>供给物, 供应品; 储备物质; 粮食, 生活用品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who will be responsible for the expedition's supplies?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁将负责探险队的物资供应?</font><br>\n
support	<h3>support</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>支撑; 撑扶; 托住; 支持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Walls support the roof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙支撑着屋顶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Bill had to support Jill or she would have fallen to the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比尔只得扶住吉尔, 不然她就会摔倒在地。</font><br>维持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Air, food and drink are necessary to support life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 空气、食物和水是维持生命所必需的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She couldn't support life without friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有朋友她就过不了日子。</font><br>赞助; 赞成; 供养<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our school is supported by the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府赞助我校的办学费用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She supports birth control.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她赞成计划生育。</font><br>经常光顾; 为…捧场<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Which football team do you support?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你支持哪个足球队?</font><br>忍受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't support this heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我忍受不了这样的热度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>支撑, 承受, 支持, 赞助<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your support has meant a lot to me during this difficult time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这困难时期, 你的支持给了我很大的帮助。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plan was canceled because of lack of support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于缺乏赞助, 这项计划被取消了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The argument lacked support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一论点缺乏证据。</font><br>支撑物, 支柱, 支座, 支架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put a support under it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在它下面放一根支柱。</font><br>给予帮助[同情]的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jimmy was a great support to us when father died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 父亲死后, 吉米给我们的帮助是巨大的。</font><br>支持者, 拥护者<br>\n
suppose	<h3>suppose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>料想; 猜想; 以为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are only supposing this on hearsay, you have no proof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你只是根据传闻想像而已, 并没有证据。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I suppose he will be back by eight o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想他八点钟以前会回来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suppose that all rich men are wicked.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以为凡是有钱人都很坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hadn't supposed that I should get the first prize.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有想到会获得一等奖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What do you suppose that dance is?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你认为那是什么舞?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All her neighbours supposed her to be an actress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 街坊都以为她是一个演员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They supposed him dead.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们以为他死了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I should suppose him to be about fifty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜想他大约50岁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suppose the box to contain books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们猜想这箱子里装的是书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I supposed it wrong to tell a lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为说谎不对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Never suppose yourself knowing everything.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别以为你自己是万事通。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He supposed himself doing the best thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以为他做得最好。</font><br>假定, 假设<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>如果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Suppose he can't come, who will do the work?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果他不能前来, 谁来做这项工作呢?</font><br>\n
supreme	<h3>supreme</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最高的; 至上的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Pope is the supreme leader of the Roman Catholic Church.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教皇是罗马天主教的最高领袖。</font><br>最重要的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was the supreme moment in his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是他一生中最重要的时刻。</font><br>\n
sure	<h3>sure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无疑的, 确信的, 有把握的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall certainly be present at the meeting, but I am not sure about my wife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我肯定会出席会议, 但是至于我的妻子去不去我就不敢说了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Not being sure of the word, he turned it up in the dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对那个词没有把握, 于是就查字典。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As we have been practising regularly, we are sure of winning the game this time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为我们一直在训练, 所以这次比赛有把握赢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am not sure of what he has said at the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在会上说了些什么我不太清楚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm sure that she will like this book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我确信她喜欢这本书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not quite sure where he is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能确定他在哪儿。</font><br>肯定要做某事的; 一定做某事的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is sure to be back soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不久一定会回来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>的确, 当然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It sure was cold.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 确实很冷！</font><br>\n
surf	<h3>surf</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拍岸浪花<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They threw off their clothes and ran into the surf.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们脱掉衣服奔向海浪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>滑浪, 作冲浪运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the waves are big enough, we'll go surfing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果海浪大, 我们就去冲浪。</font><br>\n
surface	<h3>surface</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>面, 表面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cube has six surfaces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 立方体有六个面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wooden surface had a beautiful shine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这木头表面发出美丽的光亮。</font><br>水面, 液体的表面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy disturbed the tranquil surface of the pond with a stick.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩用棍子打破了平静的池面。</font><br>外表, 外观<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must not look only at the surface of things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看事物不能只看表面现象。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This essay is so short that it can only scratch the surface of the topic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇文章很短, 只能对这一问题作肤浅的探讨。</font><br>\n
surge	<h3>surge</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(感情等)洋溢, 奔放<br>浪涛般汹涌奔腾<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(人群等)蜂拥而出<br>(感情等)洋溢, 奔放<br>(波涛等)汹涌, 奔腾<br>\n
surgeon	<h3>surgeon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外科医生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The surgeon is now operating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 外科医生正在做手术。</font><br>\n
surgery	<h3>surgery</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外科手术<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your condition is serious and requires surgery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的情况很严重, 需要动外科手术。</font><br>外科诊所<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saw the poster in the doctor's surgery.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在那位医生的外科诊所里看到了这张海报。</font><br>门诊时间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What time does surgery finish?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 门诊什么时间结束?</font><br>\n
surplus	<h3>surplus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>过剩的, 多余的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manufacturers in some countries dumped their surplus commodities abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一些国家的制造商向国外倾销过剩产品。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's an essay heavy with surplus phrasing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是篇废话连篇的散文。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>过剩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The United States tried to dispose of its grain surpluses.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美国努力把过剩粮食处理掉。</font><br>\n
surprise	<h3>surprise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使惊奇, 使诧异<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He may surprise us all yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总有一天会让我们大家惊奇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I surprised everyone by wearing a terrible mask.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我带了一副可怕的面具, 使大家受惊了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They surprised us with a visit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们突然来访使我们大感意外。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It surprised me to see so many people there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那里看到那么多人使我感到意外。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It surprised them that she was such a fine swimmer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她游得这么好, 使他们都很惊奇。</font><br>意外发现[撞见], 出其不意获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We surprised the burglars opening the safe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窃贼在开保险箱时被我们撞上了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police surprised the thief into confessing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察出其不意地使小偷招认了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>惊奇, 惊讶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll never forget his surprise when we told him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我永远不会忘记我们告诉他时他所表现出来的惊讶表情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sue was overcome by surprise when Peter walked in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当彼得走进屋时, 苏吓了一跳。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He looked up in surprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惊奇地抬头看了一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I got a big surprise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我大吃一惊。</font><br>令人吃惊的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've had some unpleasant surprises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们得到了一些令人不快的意外消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole thing is a surprise to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个事情出乎我们的意料。</font><br>\n
surrender	<h3>surrender</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>投降<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the end they were forced to surrender.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后他们被迫投降了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He voluntarily surrendered himself to the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他主动向警方自首。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>放弃; 抛弃<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They surrendered the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们放弃了这座城市。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gradually surrendered her dream of becoming an actress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她渐渐放弃了当演员的梦想。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>投降, 放弃<br>\n
surround	<h3>surround</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A crowd surrounded him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群人围着他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The firemen surrounded the burning building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 消防队员包围了熊熊燃烧的建筑物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The original builders surrounded the city by[with] a wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最初的建设者们在该城的周围修起了城墙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Complete secrecy surrounded the meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议在绝对机密的环境中进行。</font><br>\n
surroundings	<h3>surroundings</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(周围的)环境[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lived amid beautiful surroundings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们生活在优美的环境中。</font><br>\n
survey	<h3>survey</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>眺望; 纵览<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I surveyed the view from the top of the hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我从山顶眺望景色。</font><br>测量; 勘察<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are surveying the land before it is divided into house lots.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们要在土地被分割为住宅用地前先勘察这块土地。</font><br>检查, 鉴定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Survey the car before you buy it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 买车之前先对它鉴定一下。</font><br>通盘考虑, 回顾<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's survey the events leading up to the crime.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们全面回顾一下导致这一罪行的所有事件。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>调查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The reporter is doing a survey of public attitudes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位记者正在进行民意调查。</font><br>\n
survival	<h3>survival</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>幸存, 生存<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor told my wife I had a fifty-fifty chance of survival.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生告诉我的妻子, 说我活下去的可能性只有50%。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are still fighting for survival.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们还在为生存而斗争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all have a strong survival instinct.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每个人都有强烈的求生本能。</font><br>残存的人[物]; 遗物; 遗风<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man was a survival of a past age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位老人是上一代的遗老。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of these ceremonies are survivals from earlier times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些礼仪活动大部分是从古代沿袭下来的。</font><br>\n
survive	<h3>survive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>幸存, 活下来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These plants cannot survive in very cold conditions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些植物在严寒中不能存活。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp None of Shakespeare's plays survives in its original manuscript form.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 莎士比亚剧本的真迹已流失殆尽。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>比…活得长, 经历…之后还存在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most parents expect that their children will survive them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数父母都希望子女能够比他们自己长寿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did anyone survive the explosion?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那次爆炸事故中有人幸免吗?</font><br>\n
survivor	<h3>survivor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>幸存者; 残存者; 生还者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was only one survivor of the plane crash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这次飞机失事中只有一名幸存者。</font><br>\n
suspect	<h3>suspect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>猜疑(是), 怀疑(是), 觉得(是)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suspected an ambush.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们疑心有埋伏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I suspect (that) you once thought otherwise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得你一度有过不同的想法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I suspect him to know everything about that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我猜想那件事他全都知道了。</font><br>怀疑; 不信任<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all suspect the truth of the report.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们对报告的真实性感到怀疑。</font><br>怀疑…有罪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police suspect him of having taken the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察怀疑钱是他偷的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They suspect him to be a thief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们怀疑他是个贼。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>嫌疑犯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two suspects are now being interrogated in connection with the killing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与杀人案有关的两名嫌疑犯正在接受审讯。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可疑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His reason for being absent is suspect.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他缺席的理由不足为信。</font><br>\n
suspend	<h3>suspend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>暂停, 终止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Both sides in the conflict have agreed temporarily to suspend hostilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冲突双方同意暂时停火。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President has suspended the constitution and assumed total power.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统废止了宪法, 独揽大权。</font><br>悬, 挂, 吊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A lamp was suspended from the ceiling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天花板上吊着一盏灯。</font><br>\n
suspicion	<h3>suspicion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>怀疑, 嫌疑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Since they discovered the truth about his background, his colleagues have regarded him with suspicion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的同事虽然摸清了他的背景, 但对他还是疑神疑鬼的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is under suspicion of murder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他涉嫌谋杀。</font><br>疑心, 猜疑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a suspicion that he's right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我隐约觉得他是对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The behaviour of the stranger aroused our suspicions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个陌生人的行为引起了我们的怀疑。</font><br>一点儿, 少量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was just a suspicion of light in the east.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 东方刚刚泛白。</font><br>\n
sustain	<h3>sustain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>承受, 支撑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These four posts sustain the entire building.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这四根柱子支撑着整座建筑物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An unshakable belief sustained me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一种不可动摇的信念支持着我。</font><br>维持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the war we had just enough food to sustain us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争期间, 我们的食物仅够维持生活。</font><br>长期保持; 使继续<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We do not have enough money to sustain our campaign for long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们没有足够的财力使宣传活动长期保持下去。</font><br>经受, 遭受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He sustained a foot injury.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他足部受了伤。</font><br>\n
sustainable	<h3>sustainable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(对自然资源和能源的利用)不破坏生态平衡的, 合理利用的<br>可持续的<br>\n
swallow	<h3>swallow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>吞, 咽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swallowed without chewing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他未经咀嚼就把食物咽下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He put a grape into his mouth and swallowed it whole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把一粒葡萄放入嘴里, 整个吞了下去。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>不流露<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know how I managed to swallow my anger.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道怎样才能抑制住我的愤怒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was forced to swallow his pride and ask for money from his brother.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不得不抛下面子, 从他弟弟那里求得资助。</font><br>〈口〉忍受; 轻信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I found it hard to swallow his insults.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我真的很难忍受他的侮辱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(吃或喝的)一口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a few swallows of tea and then hurried out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喝了几口茶, 就匆忙出去了。燕子</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One swallow doesn't make a summer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一燕不成夏。</font><br>\n
sway	<h3>sway</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)摇摆, (使)摇动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dancers swayed to the music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 跳舞的人随着音乐节奏摇摆。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swayed his head from side to side with worry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他忧心忡忡地频频摇头。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>影响、改变…的观点[行动]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech failed to sway his colleagues into supporting the plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的一番话没能使他的同事支持这项计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>摇摆<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt the sway of the deck under his feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他感觉到脚下甲板的摇动。</font><br>支配; 统治<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In medieval times the church held sway over many countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在中世纪, 教会支配着许多国家。</font><br>\n
swear	<h3>swear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>诅咒; 咒骂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His boss often swore at him, sometimes for no reason at all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老板经常骂他, 有时毫无理由。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某人)就…宣誓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know anything about what happened, I swear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我发誓, 我对所发生的事一无所知。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They swore an oath to carry out their duties faithfully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们宣誓忠实履行自己的职责。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swore to obey the king.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发誓服从国王。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swore that he had put the papers in that drawer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他发誓说, 他是把文件放在那个抽屉里的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>〈非正〉断言, 明确地表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I swear he's a swindler.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我肯定他是个骗子。</font><br>\n
sweat	<h3>sweat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>汗, 汗水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wiped the sweat from his face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他抹去脸上的汗。</font><br>苦差事; 艰苦的工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The job's quite a sweat; I'm exhausted already.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个工作相当吃力, 我已经筋疲力尽了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)出汗, (使)流汗, (使)发汗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor sweated his patient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生使他的病人发汗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>辛苦工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sweating like a bullock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在辛苦地干活。</font><br>\n
sweater	<h3>sweater</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>毛衣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sweaters are often made of wool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毛衣常由羊毛织成。</font><br>\n
sweep	<h3>sweep</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>扫, 打扫, 拂去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is sweeping with a broom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在用扫帚扫地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother sweeps the kitchen every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妈妈每天打扫厨房。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She swept the floor clean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把地板扫干净了。</font><br>扫视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His glance swept from right to left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他左右扫视了一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The captain swept the horizon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 船长向地平线扫视了一下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>打扫, 清扫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This floor needs a good sweep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这地板需要好好清扫一下。</font><br>挥动, 摆动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With a sweep of his sword he cut through the rope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用剑一挥把绳子砍断了。</font><br>大面积搜索<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rescue services did the last sweep to try and find the missing boy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 救援队展开最后一次大面积搜索, 设法找到失踪的男孩。</font><br>\n
sweet	<h3>sweet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>甜(味)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sugar has a sweet taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 糖有一种甜味。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fruit isn't sweet enough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这水果不够甜。</font><br>悦耳[目]的, 芳香的; 令人高兴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Just smell these sweet flowers!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请闻闻这些芬芳的花朵！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It smells sweet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它有香味。</font><br>温柔的, 和蔼的, 体贴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has a naturally sweet temper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她性格温和。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My grandparents were very sweet to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的祖父母对我很和蔼。</font><br>可爱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a sweet girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位可爱的姑娘。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>糖果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't eat sweets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要吃糖果。</font><br>甜食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That sweet consists of eggs, honey and cream.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那种甜食包括鸡蛋、蜂蜜和奶油。</font><br>\n
swell	<h3>swell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>肿胀, 膨胀, 鼓起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her leg has swollen badly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的腿肿得很厉害。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The infection swelled his hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于感染, 他的手肿了起来。</font><br>增强, 增多, 扩大<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His fortune has swollen during the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的财产在战争期间大为增加。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the heavy rain the river swelled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大雨过后, 河水猛涨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These small items help to swell the total.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些小项目使总额增加了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>汹涌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waves had taken on a deep swell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海浪汹涌。</font><br>声音渐强<br>\n
swift	<h3>swift</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>迅速的, 速度快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A swift clap of thunder woke me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一阵突然的雷鸣把我惊醒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is as swift of foot as a hare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他跑得像兔子一样快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave them a swift glance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他迅速地朝他们瞥了一眼。</font><br>敏捷的, 反应快的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a swift wit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有急智。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is swift to hear, but slow to speak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听力敏锐, 但不善言辞。</font><br>\n
swim	<h3>swim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>游泳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can swim well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他游泳游得很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has swum the English Channel three times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已三次游过英吉利海峡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>眩晕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was hot and tired and his head was swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他又热又累, 头晕目眩。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>游泳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He goes for a swim every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他每天早晨去游泳。</font><br>\n
swing	<h3>swing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)摇摆, (使)摇荡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The monkey was swinging in the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猴子在树上荡来荡去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was swinging his arms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在摇摆手臂。</font><br>(使)旋转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swung the axe and with one blow split open the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挥动着斧子一下就把门劈开了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He swung the gate open wide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把大门打开。</font><br>(使)突然转向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The value of the pound swung downwards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英镑的价值突然下跌。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>摆动, 摇摆<br>秋千<br>显著的变化<br>\n
switch	<h3>switch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>开关<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where is the light switch?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电灯开关在哪儿?</font><br>改变, 转变<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had to make a switch in our arrangements.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不对我们的安排作些变动。</font><br>细枝条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy made a switch from the branch of a cherry tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个男孩用樱桃树枝做了一条鞭子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>转变, 改变<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train was switching.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车正在换道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They kept switching meeting places.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们不断改变碰面的地点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>转换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always switching jobs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是变换工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't switch the light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要开灯。</font><br>\n

sympathetic	<h3>sympathetic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>表示同情的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a sympathetic person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个有同情心的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was very sympathetic when my mother died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对我母亲的去世深表同情。</font><br>赞同的, 支持的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were quite sympathetic to our proposals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们很赞同我们的建议。</font><br>\n
sympathise	<h3>sympathise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>同情, 支持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please, dear, we sympathize deeply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听我说, 亲爱的, 我们深表同情。</font><br>\n

synthetic	<h3>synthetic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>合成的, 人造的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the synthetic diamond.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是人造钻石。</font><br>〈口〉假的, 非天然的; 虚伪的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We felt the salesman's synthetic friendliness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们感觉到那位销售员的虚情假意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>合成物, 合成纤维<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nylon is a synthetic; it is not from nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尼龙是一种合成纤维, 不是天然物质。</font><br>\n
system	<h3>system</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>系统; 体系<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He created a new system of teaching foreign languages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他创造了一种新的外语教学体系。</font><br>制度, 体制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新制度对生产率产生了灾难性的影响。</font><br>方法, 做法<br>身体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Too much alcohol is bad for the system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过量饮酒对身体有害。</font><br>\n
systematic	<h3>systematic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有系统的; 有规则的; 彻底的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher made a systematic work of teaching.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个教师进行系统的教学工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The way he works isn't very systematic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的工作不是很有条理。</font><br>\n
table	<h3>table</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>桌子; 台子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A throng of shoppers pushed against one another to the display tables of the department store.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群顾客你推我搡地挤到百货公司的展示柜台前。</font><br>同席的人, 在座的人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The table in the rear was[were] very noisy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 后面的一桌人吵闹得很厉害。</font><br>食物, 餐食, 伙食<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He keeps an excellent table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总是以丰盛的饭菜来招待客人。</font><br>表格, 目录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a table of contents in the front of a dictionary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 词典的开头有目录表。</font><br>乘法表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is learning his tables.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在背乘法表。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>列表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tables the times of arrival.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把到达的时间列成表。</font><br>把…列入议事日程, 提出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Opposition has tabled an amendment to the bill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 反对党已经就该议案提交了一项修正条款。</font><br>搁置, 把…放在以后考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The proposal was temporarily tabled due to more pressing business.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于有更紧急的事务, 该项议案暂缓审议。</font><br>\n
tackle	<h3>tackle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>解决; 应付<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know how to tackle this problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道该如何处理这个问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>捉住; 扭倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That big fullback tackles hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个高大的后卫擒抱阻拦得很凶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The robber tried to run away but a man tackled him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 强盗企图逃跑, 但一个人把他抓住了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拦截; 擒抱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made several key tackles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他作了几次关键性的阻截。</font><br>器具, 器械, 用具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't forget to bring your sports tackle with you tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别忘了明天带上你的体育用具。</font><br>滑车, 滑轮组<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They use the tackle to lift the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用滑车把机器抬起来。</font><br>\n
tag	<h3>tag</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>加标签于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tag the bottles now!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在给这些瓶子贴上标签吧！</font><br>以特殊的方式评价[描述]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often tags his speeches with poetry.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他常引用诗句添饰他的演讲以增强效果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp One may tag this book traditional.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人们可以称这本书为传统作品。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>标签, 签条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you put tags on your luggage?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在自己的行李上贴上标签了吗?</font><br>名言, 警句<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old scholar's writing is always full of tags.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位老学者的文章里总是有很多名言警句。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>褴褛的<br>\n
tail	<h3>tail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尾, 尾巴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A dog reacts to kindness by wagging its tail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狗摇尾巴以报答人们的爱护。</font><br>尾部, 尾状物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tail won't come off the toy plane; it's fixed on with nails.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玩具飞机的机尾不会掉下来, 它是用钉子钉住的。</font><br>尾随者; 随行者, 跟班<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police have put a tail on me so they know my every move.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警方派了一个人跟踪, 所以我的一举一动他们都清楚。</font><br>燕尾服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The duke first went into tails at only fifteen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位公爵十五岁时就开始穿燕尾服了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>跟踪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been tailing me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直在跟踪着我。</font><br>\n
tailor	<h3>tailor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>裁缝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tailor has cut my coat very well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁缝把我的外衣裁得很好。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>裁制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This material tailors well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种布料容易缝制成衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tailored several suits when he went to work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他开始上班时做了几套西服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tailored me several suits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为我缝制了几套衣服。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>调整使适应<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clinic tailors its treatment to individual need.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家诊所根据患者不同的病情采取相应的治疗方法。</font><br>\n
take	<h3>take</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>带(去), 携带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went out of the room, taking the flowers with her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她带着花走出了房间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take her some flowers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给她带一些花去。</font><br>拿, 取, 抓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who has taken my pen?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁把我的钢笔拿走了?</font><br>需要; 花费<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flight took two hours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一飞行花了两小时。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It takes two to make a quarrel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要两个人才能吵嘴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It took an hour for the car to come here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这辆汽车开了一小时才到达这里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It took him three hours to finish the exercises.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他完成这个练习用了三个小时。</font><br>学习; 教<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She plans to take a course in mathematics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她打算学习数学课程。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mrs. Biggs is ill and will be unable to take you today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 比格斯夫人病了, 今天不能给你们上课了。</font><br>取得, 接受, 容纳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp John takes second place in the race.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 约翰获得赛跑亚军。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She won't take any more of his insults.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她再也不能容忍他的侮辱了。</font><br>买下; 租用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're taking a house in Devon for a month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们打算在德文郡租间房子住一个月。</font><br>吃, 喝, 服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you take a cup of tea?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要喝一杯茶吗?</font><br>乘车, 上船<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Because it was wet, he took a taxi.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因为天下雨, 所以他搭乘了出租车。</font><br>测定, 量; 拍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nurse took the patient's temperature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 护士为病人量了体温。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a photograph of the castle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拍了一张这个城堡的照片。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>产生预期效果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dye took immediately.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 马上着色了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>上钩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fish is taking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鱼要上钩了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>捕获量; 收入额<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Take has lagged behind the increased outgo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 收入赶不上增加的支出。</font><br>电影镜头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We had a talk between takes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在拍摄镜头的间隙, 我们谈了一次话。</font><br>\n
tale	<h3>tale</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>故事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was reading tales of adventures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在读冒险故事。</font><br>传言; 谣言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a folk tale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个民间传说。</font><br>\n
talent	<h3>talent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>天资, 才能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a man of many talents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个多才多艺的人。</font><br>人才<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a lot of talent in this city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个城市里有很多人才。</font><br>\n
talk	<h3>talk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>说话, 交谈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hate the man who enjoys talking big.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌爱吹牛的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The instructor never talks personalities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位导师从不蜚短流长说人坏话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He talked himself hoarse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他讲得声音都嘶哑了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>谈论, 商谈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We talked football all evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们整个晚上都谈足球。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>交谈, 谈话, 聊天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That long talk healed many of differences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那次长谈消除了很多分歧。</font><br>演说, 讲话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The president was asked to give a short talk on his visit to the United States.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 校长应邀简短谈谈访美情况。</font><br>空话, 废话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was too certain of her love to be deceived by such talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他确信她的爱, 因而不会被这种谣言所欺骗。</font><br>\n
tall	<h3>tall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>高的, 身材高的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a tall man but his wife is a short woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个子很高的男人, 但他妻子很矮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dress models are tall of stature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 时装模特儿的身材都较高。</font><br>难以置信的; 难以完成的<br>\n
tame	<h3>tame</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>驯服的, 温顺的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cat is a tame animal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猫是一种温顺的动物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is so tame that he agrees with everybody.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很随和, 总是顺从他人的意见。</font><br>沉闷的; 乏味的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The film has a tame ending.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那电影的结局枯燥无味。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party was tame because all the people were sleepy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 聚会很沉闷, 因为大家昏昏欲睡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)服从; 驯服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White rats tame easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白鼠易驯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His job is to tame lions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的工作是驯狮。</font><br>\n
tank	<h3>tank</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>油[水]箱, 罐, 槽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is still some gasoline left in the tank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油箱里还剩下一些汽油。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fill the tank with water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把水槽灌满水。</font><br>坦克<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tanks moved easily over the rough road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 坦克在崎岖的道路上通行无阻。</font><br>\n
tap	<h3>tap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>塞子, 龙头<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Connect the hose to the tap and turn on the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把软管接在龙头上, 打开水龙头。</font><br>电话窃听<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The detectives put a tap on the suspect's telephone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 侦察人员在嫌疑犯的电话上装窃听装置。</font><br>轻敲, 轻拍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave a tap at the microphone before speaking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在讲话前先轻叩了一下扩音器。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>割[打]开…取[放]液体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bar tender tapped a new keg of beer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 酒吧招待开了一桶新啤酒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The girls were tapping the rubber.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 姑娘们正在割橡胶。</font><br>开发; 利用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have enormous reserves of oil still waiting to be tapped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有巨大的石油矿藏在等待开发。</font><br>窃听<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The phones of important officials were tapped.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府要员们的电话遭到窃听。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>轻拍, 轻敲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This music sets your feet tapping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这音乐能使你的双脚不由自主地跟着打拍子。</font><br>\n
tape	<h3>tape</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>带子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I used tape to tie up the box.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我用带子绑这个盒子。</font><br>录音磁带; 录像带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll have to edit that tape, it's too long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那盘录音带太长, 你得把它剪辑一下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用带子捆起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you finished taping all the presents?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把所有的礼物都捆好了吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>录音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have taped the interview.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们已录下了这次会谈。</font><br>\n

taste	<h3>taste</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>滋味, 味道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food has an attractive taste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这食品的味道很诱人。</font><br>鉴赏力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has excellent taste in dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对衣着有极好的鉴赏力。</font><br>爱好, 嗜好<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their tastes are different from mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的爱好与我的不同。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>尝, 品尝, 尝到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sometimes when you are ill, you can't taste properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有时生病时吃什么都没有滋味。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>吃, 喝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have not tasted food for two days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已两天米粒不沾了。</font><br>体验, 领略<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tasted defeat for the first time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们第一次体验到失败的滋味。</font><br>\n

technical	<h3>technical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>技术的; 应用科学的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He advised us on technical matters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在技术问题上, 他给我们提供了咨询。</font><br>艺术的, 工艺的<br>(指书等)要求有专门知识的, 使用术语的, 专业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your thesis wouldn't get across if you used too many technical terms in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你用了过多的专业术语, 你的论文就不会被人理解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book is too technical for me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书太专业了, 我看不懂。</font><br>\n
