torture	<h3>torture</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拷问, 刑讯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The torture made him confess.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 严刑拷打使他招供了。</font><br>折磨; 痛苦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She suffered tortures from a toothache.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她受着牙痛的折磨。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>拷问, 折磨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They tortured the man to make him confess his crime.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拷打那个人, 使他招认他的罪行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were several problems which tortured the elderly man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有几个问题折磨着那老人。</font><br>\n
toss	<h3>toss</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>扔; 投; 抛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's toss to see who pays it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我们来掷钱币决定谁付账吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was tossing the ball.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在投球。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tossed the beggar a coin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把一枚硬币扔给那个乞丐。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I tossed a cigarette to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我扔给他一支香烟。</font><br>(使)摇荡; 使颠簸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The matter made him toss in the bed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那件事使他在床上翻来覆去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind tossed the boat in the sea.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风使得那条船在海上来回颠簸。</font><br>\n
total	<h3>total</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>总计的; 全部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please figure out the total cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请算出总费用。</font><br>完全的; 全然的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My efforts ended in total failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的努力终归全盘失败。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The destruction was total.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这场毁灭是彻底的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>总计, 总数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A total of twenty people were[was] killed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 共有二十人被杀。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>计算<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please total all the expenditures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请计算一下全部支出是多少。</font><br>\n
touch	<h3>touch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>接触; 触摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their shoulders touched.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的肩膀碰到一起。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't touch it;  it breaks easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要碰它, 它容易破碎。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>伤害, 触犯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This touched his self-esteem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这伤害了他的自尊心。</font><br>涉及, 关系到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new law doesn't touch his case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新法律与他的案子无关。</font><br>感动, 打动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That woman's sad story touched our hearts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位妇女的悲惨经历触动了我们的心弦。</font><br>吃; 喝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't touch garlic.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不吃大蒜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You haven't even touched your wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的酒沾都没沾。</font><br>比得上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one in our class can touch her in music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在音乐方面, 我们班上无人能比得上她。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>触觉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blind have keen touch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盲人有敏锐的触觉。</font><br>触, 碰, 摸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I felt a touch on my arm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得有人摸了一下我的手臂。</font><br>手感<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This material was soft to the touch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种料子手感很柔软。</font><br>微恙, 一点小病<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was off work with a touch of flu.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她因为有点感冒而没有上班。</font><br>手法, 风格, 特征<br>修饰, 润色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This painting lacks the finishing touches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画尚欠润色。</font><br>功力, 特殊能力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your recent work's been bad; I hope you're not losing your touch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最近的作品差了, 我希望你能保持你的艺术功力。</font><br>少量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The soup wants a touch of salt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汤里少了些盐。</font><br>边线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ball is out of touch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球已出边线。</font><br>\n
tough	<h3>tough</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>坚韧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a tough character.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有一个坚韧的性格。</font><br>坚强的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a tough person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个坚强的人。</font><br>粗暴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is dreadfully tough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他极其粗鲁。</font><br>老的, 硬的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meat is too tough to eat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这肉老得不能吃。</font><br>严格的, 强硬的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are very tough on drunk drivers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们对酒后驾车者十分严格。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This policy is very tough.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个政策是很强硬的。</font><br>困难的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a tough problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个难题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is tough to work with.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很难共事。</font><br>\n
tour	<h3>tour</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旅行, 观光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My tour lasted two months.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的旅行持续了两个月。</font><br>巡回比赛[演出等]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is in the United States on a speaking tour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在美国作巡回演讲。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>旅行, 游历<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are touring in Spain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在西班牙旅行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Last year he toured Mexico.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年他周游了墨西哥。</font><br>\n
tourism	<h3>tourism</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旅游业<br>\n
tourist	<h3>tourist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旅行者, 观光客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tourists went sightseeing in the suburbs of the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 游客们游览了市郊。</font><br>\n
toward	<h3>toward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>向, 朝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He headed toward the station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他向车站赶去。</font><br>为了<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The United Nations' work is toward peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 联合国的工作是为了实现和平。</font><br>对于, 关于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is friendly toward me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对我友好。</font><br>接近<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We arrived toward night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们接近半夜才到达。</font><br>\n

tower	<h3>tower</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>塔, 高楼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tower is fifty feet in height.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 塔高五十英尺。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tower ordered the plane to taxi the full length of the runway.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 塔台指挥人员命令该机在跑道上滑行全程。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>远远高于, 远远超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The peak towers up into the clouds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那座山峰高耸入云。</font><br>\n
town	<h3>town</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>镇, 市镇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The town is a residential suburb.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小镇是市郊住宅区。</font><br>城镇居民<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole town is[are] furious about the council's education policy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全镇居民对市政会的教育政策都感到极其愤怒。</font><br>商业中心[闹市区]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is going into town this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他上午打算到商业区去。</font><br>\n
toy	<h3>toy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>玩具, 玩物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children fastened their eyes on the toys.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们把眼睛盯在玩具上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>玩弄<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He just toys with her affections.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只是在玩弄她的感情。</font><br>不认真地考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You shouldn't toy with great issues.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不该拿重大问题当儿戏。</font><br>\n
trace	<h3>trace</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>追踪; 追溯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He knew they were tracing him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他知道他们正在追踪他。</font><br>发现; 找到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They could not trace him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们找不到他。</font><br>描绘; 标出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He traced our route on the map.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在地图上标出我们走的路线。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>缓慢而困难地书写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He traced the words with a shaking hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用颤抖的手写下那些字。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>踪迹; 痕迹; 形迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have lost all trace of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们找不到他的踪迹。</font><br>极微的量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are traces of poison in the fish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种鱼体内有微量的毒素。</font><br>\n
track	<h3>track</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>踪迹, 痕迹, 足迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The motorcar tracks is very clear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车的痕迹很明显。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We followed his tracks through the snow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们循着雪地上他留下的脚印走。</font><br>小路<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They passed a muddy track through the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们穿过森林的泥泞小路。</font><br>路径, 路线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The earth crosses the tracks of certain comets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球穿过某些彗星的轨迹线。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the track of the coming storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是即将来临的风暴路线。</font><br>轨道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers are laying the tracks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们正在铺铁轨。</font><br>跑道<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a running track.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一条跑道。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>跟踪, 追踪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police used dogs to track the criminal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察用警犬来追踪罪犯。</font><br>\n

trade	<h3>trade</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>贸易, 商业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Transport has always been the key to developing trade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运输一直是发展贸易的关键。</font><br>行业, 生意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Which is your trade?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做哪一行?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They carried on trade in tea and spices with the orient.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们同东方国家做茶叶和香料的生意。</font><br>谋生手段, 手艺, 职业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Shoemaking is a useful trade.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做鞋是一种有用的手艺。</font><br>同仁, 同行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only is the trade likely to be interested in this talk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有同行才可能对这个话题感兴趣。</font><br>〈美〉顾客<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A lot of trade are in that store.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那商店有许多顾客。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>交易; 经商<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He traded as a tobacco merchant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是做烟草生意的商人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They traded seats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们互换座位。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were persuaded to trade information.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们被说服出卖情报。</font><br>\n
trademark	<h3>trademark</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(注册)商标<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trademark of the pen was changed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这钢笔的商标改了。</font><br>\n
tradition	<h3>tradition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>传统<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The custom will never receive the sanction of tradition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那种风俗绝不会作为传统而被提倡。</font><br>惯例<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a tradition that women get married in long white dresses in that area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在那个地区女子结婚时穿白色长礼服是个惯例。</font><br>\n

trail	<h3>trail</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某物)被拖在后面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wounded soldiers trailed past us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 伤员们拖着步子走过我们身边。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>跟踪, 追踪<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(在比赛等中)输, 失败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The party trailed in the election.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该党在选举中大大落后。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>足迹; 臭迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The hound found the trail of the rabbit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 猎狗发现了兔子的踪迹。</font><br>小径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The men had followed desert trails for days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些人沿着沙漠小道走了数日。</font><br>一缕, 一股<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car raised a trail of dust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车掀起了一股尘土。</font><br>\n

transfer	<h3>transfer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>转移; 迁移<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company has transferred to an eastern location.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司已搬到东部某地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I intend to transfer the property to my son.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想把这笔财产转给我儿子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>转让<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>转移; 转让; 转录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The manager arranged for his transfer to another football club.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经理安排他转会到另一个足球俱乐部。</font><br>中转, 换乘, 改变路线<br>\n

transmit	<h3>transmit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>发射, 播送, 广播<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The station transmits from 6 a.m. until midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电台从早晨六点开始播音, 一直持续到半夜。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>传播, 传染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Insects can transmit diseases.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昆虫能传播疾病。</font><br>传导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Glass transmits light but not sound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玻璃传导光, 但不传导声音。</font><br>\n
transparent	<h3>transparent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>透明的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dressed a transparent silk blouse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿了一件薄得透明的丝绸衬衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The window glass is transparent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗玻璃是透明的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is so transparent that we can see the fishes swimming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水清澈透明, 可以看到鱼儿游来游去。</font><br>含义清楚的, 显而易见的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a transparent lie.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是不折不扣的谎言。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meaning of this passage seems quite transparent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一段的意思看来是相当清楚的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was transparent that she was irritated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 显然她是生气了。</font><br>\n
transplant	<h3>transplant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>移植, 移种<br>(人)移居, 迁移<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A group of farmers were transplanted to the island by the government.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一批农民被政府迁到这个岛上居住。</font><br>移植(器官、皮肤、头发等)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(器官、皮肤、头发等的)移植<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several of the patients had received kidney transplant.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人中有几位已接受了肾移植手术。</font><br>移植的器官, 移植物<br>\n
transport	<h3>transport</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>运送; 流放<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bus transported us from the airport to the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一辆公共汽车把我们从飞机场送到城里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Czar government transported him to Siberia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沙皇政府把他流放到西伯利亚。</font><br>使万分激动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The beautiful music transported the audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 优美的音乐使听众心旷神怡。</font><br>\n
transportation	<h3>transportation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>运送, 运输<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The transportation of goods by air costs a lot.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 航空运输货物花费很高。</font><br>运输工具<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The transportation took off with its cargo at midnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 运输机载着货物深夜起飞了。</font><br>流放, 放逐<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the past, British convicts could be sentenced to transportation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过去, 英国的囚犯可能会被判流放。</font><br>\n
trap	<h3>trap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>诱骗; 诱捕; 设陷阱捕捉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many rabbits have you trapped in your special trap this week?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个星期你用特制的捕兽器捉了多少只兔子?</font><br>困住, 使陷入绝境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thirty miners were trapped underground after the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 起火后有三十名矿工被困在地底下。</font><br>使受限制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I trapped a lie in my throat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把就要脱口而出的一句谎话忍住了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(捕捉动物的)夹子, 罗网, 陷阱<br>圈套, 困境<br>(对付人的)计谋, 策略, 陷阱<br>\n
trash	<h3>trash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拙劣的材料[作品]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't read that trash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别读那种蹩脚作品。</font><br>垃圾; 废物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put out the trash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把垃圾拿出去。</font><br>没出息的人<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>捣坏; 破坏; 弄脏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The guys got angry and trashed the bar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些小伙子生气了并砸毁了酒吧。</font><br>\n
travel	<h3>travel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旅行, 行走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Travel broadens the mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅行可以使人胸襟开阔。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave a talk to the Women's Institute on his travels in Asia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他就他的亚洲之旅为妇女协会做了非正式演讲。</font><br>游历; 游记<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you like books of travels?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你喜欢读游记吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>旅行, 到远处去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are not fit to travel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不宜外出旅行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has travelled widely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他到过很多地方。</font><br>移动, 传导<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wheel travells along this bar.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轮子顺着这根滑竿移动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sound waves will not travel through a vacuum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 声波在真空里不能传播。</font><br>旅行推销, 兜售<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My husband travels for a firm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我丈夫替一家公司作旅行推销。</font><br>飞速行进, 飞驰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That motorbike was really travelling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那辆摩托车开得飞快。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>走遍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He travelled the whole world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他周游了全世界。</font><br>走过…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have travelled a tortuous road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们走过了曲折的道路。</font><br>\n
tray	<h3>tray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>盘子, 托盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were two glasses of champagne on the tray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 托盘里有两杯香槟酒。</font><br>文件盘<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Letters were piled high in the tray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 文件盘里有很多信。</font><br>\n
treasure	<h3>treasure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>金银财宝; 宝藏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He amassed great treasure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他积累了大量的金银财宝。</font><br>珍宝, 贵重物品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The library has many art treasures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家图书馆收藏了很多艺术珍品。</font><br>不可多得的人才<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My secretary's a real treasure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的秘书确实是一个不可多得的人才。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>重视; 珍惜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I certainly treasure the friendship between us very much.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我当然非常珍视我们之间的友谊。</font><br>\n
treat	<h3>treat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>款待, 招待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was cooking fish as a treat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在煮鱼来款待客人。</font><br>乐事, 乐趣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These performances are a great treat to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看这些表演节目对我来说是一大乐事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>对待, 看待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He treated me all right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他待我不错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please treat the matter seriously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请认真对待这件事。</font><br>处理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is chemically treated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这水是经化学处理的。</font><br>探讨, 讨论, 论述<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book treats the problems of economic development.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书探讨经济发展的问题。</font><br>把…看作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They treated me as their own child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把我当亲生孩子看待。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He treated money as having little value.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他认为钱没有多大的价值。</font><br>治疗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dentist is treating my teeth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牙科医生给我治牙。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>请客, 款待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll treat today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天我请客。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He treated them to a good dinner on New Year's Day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在新年那天, 他请他们吃了一顿好饭。</font><br>\n
treatment	<h3>treatment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>处理; 对待, 待遇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mayor's treatment of the problem satisfied both sides in the dispute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 市长对这个问题的处理使争议双方感到满意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is crystal clear and drunk without any treatment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那水很干净, 不经任何处理即可饮用。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will not submit to such treatment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不甘心忍受这样的待遇。</font><br>治疗; 疗法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's receiving treatment for cancer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在接受癌症治疗。</font><br>\n
treaty	<h3>treaty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>条约<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They signed a treaty to settle all border disputes by arbitration.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们通过仲裁签订了解决所有边境争端的条约。</font><br>协议, 协商<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house was sold by private treaty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座房子是通过私下订立协议出售的。</font><br>\n
tree	<h3>tree</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>树, 乔木<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old trees were profiled against the pale sky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些老树的轮廓映衬在苍白的天空上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There're some apples on the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那棵树上有几个苹果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a bird in the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 树上有只鸟。</font><br>树状图, 世系图<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A family tree is a diagram with branches, showing how the members of a family are descended and related.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 家谱是说明家族成员血缘承袭关系的明细分支图。</font><br>\n
tremble	<h3>tremble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>发抖, 颤抖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room is warm now, but he is still trembling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间里现在暖和了, 但他仍然哆嗦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole house trembled as the train went by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车开过时, 整座房子都颤动了。</font><br>焦虑, 担忧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I tremble to think of the consequences.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我为可能产生的后果而担心。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>震颤, 发抖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a tremble in her voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她声音颤抖。</font><br>\n
tremendous	<h3>tremendous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极大的, 巨大的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a tremendous difference between them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们之间有着极大的差别。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The response to our appeal was tremendous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对我们呼吁的反应极大。</font><br>绝妙的, 极棒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We went to a tremendous party last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨晚我们参加了一个极棒的晚会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think you're tremendous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为你真了不起。</font><br>\n
trend	<h3>trend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>趋势, 倾向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rise in violent crime is a disturbing new trend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 暴力犯罪的上升是一种令人担忧的新趋势。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can anything be done to reverse this trend?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有什么办法扭转这种倾向吗?</font><br>流行<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trend at the moment is towards a more natural and less made-up look.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在流行的是外表上更注重少加装扮的自然美。</font><br>\n
trial	<h3>trial</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>审判, 审理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's standing trial for thieving.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正因涉嫌偷窃而接受审判。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The case is now under trial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 案件正在审理中。</font><br>测试, 试验, 考验<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall put the machine to further trial.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将进一步试验这部机器。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll make a trial of his intelligence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将测试他的智力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are doing clinical trials on a new drug.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在做一种新药物的临床试验。</font><br>讨厌的人[事物], 忧虑[麻烦]的原因<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The recorder next door is a great trial to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 隔壁邻居的那台录音机响得真是让人受不了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That child is a trial to his parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那小孩真让他父母伤脑筋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The loss of relatives is among the most frequent trials in life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失去亲人是人生最常遇到的痛事之一。</font><br>\n
triangle	<h3>triangle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>三角形; 三角形物体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drew a right triangle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他画了一个直角三角形。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The place is a cobbled triangle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个地方是一块铺石子的三角地。</font><br>三人一组; 三角关系<br>\n
trick	<h3>trick</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>戏法, 把戏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An old dog cannot learn new tricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老狗学不会新把戏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you do magic tricks?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你会变魔术吗?</font><br>计谋, 诡计, 花招<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't be fooled by any of her cunning tricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要被她的任何诡计所骗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He even plays a shabby trick on his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他甚至同他的父亲玩弄卑鄙的手段。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I thought I saw a ghost, but perhaps it was only a trick of the light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我以为我看见鬼了, 但这大概不过是灯光在捉弄人。</font><br>诀窍, 技巧, 技艺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Patience is the trick in doing a job well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 耐心是做工作的诀窍。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>哄骗; 欺骗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't try to trick me!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要欺骗我！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A clever lawyer should be able to trick the prisoner into an admission of guilt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 聪明的律师应能诱使罪犯认罪。</font><br>打扮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She tricked herself out for the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把自己打扮起来去参加晚会。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>用于特技的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Trick photography is one of his hobbies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 特技摄影是他的爱好之一。</font><br>有意捉弄人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was purely a trick question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这纯粹是一个有意捉弄人的问题。</font><br>\n
trifle	<h3>trifle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>无价值的东西; 琐事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's silly to quarrel over trifles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为小事争吵是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know why you waste your time on such trifles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不明白你为什么在这种琐事上浪费时间。</font><br>少量, 少许, 一点点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll have just a trifle of the dessert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只要吃少量的甜点心。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>轻视, 小看<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The text is not to be trifled with.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原文不应被轻视。</font><br>\n
trim	<h3>trim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修剪, 整修<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gardener trimmed the hedge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位园林工人修剪了树篱。</font><br>除去, 削减<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ask the meat man to trim away the fat edges of the meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请卖肉师傅把这块肉边上的肥膘切掉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must trim your costs if you want to make bigger profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你想获得更大的利润, 就必须削减开支。</font><br>装饰<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>整齐的, 整洁的, 匀称漂亮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He keeps his room trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把房间整理得井然有序。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looks very trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看起来很苗条。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>修剪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the hairdresser's for a trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她到理发店理发去了。</font><br>准备就绪, 井井有条, 整整齐齐, 状态极佳<br>\n
trip	<h3>trip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>旅行, 旅游, 有目的的外出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll make a bus trip to the town next week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下星期我将乘公共汽车进城。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He often makes a round trip to the hospital alone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他经常一个人往返医院。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>轻快地行走[奔跑, 跳舞]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child tripped lightly like a bird.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个孩子像鸟儿一样轻快地奔跑着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is tripping along with her little steps.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她踏着小步在轻盈地跳着舞。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>绊倒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I tripped and fell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我绊了一跤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stuck his foot out and tripped me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他伸出脚把我绊倒。</font><br>(使)犯错误<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tripped when trying to spell this word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在拼写这个词时拼错了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clever lawyer tripped the witness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个聪明的律师使证人说错了话。</font><br>\n
triumph	<h3>triumph</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>胜利, 成功<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The victorious army returned in triumph.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 获胜的部队凯旋而归。</font><br>巨大的成就[成功]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He achieved great triumphs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他获得了巨大成功。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>获胜, 得胜; 克服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had met the challenge and triumphed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他迎接挑战并取得了胜利。</font><br>\n
troop	<h3>troop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>军队, 部队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The troops swept past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 部队疾驰而过。</font><br>一群, 一队<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A troop of visitors arrived.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一群来访者抵达。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was surrounded by troops of friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他被一群群朋友围住了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>成群结队地走<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The miners trooped home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 矿工们成群结队地回家了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The students trooped into the classroom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们列队走进教室。</font><br>\n
tropical	<h3>tropical</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>热带的; 炎热的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has bought some tropical fruits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他买了一些热带水果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is used to the tropical weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他习惯了炎热的天气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Summer was almost tropical last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年的夏天十分炎热。</font><br>\n
trouble	<h3>trouble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>困难, 忧虑, 麻烦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old lady told me all her troubles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个老太太把她的烦恼都告诉了我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been through much trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已渡过许多困难。</font><br>困境, 险境<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new company did well at first, but then ran into trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家新公司最初办得还不错, 但后来就陷入困境了。</font><br>麻烦, 费事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trouble is that he doesn't have enough money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麻烦在于他缺钱。</font><br>动乱, 纠纷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had no hand in this trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她没有参与这次纠纷。</font><br>毛病, 故障<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car's got some sort of engine trouble again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 车子的引擎又出了什么故障。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>费神; 费心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I mustn't trouble if he doesn't come tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚他若不来, 我就不用费心劳神了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please don't trouble to see me off at the station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请不用麻烦到车站送我了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使烦恼, 使忧虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't wish to trouble them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不愿意去麻烦他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What troubles me is that the supply of raw materials is not ensured.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 使我担忧的是原料供应没有保证。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I trouble you to shut the door?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麻烦你把门关上好吗?</font><br>\n
troublesome	<h3>troublesome</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>引起麻烦的, 令人讨厌的, 令人烦恼的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a troublesome person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个讨厌的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a troublesome question.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个棘手的问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This work is very troublesome.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这工作很讨厌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Teaching seems troublesome to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教书对于他来说好像是烦扰的事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Chinese characters are troublesome to write.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汉字很难写。</font><br>\n
trousers	<h3>trousers</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>裤子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wore a pair of black trousers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着一条黑色裤子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two pairs of trousers are mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两条裤子是我的。</font><br>\n
truck	<h3>truck</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>货车, 卡车, 载重汽车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drives a truck.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开卡车。</font><br>(铁路的)无盖货车; (行李)搬运车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A railway truck carries about 10 tons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一节货车大约能载十吨货物。</font><br>\n
true	<h3>true</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>真实的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a true story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是个真实的故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story must be true, for I read it in the newspaper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个故事准是真的, 因为那是我在报上看到的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is it true that he has left London?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他已离开了伦敦的消息属实吗?</font><br>实际的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her true motives only emerged later.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的实际动机是后来才显露的。</font><br>真正的, 纯正的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who was the true heir to the throne?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁是真正的王位继承人?</font><br>忠实的; 忠诚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a true friend.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个忠实的朋友。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is always true to his friends.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他始终忠于朋友。</font><br>逼真的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I think the painter has produced a very true likeness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为这位画家画得非常逼真。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to admit that these sketches are true to life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你得承认这些素描很逼真。</font><br>正确的, 准确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the door's not exactly true it won't close properly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这扇门如果安得不正确就关不上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It would be truer to say that he was careless than that he was unkind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 与其说他待人苛刻倒不如说粗心更准确。</font><br>\n
truly	<h3>truly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>真正地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a truly good man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个真正的好人。</font><br>忠实地, 真诚地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must speak truly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须说实话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am truly grateful for all your help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我实在感谢你的帮助。</font><br>\n
trumpet	<h3>trumpet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>喇叭, 小号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is blowing a trumpet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正在吹喇叭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She played a tune on her trumpet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用小号吹了一支乐曲。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>大肆宣扬, 鼓吹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is always trumpeting her son.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她总是吹嘘她儿子。</font><br>\n
trunk	<h3>trunk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>树干<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy could be seen with his legs wrapped around the trunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只见那男孩双腿盘着树干。</font><br>衣箱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are unpacking a trunk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在打开衣箱。</font><br>象鼻<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The elephant's trunk is bigger than other animals'.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大象的鼻子比其他动物的大。</font><br>\n
trust	<h3>trust</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>信任, 信赖, 相信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You've betrayed my trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你辜负了我的信任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is my sole trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是我惟一信赖的人。</font><br>信托, 托管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The property is merely a trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这财产不过是一项委托物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She left money to her uncle to keep in trust for her children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把钱留给她叔叔, 请他替她的子女保管。</font><br>照管, 关怀; 职责<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's not yet old enough to be employed in a position of trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她还年轻, 不能担当重任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall think it is a great trust to obey the wishes of my dead father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为按照先父的愿望去做是我重大的职责。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>相信; 信任<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't trust.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不相信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have always trusted him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一直信任他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I trust to hear better news from you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望从你口中听到更好的消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I trust that I'm right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我相信我是对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't trust what you say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能相信你的话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may trust me that I'm speaking the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以相信我在说实话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You cannot trust him to keep his promise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可不能相信他会履行诺言。</font><br>\n
truth	<h3>truth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>事实, 真相, 实情<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm going to ascertain the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要查明真相。</font><br>真实性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I grant the truth of what he says.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我承认他说的是真的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I challenged the truth of their story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对他们所说情况的真实性表示怀疑。</font><br>真理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was a seeker for truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个追求真理的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have persuaded him of its truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我使他相信了其中的真理。</font><br>\n
try	<h3>try</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>试图; 努力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you can't do it the first time, try again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要是你第一次做不成, 就再试一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried climbing the tall tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试着爬上那棵大树。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been trying to solve the problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直在设法解决这一问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me try retelling the story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让我试着复述这个故事吧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try what you can do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 试试看你能有什么办法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Try how far you can throw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 试试看你能扔多远。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's try which takes most.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们试试哪种办法费时间最多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's try whether it will break.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 咱们来试试, 看它会不会折断。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She tried herself to describe what she remembered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她尽量说出她记得的情况。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>考验, 磨炼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This will try your courage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对你的勇气将是一个考验。</font><br>审讯, 审理<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp So they tried him and sentenced him to twenty-five years in prison.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 于是他们对他进行了审讯, 判处了他25年徒刑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was tried and found guilty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他受审并被判有罪。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尝试<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He cast off fear and decided to make a try.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他去掉害怕心理, 决定试一试。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a try at solving the problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图解决这个问题。</font><br>\n
T-shirt	<h3>T-shirt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>T恤, 短袖汗衫<br>\n

turn	<h3>turn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)转动, 旋转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wheels were turning swiftly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轮子飞快地转动着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What turns the wheel?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是什么使轮子转动?</font><br>(使)改变方向, (使朝某个方向)转弯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned and faced her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他转过来面对着她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned his horse and rode away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拨转马头就走了。</font><br>(使)不适, 作呕, 恶心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At the sight of blood her stomach turned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看到血就感到恶心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stink of the rotten fish turned my stomach.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 腐烂的鱼臭味使我恶心。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使折起, 使翻转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He could turn a bar of steel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他能把钢条扭弯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She turned her ankle while ice-skating.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她滑冰时扭伤了脚踝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was idly turning the pages of a magazine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在无聊地翻看一本杂志。</font><br>达到, 超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His collection of ancient pottery is turning one hundred pieces.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他收集的古陶器要超过一百件了。</font><br>使变酸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lack of refrigeration turned the milk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 牛奶没有冷藏, 变酸了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.&link v.</i></font><br>(使)变为, (使)成为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He used to be a linguist till he turns writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他过去是个语言学家, 后来成了作家。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When she saw this, she turned red.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看到这个, 她脸红了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Severe cold turned our ears pink.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 严寒冻红了我们的耳朵。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>转动, 旋转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This loose screw needs a turn or two.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只松动的螺钉需要旋动一两下。</font><br>方向的改变, 转折; 转折点<br>发展变化, 新趋势<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The event took an explosive turn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 事态起了急剧变化。</font><br>机会; 顺次<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My turn will come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的时运快来了。</font><br>\n

twist	<h3>twist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>扭, 搓, 缠绕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Suddenly the snake twisted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 突然, 蛇扭动了一下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She twisted her ankle when she fell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她摔倒时扭伤了脚踝。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He twisted the three ropes to make one very strong rope.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把三根绳子搓在一起, 做成了一根结实的绳子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>转动; 拧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to twist the lid off, not pull it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盖子是拧开的, 不是拉开的。</font><br>歪曲; 曲解<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They always twisted the facts to suit their purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了达到自己的目的, 他们总是歪曲事实。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>拧, 旋转, 扭转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give the knob a twist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拧一下门把。</font><br>弯曲, 曲折处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mountain road is full of twists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 山路弯弯曲曲。</font><br>转折, 转变<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's an unusual twist to the plot at the end of the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这本书的末尾, 情节发生了不寻常的转折。</font><br>\n

typewriter	<h3>typewriter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>打字机<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the office there are two typewriters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 办公室里有两台打字机。</font><br>\n
