vital	<h3>vital</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极重要的, 必不可少的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The analysis of what kind of temperament you possess is vital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 分析一下你有什么样的气质是十分重要的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is vital that we should be kept informed of all developments.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 重要的是我们必须熟悉所有的发展情况。</font><br>维持生命所必需的; 生命的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must try to ensure that vital food supplies are maintained.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须确保维持生命所必需的食物之供应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was lucky that the bullet hadn't entered a vital organ.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很幸运, 子弹没有打进身体的要害部位。</font><br>有生气的, 充满生机的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His vital and cheerful manner filled the whole team with courage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他那充满生机、欢快的态度使整个队伍充满了勇气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is vital and attractive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她活泼又漂亮。</font><br>\n

vocabulary	<h3>vocabulary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>词汇(量)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The basic vocabulary of a language is those words that must be learnt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一种语言的基本词汇是那些必须掌握的词语。</font><br>词汇表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a vocabulary at the back of our English book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们英语课本的后面附有词汇表。</font><br>\n

volume	<h3>volume</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>卷, 册, 书卷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For that article he has worked over some 30 volumes of Chinese history.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了写那篇论文, 他仔细查阅了大约30册中国历史书。</font><br>体积; 容积, 容量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Pressure varies directly with temperature and inversely with volume.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 压力随温度成正比例变化, 与容积成反比例变化。</font><br>音量, 响度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He turned up the volume on the television.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他开大了电视音量。</font><br>\n
voluntary	<h3>voluntary</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>自愿的, 志愿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a voluntary statement to the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自动向警方供出一切。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That he bumped me is voluntary.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他故意撞了我一下。</font><br>义务的, 无偿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At election time the party needs a lot of voluntary helpers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大选时, 该党需要许多义务帮忙的人。</font><br>\n
volunteer	<h3>volunteer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>自动提供, 自愿效劳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many of them volunteered?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们当中有多少人愿意自愿效劳?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My friend volunteered an interesting piece of news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的朋友自动说了一则有趣的消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He volunteered to water our plants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他自告奋勇给我们的树木浇水。</font><br>\n
vote	<h3>vote</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>一致认为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The students voted to continue the struggle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们一致决定继续斗争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They voted that the meeting should be adjourned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们一致认为应该休会。</font><br>提议, 建议<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I vote that he (should) do it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我建议他做那件事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>投票, 表决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're too young to vote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你太小, 不能参加选举。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They vote to choose a president.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们投票选举总统。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Vote MacDonald, the man you can trust!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请投麦克唐纳的票, 他是大家能信任的人！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have voted him our monitor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们选他当班长。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>投票, 选举, 表决<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The vote will be held next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个月举行选举。</font><br>票, 选票<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Tory got 40% of the vote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 保守党获得40%的选票。</font><br>表决结果; 投票总数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Was the vote for or against the resolution?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 表决结果是赞成还是反对此决议?</font><br>选举权, 投票权, 表决权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only members of the team have a vote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只有这个团体的成员才有表决权。</font><br>\n
voyage	<h3>voyage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>航行, 航海; 航天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is a prosperous voyage to the ship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是那艘船的一次成功的航行。</font><br>\n
wage	<h3>wage</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工资<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When wages are high, prices are high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工资高, 物价也会相对的高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We expect a fair day's wage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们希望得到一天应得的工资。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wages of sin is death.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罪恶的代价就是死亡。</font><br>\n
wagon	<h3>wagon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>四轮的运货马车<br>〈英〉铁路货车<br>〈美〉小手推车<br>\n
waist	<h3>waist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>腰, 腰部, 腰围<br>(衣服的)腰部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She took in the waist of her dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把衣服的腰身改小。</font><br>中间凹入的部分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sound is from the waist of a violin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 声音是从小提琴的中间部分发出的。</font><br>\n
wait	<h3>wait</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>等候, 等待<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shan't wait long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不会等很久的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That waiter does not know how to wait.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那侍者不会侍候顾客。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm waiting to hear your explanation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在等你的解释。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's waiting his opportunity.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正等候机会。</font><br>\n
waiter	<h3>waiter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(男)侍者, (男)服务生<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got work in a hotel as a waiter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在一家旅馆找到了当服务生的工作。</font><br>\n
wake	<h3>wake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>醒, 唤醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When I woke the sun was three poles high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我醒来时, 已日上三竿了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The child woke three times during the night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这孩子夜间醒了三次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I woke to find that he had gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我醒来时发现他已经走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scene woke memories of my boyhood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幕情景使我回忆起童年的往事。</font><br>\n
waken	<h3>waken</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>醒来; 睡醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wakened at 7 o'clock.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他七点钟醒来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>唤醒; 弄醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What time are you going to waken him?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你准备什么时间叫醒他?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)觉醒; (使)振奋; 激发<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The book wakened the reader's interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书唤起读者的兴趣。</font><br>\n
walk	<h3>walk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>走, 步行, 散步<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The baby can't walk yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这婴儿还不会走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man walked five miles every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这老人每天早晨步行五英里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He walked slow and lame.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他慢慢地一瘸一拐地走着。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trainer is walking his dogs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位驯兽人正在遛他的狗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>步行, 散步<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Uncle Tom looked hot after his walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在步行之后, 汤姆叔叔看来很热。</font><br>行走的路程<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a long walk to the station.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去车站要走很长一段路。</font><br>步态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ran, and then slowed down to a walk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他跑着, 然后放慢速度步行。</font><br>步行的路径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The walk was covered with leaves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这人行道上满是树叶。</font><br>\n
wall	<h3>wall</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>墙, 壁, 围墙<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They glided along the wall until they were out of sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们沿着墙壁溜得无影无踪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He fastened the calendar to a wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把日历挂在墙上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I should hate to be confined within the four walls of an office all day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌整天关在办公室里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>筑墙围住, 用墙隔开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're going to wall the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们打算用墙把花园围起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They walled off the large prison into lots of very small cells.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把大监狱隔成很多小牢房。</font><br>\n
wallet	<h3>wallet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钱夹, 皮夹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Someone has stolen my wallet from my back pocket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人从我的后口袋偷走了皮夹子。</font><br>\n
wander	<h3>wander</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>漫游, 徘徊<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wandered lonely like a cloud.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我像一朵浮云般漂浮不定。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy wandered the neighbourhood, looking for his dog.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩在附近徘徊, 寻找自己的狗。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>迷失<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The travelers wandered in the way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 旅行者们在途中迷了路。</font><br>\n
want	<h3>want</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>打算, 希望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want your promise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望你答应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The picture wants something of perfection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这幅画还有些不够完美。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've long wanted to come to your country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我老早就想到你们国家来。</font><br>应该<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want a shave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我该刮胡子了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your watch wants repairing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的手表该修一修了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>想, 要, 需要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You shall never want while I have any money left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要我有余钱, 就不会叫你缺少什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These plants are drooping—they want water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些庄稼有点枯萎——需要浇水。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺乏, 不足<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your work shows want of care.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的工作证明你缺乏细心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plants died for want of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些植物因缺水而枯死了。</font><br>需要的东西, 想往的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should try to reduce your wants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该努力减少需求。</font><br>\n
war	<h3>war</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>战争; 战争期间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were fighting a just war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在打一场正义战争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their courage brought the people through the war.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的勇气使人们熬过了战争。</font><br>斗争, 竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are at war with each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们互相争吵。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>进行战斗; 作战<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two countries have been warring constantly for years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两国多年来一直交战。</font><br>斗争<br>\n
ward	<h3>ward</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>病房, 病区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is in the surgical ward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住在外科病房。</font><br>区, 行政区<br>受监护的未成年者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After his parents died, the boy was made his uncle's ward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 双亲去世后, 小男孩由其叔叔监护。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>监护, 守护<br>\n
warm	<h3>warm</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>暖和的, 温暖的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She submerged her hands in warm water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把手浸在温水中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is getting warm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气渐渐地暖和了。</font><br>热情的, 热心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a warm heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很热心。</font><br>暖调的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Red, yellow and orange are called warm colours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 红、黄、橙称为暖色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)变暖; 被加热; 暖和起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The water is warming on the stove.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水在炉火上加热。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His words warmed my heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的话使我的内心感到热乎乎的。</font><br>\n
warmth	<h3>warmth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>温暖; 热情, 热烈<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We felt the warmth of the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们感受到太阳的温暖。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He answered with warmth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他热情地回答。</font><br>\n
warn	<h3>warn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>警告, 提醒; 告诫; 预先通知, 预告<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Once again I warned her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我又警告她一次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather station warned that a storm was coming.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气象台说将有暴风雨来临。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They warned him to stay away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们警告他不要靠近。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did he warn you that he might be late?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有没有预先告诉你他可能会迟到?</font><br>\n
wash	<h3>wash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>洗; 洗涤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I must wash before dinner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我饭前要洗手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I washed my car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我冲洗了汽车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please wash the bottle clean.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这个瓶子洗净。</font><br>冲, 拍打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A breeze washed against her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 微风拂过她的脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sea washed the seashore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 海浪拍打海岸。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>耐洗, 经洗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the suit won't wash, it must be dry-cleaned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果这套西服经不住水洗, 就得干洗了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>洗; 洗涤<br>要洗的衣物的数量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a large wash this Sunday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这星期天我有一大堆衣服要洗。</font><br>\n
waste	<h3>waste</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>浪费; 滥用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must combat extravagance and waste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须反对铺张浪费。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a mere waste of time waiting any longer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 再等下去纯粹是浪费时间。</font><br>废料, 废弃物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river was thick with industrial waste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条河里淤积了工业废物。</font><br>荒地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We traveled through treeless wastes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们穿过了没有树木的荒地。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>浪费, 徒劳<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't waste, save!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别浪费, 要节省！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hurry up, we're wasting time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 快点儿, 我们别再浪费时间了。</font><br>(使)损耗, (使)消瘦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The oil resources in some countries are rapidly wasting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些国家的石油资源正被迅速地消耗掉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The long illness had wasted the old man's strength.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长期生病消耗了这老人的体力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>破坏, 使荒芜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Long dry periods wasted the land.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 长期干旱使土地荒芜了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>废弃的; 无用的; 荒芜的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a waste and useless tyre.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个废弃无用的轮胎。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The land becomes waste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块土地变得荒芜了。</font><br>\n
watch	<h3>watch</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>看, 观察<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She sat there watching, but said nothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她坐在那里看着, 但没说什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I often watch television in the evening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我通常在晚上看电视。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Just watch what will happen when I press the button.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看着, 我按按钮会发生什么事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She watched the children play table tennis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看孩子们打乒乓球。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people like to watch others playing games.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人喜欢看别人比赛。</font><br>守卫[保护], 留心, 注视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nurse watched to see what would happen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 护士注意着会发生什么情况。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She watched his face anxiously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她焦急地注视着他的脸。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>注意, 当心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Watch that he doesn't cheat you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 注意别让他骗了你。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>看管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep a close watch on everything that happened on the island.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 密切注视岛上发生的一切事情。</font><br>值班人员<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The night watch comes on duty soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 值夜班的人很快就要来值班了。</font><br>表<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wears a gold watch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他戴了一块金表。</font><br>\n
water	<h3>water</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Flowers will die without water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有水, 花就会枯死。</font><br>大片的水, (尤指)湖[河, 海]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They forbid any ships to enter the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们禁止任何船舶进入这片水域。</font><br>(湖、河等的)水域, (某国附近的)海域<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship is in British waters.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条船行驶在英国的海域里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…浇水[洒水]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Water the flowers every morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每天早晨给花浇水。</font><br>给…水喝<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have the horses been fed and watered?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给马匹喂食饮水了吗?</font><br>(尤指江河)流经并供水给(某地区)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The valley is continuously watered by the melting snow from the mountains.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 群山融化的雪不断流经山谷。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>流眼泪; 流口水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The smoke made her eyes water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 烟熏得她眼睛流泪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The smell from the kitchen made his mouth water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从厨房传来的气味使他流口水。</font><br>\n
watermelon	<h3>watermelon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>西瓜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I bought a watermelon andsome peaches.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我买了一个西瓜和一些桃子。</font><br>\n
waterproof	<h3>waterproof</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不透水的, 防水的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My mother bought me a waterproof watch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妈妈给我买了一块防水手表。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An umbrella should be waterproof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨伞应能防水。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使防水; 使不透水<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wax my boots chiefly to waterproof them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我给靴子打蜡主要是为了防水。</font><br>\n
wave	<h3>wave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>波, 波浪, 波涛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The waves are high.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 波涛汹涌。</font><br>挥手, 招手<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He saluted his friends with a wave of the hand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挥手向他的朋友致意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>飘扬, 摇摆, 起伏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The grass waved in the wind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 草在风中起伏波动。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>挥动…示意, 挥手(打招呼、问候等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He waved until they were out of sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挥着手, 直到再也看不到他们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She waved me a greeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她扬手跟我打招呼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She waved her handkerchief to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她向我们挥动着手绢。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挥手表示<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She waved a farewell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她挥手告别。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We waved good-bye to her at the airport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在机场向她挥手告别。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She waved me quiet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她挥手要我别出声。</font><br>\n
wax	<h3>wax</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>蜡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should put some wax on those boots.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你应该给那些靴子打上一些蜡。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…打蜡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wax the floor once a month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每月给地板打一次蜡。</font><br>\n
way	<h3>way</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>路, 道, 街, 径<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is this the way out?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是出去的路吗?</font><br>方向<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Kindly step this way, ladies and gentlemen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 女士们、先生们, 请往这边走。</font><br>方法, 方式, 手段<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are trying to find a way of settling the dispute.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正设法寻找解决争端的办法。</font><br>习俗; 作风; 习惯<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The way that you're doing it is completely crazy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你这种习惯, 简直是发疯了。</font><br>距离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Success is still a long way off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 离成功还远着呢。</font><br>附近, 周围<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crops are doing well down this way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一带的作物长势良好。</font><br>某方面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor told the patient that he was in good way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大夫对病人说, 他的病情已在好转。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>远远地, 大大地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The mortality rate was way down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 死亡率大大降低。</font><br>\n

we	<h3>we</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>我们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are all students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们都是学生。</font><br>\n
weak	<h3>weak</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>弱的; 易毁坏的; 无力气的; 容易被击败的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't stand on that chair, it's got a weak leg.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那张椅子有一条腿不牢, 不要站在上面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She spoke in a weak voice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有气无力地说话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was too weak to say a word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他太虚弱了, 一句话也说不出来。</font><br>功能不佳的<br>无说服力的; 软弱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was an incredibly weak answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是一个令人难以置信的缺乏说服力的回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher's so weak that the children do what they like.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这老师太软弱了, 孩子们因此为所欲为。</font><br>淡的; 稀释的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The tea is weak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这茶很淡。</font><br>未达高标准的; 有缺欠的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her French is rather weak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的法语相当差。</font><br>\n
weaken	<h3>weaken</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)削弱 , (使)变弱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She weakened as the illness grew worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于病情恶化, 她变得更虚弱了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can weaken the tea by adding water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以加水把茶弄得淡一些。</font><br>\n
weakness	<h3>weakness</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>虚弱, 软弱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have got over my weakness and fatigue.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了。</font><br>弱点, 缺点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is my great weakness now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我现在极大的弱点。</font><br>偏好, 嗜好<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a weakness for detective stories.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他特别爱读侦探小说。</font><br>\n
wealth	<h3>wealth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>财产; 财富<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Health is above wealth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 健康比财富更重要。</font><br>大量, 众多, 丰富<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wealth is estimated at fifty million dollars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的财产估计有5000万美元。</font><br>\n
wealthy	<h3>wealthy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>富有的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He grew up in a wealthy family.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在一个富有的家庭里长大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My brother is now very wealthy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我哥哥现在很有钱。</font><br>\n
weapon	<h3>weapon</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>武器, 兵器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That young man was carrying weapons.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个年轻人携带着武器。</font><br>自卫[克敌制胜]的手段[行动]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their ultimate weapon was the threat of an all-out strike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们最后的杀手锏是威胁举行大罢工。</font><br>\n
wear	<h3>wear</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>穿, 戴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This suit has been in constant wear for two years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一套衣服已连续穿了两年。</font><br>衣服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shop sells children's wear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家商店出售童装。</font><br>磨损, 损耗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look at the wear on these shoes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 看看这双鞋子磨损的样子。</font><br>使用, 用坏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These shoes I bought last week are already showing signs of wear.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我上周买的这双鞋已经快破了。</font><br>耐用性, 耐穿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a lot of wear in these tyres.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些轮胎经久耐用。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>穿着, 戴着; 蓄, 留; 擦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's wearing a new coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着一件新外套。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She used to wear her hair long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她过去把头发留得很长。</font><br>呈现; 显出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wore a smile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他面带笑容。</font><br>磨成, 擦成; 因不断使用而造成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His trousers had been worn into holes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的裤子已经穿破了。</font><br>同意, 接受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will your father wear this idea?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你父亲会接受这个主意吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>磨损, 变旧, 用坏, 穿旧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This cloth wears well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种布很耐穿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The coat is worn threadbare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这件外衣已经穿旧了。</font><br>保持某种状态<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The house wore a neglected look.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房子给人一种没人照料的印象。</font><br>\n
weather	<h3>weather</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>天气, 气象<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather changed overnight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一夜之间就变天了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>晒干; 风化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Rocks weather until they are worn away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 岩石风化, 直至损坏。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind and sea have weathered the rocks quite smooth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些岩石因风和海水的作用变得非常光滑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>平安渡过; 挨过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The country had weathered a serious crisis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家平安渡过了严重的危机。</font><br>\n
weave	<h3>weave</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>编, 织; 织成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old woman was weaving on her loom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位老太太正在织布机上织布。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wove some branches together to form a roof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把一些树枝编起来搭成屋顶。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>编排, 杜撰<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wove a fascinating tale of knights in shining armour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他编了一个穿着明亮盔甲的骑士的迷人故事。</font><br>\n
web	<h3>web</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(蜘蛛等的)网<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A spider spins a web.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蜘蛛结网。</font><br>周密的布置; 网状物; 圈套<br>\n

Wednesday	<h3>Wednesday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>星期三<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll meet on Wednesday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们星期三见面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On the Wednesday she got worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个星期三, 她病得更严重了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On Wednesdays I do the shopping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每星期三我都去买东西。</font><br>\n
weed	<h3>weed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>杂草<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My garden is running to weeds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的院子里长满了杂草。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>除杂草<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Tomorrow I have to weed the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我明天得给花园除草。</font><br>\n
week	<h3>week</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一星期, 周<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall be away from home all this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个星期我都不在家。</font><br>\n
weekday	<h3>weekday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>平日, 普通日, (星期天及星期六以外的)任何一天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am always busy on weekdays.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在工作日总是很忙。</font><br>\n

weekly	<h3>weekly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>一周一次的[地], 每周的[地]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He writes a weekly letter to his parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他每周给父母写一封信。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>周刊; 周报<br>\n

weigh	<h3>weigh</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>称…的重量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When did you weigh last?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你上次是什么时候称体重的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor weighed the baby every month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生每个月都给这个婴儿称体重。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>link v.</i></font><br>重达<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This marble ramp weighs one ton.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个大理石台阶重一吨。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>权衡; 考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The point deserves to be carefully weighed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一点值得慎重考虑。</font><br>\n
weight	<h3>weight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>重量, 分量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pillars couldn't support the weight of the roof.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些柱子无法承受屋顶的重量。</font><br>砝码, 秤砣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you put on another a pound weight the scale can be balanced.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你再放上一个一磅的砝码, 这个秤就能平衡。</font><br>重物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can lift heavy weights because of his strength.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他力气大, 可举起重物。</font><br>负荷, 负担<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The full weight of decision-making falls on her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 决策的重任全落在她的肩上。</font><br>重要性; 严重性; 影响力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Recent events further added weight to their country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最近发生的事情更增加了他们国家的影响力。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使…变重<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The net is weighted to keep it below the surface of the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个网加了坠因而可没入水面以下。</font><br>偏袒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Circumstances are weighted in his favour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情况对他尤其有利。</font><br>\n
weird	<h3>weird</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>怪诞的; 神秘而可怕的; 超然的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a weird old house, full of creaks and groans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是所神秘而可怕的旧宅, 到处嘎吱嘎吱作响。</font><br>古怪的; 离奇的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has some weird ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一些怪念头。</font><br>\n
welcome	<h3>welcome</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>欢迎, 迎接<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He welcomed you to enjoy his hospitality.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他欢迎你去做客。</font><br>乐于接受; 希望有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I welcome your help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我乐意接受你的帮助。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>受欢迎的; 可喜的; 来得正好的<br>被允许的; 可随意取用的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are welcome to the use of my books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可随意用我的书。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>欢迎; 迎接<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The host bids him welcome.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 主人欢迎他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A warm welcome awaits her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 热烈的欢迎等待着她。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>欢迎<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Welcome!Come in and meet my parents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 欢迎!进来见见我的父母。</font><br>\n

welfare	<h3>welfare</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>健康, 幸福, 繁荣<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are concerned about my welfare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们关心我的健康。</font><br>福利<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Patrick works for social welfare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 帕特里克为社会福利工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company's welfare officer deals with employee's personal problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司负责福利的工作人员处理雇员的个人问题。</font><br>〈美〉政府的福利(制度)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of the families in this neighbourhood are on welfare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一带的大多数家庭都接受政府的福利救济。</font><br>\n
well	<h3>well</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>好, 对, 满意地; 友好地, 和蔼地; 彻底地, 完全地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you eat well at school?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在学校吃得好吗?</font><br>夸奖地, 称赞地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They speak well of him at school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学校里的人都称赞他。</font><br>有理由地, 恰当地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You did well to tell him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你告诉了他, 做得对。</font><br>很, 相当<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may well be right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 很可能是你对。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>健康的; 痊愈的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't think he is really a well man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为他并不是真正健康的人。</font><br>良好的; 正常的; 令人满意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All is not well in this country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家的情况不能令人满意。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>(用于表示惊讶, 疑虑, 接受等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Well!Look at that amazing sight!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哦!看那迷人的景色！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>井, 水井<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They dug another well in the village.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在村里又挖了一口井。</font><br>泉; 源泉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A book is a well of knowledge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书是知识的源泉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(液体)涌出; 流出; 涌流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oil welled out of the ground.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 原油从地下涌出。</font><br>\n
well-known	<h3>well-known</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>出名的, 众所周知的; 熟悉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is one of the world's best-known writers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是世界上最知名的作家之一。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was well-known two years ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两年前她就出名了。</font><br>\n
west	<h3>west</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>西, 西部, 西方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The city is in the west of London.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座城市位于伦敦的西边。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Laos is on the west of Vietnam.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老挝在越南西面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Korean peninsula lies to the west of Japan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 朝鲜半岛在日本以西。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>在西方的; 西部的; 朝西的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shop is on the west side of the street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 商店在街道的西边。</font><br>(风)来自西面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a west wind blowing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那儿正刮着西风。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向西, 朝西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane flew west.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机向西飞行。</font><br>\n
western	<h3>western</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>西方的, 西部的; 在西方的, 在西部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is wearing a western style suit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他穿着一套西式服装。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This philosophy is western in origin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种哲学起源于西方。</font><br>\n
