wet	<h3>wet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>湿的, 潮湿的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If this wet land was drained, it would be good farmland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果把这块湿地的水排干, 这块地就会成为良田。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ground is wet after the rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨后地上是湿的。</font><br>下雨的, 多雨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We're having too much wet weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们这里下雨的日子太多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When it is wet, the buses are crowded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下雨天, 公共汽车非常拥挤。</font><br>懦弱的, 软弱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is really a wet young man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真是个懦弱的年轻人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her boyfriend is really wet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的男朋友非常怯懦。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>雨天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is standing in the wet without a coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没穿外衣, 站在雨中。</font><br>湿地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Come and walk on the dry road, instead of going through the wet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过来, 在干燥路面上走, 不要走湿路。</font><br>\n
whale	<h3>whale</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鲸, 鲸鱼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The blue whale is the world's largest living animal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蓝鲸是世界上最大的动物。</font><br>\n
what	<h3>what</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(用以询问某人或某事物的词) 什么, 多少<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is the price?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价钱多少?</font><br>…的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This dictionary is just what I want for my study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部词典正是我学习要用的工具。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>…的(事物或人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What colour is it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它是什么颜色的?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>(用于感叹句中)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What genius he has!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真有才华！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What happy children they are!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是些多么幸福的孩子呀！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>(用以表示不相信或惊奇)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What, do you really mean it?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 什么, 你真是这个意思?</font><br>(用以表示未听清楚对方说的话)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What?Can you say that again?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 什么?你能再说一遍吗?</font><br>\n
whatever	<h3>whatever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>任何(事物), 每样(事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will do whatever you wish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我会对你言听计从。</font><br>无论什么, 不管什么<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will never give up working, whatever happens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论发生什么事, 我们都不会放弃工作。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>任何, 什么…<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>任何<br>\n
whatsoever	<h3>whatsoever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>无论什么<br>\n
wheat	<h3>wheat</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>小麦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The farmer grows a lot of wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位农民种了许多小麦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Flour is made from wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面粉是用麦子磨成的。</font><br>\n
wheel	<h3>wheel</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轮子, 车轮, 机轮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A wheel revolves round its axis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 轮子是绕轴旋转的。</font><br>方向盘, 舵轮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm rather tired; will you take the wheel?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有点累, 你来替我驾驶好吗?</font><br>旋转, 旋转运动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Platoon, right wheel!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 全排向右转！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>转动, 旋转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wheeled and faced his opponent squarely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他转过身来面对着他的对手。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sails of the windmill were wheeling round.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风车的翼转个不停。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>推, 拉(车)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I shall be glad when she wheels the old man away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 等她把那个老人推走我就高兴了。</font><br>\n
when	<h3>when</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>什么时候<br>在那时, 其时<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>在…时, 当时<br>如果, 要是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the weather is good, I usually go to the country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 若是天气好的话, 我总是到乡下去。</font><br>既然, 考虑到<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>什么时候<br>那时<br>\n
whenever	<h3>whenever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>在任何时候<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may leave whenever you please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你愿意什么时候离开就什么时候离开。</font><br>每当, 每次<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whenever we meet him we speak to him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每次我们见到他, 我们都和他讲话。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>(究竟)在什么时候, 什么场合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whenever did you buy that?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那你到底是什么时候买的?</font><br>\n
where	<h3>where</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在哪里, 到哪里, 在什么位置<br>在…(地方); 到…(地方)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the house where the great man was born.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这所房子便是那位伟人出生的地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was shown into a small room, where there was a dying man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被领进了一间小屋子, 那里有一个垂死的人。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>(在)…的地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They live where the police can't get them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们住在警察抓不到他们的地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's where it is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那才是真正的理由所在。</font><br>\n
whereas	<h3>whereas</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>但是, 而<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some praise him, whereas others condemn him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些人赞扬他, 而有些人谴责他。</font><br>\n
wherever	<h3>wherever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>无论什么地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will find him wherever he may be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论他在哪儿, 我都要找到他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever possible, the illustrations are taken from literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要有可能, 例证都取自文学作品。</font><br>各处, 处处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever the film star goes, there are crowds of people waiting to see her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位电影明星所到之处都有成群的人等着见她。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>(究竟)在哪儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever are you taking me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你究竟要把我带到什么地方去?</font><br>\n
whether	<h3>whether</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>是否<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was in doubt whether she was right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对她是否正确拿不准。</font><br>不管…(还是…)<br>\n
which	<h3>which</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>哪一个, 哪一些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is the house which I built.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是我建的房子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ask him which he wants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 问他一下他要哪一个。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't decide which to choose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我无法决定要选哪一个。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>哪一<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let me know which train you'll be arriving on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 告诉我你要坐哪一趟车来。</font><br>\n
whichever	<h3>whichever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>…的那个人[事物]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Choose whichever of them you like best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选一个你最喜欢的吧。</font><br>无论哪个[哪些]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whichever of them are you going to help?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你究竟帮助他们当中的哪一个?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(究竟)哪个, 哪些<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whichever book do you like?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你到底喜欢哪一本书?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whichever day you come, we will be pleased to see you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论你哪一天来, 我们都很高兴。</font><br>\n
while	<h3>while</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>在…期间, 当…的时候; 与…同时<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp While in prison, he wrote his first novel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在狱中写出了第一部小说。</font><br>虽然, 尽管<br>而, 然而<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(一段)时间<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>消磨, 打发(时间)<br>\n
whilst	<h3>whilst</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>时时,同时<br>\n
whip	<h3>whip</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>鞭打; 抽打<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whipped the horse to make it go faster.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他鞭打马使它跑得更快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The culprit will be whipped when he is found.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个罪犯被找到后就要挨鞭子。</font><br>搅拌…直至变稠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is whipping the eggs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在打鸡蛋。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whip the ingredients into a smooth paste.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把配料搅拌成均匀的糊状。</font><br>偷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who's whipped my book?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁把我的书偷走了?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>突然移动, 横扫; 彻底击败<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bamboo whipped back and hit me in the face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那竹子突然弹回打在我的脸上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their team really whipped ours at football.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们的足球队彻底击败了我们队。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鞭子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's cruel to use a whip to punish a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 用鞭子惩罚孩子是残酷的。</font><br>\n
whisper	<h3>whisper</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>低声说, 耳语, 嘀咕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did she whisper in your ear at the meeting?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 开会时, 她跟你私下交谈了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She whispered a story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她低声讲故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whispered that he had got a new job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他低声说他已找到了新工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whispered the news to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他私下告诉我这个消息。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I whispered him not to make any noise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我低声告诉他别出声。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She whispered to me that his temperature was up again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她低声对我说他的体温又上升了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>沙沙地响<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind was whispering in the pines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风在松林中沙沙作响。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轻柔的飒飒(风)声; 低语, 耳语, 私语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were talking in whispers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在悄悄地谈话。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This fine engine makes only a whisper when running at full speed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部优良的发动机全速开动时也只发出一点点沙沙声。</font><br>传闻, 谣言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've heard a whisper that he's going to resign.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到了一个传闻说他准备辞职。</font><br>\n
whistle	<h3>whistle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>吹口哨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who whistled just now?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刚才谁吹口哨了?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy whistled a happy tune.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩用口哨吹了一支愉快的曲调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whistled a foreign tune to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用口哨为我们吹奏了一首外国曲调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whistled to his friends to keep hidden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他吹口哨通知他的朋友隐蔽起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>鸣笛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train whistled and steamed off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车鸣笛开走了。</font><br>呼啸着前进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cold wind whistled past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 寒风嗖嗖吹过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Another bullet whistled by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 又一颗子弹呼啸而过。</font><br>空指望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not prepared to use any firm's money to pay this man; let him whistle for his money!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想用任何公司的钱付给这个人, 让他做他的美梦吧！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>哨子, 汽笛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The referee blew a whistle at the end of the game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁判在比赛结束时吹响了哨子。</font><br>口哨声, 汽笛声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We heard the whistle of a train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听到了火车的汽笛声。</font><br>\n
white	<h3>white</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>白色的, 白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wore white trousers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着白色的裤子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She smiled, showing all her strong white teeth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她笑了, 露出一口洁白的好牙齿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His hair has turned white.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的头发已经变白了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No wool is so white but a dyer can dye it black.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何白羊毛都能被染黑。</font><br>白种人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the city there are many black people as well as white people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 城里除了白人外还有许多黑人。</font><br>脸色苍白的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went as white as a sheet when she heard the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她听到这个消息后脸色苍白。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>白色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp White and black are opposites.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 白色和黑色是对比颜色。</font><br>白种人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many whites in our town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们镇上有很多白人。</font><br>蛋清, 蛋白<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She used the whites of six eggs to make the cake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她用了六个鸡蛋的蛋白来做蛋糕。</font><br>\n
white-collar	<h3>white-collar</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>白领阶层的<br>\n
who	<h3>who</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>谁, 什么人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who is that woman in the red hat?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个戴红色帽子的女人是谁?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wonder who will play in the basketball match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道这场篮球赛谁会上场。</font><br>(限制性关系代词)…人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He who laughs last laughs best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后笑的人笑得最开心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All who[that] heard him were delighted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有听了他讲话的人都很高兴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the only one who[that] knows Russian.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是我们中间惟一懂俄语的人。</font><br>(非限制性关系代词)他, 她, 他们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The committee, who were all young women, fulfilled their duties admirably.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 委员会的委员们都是些年轻妇女, 很好地履行了她们的职责。</font><br>\n
whoever	<h3>whoever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(引导名词性从句)谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whoever wants the book may have it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁想要这本书都可以拿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll take whoever wants to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁要去我就带谁去。</font><br>无论谁, 不管谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll find the person who did this, whoever he is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要找出干这件事的人, 不管他是谁。</font><br>究竟是谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whoever could have done such a dreadful thing?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 究竟是谁能干出这种可怕的事呢?</font><br>\n
whole	<h3>whole</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>齐全的, 整体的, 全部的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole village was attacked with influenza.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整个村子的人都得了流行性感冒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old woman has been confined to her bed for a whole year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那老妇人已经卧病在床整整一年了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Forty is a whole number.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 40是个整数。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's the whole truth about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是事情的全部真相。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He ate an apple whole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把整个苹果一口吃下。</font><br>没有破碎的; 完整的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're lucky to escape with a whole skin.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你未受损伤而逃脱, 真是幸运。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you break the whole dish?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盘子被你打碎了?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was surprised to find himself whole after the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惊奇地发现自己在事故发生后安然无恙。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>齐全, 整体, 全部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole of my money was stolen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我全部的钱都被偷走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He spent the whole of the week in hospital.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他住院住了整整一星期。</font><br>整体, 一体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two halves make a whole.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两个一半构成一个整体。</font><br>\n
wholly	<h3>wholly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地, 全部地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wholly agree with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我完全同意你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your idea isn't wholly practical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的想法并非完全现实。</font><br>\n
whom	<h3>whom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(who的宾格)谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To whom did you give the book?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把书交给谁啦?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These new neighbours, to whom I was introduced yesterday, have come here from Singapore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些新邻居是从新加坡来的, 昨天我被介绍同他们认识了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know whom to give it to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道把它给谁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is the man (whom) they understood to be extremely rich.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他就是那个他们认为腰缠万贯的人。</font><br>\n
whose	<h3>whose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>谁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whose is this?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是谁的?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These books are mine, then whose are those?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些书是我的, 那些书是谁的?</font><br>那个[些](人)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That's the man whose house was burned down.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是房子被大火烧了的那个人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The men whose names were called left the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些被叫到名字的人离开了房间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play, whose style is rigidly formal, is typical of the period.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这剧本是那个时期的典型作品, 风格拘谨刻板。</font><br>\n
why	<h3>why</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>为什么<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why are you late?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你为什么迟到?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why not call on me tomorrow?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你干吗不明天就来看我呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is why I'm working hard at my lesson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 就是这个原因, 我要努力学习。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can't understand why he failed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不明白他为什么失败了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That is the reason why we must go now.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那就是我们现在必须走的理由。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why ever didn't you tell us before?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你怎么不早告诉我们呢?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>int.</i></font><br>呵唷, 哎呀, 嗨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Why, what's the harm?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嗨, 这又有什么害处呢?</font><br>\n
wicked	<h3>wicked</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>邪恶的, 恶劣的; 缺德的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was wicked of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真邪恶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a wicked accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那事故非常严重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What wicked weather!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气真糟糕！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is wicked to make other people suffer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让别人受罪就是作恶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was wicked of you to torment the poor girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你折磨那可怜的女孩, 真是恶劣。</font><br>淘气的, 顽皮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wicked children are quite annoying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 淘气的孩子令人讨厌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are being wicked again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你又在恶作剧了。</font><br>\n
wide	<h3>wide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>宽的, 宽阔的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He admired the city's wide streets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他赞美该市宽阔的街道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gate isn't wide enough to get the car through.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这大门不够宽, 小汽车进不去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The stream is too wide for me to jump across.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条小河太宽了, 我跳不过去。</font><br>范围大的, 广泛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His interests spanned a wide range of subjects.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的兴趣涉及广泛的学科。</font><br>完全张开的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She stared at him with wide eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她睁大眼睛注视着他。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>充分地, 完全地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He stood with his legs wide apart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他两腿完全叉开地站着。</font><br>(体育中)远离目标地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The arrow fell wide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 箭没有射中。</font><br>\n
widen	<h3>widen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>放宽, 加宽, (使)变宽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her outlook gradually widens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的眼光渐渐开阔了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are widening the road.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在加宽路面。</font><br>\n
widespread	<h3>widespread</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>分布广的; 普遍的, 广泛的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp English is a widespread language.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语是一种很普及的语言。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a widespread dissatisfaction among the students with the food on campus.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 学生们普遍对学校的饭菜不太满意。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This disease is widespread in tropical areas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种疾病在热带地区蔓延很广。</font><br>\n
widow	<h3>widow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>寡妇, 遗孀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Martha was a very rich young widow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛莎是个很有钱的年轻寡妇。</font><br>\n
width	<h3>width</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>宽度, 阔度, 广度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road has a width of twenty feet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那条路的宽度有20英尺。</font><br>宽, 广<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can't get it through the door because of its width.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们无法使它通过这道门, 因为它太宽了。</font><br>\n
wife	<h3>wife</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>妻子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some people think that husband and wife should never work together.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有人认为夫妻二人绝不应该在一起工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two men went fishing while their wives prepared the dinner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那两个男人去钓鱼时, 他们的妻子做晚饭。</font><br>\n
wild	<h3>wild</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>野生的, 未驯化的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They hunted wild animals for food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们猎取野生动物为食。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some wild flowers are growing in a corner of the garden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 花园的一角长了一些野花。</font><br>未开化的; 野蛮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wild tribes still inhabit part of the Philippines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 菲律宾部分地区仍然居住着一些原始部落。</font><br>无居民的, 荒凉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a wild stretch of land behind the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房子后面有一大片荒地。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the old gardener died, the garden grew wild.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老园丁死后, 花园就慢慢荒芜了。</font><br>强烈的, 狂暴的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a wild night tonight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个暴风雨之夜。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The weather has been very wild recently.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近来天气非常恶劣。</font><br>狂热的, 发怒的, 疯狂的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt a wave of wild fury overcame her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她顿时觉得怒不可遏。</font><br>对…狂热[着魔]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was wild with excitement at the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他听到这个消息后激动得发狂。</font><br>\n
wildlife	<h3>wildlife</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>野生的鸟兽等<br>\n
will	<h3>will</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>用于表示简单将来式) 将, 要, 会<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will let you know about it as soon as we come to any conclusion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们一得出结论, 我就会让你知道。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will you be free tomorrow afternoon?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你明天下午有空吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They say that it will rain tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们说明天将会下雨。</font><br>愿意; 准备<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will help him if he asks me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要他提出, 我愿意帮助他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp And I will take care of you, I promise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我保证, 我一定照顾你。</font><br>(用于请求某人做某事)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You will allow us to retire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请允许我们告退。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Help me with this baggage, will you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请你帮我搬这件行李好吗?</font><br>(用于表示可能, 与can类似)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That will be my brother ringing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按铃的可能是我哥哥。</font><br>(用于表示推测, 与must类似)大概, 可能<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man with the umbrella will be the Prime Minister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拿着雨伞的那个人准是首相。</font><br>(表示总是如此) 惯于, 总是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Oil will float on water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 油总是浮在水面上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Man will die.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人总是要死的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用意志力驱使(某事发生)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He who wills success is halfway to it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 热切争取成功等于成功了一半。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She willed herself to bury her past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她努力使自己忘记过去。</font><br>将(财产等)遗赠某人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He willed that his property be divided equally among his children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在遗嘱中讲明将自己的财产均分给子女。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Grandfather willed my brother his car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 祖父立下遗嘱把他的车留给了哥哥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She willed her house to her sister.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把房子遗赠给她妹妹。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>〈旧〉愿意, 希望, 想要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go where you will.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你愿意上哪儿就上哪儿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Fate has willed it otherwise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 命运偏不如此安排。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp God wills that man should be happy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上帝愿人类幸福。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>意志(力)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Will can conquer habit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 意志能战胜习惯。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She'll need an iron will in order to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她若想成功, 需要有很强的意志力。</font><br>决断, 意图, 决心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I felt he had a strong will.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我觉得他决心很大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where there is a will, there is a way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有志者, 事竟成。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What is his will in the matter?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在这件事上的意图是什么?</font><br>遗嘱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told me that he didn't know the content of the will.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他告诉我他不知道遗嘱的内容。</font><br>\n
willing	<h3>willing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>愿意[乐于]的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a willing horse but he always seems to get the rotten jobs.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个乐于帮忙的人, 可是他似乎总是做倒霉的事情。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't work well, but he's always willing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他活儿干得不好, 不过他总是愿意干。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am willing to help you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我很乐意帮助你。</font><br>不反对(某事), 愿意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Are you willing that he should be allowed to join in?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你愿意让他加入吗?</font><br>愿意[喜欢]做的[给的]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a willing worker.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一位志愿工作人员。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing is impossible to a willing mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 世上无难事, 只怕有心人。</font><br>\n
win	<h3>win</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(在…中)获胜, 赢, 战胜(对手)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Which side won?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 哪一方打胜了?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's sure to win.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一定会赢。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have won the football match.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们打赢了这场足球赛。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>获得…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She won a bronze medal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她得了铜牌。</font><br>(通过努力等)赢得, 博得, 获得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall win greater victories in the future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将取得更大的胜利。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She won her diploma in only three years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她仅用三年时间就取得了毕业文凭。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speaker soon won his audience.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 演讲人很快赢得了听众的好感。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That invention won him a medal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那项发明为他赢得了一枚奖章。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He soon won a reputation for himself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很快就成名了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(体育比赛中)胜利, 赢<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This season we've had three wins and two defeats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个赛季我们三胜二负。</font><br>\n
wind	<h3>wind</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>风, 气流<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A gentle wind disturbed the surface of the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 微风拂动水面。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These young men are advancing against the winds and waves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些年轻人迎着风浪前进。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rocks were shaped by sun, wind and rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太阳, 风和雨使岩石变形了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind blew out the candle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 风吹灭了蜡烛。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is not much wind today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天没什么风。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wind of war had swept his home away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战火毁了他的家园。</font><br>呼吸<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Climbing these stairs takes all the wind out of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 爬楼梯使他气喘吁吁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>缠绕, 卷绕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is winding the wool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在缠毛线。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The man's arm was wound with bandages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那人的胳膊上裹着绷带。</font><br>给…上发条<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's time to wind your watch.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该给表上弦了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The alarm clock was wound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 闹钟上过发条了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>迂回, 蜿蜒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The road winds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条路弯弯曲曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The river winds the valley.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这条河蜿蜒流过山谷。</font><br>\n
window	<h3>window</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>窗户; 橱窗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She heard a few taps on the window.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她听见有人轻轻地敲了几下窗户。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I saw the vase in the window of an antique shop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在一家古玩店的橱窗里看见了这个花瓶。</font><br>窗玻璃, 窗状开口<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The burglars smashed the window to get into the house.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盗贼打破了窗玻璃闯进屋里。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Windows allows a computer user to execute multiple programs simultaneously.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Windows操作系统允许计算机用户同时运行多个程序。</font><br>\n
wine	<h3>wine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>葡萄酒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wine is made from grapes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 葡萄酒由葡萄制成。</font><br>(其他)果酒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He drank two bottles of red wine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喝了两瓶果酒。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tried many wines and declared this to be the best.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他尝了好几种果酒, 宣布这一种最好。</font><br>\n
wing	<h3>wing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>翼, 翅膀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Butterflies' wings are very beautiful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 蝴蝶的翅膀很漂亮。</font><br>翅膀, 机翼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The plane's wings are very long.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 飞机的机翼很长。</font><br>派, 翼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He belongs to the radical wing of the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他属于该党的激进派。</font><br>\n
winter	<h3>winter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>冬, 冬天, 冬季<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dusk sets early in winter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 冬季天黑得早。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We used 10 tons of coal last winter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年冬天我们用了10吨煤。</font><br>\n
wipe	<h3>wipe</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>擦, 拭, 抹; 擦去, 拭去, 抹去<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He went on talking, occasionally wiping at his face with a towel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他继续说着, 偶尔用毛巾擦一下脸。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher wiped the misspelling from the blackboard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师把黑板上拼错的字擦了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>擦, 拭, 揩, 抹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give your nose a good wipe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 把鼻子好好地擦一擦。</font><br>\n
wire	<h3>wire</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>金属丝, 金属线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wire twists easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 金属丝容易弯曲。</font><br>电线, 导线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Electricity is carried along wires.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电沿着电线传导。</font><br>电报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got a wire to go home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他接到一封让他回家的电报。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>拍电报<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wired home for money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她拍电报向家里要钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wire me if you can't come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要是不来就给我打个电报。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>给…装金属线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workmen are busy wiring the new school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们正忙着给那所新建的学校装电线。</font><br>\n
wireless	<h3>wireless</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不用电线的; 用无线电波传送的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>无线电<br>无线电接收机或发射机<br>\n
wisdom	<h3>wisdom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>明智, 智慧, 正确的判断<br>知识, 学问<br>\n
wise	<h3>wise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>聪明的, 有才智的, 明智的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wise men learn by other men's mistakes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 聪明人能从别人的错误中吸取教训。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is no wiser than he used to.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他绝不比以前聪明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was wise to give up smoking.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他戒烟是明智的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was wise of you to remain silent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你保持沉默, 这很明智。</font><br>\n
wish	<h3>wish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>〈正〉希望; 想要; 但愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can get to work now if you wish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要是你愿意, 我们可以马上干起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you wish wine with your meal, sir?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 先生, 你希望吃饭时喝点酒吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They informed him that they wished reconciliation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们告诉他, 他们愿意和解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How I wish I was there with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要是也在那儿和你们在一起就好了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wish that I had never met him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望从来没见过他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wish I could fly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望会飞。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>祝愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His colleagues wished him happiness on his retirement.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他退休时同事们祝他幸福。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>渴望, 希望, 盼望, 愿望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our wish for better times has come true.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要过好日子的愿望已实现。</font><br>希望的事, 想要的东西<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wanted a new bike for Christmas and she got her wish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她想在圣诞节得到一辆新的脚踏车, 结果如愿以偿了。</font><br>许愿, 祈祷, 祈求<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He closed his eyes and made a wish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他闭上眼睛许了个愿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have no wish for a well-paid position.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不祈求待遇优厚的职位。</font><br>\n
wit	<h3>wit</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>风趣, 善于说俏皮话的能力<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our teacher is full of wit when he has a lesson.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的老师只要讲课就很风趣。</font><br>心智, 才智<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is a boy of quick wits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个机敏的孩子。</font><br>\n
with	<h3>with</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示关系)和…在一起<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you like to go to the street with me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你愿和我一起上街吗?</font><br>(表示状态)具有, 带有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many exhibits with characteristics of the Chinese art are on display.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多具有中国艺术特色的展品陈列出来。</font><br>(表示方式)用, 以, 藉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room is cooled with air conditioner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这房间用空调降温。</font><br>(表示对象)对…, 关于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was always good with the unfortunate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对不幸的人总是很友好。</font><br>(表示伴随)与此同时, 随着<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I always rise with the bell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我总是听到铃声就起床。</font><br>(表示让步)虽然, 尽管<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With all his abilities, he failed completely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 尽管很能干, 他还是一败涂地了。</font><br>(表示原因)由于, 因为<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She flushed with delight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她高兴得脸上通红。</font><br>(表示态度)支持, 赞同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is he with us or against us?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他赞成我们还是反对我们?</font><br>(表示态度)跟(…对抗)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are struggling with backwardness.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们在和落后现象做斗争。</font><br>\n
withdraw	<h3>withdraw</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>取[收]回<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'd like to withdraw 1000 dollars from my savings account and put it in my cheque account.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想从我的储蓄账户上提取1000美元转到支票账户上。</font><br>(使)撤退[出]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want to withdraw a statement I made earlier.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想收回我早些时候发表的一项声明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The general decided to withdraw his soldiers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位将军决定撤军。</font><br>\n
within	<h3>within</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…里面, 在…内部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are two long rivers within the continent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该地区有两条长河。</font><br>(表示时间)不超过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has grown three inches within the last two years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两年的工夫他长高了三英寸。</font><br>(表示距离)不超出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mr.Smith lives within ten miles of us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 史密斯先生住在离我们不到十英里远的地方。</font><br>(表示范围)在范围[限度]内<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is within our power to reward him for that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有权为那件事奖励他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are serious differences of opinion within the medical profession.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在医务界存在着严重的意见分歧。</font><br>\n
without	<h3>without</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示否定)无, 没有<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like a house without a bathroom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢没有浴室的房子。</font><br>(表示位置)在外面<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is waiting without the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在门外等。</font><br>(表示伴随)在没有…的陪伴下, 在不附带…的情况下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two can never talk without smiling.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他俩谈话没有不笑的时候。</font><br>\n
withstand	<h3>withstand</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>经受, 承受<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bridge withstands the flood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那座桥经得起洪水。</font><br>\n
witness	<h3>witness</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>目击者; 证人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a witness of the incident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是事件的目击者。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A witness was examined by him in a court of law.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在法庭上质问一个证人。</font><br>证词; 证据<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gave witness on behalf of an accused person.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他为被告作证。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>亲眼看见, 目击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I witnessed the accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我亲眼目睹了这场事故。</font><br>作证, 证明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No one could witness that he was present.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人能证明他在现场。</font><br>表示, 说明<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Severe damage witnessed the destructive force of the storm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 严重的损失表明了这场暴风雨巨大的破坏力。</font><br>\n

woman	<h3>woman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>成年女子, 妇女<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a woman of great insight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是一个有见解的女人。</font><br>女人(女子的总称)<br>\n
wonder	<h3>wonder</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>对…感到疑惑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jacelin says he didn't do it, but I still wonder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 杰斯林说他没那样做, 可我仍然怀疑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They waited and wondered what to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们等待着, 不知干什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wonder none of you were hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我纳闷怎么你们谁也没受伤。</font><br>想知道; 问自己<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was just wondering.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我只不过是好奇而已。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wonder how you came to miss your way.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想知道你是怎样迷路的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>惊奇, 惊叹, 惊异, 惊诧<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt wonder mingled with awe at the Grand Canyon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 面对着大峡谷, 他又惊奇又敬畏。</font><br>奇人, 奇才<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a wonder with the way he arranges everything without any help.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不要任何帮忙就把事情样样办妥, 真是个奇才。</font><br>奇观, 奇景, 奇迹, 奇事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Books are filled with many wonders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 书中充满了新奇的事物。</font><br>\n
wonderful	<h3>wonderful</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>极好的, 精彩的, 绝妙的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He told me a wonderful story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给我讲了个精彩的故事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His skill is wonderful for his age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他小小年纪, 技巧令人称奇。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's wonderful to see you again!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 再次见到你真是太好了！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How wonderful it was to be here with her!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和她一起在这里多好啊！</font><br>\n
wood	<h3>wood</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>木, 木头, 木材, 木料, 木柴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chairs are made of wood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些椅子都是木制的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He took a few bits of wood and made a fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他拿了几片木柴生火。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He put some more wood on the fire.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他又往火上加了些木柴。</font><br>树林, 林地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lost man yelled, hoping someone in the woods would hear him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 迷路的人大声喊着, 希望林子里的人会听见。</font><br>\n
wooden	<h3>wooden</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>木制的, 木头的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The room was full of wooden furniture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 房间里摆满了木制家具。</font><br>僵硬的, 呆笨的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She gave the stranger a wooden stare.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她呆头呆脑地瞧着那个陌生人。</font><br>\n
wool	<h3>wool</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>羊毛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sheep of mine have very thick wool.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我家绵羊的毛很厚。</font><br>毛线; 毛织品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her ball of knitting wool fell on to the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她织衣服的毛线团掉到了地板上。</font><br>\n
woolen	<h3>woolen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>毛纺的<br>\n
woollen	<h3>woollen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>羊毛制的, 毛线的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wear a woollen scarf.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她围着一条羊毛围巾。</font><br>生产羊毛制品的; 销售毛织品的<br>\n
word	<h3>word</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>字; 单词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How many letters are there in the word “struggle”?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp struggle这个单词有多少个字母?</font><br>(说的)话, 话语, 言语<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He didn't say a word about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对这件事一句话都没说。</font><br>消息; 谣言<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Word got round that he had resigned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谣传他已辞职。</font><br>口令, 号令; 命令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp On his word they all moved forward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 按照他的命令, 他们都向前进发。</font><br>诺言, 保证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I give you my word I'll go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我向你保证, 我会去的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Stand by your word.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 要守信用。</font><br>\n
work	<h3>work</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)工作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's been working hard all day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他辛劳地工作了一天。</font><br>(使)运作, 运转<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the telephones don't work properly today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今天所有电话机都出故障了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I know how to work the machine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道如何开动机器。</font><br>(使)产生效果<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the scheme works, most of the peasants in this area will be rich.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果计划成功, 这地区的大部分农民将富起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The newspapers say this new drug can work wonders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报上说这种新药有奇效。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工作, 劳动, 作业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have a lot of work to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有许多工作要做。</font><br>事业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's devoted her life to good work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她献身于慈善事业。</font><br>工作成果, 产品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The villagers sell their work to tourists.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 村民们将工艺品卖给旅游者。</font><br>著作, 作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is reading a new work on acupuncture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她正在看一本关于针灸疗法的新书。</font><br>工厂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The works have closed for the Christmas holiday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 圣诞假期, 这些工厂歇工了。</font><br>功<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you push hard against something and move it, you have done work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你用力推一件东西, 并且移动它, 那你就做了功。</font><br>\n
worker	<h3>worker</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>工作的人, 工作者; 研究者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His parents are scientific and technological workers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的父母都是科技工作者。</font><br>员工, 工人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The workers are reluctant to be ordered around by the employers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工人们不愿被雇主们差来遣去地随便使唤。</font><br>\n

workman	<h3>workman</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>技术工人, 工匠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A bad workman quarrels with his tools.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拙匠抱怨工具差。</font><br>\n

world	<h3>world</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>世界, 地球<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has sailed round the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她作过环球航行。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our world is but small part of the universe.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的地球只不过是宇宙的一小部分。</font><br>界, 领域<br>众人; 世人; 人类<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Keep quiet, we don't want the whole world to know about it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 安静些, 我们可不想让人人都知道这件事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Human acts have repercussions far beyond the frontiers of the human world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 人类行为所产生的影响远远超出人类世界的范围。</font><br>世间; 人间<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's very young and inexperienced, and doesn't know about the ways of the world.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他还很年轻, 又缺乏经验, 不懂得人情世故。</font><br>\n
worldwide	<h3>worldwide</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>全世界的, 世界范围的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book has worldwide sales.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书在全世界畅销。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His fame is worldwide.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的名声享誉全世界。</font><br>\n
