worried	<h3>worried</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>焦虑的, 烦恼的, 担忧的<br>\n
worry	<h3>worry</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>烦恼, 忧虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Too much worry had made him look an old man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 过分忧虑使他显得像个老人。</font><br>令人忧伤的人[事]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Life is full of worries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 生活中充满着使人烦恼的事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>担心, 为…发愁<br>(使)困扰, (使)烦恼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is always worrying about little things.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她老是为小事烦恼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He worried his father to buy a new car.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他苦苦缠着父亲要买一辆新车。</font><br>\n
worse	<h3>worse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>更坏的, 更糟的, 更差的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have even worse news for you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我有更坏的消息告诉你。</font><br>恶化的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's getting steadily worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的病情每况愈下。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>更坏地, 更糟地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has been taken worse.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他病情更重了。</font><br>(程度上)更…<br>\n
worship	<h3>worship</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>崇拜; 尊崇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A miser worships money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 守财奴崇拜金钱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>做礼拜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't talk while you are worshipping.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们做礼拜时别讲话。</font><br>\n
worst	<h3>worst</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>最坏的, 最差的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the worst singer I know.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是我所知道的最糟糕的歌手。</font><br>〈美〉最厉害的, 最激烈的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>最坏地, 最恶劣地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Manufacturing industry was worst affected by the fuel shortage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 燃料短缺制造业最受到影响。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>最坏的部分[情况, 事情, 可能性等]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I was prepared for the worst when I heard the news.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到了消息, 心里已经想到了最坏的可能性。</font><br>\n
worth	<h3>worth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(表示比率)值(多少钱), 值得<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The picture is worth at least twenty pounds.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张图片至少值二十英镑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The novel is worth reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部小说值得一读。</font><br>(表示归属)拥有(财产等)<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>价值<br>\n
worthless	<h3>worthless</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无价值的, 没有用处的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't read worthless books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要读没有用的书。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was worthless as a painter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他作为画家一事无成。</font><br>\n
worthwhile	<h3>worthwhile</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>值得的, 值钱的, 有价值的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher recommended some really worthwhile novels to his students.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师推荐给学生一些真正有价值的小说。</font><br>\n
worthy	<h3>worthy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>应得某事物; 值得做某事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is worthy of our praise.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他值得我们赞许。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There occurred nothing that was worthy to be mentioned.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有值得一提的事发生。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is worthy mentioning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事值得一提。</font><br>可尊敬的<br>\n
would	<h3>would</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>aux.v.</i></font><br>将<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They said they would meet us tomorrow morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们说明天早晨与我们会面。</font><br>(表示习惯、行为、习俗)老是, 总是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When-ever he had time, he would do some reading.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一有时间, 就会读点书。</font><br>(表示设想、推测、可能性)也许, 大概<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She would be about 60 when she died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她死时也许60岁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If I were you I wouldn't agree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要是你就不会同意。</font><br>(表示婉转的请求)请<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would you kindly show me the way to the station?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以指点我去车站的路吗?</font><br>(表示意愿)愿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Would that I were young again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我若能返老还童该多好。</font><br>\n
wound	<h3>wound</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>创伤; 伤口; 伤痕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Apply some medicine to his wound.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给他的伤口上点药吧。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使受伤, 伤害<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief wounded her in the arm with his knife.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小偷用刀子扎伤了她的手臂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her pride has been wounded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的自尊心已经受到伤害。</font><br>\n
wrap	<h3>wrap</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包, 裹; 卷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better wrap it with a piece of clean cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好用一块干净的布把它包起来。</font><br>\n
wreck	<h3>wreck</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>毁坏[毁灭]某物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire wrecked the hotel.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那场大火把饭店烧毁了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The rice mill was wrecked by the enemy bombing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 碾米厂遭到了敌机的轰炸。</font><br>\n
wrinkle	<h3>wrinkle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(尤指皮肤上的)皱纹; 皱褶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The old man's face is covered with wrinkles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老人的脸上布满皱纹。</font><br>〈非正〉有用的建议; 妙计, 好主意<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使起皱纹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wrinkled her nose at the smell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她闻到这气味就皱起了鼻子。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(尤指皮肤)起皱纹<br>\n
wrist	<h3>wrist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>腕, 腕关节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They took her by the wrist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们握住她的手腕。</font><br>\n
write	<h3>write</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>写<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he was very young, he began to learn to read and write.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很小的时候就开始学习读书写字了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She writes gracefully.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她字迹秀丽。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have been writing this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 本周我一直在写。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Let's write a notice of next Friday's meeting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们来写一份关于下星期五开会的通知。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After she wrote the melody, she asked us for criticisms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她做好曲之后, 请我们提意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote what he saw.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他写下了所看到的情况。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wrote Beijing “Peking”.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把北京写作Peking。</font><br>写信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have had another performance of the play since I wrote.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 从我上次给你写信之后, 这个剧我们又演出了一次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Write me, and let me know how things go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 望来信, 谈谈你那儿的情况。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My son wrote to say he was coming from Paris this week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的儿子来信说他这个星期从巴黎来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She writes that she is leaving tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她信上说她明天要走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wrote my mother a letter hurriedly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我匆忙地给我母亲写了封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please write us the result.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把结果函告我们。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't forget to write all the news to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要忘记把一切消息都写信告诉我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wrote Bass that his father was not well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她给巴斯写信, 说他爸爸身体不舒服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Write me when you get home.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你到家后给我写封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He wrote her to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他给她写信要她回来。</font><br>\n
writer	<h3>writer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>作者, 作家<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the writer of the letter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他就是写这封信的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dickens was a famous English writer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 狄更斯是英国著名作家。</font><br>\n
writing	<h3>writing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(书)写, 写作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Writing is his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 写作是他的生计。</font><br>著作, 作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His writings include poetry and prose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的作品包括诗和散文。</font><br>\n
wrong	<h3>wrong</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不道德的, 不正当的, 不义的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cheating is always wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 欺骗总是不对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are quite wrong in doing this.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做这件事是不应该的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You were wrong to take the car without permission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你未经许可就把车开走是不应该的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is wrong to steal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 偷窃是不道德的。</font><br>不确实的, 不正确的, 错误的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You're wrong; she didn't say that.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你错了, 她没那么说。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've been wrong to accuse him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我指责他是不正确的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was wrong of you to go there.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你去那儿是错误的。</font><br>不合要求的, 不适合的, 并非合意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the wrong time to make a visit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个时间去拜访是不合适的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I knew something was dreadfully wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我知道有些情况极不正常。</font><br>有故障, 有毛病<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The clock's wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这钟不准。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>方式或方向错误地; 错误地; 结果错误地<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>罪过, 过失, 罪恶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He doesn't know the difference between right and wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是非不分。</font><br>不义的行为, 不公正的事<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher has done his students a great wrong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个老师对待他的学生们十分不公正。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy complained of the wrongs he had suffered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩申诉他受到的委屈。</font><br>\n
X-ray	<h3>X-ray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>X射线, X光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp X-rays are used by doctors to examine the bones or organs inside our body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp X光被医生用来检查人体内部的骨骼和器官。</font><br>X光检查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the hospital for an X-ray yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她昨天去医院作了X光检查。</font><br>X光片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chest X-rays showed moderate enlargement of the heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 胸部X光片显示出心脏稍有扩大。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用X光摄影[检查, 治疗]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They can't tell till they X-ray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在使用X光检查之前, 他们还说不上来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've never X-rayed for two years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我两年来没有做过X光检查。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you X-rayed your chest?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的胸部用X光照过没有?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They X-rayed her leg to find out if the bone was broken.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用X光检查她的腿骨是否断了。</font><br>\n
yard	<h3>yard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>院子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can play outside, but you must not leave the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以在外面玩, 但不得离开院子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children are playing in the yard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们正在院子里玩耍。</font><br>场地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I work in the railway yards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我在铁路调车场工作。</font><br>码(等于3英尺或36英寸或0.9144米)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You can still buy cloth by the yard in this country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个国家买布还论码。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was standing under a tree about ten yards away.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他站在约十码远的一棵树下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We need 3 cubic yards of sand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们需要3立方码的沙子。</font><br>\n
yawn	<h3>yawn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>打呵欠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yawned and fell asleep.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打着呵欠睡着了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yawned heavily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打了个大呵欠。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She yawned during the lecture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她听讲座时一直在打呵欠。</font><br>张开, 裂开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A great gap yawned between the rocks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在岩石间有个大裂缝。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>呵欠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His yawns suggested he was either tired or bored.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他呵欠连天说明他不是疲倦, 就是厌倦。</font><br>乏味或枯燥的事物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The meeting was one big yawn from start to finish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那会议自始至终十分无聊。</font><br>\n
year	<h3>year</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>年<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A leap year has 366 days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 闰年有366天。</font><br>一年的期间, 年度; 学年<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's been a good year for films.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是个适于拍片的一年。</font><br>年纪, 年龄, 年岁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looks young for her years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看起来比她的岁数年轻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Purple, though beautiful, adds years to the age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 紫色虽美, 但会使人显得老气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My teacher is a seventy-year-old woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的老师是一位70岁的老妇人。</font><br>\n
yearly	<h3>yearly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>每年的, 一年一度的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The flower show is a yearly event in our town.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们镇上的花展一年举行一次。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The earth makes a yearly revolution around the sun.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 地球每年绕太阳一周。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>每年, 一年一度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The examination is held yearly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种考试一年举办一次。</font><br>\n
yell	<h3>yell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>叫喊, 号叫<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>叫喊, 号叫, 叫着说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This gave them a chance to yell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd yelled when the hometown team scored a touchdown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他们自己的队得了底线分时, 人群高声呼喊起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yelled with fright.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惊恐得大声喊叫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They yelled the oath.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大声宣誓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yelled his defiance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声抗议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They yelled their goodbyes when the bus left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车开动时, 他们大喊再见。</font><br>\n
yellow	<h3>yellow</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>黄色的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She wore a yellow dress.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她穿着一件黄外衣。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A ripe lemon is yellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 熟了的柠檬是黄色的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was autumn and the leaves were yellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 已经是秋天了, 树叶变黄了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fields were yellow with wheat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麦田一片金黄。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The curtain was yellow with age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 窗帘因年久而呈现黄色。</font><br>黄皮肤的; 黄种人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some peoples are yellow races.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些民族是黄色人种。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most of Asians are yellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数亚洲人都是黄皮肤。</font><br>胆怯的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I always suspected he was yellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我总怀疑他很胆小。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>黄色<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yellow is her favourite colour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她最喜欢黄颜色。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使某物)变黄或发黄<br>\n
yes	<h3>yes</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “Is this a painting by Picasso?” “Yes, it is.”</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “这是毕加索的画吗?”“是的。”</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yes, what you say is right.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不错, 你说的是对的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His composition is good, yes, very good.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的作文很好, 是的, 很好。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He smiles at you, yes?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在对你笑, 对吗?</font><br>\n
yesterday	<h3>yesterday</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>昨天<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yesterday was my birthday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天是我的生日。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can remember it as if it were yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我对此事记忆犹新, 恍如昨日一样。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where was she yesterday afternoon?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天下午她在什么地方?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accident happened the day before yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那意外事故发生在前天。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在昨天, 在昨日<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He arrived only yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他昨天刚到。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was very busy yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天她非常忙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wasn't born yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不是小孩子。</font><br>\n
yet	<h3>yet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>还, 尚, 仍然<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He can't drive yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他还不会开车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The job is not yet finished.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这工作还没做完。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He said he hadn't received a letter from her yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说他至今尚未收到她的信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The poor girl loves him yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那可怜的姑娘现在依然爱着他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Go at once while there is yet time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 趁着还有时间, 马上去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have yet to find out the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我还得去了解真相。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ah, so you've bought new slippers yet!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 啊, 所以你还买了新拖鞋！</font><br>已经<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have the children come home yet?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们已经回家了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is the biggest underground lake yet discovered.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是迄今为止所发现的最大地下湖。</font><br>甚至, 更<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must work harder yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须更努力些。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He may surprise us all yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他总有一天会让我们大家感到惊奇的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The most severe weather is yet to come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最冷的天气还在后头呢。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>然而, 但是<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She's a funny girl, yet you can't help liking her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她很滑稽, 但你禁不住会喜欢她。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy is so fat and yet he runs very fast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩很胖, 但却跑得很快。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is very old, yet he is quite strong.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他虽然年纪很大了, 但还很强壮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I agree with you, but yet I can't consent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我同意你的意见, 但是我不能答应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lives alone, yet he is happy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他虽然独自生活, 但却很愉快。</font><br>\n
yield	<h3>yield</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>生产, 出产, 带来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This land yields well.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这块土地产量高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This old tree still yields apples every year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这棵老树仍然每年结苹果。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A cow will yield several gallons of milk each day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一头母牛每天产几加仑的牛奶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His business yields big profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的企业获利大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This article yield-ed us great profit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这东西给我们带来了很大的收益。</font><br>屈服, 放弃; 不再反对, 让出<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shall never yield.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们绝不投降。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The terrorists have yielded two of their hostages.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 恐怖分子交出了两名人质。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were forced to yield the city.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们被迫放弃这座城市。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She yielded me her books.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把书让给了我。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She yielded her property to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把她的财产让给我了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>变形, 折断, 塌陷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The shelf is beginning to yield under that heavy weight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 架子受不了那重量, 开始塌下去了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>产量, 收益<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All these have helped raise farm yields steadily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有这些都有助于农业产量的稳步提高。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The yields on his shares have increased in this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年他的股票红利增加了。</font><br>\n
yoga	<h3>yoga</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>瑜伽派(印度哲学的一派)<br>瑜伽(术); 瑜伽修行法<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I do two hours yoga every day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 每天我练两小时瑜伽功。</font><br>\n
yoghurt	<h3>yoghurt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>酸乳酪, 酸奶<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I only had a strawberry yoghurt for breakfast.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我早餐只吃一个草莓酸奶。</font><br>\n
you	<h3>you</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>您, 你, 你们<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can you tell me the nearest way to the station?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你能告诉我去火车站最近的路吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I thought she told you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我以为她告诉你了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was absurd of you to do such a thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做那样的事是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mind your own business, you!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你少管闲事！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You fool!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你这笨蛋！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You girls are always getting into trouble.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们这些女孩子老是惹麻烦。</font><br>一个人, 任何人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Driving on the left is strange at first but you get used to it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 沿着路的左侧驾车刚开始时有些别扭, 可是习惯就好了。</font><br>\n
young	<h3>young</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>年幼的, 年轻的, 幼小的, 新发展的; 有朝气的, 有青春活力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man graduated from a prestigious university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个年轻人毕业于一所名牌大学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a young family to support.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他要抚养年幼的子女。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young trees have struck root.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些幼树已经扎根了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In her young age Miss Ross did her best as a school teacher.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在她的青年时代, 罗斯小姐尽到了身为一位教师的最大本分。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young look is in fashion this year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今年时兴扮年轻人的样子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a young ambition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有着年轻人一般的雄心。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cook was still young then.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当时库克还年轻。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is ten years younger than her husband.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她比她丈夫小十岁。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is old in body but young in heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他人老心不老。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is young at work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她没有工作经验。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That hat is too young for you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你戴那顶帽子显得太年轻了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are too young to join the army.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你年龄太小, 还不能参军。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>年轻人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young in our society need care and protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们社会的年轻人需要关怀和照顾。</font><br>幼小的动物, 崽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lion fought to protect her young.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那头狮子为了保护其幼狮而进行搏斗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cat has been with young.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这只猫已怀胎了。</font><br>\n
youngster	<h3>youngster</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>孩子; 少年; 青年; 年轻人<br>\n
your	<h3>your</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>你(们)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you brought your toothbrush with you?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你带牙刷来了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your pants are dirty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的裤子脏了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I hope he doesn't mind your saying it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我希望他不介意你说的话。</font><br>\n
yours	<h3>yours</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>你(们)的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This book is yours, not mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本书是你的, 不是我的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is my pen, and yours is on the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是我的钢笔, 你的在桌子上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our school is not as big as yours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的学校没有你们的大。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You said he was a friend of yours.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你说过他是你的一个朋友。</font><br>\n
yourself	<h3>yourself</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>你自己<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must have cut yourself when shaving this morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你早上刮胡子时一定刮破了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Look at yourself in the mirror!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你在镜子里照照自己吧！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You don't seem yourself today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你今天看上去不太舒服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have only got to be yourself and they will all love you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你只要表现自然, 他们就都会爱你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Just relax and be yourself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你要放松自然一点。</font><br>(用以加强语气)亲自<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You yourself said so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 是你自己这样说的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you do it yourself?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是你自己做的吗?</font><br>\n
youth	<h3>youth</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>青年时期, 青春(期)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They studied together in their youth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青少年时期他们就在一起学习。</font><br>青春, 活力, 朝气, 血气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She kept her youth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她青春依旧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am determined to give my youth to the motherland.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我决心把青春献给祖国。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost his youth a long time ago.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他早已失去了青春活力。</font><br>青年人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The youth of our country have[has] lofty ideals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我国的青年有崇高的理想。</font><br>年轻人, 青年男子<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The youth of today has greater opportunities than ever before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现在的年轻人比以往任何时候都有更多的机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several youths and girls were standing at the street corner.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有几个小伙子和姑娘站在街道拐角处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some youths were standing near the bus stop.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一些年轻人正站在车站旁边。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He billeted in youth hotels.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他投宿于青年旅馆。</font><br>\n
yummy	<h3>yummy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>美味<br>\n
zero	<h3>zero</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(数字)零<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The figure 100 has two zeros in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 数字100有两个零。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher put a zero on his paper.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师在他的试卷上打了个零分。</font><br>零点, 零位; 零度<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was ten degrees below zero.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气温是零下十度。</font><br>没有, 无<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our hopes fell to zero.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的希望完全破灭了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>把(枪等)直接瞄准[聚焦]…<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They zeroed in on the key issues for discussion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把注意力集中到讨论的关键问题上来。</font><br>\n
zone	<h3>zone</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(划分出来的)地区, 区域, 地带<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do not enter the danger zone!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 切勿进入危险区！</font><br>气候带<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>将…划分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They zoned the house into sleeping, sitting and dining rooms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们将房子区分成卧室、客厅和餐厅。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This small town has been zoned as a shopping area.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个小镇已划作商业区。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The whole hospital area has been zoned off until the infection is under control.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这种传染病得到控制以前, 整个医院已同外界隔离。</font><br>\n
zoo	<h3>zoo</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>动物园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A zoo is a place where live animals are kept in captivity for the public to see.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物园是圈养动物以供公众观看的场所。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two gorillas have escaped from the zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两只大猩猩从动物园里逃跑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many animals in a zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物园里有许多动物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Modern zoos are much better than they used to be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现代的动物园比过去的好得多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His sister works at Beijing Zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的姐姐在北京动物园工作。</font><br>\n
